1b1(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+nyA na dz+wa la tan+t+ra rAdza/ bod skad du/ dpal ye shes
1b2(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// kye ma sangs rgyas
1b3(rgyud 'bum): kye sangs rgyas/ / ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yi// rgyud ni gang lags rgyal po gang // ye shes
2a1(rgyud 'bum): gang lags 'bar ba gang / / dpal ni gang lags bdag la gsungs// 'jigs
2a2(rgyud 'bum): byed chen pos bka' stsal pa/ / dpal ni gnyis med ye shes te// gnyis med bde chen ro las byung //
2a3(rgyud 'bum): gzung 'dzin mtha' spangs rang rig go/ sna tshogs mdud pa ye shes che// rang byin brlabs pa lte bar te//
2a4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor 'khor gsang bar ro// smin mtshams kyi ni mdzod spu ltar// thung du gnas shing ring du
2b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / de nyid drang dang kha dbye dang // rgyas par bya ba gsum yod do// dang por drang ba'i rnam pa yang // 'drongs
2b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i tshad ni gsum yod de/ / sgo gsum yon tan gsum ldan na// sor bzhi phyi ru 'byung bar nges// 'bring la sor
2b3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis tha ma la/ / sor dang nas kyi tshad kyis 'byung // sbom phra gzhan skyes phra mo tsam// dang po bya gdong nyid na gnas//
2b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam thar sor gnyis skye mched bzhi// stong pa bcu drug khams bco brgyad// nyi shu lte bar nyi shu la// snying ka ru ni gnas
2b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / sman la sogs pa kun ldan pas// drang ba'i sbyor ba brtsam par bya// rnam snang ska rags bcing ba dang // rgyab yol
3a1(rgyud 'bum): dbul dang mchod pa dbul// gdan khri dbul dang sku khrus dbul// spyan mchod dbul dang me mchod dbul/
3a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas reg bya'i mchod pa dngul// kun rdzob lce yi rtse mo 'am// khro mo mdzub mo'i rtse mo yi// bdud rtsa ril bu legs byas te// mkhas pas
3a3(rgyud 'bum): rigs bya'i mchod pa 'phrul/ / mngon du shes pa gdon mir// bde chen po'i mchod pa yis// khams gsum mchod par gdon mim/
3a4(rgyud 'bum): dar ram med dri mor bano chad// rked pa mA rags dbul bar bya// sprul pa'i g.yas dang g.yon gnyis sa// ras bal la stsogs
3a5(rgyud 'bum): yol dbul/ / shing bu rigs dang mthun pa yi// sgrom phra rigs kyi bdag pa n+dam// dri med sman dang snyam ldan pa'i// drug rngumi bskyed
3a6(rgyud 'bum): rdzas kyis/ / lo ro cana'i lam du mchod// dri zhim chu yi khrus byas te// khrus kyis lus la mchod pa dbul// sman dang sum gyi la yos/
3b1(rgyud 'bum): sgo gnyis ngag tu mchod pa dbul// shin tu dra ba'i me dag gis// gtum mo'i me la mchod pa dbul// rked pa'i tshad mnyam karti ka/ gdan khri bsgrub pa'i mchod pa dbul// de yis
3b2(rgyud 'bum): 'drongs par gdon mi za/ / de nas rgyas par bya ba yang // gzhan ni gong dang 'dra ba ste// phyi nang 'dod pa'i mtshan mu kun// rgyas par byed pa'i lam yin te// brgyad pa'i sbyor ba gsum byas na//
3b3(rgyud 'bum): dper na me tog pad+ma bzhin// de nas dbye ba'i rim pa yang // gong du gsungs pa thun mong ste// dus gsum lce yi rtse mos kyang // bskyod na nges par kha 'byed de// de nyid gsum ni mi rang bzhin//
3b4(rgyud 'bum): me 'bar ba yi rkyen gyur pa// rlung nyid yin par gsungs pa ste// rkyen des me nyid 'bar ba bshad// gzhan yang rkyen gyi bye brag dang // srog rtsol rlung ni dbu mar dgag/ bum pa zhabs
3b5(rgyud 'bum): med rlung phul nas/ / sgo dgu phyi rol drag tu bud// lus kyi ngal dub chab snyam ste// sbyong ba rdzogs na bde ba'i rkyen// bde ba las ni rdo rje 'chang // bde ba yis ni bde ba 'grub// rgyu bde
3b6(rgyud 'bum): ba las 'bras bu bde/ / rgyu yi nang na 'di mchog la// 'bras bu'i nang na 'di mchog go// de nas bde ba'i rkyen gyur pa// srid pa dgag dang rlung dgag pa// gnas nas gnas su rten bzung
3b7(rgyud 'bum): ste/ g.yas brkyang bas ni ro ma dgag/ dpa' bo g.yas nas mkha' 'gro g.yon// g.yon brkyang bas ni brkyang ma ste// sags kun dar ma ru gzung // de bzhin zlum pos dbu mar gzang //
4a1(rgyud 'bum): de dag kun gyi bye brag kyang // dpa' bos g.yas dang gzhan gyis g.yon// de bzhin kun la sbyar bar bya// gzhan yang gzung ba'i bye brag kyang // dril can bu gu dgu
4a2(rgyud 'bum): lam gyi/ / rlung rgyu phyi ru bus byas te// rkang lag drug tu bsgrims byas na// zin par 'di la the tsom med// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma gnyis kyis// thun mong du ni bya bar gsungs// bai ro tsa na las
4a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi rlung / / gzhan yang lam brgyad rlung rnams dag/ dang po nyid du bsdams byas na// zin par 'di la the tsom med// dbye ba bsdams pa'i man ngag go// byed pa spel mar sos gyur na// mi zin pa la
4a4(rgyud 'bum): the tsom med/ / gnas gsum dag tu klu bsams te// dbugs gsum pa yis yar drangs te// lte ba'i gyen la drangs kyang zin// 'di ni gang zag mchog gi sa yin// mdzes pa'i spyi bo de nyid la/
4a5(rgyud 'bum): gyen du bkan dang thur du bkan// drang por g.yas g.yon bcan thabs la// ka ti'i gzer ni btsan thabs gcig/ sbom po khro mos mnan pa ste// bla ma'i zhal nas ma blangs na// lus kyi nang gzhi
4a6(rgyud 'bum): kun nas skye/ / chu skyes chu so skrangs la sogs// lus smad nad sna nyi shu 'byung // gzhan yang btsan thabs bcu gnyis ni// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// bla ma mnyes par bya ba'i phyir// lus
4a7(rgyud 'bum): srog longs spyod thams cad kyis/ / dus gsum maN+Dal dang bcas mchod// lus srog gtang bar 'phangs pa bas// man ngag dam pa de bas 'phangs// de bas btsan thabs legs par swa/
4b1(rgyud 'bum): man ngag chu bo'i rgyun 'dra bas// denying rgyud du shes par bya// zab mo'i don ston rgyal por gsungs// rdo rje phag mo la sogs rnams// gsang ba'i gsang ba rmad byung 'di// khyod la gtad do dam
4b2(rgyud 'bum): du spos/ / kun la spel na dam tshig nyams// kye ma rgyud 'di'i don 'di la// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa'i// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs// thams cad ngo mtshar cher
4b3(rgyud 'bum): skyes te/ / dga' zhing mgu nas yi rang ngo // dpal ye shes 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang ba las kyang cher gsang ba rmad du byung ba rdzogs so// // sing ga gling
4b4(rgyud 'bum): gi rnal 'byor ma tsan+d+ra mA le dang / dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// rgya gar skad du/ shrI tsan+d+ra ma le tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du
4b5(rgyud 'bum): dpal zla ba'i 'phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// kye ho mgon po rdo rje can// sgrol ma nyi shu rtsa bzhi yi// nges pa gang lags tshad gang lags// rang
4b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin grub pa ji ltar lags/ / mgon pos bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rang bzhin grub pa sgrub 'dod pas// bla ma'i bka' drin legs mnos te// dur
4b7(rgyud 'bum): khrod la sogs sa phyogs su/ / bar chad gsum med yon tan ldan// brtags pa las dang po yi gnas// gang zag mchog la brtag tu med// yon tan ldan pa'i sar 'jug ste// bla med sems
5a1(rgyud 'bum): @gzung rnal 'byor pas/ / sgo gsum dal ba'i tshad brtag ste// bcing ba gsum ni nges bsgoms pas// skye ba gcig gis 'grub par nges// dbugs bcing kun rdzob sna
5a2(rgyud 'bum): rtser yid/ / yid bcing sor bzhi'i nam mkha'i khams// sems bcing rang rig bsam mi khyab// rgyu rkyen las ni sna tshogs las// sems can mos pa sna tshogs 'byung // de dag bcing gsum dag
5a3(rgyud 'bum): pa yis/ / sems can bcings las nges par grol// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// 'du shes gsum gyi cha las grol// thig le cha gsum phra mo ni// yan lag lnga ldan 'byung ba'i rim/
5a4(rgyud 'bum): sgra dang rang rig re rer snang // stong nyid thabs dang shes rab tshul// sa dang lam sogs rim pa kun// rang bzhin gyis gnas mkhas pas sbyar// de nas sgrol ma'i tshad bstan te// tshad ni spyi dang
5a5(rgyud 'bum): bye brag ste/ / brgya phrag gnyis dang bcu gnyis dang // yi ge gsum las nges 'byung ba// gsang ba gcod pa'i rgyud kyi tshad// brgya phrag gcig dang sum cu lnga// yi ge bcu dgu las 'byung ba// rin
5a6(rgyud 'bum): chen 'phreng ba'i nges pa'i tshad/ / brgya phrag gcig dang sum cu bzhi// mi 'gyur bcu gsum las byung ba// sku gsung thugs kyi sgron ma'o// brgyad cu rtsa lnga'i yi ge bzhis// ma tshang ba las gang
5a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba/ / gsang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// brgyad cu rtsa gnyis yi ge gcig/ rin chen 'bar ba'i ldang tshad do// sum cu rtsa gcig yi ge ni// nyi shu rtsa gnyis las byung ba// nam mkha'
5b1(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa'i tshad yin no/ / drug cu rtsa drug yi ge drug/ dam tshig chen po'i rgyud kyi tshad// drug cu yi ge nyi shu gcig/ gsang ba rdo rjer rab tu grags// drug cu rtsa gnyis mi 'gyur ba// bcu drug
5b2(rgyud 'bum): stobs po che yi tshad/ / bzhi bcu rtsa gcig yi ge lnga// nam mkha' chen po'i tshad yin no// drug cu rtsa drug yi ge drug/ ye shes 'bar ba'i ldang tshad do// sum cu rtsa drug yi ge dgu// ye shes
5b3(rgyud 'bum): 'phrer ba'i tshad yin no/ / sum cu rtsa bzhi nyi shu bzhi// mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i tshad yin no// sum cu rtsa bzhi bcu bzhi dag/ me yi 'phreng ba'i tshad yin no// drug cu rtsa drug yi ge drug/ nyi shu rtsa
5b4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis bco brgyad dag/ ye shes rgyal po'i ljang tshad do// bdun cu rtsa brgyad rkang pa phyed// chags pa'i rgyal po'i tshad yin no// tshigs su bcad pa nyi shu lnga// ye shes bsam pa'i ldang
5b5(rgyud 'bum): tshad do/ / dgu bcu go brgyad las byung ba// ye shes gsang ba'i tshad yin no// nyi shu tham pa gang yin pa// gsang ba rdo rje rgyal po'i tshad// brgya dang nyi shu rtsa gnyis ni// rdo rje rgyal po'i ra li'i
5b6(rgyud 'bum): tshad/ lnga bcu rtsa gsum yi ge bcu// dur khrod rgyan gyi ldang tshad do// sum cu rtsa gsum yi ge ni/ bcu drug mkha' 'gro ma sdom tshad// lnga bcu yi ge bco lnga las// byung ba gsang ba bdud
5b7(rgyud 'bum): rtsi'i rgyal/ / bzhi bcu yi ge nyi shu bzhi// nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i gzhung tshad do// sum cu yi ge bcu drug las// byung ba zla ba'i 'phreng tshad do// de nas nges par bshad bya ste// gsang ba'i
6a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo gang ston pa/ / gsang ba'i rdo rje'i dam tshig dag/ ston pa dam tshig chen por nges// dgra drug sten pa stobs po che// dbang bzhi dag sgrub gsang ba gcod//
6a2(rgyud 'bum): rang rig de ston bsam mi khyab// yi ge gsum ston rin chen 'bar// sgo gsum lam ston nam mkha' mnyam// bcom ldan la sogs the tsom med// ston pa nam mkha'i chen po ste// dbang
6a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhi'i de nyid gang ston pa/ / ye shes gsang ba'i rgyud du nges// lta spyod rmad du gang byung ba// ston pa ye shes 'phreng bar nges// gleng bslang rnam pa lnga yi don// ston pa mkha' 'gro gsang
6a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rgyud/ / he ru ka dpal gang ston pa// me yi 'phreng ba'i rgyud du grags// dbang gsum don ni gang ston pa// sku gsung thugs kyi ra li ri nges// snod bcud rin chen ston byed pa// rin
6a5(rgyud 'bum): chen 'phreng ba'i ra lir nges/ / lhan cig skyes ston ye shes bsam// rdo rje rnyog pa med pa'o// lha yi de nyid gang ston pa// chags pa'i rgyal po ra lir nges// nges pa lnga sngon rdo rje rgyal//
6a6(rgyud 'bum): ri gi a ra li zhes grags// dur khrod brgyad ston dur khrod rgyan// dam tshig sdom pa mkha' 'gro gsum// ston pa mkha' 'gro sdom pa'o// dkyil 'khor la sogs drug stor pa// gsang
6a7(rgyud 'bum): ba bdud rtsi'i rgyal po'o/ / 'khrul pa 'khrul gzhi de sad pa// gsum ston ye shes rgyal po'i rgyud// ma spangs nges ston nyi 'khor lo// tshad nges sgrub gsum ston zla 'phreng // rgyud sogs
6b1(rgyud 'bum): lnga ston ye shes 'bar/ / de nas 'khor thams cad dga' nas rgyud thams cad kyi don la yi rang bar gyur to// dpal zla ba'i 'phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//
6b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyu gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+hA ra dang / lo tsang dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// rgya gar skad du/ shI rat+na dz+wa la tan+ta rA nA ma/
6b3(rgyud 'bum): bod skad du/ dpal rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// he he rdo rje snying po dang // mkha' spyod ma la sogs pa dag/ sgo gsum
6b4(rgyud 'bum): legs par bsdus nas ni/ / ra li chen po'i dbye ba nyon// la las byung ba thabs kyi rgyud// ra las byung ba shes rab rgyud// i phyis a las gnyis med rgyud// thabs ni sku ste shes rab
6b5(rgyud 'bum): gsung / / gnyis med thugs su shes par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin las// nyi shu rtsa bzhi byung ba'o// a la la ho i ma'o// thabs ni la las ji ltar byung // ra las shes
6b6(rgyud 'bum): rab ji ltar byung / / a las gnyis med ji ltar byung // sku gsung thugs su ji ltar 'gyur// nyi shu rtsa bzhir ji ltar dbye// e ma ho mgon pos bshad du gsol// 'jigs byed chen
6b7(rgyud 'bum): pos bka' stsal pa/ / a las a ba d+hU tI ste// 'di nyid las ni gnyis med rgyud// 'byung ba'i gnas dang rgyu ru brtag/ la las la la nA yi rtsa// de las thabs kyi rgyud byung ba'i// rgyu dang
7a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas dang ngo bor brtag/ ra las ra sa nA ya rtsa// 'di nyid las ni shes rab kyi// ra li 'byung ba'i rgyud dang gnas// ra ni chags phyir shes rab ste// shes rab yi ge
7a2(rgyud 'bum): bcu drug brda/ / la ni nub phyir thabs yin te// thabs kyi yi ge bcu bzhi'i brda// thog ma med nas ma skyes pa// e ni gnyis med rang bzhin te// gnyis med blo yi spyod yul min// blo dang sgra ri kun
7a3(rgyud 'bum): rdzob phyir/ / g.yas ni thabs yin la la nA// g.yon pa shes rab ra sa nA// a ba d+hU tI gnyis su med// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med kyi// ra li'i ngo bo shes par bya// 'dod chags rdul/
7a4(rgyud 'bum): la lus ni thabs// la la nA ni sku yin te// gti mug mun pa dag dang yang // shes rab ra sa nA ni gsung // zhe sdang snying stobs yid yin te// thugs te gsum gyis 'gyur ba'o// sku la
7a5(rgyud 'bum): brgyad de gsung la brgyad/ / thug la brgyad de nyi shu bzhi// ra li nyi shu bzhi ru nges// gnas ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi dang // tsaN+Da li dang phyag dag dang // mkha' 'gro 'byung po nyi shu bzhi// de nyid brda ru nges pa ste// sku gsung thugs kyi
7a6(rgyud 'bum): dbye bas so/ / gnas dang mkha' 'gro ra li dbye// sku gsum du ni de nyid bsdu// dang por rgyud kyi nges pa dang // rgyu yi gnas dang gnas nges pa// gtang sa nges dang go rims nges// grangs
7a7(rgyud 'bum): ngos rigs nges bco lngar nges/ / mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa yi// dman pa'i rim pas dang por gsungs// dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud// de rjes rnal 'byor nyid yin te// skyes pa
7b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dul phyir rnal 'byor rgyud/ / phyi nas rnal 'byor ma rgyad ni// bud med yongs su gzung phyir ro// dang po rtsa ba'i rgyud gsungs te// de nas bshad pa'i rgyud nyid do// de nas rgyud ni phyi ma'o//
7b2(rgyud 'bum): de rjes phyi ma'i phyi ma ste// rim pa bcu ni bskor ba ste// snod ngan dman pa'i rim pas gsungs// me tog snying po'i bcung bzhin du// phyi yi phyi nas bdud rtsi'i ro// ra li'i snying po snying po'i rgyud//
7b3(rgyud 'bum): dang por la las sku yi rgyud// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro mas zhus nas// sku yi mkha' 'gro brgyad la gtad// de rjes ra las gsung gi rgyud// gsung gi mkha' 'gro brgyad la gtad// phyi nas
7b4(rgyud 'bum): a las thugs kyi rgyud/ / thugs kyi mkha' 'gro brgyad la gtad// gnyis med ye shes bdud rtsi'i ro// lus las lus gsal mig gis lus// gsal ba'i phyir ni sgron ma ste// seng ge'i
7b5(rgyud 'bum): gzugs 'dra bdud rtsi'i ro/ / nyi ma'i 'od 'dra zla ba'i zer// 'brug gi sgra 'dra rgya mtsho'i gting // chu bo'i rgyun 'dra ri rab lhun// u dum wAr 'dra'i zhing gi rdul// 'di la 'dod 'dod tshol
7b6(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / rtog ge pa yis dpyad du med// gal te rang 'dod dpyad gyur na// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro khros gyur to// mgo lus tshul pa brgya ru 'gas// de bas rang gi chung ma dang // bu dang yul
7b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lus ngag gis/ / bla ma dam pa mnyes bya ste// chu bo rgyun 'dra'i man ngag blang // kye ma'o mgon po snying rje can// ra li'i dbye ba de ltar na// de yi chen po ji ltar lags// nang du nyi shu
8a1(rgyud 'bum): rtsa bzhi yi/ / nges pa slar yang bdag la gsungs// rdo rje can gyis bka' stsal pa// ma spangs nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyis// ra li 'di ni chen por nges// re re la yang chen po
8a2(rgyud 'bum): bdun/ / gang zhig 'bras bu 'dod pa la// rgyu nyid gtso bor gyur pa ste// sa lu las ni myu gu bzhin// de phyir dang po rgyu mi spang // lhan cig skyes gnyis rgyu yin te// rang bzhin lhan cig skyes
8a3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / lhan cig lhan cig skyes pa'o// thun mong dang ni thun mong min// bla ma'i zhal nas shes bya'i phyir// dpa' bo mkha' 'gro'i zhal yin te// de nyid ston pa'i bka' las 'das//
8a4(rgyud 'bum): de las 'khrul pa snying re rje// phung sogs rtsa dang shu kra ni// lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu yin te// log rtog 'khrul pa rgyur 'dod dang // ngo bo ma grub rgyur 'dod dang // kun rdzob byang sems rgyur
8a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa/ / 'di ni rmongs pa ma rungs pa// phung po 'byung ba dbang po dang // phyi yi skye mched dman pa'i rgyu// brtags pa rgyur 'dod snying re rje// nam mkha'i me tog gi dri gang // rang bzhin
8a6(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa'i rtsa rlung sogs/ / khyad par lam gyi rgyu yin te// rang bzhin gnas pa ma shes par// log par rtogs pa snying rje nyams// don dam byang chub sems kyis ni// lhan cig skyes pa'i
8a7(rgyud 'bum): ye shes rgyu/ / bla ma ma bsten de las 'khrul// kun rdzob shu kra rgyur 'dod pa// rgyu dang 'bras bu 'khrul pa'o// rkyen med rgyu yis 'bras mi 'byin// de phyir rkyen ni spang mi bya// ye shes
8b1(rgyud 'bum): rlung dang ye shes me/ / lhan skyes gnyis med rkyen yin te// de nyid spang bar mi bya zhing // las kyi rlung dang me nyid dang // gzhan du'ang de nyid sbyar bya dang // srid pa len dang bde ba len//
8b2(rgyud 'bum): las mi spang zhing bde ba yang // mi spang ba ni bzhi po'o// lus dang lus kyi snying po rtsa// gnas dang gnas chen mi spang ba// lnga pa drug pa yin par 'dod// de nyid phyi dang nang du shes// phyi
8b3(rgyud 'bum): nang dbye ba ma spangs pa'o/ / snang ba dang ni mun pa'i cha// gang ba dang ni stong pa'i char// 'pho ba ma spangs brgyad pa'o// rgyu yi gnas dang 'bras bu'i gnas// de nyid mi spang shes par bya//
8b4(rgyud 'bum): rin po che yi pho brang du// rten ni mi spang shu kra gzung // gal te de rum zin na// shor ba mi spang ro mar bstim// gnyen po mi spang gzugs sku gnyis// ma spangs pa ni bcu gnyis pa'o//
8b5(rgyud 'bum): nor bu'i rten las skyes pa yi// bde ba la brten dbang po yi// sgo bsdu ngo bo ma spangs pa'o// gong 'og khyad par shes byas nas// sgyu mas gnyen po ma spangs pa'o// dga' ba mchog dga'
8b6(rgyud 'bum): shes byas te/ / sngon du 'gro ba ma spangs pa'o// 'khor ba lugs las bzlog bya ste// gnas nas gnas su zlog byed pa// gnas kyi khyad par ma spangs pa'o// de nyid rim par 'pho byed pa/
8b7(rgyud 'bum): bla ma'i bla ma las brgyud shes// 'khor bar 'jug ldog bye brag ni// 'pho ba ma spangs rnam pa gnyis// ye shes me ni cher 'bar bas// phung po 'byung po dbang po sogs// thams cad
9a1(rgyud 'bum): bdud rtsir gyur pa ni/ / rkyen gyi khyad par ma spangs pa'o// lus kyi ba spu'i bu ga dang // brtan dang g.yo ba'i dngos po kun// bde ba'i ngo bor gang snang ba// ngo bor
9a2(rgyud 'bum): khyad par ma spangs pa'o/ / de nyid sgyu ma'i rang bzhin med// gnyen po'i khyad par ma spangs pa'o// bzhin mdzes mig yangs phyag rgya ni// ldan pa phyag rgya ma spangs pa'o// dam tshig
9a3(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi phyag rgya dang / / de nas ye shes phyag rgya che// phyag rgya'i khyad par ma spangs pa'o// chags pa'i phyag rgya las yin te// dam tshig chos ni ma ning gi/ phyag rgya gnyis su shes par bya/
9a4(rgyud 'bum): ye shes phyag rgya chen po gnyis// grol ba'i phyag rgya yin par 'dod// phyag rgya'i dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// dang por gsang ba'i 'khor lor te// phyi nas rang bzhin 'khor lor yin//
9a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo'i dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// dang po gsang ba'i gtum mo ste// gnyis par rang bzhin gtum mo ni// gtum mo'i dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// las kyi rlung dang me gnyis ni//
9a6(rgyud 'bum): kun rdzob 'khor ba'i rkyen yin te// ye shes rlung dang me gnyis ni// don dam gnyis med rkyen yin te// rkyen gyi dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// srid pa bskyed cing 'dzag pa bde// kun rdzob shu
9a7(rgyud 'bum): kwa'i las yin no/ / srid pa mi len rang rig skyes// don dam byang sems las yin no// las kyi dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// sbyor thabs rtsa ni rgyas po dang // kha 'byed pa yi las yin
9b1(rgyud 'bum): te/ sbyor thabs bzhi la ma rmongs pa// 'di ni ma spangs nyi shu brgyad// spyi mthun las las grub pa yi// mig drug la sogs grangs kyis bstan// rang rig ye shes gang 'dod pas//
9b2(rgyud 'bum): bla ma'i dus thabs legs par bsten// mi spangs nges pa'i gdams ngag blang // 'di nyid rdo rje 'chang gi rgyu// de las byung ba khyad par 'bras// dang por cha ste thig le dang // tshul dang
9b3(rgyud 'bum): tshul can mchog gzhan mchog/ 'di nyid de nyid drug yin te// de nyid drug ni tsaN+Da lI// re re la yang bani bzhi ste// tsaN+Da lI ni nyi shu bzhi// ra li nyi shu rtsa bzhir nges// phyi ru gnas ni
9b4(rgyud 'bum): nyi shu bzhi/ / spyan dang phyag rgya nyi shu bzhi// tsaN+Da lI dang ra li yi// phyi dang nang du grangs su nges// he he dpa' bo rdo rje 'chang // ra li 'byung ba'i rgyu gang lags// ra li'i ngo bo gang gang
9b5(rgyud 'bum): lags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sku dang phyag mtshan rags pa kun// ra li'i ngo bo dman pa'i lam// mkha' spyod sa spyod sa 'og spyod// sgo gsum la gnas khyad
9b6(rgyud 'bum): par gyi/ / ra li'i ngo bor gsungs pa yin// dga' ba bcu drug rten dang bcas// zab pa'i ra li'i ngo bor brtag/ rang rig stong pa thobs dang bcas// mthar thug ra lir shes par bya//
9b7(rgyud 'bum): a ni thog mar ma skyes pa// la ni nub dang skyong ba ste// ra ni chags dang rin po che// ra las 'dod chags khrag yin te// la las zhe sdang khu ba'o// a las gti mug khu ba ste// sems
10a1(rgyud 'bum): can ra li'i rang bzhin te/ / ye shes lnga dang sa bcu sogs// kun la ldan pas ra lir gnas// sku yi ra li spyi bo yi// gtsug tor dag las byung ba'o//
10a2(rgyud 'bum): gsung ni ljags kyi dbang po las// thugs kyi re li thugs ka nas// byung ba rnam par nges pa'o// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// spyan rnams la ni rang bzhin byung // sku gsung
10a3(rgyud 'bum): thugs kyi gnas las te/ / spyi bo la sogs dag las byung // phyag gi mthil nas rim pas byung // bla ma'i zhal nas blang bar bya// bye brag 'byung ba'i sgo yin te// he he sems can
10a4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyi/ / rang bzhin sa dang lam ldan te// zla ba bcu sogs sa sogs ni// rdzus skyes la sogs ji ltar lags// 'on te sangs rgyas min nam ci// sems can thams cad
10a5(rgyud 'bum): gdod ma nas/ / sangs rgyas yin par gsungs pa ste// rdzus skyes sgong skyes drod gsher sogs// sems kyi gnas bcu sa bcu ste// rnam shes brgyad ni byang chub lnga// mkhan po sems
10a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi rgyal po ste/ / rang bzhin dag pa chos gos yin// rang bzhin gnas pa kha spu bregs// a dang haM gnyis sngags kyi don// thams cad sems la gnas pa ste// sems med sangs rgyas
10a7(rgyud 'bum): ma yin te/ / ngam grog la sogs bems po'o// sems nyid sangs rgyas yin pa'i phyir// sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin no// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i tshul dang yang // bag la nyal
10b1(rgyud 'bum): dang kun tu rgyu/ / nus pa'i tshul dang mngon sum tshul// gzugs can gzugs med mkhas pas brtag/ sangs rgyas sems can de bzhin no// de ltar sems can sangs rgyas pas//
10b2(rgyud 'bum): ra li sems can rang bzhin phyir// lus la sku yi phyag rgyas gdab// ngag la gsung gi phyag rgyas gdab// sems la thugs kyi phyag rgyas gdab// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin du//
10b3(rgyud 'bum): dngos po ro mnyam gyur pa la// sangs rgyas sems can ga la yod// dman dang gya nom ga la yod// 'khor ba yongs su shes pa la// mya ngan 'das zhes de la brjod// thams cad
10b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs dang rnam rtog spong / / 'di la thams cad ngo mtshar gyis// legs par gtad kyis dam du spro// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thams cad ngo mtshar du gyur te mi snang bar gyur to//
10b5(rgyud 'bum): dpal rin chen 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// / rnal 'byor ma zla ba'i 'phreng ba dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o//
10b6(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ shrI sUr+ya tsakra tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba// dpal
10b7(rgyud 'bum): bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / a la la la ho dpa' bo kye// ngo mtshar med du byung ba yi// bskyed dang rdzogs pa chen po yi// ma spangs pa dang nges pa dag/ mgon pos bdag la
11a1(rgyud 'bum): bshad du gsol/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dang po ma spangs bshad bya ste// phung po khams dang skye mched dag/ bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rgyu ma spangs//
11a2(rgyud 'bum): phyag mtshan nyi zla yig 'bru dang // bla ma'i man ngag rkyen ma spangs// lus ngag sgo bsdams dam tshig las// sku gnyis 'byung ba 'bras ma spangs// zhe sdang ru trar skye ba'i las// zhe sdang
11a3(rgyud 'bum): rang rig bskyed pa dang / / lus kyi dri mi 'khrud pa las// las kyi dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// pu li ra dang dza lan sogs// nang du spyi bo spri gtsug sogs// gnas kyi dbye ba ma spangs
11a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / shar sogs bdud kyi snying ka ru// zhabs gnas gnas chen ma spangs pa// gnas de phyi dang nang du shes// gnas kyi dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// gser 'gyur rtsi yi rnam pa bzhin// /
11a5(rgyud 'bum): phung sogs lha ru 'pho byed na// 'di ni 'pho ba ma spangs pa'o// rgyu yi gnas ni snying ka ste// 'bras bu'i gnas ni phung sogs te// ma spangs pa ni gnyis su shes// phung sogs sgyu mar
11a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin byed pa/ / 'di ni rten pa ma spangs pa'o// gal te nang du ma zin na// phyi ru de nyid ngo bor bsgom// de nyid shor ba ma spangs pa'o// gnyen po ma spangs sgyu mar bsgom// phung sog
11a7(rgyud 'bum): la rten lha rnams la/ / sgo gsum ngo bo ma spangs pa// tha mal pa dang bskyed rim gnyis// gong 'og khyad par shes bya ste// sgyu ma gnyen po ma spangs pa'o// bdun po rnam dag la
11b1(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa/ / sngon du 'gro ba ma spangs pa'o// phung sogs rtog pa las log nas// phra ba'i gnas su gnas pa byed// gnas kyi khyad par ma spangs pa'o// lha yi rnam par 'jug
11b2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / gang du sgyu mar bzlog pa gnyis// 'pho ba'i khyad par ma spangs nyid// ye shes me ni cher 'bar te// phung sogs sgyu mar gang 'dzin pa// rten gyi khyad par ma spangs pa'o//
11b3(rgyud 'bum): mnyam gzhag rjes thob kun 'gags te// thams cad rten dang brten par snang // ngo bo'i khyad par ma spangs pa// de nyid sgyu ma'i rang bzhin med// gnyen po'i khyad par ma spangs pa'o//
11b4(rgyud 'bum): shes rab phag mo ma spangs pa// phyag rgya ma spangs pa ru 'dod// ma spangs gcig ni gzhan dang 'dra// gong 'og las kyi khyad par ro// zhe sdang thugs la 'dod chags gsung // gti/
11b5(rgyud 'bum): mug sku yi phyag rgya ste// phyag rgya'i dbye ba ma spangs pa// sku dang gsung dang thugs 'khor lo// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo dag/ 'khor lo'i dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// dang po sgyu ma
11b6(rgyud 'bum): ye shes me/ / gnyis pa sgyu ma ltar snang me// gtum mo'i dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// phung sogs sgyu ma las g.yo zhing // phung sogs sgyu mas yang dag sreg/ kun rdzob rtogs pa'i
11b7(rgyud 'bum): rkyen yin te/ / sgyu ba lngar snang las g.yo zhing // sgyu ma de nyid lhar bsregs pa// don dam gnyis med rkyen yin te// rkyen gyi dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// 'khor ba spel zhing
12a1(rgyud 'bum): mchog brdzeg/ klan rdzob bden pa sems kyi las/ ma 'kho bsgrib/ don dum sems kyi mas man// las kyang kyil n
12a2(rgyud 'bum): gas sgrungs hU~M b+hU rgya / / rnam pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba'o// gsang nga bang bla ma'i zhal nas byung / shes rab myi shes gzhan du'o// ngan pa'i maspangs te shre l+h+wam
12a3(rgyud 'bum): rig ldan cis smras pa so/ / chos nyid ma dag pani pa'i dra// mal gyi man ngag rgyan ma spangs// 'gyu ba'i chos rnams rang rig mes// bemag pa las ma sbyangs pa yin// grong+gal
12a4(rgyud 'bum): pas dbye ma spangs/ / a ba d+hU tA 'og min gnas// gnas dang gnas chen ma spangs pa// de nyid phyi dang nang du nges// phyi nang dbye ba ma spangs pa'o// stong pa dang ni gzung 'dzin char
12a5(rgyud 'bum): / 'pho bam spangs a dang haM// rten ma spangs te rtog pa la// sems 'phros de nyid rang rig bsgom// shor ba ma spangs par rig pa// dbang po'i sgo bsdu ngom spangs// chog bcom gnyen
12a6(rgyud 'bum): po ma spangs pa/ / rang rig la sems pa las// sngon du ma spangs ma spangs brgyad// tha ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// spri dang rang rig mtshan nyid la// 'pho ba ma spangs rang rig bsgom
12a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya ma spangs rang rig las/ / 'phrin las nyi shu rtsa bzhi 'byung // las ma spangs te gzhan rnams ni// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// dang med bla ma ma bsten dang // bla ma dam pa ma
12b1(rgyud 'bum): rnyed dang / / ma spangs ngo bor ma shes par// rang rig 'bras bu gang 'dod pa// de dag mi shes dri mas bsgribs// dper na sbrul gyi 'o ma bzhin// de nas nges pa bco lnga yang // rgyu
12b2(rgyud 'bum): nga rkyen dang gnas dang yang / / gtad pa go rim grangs dang ril// nges pa bdun ni gzhan du gsungs// sngags na spos bcas spros med des// rkyen ni ye shes me rlung nges// rgyu 'bras
12b3(rgyud 'bum): gnas ni a haM nges/ / dbang bzhi gong 'og khyad par nges// sun 'byin gnyen po nges pa dang // ngo bo nges dang dbye ba des// las nges pa dang bco lnga ste// de las byung ba'i nges pa dag
12b4(rgyud 'bum): bcu bdun bla ma'i zhal nas shes/ / ma spangs pa dang nges pa yi// mtshan nyid yongs su shes gyur na// 'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul pa'i gzhi// thams cad 'di yis spong bar byed//
12b5(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa yi// dngos grub thams cad 'di las 'byung // gong bu chu dang gzugs su gnas// de bzhin gzugs las 'das pa ste// gnas pa rnam pa bzhi ru yang //
12b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyud ni nges pa kho na ste// rgyud ni dbang po'i ngo bor gnas// de phyir dngos grub 'dod pas kyang // 'bad pas bla ma mnyes bya ste// rgyud kyi ngo bo dbang rnams dang // de yi man ngag shes
12b7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / bla ma mnyes par ma byas shing // dbang rnams thob pa ma byas par// nyan pa la sogs byed pa ni// 'bras bu med cing rlag par 'gyur// de bas 'bad de nan tan bya//
13a1(rgyud 'bum): dpal nyi ma'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsab dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing
13a2(rgyud 'bum): zhus te gtan la phab pa'o/ / rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+nyA na rA dza tan+ta rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal ye shes rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/
13a3(rgyud 'bum): dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// kye ma sangs rgyas kyi sangs rgyas// kye ma sangs rgyas mdzad pa legs// gang phyir sems can thams cad kyis// mya ngan 'das pa thob
13a4(rgyud 'bum): bya'i phyir/ / dad dang brtson 'grus rdzogs byas te// bla ma'i rjes su 'jug par bya// rang rig gnyis su med pa la// gzhan rig gnyis su 'dzin pas 'khrul// gzod nas ma skyes ma
13a5(rgyud 'bum): grub la/ / skyes dang grub par 'dzin pas 'khrul// dngos po ro mnyam gyur pa la// dman dang gya nom 'dzin pas 'khrul// 'khor ba yongs su shes pa nyid// mya ngan 'das par
13a6(rgyud 'bum): brjod pa la/ / sangs rgyas sems can rtog pas 'khrul// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa la// rgyu dang rkyen gyis skye bas 'khrul// brda dang tha snyad bral ba la// blo yi spyod yul
13a7(rgyud 'bum): byed pas 'khrul/ / mtha' bral dbu mar gnas pa la// rtag dang chad par 'dzin pas 'khrul// shes brjod yul las 'das pa la// bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pas 'khrul//
13b1(rgyud 'bum): dngos po mtshan ma la sogs pa'i// rnam rtog kun gyis stong pa la// dngos por rjes su 'dzin pas 'khrul// rang nyid gnyis su med pa la// bden pa gnyis su 'dzin pas
13b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khrul/ / gdul bya sna tshogs 'dul ba yi// theg pa du ma'i gong 'og la/ sgro dang skur pa 'debs pas 'khrul// sems can 'khrul pa sna tshogs kyis// las kyi rnam smin
13b3(rgyud 'bum): la sogs la/ / blta bas skur pa 'debs pas 'khrul// rang rig gzod nas 'od gsol la// sku mdog phyag mtshan la sogs pa// rdo rje 'dzin par 'dod pas 'khrul//
13b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul pa'i gzhi// 'dod chags 'dod chags chen po ste// 'khrul gzhi 'khrul pa las 'das na// 'dod chags chen po bcom ldan 'das// zhe sdang zhe sdang
13b5(rgyud 'bum): chen po dang / / de bzhin zhe sdang bcom ldan 'das// gti mug gti mug chen po ste// de bzhin gti mug bcom ldan 'das// 'di yis nges par grol 'gyur gyi// 'di spangs
13b6(rgyud 'bum): gzhan gyis grol ba min/ / bdag po lha dang bla ma spun/ bdag po lhan cig rnal 'byor tsam// theg pa spyi bsdus de las gzhan// skye bo'i bems po che dang brgyad// de dag
13b7(rgyud 'bum): rang rig thob pa'i rgyu/ / de phyir dam tshig gtso bor bsrungs// 'bras bu'i khyad par rang rig 'byung // kye ma mgon po kye sangs rgyas// 'dod chags dbye ba de ltar na// de yi ngo bo
14a1(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar lags/ / zhe sdang la sogs de dang 'dra// rdo rje snying po snying rje che// legs par nyon la yid la zung // las dang las kyi rnam smin gyi// rgyu 'bras
14a2(rgyud 'bum): mi shes gti mug ste/ / lus sems kun nas 'khrugs pa dag/ zhe sdang yin te sgo gsum gyis// kun nas bslang ste nor bu'i mthar// sa bon 'byung ba 'dod chags so// dbang
14a3(rgyud 'bum): sogs ngo bo gang ma shes/ / 'dod chags la sogs chen por nges// rang rig ngo bo gang la gnas// 'og ma spong ba'i gnyen po ste// ngo bo sgyu mar gang shes dang // dbang po'i
14a4(rgyud 'bum): sgo bsdus thabs yin te/ / gong ma skye ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i// phyir yang chen por gyur pa ste// gzhan gyi don du gyur pa dang // de las gzhan dge mos 'gyur dang // mang po mi mos
14a5(rgyud 'bum): spong ba dang / / nyon mongs spyi yis zil ma non// bye brag 'dod chags zhe sdang sogs// zil gyis mi non 'og ma yi// rnam rtog gang yang mi skye dang // nyon mongs spyi dang bye brag
14a6(rgyud 'bum): spong / / gnyen po yin par nges pa dang // nyon mongs skra rtse tsam mi skye// gnyis ni gong dang 'dra ba ste// bcu gnyis 'dod chags chen po dag/ bcom ldan 'das su gsungs pa ste/
14a7(rgyud 'bum): zhe sdang la sogs de bzhin no// zab mo'i lha spyod ma rtogs par// sngags spyod bzlas pa la sogs byed// de dag ngal ba don med yin// de dag bla ma dam pa las// man ngag
14b1(rgyud 'bum): dam pa brtul bya ste/ / 'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul gzhi las// sad par byed pa'i cho ga blang // de'i tshe rgyud kyi don la dga' zhing rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// dpal ye shes rgyal po
14b2(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//
14b3(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra DA ki nI gu h+ya tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// kye ho mngon
14b4(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs mgon po kye/ / dbang rnams dam pa yod dam chi// gtso 'khor khyad par med dam ci// sems can dang ni sangs rgyas la// bye brag tha dad med dang
14b5(rgyud 'bum): ci/ dam tshig che chung ji ltar mchis// de nyams bshags thabs yod dam ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rnam rtog gzung 'dzin dgag pa dang // rang rig s
14b6(rgyud 'bum): hes thugs pa'i phyir/ / dbang rnams sgyu ma tsam du yod// rnal 'byor sems kyi ngo bo ru/ dbang ni nges pa 'on ste// lus ngag kun nas 'bang ba la// de phyir sems kyi drim na//
14b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khrung dang gtor dang sreg pa dang // mkhyen pa'i rten pang po 'byed pas// sa dang chu dang me rang rlung // nam mkha' lta bu gsungs pa ste// dang po gnyis pa gsum pa dag/ rim
15a1(rgyud 'bum): gyis ma bgrod dbang mi thob/ / bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas shing // rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod rnams la// thabs 'di rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis//
15a2(rgyud 'bum): skas kyi rim pa lta bur gsungs// gang zag mchog dang las dang po// mngon par rtog pa'i rim pa dang // mngon par rtogs pa yan lag go/ 'di yis ngan 'gro srid las grol/
15a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang dang man ngag 'brel bas so// de nas bzhi pa zhal gyi dbang // sngon du 'gro dang mi 'gro med// 'di ni dbang gi rgyal po ste// slob dpon sems kyi rgyal po yin// 'di ni rang rig
15a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa'i dbang / / 'di yis thams cad grol bar 'gyur// 'di la rtag tu phyag sogs bya// rdo shing 'dra 'bag la sogs pa'i// gzugs brnyan yongs su rdzogs pa dang // ras
15a5(rgyud 'bum): dang tshon pa la sogs pa'i/ / gzugs brnyan yongs su rdzogs pa la// byin rlabs ye shes dbab byas nas// lha yin zer nas mchod sogs te/ bcos ma la sogs de ltar na//
15a6(rgyud 'bum): phung sogs ye nas sangs rgyas la// ci yi phyir na mchod mi byed// de nas gzhan yang dbye ba dag/ 'khrul pa dang ni 'khrul pa'i gzhi// bcos ma nye bar bcos ma dang // 'dra ba yin
15a7(rgyud 'bum): pa lta bu yi/ / dbang bzhis grol bar mi 'gyur te// log pa'i sred pas sred par 'ching // 'khrul pa'i 'khor los 'khor bar 'khor// de bas dngos grub 'dod pas kyang // lha yi/
15b1(rgyud 'bum): bu yi bdud spangs te// bla ma dam pa rtag tu bsten// yid ches rig dang nges pa skye// lung gi tshad ma yin pa dang // 'og ma spangs shing gong ma thob// man ngag tshad ma yin pa blang //
15b2(rgyud 'bum): mos pa'i rjes su 'brang byed cing // che ba'i nga rgyal la gnas shing // 'jig rten ltar sprod dang 'dres pa'i// snod bcud blang bar mi bya'o// de nas gtso 'khor bye brag kyang // gnas
15b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi khyad par dbus su ste/ / rgyan gyi khyad par thar pa'o// rigs kyi khyad par drug pa'i rigaso// de nas gtso 'khor bye brag kyang // phyag dang zhabs sogs khyad par gyis// gtso bo
15b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor las khyad par 'phags/ / dper na pha rol phyin drug las// shes rab pha rol phyin med na// pha rol phyin pa lnga dag gis// pha rol phyin pa'i ming mi thob// dkyil
15b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dbus su gang gnas pa'i/ / de nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor te// gang zhes dbus su mi gnas na// 'khor rnams dkyil 'khor du mi 'gyur// dper na rgyal po med pa yi// grong
15b6(rgyud 'bum): dang grong khyer ji bzhin no/ / de bzhin dam tshig bye brag kyang // rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// yan lag dam tshig de dang 'dra// thugs kyi dam tshig nyams gyur na// sku gsung
15b7(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig de dang 'dra/ / srog gcod dam tshig nyams gyur na// brdzun dang ma byin len pa dang // 'dod chags dam tshig de dang 'dra// lta ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// spyod pa'i
16a1(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig de dang 'dra/ / tshul 'chos mi dge mos pa tsam// dam tshig nyams pa de dang 'dra// dper na 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang // bral ba'i rin chen
16a2(rgyud 'bum): bdun po de dag gis/ / 'khor lo sgyur ba'i ming ni mi thob bzhin// bla ma'i zhal nas thams cad shes par bya// de nas sangs rgyas sems can yang // rdul tsam khyad par med mod
16a3(rgyud 'bum): kyang / rang rig gzhan rig rkyen dag dang // rang sems las su rung ba dang // ma rung ba dang las kyi mtha'// log pa dang ni me log pa// don byed nus dang mi nus pa// yongs su
16a4(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs dang ma rdzogs pas/ / sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su snang // tha dad par ni mi rtag ste// chu khams gser dang nam mkha' bzhin// rang bzhin gyis ni dag par 'dod// rang
16a5(rgyud 'bum): sems rang rig rtogs pa na/ / sems can gdong nas sangs rgyas so// rdo rje phag mos yang zhus pa// srog gcod la sogs dam tshig gi/ dbye ba khyed kyis bdag la gsungs//
16a6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rang gi lus ngag sems g.yos kyang // gsod pa'i 'du shes ma skyes na// srog gcod nyams pa chung ngur nges// gzhan gyis gnod par tshor
16a7(rgyud 'bum): ba dag/ nyams pa 'bring du gsungs pa yin// de las bzlog pa chen por nges// gang zhig ma byin chung blangs kyang // gzhan la nyon mongs cher skyes na// de nyid nyams pa 'bring du nges//
16b1(rgyud 'bum): cher blangs nyon mongs chung na 'bring // chen po las ni nyon mongs cher// de ni chen po kho nar nges// tshul 'chos lhung ba chen po ste// mi shes pa dang bag med dag/ brjed ngas la sog
16b2(rgyud 'bum): 'bring du gsungs/ / gzhan yang dam tshig nyams pa yi// che 'bring chung ngu'i ldang tshang dag/ rang dang gzhan dang gnyis ka yis// rgyu rkyen dag las shes bya ste// ltung ba'i ngo bos
16b3(rgyud 'bum): zin pa dang / / phyi nang rdo rje slob dpon gyi// spyan sngar dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs// tshul dang mthun par bshad par bya// dam tshig gong 'og bye brag gis// bla ma'i dkyil 'khor
16b4(rgyud 'bum): shes par bya/ / gzhan yang bshags pa'i bye brag la// sbyin sreg gis ni sdig sreg phyir// nang gi sbyin sreg chen po tsam// zab pa'i me ni rgyun bzhag me// thab kyi rgyun bzhag me yin//
16b5(rgyud 'bum): te/ le bdun dang ni lo gcig dag/ phyi yi rgyun bzhag chen po med// zla ba bdun dang gsum dag ni// 'bring du gsungs te zhag bdun sogs// rgyun bzhag me ni chung ngur gsungs//
16b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa la sogs de bzhin te// rang bzhin gdod nas gnas pa yi// gtum mo ye shes me rang bzhin// 'di ni rgyun bzhag chen po'i me// thog mtha' med par gnas pa'i phyir//
16b7(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig nyams pa'i bud shing sogs// ye shes me yi bung shing ker// mar ngag can gyis bsregs byas na// nyams pa'i shing sogs 'tshig par nges// dgang gzar la sogs
17a1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin te/ / rgyas pa la sogs de dang 'dra// rgyud 'di gtad kyis legs par zung // thams cad dga' zhing mgu bar gyur// dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i
17a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so/ / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang // lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//
17a3(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+wa la ag+ne gu h+ya tan+ta rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba me 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
17a4(rgyud 'bum): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la snyoms par zhugs so// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus
17a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i nang nas rdo rje phag mos gsol pa/ rnal 'byor gang lags 'pho ba gang // 'chi ba gang lags shi ba gang // ro ni gang lags ro chen gang // de bzhin shi ba chen po gang // thal ba
17a6(rgyud 'bum): gang lags thal chen gang / / tsha tsha gang lags tsha tsha yi// chen po gang lags gnas ni gang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
17a7(rgyud 'bum): thabs dang shes rab snyoms 'jug la// rnal 'byor zhes ni gsungs pa yin// dus min lha ni gsod pa ste// dang por 'pho ba'i rtags dang yang // dus chod nges par shes bya ste/
17b1(rgyud 'bum): bar chad med pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// 'khrul 'khor bcas te khyad par gyi// 'bras bu 'byung bar 'pho bar nges// khams dang 'byung ba so sor thim// srog kyang rtsol ba la thim ste/
17b2(rgyud 'bum): rtsol ba rnam shes la thim pa'i// skad cig dang po 'chi ba ste// rdo rje can sogs rigs bzhi dang // rnam snang tha dad bral ba yi// skad cig dang po shi ba ste// de nas zhag bdun bar du bzhag
17b3(rgyud 'bum): lus kyi mkha' 'gro mya ngan 'das/ / de ni shi ba chen por grags// lus ni ta la'i mgo bo 'dra// 'di nyid ro zhes gsungs pa ste// ye shes dbab dang ye shes bstan// mkha' spyod sa spyod/
17b4(rgyud 'bum): sa 'og spyod// spyi bo mgrin pa snying ka ru// dri yi thig le gsum byas te// sku gsung thugs su byin gyis brlabs// thog mar dri zhim sna tshogs kyis// khrus byas gnas ni bcu gnyis
17b5(rgyud 'bum): su dri yi thig le bcu gnyis bya/ / dpa' bo mkha' 'gros byin gyis brlabs// gzhan yang rgyan la sogs pa kun// dngos su gnas pas rab tu nges// ri mor bris pa 'bring po ste/
17b6(rgyud 'bum): driyi thig le tha mar nges// g.yas brkyang la sogs 'dug stangs kyis// he ru kar grags chen por bzhengs// rang rig bdag po gang yin pa'i// he ru ka ru nges pa dang // de la dus drug
17b7(rgyud 'bum): mchod pas mchod/ / 'di dag ron chen po ste// 'chi ba zhes ni rnam rtog ste// mkha' spyod gnas su 'khrid par byed// rang bzhin bsregs pa thal ba ste// rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor la brten
18a1(rgyud 'bum): nas/ chos sku'i gzugs brnyan rim bzhin brtsig/ yang na bum pa lta bu yi// gzhal yas khang pa brtsegs mar brtsig/ mi 'chi bcu phyed snying po dang // tsan
18a2(rgyud 'bum): ngan gur kum la sogs pa'i/ / dri yis byugs shing bsgo bar bya// tsan dan dmar po la sogs pa'i// dri zhim ldan pa'i shing bu 'am// yang na 'bras bu yod pa yi// bud shing tshad dang
18a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa yis/ / thab khung chen por rdzogs par brtsig/ bla ma dam pa mnyes byas la// zhal nas yang dag shes par bya// zur bzhi rgyal po chen po bzhi// phyogs bzhi mi 'jigs seng ge
18a4(rgyud 'bum): brgyad/ / ka ba bzhi dang gdung bzhir ldan// cho ga yongs su rdzogs pa dang // rig pa'i dkyil 'khor gzhug pa dang // sngar gyi dbang thob rdzogs par bskur// de nas rgyun bzhag me sbar te//
18a5(rgyud 'bum): me lha la sogs gzhan dang 'dra// de nas rig pa de nyid kyang // me yi khang pa mdzes pa ru// rang bzhin spyan drangs bzhugs su gsol// me mchod sdig pa sreg pa'o// sngags dang
18a6(rgyud 'bum): rdzas sogs gzhan dang 'dra/ / me dang du ba rlung sogs kyi// mtshan ma mkhas pas brtag bya ste// bkra shis rtags rnams byung na legs// med na sdig pa bsreg par bya//
18a7(rgyud 'bum): gdung la sogs pa byung na rab// ma byung na yang cho ga rnams// rdzogs pa las byung rus pa rnams// 'di ni thal ba chen po ste// de las gzhan pa thal bar gsungs// de nas rus
18b1(rgyud 'bum): pa zhag gsum ni/ / gur kum la sogs dris gtor te// rus pa'i mtshan ma brtag bya ste// kha dog dbyibs dang dri dang ro// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// gdon bsal khrus bya
18b2(rgyud 'bum): rus pa brdung / / ma nyams dum bu gcig pa la// dri sogs bsgos pa'i nang du ste// dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa yi// steng du seng ge'i khri dag la// seng ge rgyal chen 'og gi
18b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyan steng nas gdugs dang rgyal mtshan te/ / gnas der rus pa bzhag byas la// me mchod byas nas zhag lnga ru// bsnyen pa byas te drug pa la// gdung ni 'byung ste bdun pa la
18b4(rgyud 'bum): cha tsha rab tu gnas par bya/ / dang por ro sreg dus su yang // shi ba dang po nas bzung ste// zhag lnga ro yi bsnyen pa ste// drug pa ro yi sta gon no// bdun pa dur khrod rab tu gnas/
18b5(rgyud 'bum): dang por snang ba gnyis por ro// gsum pa rus pa mya ngan 'dus// mya ngan 'das pa rnam pa gsum// gzhan la med cing rang la med// dman la med cing de rjes med/
18b6(rgyud 'bum): thabs sum gsungs shes rab kyi// rtswa rgyud bshad rgyud phyi ma dang // phyi ma'i phyi mar ma gsungs pa'o// mya ngan 'das pa rnam pa gsum// bdud rtsi sgron mar li yi// rgyud du
18b7(rgyud 'bum): khyod la 'a yis bshad/ / de nas sa tsha'i rim pa yang // sdang brgyal po la sogs lo// mthun pa'i gtam gyis sa sogs bsrang // mi sngangs bdag la sogs la// gtir mam
19a1(rgyud 'bum): yis sa sogs bsrung / / de nas spyad pa rnam lnga yang // phan pa rdo rje can dang yang // gzi brjid gar dang rdo rje rgyal// srad bus sa gzungs sbyang sogs/
19a2(rgyud 'bum): cho ga gzhan dang mthun par bya// dur khrod gnas su rtsa ba yi// dkyil 'khor chen po bzhengs par bya// lha grangs du yod gtor mar gtang // sbyin sreg dag gis zhi byas te/
19a3(rgyud 'bum): gcig gam lnga 'am bdun nam ni// nyi shu rtsa gcig brgya rtsa brgyad// ci nus par ni gdab par bya// dus ni mtshan mo zhes pa ste// dang po la ni dkyil 'khor gyi// phyag rgya chen po
19a4(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs pa ste/ / gsum pa bzhi pa gnyis pa dag/ chos kyi sku yi gzugs brnyan gdab// bum dbang sa la gdab pa ste// gsang dbang sa dang chu la gdab// gsum pa ma dang rlung
19a5(rgyud 'bum): la gdab/ / bzhi pa nam mkhar gsungs pa'o// dang po 'pho bas ma lhung la// gnyis pa ro bsreg ma lhung ba'o// gsum pa tsha tshas ma lhung na// 'chi ba slu ba'i dam pa ste/
19a6(rgyud 'bum): srid pa'i 'ching ba las grol nges// dman pa'i 'pho ba la sogs pas// ltung zhing 'chi ba kho nar nges// de bas srid las grol 'dod pas// bla ma dam pa rab mnyes te// 'pho
19a7(rgyud 'bum): pab la sogs gdam ngag blang / / rgyud 'di gtad kyis legs par zung // de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams kyis chen po yang g.yos par gyur to// mchod pa sna tshogs pa'i char yang bab bo//
19b1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / dur khrod na gnus pa'i ro langs chen po thams cad rgyud kyi don la rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// dpal gsang ba me 'bar ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//
19b2(rgyud 'bum): / paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// rgya gar skad du/ shrI a mr-i ta
19b3(rgyud 'bum): gu h+ya tan+ta rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ bcom ldan 'das dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/
19b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la zhugs so// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ dkyil
19b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dbye ba ji lta bu/ / sngags dang gtor ma ji lta bu// sbyin sreg mchod sogs ji lta bu// khyod kyis bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dang po
19b6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dbye ba yang / / phyi la gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor te// nang du lus kyi dkyil 'khor ro// gsang bar b+ha ga'i dkyil 'khor te/ bzhi pa rang rig byang chub sems// de rnam
19b7(rgyud 'bum): lha yi mtshan nyid kyang / / su mdog phyag mtshan rigs pa'i lam// khro tshul drug tu rtsa bzhi dang // 'bar ba'i gar dgu phyag rgya drug/ mtshan nyid sgyu ma lta bu la// thamal pa yi rnam rtog
20a1(rgyud 'bum): spong / lus kyi dri 'khru zhe sdang dag/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur gyur pa'o// 'di dag phyi yi dkyil 'khor te// dkyil 'khor dbus su gang gyur pa// de nyid kyi
20a2(rgyud 'bum): ni dkyil 'khor te/ / rdo rje can dang phan pa dang // de bzhin rdo rje gzi brjid dang // pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang // de bzhin rta bdun rdo rje sems// snying po yongs bzung dkyil 'khor te/
20a3(rgyud 'bum): de dag phyi yi dkyil 'khor yin// de nas nang gi dkyil 'khor yang // rnam grol steng du gdan khri rlung // rang rig bdag po lha yin no// dang por de nyid shes bya ste// rags pa dang ni phra ba
20a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / zung 'jug sgo gsum nyi khri dang // tshig stong drug brgya rgyu ba tsam// las ni rags pa'i lam 'joms shing // ngag gi dri 'khru gti mug dag/ sprul pa'i sku yi rgyur gyur pa// mkha'
20a5(rgyud 'bum): spyod rlung du shes par bya/ / gang zhig snang ba sgom pa dang // de bzhin mun pa sgom pa dag/ nyin dang mtshan mor rab tu grags// gnod mdzes lta stangs dman pa ste// tshul de de las bzlog
20a6(rgyud 'bum): po'o/ / dang por yid bcing sna rtser bya// de bzhin sems bcing rlung bcing yang // nam mkha' sor bzhi de nas stong // de nas bar du thig le yang // yan lag dang bcas yan lag med//
20a7(rgyud 'bum): shin tu yan lag med pa ste// yan lag bcas pa bcu gsum ste// thabs la thabs kyi sbyor ba ni// bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// ma ning 'dus pa'i sgo ru gsungs// de nas 'og sgor
20b1(rgyud 'bum): tsaN+Da li/ / kha sbyor dang ni stug po sogs// rkyen dang bcas dang rang bzhin dang // bdag sbyang ba dang gzhan sbyang dang // gtum mo rang bzhin sbar ba dang // gtum mo go bzlog sbar ba dang /
20b2(rgyud 'bum): gtum mo rkyen gyis sbar ba dang // gtum mo zhar la sbyar ba dang // gtum mo bye brag sbar ba dang // spyi yi gtum mo sbar ba dang // grol ba'i rang bzhin gtum mo dang // chags pa'i rang bzhin
20b3(rgyud 'bum): gtum mo ste/ / nang gi lha yi ngo bo ste// gsang ba'i lha yi ring ba'i rgyu// de nas gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yang // dbang po gnyis sbyor kun tu ru// de yi phyir na b+ha ga yin// dga' ba la
20b4(rgyud 'bum): sogs sgyu ma yis/ / phra ba'i lam spong las yin te// sems kyi dri 'khrud 'dod chags dag/ rang rig sems kyi rgyal po'i rgyu// de nas bzhi pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// chos sku skye med nam
20b5(rgyud 'bum): mkha' bzhin/ / rang rig stong par 'od gsal ba// bsgoms pas nyes pa ma yin te// ma bsgoms pas kyang nyes pa yin// sgom pa nyid kyang rtog pa ste// mi sgom pa yang rtog pa nyid//
20b6(rgyud 'bum): sgom du rdul tsam med pa la// yongs su skad cig med pa 'di// lha yi rgyal po yin par 'dod// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi mchog gyur pa// rang rig ye shes me bo che// thams cad 'di
20b7(rgyud 'bum): la gnas pa ste/ / dper na 'khor lo sbyar ba'i rgyal po dag/ yul dang grong khyer dag tu mi 'gro yang // yul na 'dod pa thams cad sdud pa ltar// mchod dang gtor ma la sogs pa'i/
21a1(rgyud 'bum): las dang bya ba sna tshogs kun// sems kyi de nyid shes gyur na// thams cad 'di la sdud par nges// las ni zab pa'i las spong ste// sgo gsum rnam dag dug gsum
21a2(rgyud 'bum): 'joms/ / gzugs sku gnyis ni 'byung ba'i rgyu// sbyin sreg rnam pa bzhi yin te// phyi yi thun mong yin par gsungs// de nas nang gi sbyin sreg kyang // lte ba snying ka spyi bo mgrin//
21a3(rgyud 'bum): rigs ni nges pa'i thab khung ste// sku ni spyi bo gsung mgrin pa// snying kar thugs te yon tan dang // 'phrin las gtum mo gnyis su nges// rlung dang rtsa dang thig le dang // rang bzhin
21a4(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa'i ye shes me/ / me lha dag pas bdag po'i lha// sku mdog phyag mtshan rnam rtog dag/ bsreg rdzas bsregs te me mchod bya// nye bar zhi ba sbyin pa dang // rnam rtog bsreg
21a5(rgyud 'bum): phyir sbyin sreg ste/ / rang lus ye shes me yis ni// rtog pa'i bud shing bsreg bya ba// 'di ni sbyin sreg tshad ma ste// ti la sogs sdig par nges pa'am// las kyi me nyid ye shes sam//
21a6(rgyud 'bum): bsregs pas nges par tshig gam ci// bsreg rdzas rtog pa sreg byed me// dbang po'i spyod yul ma yin te// de phyir las kyi ma nyid la// til sogs bsregs pa'i las byas kyang /
21a7(rgyud 'bum): nges par sdig pa 'tshig mi 'gyur// mchod pa la sogs de bzhin no// bstan pa tsam du nges pa ste// rgyud ni don dam ma yin te// don dam rtog pas bstan pa med// dgang gzar thugs
21b1(rgyud 'bum): gzar la sogs pa/ / bla ma'i nal nas shes par bya// de nas gsang ba'i sbyin sreg kyang // thag khung sde ba'am sa rtse ste// chags grol gnas ni nges pa dang // rang bzhin dang ni gsang
21b2(rgyud 'bum): ba yi/ / gtum mo ye shes me sbar te// g.yas g.yon dgang gzar blugs gzar gyis// shu kra rtsa dang rlung sogs kyi// phra mo'i rtog pa'i bsreg rdzas bsreg/ bde ba'i me lha
21b3(rgyud 'bum): mchod par bya/ / zhi rgyas las kyi rim pa dang // bzhi pa zhal nas shes par bya// de nas sngags kyi dbye ba yang // phyi yi sngags ni oM AHhUM// nang du bdud rtsi mtshan nyid de// gsang
21b4(rgyud 'bum): bar mchog chad dbus na gnas/ / mthar thug mtha' bral rang rig go// spos sogs phyi yi mchod pa ste// bdud rtsi la sogs nang du'o// gsang bar bde ba'i ro yis mchod// mthar
21b5(rgyud 'bum): thug stong pa'i ro yis mchod/ / 'bras sogs phyi yi gtor ma ste// dman pa'i bgegs sogs zhi bar byed// a ba d+hU tI'i ka pA lar// sha sogs bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin gnas// rnam
21b6(rgyud 'bum): rtog bgegs chen zhi bar byed/ / bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i ros// phra ba'i gdon chen zhi byas pa// 'di ni gsang ba'i gtor mar gsungs// rang rig stong pa'i bdud rtsi'i ros//
21b7(rgyud 'bum): bde chen don ni zhi byas pa/ 'di ni bzhi pa'i gtor mar nges// phyag 'tshal skor ba la sogs pa// sbyang sogs bla ma'i zhal nas shes// gang gi phyir na sbyin sreg ni// dngos grub
22a1(rgyud 'bum): dam pa ster ba dang / / rnga mchog sres phyir dz+nyAn sreg ste// shing sogs sreg pa sbyin sreg min// mnyes pa'i don gyis mchod pa ste// sgros sogs phul
22a2(rgyud 'bum): mnyes pa med/ / rang sems las su rung ba dag/ mnyes pas mchod pa chen po ste// gdon dang gnong po zhi ba dang // bar chod zhi dang dngos grub dag/ 'byung ba'i phyir na gtor ma ste/
22a3(rgyud 'bum): 'bras sogs phyi yi gtor ma yis// gdon sogs zhi bar mi 'gyur te// rang gi sgo gsum rnam rtog dag/ gdon la sogs par snang ba ste// 'khrul pa'i rnam rtog ma spangs par
22a4(rgyud 'bum): gdon sogs zhi bar mi 'gyur phyir/ / sgo gsum rnam rtog 'joms pa yis// sems kyi gtor ma gtor ma'i mchog/ gdon dang gnod pa zhi ba dang // dam tshig gso dang lha rnam 'go/
22a5(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur// phyi nang gtor ma'i nges pa'o// rgyud rnams nye bar zhi ba dang // lus las 'byung phyir lha yin te// phyi yi dkyil 'khor lha ma yin//
22a6(rgyud 'bum): lus dang yan lag lha ma yin// kha mig la sogs lha ma yin// lus las ma byung g.yeng ba'i phyir// dbang po sgo gsum ga long ba dag/ rang gi lus la rang lus 'byung //
22a7(rgyud 'bum): gsum zhi phyir lha zhes brjod// yid skyob phyir na sngags yin te// rang sems las su rung ba dang // rnam rtog gdon rnams las skyob phyir// 'di ni sngags kyi rgyal por gsungs/
22b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang dngos grub 'dod pa yis// thams cad bla ma'i zhal nas blang // rgyud 'di gtad kyis nan tan gyis// de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thams cad rgyud kyi don la yi rang bar gyur to//
22b2(rgyud 'bum): dpal gsang ba bdud rtsi'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//
22b3(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ shrI sh+ma sA na a laM kA ra tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal dur khrod rgyan gyi rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo//
22b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs byed che la phyag 'tshal te// zhabs la spyi bos legs btud nas// dur khrod gang lags rgyun gang lags// rgyud ni gang lags rgyal po gang // bcom ldan 'das kyis
22b5(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ / legs so rdo rje snying po legs// legs par nyon la legs par zung // dang por dur khrod bshad bya ste// dur khrod spyi dang bye brag gnas// gzhal yas khang gi
22b6(rgyud 'bum): phyi rol te/ / rdo rje ra ba'i nang rol du// 'jigs pa chen po spyi yi gnas// bye brag shar la sogs pa ste// snod kyi zhen pa bzlog pa yang // lcags ri nag po tshun chad de// rdo rjer
22b7(rgyud 'bum): bas de nyid do/ / chen po khru ni nyi shu ste// chung ba khru gang tshun chad do// de las gzhan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// tshad las nges par bzlas pa'o// rnam shes tshogs brgyad rnam rtog brkyang /
23a1(rgyud 'bum): mi mnga'i rtags su dur khrod brgyad/ phyogs dang phyogs bral dag tu dgod// tshogs brgyad yon tan brgyad ldan pa'i// rtags su shing brgyad rim pas dgod
23a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gdug pa brgyad bcom pa'i/ / rtags su klu brgyad rim pas dgod// tshogs brgyad mi dge bcu bcom pa'i// chags su phyogs skyong rim pas dgod// lus ngag yid kyis sems can
23a3(rgyud 'bum): gyi/ don mdzad phyir ni char sprin dgod// de nyid dur khrod 'jigs pa che// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med rgyud// rnam rtog zil gnon brgyad por bshad// mdzes pa'i phyir na rgyan
23a4(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / de nyid gsal bar bya ba'i phyir// dang por dur khrod bshad par bya// shar du gtum drag nag po che// lho ru 'phar dgod ser che// nub tu mi bzang dmar po che// byang du tshang
23a5(rgyud 'bum): tshing ljang ku che/ / me ru g.yer ka can yin te// bden bral mtshams su 'bar ba 'dzin// rlung mtshams dmyal sogs gnas pa ste// dbang ldan du dbyibs can no// b+hu tsa ri khi tsa sha ni//
23a6(rgyud 'bum): sa stengs shar gyi phyi ru dgod// pa tA li dang bA sa ni// sa 'og nub kyi phyi ru dgod// dur khrod 'di rnams gzugs rnams kyang // 'bar ba tshig dang mchog sogs// keng rus thod pa la
23a7(rgyud 'bum): sogs dang / / ro langs 'byung po'i tshogs dang bcas// ce spyang sgra yis 'jigs pa'i gzugs// shar du shi ri sha yi shing // lho ru a shwad tha yi shing // nub tu wang ge ling gi shing /
23b1(rgyud 'bum): byang du nu ta'i shing du nges// gong dang mtshungs pa n+ya gro d+ha// parka ti lcug pA thA dag/ me nas dbang ldan mtshams su dgod// ji ltar grags pa'i gzugs su 'dod// shar du dbang po
23b2(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa ste/ / lho ru gshin rje gnas pa'o// nub tu klu dbang gnas pa ste// byung du gnod sbyin yang dag gnas// shar lhor me ni gnas pa'o// lho nub mtshams su srin po gnas/
23b3(rgyud 'bum): nub byang mtshams su rlung dgod de// byang shar mtshams su dbang ldan dgod// nyi zla shar la sa bdag nub// ji ltar grags pa'i gzugs su dgod// shar du nor rgyas gnas pa ste/
23b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jog po lho ste stobs rgyu nub// pad+ma byang la pad chen me// hu lu hu lu srin por dgod// rigs ldan rlung mtshams dgod pa ste// dung skyong dbang ldan mtshams su ni// gdug pa sprul
23b5(rgyud 'bum): gyi gzugs su dgod/ / kha dog rigs kyi dbye bas dbye// shar du char sprin dkar por dgod// lho ru pu mi ti dgod do// nub tu 'jigs pa rnam par gnas// byang du a ba yang dag
23b6(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / sngo nya mer ni yang dag gnas// g+hA nya srin po'i mtshams su dgod// rlung gi mtshams su par shan// gtum po 'di brgyad char sprin brgyad// btsod kyi mdog 'dra gur kum
23b7(rgyud 'bum): mdog/ nam mkha'i mdog 'dra ngu ba'i mdog/ sprin gyi mdog 'dra sprin gyi gzugs// shar la sogs pa bzhi bzhi ste// 'di dag nang rtags phyi ru 'byung // dang por spangs pa phun
24a1(rgyud 'bum): phun sum tshogs/ / de nas ye shes phun sum tshogs// rang rig don ni phun sum tshogs// gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa yi// rtags su 'jigs pa 'di
24a2(rgyud 'bum): dag gnas/ 'o nas nang gi dur khrod sogs// pags pa rdo rje ra ba ste// rus pa rdo rje gur du nges// dpung pa nye ba'i dpung pa ste// brla dang de bzhin nye ba'i brla// brgyad ni dur khrod
24a3(rgyud 'bum): brgyad du nges/ / rje ngar nye ba'i rje ngar bzhi// lag ngar nye ba'i lag par bzhi// brgyad ni nang gi shing brgyad do// tshigs dang de bzhin nye ba'i tshigs// steng dang 'og tu bzhi bzhi ste//
24a4(rgyud 'bum): nang gi phyogs skyong yin par 'dod// mthil dang de bzhin nye ba'i mthil// steng 'og de bzhin klu brgyad do// rtse dang de bzhin nye ba'i rtse// brgyad ni char sprin brgyad yin te// bskyed rim
24a5(rgyud 'bum): rnam rtog mi mnga'i rtags/ / dur khrod brgyad ni nang na gnas// rtsa rlung ngo bo shes pa rgyas// de phyir nang gi shing brgyad gnas// rags pa'i gdug pa 'dul ba'i phyir// nang na klu brgyad yang
24a6(rgyud 'bum): dag gnas/ / bdag spyod gzhan yang spyod pa'i phyir// char sprin brgyad ni nang du gnas// de nas gsang ba'i dur khrod kyang // sna rtse rtsa brgyad dur khrod brgyad// lte bar rtsa brgyad shing brgyad
24a7(rgyud 'bum): ngo/ snying kar rtsa brgyad phyogs skyong brgyad// mgrin par rtsa brgyad klu brgyad de// spyi bor rtsa brgyad char sprin brgyad// gsang bar rnam rtog mi mnga'i rtags// dur khrod brgyad ni gsang bar
24b1(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / thams cad bde bar snang ba'i phyir// gsang bar shing brgyad yang dag gnas// phra ba'i mtshan ma'i rnam rtog gi/ gdug pa 'joms phyir klu brgyad dgod// bde bas bdag
24b2(rgyud 'bum): spyod gzhan sbyor bas/ / de yi phyir na char sprin dgod// de nas bzhi pa'i dur khrod kyang // rnam shes brgyang na de nyid brgyad// dur khrod brgyad du nges pa'o// dur khrod sogs brgyad de
24b3(rgyud 'bum): nyid shing / / lhag ma gsum dang tshor sogs lnga// brgyad ni phyogs skyong brgyad du nges// nyon mongs drug dang de yi gnyis// brgyad po dag ni klu brgyad do// lnga dang bzhi dag gsum dag
24b4(rgyud 'bum): ni/ de ni bzhi pa'i char sprin brgyad// gzung 'dzin rnam rtog mi mnga'i rtags// bzhi pa yi ni dur khrod brgyad// stobs sogs mkhyen pa'i yon tan rgyas// rtags su shing brgyad nges
24b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / rnam rtog gdug pa 'dul ba yi// rtags su klu brgyad nges pa'o// gzugs sku gnyis kyis sems can gyi// don mdzad rtags su char sprin brgyad// phyogs skyong bla ma'i zhal
24b6(rgyud 'bum): nas shes/ / de dag kun gyi bye brag kyang // bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// rgyun chags phyi nang rgyud ces bya// rgyal po khyad par 'phags pa'o// gzhan yang nga yis gsungs pa'i
24b7(rgyud 'bum): bka'/ / gsung gcig nyid du gsungs gyur kyang // du ma nyid du so sor snang // chos tshul du ma'i bye brag dang // mos pa du ma'i bye brag dang // 'du shes du ma'i bye brag gis// theg
25a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mtha' la thug pa med/ / sems gzung yan lag bsam mi khyab// nga yi rjes su 'brangs pa yi// bla ma sa rab non pa dang // de nyid bcu ldan mngon shes
25a2(rgyud 'bum): skyes/ / de gsung bcu drug mtha' yi bar// rig pa'i gnas lnga mkhas pas sbyang // mkha' 'gro ma yis lung bstan pas// brtsams la bzhi yi mtha' yis nges// de lta'i man ngag
25a3(rgyud 'bum): mo thob par/ / sngags kyi lha spyod gang spyod pa// rang yang phung la gzhan yang phung // mthong ba'i chos la dmyal sogs 'tshed// de bas dngos grub 'dod pa yis// bla ma dam pa mnyes
25a4(rgyud 'bum): byas te/ / man ngag dam pa blang bar bya// nges pa'i lta spyod ma rnyed par// gsang ba'i lha dang spyod pa dang // mos pa'i rjes su gang byed dang // nyon mongs zil non la sogs dag/
25a5(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags lta bur spyad pa spyod// 'di dag rkun po ma rungs pa// mthong ba'i chos la dmyal bar skyes// dang po srid pa skye ba yang // yar ngo mar ngo mtshams dang gsum// si h+la'i dang /
25a6(rgyud 'bum): po tha ma dang // 'bras bu srid pa skye ba yi// dus der kun tu ru byed na// 'byung ba'i rlung gi nang zhugs na// nad gzhi bsdus shing nad gzhi skyed// srog dang tshangs par spyod pa 'byung //
25a7(rgyud 'bum): de la 'dod pa'i mtshon chas ni// g.yeng ba med par gtar ka bya// phyi nas rigs kyi bdag pos so// srid par skye ba'i dus tshod kyang // rgyun chang zhag gsum zhag lnga dang // bdun dang dgu yi
25b1(rgyud 'bum): dus rnams snang / / de ltar rgyung mchog rgyal po'i don// khyod la gtad kyis legs par drung // de nas 'khor thams cad dga' zhing mgu ste rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// dpal du bzod
25b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyan gyi rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so/ / / paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//
25b3(rgyud 'bum): gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra rA dza ma hA tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje rgyal po chen po'i rgyud/ dpal sdom pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na
25b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i dpa' bo mkha' 'gro grangs med pa dang thabs gcig tu
25b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs pa'i dus su phyi nang gsang ba bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mngon du phyogs pa dang / bcom ldan 'das zhal 'dzum pa mdzad de/ rdo rje snying po la sogs
25b6(rgyud 'bum): pas gsol pa/ rdo rje gang lags chen po gang // rgyud ni gang lags rgyal po gang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// don gyi rdo rje rnam pa bzhi// dbang bzhi'i grangs su shes par bya//
25b7(rgyud 'bum): rnam rtog 'joms phyir rdo rje ste// de la rnam pa bzhi yin te// phyi nang gsang ba rab gsang gnyis// rtse gsum rtse gcig rtse lnga pa// rtse dgu pa ni nyid yin no// bcu gnyis de nyid rdo rje ste//
26a1(rgyud 'bum): rtags kyi rdo rje bzhi yin no// gnyis su med pa rtse gcig pas// rnam rtog thams cad spangs pa yin// rtse gsum sku gsung thugs yin te// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug
26a2(rgyud 'bum): gsum/ / 'joms pa'i phyir na bshad pa yin// rtse lnga ye shes lnga yi rtags// me long mnyam nyid so sor rtog/ bya ba nan tan chos dbyings shes// nyon mongs lnga ni spangs pa ste// zhe sdang
26a3(rgyud 'bum): nga rgyal 'dod chags dang / / phrag dog gti mug 'joms par byed// rdo rje rtse dgu gang yin pa// ye shes rtse dgu bshad pa ste// khams gsum sa dgu 'joms par byed// 'dod khams
26a4(rgyud 'bum): gzugs khams gzugs med khams/ / nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems// rig 'dzin sangs rgyas ye shes che// sa dgul ni gang sgrib pa'i// sgrib pa sbyong bar byed pa yi// rdo rje rtse dgur/
26a5(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa yin// rdo rje rtse mo bcu gnyis pa// 'khor ba'i rten 'brel bcu gnyis kyi// spong ba'i ye shes bcu gnyis yin// ma rig pa las 'du byed de// 'du byed rkyen gyis rnam par shes// /
26a6(rgyud 'bum): ming dang gzugs dang skye mched drug/ reg dang tshor dang sred dang len// srid pa skye dang rga shi ste// de rnams spong ba'i gnyen po ste// chos kyi ye shes mngon du byas// de las ye shes drug
26a7(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin/ / de las sku gsung thugs ngo bo// de las skye mched drug sangs rgyas// de las gnyis med reg pa ni// de las nyams myong bde chen po// rang rig de nyid sred pa ste// chos
26b1(rgyud 'bum): kun ston byed len pa ste/ / srid pa longs spyod rdzogs sku yin// skye ba sprul pa'i sku ru bshad// rga shi rgyun dang mya ngan 'das// 'od gsal stong chen dang du thim// de phyir rdo rje bcu gnyis/
26b2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ rdzas kyi rdo rje bzhi yin te// 'bigs shing rno ba zur gsum ste// gru bzhis rdzas rnams brdar byas pas// 'jam zhing dpal 'joms par byed// pa lam zlum pos rtsub pa 'joms/
26b3(rgyud 'bum): zur lngas thams cad cing gar byed// de nas chen po'i don bshad de// dmigs dang bsam pa spyod pa dang // brtul zhugs brtson 'grus smon lam dang // de bzhin ye shes chen po ste//
26b4(rgyud 'bum): ri re la yang bdun dadun sbyar// de phyir chen po zhes ni bstan// rgyud ni rnam pa lnga yin te// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba dang // rab tu gsang dang gsang ba che// de rnams rgyun du gnas pa la/
26b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyu yi rgyud du bstan pa yin// de rnams don ni ji bzhin rdzogs// 'bras bu'i rgyud du bstan pa yin// rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis med pa// rgyu ni gnyis su med pa yi// rang rig ye shes
26b6(rgyud 'bum): mthar thug pa/ / mthar thug bla na med pa'i rgyud// rgyal po la yang lnga yin te// phyi nang gsang dang rab tu gsang // shin tu gsang ba chen po ste// de rnams don la dbang bskur dang /
26b7(rgyud 'bum): de yi mi mthun phyogs 'joms phyir// de phyir rgyal po lnga ru bstan// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ni jo ltar lags// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/
27a1(rgyud 'bum): sku gsung thugs ni ji ltar lags// btsun mo'i b+ha ga ji ltar lags// rdo rje gang lags snying po gang // dpa' bo gang lags mkha' 'gro gang // dpag tu med pa
27a2(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar lags/ / thabs gcig bzhugs pa ji ltar lags// phyi nang gsang ba bla med pa'i// mchod nas zhes pa ji ltar lags// mngon phyogs 'khod pa ji ltar lags// zhal 'dzum
27a3(rgyud 'bum): mdzad pa ji ltar lags/ / gzigs pa zhes pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon mongs dang ni 'chi bdag bdud// phung po'i bdud dang lha yi bdud// bdud
27a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhi bcom pas bcom pa'o/ / ldan pa yon tan drug ldan phyir// dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang // dpal dang grags dang skal ba bzang // ye shes phun sum tshogs pa la//
27a5(rgyud 'bum): drug po de ldan zhes bya ba// 'khor ba'i chos ni mya ngan te// de ltar bral phyir 'das pa'o// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa kun// 'gro ba'i don mdzad de bzhin gshegs// thams cad
27a6(rgyud 'bum): dus gsum sangs rgyas kyi/ / sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bor bcas// btsun mo zhes bya chos kyi dbyings// de las byung phyir b+ha ga ste// dbyer mi phyed pas bzhugs par bshad// rdo rje chos
27a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams 'jug pa che/ / snying po ye shes chen po ste// sogs pa mang po'i don yin te// dpa' bo zhes pa rnam pa lnga// phyi nang gsang ba la sogs kyi// rnam par rtog pa 'joms phyir yin//
27b1(rgyud 'bum): mkha' la 'gro bas mkha' 'gro ste// rtsa sogs la yang shes par bya// thams cad de las byung ba'i phyir// ma zhes nga yis gsungs pa yin// de yi don la mi dpogs pas// de yi phyir
27b2(rgyud 'bum): na dpag tu med/ / thabs gcig bzhugs zhes bya ba 'di// de nyid don dang dbyer med phyir// gcig gi don du bshad pa'o// gnyis pa ma yin de don du// phyi nang ma yin mchod pa ni//
27b3(rgyud 'bum): phyi yi mchod pa bshad par bya// me tog bdug pa mar me dang // dri dang lha bshos btung ba dang // rol mo sil snyan dbyangs nyid dang // sgeg dang dgod dang gar nyid dang // rta dang glang
27b4(rgyud 'bum): po rin chen sogs/ / de nas nang gi mchod pa ni// b+ha ga btsums la ku tsa btsir// bdud rtsi lnga dang btung ba lnga// byang chub sems dang ldan byas te// phung po khams dang skye mched
27b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / de la sogs pas mchod par bya// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa ni// rtsa dang rlung dang thig le ste// de nyid gnyis med bde ba yis// rtsa dang rlung sogs thig les mchod//
27b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas rab gsang mchod pa ni// dang po dga' dang mchog dga' dang // dga' bral de bzhin lhan skyes dga'// bde ba'i khyad par de nyid kyis// rang bzhin dga' sogs thams cad mchod//
27b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas tha med mchod pas ni// rang rig stong par rtogs pa yi// 'od gsal de nyid chos kyi sku// de nyid bla med mchod pa mchog/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// rdo rje
28a1(rgyud 'bum): snying po la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams dga' zhing mgunas rjes su yi rangs par gyur te/ g.yon phyogs nas bskor ba byas nas so so'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mi snang bar gyur to//
28a2(rgyud 'bum): dpal 'khor lo sdom pa rdo rje rgyal po'i rgyud rdzogs so// // rnal 'byor ma tsan+da mA le dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// /
28a3(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+nyA nA tsin+ta tan+da rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal ye shes bsam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
28a4(rgyud 'bum): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma'i 'khor grangs med pa dang / ye shes gsang ba'i gnas na thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa'i dus su dpa' bo ye shes
28a5(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro zhes bya bas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos gtugs te thal mo sbyar nas gsol pa/ bcom ldan ye shes mnga' bdag che// ye shes kyi ni rang bzhin dang // ye shes skye
28a6(rgyud 'bum): gnas gang dang gang / / rgyal po ji ltar lags pa dang // gang la dbang byed gang gis 'dul// de nyid bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dpa' bo ye
28a7(rgyud 'bum): shes mkha' 'gro nyon/ / ye shes zhes bya rnam pa lnga// de nyid don la shes pa dang // log rtog shes pas ma bsgribs phyir// spyi bo'i ye shes bshad pa'o// me long ye shes mnyam nyid
28b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / so sor rtog dang bya nan tan// chos dbyings ye shes lnga pa'o// de la me long ye shes ni// dper na g.ya' dag me long la// gzugs brnyan gsal bar snang ba bzhin// de bzhin
28b2(rgyud 'bum): sems kyi me long la/ / nyon mongs g.ya' ni dag byas na// chos rnams gzugs brnyan sgyu mar mthong // sems kyi me long gang yin la// sgyu ma tsam du snang ba de// tha dang mi phyed mnyam
28b3(rgyud 'bum): ye shes/ / mnyam nyid ye shes gang yin pa// kun rdzob sgyu ma tsam de ni// las dang mtshan nyid ma 'dres pa// de nyid so sor rtog ye shes// de nyid nan tan sgrub byed de// de nyid don grub
28b4(rgyud 'bum): ye shes te/ / thams cad chos dbyings gzhan min te// de phyir chos dbyings ye shes yin// ye shes skye gnas gang yin pa// kha sbyar dbus kyi rtsa brgyad do// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis
28b5(rgyud 'bum): med tshul/ / shar dang lho dang nub dang byang // ye shes bzhi po skye ba'i gnas// de dag kun 'dus lte ba ni// chos dbyings ye shes skye ba'i gnas// me long ye shes mnyam nyid dang // so//
28b6(rgyud 'bum): sor rtog dang bya ba grub// chos dbyings ye shes la sogs pa// bdag po byed pa'i phyir dang ni// zhe sdang dang ni nga rgyal dang // 'dod chags dang ni phrag dog dang // de bzhin gti mug la
28b7(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa'i/ / nyon mongs thams cad 'joms pa'i phyir// rgyal po zhes ni bstan pa yin// ye shes mkha' 'gros yang gsol pa// byang chub sems ni ji ltar lags// de nyid dbye/
29a1(rgyud 'bum): ba gang lags dang // de yi gnas dang gzung ba'i gnas// nges par bzlog pa'i tshul nyid dang // de nyid kyi ni 'bras bu dang // rtags dang yon tan gang lags pa//
29a2(rgyud 'bum): de nyid bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// byang chub sems ni rang rig ste// dbye ba'i don ni gnyis su bstan// de yi gnas ni rtsa yin te// gzung ba rig
29a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'khor lor te/ / nges par bzlog pa'i thabs dag ni// go bzlog pa yi tshul yin no// de nyid 'bras bu gnyis med rtogs// rtags ni lus la khrag byung dang // ba spu langs dang 'dar
29a4(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / kha zas dang chung lus yang dang // skra dkar gnyer ma dengs pa dang // le lo mad dang brtson 'grus ldan// de la sogs pa'i rtags rnams 'grub// de nas yon tan bshad pa ni//
29a5(rgyud 'bum): rkang mgyogs sa steng sa 'og gi/ 'jig rten dngos grub gang yin dang // 'jig rten las 'das thob par 'gyur// gnyis med byang chub sems kyi gnas// rang rig 'od gsal de nyid do//
29a6(rgyud 'bum): ye shes rang bzhin gnas yin te// rtags ni 'od gsal de nyid do// 'bras bu chos sku 'chang chen po'i// sa ni nges par thob pa'o// rnal 'byor sems gzung sgom pa brtag/ lus sems
29a7(rgyud 'bum): tshachags su bcug nas ni/ / rang rig sems kyi de nyid la// de nyid dbyer med bsgom par bya// de yis thob med 'bras bu thob// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang //
29b1(rgyud 'bum): ye shes mkha' 'gro la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad rjes su yi rang nas/ de kho na nyid bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod de mi snang bar gyur to// dpal 'khor lo sdom pa ye shes bsam pa'i rgyud
29b2(rgyud 'bum): kyi rgyal po rdzogs so/ / // paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// // rgya gar skad du/
29b3(rgyud 'bum): shrI rA ga rA dza tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal chags pa'i rgyal po rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das/
29b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos spos dang me tog la
29b5(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa'i mchod pas mchod nas/ he he dpa' bo 'jigs pa che// sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin na// mtshan dang dpe byad gang dang gang // stong dang de bzhin rnam thar dang // rdzus
29b6(rgyud 'bum): skyes mngal skyes sgong skyes dang / / drod gsher gnyis gsum bzhi char ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// a ni dbu yi gtsug tor te// A ni dbu skra g.yas su 'khyil/
29b7(rgyud 'bum): i ni dpral ba'i dbyes mnyam pa// I ni smin mtshams mdzod spu ste// u ni spyan mig mthon mthing la// ba yi rdzi ma lta bu'o// U tshems bzhi bcu mnga' ba ste// r-i r-I tshims mnyam
30a1(rgyud 'bum): tshems thags bzang / / l-i l-I tshems dkar ro bro mchog/ e ni 'gram pa seng ge 'dra// oM ljags shin tu srab pa ste// oM ni tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan/
30a2(rgyud 'bum): oM ni dpung mgo shin tu zlum// a ni bdun mtho ba ru gsungs// aHni thal gong rgyas pa ste// 'di dag bcu drug g.yas bskor ro// de nas g.yon bskor mtshams nas kyang // a
30a3(rgyud 'bum): pags srab mdog gser 'dra/ / A ni bzhengs bzhin ma btud par// phyag gnyis pus mor sleb pa'o// i ni ro stod seng ge 'dra// I ni shing n+ya gro lta bur// chu dang zheng ni gab pa'o//
30a4(rgyud 'bum): u ni mdzod spu g.yas su 'khyil// U ni spu rnams gyen du phyogs// r-i mdoms sba ba sbubs su nub// r-I baR+Ya legs par zlum pa'o// l-i ni zhabs long tshogs ma mngon// l-I ni phyag
30a5(rgyud 'bum): zhabs 'jam zhing gzhon/ / l-I ni phyag mthil zhabs kyi mthil// 'jam zhing gzhon sha rgyas pa'o// e ni phyag zhabs dra bas 'brel// ai ni sen mo ring ba ste// oM ni phyag dang zhabs
30a6(rgyud 'bum): mthil la/ / 'khor lo dang ni ldan pa yin// oM ni zhabs ni shin tu gnas// aM zhabs rting pa yangs pa ste// aHni byin pa ri dgas ni// e n+ya ya yi lta bu ste// spyi bo'i mi shigs
30a7(rgyud 'bum): snying po haM/ / ston pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// ka ni sen mo zangs mdog 'dra// kha ni sen mo dog snum pa// ga ni sen mo mtho ba ste// g+ha ni sor mo rnams zlum pa// nga ni sor mo rnams
30b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa/ / tsa ni sor rnams byin gyis phra// cha ni rtsa rnams mi mngon pa// dza ni rtswa mdud med pa yin// dzA ni long bu mi mngon pa// nya ni zhabs mi mnyam pa med// Ta ni seng ge'i stabs su/
30b2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs// Tha ni glang po'i stabs su gshegs// Da ni ngang pa'i stabs su gshegs// D+ha ni khyu mchog stabs su gshegs// Na ni g.yas phyogs ldog cing gshegs// ta ni mdzes
30b3(rgyud 'bum): par gshegs pa ste/ / tha ni mi g.yo bar gshegs pa// da ni sku la 'khril bag chags// d+ha sU byi dor byas pa 'dra// na sku rim par 'tsham pa'o// pa ni sku gtsang ba sku mchog/
30b4(rgyud 'bum): pab sku rnam par dag pa'o// b+ha ni mtshan rdzogs ngo bo nyid// ma sku kho lag yangs shing bzang // ya ni gom pa snyoms pa'o// ra sku shin tu gzhon mdog can// la ni sku la 'khrul pa med//
30b5(rgyud 'bum): wa ni sku lus rgyas pa ste// sha ni shin tu grims pa'o// Sha ni yan lag thams cad mdzes// sa gzigs rab rib med cing dag/ ha dku zlum pa nyid yin te// k+Sha ni dku skabs
30b6(rgyud 'bum): phyed pa'o/ / ya dku ma rnyongs pa yin te// ra ni phyal phya ma med pa yin// la ni lte ba zab pa ste// wa ni lte ba g.yas su 'khyil// Da ni kun nas mdzes pa ste// D+ha ni kun spyod gtsang ma
30b7(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / 'di dag thabs kyi rang bzhin gyis// g.yas nas bskor ba bzhi bcu yin// de nas g.yon gyi bzhi bcu ni// ka ni sku sme gnag bag med// kha ni shing bal ltar 'jam phyag/ ga
31a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag ri mo mdangs yod pa/ / gA phyag ri mo zab pa dang // nga phyag ri mo ring ba'o// tsa zhal ha cang mi ring ba// tsha zhal gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang // dza dzA lcug
31a2(rgyud 'bum): mnyen ljags srab pa/ / nya ni ljags dmar ngo bo ste// glang po'i nga ro 'brug sgra Ta// Sha ni gsung snyan mnyen 'jam pa// Da D+ha mche ba zlum dang rno// Na ni mche dkar ta tshems mnyam// tha ni
31a3(rgyud 'bum): mche ba byin gyis phra/ / da shangs shin tu mtho ba dang // dA shangs shin tu gtsang ba'o// na ni spyan 'od rnam par dag/ pa pha spyan bzang rdzi ma lcug/ ba ni dkar nag phye pad+ma'i// 'dab ma'i
31a4(rgyud 'bum): mdangs 'dra pad+ma'i spyan/ / b+ha ni de bzhin smin mtshams ring // ma la smin mtshams smin spu mnyam// ra ni de bzhin smin mo snum// la ni snyan shal stug cing ring // de bzhin wa ni snyan
31a5(rgyud 'bum): shal mnyam/ / sngon gyi dbang po ma nyams sha// dpral ba legs par 'byes pa Sha// sa ni dpral ba'i dbyes che ba// hA ni dbu dag shin tu rgyas// dbu skra bung ba ltar gnag k+Sha// dbu
31a6(rgyud 'bum): sgra sdug pa ya yin te/ / de bzhin dbu skra 'jam par// dbu skra mi 'dzing ba ni la// dbu skra mig shor ba ni wa// dbu skra dri zhim Da yin te// phyag la dpal gyi be'u dang ni// bkra shis
31a7(rgyud 'bum): g.yung drung 'khyil bas brgyan/ / sdong ris lta bu d+ha yin te// lte ba sprul pa'i snying po aM// gtso bo dpe byad brgyad cur ldan// a ni phyi nang stong pa nyid// A ni stong pa nyid stong pa/
31b1(rgyud 'bum): i ni chen po stong pa nyid// I ni don dam stong pa nyid// u ni 'dus byas stong pa nyid// U ni 'dus ma byas stong pa// r-i ni mtha' las 'das stong pa// r-I ni thog mtha' stong pa nyid/
31b2(rgyud 'bum): l-i ni dor ba med pa stong // l-I ni rang bzhin stong pa nyid// e ni chos rnams thams cad stong // aM ni rang gi mtshan nyid stong // oM ni mi dmigs stong pa nyid// oM ni dngos po med stong nyid//
