31b3(rgyud 'bum): aM ni ngo bo stong pa nyid// dngos med ngo bo sdong nyid aH/ mgrin pa longs spyod snying po au// shes rab stong pa bcu drug rtsa// gzugs can gzugs rnams la lta ba// rnam par thar pa
31b4(rgyud 'bum): dang po a/ / nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas// phyi rol gzugs rnams la lta ba// rnam thar gnyis pa ka yin no// sdug pa rnam par thar pa'i lus// mngon sum byas nas rdzogs
31b5(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ / de dag rnam thar gsum pa tsa// gzugs kyi 'du shes la 'das pa// sna tshogs 'du shes yid mi byed// nam mkha' mtha' yas la gnas Ta// nam mkha' mtha' yas las 'das
31b6(rgyud 'bum): te/ rnam shes mtha' yas la gnas shing // rnam shes mtha' yas rdzogs pa te// rnam shes mtha' yas las 'das na// ci yang med pa la gnas te// de nyid rdzogs pa pa yin no//
31b7(rgyud 'bum): ci yang med pa las 'das te// 'du shes med min la gnas te// 'du shes med min rdzogs pa yang // 'du shes med min las 'das te// 'du shes tshor ba 'gog pa'i lus//
32a1(rgyud 'bum): mngon sum byas nas rdzogs pa ni// rnam par thar pa brgyad pa sha/ snying ba chos kyi 'khor lo hUM// gtso bo rnam thar brgyad dang ldan// 'di dag r+b+ha yi rnam par gnas/
32a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo'i rgya ni sor gsum ste// sems can kun la rang bzhin gnas// de phyir sems can sangs rgyas yin// sna tshogs sdud pa'i mtshan nyid kyang // ring du 'byung zhing thung ngu gnas/
32a3(rgyud 'bum): smin mtshams kyi ni mdzod spu bzhin// chos kyi 'byung gnas lte ba la// g.yas g.yon bu ga lnga lnga ste// steng 'og kha yi bar nas 'byung // ro ma shar du mngon du phyogs// brkyang ma nub ste/
32a4(rgyud 'bum): 'og gi char// ro mas brkyang ma la 'khyud cing // g.yas pa'i cha ru zung 'jug nyid// brkyang mas ro ma la 'khyud cing // g.yon gyi cha ru zung 'jug nyid// g.yas g.yon rtse mo sku
32a5(rgyud 'bum): gsung thugs/ / de sgra sngags su rab tu grags// sngags dang rgyud dang dngos grub sogs// de nyid las ni byung bas na// sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin no// skye ba bzhi yi rim pa
32a6(rgyud 'bum): yang / snod bcud yab yum la thim ste// yab yum nyi ma zla bar 'gyur// snang ba'i thig le yang dag bcas// 'di dag nang gi mngal skyes tshul// A li kA l-i nyi zla ste// sems
32a7(rgyud 'bum): ni thig le'i ngo bor gnas/ / nang gi sgong skyes yin par 'dod// ka dang a las nyi zla ste// rang byung thig le drod gsher yin// de dag skad cig rkyen med las// rang bzhin 'byung ba
32b1(rgyud 'bum): rdzus skyes so/ / rkyen med sbyor ba sgong sogs las// bde ba skye dang bde ba'i rgyu// thams cad dran pa gsang ba yi// mngal na skyes pa'i tshul yin te// yar la bsreg dang mar la gso//
32b2(rgyud 'bum): gnas gsum nyi shu bzhir 'pho yin// phyi nang 'dod pa'i mtshan ma yis// rtsa rgyas bde ba ster ba dang // rin po che yi pho brang du// sems 'dzin gsang ba'i sgong skyes yin// nang gi
32b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i mtshon cha yis/ / bde ba skye ba drod gsher skyes// gang gi rkyen gyis ma skyes par// gdong nas bde ba'i rgyur skyes la// bde ba skyes pa rdzus skyes so// gtum mo go bzlog rkyen
32b4(rgyud 'bum): gyis sbar/ / gtum mo rkyen gyis sbar ba dang // gtum mo go bzlog sbar ba dang // gtum mo rang bzhin sbar ba ni// mngal skyes sgong skyes drod gsher skyes// rdzus skyes rim par
32b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyar bar bya/ / du ma'i gzhi bcas gzhi bcas dang // gzhi med shin tu gzhi med de// mngal skyes skyong skyes drod gsher skyes// rdzus skyes bzhi char rim par sbyar// rgyu dang lam ste
32b6(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu kun/ / skye ba bzhi yi ngo bor gcig/ de phyir sangs rgyas sems can gnyis// dngos po ro mnyam gyur pa la// log rtog sgyu mas gnyis su 'khrul// rdo rje snying po snying
32b7(rgyud 'bum): rje che/ / nang dang gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor yang // nga yis bshad kyis legs par nyon// sku yi dkyil 'khor spyi bor sgom// gsung ni mgrin pa thugs ni snying // yon tan lte ba
33a1(rgyud 'bum): 'phrin las ni/ / sna rtse dag tu bsam par bya// 'bar ba bzhi yi a la yang // rdo rje phag mo rab tu grags// ha ni bde mchog he ru ka/ dpa' bo gcig pa yin
33a2(rgyud 'bum): par 'dod/ / bdun pa dang ni dgu pa dag/ gsum pa hUM las rab tu grags// bcu gsum pa dang bco lnga pa// bcu dgu oM las rab tu grags// nyi shu rtsa lnga nyi shu dgu// haM gi ngo bor
33a3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag gnas/ / sum cu bdun dang drug cu bzhi// a yi dkyil 'khor yin par nges// rtsa ni rdo rje phag mo ste// g.yas g.yon phyag la dbu ma zhal// dpa' bo byang chub sems yin
33a4(rgyud 'bum): te/ skye mched bcu gnyis dngas ma yang // bcu gnyis phyag tu rab tu grags// 'byung bzhi'i dngas ma zhal bzhir nges// mdzes pa'i phyir na rgyan du bshad// gsung mchog bla ma'i
33a5(rgyud 'bum): zhal nas blang / / g.yas g.yon steng 'og sgo bzhi ste// 'dom gang mnyam pa gru bzhi yin// bdud rtsi lnga ni tshon rtsi lnga// rtsa ni thig gi rang bzhin te// ka ba brgyad ni rkang brgyad do//
33a6(rgyud 'bum): so sen pa sU tA ra sogs// mkhas pas brtag cing shes par bya// 'di dag rang bzhin dkyil 'khor te// dper na rang byung gser dang 'dra// 'di ni bcos ma ma yin te// rang
33a7(rgyud 'bum): rig ye shes gzugs brnyan ni/ / gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor sgom pa min// rdul tshon la sogs bri ba min// spos la sogs pas mchod pa min// rdo shing lha la phyag mi bya/
33b1(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin gnas pa'i sangs rgyas la// rang bzhin mchod pas rtag tu mchod// sku ni dgun dus rang bzhin te// 'byung ba'i sku gsum zla ba gsum// gsung ni dpyid dus ngo bo ste// 'jug
33b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sku gsum zla ba gsum/ / thugs ni dbyar dus ngo bo ste// gnas pa sku gsum zla ba gsum// ye shes ston gyi dus yin te// sku gsung thugs ni zla ba gsum// dang po rgyu yis pa yin/
33b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo chags pa dmar po la// yi ge rnams ni dkar pos gnas// lam gyi sa pa rnam pa gnyis// ring ba dang ni nye ba'o// de ni 'bras bu'i sa pa yin// 'khor lo yang dag gnas pa
33b4(rgyud 'bum): ste/ 'khor lo de rnams lha rnams kyang // sku mdog phyag mtshan kun dang bral// rang bzhin gsal ba dri ma med// shel ltar gsal ba dri ma med// mi mthong mthong ba'i ngo bo can//
33b5(rgyud 'bum): zab cing phra ba'i rang bzhin can// phyi ru sku mdog phyag mtshan lha// nang gi shin tu phra ba'i gzugs// gsang ba'i bde ba lha ru nges// de las bzlog pa bzhi pa'i lha// lus las byung phyir
33b6(rgyud 'bum): lnga zhe 'am/ / rgyud rnams dag byed phyir na lha// chags pa'i phyir na lha yin te// rgyal po shes rab rang bzhin te// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyi// chags pa chen po'i rgyud gsungs
33b7(rgyud 'bum): so/ / de nas sa chen po'ang cher g.yos par gyur te/ mchod pa'i sprin gyi char chen po babs par gyur to// de nas dpa' bo dang mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyang rgyud kyi don la dga' zhing mgu sde rjes
34a1(rgyud 'bum): su li rang nas mi sdang bar gyur to/ / dpal chags pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// rnal 'byor ma tsan+da mA la dang / lo tsa ba
34a2(rgyud 'bum): slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/ / rgya gar skad du/ shI R+Sha ki nI saM ba ra tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal mkha' 'gro ma'i sdom
34a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal bde ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// bde ba chen po'i ros gang bas// thams cad stong par gyur nas kyang // he he mgon po rdo rje 'dzin// mkha' 'gro ma
34a4(rgyud 'bum): ni ji ltar lags/ / de yi sdom pa ji ltar lags// dam tshig srung ba ji ltar lags// rdo rje phag mo bdag la gsungs// nyon cig rdo rje phag mo nyon// dang po dam tshig mtshan nyid kyang // rtsa
34a5(rgyud 'bum): ba dang ni yan lag bcas/ / rang gi lus ngag yid gsum dag/ kun nas 'khrugs te gzhan gyi yang // sgo gsum kun 'khrugs chen po ste// rang gzhan sgo gsum 'khrugs pa 'bring //
34a6(rgyud 'bum): nyams pa 'bring du gsungs pa yin// rang bzhin 'khrugs pa tha ma yang // nyams pa chung ngu yin par 'dod// re re la yang gsum gsum ste// nyams pa che 'bring dgu ru dbye// rang la
34a7(rgyud 'bum): mnar sems ma skyes kyang / / gzhan la mnar sems skyes pa yi// bdag gis g.yeng bas rkyen byas pa// de nyid nyams pa 'bring du bshad// rang la mnar sems cher skyes kyang // gzhan
34b1(rgyud 'bum): la nyes pa chung bas na/ / 'di lnga nyams pa 'bring du bshad// g.yeng ba'i rkyen gyis gang nyams kyang // 'di ni lhung ba yang bar gsungs// rang gi dam tshig bsrungs pa yi// lta spyod gang la
34b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhan ma mos/ / zab mo'i don la skur 'debs pa// ltung ba che 'bring yang bar bshad// rang gis ma nyes gzhan char 'khrugs// 'di ni nyams pa chung ngur bshad// re re'i dbye ba gzhan nas
34b3(rgyud 'bum): shes/ de nas snod kyi mtshan nyid kyang // phyi yis rang gi sgo gsum dag/ 'khrugs pa che chung rim pas dbye// rang sems 'khrugs na phyi rol pa// bsnun sogs nyams pa chen por 'gyur//
34b4(rgyud 'bum): g.yengs pas nyams pa 'bring chung ngu// mdor na rang bzhin dam tshig dang // bcas te bye brag dam tshig las// gnyis su med par mkhas pas gsungs// dam tshig las ni rdo rje 'chang //
34b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas mkha' 'gro'i mtshan nyid kyang // mkha' 'gro rtsa ru gnas pa ste// phag mo yungs kar tsam gyi tshad// gzhan ni lnga yi tshad tsam ste// gsal la rang bzhin med pa'o// ka nas g.yas
34b6(rgyud 'bum): bskor ka yi bar/ / mkha' 'gro drug cu bzhi ru nges// ka sogs zung rtsa mkha' 'gro ste// phyi nas rtsa re mkha' 'gro re// mkha' 'gro nas bskor mtshams kyi sar// sum cu rtsa bdun mkha'
34b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ma/ / lte ba sprul par yang dag gnas// a sogs brgyad ni mkha' 'gro brgyad// de bzhin zung rtsa mkha' 'gro bzhi// snying ka ru ni yang dag gnas// zung rtsa gsum ni mkha' 'gro re/
35a1(rgyud 'bum): gzhan rnams rtsa re mkha' 'gro re// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi mgrin par gnas// rdo rje phag mo lte bar gnas// gzhan ni spyi bor yang dag gnas// de nas sdom pa bshad
35a2(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen po// bde de sdom pa yang dag bshad// gang zhig bde ba khyad par can// nges par sdom pa yin par 'dod// rdo rje phag mo ma 'da' bas// sdom pa dam
35a3(rgyud 'bum): tshig tu ni bshad/ / mi phyed pas ni phyag rgyar gsungs// rdo rje phag mos yang zhus pa// dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu gang lags// rkyen ni gang lags dus gang lags// tshad ni gang lags/
35a4(rgyud 'bum): srung dus gang // lus ngag dam tshig ji ltar dbye// dang por nyams pa'i rgyu nyid kyang // mi shes pa dang bag med dang // nyon mongs ldan dang mgus dang // brjed ngas dran pa mi gsal ba//
35a5(rgyud 'bum): 'di drug dam tshig nyams pa'i rgyu// bla ma ma bsten grogs ngan 'grogs// mdor na sgo gsum yengs pa'i yul// de dag nyams pa'i rkyen du gsungs// gdon gyis bar chod chang gis myos//
35a6(rgyud 'bum): log lnga skyes dang khengs grags 'dod// nyon mongs zil non bla mas skyo// 'dod chags chen po skyes pa dag/ dam tshig nyams pa'i dus yin te// spyir ni rtsod ldan dus su gsungs// gdon /
35a7(rgyud 'bum): sogs gzhan gyis byin brlabs tshe// bsrung ba'i 'du shes sngon song na// chen po rdzogs kyang chung ngur gsungs// 'du shes sngon du ma song na// bag med nyams pa so na gnas// gdon
35b1(rgyud 'bum): sogs rang gis ma mthong na/ / de yang nyams pa chung ngur gsungs// 'khor bas skyo dang rnam smin dran// bla ma dran dang 'dod pa skyes// bar chod bral ba bshags pa'i dus// sbyor ba dngos
35b2(rgyud 'bum): gzhi mjug dang gsum/ / gang rdzogs tshad ni mthar phyin te// tshe 'bring dbye bas shes par bya// sbyor ba lhung ba chung ngu ste// dngos gzhi ltung ba 'bring du 'byung // 'jug rdzogs lhung ba
35b3(rgyud 'bum): chen por nges/ / rgyun dang phyag rgya phyag mtshan dag/ 'chang ba bsten pa'i dam tshig yin// sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga rnams ni// bza' bar bya ba'i dam tshig go// sems can dpa' bo mkha'
35b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gro la/ / longs spyod mchod pa gang byed pa// blta bar bya ba'i dam tshig go// rang gzhan sgyu mar gang shes pa// shes par bya ba'i dam tshig go// sgo gsum sku gsung thugs su bsam//
35b5(rgyud 'bum): bsrung bar bya ba'i dam tshig go// nyon mongs dug drug gzung 'dzin kun// rang rig skye ba med par bsgral// bsgral ba'i dam tshig chen po yin// dam tshig don du dam tshig dag/ dus
35b6(rgyud 'bum): drug dus gnyis lo bar du/ / brtul zhugs can gyis dam tshig bsrung // dngos grub don du rtag tu bsrung // skad cig tsam yang gnang ba med// rang gi lus kyi nyes pa las//
35b7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan gyi lus kyi nyes 'byung ba// 'di ni sku yi nyes par bshad// rang gi lus kyi nyes pa las// gzhan gyi ngag gi nyes 'byung ba// bdag gi sku yi nyams pa ste// gzhan la gsu
36a1(rgyud 'bum): gI nyams par 'gyur/ / gzhan yang mkhas pas shes par bya// rang la rtsu ba'i nyes pa las// gzhan la yan lag nyes 'byung dang // legs pa las ni nyes
36a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung sogs/ / bla ma'i zhal nas shes bya ste// 'bad de dam tshig bsrung bar bya// dam tshig de yi don rnams la// 'khor rnams 'jigs shing skrag gyur te// rdo rje phag mos yang
36a3(rgyud 'bum): zhus pa/ / dam tshig 'di yi don rnams ni// zab cing rgya che rtogs par dka'// mgon po khyod kyis bzhes par zhu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bdud rtsi khar zos slar
36a4(rgyud 'bum): la dor ba med/ / ngan skyugs phyir don slar la za ba med// rang rig byang chub bdud rtsi'i re tshor na// log rtog 'khrul pa'i rgyu 'bras ga la tshol// de bas dam tshig kho na gtso bor gyis//
36a5(rgyud 'bum): de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa thams cad kyang rgyud kyi don la rjes su yi rang bar gyur to// mkha' 'gro ma'i sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha
36a6(rgyud 'bum): ra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du/ shrI ag+ne ma le tan+ta rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal me'i
36a7(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// ha ha hi hi he he kye// bdag ni khyod la zhu ba mchis// shrI ni gang lags he gang lags// ru ni gang lags
36b1(rgyud 'bum): ka gang lags/ / dbang bzhi'i he ru ka gang lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shrI ni gnyis med ye shes te// he ni rgyu sogs rnam par spangs// ru ni tshogs dang bral
36b2(rgyud 'bum): ba nyid/ / ka ni gang du mi gnas so// de lta'i dpal ldan he ru ka/ rtag tu lus dang sems la gnas// de nyid la yang rnam pa bzhi// dbang bzhi'i grangs kyi nges pa ste// dang por bum
36b3(rgyud 'bum): dbang he ru ka/ sku dang phyag mtshan snang ba'i tshe// rang sems las su rung ba ste// de tshe 'jig rten tha mal pa'i// rgyu drug rkyen bzhi 'bras bu bzhi// spangs pa'i phyir na he zhes brjod//
36b4(rgyud 'bum): las dang nyon mongs tshogs dang bral// de yi phyir na ru zhes brjod// 'jig rten tha mal rnam rtog gi/ gzung 'dzin gang yang mi gnas pa'i// phyir na ka zhes gsungs pa'o// thabs
36b5(rgyud 'bum): dang shes rab zung 'jug pas/ / gzung 'dzin gnyis 'gags gnyis su med// de yi phyir na shrI ru brjod// bskyed pa'i rim pa he ru ka/ phag mo la sogs tshogs dang ldan// zag
36b6(rgyud 'bum): med rgyu rkyen kun dang ldan/ / thabs dang shes rab gnyis kyi tshul// de nas gsang dbang he ru ka/ nyi zla mtshan ma yig 'bru'i tshogs// bskyed rim rgyu rkyen kun spangs te// rlung sogs
36b7(rgyud 'bum): las su rung bas na/ / de yi phyir na he zhes brjod// phyi yi sbyin sreg gtor ma dang // mchod pa dkyil 'khor la sogs pa'i// tshogs dang bral ba'i phyir na ru// bskyed pa'i rdo rje
37a1(rgyud 'bum): phag mo dang / / dmigs dang lta spyod gang la yang // mi gnas phyir na ka zhes brjod// bskyed pa'i gzung 'dzin gnyis med ma'o// phyir na shrI zhes gsungs pa ste//
37a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyu rnams lam la sogs dang ldan// rlung sogs thabs dang shes rab tshul// rlung sogs sgyu ma'i ngo bor gnas// rtsa rlung rang bzhin gnas la sogs// nang gi rgyu dang rkyen sogs
37a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan nang gi dpal ldan he ru ka/ de nas shes rab he ru ka/ rlung sogs rang bzhin gnas pa yi// rgyu spangs phyir na he zhes brjod// rlung sogs lam la brten pa yi// tshogs dang
37a4(rgyud 'bum): bral phyir ru zhes brjod/ / rlung dang rtsa dang thig le dang // tsaN+Da li yi kha dog dang // dbyibs la mi gnas phyir na ka/ sems nyid bde bar gnas pa yis// nang gi thabs dang shes rab med//
37a5(rgyud 'bum): de yi phyir na shrI ru gsungs// mig ser nad kyis btab pa lhur// rang sems bde bar gnas pas so// sems nyid bde bar gnas pa dang // bde ba la brten tshogs dang ldan//
37a6(rgyud 'bum): lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu rkyen ldan// sems dang bde ba tha dad med// sems dang bde bar gang gnas pa// mchog dang chad pa'i dbus gnas pa// gsang ba'i dpal ldan he ru ka
37a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas bzhi pa'i he ru ka/ rang rig stong par gnas pa'i tshe// lhan cig skyes pa'i rgyu rkyen bral// de yi phyir na he zhes brjod// pha rol phyin drug bde ba'i lam// thams cad stong
37b1(rgyud 'bum): par ro gcig pas/ / tshogs gnyis bral phyir ru zhes brjod// bde ba tsam la mi gnas phyir// ka zhes nges par brjod pa yin// sems nyid rang rig stong par gnas// stobs sogs
37b2(rgyud 'bum): phun sum tshogs pas na/ / rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pa dang // gzugs sku'i rgyu rkyen la sogs ldan// shrI zhes bya bar mngon par brjod// dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med/
37b3(rgyud 'bum): dngos po ro mnyam mtha' yas pa'i// sems kyi de nyid la gnas pa'o// bezhi pa'i dpal ldan he ru ka/ bdud rnams kun la mtho 'tsham zhing // lhan cig skyes pa'i dur khrod rol/
37b4(rgyud 'bum): mi gnas gsal ba'i rang bzhin med// me long bzhin 'dra chu zla bzhin// mkhas pas 'bad de 'khrul pa spang // de ltar don ni ma rtogs par// kha cig sku mdog phyag mtshan la/
37b5(rgyud 'bum): heng ka yi rnam par rtog/ kha cig gzugs brnyan rnam par rtog/ kha cig rang gi ngo bor 'dod// de bzhin rtswa dang rlung 'dod sogs// de bzhin rang rig he ru ka/ bla ma ma bsten brtson
37b6(rgyud 'bum): 'grus med/ / rigs dang rigs pa'i nga rgyal can// khe dang grags pa rnyed la dga'// rgyu des log rtog sna tshogs bskyed// de bas he ru kar grags pa// dngos grub 'dod pa'i rnal
37b7(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pas/ / ngang dang gus bcas pha rol phyin// rdzogs byas bla ma dam pa las// man ngag yang dag blang bar bya// ma mo'i tshogs kyis yang zhus pa// he ru ka dpal de ltar na/
38a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje phag mo ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje gsum ste lag mo gnyis// don gyi rdo rje de nas brtags// tha ma rdzas kyi rdo rje ste// don
38a2(rgyud 'bum): gyi rdo rje bzhi pa ste/ / gzung 'dzin rnam par rtog pa yis// mi phyed phyir na rdo rje ste// dbang bzhis rdo rje re re'o// rtags kyi rdo rje gsum yin te// rtse gsum rtse lnga rtse dgu ste// rtse gsum sku
38a3(rgyud 'bum): gsung thugs kyi rtags/ / rtse lnga ye shes lnga yin te// khams gsum sa dgu 'joms pa yi// rtags su rdo rje rtse dgu'o// rdzas kyi rdo rje bzhi yin te// mi shes dri ma ches gos pa'i//
38a4(rgyud 'bum): dud 'gror skyes pa'i phag mo dang // shes rab char phyung phag mo ste// de nyid rnam pa bzhi ru nges// bum dbang zhe sdang gti mug phag/ gsang dbang rlung gi gti mug phag/ gsum pa chags
38a5(rgyud 'bum): dga' gti mug phag/ bzhi pa chos dbyings gti mug phag/ 'di nyid khyod la legs par gtad// thams cad rjes su yi rang ngo // dpal me'i 'phreng ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal he ru ka'i
38a6(rgyud 'bum): nges pa 'byung ba rdzogs so/ / / bla ma g+ha ya d+ha ra dang / dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// / rgya gar skad du
38a7(rgyud 'bum): shrI badz+ra DA ka~M gu h+ya tan+t+ra rA / bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// kye ho mngon rdzogs rgyal po kye// dbang rnams dam
38b1(rgyud 'bum): par yang ngam ci/ / gtso 'khor khyad par med ngam ci// sems can dang ni sangs rgyas la// bye brag tha dad med dam ci// dam tshig che chung med dam ci// de nyams bshags thabs yod dam ci//
38b2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rnam rtog gzung 'dzin dgag pa dang // rang rig ye shes blugs pa'i phyir// dbang rnams sgyu ma tsam du yod// rnal 'byor sems kyi ngo bo ru// dbang ni nges
38b3(rgyud 'bum): pa kho na sde/ / lus ngas kun nas bslangs pas so// de phyir sems kyi dri ma ni// 'khrud dang 'thor dang sreg pa dang // mkhyen pa'i rten dang go 'byed pas// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // nam mkha' lha
38b4(rgyud 'bum): bur gsungs pa ste/ / dang po gnyis pa gsum pa dag/ rim gyis ma bgrod dbang mi thob// bskyed pa'i rim pa la gnas shing // rdzogs pa'i rim pa 'dod rnams la// thabs 'di rdzogs pa'i
38b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyis/ / skas kyi rim pa lta bur gsungs// gang zag mchog dang las dang po// mngon par rtogs pa'i rim pa dang // mngon par rtogs pa'i yan lag go// 'di yis ngan 'gro'i
38b6(rgyud 'bum): srid las grol/ / dbang dang man ngag 'brel bas so// de nas bzhi pa zhal gyi dbang // sngon du 'gro dang mi 'gro med// 'dini dbang gi rgyal po ste// slob dpon sems kyi rgyal po ste// 'di ni
38b7(rgyud 'bum): rang rim pam pa'i dbang / 'di yis thams cad grol bar 'gyur// 'dal rtab tu byas mams kyi/ rnga shing 'gram 'bag la sogs la// gzugs panan mongs su rdzogs pa ma// ram
39a1(rgyud 'bum): tshon la sogs pa yi/ / gzugs brnyan yongs su rdzogs pa la// byin brlabs ye shes byas nas ni// lha lon zer nas mchod sogs te// bcos ma'i lha sogs
39a2(rgyud 'bum): ltar na/ / phung sogs ye nas sangs rgyas la// ci yi phyir na mchod mi byed// de nas gzhan yang dbye ba dag/ 'khrul pa yi ni 'khrul gzhi dag/ bcos pa nye bar bcos ma dang // 'dra ba dang ni/
39a3(rgyud 'bum): bu'o// dbang bzhis grol bar mi 'gyur te// log pa'i srid pas srid par 'ching // 'khrul pas 'khor los 'khor bar bskor// de bas dngos grub 'dod pas kyang // lha yi bu yi bdud spangs
39a4(rgyud 'bum): te/ bla ma dam pa rtag tu bsten// yid ches rig dang nges shes skye// lung gi tshad ma yin pa dang // 'og ma spong zhing gong ma thob// man ngag tshad ma yin par blang // mos pa'i rjes su 'brang byed
39a5(rgyud 'bum): cing / / che ba'i nga rgyal la gnas shing // 'jig rten lha spyod 'dren pa yi// snod bzung blang bar mi bya'o// de nas gtso 'khor bye brag kyang // gnas kyi khyad par dbus su ste// rgyan gyi khyad par
39a6(rgyud 'bum): thal ba ste/ / rigs kyi khyad par drug pa'i rigs// phyag dang zhal sogs khyad par gyis// gtse 'khor la sogs khyad par 'phags// dper na pha rol phyin drug las// shes rab pha rol phyin
39a7(rgyud 'bum): med na/ / pha rol phyin pa'i ming mi 'thob// dkyil 'khor dbus su gang gnas pa'i// de nyid kyis ni dkyil 'khor te// gang zhig dbus su mi gnas na// 'khor rnams dkyil du mi 'gyur te/
39b1(rgyud 'bum): dper ra rgyal po med pa'i grong // grong dang grong khyer ji bzhin no// de bzhin dam tshig bye brag kyang // rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// yan lag dam tshig de dang 'dra// thugs kyi dam tshig nyams
39b2(rgyud 'bum): gyur na/ / sku gsung dam tshig de dang 'dra// srog gcod dam tshig nyams gyur na// brdzun dang ma byin len pa dang // 'dod chags dam tshig de dang 'dra// lta ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// spyod
39b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dam tshig de dang 'dra/ / tshul 'chos mi shes song ba tsam// dam tshig nyams pa de dang 'dra// dper na 'khor lo sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang // bral ba'i rin chen bdun po de dag gis// 'khor
39b4(rgyud 'bum): la sbyar ba'i ming ni mi thob bzhin/ / bla ma'i zhal nas thams cad shes par bya// de nas sangs rgyas sems can yang // rdul tsam khyad par med mod kyang // rang rig gzhan rig rkyen dag kyang //
39b5(rgyud 'bum): rang sems las su rung ba dang // ma rung ba dang las kyi mtha'// log pa dang ni ma log pa// don byed nus dang mi nus pa// yongs su rdzogs dang ma rdzogs dang // sangs rgyas sems can
39b6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis su snang / / za dad par ni mi brtag ste// chu khams gser dang nam mkha' bzhin// rang bzhin gyis ni dag par 'dod// rang sems rang gis rtogs pas na// sems can gdong nas sangs
39b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas so/ / rdo rje phag mos yang zhus pa// srog gcod la sogs dam tshig la// dbye ba khyod kyis bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rang gi lus ngag sems
40a1(rgyud 'bum): g.yos kyang / / gsod pa'i 'du shes ma skyes na// ches gcod rnams chung ba nges// gzhan gyis gdon par tshor rab dag/ nyams pa 'bring du gsungs pa yin
40a2(rgyud 'bum): de las bzlog pa chen por des/ / gang zhig ma byin chung blangs kyang // gzhan la 'on mongs cher skyes na// de 'ang nyams pa 'bring du nges// cher blangs nyon mongs chung na 'bring // chen po las
40a3(rgyud 'bum): ni nyon mongs cher/ / de ni chen po kho nar nges// tshul 'chos lhung ba chen po ste/ mi shes pa dang bag med dang // brjed ngas la sogs 'bring du gsungs// gzhan yang dam tshig nyams pa yi//
40a4(rgyud 'bum): che 'bring chung ngu'i ldang tshang dag/ rang dang gzhan dang gnyis ka yi// rgyu rkyen ngag las shes bya ste// ldang ba ngo yis zin pa dang // phyi nang rdo rje slob dpon gyi// spyan sngar dkyil 'khor chen po
40a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhengs/ / tshul dang mthun par bshags pa bya// dam tshig gong 'og bye brag ni/ bla ma'i dkyil 'kho ma shes par bya/ gzhan yang bshags pa'i bye brag las// sbyin sreg gis ni sdig sreg
40a6(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ / nang gi skyon sreg chen po bsam// zab pa'i me ni chun bzhag mo// thabs kyi rgyun bcag ma yin te// lo bdun dang na lo gcig dag/ phyi yi rgyun banag chen po'im// thab gsum
40a7(rgyud 'bum): dang bdun dang ni/ / 'bring du gsungs te zhag bdun sogs// rgyun bzhag me ni chung ngur gsungs// rgyas pa la sogs de bzhin te// rang bzhin gdong nas gnas pa yi// gtum mo ye shes
40b1(rgyud 'bum): me rang bzhin/ / 'di ni rgyun bzhag chen po'i me// thog mtha' med par gnas pa'i phyir// dam tshig nyams pa'i bud shing sogs// ye shes me yi bud shing yin// man ngag can gyis
40b2(rgyud 'bum): bsregs byas na/ / nyams pa'i shing sogs 'tshig par nges// dgang gzar la sogs de bzhin te// rgyas pa la sogs de dang 'dra// rgyud 'di gtad kyis legs par zung // thams cad dga'
40b3(rgyud 'bum): zhing mgu bar gyur/ / dpa' bo mkha' 'gro gsang ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//
40b4(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra b+hai ra ba bi dA ra Na tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam par 'joms pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po
40b5(rgyud 'bum): dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'khor dpag tu med pa dang ri rab kyi steng du bzhugs pa'i dus su/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje snying
40b6(rgyud 'bum): pos/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum du bskor ba byas te/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces gsol to// thugs rje che ldan bcom ldan 'das// rdo rje gang lags 'jigs byed gang // 'joms
40b7(rgyud 'bum): pa gang lags chung gang lags/ / rgyal po gang lags bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje rnam pa gsum yin te// nyon mongs bdud sogs 'joms par byed//
41a1(rgyud 'bum): nyon mongs dgra sogs rnam par 'joms// chu yi rlung dang 'bras bu'i rgyung// mthar thug chung ni gang yin la// rgyal po zhes ni bskrun pa yin// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol
41a2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ re re'i bye brag ma 'tshal bas// de yi dbye ba bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje rnam pa gsum yin te// don gyi rdo rje de nas rtags// rdzas kyi rdo rje dang ni
41a3(rgyud 'bum): gsum/ / de nas don gyi rdo rje bshad// gzung 'dzin rtog pas mi phyed phyir// don gyi rdo rjer bshad pa'o// dbang bzhi rdo rje re re ste// rdo rje bzhi ru bshad pa yin// rtags kyi rdo rje gsum yin te/
41a4(rgyud 'bum): rtse gsum rtse lnga rtse dgu pa// rtse gsum sku gsung thugs kyi rtags// rtse lnga ye shes lnga yi rtags// rtse dgu khams gsum sa dgu'i rtags// rdzas kyi rdo rje bzhi yin no// bum pa'i dbang dang
41a5(rgyud 'bum): 'brel ba yi/ / sku mdog phyag mtshan la sogs lha// gzung dang 'dzin pa'i rnam rtog ni// 'jig snang 'joms pas rdo rje'o// gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi// rtsa dang rlung dang thig le la/
41a6(rgyud 'bum): gzung 'dzin gnyis su gang rtogs pa// 'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje'o// shes rab ye shes dang 'brel ba'i// lhan cig skyes dga' la sogs pa'i// gzung dang 'dzin pa gang rtogs pa//
41a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje lam// bzhi pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba mo// rang rig sems nyid stong nyid la// gzung 'dzin gnyis su gang rtog pa// 'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje'o// de nas
41b1(rgyud 'bum): rtags kyi rdo rje ni/ / rtse gsum sku gsung thugs su bshad// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum// 'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje ste// rtse lnga ye shes lnga yi rtags// nga rgyal la sogs
41b2(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa lnga/ / 'jig cing 'joms pas rdo rje'o// de nas rdzas kyi rdo rje ni// rnam pa bzhi ru bsten pa ni// zur gsum rno la 'bigs pa dang // gru bzhi dag cing gsal bar byed// zlum pos rdzas rnams
41b3(rgyud 'bum): 'joms par byed/ / zur lngas 'dod sgrub sras rdo rje// rgyud kyi don ni rnam pa bzhi// rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis ka'i rgyud// mthar thug rgyud kyi rgyal po ste// de rnams kun la dbang byed pa// log
41b4(rgyud 'bum): lta'i rgyud sogs spong bar byed/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa rnams dga' zhing mgu nas rjes su yi rangs te/ g.yas
41b5(rgyud 'bum): phyogs nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ so so'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mi snang bar gyur to// dpal rdo rje 'jigs byed rnam par 'joms pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// // bla
41b6(rgyud 'bum): ma ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsa ba shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA ba la dz+nyA na rA dza tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal
41b7(rgyud 'bum): stobs chen ye shes rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de kho na nyid btsun mo'i b+ha ga la 'khor
42a1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo rdo rje la sogs pa mkha' 'gro ma dang / ma mo'i tshogs kyis banor te bzhugs pa'i dus su/ dpa' rdo rje mkha' 'gro la sogs pas g.yon phyogs su bskor ba lan
42a2(rgyud 'bum): gsum byas nas phyos sa gcig tu 'khod do/ / dpa' bo rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la spyi bos gtugs te ha ha zhes pa gsum brjod nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ rtsa ni gang lags rlung gang
42a3(rgyud 'bum): lags/ / thig le gang lags grangs ni du// de la sems gzung ji ltar lags// 'khor lo ji ltar lags pa dang // de yi grangs ni du zhig mchi// rtsa rnams rang bzhin ji ltar lags//
42a4(rgyud 'bum): yi ge dgod thabs ji ltar lags// de rnams dbus kyi lte bar ni// yi ge dgod pa gang dang gang // gtum mo sbar ba ji ltar lags// zla ba nyi ma ji ltar lags// gnas ni gang du gzung bar bgyi/
42a5(rgyud 'bum): rkyen gnyis 'khor lo ji ltar lags// go bzlog tshul ni ji ltar lags// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi gang lags// de rnams kyi ni dgongs pa dang // de la dga' sogs ji ltar 'byung //
42a6(rgyud 'bum): stong pa bcu drug ji ltar lags// sa yi rim pa ji ltar lags// de rnams kyi ni dgongs pa dang // dgos pa'i dgongs pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon
42a7(rgyud 'bum): cig dpa' bo rdo rje khyod/ / khyod la bshad kyis logs par zung // rtsa rnams kyi ni rang bzhin ni// nam mkha' gnyis med thams cad skyed// der gnas rlung gi rang bzhin ni// g.yo ba rnam
42b1(rgyud 'bum): shes g.yo ba yin/ / thig le stong nyid ngo bo ste// stong nyid bsam du med pa'o// thig le grangs ni bcu drug ste// rtsa dang rlung yang de bzhin no// de nas sems gzung bstan pa ni// rtsa dang rlung
42b2(rgyud 'bum): ni thig le la/ / gnyis med rtse gcig sems dang po// 'khor lo'i grangs ni bzhi yin te// bde chen 'khor lo longs spyod chos// de 'og sprul pa'i 'khor lo ste// de re la yang bzhi bzhi ste/
42b3(rgyud 'bum): bcu drug grangs su shes par bya// me rlung gnyis ni rkyen yin te// ro ma'i 'khor lo nyid dang ni// spyi gtsug 'khor lo dbang bskur gnas// gsang ba'i 'khor lo ba ni yin te// bde skyong
42b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo dang po ste/ / rta mgrin longs spyod 'khor lo yin// rig pa'i 'khor lo gsum pa'o// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bzhi yin no// nyi shu rtsa bzhi grangs su bstan// rtsa rnams rang
42b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin nga yis bshad/ / rtsa ni sa yi rang bzhin te// rlung dang thig le'i rang bzhin no// de nas yi ge dgod pa ni// bde chen 'khor lo sum cu gnyis// gsal byed sum cu rtsa gnyis ni//
42b6(rgyud 'bum): g.yas nas bskor te dgod par bya// longs spyod 'khor lo'i rtsibs bcu drug/ dbyangs yig bcu drug g.yon nas dgod// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad// yum bzhi'i sa bon g.yon
42b7(rgyud 'bum): nas bskor/ / thabs ni mtshams te g.yas nas bskor// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'o 'dab ma ni// drug cu rtsa bzhi gang yin la// gsal byed g.yas skor dgod par bya// dbyangs yig
43a1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis ldan g.yon nas bskod/ khang rten 'tshar mo'i lte dbus su// rkan dkar po 'byur ba smras pasam// longs spyod 'khor lo'i ste dbus su// oM na dka
43a2(rgyud 'bum): na ltas bsam/ / chos kyi 'khor lo'i lde dbus su// dz+nyA ni sngon po 'thur bltas bsam// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i lte dbus su// A ni dmar po byin bltas bsam// rkyen ni 'khor
43a3(rgyud 'bum): lo gnyis yin te/ / dang po'i gnas su yi ge yaM// gtum mo 'bar ba'i yaM yid te// nag po yongs su gyur pa las// rlung 'khor mdog gnag gzhu yi dbyibs// dbus su d+ha lnga dgod
43a4(rgyud 'bum): byas nas/ / ba dan lnga ni mdzes pa'o// gru gsum gnas su yi ge raM// me yi 'khor lo gru gsum dmar// dbus su oM AHhUM ni dgod// zur la rdo rje gsum gyis mtshan// rkyen gyi
43a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo de ltar yin/ / rlung gis bskyod pas dam tshig mes// ye shes me ni bskul ba mkhas// 'khor lo bzhi 'am brgyad gnyis bshad// bde chen ma gtogs gnyis tsam bsregs//
43a6(rgyud 'bum): bde chen ta ni bsros byas nas// zhu ba'i cha med bdud rtsi ni// zla ba nu ba'i bdud rtsi yos// srog gi rtsa yi nang nas 'bab// rgyun du 'bab par gyur pa yis// 'chi med thigs pa gnyis yin te//
43a7(rgyud 'bum): gzung ba mdud pa'i nang du gzung // no bzlog lpags su bzlog pa ste// mthar drug ga nas su gzung ba'o// gsang ba'i 'khor lo bani pa ni// gsang ba bang skyong 'khor lolo// dz+nyAn sti nga/
43b1(rgyud 'bum): dgod byas nas// 'dab ma lnga bcu brgyad kyi grangs// gsal byed lugs bzhin dgod par bya// dbyangs yig rim gnyis dag bkod nas// tha ma bzung ste spangs pa'o// sdig pa spong phyir bde
43b2(rgyud 'bum): skyong ste/ / de phyir bde sbyor zhes ni bshad// rta mgrin 'khor lo'i 'ad ba bzung la// dbyangs yig lugs dang lugs min dgod// lte bar u ni dgod par bya// bde ba'i longs spyod myong ba'i
43b3(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ / rta mgrin 'khor lo ru ni bshad// rig pa'i 'khor lo 'dab ma lnga// lte bar haM ni dgod byas nas// 'dab ma lnga la oM hUM wus// g.yas nas rim gyis dgod par bya// bzhi pa'i
43b4(rgyud 'bum): don ni rig pa'i phyir/ / rig pa'i 'khor lo zhes ni bshad// gsang ba'i 'khor lo rim pa drug/ lte ba 'dab bzhi 'dab ma brgyad// bcu drug sum cu rtsa gnyis te// drug cu rtsa bzhi bshad pa
43b5(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / lte bar a ni dgod pa ste// e baM ma ya de rnams ni// 'dab ma bzhi la g.yon nas dgod// 'dab ma brgyad la dgod bya ba// sde brgyad kyi ni dang po brgyad// g.yon gyi rim pas dgod
43b6(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / 'dab ma bcu drug gang yin la// ma mo bcu drug g.yon nas dgod// 'dab ma sum cu gnyis sogs la// dbyangs yig yi ge bcu drug ni// g.yas dang g.yon gyi rim pas dgod//
43b7(rgyud 'bum): 'ang ma dzum curgya bzhi 'o// g.yas nas kA la lugs pazhin dgod// a la rim gnyis g.yon rnaMs dgo// gsang pa'i dbang bsrung ba mi byor// gsang ba'i 'kho la rnaM na bshad/
44a1(rgyud 'bum): nas ro ma'i 'khor lo na// 'dab ma gnyis la lte bar bcas// ma ning ba ni yi 'dab gnyis la// lte bar de nyid 'thur la dgod// rin chen rtse mo bsam bya ba// b+h+ya ni byin
44a2(rgyud 'bum): la dgod par bya/ / yi ge gnyis kyi dbus su ni// byang chub sems kyi bde ba'i ro// nyams su myong bar bya ba'i phyir// nyams myong ro ma'i 'khor lor bshad// de nas dbang bskur 'khor lo ni//
44a3(rgyud 'bum): steng gi tshangs sgo'i 'dab ma brgyad// lte bar a ni dgod pa ste// de la khaM r+ya/ g.yon nas brtsams te phyogs bzhir dgod// hUM tra~M hri a/ g.yas nas mtshams su rim par dgod// byang chub
44a4(rgyud 'bum): sems kyi chu rgyun gyis/ / lus ngag yid gsum sgrib pa dag/ 'khrud pa'i phyir na dbang bskur te// de phyir dbang bskur 'khor lo bshad// de nas yang ni bshad bya ba// mdor bsdus sgom pa
44a5(rgyud 'bum): bshad par bya/ / gong du bstan pa gang yin pa// sgyu ma tsam du shes par bya// rang rig sems las gzhan min te// rang gi sems kyi stong pa nyid// 'od gsal ba yi rang bzhin du// ci yang
44a6(rgyud 'bum): mi rtog shes gyur na/ / ma bsgoms na yang sgom pa nyid// de ltar sems la legs par zung // bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / dpa' bo rdo rje la sogs pa'i dpa' bo
44a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / mkha' 'gro ma dang / ma mo la sogs pa'i 'khor dpag tu med pa rjes su yi rang bar gyur te/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod nas mi snang bar gyur to// dpal stobs chen ye shes
44b1(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rmad du byung ba rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+hudUr dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//
44b2(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra sid+d+hi dz+wa la saM ba ra tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje grub pa'i dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo//
44b3(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das dga' ldan gyi gnas na/ rin po che khang bzang gi nang na byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang / dga' ba'i 'od dang / dri ma med pa'i
44b4(rgyud 'bum): 'od la sogs pa dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor dpag tu med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs pa'i dus su/ rigs sgyu ma'i dbang du
44b5(rgyud 'bum): mdzad de/ thams cad kyis lha'i phyi nang gi gsang ba bla na med pa'i mchod pas mchod pa'i dus su/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal
44b6(rgyud 'bum): te/ thal mo sbyar te gsol pa/ mgon po thugs rje che ldan pa// de nyid don dam gang yin pa// dpal dang rdo rje'i don dang ni// dra ba sdom pa rgyud kyi don// nges bstan sdom pa gang yin pa/
44b7(rgyud 'bum): de nyid bdag la bshang du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// byams pa la sogs 'khor rnams kun// rgya rol don la yangs pa'i sems// nang du bsdus la rtse gcig nyon
45a1(rgyud 'bum): dpal ldan ye shes gnyis med do/ / de nyid mchod pa'i 'os yin la// gnyis med bde bas mchod par bya// rdo rje zhes bya ye shes lnga// gzung 'dzin rtog pa ma ma byang/
45a2(rgyud 'bum): phyir// rdo rje nas ni bstan pa yin// de nyid don la rtse gcig pas// chos su rdo rje 'chang chen po'i// sa ni nges par thob pa'o// dra ba zhes pa mang po'i don// kun rdzob gzhan rig tu bstan
45a3(rgyud 'bum): pas/ / grangs mang rgya cher bstan pa ni// nam mkha' dang mtshungs sdom pa'i don// nam mkha' dang mtshungs rang rig ni// sems kyi de nyid stong pa'o// skad cig de nyid rgyud nyid la// rgyud
45a4(rgyud 'bum): ces bya bar bstan pa yin/ / dpal rdo rje dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud las/ mtshan gyi rgyud bstan pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de las gzhan ni nga yis bshad// ye shes skye ba'i
45a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyu dang gnas/ / rkyen dang de bzhin dmigs pa'i yul// bye brag ming gi rnam grangs dang // don gyi rnam grangs gang yin dang // phan yon dang ni 'bras bu dang // don dam de nyid chos kyi dbyings
45a6(rgyud 'bum): de nyid 'dir ni bshad par bya/ / rgyu ni rang rig ye shes te// rgyu med rgyu yi rang bzhin can// rang rig sgyu mar byung ba ni// bde chen 'khor lo nas brtsams te// 'khor lo bzhi 'am brgyad
45a7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis bshad/ / de bzhin nyi shu rtsa bzhi ste// ye shes skye ba'i rten yin la// gnas ni de dang mnyam pa'i rtsa// grogs ni ye shes rlung yin te// ye shes rlung gi bzhon pa la// zhon nas
45b1(rgyud 'bum): de nyid 'byung ba yin/ / grangs ni snga ma ltar du shes// ngo bo thig le nyid yin te// thig le mdud pa'i grangs su shes// de yi phan yon gang yin pa// gzung 'dzin rnam par rtog pa yis//
45b2(rgyud 'bum): phyir ci log tu brtags pa yis// rnam par rtog pa spong ba yin// 'bras bu rdo rje 'chang chen po'i// sa ni nges par thob pa'o// dpal rdo rje dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud las/ ye shes kyi rgyu dang
45b3(rgyud 'bum): gnas la sogs pa bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// 'khor lo rnams kyi dbye ba ni// bde chen 'khor lo'i 'dab ma ni// sum cu
45b4(rgyud 'bum): rtsa gnyis grangs yin no/ / de nas longs spyod 'khor lo ni// 'dab ma bcu drug dag tu bstan// chos kyi 'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad// sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i 'dab ma ni// drug cu rtsa bzhi
45b5(rgyud 'bum): ngag yin no/ / bde chen 'khor lo sor bzhi ste// longs spyod 'khor lo sor bcu drug/ chos kyi 'khor lo sor bcu gnyis// sprul pa'i 'khor lo sor bcu drug/ bde chen 'khor lo'i lte ba
45b6(rgyud 'bum): ru/ haM ni dkar po 'thur bltas bsam// longs spyod 'khor lo'i lte dbus su// oM ni dmar po gyen bltas bsam// chos kyi 'khor lo'i lce dbus su// hUM ni sngon po 'thur bltas
45b7(rgyud 'bum): bsam/ / sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i lte dbus su// A ni dmar po gyen bltas bsam// dang po'i 'khor lo'i 'dab ma la// dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug ni// lugs 'byung lugs min dgod
46a1(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / longs spyod 'khor ba'i 'dabs la// dbyangs yig bcu drug rim bzhin dgod/ chos kyi 'khor mo'i 'dab ma la// mAnA pa ta/ yi ge 'di rnams ga
46a2(rgyud 'bum): nas dgod/ / oM traM hriHa/ mtshams nas g.yas su dgod par bya// sprul pa'i 'dab ma bzhi rtsibs la// gsal byed yi gsum cu gnyis// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog tshul
46a3(rgyud 'bum): dgod/ / sku gsung thugs kyi rtsa gsum ni// dbus nas drang por gnas pa ste// hUM ni dkar po 'thur bltas pa// mar gyi rtsel thug par dgod// g.yas na thabs kyi rtsa gnas te/
46a4(rgyud 'bum): kA li sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// thabs la lan gsum bskor byas nas// lugs 'byung 'og tu kha bltas dgod// g.yon na shes rab rtsa gnas la// ma mo dbyangs yig bcu drug ni/
46a5(rgyud 'bum): gyen la bltas pa dgod par bya// sgal tshigs la gnas srog la brten// rtsa gsum 'dus pa'i gnas der ni// rin chen dang 'dra mdud pa ni// dgu par gnas pa bya gdong tshul//
46a6(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// bde ba reg ster ma ni bzhugs// gzhan yang rkyen gyi 'khor lo gnyis// glu gsum gnas su yi ge raM// de ni yongs su gyur pa las/ me yi 'khor
46a7(rgyud 'bum): lo gru gsum pa/ / tshad ni sor gsum nyid yin te// lte bar raM ni dmar po bsam// 'dab ma gsum la oM AHhUM// gru gsum zur la dgod bya ba// rdo rje rtse gsum bsam par bya//
46b1(rgyud 'bum): rlung gi gnas su yi ge yaM// de nyid yongs su gyur pa las// mdog gnag gzhu yi dbyibs 'dra la// tshad ni sor bzhi nyid yin no// dbus su 'dab ma lnga yin te// lte bar yang ni nag
46b2(rgyud 'bum): po bsam/ / 'dab ma lnga la dA lnga dgod// ba dan lnga yis mtshan pa'o// rlung gi dam tshig me sbar bas// dam tshig me yis gtum mo bskul// ye shes mes ni gtum mo bskul//
46b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo gsum bsregs rnying pa tsam// yi ge haM ni bsros pa yis// haM bzhu bdud rtsi'i char yang bab// lte ba'i gnas su thig ler gyur// rgyun du 'bar bar gyur pa yis// rin chen
46b4(rgyud 'bum): dbyibs 'dra'i nang sleb nas/ / rang bzhin dga' ba nyams myong bas// rang gi sems kyi snying po'i ro// bzhi pa'i dpal ldan he ru ka/ de nyid rtogs par gyur pa yis// chos sku rdo rje 'chang
46b5(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i/ / sa ni nges par thob pa'o// dpal rdo rje grub pa dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud las/ 'khor lo bzhi bstan pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya
46b6(rgyud 'bum): ba/ yid bzhin nor bu dang mtshungs pa'i// nges don du ni nga yis gsungs// de yi don la khyed rnams kyis// rtse gcig sems kyis yid la zung // bcom ldan 'das kyis de
46b7(rgyud 'bum): skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byams pa dang / dga' ba'i 'od dang / dri ma med pa'i 'od la sogs pa dpa' bo dang rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor dpag tu med pa thamatshing mgu nas
47a1(rgyud 'bum): rjes su yi rang nas lha'i mchod pa rnam pa du mas mchod pa ni nam mkha' la rin po che'i char dang / sgeg pa dang / dgod pa dang / dga' ba'i mchod pa'i rnam pa dang / @
47a2(rgyud 'bum): hi la sogs pa'i mchod pa dang / gzhan yang lha'i me tog dang / spos dang / mar me dang / dri dang / zhal zas kyi mchod pa ro brgya pa dang / gtum pa'i mchod pas mchod de/ gzhan yang
47a3(rgyud 'bum): nang dang / gsang ba dang / gsang ba'i gsang ba bla na med pa'i mchod pa chen po rmad du byung bas mchod nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ so so'i rdzu 'phrul gyis mi snang bar gyur to// dpal de
47a4(rgyud 'bum): rje grub pa dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so/ / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus pa'o//
47a5(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta gar+b+ha ar+tha tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi snying po don gyi rgyud/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa'
47a6(rgyud 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje bdag/ snying po mchog ni bzhugs pa'i sku// rdo rje
47a7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' la gzigs te/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes sku// sna tshogs gzugs can sems 'di ni// mtha' dang bral ba yin mod kyi// srid dang 'khor bar rab tu grags// de nas
47b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' yis/ / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol// kye ho rang byung bcom ldan 'das// nam mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs lus// gsung gi mnga' bdag rig sngags rgyal// skye
47b2(rgyud 'bum): med dbyings nas snang byed 'khrungs/ / 'gro drug 'dren pa khyod kyi gsung // nyid kyi zhal nas thig pa shor// ke ke ru dang margad dang // spug dang rdo yi snying po dang // rin chen kha dog sna lnga pas/
47b3(rgyud 'bum): ye shes gzhal yas kha dog spras// nyid las mi gzhan 'jigs byed dang // rgyal sras dad pa gtam nyan dang // 'gro ba 'dul ba'i 'khor rnams so// de nas bcom ldan shAka thub kyi//
47b4(rgyud 'bum): gsung gi dgongs pa mkhyen nas ni// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes kyi// rang byung ye shes bsdu ba mdzad// de bzhin gshegs kyis 'di skad du// ched du brjod pa rnam par mdzad// gang zhig
47b5(rgyud 'bum): rtsol med bde chen don/ / lhan cig skyes pa ma mthong na// sgrub dang rtsol ba ci spyad kyang // byis pa don med ga chad du// rdzas bzung ba ni 'ching ba nyid// rten 'brel sgom pa gnyis pa'o// don
47b6(rgyud 'bum): med nyams myong 'dod pa yang / / 'ching ba'i rgyu ste gsum pa'o// kha cig oM ri'i thal bas byugs// dbang phyug nam mkha'i rdzas rnams sdud// 'ching ba'i rgyu ste bzhi pa'o// gleng gzhi'i
47b7(rgyud 'bum): le'u ste dang po'o/ mtha' dang bral ba'i rang bzhim la/ gzung 'dzin nad kyimatshal 'ching // gdod nas dag pa'i rnam mkha' la// bag chags mtshan mas cis
48a1(rgyud 'bum): 'ching / / skye 'gag med pa'i chos nyid la// rgyu 'bras nad kyis ci la 'ching // bsam dang bral ba'i ye shes la// rdog dpyod nad kyis cil 'ching // e ma'o rnam
48a2(rgyud 'bum): dngag sems nyid klong / / lhan cig skyes pa bde ba'i mchog/ 'od gsal sna tshogs dus na bde// rnam dag 'khor lo bde ba la// bsnun pa'i blo gros log pa yis// srid rgyu nges pa'iH
48a3(rgyud 'bum): bar 'khyams/ / gzhan yang ston pas 'di skad gsungs// zhen chags can gyi gdul bya la// bde ba chen po bcos ma sbyin// khong khro can gyi gdul bya la// g.yo ba rlung gi bcos ma
48a4(rgyud 'bum): sbyin/ / 'dod pa chu bzhin gdungs pa la// bkri drang rang rgyud bcos ma sbyin// kun tu rmongs pa'i yid can la// stong pa snying rje bcos ma sbyin// ston pas de skad bka' stsal pas// 'khor
48a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams bsdu ba rnam mdzad de/ / de bzhin gshegs la 'di skad gsol// ye nas rnam par dag pas na// khams gsum 'khor ba ji ltar lags// glo bur ba gcig legs 'gyur na//
48a6(rgyud 'bum): thog mtha' yod par mi 'gyur ram// yang na rdo rje sems sogs pa// dmyal bar 'tshed par mi 'gyur ram// 'khor ba bde ba grub pa na// sbyang btub bam ni ci zhig gu// de skad gsol nas
48a7(rgyud 'bum): mi snang gyur/ / de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa// nga la nyan pa khyed legs so// rtse gcig yid kyis dang bar byos// ma nges kha dog 'ja' tshon las// rigs kyi khyad par tha dad
48b1(rgyud 'bum): snang / / ldan la lha mi gcig pa'o// ma bsdus gcig tu rdzogs pa'o// smra ba'i seng ge 'jigs pa med// bka' yi dgongs pa shin tu zab// margad blo yi mching bu len// sna tshogs
48b2(rgyud 'bum): kha dog rigs su bsgyur/ / dper na swa sti ka bzhin no// ka ran ta yi skye bzhin no// brtags shing brtags shing skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes sku// khyab bdag nam mkha'i
48b3(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs gzugs/ / deng bdag sems dpa'i lus su 'gyur// 'gro ba'i mgon pos de skad du// bshad nas 'khor rnams dengs gyur te// phyogs gcig tu ni 'khor gyur na// bcom
48b4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das la 'di skad gsol/ / lta ba'i rang bzhin ji lta bu// ma bcos ngo bo ji lta bu// ye shes spyod pa ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// legs so 'dus pa'i
48b5(rgyud 'bum): tshogs chen pos/ / rnam pa drug gi mtshan nyid de// khyad par bdun dang mtshon pa'i dpe// bcu bzhi rnam pa ci rigs su// bcu gsum ma nor zhes su bshad// lhan cig skyes pa khyab gnas
48b6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ mngon sum dbang gi ngo bor shar// sbyin pas bzlog nas bltas pa yis// nam mkha' las 'bab bde skyong nas// 'thur du 'khor lo drug rims su// a ta rak+ta bde ba len//
48b7(rgyud 'bum): ye shes zer zhing sdug bsngal skye// rmongs pas mya ngan sdig pas 'dzin// de mi spong ba'i 'ching bar 'gyur// si d+ha'i tshul du dge slong gnyis// dbang rdzogs zer zhing bde ba spyod/
49a1(rgyud 'bum): 'chi 'phos nas ni dmyal bar song // rgyal po'i khab na btsun mo can// chom du sdud cing rig pa yis// ye shes gzhan la 'chad cing ston// 'chi 'phos drung
49a2(rgyud 'bum): khrod sa ga yi/ / smad 'tshong ma yi srin bur skyes// 'jig rten khams gzhan sems dmyal du// shin tu 'tshed cing 'bod par 'gyur// brig sha'i drung na a ko ta// bka' yi
49a3(rgyud 'bum): bsgo ba rnam par byed/ / kha sbyor ba ni ye shes zhes// bzhin bzang ma la legs par dgod// tshe 'phos nas ni ngu 'bod skyes// 'chad pa'i skyes bu de phyir nges// khyod kyis 'dri ba
49a4(rgyud 'bum): bstan par bya/ / sems kyi rang bzhin ma bcos pa// mi rtog lta ba mi dmigs shes// mi g.yo ngo bo mi 'da' 'am// de skad gsungs nas mi snang gyur// 'dri ba'i rtog pa dang po
49a5(rgyud 'bum): chod/ / 'chad pa'i skyes bus yang gsol pa// 'gro ba'i bla ma gnyen gcig pu// dam phog pa ni ji ltar lags// dbang gi rang bzhin ji ltar lags// rtog pa gnyis pa dris pa
49a6(rgyud 'bum): las/ / lta ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // lhan cig skyes pa'i bde ba yi// gang la ming de skad bya yi// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs// mtshon pa'i dpe
49a7(rgyud 'bum): ni 'di skad gsungs/ / nag po brtsegs pa pad pa ti// gri ta dang ni kang ka dang // phag dang glang po gzhon nu ma// zla ba chu she glang seng dang // o da chu bo gsum 'dres dang //
49b1(rgyud 'bum): gser dang nam mkha' ri bo ma// gsum pa bcu ba nir shes par bya// de bzhin nyid ldan dam pa ste// de las gang zhig 'da' byed pa// dmyal bar yang dag 'tsheng par bshad// e ma'i/
49b2(rgyud 'bum): rang rig skal chen po// nam mkha'i sprin la 'byung bar byed// byis pa rang bzhin mi shes pas// bcos med rang bzhin spro bsdu byed// rnam dag 'od gsal sgrib pa med// ye shes
49b3(rgyud 'bum): rgya mtshor zhugs rmongs pas/ / kun tu 'ching ba'i mdud pa nyid// kun tu 'ching ba rgyun mi 'chad// lhan cig skyes pa'i mda' 'phangs kyang // bsnun pa'i blo gros log pa yis//
49b4(rgyud 'bum): gcig dang du mas sems bslad pas// rmongs pa nga rgyal spel bar byed// rlung gi rgyu ba dril pa'i lha// yig 'bru kha dog go bar byed// yid dang rlung ni rgyu ba na// snang ba 'gags pa
49b5(rgyud 'bum): ye shes so/ / de nyid log pas 'ching ba'i rgyu// tshangs pa yi ni tsiN+Da li// sbar bas lha nyid 'od du zhu// ka sogs g.yas dang g.yon du a// yig mgo tshig dang gsos pa dang //
49b6(rgyud 'bum): stong phrag bdun cu'i rtsa lam nas// bab pa bde ba skyed par byed// don dam pa'o zhes su smra// rmongs pa bsdams pas mdud pa grol// zag pa skyes pas 'ching bar 'gyur// lhan
49b7(rgyud 'bum): cig skyes pas rigs pa yis/ / ci rigs pa ru gzhan la ston// grol bar 'gyur zhes nga mi smra// e ma'o blo ni gnyis su snang // ji ltar spyad kyang grol mi 'gyur// dbang gi le'u ste
50a1(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa'o/ / gang la ming de skud bya ba'i// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' yis// rtog pa gsum la
50a2(rgyud 'bum): gcad pa'i phyir/ / stan las langs te 'di skad gsol// nam mkha'i bdag po sna tshogs lus// bsgom pa'i rang bzhin ji ltar lags// phyag 'tshal rdo rje dpa' khyod la// phyag 'tshal
50a3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rang byung sems/ / phyag rnams dag pa 'od gsal dbyings// phyag 'tshal 'dud cing phyag 'tshal 'dud// 'gro ba'i bla ma ye shes gzugs// gsung gi thigs pa lhan cig skyes//
50a4(rgyud 'bum): rnam dag rang rig dbyings la 'dud// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kye ma sems dpa' rdo rje nyon// mngon du gyur pa sgom pa'i mchog/ sna tshogs 'bar ba ye shes drod//
50a5(rgyud 'bum): ci yang mthong la med rtogs na// ma mthong gnas na mthong ba ru// mthong na 'gag cing bltas na skye// shes rab ye shes 'ong po che// ci dgar bzhag na bde ba 'gog/ ye shes rgya mtsho ye
50a6(rgyud 'bum): gsal la/ / sangs rgyas sgom par mi mdzad do// de la gnyen po yod dam ci// rigs pas ston pa 'ching ba'i nad// 'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi// bde ba de ni ston mdzad dam// rdo rje
50a7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' khyod nyid kyis/ / bstan par nus sam 'on te ci// bsnyad du med pas brjod dang bral// bsgrub tu med pas dpe dang bral// mtshon du med pas tshig la ma chad// lhan cig/
50b1(rgyud 'bum): skyes pas bsgrub tu med// mngon du gyur pas bsgom du med// dpyad du med pas bcos dang bral// ma yengs blo yis rtogs pa'o// bsgom pa'i le'u 'di bshad pa'i tshe// 'chad pa'i
50b2(rgyud 'bum): skyes bu nyid kyang ni/ / brgyal nas sa la 'gyel gyur te// lha min rig sngags 'chang ba rnams// so sor byer te rengs par gyur// lha yi bu mo stong phrag ni// chos la rdul mig rnam par
50b3(rgyud 'bum): dag/ byang chub sems dpa' nyi khri yang // de ma thag tu mngon sangs rgyas// 'jig rten khams ni drug g.yos pas// 'ur 'ur po dang chem chem gyis// khams gsum po ni 'dar bar byed//
50b4(rgyud 'bum): de yi mod la sems rdzogs pa// ngo mtshar skyes nas 'di skad gsol// e ma'o sangs rgyas kun gyi rje// rdzogs sangs rgyas pa bde ba'i mchog/ skal ldan 'dul byed gnyen gcig pu// 'gro
50b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i mar me ye shes sbron/ / khyod kyi thugs kyi ye shes kyis// ma rig sgo nga'i ling thog bsal// rnam dag ye shes khyod la 'dud// dga' mgu rangs nas gsol pa dang // thams cad
50b6(rgyud 'bum): 'dud cing 'khod par byed/ / sgom pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// de skad bcom ldan shAkya thub// rdo rje sems dpa' la gzigs te// bka' yi bsgo ba 'di skad mdzad/
50b7(rgyud 'bum): legs so 'dus pa'i tshogs chen rnams// yang dag ye shes la zhugs pas// rnam rtog 'ching ba'i nang dang bral// mtha' dang bral ba'i rang bzhin la// bzlog pas bltas pa tha dad
51a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin/ / gnyug ma'i rang bzhin lhan cig skyes// de yang bcings pas ci la mthong // gang gis de nyid mngon gyur pa// de la sdig pas ci la 'dzin// dus gsu
51a2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten khams bzhugs pa/ / de la byin gyis rlob par mdzad// de la gal te gzugs yod na// dpag gam gzhal du btub bam ci// lha dang lha min gsang ba pa// de la ci rigs skyob
51a3(rgyud 'bum): par byed/ / gnod sbyin mthu chen thob pa yang // srung ba rgyun du byed par 'gyur// grul bum srin po gdon rnams kyis// de yi bsam pa yongs su sgrub// nad dang shu ba 'bras dang
51a4(rgyud 'bum): rims/ / de yi lus la 'byung mi 'gyur// bskal par bsags pa'i sgrib pa yang // skad cig ma yis 'byung bar 'gyur// rgyun du zhugs dang lan cig 'ong // phyir mi ldog pa'i
51a5(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' yis/ / de yi gzi brjid 'phel bar byed// de bas sems dpa' chen po nyon// khyab pa'i 'khor lo bde ba'i mchog/ de nyid pha rol phyin drug ldan// yi ge med dang rig
51a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gsung / / dam pa'i don la 'jal bar nus// don gyis chos nyid 'jal bar ston// bla ma'i zhal nas dris na skye// rtogs na rnal 'byor skyes bu de// nam mkha'i rdul phran ston
51a7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ ma rabs sgyu ma'i tshig la 'dzin// lhan cig skyes pa mthong ngam ci// gal te mthong na brtag par 'gyur// brtags na yengs te 'khyam par 'gyur// gnyis kyis blo la/
51b1(rgyud 'bum): mya ngan snang // kha dog gcig tu bsgyur ba yi// bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo mchog/ rnal ma la gnas 'ching 'grol 'gyur// gang zhig bla ma'i drin shes dag/ skye ba med pa nyid du ston//
51b2(rgyud 'bum): bla ma'i bka' drin mi shes pa// de yis lhan skyes ci la mthong // lhan cig skyes pa de yis bcings// de la 'gro ba skye zhing 'ching // tha dad gzengs pas nang du gyur// dus dang gnas su/
51b3(rgyud 'bum): bgrangs pas ldog/ bdag dang gzhan du bltas pas ldog/ 'di dang phyi mar bsnyad pas gol// skye med lhan skyes bcos pas 'ching // de skad bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad// 'chang
51b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i skyes bus 'di skad bstod/ / e ma'o rnam dag ye shes sku// khyab bdag gsung gi lde mig sgo// ma rig sgrib pa dral ba'o// bde bar gshegs pa ye shes sku// e ma'o rnal
51b5(rgyud 'bum): 'byor thugs kyi bcud/ / 'gro ba sdug bsngal gzir las bsgral/ a skyes lhan cig 'gag med cing // byang chub sems la phyag 'tshal bstod// phan yon gyi le'u ste lnga pa'o//
51b6(rgyud 'bum): / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kyi snying po'i don gyi rgyud rdzogs so// / rje btsun gu ru'i zhal snga nas dang / lo tsa ba seng kar shAkya
51b7(rgyud 'bum): 'od kyis pam mthong du bskur cing gtan la phab pa'o/ / rgya gar skadang du/ shri tsigs par tan+da ma a d+h+yaHthA swa na sa la kAr nas
52a1(rgyud 'bum): bod skad du/ dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dur khrod kyi rgyar rmang du byung ba zhes bya ba/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos
52a2(rgyud 'bum): pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsur mo'i b+ha ga rnams la bzhugs so// de nas rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i
52a3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo dang dpa' mo rnams kyis phyi'i mchod pa dang / nang dang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang / de kho na nyid kyi mchod pas mchod nas/ 'di skad ces gsol to// kye ho bcom ldan rdo rje 'dzin
52a4(rgyud 'bum): dpal zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags/ / 'khor lo zhes pa gang la bgyi// sdom pa nyid kyang ji lta bu// rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar lags// de bzhin rgyud kyi rgyal po ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis
52a5(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ / dpal ni gnyis med ye shes te// 'khor lo rnam pa bzhi ru brjod// phyi nang gsang ba de nyid do// dang po phyi yi 'khor lo ni// sku mdog phyag mtshan lha yi sku//
52a6(rgyud 'bum): drug cu rtsa gnyis rim pa ste// ye shes dam tshig sku gsung thugs// dkyil 'khor phyogs mtshams rim pa bzhin// lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa ni// tha mal gcod pas phyiru
52a7(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / gnyis pa nang gi 'khor lo na// gnas sogs bcu yi rim pa rnams// mtho ris sa steng sa 'og dang // 'khor lo sgal dgod pa ni// phyi rol spros pa gcod pa'o// gsum
52b1(rgyud 'bum): pa gsang ba'i 'khor lo ni/ / sprul pa chos dang longs spyod dang // de bzhin bde ba chen po ste// rtsa chen sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi// gnas su gyur pas sdug bsngal gcod// dga' ba dang ni
52b2(rgyud 'bum): mchog dga' dang / / rnam par dga' ba'i gnyen po ni// bde ba stong pa mi rtog gsum// dbyer med rtogs pas lhan skyes la// de kho na yi 'khor lor brjod// sdom pa phyi nang gsang
52b3(rgyud 'bum): ba nyid/ / 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal la sogs nyon mongs pa// gnyen pos ye shes dang du sdom// bdag dang dngos por lta ba dang // tha mal pa yi rnam rtog
52b4(rgyud 'bum): kyang / / dag pa lha yi 'khor lor sdom// gdod nas lus la grub pa yi// rtsa dang rlung dang byang sems kyang // a ba d+hU ti'i nang du sdom// bde ba stong pa mi rtog dang // dngos dang dngos
52b5(rgyud 'bum): med ye shes kyang / / dbyer med gnyug ma'i ngang du sdom// rgyud ces bya ba rgyun yin te// gnas skabs gsum gyi dri ma dang // 'jug dang zhugs dang nges pa yis// rgyu dang thabs dang
52b6(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu ste/ / dang po 'khor ba'i rang bzhin la// gnyis pa thun mong mya ngan 'das// rgyal po zhes pa rnam pa bzhi// 'og ma'i yon tan ldan pa dang // nges pa'i don la dbang byed dang // /
52b7(rgyud 'bum): gnyen po ye shes che ba dang // gzhan la khyab pas rgyal po yin// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// dur khrod brgyad ni ji ltar lags// de yi dgongs pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan
53a1(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ / phyi nang gsang ba de nyid kyis// dur khrod rnam pa bzhi ru 'gyur// dang po phyi yi dur khrod ni// rdo rje ra ba'i nang rol lam// yang
53a2(rgyud 'bum): na phyi rol grwa rnams su/ / lugs 'byung lugs las bzlog pa ni// gtum drag dang ni tshang tshing dang // 'bar bas 'khrugs pa'i keng rus dang // 'jigs sde rnams ni shar sogs
53a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi/ phyogs su g.yon nas bskor te gnas// ha ha ra dgod pa dbang ldan te// dpal gyi nags tshal byin zar ro// 'jigs pa'i mun pa bden bral du// rlung mtshams ki li ki
53a4(rgyud 'bum): lir sgrogs/ / shar du ha ri pa s+ye la// gtum drag dkar po glang po'i gdong // byang du byang chub shing bu la// g+ha ra ser po mi yi gdong // nub tu mya ngan med shing la// 'bar
53a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khrugs dmar po chu srin gdong / / lho ru tsu ta'i shing bu la// 'jigs sde nag po ma he'i gdong // me ru ka ran tsa na ste// dpal gyi nags tshal ra gdong dmar// bden bral a rdzu'i/
53a6(rgyud 'bum): shing bu la// 'jigs pa'i mun pa ma he'i gdong // rlung du srid grub shing bu la// ki lir sgra sgrogs ri dgas gdong // dbang ldan n+ya gro d+ha shing la// ha ha ra dgod pa ba glang gdong
53a7(rgyud 'bum): g.yas na gri gug thod pa g.yon/ / shing lo'i steng na stod phyung ngo // shar du brgya byin dkar po la// rdo rje sdigs mdzub glang po zhon// byang du lus ngan ser po la// dbyug pa 'dzin/
53b1(rgyud 'bum): cing gter la zhon// nub tu chu bdag dmar po ni// chu srin zhon nas zhags pa thogs// lho rug shin rje nag po la// ma he zhon nas be con thogs// shar lho me lha dmar ser la/
53b2(rgyud 'bum): ral zhon nas me thab 'dzin// lho nub srin po smug nag la// ral gri thogs nas mi la zhon// nub byang rlung lha mdog sngon po// ri dgas zhon nas 'phan ni 'phyar// byang shar dbang
53b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan dkar po ni/ / khyu mchog zhon nas rtse gsum thogs// thams cad rang rang rig mas 'khyud// nor rgyas dang ni 'jog po dang // stobs kyi rgyu dang pad+ma dang // shar nas brtsams
53b4(rgyud 'bum): g.yon du dgod/ / pad+ma che dang mtha' yas dang // rigs ldan dang ni dung skyong ni// g.yas kyi phyogs nas dgod pa'o// sgra sgrogs pa dang rmugs pa dang // mun pa can dang kun tu 'khyil//
53b5(rgyud 'bum): shar nas byang gi phyogs su dgod// 'khrigs pa gang ba 'bab pa dang // drag po sprin tshogs mtshams la dgod// rdo rje rin chen pad+ma dang // las dang dam tshig rnal 'byor ma// snga
53b6(rgyud 'bum): tshogs 'jig rten mkha' 'gro rnams/ / shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis ni// ro la spyod cing mkha' la rgyu// gzhan yang rnal 'byor mchod rten dang // chu dang me sogs rim pa ste/
53b7(rgyud 'bum): gza' dang par ta grub pa rnams// rol pa chen po'i tshul du gnas// 'byung po'i gdon dang ro langs dang // stag dang khyi dang ce spyang dang // wa dang 'ug pa bya rgod dang // phyed tshig pa
54a1(rgyud 'bum): dang rnam par sbyangs/ / mgo bo lus po keng rus rnams// a lam gyi sna sgrogs pa// de nas nang gi dur khrod ni// lus kyi sgram na sprul sogs// skye zhing 'jig
54a2(rgyud 'bum): par byed pas ni/ / dur khrod chen po lus la dgod// de nas gsang ba'i dur khrod ni// ca chen sram cu rtsa gnyis nas// 'byung 'jug gnas pa'i rlung rnams ni// dbugs rgyu zhes pa du
54a3(rgyud 'bum): khrod do/ / rnam par shes pa'i tshogs brgyad dang // dngos po'i rtog pa sna tshogs pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi dur khrod 'chi// gsang ba rig pa'i ye shes khrod// de nas dur khrong dgos pa'i
54a4(rgyud 'bum): rnam shes dag pas dur khrod la/ / phyogs skyong mi dge bcu po spong // sangs rgyas brgyad kyi mtshan ma shing // thugs rje'i rtags su shing brgyad la// zhing skyong sngags kyi theg pa srung //
54a5(rgyud 'bum): gdug pa 'joms phyir klu brgyad dgod// mchod rten rang sangs rgyas kyi gnas// rnal 'byor brtul zhugs spyod pa byed// chu ni brjod bya zab pa la// me sogs rtog pa bral ba'o//
54a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// bcom ldan 'das ni ji ltar lags// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sku dang gsung thugs ji ltar lags// btsun mo'i b+ha ga ji lta bu/
54a7(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs pa'i don ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyon mongs bdud dang 'chi bdag bdud// lha yi bu dang phung po'i bdud// bdud bzhi bcom pas bcom
54b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das/ / rgal ba yon tan drug nyid de// dbang phyug dang ni gzugs bzang dang // dpal dang grags dang skal ba bdang // ye shes phun sum tshogs pa ni// drug po de la ldan/
54b2(rgyud 'bum): zhes gsungs// 'khor ba'i chos ni mya ngan te// de dang bral phyir 'das pa'o// 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa kun// 'gro ba'i don mdzad de bzhin gshegs// thams cad dus
54b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum sangs rgyas kyi/ / sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bor gnas// btsun mo zhes pa chos kyi dbyings// de la yod phyir b+ha ga ste// mi phyed pas na bzhugs zhes bya// rdo rje snying pos yang gsol
54b4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ dpa' bo zhes pa gang la bgyi// de bzhin dpa' mo nyid kyang ci// de yi mchod pa ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dpa' bo la yang rnam bzhi ste// bum
54b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi/ / lha yi rnal 'byor bsgoms pa yis// tha mal pa yi rnam rtog spong // des ni phyi yi dpa' bor bshad// gsang ba'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi// rtsa rlung thig le
54b6(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms pa yis/ / mtshan ma'i rnam rtog 'joms pa ni// nang gi dpa' bor bshad pa yin// gsum pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi// dga' ba bzhi yi don bsgoms pas// gzung dang
54b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa'i rtog pa 'joms/ / de ni gsang ba'i dpa' bo yin// bani pa'i dbang dang 'brel ba yi// gnyis su med pa gang bsgoms pas// tha dad rtog pa 'joms pa'i phyir// de kho na mi
55a1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bor bshad/ / dpa' mo la yang rnam pa bani// ma ni shes rab pha rol phyin// gdod nas spros bral lhun grub la// lta ba'i zhen pa spong ba ni// de ni phyim
55a2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' mor bshad/ / nang du rtsa dang thig le sogs// rang bzhin med par byed pas ma// gsang bar dga' ba bzhi rnams la// rang bzhin lhan cig skyes pas ma// rang rig sems kyi ngo bo ni//
55a3(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' lta bur gang bsgoms pa// de kho na yi dpa' mo'o// mchod pa yang ni rnam pa bani// phyi nang gsang ba de kho na// dang po phyi yi mchod pa ni// me tog bdug spos mar me dang //
55a4(rgyud 'bum): dri dang lha bshos btung ba dang // rol mo sil snyan dbyangs nyid dang // gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ni// ro dang reg bya 'jam pa dang // 'khor lo rin chen glang po rta// btsun mo dmag
55a5(rgyud 'bum): dpon blon po rnams/ / phyi yi mchod pa thun mong ngo // rang gi lus las byung ba yi// bdud rtsi lnga dang btung ba dang // sha lnga lhag pa'i rdzas rnams ni// phung po khams dang skye mched
55a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi'akhor lo rnams la mchod pa nang / / de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa ni// rang snang thabs kyi rog ma yis// sra gzung thug ku tsa btsir// rtsa dang rlung dang thog le sogs// dka'
55a7(rgyud 'bum): bamachog dga' dga' bral dang / / lhan cig skyes pa'i bde bas mchod// rang rig stong ba rtogs pa yi// 'od gas la de nyid chos sbal// zhen pa rnams dang bral ba na// blan med sa
55b1(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa'o/ / rdo rje snying pos yang gsol pa// gtor ma zhes pa gang la bgyi// de yi phan yon ji ltar 'byung // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gtor ma rnam pa bzhi ru
55b2(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / phyi nang gsang ba de kho na// dang po phyi yi gtor ma ni// thun mtshams lha yi mdun nyid du// re las me dang yaM las rlung // skyed gsum a las dum gcig pa'i// nang du
55b3(rgyud 'bum): bdud rtsi sha lnga la/ / sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba yis// lha rnams mnyes par byed pa dang // mkha' 'gro dgyes par byed pa'o// gnyis pa nang gi gtor ma ni// phung po khams dang skye
55b4(rgyud 'bum): mched rnams/ / lus ni lha yi 'khor lo lo// rtsa ni ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// srin bu las kyi mkha' 'gro mchod// gsum pa gsang ba'i gtor ma ni// 'khor lo bzhi yi ka pA lar//
55b5(rgyud 'bum): rlung dang thig le bdud rtsi la// dga' ba gsum gyis byin brlabs te// lhan cig skyes pa mchod par bya// de nyid bzhi pa'i gtor ma ni// phyi nang dngos po'i gtor ma kun// chos kyi dbyings
55b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi bad snod du/ / don dam sems kyi sngags kyis su// bde ba chen po'i lha la mchod// phan yon dngos grub ster ba dang // phyi nang bar chad sel ba dang // zas kyi rtog pa choms pa dang //
55b7(rgyud 'bum): khams dang skye mched rtas pa dang // rgas sra lus kyi mdangs ldan zhing // skra dkar gnyer ma spong ba dang // dngos po'i gdon las grol ba dang // 'khor ba'i pha rol son pa'o// lha mos
56a1(rgyud 'bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das/ / sems kyi rang bzhin dri lta bu// de nas 'khrul nas ji ltar 'khor// ma 'khrul don la ji ltar lags// de las yon tan du m+b+ha
56a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sems las ma gtogs sangs rgyas dang // sems las ma gtogs chos gzhan dag/ sangs rgyas kyis kyang ma gzigs shing /
56a3(rgyud 'bum): ma gsungs gsung bar mi 'gyur te// des na sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// sems kyi gsang 'di gsang ba'i mchog/ khams gsum brtan dang g.yor bcas pa// snang ba myong zhing
56a4(rgyud 'bum): grub pa med/ / de phyir 'khor ba'i ming yang med// thog mar ma skyes rang bzhin dag/ blo bur sangs rgyas ming yang med// sangs rgyas sems can
56a5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis ma yin/ / kun rdzob don dam gnyis ma yin// rang bzhin rig pa 'od gsal sogs// smrar med brjod du med pa ste// dper na lkugs pas ro myong 'dra// ras dang shel 'dra'i
56a6(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin la/ / log rtog rtsi sogs rnam par 'khrul// khams gsum brtan dang g.yor snang zhing // 'dod pa'i byang chub sna tshogs dang // de dag spyod pa sna tshogs dag/ de nyid g.yeng
56a7(rgyud 'bum): dang rnam rtog ste/ / rang gis 'khrul nas rang gis 'ching // rang gis gsod cing rang gis za// rang gis ltung zhing rang sdug bsngal// rang rig ye nas spros bral la// sgra dang tha snyad
56b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jug na 'khrul/ / rang rig rang gis 'od gsal la// ma rig mun pas bsgribs na 'khrul// dngos po stong par ro mnyam la// brang dang dor bar byed na 'khrul// 'dod yon rang gi
56b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gags pa la/ / de dag dka' bas spong na 'khrul// rang rig ye nas stong pa la// 'dod yon lnga la brten na 'khrul// dman dang gya nom med pa la// sgro dang skur pa 'debs na 'khrul/
56b3(rgyud 'bum): gdod nas spros bral lhun grub la// sgom dang mi sgom byed na 'khrul// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis med la// de dag gnyis su 'dzin ra 'khrul// don dam kun rdzob gnyis med la//
56b4(rgyud 'bum): bden pa gnyis su 'byed na 'khrul// sangs rgyas 'khor ba'i chu bo rgal// skye 'gag gang ltar 'dod kyang 'khrul// stong nyid ro la mi gnas par// dngos po mtshan mar gzung na 'khrul//
56b5(rgyud 'bum): sems kyi glang chen mi 'dul bar// g.yeng ba'i sems su 'dug na 'khrul// rnam rtog rlung gis bskyod pa la// rang rig ye shes 'dod na 'khrul// rang sems rang gis ma mthong bar/
56b6(rgyud 'bum): che ba'i nga rgyal smra na 'khrul// rang rig nyams su ma myong bar// dkar po'i chos rnams spring na 'khrul// sangs rgyas ma 'khrul sems can 'khrul// rang bzhin ma 'khrul rang rig 'khru
56b7(rgyud 'bum): sems nyid ma la khrul bag chags 'khrul/ / sangs rgyas las 'khrul sems can de// rang rig las 'khrul gzhan rig snang // sems nyid las 'khrul bag chags 'byung // des na ra
57a1(rgyud 'bum): sems 'khrul pa dag/ don du snang ba rab tu skye// skye ba med bzhin skye bas 'khrul// lcags bsregs sa ba ni rang gi sems// me sogs byed pa gzhan na med// bkres
57a2(rgyud 'bum): sgom sdug bsngal rang gi sems/ / zas sgom bkres pa gzhan na med// rdeg btsog lcag gzhus rang gi sems// srog gcod gshan pa gzhan na med// 'gro ba thams cad rang sems kun/
57a3(rgyud 'bum): rang gi sems su ma shes na// de yis sangs rgyas spangs pa yin// bla ma dam pa rtag tu bsten// theg chen zab mo'i mdo rgyud blta// bsgom du med pa'i don bsgoms nas// ma bsgoms na yang
57a4(rgyud 'bum): bsgom pa'i mchog/ de ltar gyur pa'i mkhas pa la// stong par mi 'gyur gang yang med// de las mya ngan 'das pa 'byung // sku dang stobs la sogs pa kun// nor bu'i tshul du rang bzhin 'byung //
57a5(rgyud 'bum): de dag sems kyi rang bzhin no// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// rten gyi gang zag rnam pa du// rgyud kyi rnam grangs du zhig mchis// gdul bya gang la rgyud rnams bshad// bcom ldan
57a6(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ / sems can sangs rgyas rang bzhin pas// gdol pa ko lpags mkhan la sogs// gzugs ngan gsod pa'i gdon gnyer ba// theg pa 'di las 'grub par
57a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / dkyil 'khor rdzogs par bsgoms pa dang // gtso bo yab yum bsgom pa dang // dbu ma'i spyan la sems 'dzin pa// bskyed rim spros dang bcas pa'i lam// rigs la gnas
57b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rnal 'byor gyis/ / lha sogs bu mo mtshan ldan la// chags pas chags pa spong ba ni// las kyi phyag rgya chags pa'i lam// gnas pa rtsa dang g.yo ba rlung // bkod pa byang sems
57b2(rgyud 'bum): dman pa dbyibs/ / zab pa sngags dang thig le dang // mthar thug yan lag bdun bsgoms pa// chos kyi phyag rgya grol ba'i lam// rten yod ma yin brten pa med// dmigs pa thams
57b3(rgyud 'bum): cad rnam bsal te/ / lhan cig skyes pa'i don sgom pa// phyag rgya chen por rang byin rlab// de rnams gnyis su bsdu ba ste// gang zag mchog dang las dang po// las dang po la phyi nang gnyis
57b4(rgyud 'bum): mchog la yang ni phyi nang gnyis/ / dbang bzhi bgrod pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// bsnyen gnas dge bsnyen dge tshul dang // dge slong chen po gsungs pa ste// 'di yis rgyud rnams 'grub par 'gyur// /
57b5(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba'i rgyud ni rnam pa gsum// bshad rgyud sum cu rtsa gnyis te// yan lag rgyud ni grangs las 'das// rtsa ba chen po phyi ma dang // phyi ma'i phyi mar bsdus pa yin// bram ze rgyal rigs rje
57b6(rgyud 'bum): rigs dang / / dmangs rigs gdol pa gdul don du// rgyud kyang rnam pa bzhir gsungs te// bya spyod rnal 'byor bla med do// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// gnas gang du ni
57b7(rgyud 'bum): gtso bo bsgom/ / thabs ni rnam pa ngu zhig mchis// de bzhin thabs las byung ba ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ri rtse dur khrod ro sdang du// gcer bu skra ba shig lhor
58a1(rgyud 'bum): bltas te/ / A li kA lis lus bsrungs la// dpa' bo'i 'khor lo bsgom par bya// smin par byed pa dbang bzhi la// grol ba bskyed rdzogs gnyis kyi lam/
58a2(rgyud 'bum): lam gnyis la ni brten nas su// sngags pas byang chub bsgrub par bya// bum pas lus kyi dri ma 'khrud// gsang bas ngag gi dri ma 'khrud// gsum pas sems kyi dri ma ste// de ni kun tu
58a3(rgyud 'bum): brtags pa la/ / lhan cig skyes pa'i ma rig pa// bkru ba'i phyir na bzhi pa bshad// gnas dang ldang ba nyid dang ni// 'jug dang yongs su rdzogs pa dang // byin gyis brlab dang dbang bskur
58a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / / ting 'dzin mchod pa bskyed rim la// nye bar bsdu ba rdzogs pa'i rim// rim gnyis mnyam par gnas nas su// rdo rje can gyis chos 'chad do// stong pa mngon gyur chos sku la//
58a5(rgyud 'bum): mtshan dpe bde ba longs spyod sku// rol pa'i mdzad pa sprul sku la// sku gsum dbyer med bde chen dang // lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// gang gis bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur//
58a6(rgyud 'bum): gang la bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'khor bas sgo nas sdom gsum ldan// thos tshe dang ldan mtshan nyid bzang // dben par dkyil 'khor bris smra
58a7(rgyud 'bum): bcad/ / chos gos gyon la bdud rtsi spyad// thun bzhir bsgrubs na 'grub par 'gyur// zhen pa che ba'i rnal 'byor la// 'bras bu'i bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur// g.yeng ba che ba'i rnal
58b1(rgyud 'bum): 'byor la/ / sgom pa'i bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur// dam tshig nyams pa'i rnal 'byor la// spyod pa'i bar chad 'byung bar 'gyur// le lo che ba'i rnal 'byor la// lta ba'i bar chad 'byung bar
58b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// rgyud kyi ngo bo ji lta bu// rtsa ba'i rgyud ces gang la bgyi// bshad pa'i rgyud ces gang la bgyi// 'byung ba'i dus ni ji lta bu// bcom ldan
58b3(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ / lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin la// rgyud rnams kun gyi ngo bo 'dus// yod pa rgyu la sgrub pa lam// mngon 'gyur 'bras bu'i ngo bo yin// thog mar gsungs
58b4(rgyud 'bum): pa rtsa ba'i rgyud/ / phyi nas gsungs pa bshad pa'i rgyud// don rnams ston pas rtsa ba la// gsal bar byed pa bshad pa'i rgyud// bskal pa rdzogs ldan gsum gnyis dang // rtsod ldan
58b5(rgyud 'bum): dus bzhi'i rim pa yis/ / rgyud kyang rnam pa bzhir gsungs te// bya spyod rnal 'byor bla med do// lha mos gsol pa bcom ldan 'das// zab mo'i rgyud 'di gang la sba// ji lta bu la
58b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin par bya/ / ster na lung nod ji ltar bya// bka' 'di rgya yis ji ltar gdab// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// snying rje med cing khro la gdug/ khengs shing chags pa
58b7(rgyud 'bum): tshul khrims med/ / dad med rigs ngan bla mas skyo// thos chung snying ring rnams la sba// dpa' zhing dul la blo gros ldan// bzod ldan drang la g.yo sgra med// dad ldan rigs
59a1(rgyud 'bum): bzang gtong phong che/ / thos mang dam tshig ldan la sbyin// dbang bzhi bgrod pa'i sngags pa yis// sngon du bla ma mnyes byas la// yar ngo mar ngo'i tshes
59a2(rgyud 'bum): bcu la/ / dpa' bo rnal 'byor tshogs kyis mchod// ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// lha mo rnams la rgyud gtad ltar// de bzhin gsang ba'i rgyud sde rnams// zung la sgrub pa che/
59a3(rgyud 'bum): du gyis// lan gsum brjod la rgyud rnams sbyin// phyi rabs dus kyi snyigs ma la// chags sems gyong ba'i slob ma ni// gus pas mi zhu g.yo sgyus 'dod// thos nas khus
59a4(rgyud 'bum): su ba rang che 'byin/ / de la bstan na dam tshig nyams// nges par dang nas zhu ba yi// gcig nas gnyis la ma spel na// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rigs rgyun 'chad// bcom ldan 'das kyis
59a5(rgyud 'bum): de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / ye shes mkha' 'gro ma la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis rgyud kyi don rtogs nas rjes su yi rang ngo // dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po dur khrod kyi
59a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyan rmad du byung ba rdzogs so/ / paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o// rgyags
59a7(rgyud 'bum): skad du/ shrI a nA bi la tan+da rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ rgyud kyi rgyal po dpal rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// sems can rnams la phan 'dod pas/
59b1(rgyud 'bum): rnyog med rab tu bshad par bya// snang ba med cing dpe med pa// tshig gi yul las rnam par 'das// zhi zhing bdag med dag pa nyid// mtshan med mtshan gzhi rnam par spangs// ngang gis
59b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas 'di nyid tshul/ / khyad par du yang mdor bsdus pas// bdag gis gsal bar bshad pa yin// rmongs pa rnams la phan 'dod pas// snying rjes 'di ni bstan pa yin// kha cig/
59b3(rgyud 'bum): stong par 'dod pa dang // kha cig thig le'i gzugs can dang // kha cig khyab 'jug tshul gyis ni// blo dman dag ni 'jog par byed// de nyid nges par yang dag par// rgyu yi gnas kyi spyod
59b4(rgyud 'bum): yul nyid/ / rgyu dang 'bras bu ma grub na// bsgoms pa med cing byang chub med// rgyu yi yid ches spangs pa 'di// thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag/ sgyu ma'i ye shes las byung ba// rnam pa sna tshogs
59b5(rgyud 'bum): ston par byed/ / kha cig drag po'i rang bzhin du// kha cig zhi ba chen po che// kha cig phyag rgya'i rang bzhin gzugs// kha cig 'dar zhing g.yo ba dang // glu gar de bzhin sil snyan dang // lha yi/
59b6(rgyud 'bum): sngags ni brjod pa nyid// kha cig sngags ni yang dag dgod// kha cig dkyil 'khor bri ba dang // dbang la sogs pa brtag pa dang // 'byung dang 'byung las gyur pa'i lus// de ltar la
59b7(rgyud 'bum): sogs mtha' yas mchog/ sangs rgyas la sogs rdo rje brtags// gang tshe sems ni legs gnas pa// de bzhin nyid kyi spyod yul nyid// dkyil 'khor de nyid 'gyur ba ni// phan 'dod
60a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis shes par bya/ / phung po la sogs tshogs rnams kyis// gang zhig khyad par gyis bcos pa// lus ngag yid gsum bcos pa'i phyir// rdul tshon dkyil 'khor
60a2(rgyud 'bum): zhes byar gsungs/ / phung sogs gzhan sogs mthong ba'i phyir// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor zhes byar gsungs// sems kyi dkyil 'khor dag pa ste// rang bzhin med par bsgom par bya//
60a3(rgyud 'bum): me long lta bu'i gcig nyid de// dang po grur ni rtogs par bya// so sor rtog pa zhes gsungs pas// shar gyi grur ni rnam par brgyan// bya ba nan tan khyad 'phags pa// byang gi grur ni rnam
60a4(rgyud 'bum): par spros/ / mnyam nyid ye shes chen po ni// bag chags med gru rjes rtogs byed// gzhan du'ang dkyil 'khor gru bzhi pa// grwa yi dbus ni thams cad du// de nyid 'di ni rab 'jug pas// /
60a5(rgyud 'bum): ye shes spyod yul du ni brtag/ sgo bzhir yang dag brjod pa ni// de bzhin dran pa bzhir byung ba// de bzhin grwa bzhir gsungs pa ni// sbyin pa bzhi ni rnam dag pa// dbus su dkyil 'khor gzugs
60a6(rgyud 'bum): su ni/ / mi bskyod pa yis rnam par brgyan// zhi dang chos don brgyan pa las// de dag thams cad dkyil 'khor 'grub// dra ba dra phyed zla ba sogs// dkyil 'khor du ni bris pa dang // rta/
60a7(rgyud 'bum): babs la sogs thams cad ni// ting 'dzin yan lag rta babs nyid// sems kyi mthar thug brjod pa ste// de nyid rang bzhin las ni gsungs// gang zhig sems kyi rab 'phel ba//
60b1(rgyud 'bum): ting 'dzin yan lag rnam par gnas// de nyid dra ba zhes su gsungs// dra ba phyed pa phyed du ste// dril bu do shal brtag pa ni// rang gi btsun mo rtogs par byed// sgra brnyan rnam pa lta bur
60b2(rgyud 'bum): na/ chos rnams thams cad so sor rtogs// chos rnams ma skyes mthong ba'i phyir// de nyid rgyal mtshan 'phreng bar gsungs// bla re la sogs gang bres pa// dngos po la sogs dang po
60b3(rgyud 'bum): nges/ / sems ni bla re zhes byar bshad// dam pa'i don las gsungs pa'o// gos 'phreng de dag thams cad ni// rnam pa sna tshogs snang ba nyid// gang zhig rdo rje rnam pa'i sems//
60b4(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba'i ye shes kyis ni mtshan// de yi 'og tu rtag tu gsungs// grwa yi mtshams ni thams cad du// rdo rje rin chen rtogs pa'i phyir// rdo rje rin po che yis spras// zla ba nyi ma gang
