60b5(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa/ / thabs dang shes rab don mthong phyir// thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid sems// ye shes 'dis ni rnam par brgyan// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje skyes// de nyid dkyil
60b6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor du ni gsungs/ / sku gsung thugs ni nye ba'i phyir// rnam pa gcig tu mtshan nyid med// bla ma slob ma rnam gsal bar// rab tu 'jug pa de nyid gsungs// sbyin sreg kyang ni bshad
60b7(rgyud 'bum): pa yang / / lha rnams tshim pa nga yis brjod// rnam rtog med pa'i sems gang ni// thab khung sgra yis mtshan ma nyid// bye brag phyed pas me nang du// gzugs kyi phung sogs lnga po rnams/
61a1(rgyud 'bum): sems las byung ba'i yam shing nyid// thams cad kyi ni sreg blugs bya// gzugs la sogs pa gang byung ba// yam shing zhes ni rab tu grags// de ltar sbyin
61a2(rgyud 'bum): sreg bshad nas ni/ / rab tu gnas pa brjod par bya// sku gsung thugs la rtag tu ni// gang zhig sems ni brtan gyur pa// de nyid rab tu gnas par brjod// phung po rnams kyi dngos po co//
61a3(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig sngags kyi mtshan nyid ni// de ni gsal bar brjod par bya// yid rnams kyis ni skad du yang // gang zhig gsang ba bdag gis brjod// skye ba med cing snang med pa// mtshan ga ni
61a4(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid rnam par spangs/ / gsang ba'i don ni rtogs pa'i phyir// 'di ni nga yis sngags su gsungs// sngags ni gsal bar bshad nas ni// lha rnams kyang ni brjod par bya// phung po
61a5(rgyud 'bum): khams dang skye mched kyi/ / rang bzhin gyi ni legs gnas gang // yang dag byang chub thar pa nyid// de kun yang dag rab brtags shing // gal te sems kyis nyer brtags gang // lha
61a6(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya bar yang dag bshad/ / sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya las// de nyid du ni yang dag gsungs// lha la gsol btab rnal 'byor ni// gsal bar nga yis brjod par bya// de nas
61a7(rgyud 'bum): skyil krung bcas nas ni/ / sna yi rtse mor bltas nas kyang // rang gi rang bzhin rnal 'byor gyis// de nyid mthong bar gzhag par bya// snying ka'i gnas su lag pa gnyis// 'bad pas
61b1(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par sbyar nas su/ / mi rtog pa yi rang bzhin du// gang tshe sems ni rab rgyu ba// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag/ de tshe de la skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus
61b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bdag/ myur bar byin gyis rlob par 'gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa'i bdag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi rtog pa'i bdag/ thugs kyi rdo rje gsum pa bzhin// rnal 'byor sangs
61b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas thams cad 'gyur/ / nga yis gsal bar brjod pa ni// sku gsung thugs kyi grub sbyin pa// sangs rgyas kun mchog gsang ba'i don// thabs dang shes rab spyod yul don// sems can
61b4(rgyud 'bum): don du snying rje che/ / sangs rgyas byang chub rab sgrub pa// sna rtse dkyil 'khor nga yis gsungs// de dag thams cad dbyibs tsam du// mdor bsdus thams cad ma byas so// res 'ga'
61b5(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig 'khor lo yang / / de nyid zhes bya ma gsungs so// rtogs pa cung zad tsam gyis ni// gang 'grub de ni res 'ga' yang // gsung gi 'khor lor gsungs pa bzhin// rnam rtog
61b6(rgyud 'bum): med par lhag mos pas/ / sgrub po dam pas bsgrub par bya// khrag dang khu ba de bzhin sha// bshang ba dang ni gci ba nyid// dam tshig ces bya rab 'bad par// gang zhig bdag gis tshig
61b7(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa/ / de rnams kun la de bzhin gshegs// de rnams tha snyad tsam gyis gnas// gang tshe dam tshig 'dod chags sems// des ni de nyid rab tu spyod// gang tshe sems ni chags
62a1(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa/ / de ni sems can yod ma yin// de la kun tu rtog pa yi// khrag ni za bar 'gyur ba'o// khrag ni chen po zos nas ni// 'od dpag med pa'ang bza' bar bya//
62a2(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig chos rnams las skyes pa// khu ba'i sgrar ni bsgrags par bya// de tshe ma skyes rtogs pa'i phyir// bza' bar yang dag gsungs pa nyid// dngos po kun gyi mnyam pa nyid// sha chen du ni rab
62a3(rgyud 'bum): tu dbye/ / mi dmigs pa yi rnal 'byor gyis// bza' ba zhes byar mngon par brjod// gang zhig rab tu 'dzag pa'i sems// nus pa'i rjes su sbyor ba las// phyag rgya las kyi sbyor ba yis// de
62a4(rgyud 'bum): yang gci ba'i sgra yis brjod/ / chos dang chos min nges pa'i sems// sbas pa'i chur ni gnas pa 'di// chos rnams thams cad rab rtogs pa'i// bshang bza bar yang dag brjod// dam tshig nyid
62a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi mtshan nyid ni/ / 'di rnams thams cad gsal bar bshad// 'di rnams don ni rtogs pa yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'gyur// dpal bde ba dam pa rtogs par byed pa dang ldan pa zhes
62a6(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i rgyud byin gyis brlab pa'i rim pa chen po mkha' 'gro ma dra ba sdom pa'i brtag pa rnyog pa med pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ / rgya gar gyi mkhan po paN+Di ta ga ya d+ha ra dang / bod kyi lo
62a7(rgyud 'bum): tsab dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o/ / rgya gar skad du/ shrI saM par kha sa ma tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal bde mchog rnam
62b1(rgyud 'bum): mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ 'jam dpal ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tham
62b2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das
62b3(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba bas kyang ches gsang ba/ gsang ba chen po de bshad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje snying po khyod nyon cig/ srog dang lnga pa de bzhin te// lam dang 'bras bu nyid
62b4(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das srog gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// srog ni 'dzin par byed pa ste// sngags dang rlung dang rten nyid do// rdo rje snying
62b5(rgyud 'bum): pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lnga gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// lnga pa yang ni gcig nyid do// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa
62b6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das lam gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// snying rje chen po las skyes pa// dga' ba'i shugs las rnam par grub// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med mchog
62b7(rgyud 'bum): bde ba chen po lam yin no/ / rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das snying rje chen po ni gang / dga' ba ni gang / thabs ni gang / shes rab ni gang / gnyis su med pa ni gang lags/
63a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dmigs pa med pa snying rje'i mchog/ dga' ba gnyis med bde ba che// thabs ni he ru ka dpal nyid// shes rab rdo rje rnal
63a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma/ / gnyis su med pa zung 'jug mchog/ rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das he ru ka ni gang lags/ rnal 'byor ma ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
63a3(rgyud 'bum): he ru ka ni phung po nyid// phung po yang ni he ru ka/ khams ni rdo rje ma dpal te// rdo rje ma dpal khams nyid // skye mched de yang de bzhin du// lha yi ngo bor shes par bya// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa//
63a4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das phung po'i he ru ka gang lags/ khams kyi rdo rje rnal 'byor ma gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// he ru ka dpal bdag nyid dngos// dri ma med pa'i kha dog
63a5(rgyud 'bum): can/ rdo rje dril bu 'dzin pa ste// drug gis brgyan cing dgu dang ldan// zla tshes sna tshogs rdo rje dang // rigs kyi bdag pos rnam par brgyan// spyan gsum dag gis mdzes pa ste// chags pa
63a6(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i sham thabs can/ / shes rab rang bzhin rnal 'byor ma// ban+du rA ka'i kha dog can// gcer bu phyag rgya lngas brgyan cing // dag pa lnga bcu'i 'phreng bas mdzes// rdo rje pad+ma'i snod
63a7(rgyud 'bum): bsnams pa/ / yab la 'khyud cing brkyang bskum bzhugs// gnyis med bde ba la dgyes pa// chu skyes nyi ma'i dbus na 'gying // khams nyid kyang ni lha nyid do// dpal bde mchog nam mkha'
63b1(rgyud 'bum): dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ bskyed pa'i rim pa'i dum bu ste le'u dang po'o// / rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa gang lags
63b2(rgyud 'bum): ngo bo nyid kyis 'od gsal ba ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// brtan dang g.yo ba thams cad kun// shes rab rang bzhin ma nyid de// lnga pa'i ngo bo 'od gsal nyid
63b3(rgyud 'bum): ma skyes rtog pa bral ba'i sku/ / brjod du med cing bsam mi khyab// brtag tu med pa nam mkha'i dbus// gnyis med bde ba'i rnam pa can// gsal ba'i rang bzhin g.yo ba med// gnyis su med
63b4(rgyud 'bum): pa bde ba'i mchog/ 'bras bu lam gyi rnam pa'o// dpal bde mchog nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i dum bu ste le'u gnyis pa'o// rdo
63b5(rgyud 'bum): snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par rtog pa rnam par dag pa ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sngags dang sbyin sreg gtor ma dang // dbang gi rnam par dag
63b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / maN+Dal dang ni de bzhin du// bum pa'i ngo bo ltar shes pa// sngags kyi de bzhin nyid gnas pa'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngags ni gang / sbyin sreg ni gang
63b7(rgyud 'bum): gtor ma ni gang / dbang ni gang / maN+Dal ni gang / bum pa ni gang / sngags kyi de bzhin nyid ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sngags ni gsang sngags rgyal po rje/
64a1(rgyud 'bum): oM shrI ShaH ru ru r+m+mA d+ha phaH/ kan+da dz+walas par swAH/ hAtu d+hu la/ oM sarbA prad+ha NA kan+d+ha sa 'dz+wa la dz+nyAn+d+ha ma s+'u b+hU pA swAH/ oM 'dra thar tsan+tu mar+thaH/
64a2(rgyud 'bum): paT swA hA/ gsang sngags rgyal po 'di dag gis// bskal pa stong pa stong la sogs pa so// sdig pa ma lus dag byed chu// grubani pa la sgo ba ni be// 'khor lo dag gis rnam par mdzes
64a3(rgyud 'bum): ashwat+tha dang n+ya gro dang / / dUr ba la sogs de bzhin du// bzhi pa'i ngo bor yang dag shes// sha lnga dang ni bdud rtsi lnga// gyen dupo gyi sgra bsgrags pas// dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma kun dgyes/
64a4(rgyud 'bum): dbang ni tha ma'i lam nyid // bdud rtsi chu yis legs byugs nas// me tog dmar pos mchod pa'o// rin chen snod bzang gyis mdzes// dpa' bo bdud rtsi dag byed chu// zhal bani sngag
64a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'od zer gyis/ / gdug pa ma lus kun 'dul zhing // spro dang bsdu ba'i rnam pa can// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das skye mched kyi mkha' 'gro ma gang lags
64a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gcer bu thal ba'i mdog can te// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i yul rnams 'grim// lnga pa dang ni drug pa'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sngang
64a7(rgyud 'bum): ni gang / gtor ma ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ oM dz+wa la mu khi DA ki NI kaM ka ri hUM phaT/ oM pa ra ni ya ni DA ki nI hUM phaT/ oM ma DA ki nI hUM phaT/ oM pa ra mu
64b1(rgyud 'bum): DA ki nI hUM phaT/ oM u lu ka ti DA ki ni hUM phaT/ oM a ra Na ma DA ki ni hUM phaT/ chu skyes dag gis rnam brgyan cing // bdud rtsi lnga yis rnam par mdzes// dpa' mo drug ni mnyes par 'gyur/
64b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das smin pa'i lam ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bzhi pa'i rang bzhin ngo bo ste// de yi rnam pa de la gnas// rdo rje snying
64b3(rgyud 'bum): pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam pa'i ngo bo ni gang / sprul pa'i ngo bo ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rnam pa'i ngo bo lha nyid de// sprul pa tshogs kyi bdag
64b4(rgyud 'bum): por bshad/ / rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das tshigs kyi bdag po ni gang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dbang gi kha dog dmar po ste// zhal gcig pa la phyag
64b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa/ / sprul pa 'khor lo'i rtsibs la gnas// brkyang bskum tshul gyis mnan pa'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bsnyen par bya ba gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
64b6(rgyud 'bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ / bsnyen par bya ba sngags nyid de// oM ga Na pa ta ye swA hA/ nag po 'bru yi ril bu la// bsnyen dang sgrub pa'i lhar gnas pa// sngags kyi ngo bo shes par bya// dpal
64b7(rgyud 'bum): bde mchog nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rgyud las/ las sna tshogs kyi dum bu ste le'u gsum pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub
65a1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' rdo rje snying po dang / byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje gnod gnas la sogs pa dang / rnal 'byor ma dpag tu med pa'i 'khor de dag rjes su yi rangs
65a2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/ / / kha che'i mkhan po dz+nyAn badz+ras rang 'gyur du mdzad pa rdzogs so//
65a3(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ shrI badz+ra ma hA kA la kro d+ha nA tha ra ha s+ya sid+d+hi b+ha ba tan+ta nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal rdo rje nag po chen po khros pa'i mgor po gsang ba radze sa grub brung ba sa
65a4(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i rgyud/ dpal he ru ka la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan kun mkhyen pa'i'o// ye shes mngon par mkhyen pa yis// bdud kyi dkyil 'khor 'joms byed pa// bka' yi
65a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo bshad par bya/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thogs pa med cing gdon mi za ba bde ba chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad ces gsungs so/
65a6(rgyud 'bum): ji srid 'khor ba'i gnas su ni// kun mkhyen bde gshegs bzhugs gyur pa// mya ngan bzla bar mi mdzad cing // de srid mtshungs med sems can don// rgyun mi 'chad par 'gro ba kun//
65a7(rgyud 'bum): srid pa'i zhags pas 'jigs med par// byams pa'i thugs kyi brtson 'grus kyis// rtag tu sems can don rnams mdzad// nam mkha'i khams kyi mthar thug par// smon la
65b1(rgyud 'bum): par spyod byed cing / / snying rjes don brtson sems kyis ni// dpa' bos srid pa sbyong bar mdzad// sna tshogs gzugs can nor bu bzhin// 'di ni rgyud rnams kun tu yang // kla klo'i skang
65b2(rgyud 'bum): kyis sbas pa ste/ / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal 'joms pa po// rdo rje sems dpa' mnyam gyur pa'i// rdo rje slob dpon bdag nyid che// myur du dngos grub sder byed pa// 'phral du yang dag
65b3(rgyud 'bum): yid ches byed/ / bsam pa gang dang gang dag gis// mi rnams sems dang mthun par 'jug/ de dang de yi gzugs sprul te// sna tshogs g.yogs te bde bar bzhugs// de phyir 'bad
65b4(rgyud 'bum): pa du ma yis/ / sna tshogs tshul gyis mthun par bya// bdag nyid sangs rgyas he ru ka/ dpa' bo rnal 'byor ma tshogs can// rang gi lha yi rab sbyor bas// bdag nyid ye shes mchog 'grub
65b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / 'di yis rgyal ba rgya mtsho dang // dkyil 'khor pa dang zhing skyong tshogs// gdod nas grub pa'i dur khrod gnas// mkha' 'gro'i dbang phyug mgon po che// sku gsung thugs dang
65b6(rgyud 'bum): 'phrin las tshogs/ / ye shes yon tan rigs kyi lha// nag po chen po 'khor dang bcas// lha mo chen mo bka' 'bangs bcas// rdo rje 'dzin pas dus kun tu// sgyu ma lta bu'i ting 'dzin
65b7(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ / phyi nang gsang ba'i mgon po che// bde ba chen po'i rol pa yis// ye shes gsang ba bsam mi khyab// tshe 'di nyid du 'grub 'gyur zhes// bcom ldan rdo rje can gyis gsungs/
66a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la ni mtshan nyid med// khams gsum po ni ma lus pa// 'gro kun sgyu ma lta bu yin// brtan pa dang ni g.yo ba yis//
66a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba dmigs su med pa ste// mthong ba dang ni thos la sogs// thams cad sgyu ma lta bur 'char// gang gis skye bo 'ching gyur pa// de nyid yongs shes rnam par grol// phyag rgya'i sbyor ba 'di
66a3(rgyud 'bum): yis ni/ / sa gsum bde ba chen por bsgyur// nyon mongs med na ye shes med// nyan rang byang chub lam las ring // phung po khams dang skye mched dang // 'byung ba bzhi la sogs pa rnams//
66a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad gdod nas dag pa yi// ye shes chen po'i byin rlabs kyis// dngos po du ma gsal bar snang // ye shes med par skye mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas ye shes kyis rab bskul// de ba
66a5(rgyud 'bum): bla med rgyud 'di ru/ / 'bad de dad pa bskyed par bya// gsang ba'i sdom pa bla na med// dang po bla ma'i dam tshig dag/ thob pas rgyu dang 'bras bu 'byung // sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin te//
66a6(rgyud 'bum): brtan pa dag ni longs spyod yin// nges par brtan pa mya ngan 'da'// rnal 'byor gyi ni dam tshig gnas// brda yi sbyor ba gsang ba dang // dbang bskur bas ni dngos grub ste// bla ma de bzhin
66a7(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa dang / / rgyal ba byang chub sems dpar bcas// dkyil 'khor nag po bla ra med// sngags pa gsang po 'dir zhugs gang // yang dag bla ma bsten par bya// 'dir ni byang
66b1(rgyud 'bum): chub sems kyis ni/ / bsnyen pa nye bar bsnyen pa dang // sgrub pa sgrub pa chen po yi// khyad par rim pa rtags dang dus// las la sbyar ba shes par bya// ji srid las kyi sbyor ba yis//
66b2(rgyud 'bum): mgon po 'khor bcas mnyes gyur na// las dang dngos grub sna tshogs pa// myur du 'grub par the tshom med// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ gsang ba mngon
66b3(rgyud 'bum): par byang chub pa'i le'u ste dang po'o/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rje
66b4(rgyud 'bum): rje 'dzin pa'i gsung rmi lam lta bur nye bar gsan te gsung rdo rje'i tshig 'di gsungs so/ / rdo rje 'dzin pa gang zhig gis// sgyu ma brag cha'i sgra brnyan ltar// yid 'ong dben pa'i gnas ngag tu//
66b5(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub thams cad bsdus pa sgrub// bskal pa bzang po 'di la ni// byung ba'i mgon po ma lus pa// kun gyi snying por gyur pa ni// gsang ba zhing skyong mgon po che// sangs rgyas kun gyi
66b6(rgyud 'bum): mgon po 'dis/ / bstan pa bsrung bar mdzad pa yin// zhes gsungs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la sogs pa dang / rdo rje 'dzin pa la sog
66b7(rgyud 'bum): pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gang du rdo rje'i theg pa che// gsang ba bsdus pa'i yang dag lam// sangs rgyas bstan pa srung byed pa'i// snying po 'bras bu lam
67a1(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ / snyigs ma lnga ldan dus nyid du// 'dren pa ye shes bstan pa bsrung // 'di nyid gsang ba'i sgrub pa gang // rdo rje'i theg pa 'dir bstan gsol// de skad ces
67a2(rgyud 'bum): gsol pa dang / de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ shes rab snying rje zung 'jug pa// ting 'dzin gang du bsgom gyur pa// bla med dkon mchog bstan pa ste// rgol
67a3(rgyud 'bum): ba ngan pa bzlog par mdzad/ / thub pa mchog gi bstan pa la// 'dzin dang skyong dang srung ba gsum// lnga brgya dus kyi snyigs ma la// bdag tu 'dzin pa spong bar mdzad// sku gsum ye shes
67a4(rgyud 'bum): lnga ldan par/ / gsang ba gcig pu bsgrub par bya// zhes bka' stsal to// gsang ba'i bde ba chen po dbyings la rab tu zhugs pa bcom ldan 'das dpal he ru ka rdo rje rang rig pa'i rnal
67a5(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dbus su/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lhun gyis grub pa'i gnas gsang ba rang byung bla na med pa'i rdo rje rab tu rgyal ba'i snying po mi phyed pa'i rdo rje'i ting nge
67a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i snying po ye shes kyi dngos grub sgrub cing bdud kyi g.yul las rab tu rgyal bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos mi zad pa yang dag par 'byung ba
67a7(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba ston par mdzad do/ / rdo rje gzhi la gnas pa'i cha// gter gyi bum pa kha sbyar ldan// dus kyi rgyal po 'od gsal ba// chu 'dzin phyogs tsam phyed ldan nyid// sgra dang sgra las khyab
67b1(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ / du ma ma yin gnas pa'i yul// dam tshig gsang ba 'byung ba las// rgyal ba rin chen 'bar ba'i gtso// phyogs dus med par rang byung ba// chos 'byung pho brang dkyil 'khor du//
67b2(rgyud 'bum): rigs kyi yon tan ldan par ni// nam mkha'i rgya mtsho 'bras ldan pa// phun sum tshogs pa lhun gyis 'grub// mi phyed lhan cig skyes pa rgyal// pho brang gsang ba'i gzhal yas khang // dkyil
67b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor rin chen 'od 'khrug pa/ / ge sar pad+ma'i dbus su ni// kun nas zlum por 'khor ba ni// tshad med 'phreng bas brgyan pa ni// bkod pa dpag med rim par ldan// ri rab lhun po mchog
67b4(rgyud 'bum): byung ba'i/ / de nyid kun nas yongs bskor ba'i// rgya mtsho dang ni ri rnams te// shin tu mnyam zhing mtshungs par 'khor// de nyid rim pa yongs su brtan// bye brag mtshungs med dmar chen mcho/
67b5(rgyud 'bum): rim pas chu gter 'o ma'i gnas// 'byung ba bsdus pa mi lus kyi// phung po rus pa'i ri bo la// phyi nang mnyam pa'i tshad can gyi// lhun gyis grub par bstan pa yin// de las dngos po sna tshog
67b6(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ / tha dad snang ba ye shes gzugs// rang byung bde ba chen po nyid// mnyam pa med pa kun tu 'byung // dus gsum de bzhin gshegs pa yi// 'byung gnas snying po rdo rje'i gdan// rdo rje
67b7(rgyud 'bum): skyil krung mi phyed las/ / thog mtha' med pa'i rang bzhin can// gsang ba chen po'i rigs dag pa'i// 'dod chags rdo rje'i skur ldan pa// lho phyogs bya rkang ri dang ni// dpal gyi rol mdun
68a1(rgyud 'bum): phyogs pa/ / d+hu na ka Ta barba ta// pad+ma ge sar rgyas pa'i dbus// chos kyi 'byung gnas rtag par gnas// dpal ldan dga' ba'i khang pa brtsegs// gsang ba sngags kyi/
68a2(rgyud 'bum): rgya mtsho yi// ma lus rgyal ba bgrod pa'i yul// gsang ba chos kyi dbyings chen po// dpal ldan rgyu skar dkyil 'khor du// kla klo'i yul gyi mi rnams dang // lha dang lha min dri zar bcas/
68a3(rgyud 'bum): gsang chen yongs su rdzogs pa yi// rang byung ye shes pho brang du// tshangs dbang khyab 'jug dbang phyug bdag/ dkyil 'khor sgo bzhir bcug nas kyang // skye bo chags can rab 'dul phyir//
68a4(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu gyur pa'i snying po gsungs// phyogs bcur gnas kyi sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs rnams dang // dpa' bo rnal 'byor dbang phyug tshogs// gang+gA'i klung gi bye snyed kyi//
68a5(rgyud 'bum): khrag khrig ri rab rdul mnyam pa// de dbus seng ge'i khri re bzhugs pa'i// thub pa'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po la// rdo rje snying po sems dpa' che// bla gos phrag pa
68a6(rgyud 'bum): gcig gzar te/ / pus mo'i lha nga sa la btsugs// thal mo sbyar te 'di don zhus// gsang chen khyad par 'phags pa yi// lhun gyis grub pa'i phyag rgya che/ mi 'gyur rdo rje theg pa'i lam//
68a7(rgyud 'bum): dus dang gnas dang gang zag ste// spyod yul bstan pa'i khyad par gyi// grub dang sgrub pa 'phrin las tshogs// thabs dang stobs dang 'jug pa ste// rim pa mngon byed rgyur ldan pa// de nyid bcom
68b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan gsung du gsol/ / zhes gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ bla ma sangs rgyas bstan pa la// dga' zhing mgu la rab dad pa'i// sems dpa' chen pos
68b2(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i don/ / rab tu zhus pa legs so legs// shin tu rmad du byung ba yi// gdul dka' ma lus gdul don du// byang chub sems kyi ye shes mdzod// khyod la yang dag bstan par bya//
68b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas dngos grub thams cad kyi// grub pa rab tu ster byed pa// rgyal ba kun gyi snying po ste// gsang ba las kyi rim pa nyid// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bstan pa srung zhing bka'
68b4(rgyud 'bum): la gnas/ / dam tshig 'dzin pa'i zhing skyong la// mgon po sa bcu'i dbang phyug gtso// dpal ldan rig 'dzin thams cad la// mchog tu gyur pa'i las sgrub pa// dpal ldan nag po chen po ni/
68b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dis ni lha min 'dus pa yi// g.yul las rgyal bar byed pa yin// lha srin sde brgyad ma lus pas// mchod 'os gtso bor gyur pa yin// dpal ldan lha mo chen mo dang // nag mo re ma tir gyur
68b6(rgyud 'bum): pas/ / lham dral gyur pas bstan pa srung // sku dang gsung dang thugs gsang ba// phyi nang de nyid kho na'i don// yon tan 'phrin las dbang phyug tu// dam tshig mgon po zhing skyong ba// nyi shu rtsa
68b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhi'i gtso bo ste/ / gzhan du sa gsum dbang byed pa'o// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ gsang ba spyi la dgongs pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de
69a1(rgyud 'bum): nas gsang ba bshad bya ba/ / 'di nyid bla med sgrub pa po// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor lhung ba yi// sems can sdug bsngal gzigs nas ni// ji lta ji ltar grol 'gyur ba/
69a2(rgyud 'bum): de dang de yi thabs ston mdzad// dus ni bskal pa bzang po yi// rdzogs ldan tha mar gyur pa yi// dpag med dus las 'das nas ni// gnyis ldan dang ni gsum ldan las// rtsod pa'i dus kyi
69a3(rgyud 'bum): rim pa la/ / bcom ldan tshe lo brgya pa'i dus// de nyid bstan pa'i snyigs ma yi// lnga brgya pa yi dus kyi mthar// shin tu gdug cing rtsub pa yi// mi bsrun pa yi dus kyi tshe// de tshe mgon
69a4(rgyud 'bum): po'i bstan pa 'byung / / gang zag la yang gnyis su bshad// bsgral bar bya ba'i gang zag dang // sgrol bar byed pa'i sgrub po ste// dang po bstan pa 'jig byed cing // dkon mchog gsum po
69a5(rgyud 'bum): smod pa dang / / bla ma la sdang bdag la smod// de dag la sogs bya bar bshad// sgrub pa po ni rnam pa gsum// he ru ka dpal rnal 'byor ma// dag cing sbyangs te ting 'dzin gsal// rim pa
69a6(rgyud 'bum): go 'phang thob pa ste/ / thun mong spyi dang bye brag tu// dam tshig gnas pa'i rdo rje 'dzin// gnas kyi khyad par 'byung ba yang // bsnyen pa'i dus dang bsgrub pa dang // las la sbyar ba'i dus shes
69a7(rgyud 'bum): pas/ / yid 'ong dben dang dur khrod sogs// bsam gtan 'phel dang khyad par ba'o// yul dang dbang po'i spyod yul du// mthong ba dang ni thos pa dang // reg pa dang ni dran pa yis//
69b1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor pa yi snang ba yang // ma lus dngos po gang shar ba// bde ba can du shes par bya// bstan pa kun las bsdus pa ni// byang chub sems dpa'i lam las kyang // gsang ba 'bras
69b2(rgyud 'bum): bu lam byed pa/ / rdo rje theg pa 'di nyid de// bstan pa 'dzin skyong srung dang gsum// 'di ni khyad par bsrung ba yin// grub pa bsnyen pa'i ting 'dzin dang // nye bar bsnyen pa'i ting 'dzin dang /
69b3(rgyud 'bum): dpal ldan khrag 'thung ye shes che// rnam dag mtshan nyid kun grub pa// bde ba'i bsod nams rgyun gnas pa// rnam dag stobs ni rgyas par byed// bsnyen pa'i dus su rang lha yi// he ru
69b4(rgyud 'bum): kar ni gnas pa yi/ / bdun du bka' sdong ngam tshig gi/ mgor po phyag bzhi bsgom par bya// de nas thugs ka'i rang sngags las// 'od 'phros 'khor ba'i bzlas pa las// khyad par
69b5(rgyud 'bum): du ni sgra bcas dang / / shin tu ngal bar bzlas pa bya// nye bar bsnyen pa'i dus su ni// bdag nyid he ru ka las ni// hAM phyung mdun du 'od 'phros pas// bskyed cing mthar ni nye bar bsdu//
69b6(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa'i dus su mgon pa yi// rgyas 'debs spyi bor he ru ka/ de 'ang gsang sngags phyogs bcas pa// de nyid sems dpa' sum brtsegs bsam// gsang ba zhing skyong rgyal po che/
69b7(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyis bsgrub pa'i tshul// 'jig rten 'jog rten 'das pa'i bdag/ thams cad bde chen gnas pa la// dus gsum 'khor lo gsum du gnas// brtul zhugs 'dzin pas 'thob
70a1(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / sgrub pa chen po bla na med// ye shes mgon po chen po nyid// khwa gdong la sogs lha mo brgyad// rim pa bzhin du yongs su bskor// dkyil 'khor
70a2(rgyud 'bum): brang dbus su yang / / dur khrod du ni mgon po rol// 'jig rten gsum na rnyed dka' ba// dam tshig spyod pa'i rang bzhin ni// rtag tu rang sngags sbas pa ste// rab tu 'bad de gsang bar bya'o//
70a3(rgyud 'bum): 'phrin las khyad par gang yin pa// las la sbyor ba rim shes bya// rengs par byed dang skrod pa dang // rmugs par byed dang brgyal du 'jug/ rnam par rmongs dang lkugs par byed// dug gis/
70a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin dang 'on long dang // rang sha rang gis za byed cing // gshis ngan dug dang khrag tu skyug/ 'di dag dus min 'chi byed pa// las kyi khyad par yongs su bstan// char dbab pa dang sprir
70a5(rgyud 'bum): dral dang / / thog dang ser ba dbab pa dang // rang phyogs su ni zlog cing srung // byang ka bzlog dang ngag bcing dang // nus pa gzhom dang cho 'phrul dang // phran tshegs las kyi gsang ba'o//
70a6(rgyud 'bum): thabs ni las kyi rim pa ste// rten gyi gang zag 'ga' zhig gis// dang por bla ma mnyes par bya// gnyis par dbang bzhi thob pa dang // gsum par byin gyis brlabs nas ni// bka' bsgo
70a7(rgyud 'bum): rjes gnang tshul bzhin du/ ma nor 'jug pa'i go rim shes// rten tshul khyad par shes par bya// stobs ni chos rnams thams cadapa/ sgyu ma lnga bur shes pa dang // yang dag bden pa'i stobs
70b1(rgyud 'bum): kyis ni/ / rang bzhin med par rtogs pas 'byung // 'jug pa thun mong ma yin la// byams pa snying rje byang chub sems// tshad med bzhi dang ldan pa yis// 'gro ba'i don la sems pa po//
70b2(rgyud 'bum): mngon du byed pa nyer sgrub ste// dus dang grangs dang mtshan ma ste// dang po bar dang tha mar yang // gtso bo dang ni 'khor rnams kyi// gang grub rab 'bring tha ma ru// rtags kyi dbye ba bstan pa yin//
70b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyu ni thog ma med pa yi// rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ste// mngon sum du ni 'byung ba la// gang gis dgag par mi nus pa// de las 'bras bu phun sum tshogs// snying po smin pa bzhin du 'byung //
70b4(rgyud 'bum): gang du thogs med rdo rje yi/ snying po zad pa mar pa'i ngon/ yang dag ye shes snang ba po// bla ma'i drin las theb par 'gyu dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i rim pa bstan pa'i le'u ste
70b5(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa'o/ / // de nas dpal ldan bdud 'joms pa'i// sgrub pa yang dag rab tu bshad// gsang ba'i mgon po chen po yi// sbas pa'i yum dang bcas pa yi// gsang
70b6(rgyud 'bum): ba mkha' 'gro ma bzhi dang / / lhan cig tu dgyes par rol// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// gdul dka' 'dul ba'i dpa' bo ni// zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa// mi thung khros pa ut+pal
70b7(rgyud 'bum): mdog/ mgo skyes gyen 'greng bajam pa'i sku// ro yi gangan la bzhugs mdad cing // klu brgyad rgyan gyis brgyan pa po// khros pas char sprin nag po ltar// me stag phung po lta bu yi// spyan gsu
71a1(rgyud 'bum): drag po'i lta bas gzigs/ / glang po'i tshul can stobs ldan pa// rgyu ma'i ngo shal sbyangs pa yi// mi mgo rlon pa'i 'phreng bas klubs// shin tu mi bsrun sgeg pa'i sku// bdud
71a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dul chen po lha yi lha/ / nyams ldan gzi brjid phun sum tshogs// ma rig mun sel sgeg pa'i nyams// rmang byung chos sgrogs bzhad par ston// brtul zhugs spyod pa dpa' bo ste// gdug pa
71a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dul mdzad 'jigs par ston/ / log lnga spong byed gtsigs pa'i nyams// gdug pa tshar gcod 'jigs par ston// ngo mtshar nyon mongs 'joms mdzad cing // khro chags mi g.yo zhi ba'i thugs/
71a4(rgyud 'bum): g.yas kyi dang pos gri gug bsnams// g.yon gyi dang pos thod khrag 'dzin// g.yas kyi gnyis pas ral gri 'debs// g.yon pas kha T+wAM 'dzin par mdzad// gsung gis ha ha zhes sgrogs pa/
71a5(rgyud 'bum): log par lta ba 'joms par mdzad// stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can// sna tshogs chu skyes nyi mar bcas// rang byung rol pa'i stabs kyis gnas// de yi mdun du gtum pa mo// lha mo zhal
71a6(rgyud 'bum): gcig phyag gnyis ma/ / mun pa'i mdog can zhal gcig ma// phyag gnyis spyan gsum khro tshul can// gri gug thod pa bsnams par mdzad// yab la phyag rgya drug gis brgyan// yum la lnga yis
71a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas btab gnas/ / sku dang gnyis med 'khril bar bzhugs// me 'od 'phreng bas yongs su bskor// ye shes rgya mtsho'i 'khor bsrungs pa// shar phyogs mkha' 'gro 'phrog ma dang // lho phyog
71b1(rgyud 'bum): glang sna ma zhes bya/ / nub kyi srin mo ral pa can// byang dus yi gtsug yin no// gang du rgya mtsho chu dngas dang // nag po'i chu dang 'dra ba'i sku// ma rungs 'joms byed nag po che// 'bad pas
71b2(rgyud 'bum): snying rje bskyed pa nyid/ / gsad par bya ba brjod pa nyid// snying rje med na mi 'grub pas// de phyir snying rje bskyed par bya// mtshas sa med lnga ni byed pa dang // sangs rgyas bstan pa 'khrug byed pa/
71b3(rgyud 'bum): zhe sdang rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyis// re zhig tsam du gsad par bya// gzas pa'i sha la rtag tu rol// kun tu gtum pa'i shugs 'chang ba// yul dang yul du rol byed pas// shing rnams la ni
71b4(rgyud 'bum): gnas nas kyang / / dkyil 'khor zhing rnams skyong bar byed// dur khrod gnas kyis yongs su bskor// ma mo'i gnas sogs khyad par byed// klu yis mchod pa'i zhing skyong ba// me yi phye mas
71b5(rgyud 'bum): yongs su bskor/ / sgo dang mig gis khyad par 'gyur// gtso bo'i sngags kyi lus car te// sgrub pa po yi lus la gnas// de dag rim par dus bstan pa// dam tshig ldan pa'i sngags pa yis/
71b6(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa'i rdzas rnams khyad par las// 'bru nag gtor ma rab tu shis// sha chen gyis ni brgyan pa yi// tshegs rdzas pU dza gus pas dbul// phyi nang gsang ba khyad par las// bstan pa'i tshul
71b7(rgyud 'bum): gyis 'phrin las las/ / bye brag rgyun dang gnas skabs pa// grub dang sgrub pas mngon du 'gyur// dus rnams kun tu zhe sdang gis// rnam pa kun tu gzhom mi bya// yul min pa la bsad byas na//
72a1(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor dam tshig las nyams phyir// grub pa ram yang yong mi srid // khyad par ye shes bla med pa// dam tshig mgon po sgrub pa yi// dam tshig 'di ni rmang po che// bde ba
72a2(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa'i lam sbyor mdzad/ / byang chub sems kyi zla ba 'di// yar ngo mar ngo rab tu gnas// yar ngo yis ni skyed byed la// mar ngo la ni 'grib par byed// yar ngo yi ni bco lnga la// byang
72a3(rgyud 'bum): chub sems kyi mkha' 'gro yang / / bde ba chen por 'du bar mdzad// 'di ni nges pa'i don du gsungs// dkyil 'khor lha nyid lus nyid yin// gzhan du lha dang dkyil 'khor ni// btsal yang
72a4(rgyud 'bum): rnyed par mi 'gyur zhes/ / 'dren pa dpa' bos rtag tu gsungs// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba la// drag po kun gyi srog gyur pa// yon tan 'phrin las dbang phyug gi/ phyi nang gsang ba'i
72a5(rgyud 'bum): bdag po yin/ / ston pa gnas pa'i rang bzhin las// 'khor lo dgug bya gnyis med bstib// dngas snyigs las ni rgyu 'bras dang // gnas pa khyad par rten 'brel te// 'khrul dang
72a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khrul pa ma yin pa/ / khams gsum kun la dbang byed pas// 'jig rten las dang ye shes kyi// mgon po'i khyad par mngon 'byung ba// gdags pa tha snyad khyab pa po// thun mong bar ni bstan
72a7(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / 'di dag las dang skye bo las// sgrib pa thun mong lha yi cha// dngos dang brgyud pas lung bstan pa// srog dang srog ma yin pa ste// rgyu dang rkyen dang bskul ba yis// gsang sngags
72b1(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa mngon par phye/ / 'di ni mngon du 'byung ba'o// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ gsang ba mngon par 'byung ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas yang
72b2(rgyud 'bum): dag bshad bya ba/ / he ru ka dpal mgon nyid kyi// gsang ba'i sprul pa nag po che// 'di yi sgrub rim bshad par bya// gsang ba'i sgrub pa'i thabs mchog ste// skal ba can la sbyin par bya//
72b3(rgyud 'bum): gang du sgrub pa'i sa phyogs su// mi mthun g.yeng ba spang byas nas// de nas nag po bsgrub par bya// 'gro ba kun la rab bltas nas// tshad med byang chub sems kyi blos// snying rje chen po bskyed
72b4(rgyud 'bum): byas nas/ / bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// lhor bltas skra grol gcer bu yis// dang por skad cig tsam gyis ni// rang lhar bskyed pa'i snying kha ru// a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang /
72b5(rgyud 'bum): bsil zhing 'od dang bcas pa bsam// rang steng raM las nyi dkyil 'khor// rnga bdun 'od zer tsha ba dang / me yi rang bzhin 'phro ba bsam// de dbus yi ge hUM nag po// ye shes lnga pa'i rang
72b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin can/ / de yi 'od kyi snang ba las// dpag med kha dog bzhi bcas bsam// rang bzhin gnas su 'phros pa las// bla ma dang ni lhag pa'i lha// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo bcas pa dang /
72b7(rgyud 'bum): nag po chen po 'khor dang bcas// mdun gyi nam mkhar bzhugs pa la// skyabs su 'gro dang mchod pa 'bul// sdig pa bshags pa la sogs bya// bzod par gsol nas gshegs su
73a1(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ / de rjes dngos po thams cad kun// ma lus stong pa nyid gzhug cing // oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA A b+hA ba shud+d+hohaM/ oM badz+ra shud+d+ha sarba d+harmAHbadz+ra shud+d+ho
73a2(rgyud 'bum): oM yo ga shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA yo gA shud+d+hohaM/ zhes brjod par bya'o// phyi dang nang gi dngos po kun// gdong nas dag pa'i ngang du bsam// de nyid hUM dang bcas pa yang // nA da tsam du gnas pa las/
73a3(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' lta bu'i ngang las ni// tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi khyab par bya// de las sa bon 'di dag ni// 'chad bzhin pa las rim pas bsam// yaM las rlung gi dkyil 'khor dang // raM las me
73a4(rgyud 'bum): yi dkyil 'khor dang / / baM dkar chu yi dkyil 'khor te// laM las gser gyi sa gzhi nyid// de steng bruM las ri rab 'byung // de dag phyi nang ngo bo nyid// de dag steng gi cha la yang // dbus su
73a5(rgyud 'bum): paM las pad+ma ni/ / sna tshogs pad+ma rgya che ba// lte ba ge sar bcas dbus su// ha las sna tshogs rdo rje ni// kha dog lnga dang ldan par bsam// de dbus raM las nyi ma yi// hUM yig sa bon las
73a6(rgyud 'bum): byung ba/ / sa gzhi ma lus rdo rjer gyur// steng 'og phyogs mtshams rdo rje dang // ral gri 'khor lo mda' dang ni// phur bu gri gug kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje rtse gcig pa dang ni// rtse gsum nyi shu rtsa lnga'i sngags//
73a7(rgyud 'bum): du ma rnam par 'phros nas ni// shin tu rgya che bsam par bya// bla re ra ba sogs dang ni// gur gyi rnam par mtshams bcing bya// me 'ong 'bar ba khyad par 'gyur// 'di dag srung ba'i khyad par ro//
73b1(rgyud 'bum): bruM las byung ba'i 'khor lo ni// rtsibs bcu pa ni yongs su 'khor// de steng raM las nyi dkyil 'khor// de yi dbus su hUM mdzad do// zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste// rin chen klu dbang rgyan dang ldan//
73b2(rgyud 'bum): / rol pas rnam par sgeg par bsam// raM las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus// de steng hUM bcu rnam par bsam// de las khro bo'i rgyal po bcu// zhal phyir gzigs pa rnam par bsam// khro bo de dag
73b3(rgyud 'bum): re re zhing / / phyogs skyong bcu po gdan la ni// bkug nas gnyis med bzhugs par bsam// de la gsang sngags brjod tsam gyis// phur bus gad ba dang brdung bar bya// des ni bla med mchog dag
73b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / khro bo de dag re re zhing // brtan par bya phyir gsang sngags brjod// oM dkar 'khor lo dang bcas pa// 'od ldan de las spros bsdus pa// bcom ldan rang bzhin yangs shing khyab// 'od
73b5(rgyud 'bum): du zhu nas gzhal yas khang / / rin chen sna tshogs las grub pa// gru bzhi sgo dang rta babs bcas// rdo rje dang ni nor bu yi// 'od zer 'khrugs pa'i rnam pa'o// pho brang nang ma zlum po la// re mig dgu
73b6(rgyud 'bum): pa rdo rjes bskor/ / phyi ni pad+ma mu khyud bcas// de yi nang na e yi dbyibs// drag po'i gnas su bsam par bya// dbus ma'i nang du paM las ni// pad+ma'i zlar bcas pa bsam// A li kA li 'dus
73b7(rgyud 'bum): pa las/ / de las nam mkha'i sa bon te// nam mkha' las ni hU~M byung ste// gnyis med zhugs las 'od du zhu// de la rdo rje gri gug bsam// 'od kyi snang bas khyab pa las// skad cig gis na
74a1(rgyud 'bum): sku rdzogs pa/ / nag po chen po bsam par bya// zhal gcig phyag bzhi 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dpa' bo chen po rol pas bzhugs// yab yum gnyis su med par bsam/
74a2(rgyud 'bum): de ltar yab yum rdzogs bskyed nas// mkha' gsang byin gyis brlab bya ste// sngags brjod pas ni dgyes pa bskyed// de las dkyil 'khor lha tshogs rnams// yab yum snyoms par zhugs pa
74a3(rgyud 'bum): las/ / yum gyi mkha' dbyings bde chen du// so sor cho gas bskyed byas la// phyi rol du ni rim gyis 'byung // dang por gtso bo'i rgyan dang bcas// rdzogs par phyung ste d+hU tI nas// gyen du thugs
74a4(rgyud 'bum): ka'i pad+ma las/ / 'thon te 'gro ba'i don byas la// slar 'dus rang la thim gyur pa// dpal ldan snying rje'i stobs su gnas// de las rim pa ji bzhin du// phyung nas so so'i gdan la bzhugs/
74a5(rgyud 'bum): gtso bo'i phyogs bzhir mkha' 'gro bzhi// zhal gcig phyag ni bzhi pa ste// gar stabs ldan pa'i lha mo ni// g.yas brkyang ba ni rnam par 'gying // dpa' mo bde ba'i skur bskyed pa'o// mtsham
74a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhir thod pa bdud rtsis bkang / / sna tshogs pad 'dab la gnas pa// nyi ma la gnas mgon po ni// shar du sku yi mgon po dang // lho ru yon tan mgon po dang // nub tu gsung gi mgon po
74a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / / byang du las kyi mgon po ste// thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// gri gug thod pa bsnams pa'o// so so'i g.yon du yum re re// gtum mo dang ni drag mo dang // zlog byed ma
74b1(rgyud 'bum): dang dpa' mo ste/ / zhal gcig phyag gnyis rgyan dang bcas// de yi phyi yi gru chang la// beng 'dzin pa dang kha T+wAM ga/ gaN+DI 'dzin dang rgyal mtshan 'dzin// so so'i yum dang bcas pa ste//
74b2(rgyud 'bum): zhal gcig phyag gnyis 'bar ba'o// de yi phyi rol sgo dang grwar// lha mo brgyad po gar gyis rol// thams cad zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa// gar stabs ldan pas bzhugs pa'o// dkyil
74b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lha rnams rdzogs pa dang / / de nas gtso bo yab yum dag/ snyoms par zhugs pas 'od du zhu// de nas lha mo bzhi yis ni// rdo rje tshad med dbyangs kyis bskul// e baM si ta u Da na
74b4(rgyud 'bum): nI bA/ dza hi d+ha ma d+ha ma g+ha ma g+ha ma aM ka ma/ d+ha d+ha sha ri d+ha raM/ sa ni sa sa sa ni ga ma sa sa sa/ ri ga mo bu ma te sa ri sa ra sa ri ri sa ni sha/ ma hA ma a d+ha ma sa sa/ shu tra ni sA sa sA/ sa ni
74b5(rgyud 'bum): sa ri ta g+ha ma aM g+haM/ a ta ma ta ya/ sa sA pa pa/ ma ya a pa sa dAM na ma a i/ de ltar bskul bar gyur pa las// de ltar nye bar gsan nas ni// thugs rje'i ngang las bzhengs mdzad de/
74b6(rgyud 'bum): nag po gsang ba'i bu dang bcas// shin tu 'jigs shing 'bar ba'i sku// bdud 'dul chen po rgyan dang bcas// spro ba dang ni bsdu bar mdzad// de nyid brtan dang mnyes par mdzad// sku gsung
74b7(rgyud 'bum): thugs ni rgyas gdab cing / / ye shes gzhug dang dbang bskur dang // byin gyis brlabs dang mchod pa dang // sngags kyis brtan ched bzlas pa bya// bdud rtsi myang dang bstod cing bskul/
75a1(rgyud 'bum): ting 'dzin don pas mnyer bsdu bya// de nas ldang bar gyur pa na// gnyis pa lha rnams thams cad kun// skad cig gis ni rdzogs bya ste// de yi dang la ting nge 'dzin
75a2(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba khyad par rdzogs par bya/ / rnam rtog bag chags kyis bcings la// rtog pa dag pa'i thabs mchog ldan// rnam rtog rang bzhin yongs shes na// de nyid thob tu med pa ste// bde ba
75a3(rgyud 'bum): chen po yang dag 'byung / / tshogs pa med pas kun tu spyad// 'di de'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor pa// rig ma rnams la rol byed na'ang // de nyid shes la bcing med de// rnam par rol pa'i
75a4(rgyud 'bum): tshul mchog go/ / dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ gsang ba lha'i gnas mngon par 'byung ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad
75a5(rgyud 'bum): bya ba/ / gang du sngags kyi yi ge dang // bzang po'i sngags kyi 'phreng ba 'di// rdza rnga bcings pa las shes bya// re mig bdun pa'i grangs kyis ni// kun nas mnyam par dgod par bya//
75a6(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pas dbyangs dang gsal byed ni// sde tshan rim pas phye ba nyid// kun nas bskor ba'i tshul gyis ni// rim pa bzhin du btu bar bya// sde tshan drug pa'i lnga pa ni// ha yi mgo na gnas
75a7(rgyud 'bum): pa blang / / usma Sha yi bzhi pa nyid// wa 'og gnas pa de nyid de// sde tshan gnyis pa'i dang po ste// pa yi steng na gnas pa blang // an+tas+tha yi gsum pa ste// ya yi steng ma yang dag blang //
75b1(rgyud 'bum): sde tshan brgyang pa'i bzhi pa ni// ma yi steng na gnas par sbyar// sde tshan dang po'i gnyis pa nyid// nya yi 'og na gnas pa sbyar// sde tshan dang po'i lnga pa ste// Da yi 'og na gnas par sbyar
75b2(rgyud 'bum): sde tshan dang po'i bco lnga pa/ / d+ha yi steng na gnas pa yi// zla tshes thig les brgyan par bya// sde tshan dang po'i bcu bzhi po// de yi 'og ma'i yi ge la// dbyangs kyi bco lnga pa yin to//
75b3(rgyud 'bum): d+ha yi 'og mas brgyan par bya// de nyid thog mar sbyin bya yin// sde tshan drug pa'i gnyis pa yin// na yi 'og na gnas pa ste// bzhi pa yi ni thog ma gang // ra yi 'og ma sbyar byas te//
75b4(rgyud 'bum): mar 'byung ba'i drug po ste// 'di ni yid sbyin nor bu ster// tsha yi steng na gnas pa gang // b+ha yi 'og ma rnam par blang // Da yi steng mas brgyan par bya// ha yi 'og na gnas pa dang // wa
75b5(rgyud 'bum): yi 'og ma gzung bar bya/ / pa yi steng ma nyid btu bya// ya yi steng na gnas pa las// nya yi steng mas las kun byed// ma yi steng gnas yi ge nyid// ra yi 'og ma sbyar byas la// nyis 'gyur
75b6(rgyud 'bum): d+ha yi steng mas brgyan/ / tsa yi steng na gnas pa la// oM yi steng ma drug tu gzhag/ 'di ni dngos grub 'byung ba'i gnas// da yi steng ma'i yi ge la// d+ha yi steng mas yang dag brgyan// rig byed mngon sum dang por gnas//
75b7(rgyud 'bum): ma lus ye shes skur gyur pa'o// Sha yi 'og na gnas pa la// b+ha yi 'og ma'i yi ge dang // Na yi 'og nas rab sbyin dang // sa yi 'og ma yang dag blang // tha 'og Da 'og sngan du sbyar//
76a1(rgyud 'bum): sa bar gnas yi ge dang // dzA yi 'og ma bdag po ste// sha yi bar na gnas pa gzung // kha dang a yi bar gnas pa// ta yi 'og ma nya steng ldan// ma yi steng gnas ri
76a2(rgyud 'bum): 'og sbyar/ / thig les brgyan pa nyis 'gyur sbyar// tsa yi steng na gnas pa la// a yi sbeng mas brgyan pa drung // 'di ni sbas pa'i snying po ste// rang srog yi ger gsang ba'o// nga yi steng ma'i yi
76a3(rgyud 'bum): ge las/ / d+ha yi steng mas brgyan par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi ye shes che/ snying po bzlas pa'i rig pa ste// bkra shis pa ni thog mar sbyar// na yi steng mas yang dag brgyan// dza yi gong ma
76a4(rgyud 'bum): d+ha steng sbyar/ / sa la bar gnas Da steng sbyar// thig le nA das brgyan par bya// na 'og d+ha steng mgo bor sbyin// 'di las ma steng ri 'og ldan// thig le zla tshes dag gis mtshan// tsa yi steng
76a5(rgyud 'bum): na gnas pa la/ / ra yi 'og ma drung du sbyin// b+ha steng gnas pa la 'og sbyar// nya yi 'og ma yang dag ldan// sha sa par gnas nya 'og sbyar// 'di ni gsang ba'i bzlas pa ste// bya ba stobs
76a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan nyid yin no/ / gang du mngon par phyogs pa yi// dpal ldan nag po chen po yi// gsang sngags mchog tu gyur pa 'dis// stong dang brgya pa bcur 'gyur gyis// rigs ni dam pa'i sa la
76a7(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / thob pa yul dang yul du gnas// pha yi 'og ma dang por blang // ha yi 'og ma blang byas la// tha yi steng ma sbyin par bya// Da yi steng ma'i drung nyid du// sha yi thog mas brten par
76b1(rgyud 'bum): bya/ pha yi steng mas btu bar bya// la yi steng ma'i yi ge la// Da yi steng mas stan du sbyar// nya yi steng ma nyis 'gyur la// phyi ma nya yi 'og mas brgyan// i yi 'og gyur bsdus pa la// sha yi steng
76b2(rgyud 'bum): ma drung du sbyar/ / la yi 'og ma rgyan du byas// nya yi 'og gis sbyin par bya// o yi 'og na gnas pa la// nya yi 'og mas brgyan par bya// de yi 'og mar gnas pa la// thig le nA da dag gis brgyan//
76b3(rgyud 'bum): da yi 'og ma'i yi ge la// u yi steng ma sbyin par bya// tsha yi steng na gnas pa gang // b+ha yi 'og ma rnam par blangs// ta yi steng mas brgyan par bya// dA yi 'og ma gnas pa dang // wa yi 'og ma
76b4(rgyud 'bum): gzung bar bya/ / sa yi steng ma nyid bsdus la// ya yi steng na gnas pa las// nya yi 'og gnas de la brgyan// nya yi 'og ma kun gyi rten// sa yi steng ma blang bar bya// b+ha yi steng na gnas pa la//
76b5(rgyud 'bum): la yi 'og mas brgyan par bya// pha yi sdeng ma nyid de blang // dz+nyA yi 'og ma nga steng dang // pa yi steng na gnas pa la// u yi steng ma yang dag blang // e yi 'og gnas yi ge la// d+ha yi steng ma
76b6(rgyud 'bum): mgo bor sbyin/ / la tha bar gnas pa la yang // Na yi steng mas brgyan par bya// ma steng thig le nA das brgyan// dza 'og gnas pa'i yi ge la// nga steng sa yi steng ma dang // pha 'og ta yi 'og
76b7(rgyud 'bum): mas brgya no/ / dza yi gong na gnas pa dang // ma yi steng ma sa stengs gnas// ya yi steng ma 'di dang ldan// dza 'og la yi steng ma la// d+ha yi steng mas mgo bor brgyan// Da yi 'og ma sha stengs
77a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ / thig lenA das brgyan pa'o// Da yi steng mas cha nyid du// sha yi thog mas brten par bya// pa yi steng ma btu bar bya// la steng gnas pa Ta steng bsgyur// la yi steng
77a2(rgyud 'bum): dunyis 'gyur ba/ / phyi ma'i nya yi 'og mas brgyan// dbyangs yig dang po ka 'og can// sa steng gnas pa nyid dang yang // u steng gnas pa yang dag bcas// sa steng gnas pa thig les brgyam
77a3(rgyud 'bum): yi steng ma'i gnas pa la/ / aM yi 'og gnas ga bdun gnas// ta yi 'og ma mgo bor sbyin// nga steng gnas pa ca 'og sbyar// la steng gnas paT 'og bcas// la 'og zur gnas sbyar
77a4(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / b+ha yi 'og ma'i yi ge la/ ma steng gnas pa stan du byas// sha 'og rnga yi steng mar sbyar// Na 'og gnas pa nyid drung ste// bla steng gnas pa'i 'og mas brgyan// sha sdang drung du sbyin
77a5(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / la steng sha yi thog ma la// phyi ma nya 'og gnas pas mdzes// Ta 'og sha thog thig les brgyan// sha thog ri yi 'og mas brgyan// ba thog la steng gnas par sbyar// de la 'jog sbyir
77a6(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / bsteng gnas pa la 'og ldan// wa 'og dag gis yang dag mdzes// ka ga bar gnas pa nyid la// nyis 'gyur du ni bsdu bar bya// g+ha steng gnas pa de nyid la// nya 'og brgyan po
77a7(rgyud 'bum): nyid du bya/ / ma yi thog mar 'og bcas// g+ha steng gnas pa nyid dang ni// wa 'og gnas pa pa 'og sbyin// ha 'og Na yi 'og mar ldan// dri ma nyis 'gyur shes par bya// kha 'og mam
77b1(rgyud 'bum): yi ga la/ / mu ri bar gnas sbyar bar bya// ma steng pa 'og 'og tu sbyin// de ni nyos 'gyur sbyar bar bya// tsha yi steng ma pa thog drung // Sha mi thog madrung du gnas// de ni zung du sbyar bar bya/
77b2(rgyud 'bum): skyeng gnas pa sa thog drung // nyis 'gyur rim par shes par bya// sha thog gnas pa wa thog drung // lan gnyis su ni brjod par bya// ka 'og gnas pa pastan pa// ba 'og stan du byas pa nyid/
77b3(rgyud 'bum): nyis 'gyur dag tu shes par bya// b+ha steng gnas pa Ta steng drung // Sha yi 'og ma stan du byas// sha ste dar yi 'og ma sa brgyan// d+ha 'og i thog stan du sbyar// pha yi steng ma drung du gzhag
77b4(rgyud 'bum): ha yi 'og ma Na 'og ldan/ / pha thog drag por 'gyur ba'o// sha steng tha yi 'og mas brgyan// 'di nyid rim pa mngon spyod pa'i// mA ra ya yi thog mar sbyar// ma yi steng gnas ri 'og sbyar/
77b5(rgyud 'bum): nyis 'gyur thig le nA ngas brgyan// tsa yi steng na gnas pa la// i yi steng ma brgyan pa drung // bla thog tha thog gnas pa sbyar// de la nya yi 'og mas brgyan// ma steng gnas pa nya 'og ni/

77b7(rgyud 'bum): dang bcas/ / dur khrod rol ce spyang dang // sha ba'i tshogs rnams 'du ba bzhin// nges par 'du bar byed pa ste// bstan pa rgya mtsho srung byed pa'o// dpag tshad brgyad khri'i bar du ni// de ma
78a1(rgyud 'bum): bgegs rnams ma lus pa/ / til 'bru tsam du byed par mdzad// snying po 'di ni zos byed cing // gang du nyi ma gcig tu yang // ma chad mngon par sems pa yi// he ru
78a2(rgyud 'bum): ka dpal rnal 'byor la/ / 'jigs pa kun las srung ba dang // zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // de bzhin dbang dang mngon spyod la// thogs pa med par 'grub par 'gyur// ji srid mtshan ma ma byung

79a1(rgyud 'bum): bco lnga pa yis brgyan/ / gnyis pa'i lnga par gnas pa'o// mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa dang // lnga pa yi ni lnga pa dang // drug pa yi ni bzhi pa dang // phyi ma'i yang ni

80a1(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba'i rtsibs dag las/ / 'khor ba'i rgyu las 'od zer 'phro// steng 'og dag las rim pa ni// 'khrul cing gcod pa'i gri gug gis// las dang 'phrin las

80a5(rgyud 'bum): shes bya/ / oM ma hA kA la hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA kA la hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ka wu ma hA kA la ya hUM hUM phaT/ na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM shrI ma hA kA la ya/ shA sa naM u pa hA riNA/
80a6(rgyud 'bum): e ShA pash+tsi ma kA la a yaM/ i da rat+na tra ya/ a pa kA rir+N+NaM/ ya di pra ti dz+nyA/ sma ra si ta dzAM/ i daM duSha satwA/ kha khA khA hi khA hi/ ma re ma ra/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+na/ ban d+hA ban d+ha/
80a7(rgyud 'bum): ha na ha na/ da hid ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ sar+b+ba dun+da/ di na maM kai na mA ra ya hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA kA li ni kr-i d+ha sa ka~M la rak+Shi NI tsaN+Da ak+Shi ye hUM phaT/ oM hrIHhUM kA la~M ma hA kA la~M rak+Sha rmA

81a6(rgyud 'bum): lpags dag la dug sna dang / / khrag dang dug gi me tog gi/ du ba mtshan ngan thod chag la// mchog phur bstod pa'i snag tshas bri// rgya skyegs dag gis bsres la bri// tshad dang ldan pa'i mu khyud
