81b1(rgyud 'bum): steng non oM dang badz+ra ste// de yi phyi rim rtsibs brgyad la// a mu kaM dang ba yi ni// yi ge bcu gsum gnyis gnyis pa// g.yas skor dag tu dgod par bya// de yi phyi rim pad 'dab brgyad/
81b2(rgyud 'bum): sgo mtshams lha mo'i 'khor lo'i sngags// ming spel bcas pa dgod par bya// de yi nang gi gru chang bzhir// hUM gnyis phaT dang bcas pa la// ming spel bcug la bri bar bya// khyad par sbas pa'i
81b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo ni/ / dbus su rlung gi sa bon nyid// phyogs bzhir mkha' 'gro ma bzhi gnas// phyogs bzhir sngags kyi 'phreng ba las// phyi rol rtsibs la gcod pa'i sngags// 'dab brgyad cha la tsaN+Di
81b4(rgyud 'bum): ka/ mtha' rten snga ma dag dang mtshungs// yang na rim pa gsum pa yi// gsang sngags ma hA kA la yi// 'phrin las khyad par dgod par bya// 'dis ni shin tu mngon spyod myur// thabs dang shes
81b5(rgyud 'bum): rab khyad par dang / / steng 'og bar gyi dbye ba yis// zad da lcags kyi gri gug gis// bla dang tshe srog don snying la// myur du 'khor bas gcod par byed// sdud byed 'phrog cing len pa'i srog
81b6(rgyud 'bum): bsgral ba rdo rje rigs kyi las/ / thun mong du ni bya ba yin// khyad par 'khor lo dril bya ste// dus kyi rim pas las la sbyar// 'di ni kun tu mnan pa ste// las kyi gshin rje'i gnas su gtad/
81b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo la yang bsnyen pa dang // bsgrub pa go rim nor mi bya// 'dis ni bya ba mi 'grub med// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las gsang sngags dang 'khor lo sgrub pa'i
82a1(rgyud 'bum): le'u sde brgyad pa'o/ / de nas gzhan yang bshadang bya ba// dpal ldan nag po chen po yi// rnal 'byor ting 'dzin la zhugs te// mngon par spyod pa
82a2(rgyud 'bum): brtsam par bya/ / khyad par dur khrod pa yi shing // lha 'dreg tum po gnas pa las// ma mo'i bye brag brtags pa las// bcang pa mgo mjug ma nor bar// gnyis gshegs de nas sngags bris
82a3(rgyud 'bum): la bsdams te blang ba mig gis ni/ / phye ba'i bdun phrag gsum pa la// legs par gzhag ste tshang du bya// dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa la gzugs// gzhan yang bsgrub bya'i gzugs dag ni//
82a4(rgyud 'bum): zur gsum tshud pa sngags dang bcas// mang spel bskul tshig ldan pa na// grangs ni rab 'bring tha ma ste// ci rigs par ni bye bar gsungs// yang ni ro sgom shing la yang // byang bu byas la
82a5(rgyud 'bum): ling ga bri/ / gzhan du mgon po yab yum gyi// 'khor lo legs par bris pa dang // bsgrub bya srog gi 'khor lo ni// gri gug lnga pa 'khor ba dag/ de dag bar du bcug pa dang // yang na mgon
82a6(rgyud 'bum): po'i 'khor lo dang / / bsgrub bya du yod ling ga rnams// de yi nang du dril bar bya// 'khor lo tshon skud rnam lngas dkri// de yi phyi rol ku sha yi// rtswa yi mi gzugs byas nas kyang // rang mdun
82a7(rgyud 'bum): gru gsum nag po yi/ / nang du gzugs de gzhug par bya// de la lha dang dbye ba dang // nyes pa bsgo zhing bsgrag par bya// de nas bdag nyid lha dang ni// mdun du nag po chen po ni// zhal gcig
82b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag ba ni 'jigs pa'i gzugs/ / yum dang bcas pa bskyed pa dang // spyan drang mchod cing bstim par bya// las mgon rnams dang ma mo bzhi// rgyal chen bzhi dang phyogs skyong bcu// lha srin
82b2(rgyud 'bum): sde brgyad ma lus dang / / gzhan yang dur khrod sha za dang // ma me ro langs ce spyang dang // stag dang dred dang bya gcan sogs// bya rog khA ta la sogs pas// yongs su bskor cing 'phrin las
82b3(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / de nas rang dang mgon po dang // lha mo bzhi la sogs pa yi// sa bon las ni 'od zer yang // lcags kyu lta bu dpag med pas// bsgrub bya de dag ma lus pa// snying gi srog rtsa nas
82b4(rgyud 'bum): drangs te/ / rang dbang med par rlung gis bteg/ myur du 'ong ba mdog nyams pa// rid cing skra 'dzings shin tu 'dar// yed yid dngang zhing skrag pa de// zhags pas bcings dang bsdams pa dang //
82b5(rgyud 'bum): dril bu la sogs sgra yis ni// shin tu dbang po myos gyur te// de yi rnam par shes pa ni// ming dang bcas pa'i gzugs la bstim// de yi dus su gsang sngags ni// 'phrin las sngags
82b6(rgyud 'bum): rings mtha' ru ni/ / A kaR+Sha ya dzaHzhes brjod// mgon po nag po yab yum gyi// lte bar gru gsum lcags khang ni// btson dong mun khang gnas par bsam// de las thar dus med par bya//
82b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas dong de ro g.yam la// rdo rje rgya gram bris pas mnan// mtha' mar las sbyor dus su yang // bsgrub bya'i them pa'am lam ngag tu// mnan pa byas la 'phrin las bcol// gal te de
83a1(rgyud 'bum): nyid sbyin sreg gis/ / las sbyor bsgrub bya'i chu rjes sogs// dri ma gos dang sgra sogs dang // tshad gsum dang dug sna dang // khrag dang ske tshe shang tshe dang // da d+hu ra dang
83a2(rgyud 'bum): de la sogs/ / sa sna gzhan dang sbyar bar bya// bong bu'i chu dang bsres nas ni// 'jim pa byas la g.yog par byas// dug chu ro sol dag gis ni// de la byug cing gnas lnga ru// seng ldeng
83a3(rgyud 'bum): lcags phur btab la gzhag/ de yi lus po thams cad la// spra tshil gyis ni byug par bya// de la drag po'i shing gi ni// tsher ma sna tshogs gtsugs la gzhag/ gru gsum e yi nang du ni//
83a4(rgyud 'bum): de gzugs phyi gan dag tu gzhag/ kha nang dur khrod thal bas brdzang // de nas dong kha bcad la gzhag/ de la thun bzhir bya ba 'am// dus drug dag tu bya ba ni// rnal 'byor pa yis lhor
83a5(rgyud 'bum): bltas la/ / nyin phyed mtshan phyed dus su bya// yang na dus bzhir las la sbyar// phyogs kyi DA ki bzhi yis ni// dgug gzhug bstim dang bsngags par bya// de nas thod pa mtshan ngan du//
83a6(rgyud 'bum): yungs kar nyungs nag la sogs pa'i// thun rdzas rnams la sngags bzlas shing // dus dus dag tu brdeg par bya// skabs skabs dug gi chu yis brdeg/ gal te gu gul nag po dang //
83a7(rgyud 'bum): sha chen dag gis bdug par bya// yang na 'bras phub me la ni// spra tshil ma zhu tsam du bsro// de nas sngags kyis brdeg par bya// 'di ni nye bar 'grub par 'gyur// de ltar cho ga'i thabs
83b1(rgyud 'bum): 'di yis/ / dgra yi khang par bya rog dag/ mang po 'ba' zhig skad 'don dang // lus la tshabs thebs la sogs// du ma'i cho 'phrul 'byung bar 'gyur// dang por nang rtags gsal bar 'char//
83b2(rgyud 'bum): phyi rtags rim gyis 'byung bar 'gyur// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ drag po'i mngon spyod bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// de nas gdug
83b3(rgyud 'bum): ba 'dul don du/ / nag po chen po khros pa yi// sgrub pa'i rim pa mchog gyur pa// gzhan yang rab tu bshad par bya// rje btsun he ru ka dpal dang // nag po chen po'i lha tshogs rnams
83b4(rgyud 'bum): nam mkhar mngon par bltas nas ni/ / bdun po yongs su dag par bya// bzod par gsol la gshegs su gsol// de rjes stong pa'i ngang las ni// tshad med bzhi po bsam par bya// byang
83b5(rgyud 'bum): chub sems kyi ngang las ni/ / pad+ma zla nyir gnas pa yi// hUM yig nag por bsam par bya// de yi 'od kyis khyab pa las// bsdus shing skad cig yongs gyur pa// dpal ldan nag po chen
83b6(rgyud 'bum): po ni/ / zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa// phyag gnyis sku mdog shin tu gnag/ dbu skra kham nag gyen du brdzes// g.yas pa gshin rje'i lce 'dra ba'i// gri gug rnon po 'dzin par mdzad/
83b7(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa thod pa khrag bkang ba snams// thod pas skra mtshams bcings pa dang // yan lag thung zhing rags pa'i gzugs// mche gtsigs 'jigs su rung ba ste// ltos 'gro brgyad dang rin chen
84a1(rgyud 'bum): @brgyad/ / rgyu ma'i ga sha stag lpags can// mi mgo rlon pa'i 'phreng ba 'chang // zhal nas khrag 'dzag gang rgyangs can// phyag rgya drug gis sku la spras// drag po'i nyams dang
84a2(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa ste/ / skad cig tsam gyis bskyeng par bya// de yi thugs kar nyi ma la// ye shes sems dpa' gsal bar dmigs// ting 'dzin sems dpa' dang bcas pa// rten dang brten par bcas pa
84a3(rgyud 'bum): bsam/ / de la 'di yi gsang sngags byung // oM badz+ra ma hA kA lA ya hUM hUM phaT/ ji srid skyo bar ma gyur pa// gsang sngags 'phreng ba bzlas par bya// de nas sha chen spos sreg cing // gzhan yang
84a4(rgyud 'bum): dug dang khrag la sogs/ / bdug pa'i du bas mchod par bya// ma sha 'bras dang so ba dang // 'bru nag me tog byug pa dang // sgron ma lnga dang mi 'chi lnga// 'khur ba chan dang chang la sogs//
84a5(rgyud 'bum): gtor ma nag po che la dbul// mchod dang bstod pa tshul bzhin bya// 'di yi nye bar spyad pa ni// bsgrub bya'i zag pa'i rdzas rnams dang // tsha ba gsum la sogs pa la// gang gi ming dang bcas pa'i
84a6(rgyud 'bum): gzugs/ / byas te dug gis byugs nas kyang // tsher mas bkang ste thab khung du// 'bras phub me la gdung la sogs// bya ba sna tshogs las bya na// skad cig gis ni rlag par byed// rdo rje slob
84a7(rgyud 'bum): dpon smod byed cing / / sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig byed pa// dkon mchog gsum la sdang ba dang // sems can kun la 'tshe ba rnams// 'di dag nag po chen pos sgrol// yan lag dag gi sha
84b1(rgyud 'bum): chod la/ / mgon po nag po'i zhal du gsol// yang na de yi spyi nas ni// til tsam du ni mdzad du gsol// khrag gi rgyun yang 'thung bar mdzod// de ltar 'phrin las las bcol bya// de nas sbyin
84b2(rgyud 'bum): sreg brtsam par bya/ / phung shul g.yul sprad la sogs pa// dur khrod sol bas byug byas te// gru gsum rim pa kha khyer ldan// de yi nang du drag po'i shing // tsher ma can gyis brtsig par bya//
84b3(rgyud 'bum): mchod dang bsreg rdzas gtor ma dang // bsgrub bya'i ling ga sha chen dang // nyungs kar bcas pas yongs su bskor// sngags pas lhor bltas ting 'dzin zhugs// me lha bskyed cing dgug gzhug
84b4(rgyud 'bum): bya/ ling ga phur btab gtubs byas la// me sbar bsregs pas lha la mchod// gsang sngags 'dod yon bsgyur ldan pa// phrag gcig gis ni lan cig ste// lan grangs rol mtsho'i khyad par
84b5(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ / phyir mi zlog cing srog gtor byed// de rjes gsol gdab bcol bskul bya// shin tu myur bar rtags rnams 'grub// nag po chen po'i gsang ba'i las// ma grub lan gsum
84b6(rgyud 'bum): spogs pa dang / / sa bon 'phrog cing bcud pas 'grub// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ drag po'i sbyin sreg bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//
84b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas dkyil 'khor chen po yi// dur khrod gnas pa'i zhing skyong dang // nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i zhing skyong bcas// de dag rim pa bshad par bya// rdo rje rigs kyi pho nya mo// drug cu rtsa bzhi'i 'dzin
85a1(rgyud 'bum): las dang / / 'di nyid gsang ba'i mgon po yi// thabs mchog 'di ni kun tu smras// dpal ldan mgon po rdo rje can// khro bo bzhin gshegs pa'i sku// dkyil 'khor
85a2(rgyud 'bum): dbus bzhugs dpa' bo ni/ / shin tu 'gying zhing 'bar ba'i sku// le tshe dgu pa'i dbus su ni// sna tshogs pad+ma nyi dbus la// dpa' bo chen po phyed skyil tshul// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa//
85a3(rgyud 'bum): spyan gsum b+hi ru la ltar dmar// sku mdog sngon po 'jigs chen po// thod pa'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// phyag rgya lnga ldan gar gyis rol// dang pos gri gug thod pa dang // gnyis pa ral gri
85a4(rgyud 'bum): kha T+wAM ga/ klu brgyad rgyan gyi 'phrin las can// de yi thugs kar gnas pa yi// sa bon spro dang bsdu ba'i dngos// oM ma hA kA la A kaR+Sha ya ma pra sha mA nA ya ha sa ma ya s+t+waM/ thams cad sdud cing dbang
85a5(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ / skad cig tsam gyis bskyed par bya// de yi shar gyi le tshe la// drag po shin tu 'jigs pa ste// zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa// mthing nag bajam pa'i tshul du gnas// de yi
85a6(rgyud 'bum): mdun du rgan byed ma/ / g.yas su mi sdug drag po che// g.yon du 'jigs ma gnas pa dang // rgyab tu u ma rnam par rol// nag po'i lho yi phyogs su ni// drag po chen po du ba'i mdog/ zhal
85a7(rgyud 'bum): gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa/ / thod 'phreng gis brgyan gtsigs pa'i tshul// de yi mdun du rnam rgyal ma// g.yas su rnam par rgyal ba ma// rgyab tu mi sdug ma gnas la// g.yon du gzhan
85b1(rgyud 'bum): gyis mi thub ma'o/ / lha gter mnyam gnas nub phyogs su// zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa// mdog ser rgyu ma'i 'phreng bas dkris// shin tu bzhad pa'i tshul du gnas// de yi mdun
85b2(rgyud 'bum): du nag mo che/ / g.yas su drag chen drag shul chen// rgyab tu nag sbom ma ni gnas// g.yon du bzang mo mche ba can// nag po khyab byed byang phyogs su// zhal gcig phyag bzhi spyan gsum pa/
85b3(rgyud 'bum): char sprin nag po'i mdog 'dra ba// shin tu gdangs shing ljags 'dril ba// de yi mdun du dbang mo ste// g.yas su zla ba mo zhes bya// rgyab tu drag tu sdang ba la// g.yon du rna ba 'phyang ba'o//
85b4(rgyud 'bum): gtso bo nag po chen po yi// shar lho mtshams kyi gnas bzhugs pa// gtsigs pa can ni shel gyi mdog/ stag lpags gos kyis dkris pa'o// mdun du lha mo 'phrog byed ma// g.yas su
85b5(rgyud 'bum): 'bar byed ma gnas la/ / de yi rgyab tu 'jig byed ma// g.yon du yul skyong ma gnas so// gtso bor gyur pa'i sku yi ni// lho nub mtshams su bzhugs pa ni// mi sdug pa ni du ba'i mdog/
85b6(rgyud 'bum): shin tu mi bsrun gzugs 'chang ba// gzig gi ko ba rlon pas dkris// mdun du 'jigs byed drag mo che// g.yas su gzugs chen mo zhes bya// rgyab tu mche ba gtsigs ma ste/
85b7(rgyud 'bum): g.yon du thong can ma yin no// nag po chen po'i sku yi ni// nub byang mtshams kyi bgrar bzhugs pa// dga' bar ldan pa pang dmar mdog/ glang po'i pags pa 'dzin pa'o// de yi
86a1(rgyud 'bum): mdun du thod 'phreng 'dzin/ / g.yas su 'phreng ba 'dzin ma ste// rgyab tu tri shU la 'dzin ma'o// g.yon du ltos 'gro bsnams pa'o// gtso bo nag po chen po yi// byang
86a2(rgyud 'bum): shar mtshams su gnas pa no/ / log sred can ni rdza gsar mdog/ spre'u'i pags pa 'dzin pa'o// de yi mdun du ral grim// g.yas su dgra sta 'dzin ma ste// rgyab tu rdo rje mnga' thogs
86a3(rgyud 'bum): ma g.yon du rdo rje'i gzhu ma'o/ / khro bo'i pho nya 'di dag ni// zhal gcig phyag bzhi gar gyis rol// dang po gri gug thod pa 'dzin// gnyis pas Da ma ru dang ni// tri shU la ni 'dzin par
86a4(rgyud 'bum): mdzad/ / pho nya'i rnal 'byor ma 'di dag/ 'di dag phal cher zhal gcig la// phyag gnyis gri gug thod pa can// nag mo ser dang dmar ldang ste// phyag rgya lnga dang ldan pa'o// dur khrod
86a5(rgyud 'bum): gnas su rol bar mdzad/ / pho brang de yi phyi rol du// zhing skyong rnams kyis yongs su bskor// ka Ta ha re ka taM shing // shin+ta pa la yab yum can// ko la kir ni ro yi shing // g+han d+ha pa
86a6(rgyud 'bum): la yum dang ldan/ / d+ha ra par+Na pa yi shing // aM gi pa la yab yum sbyor// ko Tir d+hi ba pa d+hi shing // dz+wa la pa la yab yum sbyor// b+hi ra tsarte a mA'i shing // shwa ra d+ha sa gnyis med gnas//
86a7(rgyud 'bum): o Ta dbyangs can ka na ka'i// ka pA la yi lha srub byed// saT b+ha rur dza ti'i 'bras// g+han stong dpa lhan cig sbyor// oM la pU ri ra ma Na// ha ti ba yi rna ba can// ha na mo ha ya ba yum
86b1(rgyud 'bum): sbyor/ / karmi ra bar rtsa ba'i sdong // tsan d+ha sa ni go Ta'i bdag/ ma ra Ni par thang sgron shing // 'byin pa k+She tra pA lar ldan// nA ga ba ra ras shing can// keng rus ldan pa rol bar 'gyur//
86b2(rgyud 'bum): suN+ye par ri dzi lu'i shing // pu yi rkang pa rtag tu rol// dzA lan d+ha rar khang brtsegs shing // bum pa can de bde bar rol// b+ha sna gu bar drag klog 'khrug/ dza Ta tri pa mnyam par gnas/
86b3(rgyud 'bum): sos par ni tri la sha yi shing // sgra gcan bsgrags pa'i yul dang bcas// tsa ri Ta pa'i ka ran tsar// mdzes pa shag ti can yul ldan// o Ta ya bar a shog ka'i// shin tu sgra gcan
86b4(rgyud 'bum): gsang mor bcas/ / gzung 'dzin sa sar ka ko li// sred pa dpa' bo dbang phyug bcas// k+Shi ri ke par sa la'i shing // lhun po 'bar ba dbang phyug bcas// k+Shi ri ki sar sa la'i shing // lhun
86b5(rgyud 'bum): po 'bar ba lhan cig bcas/ / b+ha yang ma 'bur 'byung po'i shing // stobs chen 'jigs pa gnas byed pa'o// pu Ta nar ni d+ha du pa'i// a b+ha ke pa brtul zhugs 'dzin// rA dza g+hi ha ra dza paM
86b6(rgyud 'bum): na/ sna chen ji li sgra gcan no// khang pa can du rang byung brag/ thub dka' rgyal mtshan 'dzin mar bcas// ma hA tra yer tsan dan shing // sna tshogs dbang phyug dbang bskur bcas/
86b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag k+She Ta pA la ni// ning skyong nal gcig phyag bzhi pa// gr-i gug cang te'u g.yas pan// g.yon pa zong khrag rtse gsum can// yum ni so so'i phyag mtshan ldan// skye gnas las
87a1(rgyud 'bum): byung sgra sgrogs mdzad/ / rtag tu sgrub pa po rnams kyi// lus la yang dag gnas nas ni// dngos grub ster byed stobs mchog byed// 'di dag zhing skyong thugs brtse
87a2(rgyud 'bum): bas/ / rtag par mtshan mo 'du bar mdzad// 'di dag sa gsum khyab pa ste// sna tshogs mdog can 'bar ba'o// oM shAn+tiM k+She pa hUM phaT/ oM ma hA smi ti hUM phaT/ oM b+ha laM pu hUM phaT/
87a3(rgyud 'bum): oM shaM ka ri hUM phaT/ oM kA lA dI pa hUM phaT/ oM dza ya b+ha laM hUM phaT/ oM be pu bA ga hU~M phaT/ oM bar+Na sa na hUM phaT/ oM k+She tre pA la ha hi hU~M phaT/ oM ki lo ki l-i pheM pheM phaT pheT/ k+ShaM k+Shi k+ShaMk+ShA
87a4(rgyud 'bum): ka ha ka ha/ hri hri hri hI/ pa tsa pa tsa/ hUM hUM/ phaT phaT/ ha hA/ ta tA ra rA ra rA/ rbu kr-i kru kruM/ khaM baM l+r-i khaM/ d+hud+hud+hu d+hA/ nar Ni/ kaM kaM kaM kaM/ tsu ts+ya ts+ya tsa/ kr-i kr-i kr-i kr-i/ saM sa sa
87a5(rgyud 'bum): saM yaM yaM yaM yaM/ pheM pheM pheM dze/ d+hU d+hU d+hA nAM/ tsA tAM kAM k+ShAM/ glu glu g+hu g+hu/ paM baM paM paM swA hA/ yul ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ru// drag po'i zhing skyong nyi shu bzhi// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo la/
87a6(rgyud 'bum): sa gsum rnam par khyab nas gnas// 'di dag gsang ba'i sngags yin te// gzhan du nam yang 'khrul par 'gyur// oM DA ka nI/ ka ka k+Sha ta na/ b+ha ba baM d+ha na/ kha kha khA hi/ ban d+ha na/
87a7(rgyud 'bum): sar+b+ba duSh+paM/ ha na ha na/ g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ sarba pA pa a mu ka s+ya shAn+tiM ku ru hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ 'di dag grub pa'i rnal 'byor ma// dngos grub stsal bar the tsom med// 'di nyid
87b1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dgod pa yis/ / sna tshogs 'phrin las byas pa ste// dur khrod brgyad kyi bdag po mchog/ pho nya legs brten 'khor lo yin// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i
87b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyud las/ dur khrod kyi bdag po rnams dang / pho nya ba khyad par ba rnams dang / ma mo dang zhing skyong gi 'phrin las bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas gnas
87b3(rgyud 'bum): yang nyi shu bzhi/ / gsang ba'i mgon po 'di nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor pho brang gnas pa'o// mkha' 'gro'i gsang sngags bstan par bya// pho nya legs skyes rnal 'byor ma// rgya mtsho dang ni ro
87b4(rgyud 'bum): yis ni/ / phye ba'i rdo rje nor bu dang // pad+ma ral gri'i rigs dang ni// bde gshegs ye shes dam tshig gis// sna tshogs sha za'i ma mo rnams// gnas skyes yul dang grong gnas pa// klu
87b5(rgyud 'bum): yis mtshon pas kun tu phye/ / oM b+hai ra khi ni swA hA/ Du tri ni/ Da sha ka ra li ni/ dzA la mu khi ni/ bA yu be ga ni pra tsaN+Di Ni/ ru dra ak+Shi Ni/ ma hA se ni/ a se ni ya ma ni/ kIrti ni/ lak+ShA NaM/
87b6(rgyud 'bum): bI dza ye ni/ shrI dza na ye/ shrI dza ya ka ra Ni/ shrI badz+ra Ni/ kaM kA li ni/ kA la rA tro No/ pra kro d+ha mu khi ni/ kA la dzi hA ni/ kA rA li ni/ badz+ra b+hai ra ba ka ra Ni/ d+hu ru si ni/ ya ni ma na aM kiran/
87b7(rgyud 'bum): mr-i ka ra sa hi sA na~M/ rat+na mA li ni/ su la a k+Shi ni/ ku su li no/ Sha d+hiNi/ badz+ra tha b+ha Ni/ badz+ra kA la ya ni/ sam pa R+Sha Na~M/ ka mni b+hi/ tsi tha li ga ni/ shu ki ni/ sarba d+ha ni/ su tra
88a1(rgyud 'bum): pA las sa ni/ pad mA ShInr-i/ dza la dza la kha Di b+ha bad+d+ha d+hA na/ shrIk+to radz+dza tsaN+Da le 'an/ tsar+N+Na mu khi ni/ haM sa wa r+Na Ni/ wa ki le shA ra NaM/ b+h+r-i ta r+ra dra ye/ kar Nis
88a2(rgyud 'bum): ka b+hI rus ni mr-i d+ha nA d+hi/ g+ha ri Na sho shA NI/ su shrI b+ha/ b+hi du bA ra Ni/ shrI mr-i khi ni/ be ra ka pi ni/ ka li ni/ pa ri Ni thA ye/ pad+ma ni/ na gra pa a k+Shi ri/ b+hI ma la rba gr-i ni swA hA/ pak+Sha bak+Sha sa
88a3(rgyud 'bum): yo ga~M na~M kA me shwa ri laN+Da pulA garta gAd+d+ha gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM phaT/ chos brgyad dang ni nye ba dang // nyi shu dgu dang dgu stong dang // ni rgyas dbang dang mngon spyod k+Shi// las ni the tsom med 'grub pa'o// dbya
88a4(rgyud 'bum): gu drag po'i pho nya dang / / chu tshod kyi nim mo dang // 'pho ba gnod sbyin brgya phrag gnyis// thun ni pho nya brgya dag go/ dus sbyor bcu gnyis gnas pa'i yul// nyi shu rtsa bzhi de yi phyed// rtsa rlung
88a5(rgyud 'bum): yi ge khams la rgyu/ / 'ching grol tshar gcod rjes 'dzin pa'o// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ phyi dang nang gi dngos po po nya ma'i las bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu
88a6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// nag po chen po gtum pa ni// zhal gdangs mche gtsigs ljags 'dril cing // a la la yi sgra sgrogs pa/
88a7(rgyud 'bum): rab 'jigs bzhengs pa'i stabs kyis ri// gsang ba mchod byed lha mo brgyad// kun nas gar gyis rol pa ste// 'di yis 'phrin las dbang thob byed// oM badz+ra ka wu ma hA kA lA ya hUM hUM
88b1(rgyud 'bum): phaT/ oM gr-i d+ha sa gA ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM b+ha ga byA g+hA ya hUM hUM phaT/ oM b+han su ba rA ya hUM hU~M phaT/ oM si ma lA ya hUM hU~M phaT/ oM b+hAn She NA s+yai hUM hU~M phaT/ oM kro ne d+ha ka rA s+ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM ulpA kA
88b2(rgyud 'bum): s+ye hUM hUM phaT/ oM ga na gA s+yai hUM hUM phaT/ 'di ni dpal nag po chen po 'khor lha mo brgyad dang bcas pa'i sngags so// mtshan phyed dus na gtor ma 'bul// sha lnga dang no bdud rtsi lnga// myos
88b3(rgyud 'bum): byed stobs dang bcas pas mchod/ / gsang ba sgrub pa'i mchog tu bshad// bsnyen pa sngon du song ba yis// dben par dug dang tsha ba dang // sa la dgra bo'i gzugs bya ste// gro ga 'am ni ro
88b4(rgyud 'bum): ras la/ / rgya skyegs dug dang khrag rnams kyis// bya rog mo yi rus pas ni// gzugs bris de yi snying khar ni// e yi rnam pa'i 'khor lo la// mA ra ya yi mtha' can gyi// man ngag bzhin
88b5(rgyud 'bum): du bri bar bya/ / de nas rkang pa nas brtsams te// dril la dur khrod sgra yis dkris// sngar gyi gzugs kyi snying kha ru// bcug ste tshigs dang lci ba sogs// dug dang bcas pa'i tsher ma gzug/
88b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas sngags pa 'dod lha yi// nga rgyal chen po rab ldan pas// snying kha'i hUM las 'od 'phro bas// lha la bka' bsgo rnam shes ni// man ngag can gyis dgug par bya// oM badz+ra ma hA kA la che
88b7(rgyud 'bum): ge mo A ka rA dza/ pa hUM baM hos dgug pa dang // gzhug dang bcing dang myos par bya// de nas cha ba dug gis brag/ de bzhin bdun phrag nyi shu gsum// zla ba gcig tu las sgrub la/
89a1(rgyud 'bum): drag po'i thab tu tsher ma dang // bla ma'i me la bsro bar bya// des kyang 'dud par mi byed na// bstan pa bde la gnas pa'i phyir// snying rje chen po rab bskyed de// gri
89a2(rgyud 'bum): lcags las byas mtshon gyis gtub/ / khrag dang dug dang tsha ba dang // tsher ma ling gar bcas te bsregs// thal ba bla ma'i man ngag ltar// mnar dang chu bor dor bar bya// gzhan yang mi shis
89a3(rgyud 'bum): thod pa la/ / dug gi sbu gus gzugs bris te// de yi lce la ud ma ni// ming spel bris la zod pa gnyis// kha sbyar rgung pa nag pos dkri// nag po'i gos kyis gtums nas ni// mi shis
89a4(rgyud 'bum): sa phyogs dag tu mnan/ / bsnyen dang sgrub pas mnyes gyur na// 'chi dang smyo bar gyur pa ni// the tshom yod pa ma yin no// yi dgas sam ni dgra bo gang // gro ga la ni gzugs bris la// snying khar
89a5(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'dis bskor bar bya/ / oM badz+ra ma hA ka la che ge mo mA rA ya hUM hUM phaT/ ces pa'i sngags bris gtor mar gzhug/ de nas sgrub sngags bzlas par bya// de yi rjes la gtor ma dbul// mgon
89a6(rgyud 'bum): po nag po 'khor bcas la/ / sha khrag rkang sogs bstabs byas nas// gtor mas gsad pas bsgral bya ste// dmigs par bya ba myur du rlag/ gzhan yang gdug pa pha rol de// nus pacung
89a7(rgyud 'bum): zad yod gyur na/ / rang sheng rang la dbab pa'i phyir// ngag mnan sbyor ba 'di ltar bya// gro ga 'am ni ro ras la// khrag dang dug dang bdug pa yis// gzugs ni lces khengs sngags bri ba/
89b1(rgyud 'bum): stam+b+ha ming spel ldan pas bskor// phyin ci log tu dril la bcings// zag pa'i rdzas sogs sa la ni// tsha tsha byas pa'i nang bcug la// bstim zhing mnan la mdun byas la// rnal 'byor spro bsdu
89b2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya bcing / / thun gyis brabs la bzlas pa bya// las bcol zhag bdun thun bzhir bya// de la sngar bzhin byas nas ni// gnod pa'i sa phyogs dag tu mnan// myur du 'grub par the tshom med//
89b3(rgyud 'bum): thod pa 'am ni snod gzhan du// sbyin sreg byas pa'i thal ba de// thun rdzas kyis brab ling gar bcas// yang na drag po klu la gtad// gru gsum dong bcug brdzi bar bya// kha bcad nas ni drag po yi//
89b4(rgyud 'bum): nges par thob par the tsom med// de ltar las la sbyor dus su// nyes pa bsgo ba'i thabs shes nas// srung byed nyes pa 'di ltar skrag/ bstan pa 'jig par byed pa yi// dgra bo srung byed lha khyod nyon//
89b5(rgyud 'bum): gdug pa'i sems ldan dgra 'di yis// dkon mchog bla ma la smod cing // rnal 'byor la sdang sems can 'tshe// sgrub pa po la brnyas gyur pas// dpag tshad stong du ltung ba yi// dmyal ba'i
89b6(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal myong gyur pas/ / bdag gis myur du bsgral nas ni// gzugs kyis lha rnams mchod pa yin// khyed kyis srung bar ma byed par// sdig can 'di ni myur du spongs// zhes brjod par
89b7(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / bstan pa bsrung ba'i bsam pa dang // snying rje chen po ldan pa yis// yengs pa med par byas gyur na// nges par 'grub par gdon mi za// brgya byin dag go srog kyang g.yo// sdig can dgra
90a1(rgyud 'bum): bgegs smos ci dgos/ / byang chub sems dang rab ldan ma// ngo bo nyid kyis 'grub par 'gyur// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ lha mo
90a2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo dang las sgrub pa bstan pa'i le'u sde bcu gsum pa'o/ / de nas gzhan yang bshadang bya // gsang ba'i cho ga nyams dga' bo// dpal ldan lham dral thams cad
90a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi/ sgrub pa rab tu nyams dga' ni// mgon po kun gyi gnas 'di ni// zhal gcig pa la phyag drug pa// dang po gri gug zod khrag 'dzin// spyan gsum mthing nag brngam pa yi// g.yas
90a4(rgyud 'bum): g.yon bar mas 'phreng ba dang / / Da ma ru ni 'dzin cing rdung // tha ma gnyis kyis kha tAM dang // sdigs mdzub zhags pa 'ching bar mdzad// klu brgyad kyis brgyan khrag 'dzag zhal// sa bon rang sngag
90a5(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba can/ / rgyas btab pas ni byin brlabs shing // rdo rje sems dpas dbu brgyan pa// n+ya gro d+ha yi shing la brten// bi na ya ka mnan par bsam// oM badz+ra ma hA kA la k+ShaM k+She tra bi g+h+nAM bi nA ya ka/
90a6(rgyud 'bum): nAM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ sha chen bsregs spos phul nas ni// skyo bar gyur na gsang sngags bzlas// de la gtor ma dbul bar bya// khyad par byin rlabs gyur par bya// 'phrin las thogs pa med par
90a7(rgyud 'bum): 'grub/ / oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya ma hA kA lA ya hUM phaT/ sku'i mgon po'i sngags so// oM ma hA kA la gu Na hri da hUM phaT/ yon tan gyi mgon po'i sngags so// oM badz+ra ma hA kA la rak+Sha ru dri b+ha Sha ni hUM
90b1(rgyud 'bum): phaT/ gsung gi mgon po'i sngags so// oM badz+ra kr-iSh+Na tsaN+Da mA ra ya ma hA kA la tsi ta la hriHdzaHlas kyi mgon po'i sngags so// oM badz+ra ma hA kA li ha na badz+ra hUM phaT/ yi ge bcu pa'i gsang ba'i mgon
90b2(rgyud 'bum): po'i sngags so/ / oM tsaN+De shwa rI ye swA hA/ gtum pa mo'i sngags so// oM tsaN+Di tsi kA ye swA hA/ drag mo'i sngags so// oM ka li kI ye swA hA/ zlog byed ma'i sngags so// oM ku li she Sha rI ye
90b3(rgyud 'bum): swA hA/ dpa' mo'i sngags so// oM shrI ma hA kA la ga Na me tri dzaHbeng 'dzin ma'i sngags so// oM re dan+ti ma hA kA li tri shU la sar+b+ba sha twA dzaHrtse gsum 'dzin pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra ma hA kA la kro/
90b4(rgyud 'bum): tri gaN+De sa ya hUM phaT/ gaN+DI 'dzin pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra ma hA kA la te tsi tso ta ka ra ma rA NAM hUM phaT/ rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa'i sngags so// gsang ba beng 'dzin mgon po yis// lha ma yin
90b5(rgyud 'bum): kyigyi grong khyer ni/ / sum brtsegs la sogs khang bzang rnams// khro bo tsan ngan beng bsnams kyis// lha dmag bye ba rung phyur rnams// phyung nas rlag par mdzad pa yi// grong khyer 'bum phrag
90b6(rgyud 'bum): brgyad cu yang / / rlag byed bdud 'dul chen po ste// 'di nyid g.yon gnas lha mo ni// kun tu dgyes nas gar stabs gnas// oM shrI ma hA kA la du bo ni dza a mu ru Ta b+h+yaHoM shrI ma hA kA la trag
90b7(rgyud 'bum): rak+Sha/ bo ni dza/ mun ga shig b+h+ya/ mu shig b+h+ya che ge mo mA ra ya phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA kA la rak+Sha tri/ yak+Sha ru dzas ma ya/ sar+b+ba sha d+hu ru ru tsa pa lA ya/ ma ra Na rbang zang / nri rbang pu rbad pu
91a1(rgyud 'bum): tshal pa tshal pa ni sha ku ru sa ma ya/ che ge mo gtubs dza dza/ oM ru ru ma ma b+h+yaHma ma shad+d+ha/ tsai ta la hr-i hri/ mA ra ya cung rdung / re shaM g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya/ kA lo yaiH
91a2(rgyud 'bum): sha ni ma hA kA la yak+Sha shA sa na/ a pa ka ri na me ke na me ru ru ma ma b+h+yaHtsit+ta la hr-i hr-i rbad/ tI ri tr-i pi tr-i ka hi swA hA/ ti ka pa tra hUM/ a tra ka ti swa mo sha mo sna/ tig bug shig/ ku mi Na
91a3(rgyud 'bum): rbang shig drud song / gaN+DI 'dzin pa'i khro bo che// ma rungs klad pa 'gem par byed// tsa muN+Di ldan rol pa ste// gdug pa 'dul ba'i las la shis// kha tAM rtse gsum 'dzin pas ni//
91a4(rgyud 'bum): dgra bgegs lus ngag yid la 'debs// gtum po thogs 'bebs mig sgyur ma// sangs rgyas bstan pa skyong ba'o// gang du keng rus rgyal mtshan bsnams// bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs
91a5(rgyud 'bum): skrag byed/ / 'di nyid legs ldan rgyal po che// rdo rje bse gdong sna tshogs gdong // dkyil 'khor lha tshogs 'di dag gis// gsang sngags rim pas bstan pa'o// thun mong khyad par bye
91a6(rgyud 'bum): brag gis/ / lus kyi mtshan nyid rtags bcas pa// grub pa kun du bgrod pa'o// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor ba'i mgon po dang yum dang bcas pa'i
91a7(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags dang 'phrin las kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o/ / de nas bden pa tsam gyis ni// grub pa stsol bar mdzad pa'o// dngos grub 'byung gnas rim pa ni// yang dag
91b1(rgyud 'bum): nyid du bshad par bya/ / bya rog g.yang gzhis brgyan pa yi// nag po phyag bzhi pa yi sku// gsang zhing dam tshig ldan pas bri// de yi sku yi rten du bshad// gser dngul la sogs kyis bris pa'i/
91b2(rgyud 'bum): nag po chen po'i snying po dang // nye ba'i snying po bris pa rnams// gsung gi rten du 'dod pa'o// bya rog sogs dang rta nag snying // khyi yi snying dang mi yi snying // rin chen lnga dang bcas pa rnams
91b3(rgyud 'bum): thugs kyi rten du gzung bar bya/ / snying gi rnam pa thams cad dang // nya sha la sogs 'bru yi chan// sman gyi rnam pa thams cad dang // bsnyen pa'i gtor ma bya ba yin// rdzas dang rta gtor steng dang
91b4(rgyud 'bum): 'og/ sbeng nas dar nag gur gyis dbub// sha lnga sman lnga myos byed bcas// rgyun du thugs dam bskul phyir mchod// rta nag lug nag g.yag rog la// mgul du snying po bris la gdags//
91b5(rgyud 'bum): de yi ngo bo legs phul la// phyi yi rten du bya bar bshad// nag po ras sam dar la yang // rin chen lnga dang bcas pa yis// nag po zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa// bris pa nyin gcig gis rdzogs
91b6(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / bar chad med par rab gnas bya// gsang rten lus la bcang ba'o// sna tshogs 'bru nag dpal byas pa'i// gtor ma mi shas brgyan pa dag/ pho brang rten dang brten par bcas// nang gi
91b7(rgyud 'bum): rten du slob pa'o/ / skyes pa grir shi'i thod 'phreng ni// yon tan ldan phyir rtag tu sra// mi bsang mtshon las byas pa yi// rdo rje gri gug hUM bris pa// 'dzin las byed pa'i khyad par ro// dam tshig
92a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ / nyams dga' dben pa'i gnas nyid du// lha mo'i rten yang 'di ltar ro// rigs med kyi ni thod pa la// gsang sngags yi ge 'di dag ni//
92a2(rgyud 'bum): bris pa tsam gyis las 'grub byed// bsgrub mi dgos par nus pa 'byung // dur khrod sol bas sngags 'di bri// oM shrI de wi tsa muN+Da rak+ta tsa muN+Di/ sau ka mor/ d+ha ke saM ha si ta/ mu le
92a3(rgyud 'bum): ka ra ha ra/ kI la kI la pre k+Sha ti ta sa na sa ta b+h+rUM b+h+rUM la la ta ya/ ka pA la mA la d+ha ra Ni hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ thod pa'i nang du 'khor bar bri// phyi yi rten du bshad pa yin// bong bu nag mo'i thod
92a4(rgyud 'bum): pa la/ / rten pa lha mo'i sku bris pa// nang gi rten du bshad pa yin// nal gri'i snying ni ma nyams pa// mtshon gyi rtse la bskon pa gzhag/ gsang ba'i rten du gzugs par bya// bu mo'i thod pa
92a5(rgyud 'bum): dza ril dang / / gri gug dar gyis gtums pa dang // dri bzang mtshan gyis bdug par bya// de kho na nyid rten du bshad// de nas nub phyogs dag nas ni// gsum gyis khur nas 'ongs pa'i rdo//
92a6(rgyud 'bum): mi nag gsum gyis 'di skad brjod// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid can// rdo rje mgon po 'khor bcas pa// rang bzhin gnas nas sku bzhengs la// 'dir ni bstan bsrung bzhugs su gsol//
92a7(rgyud 'bum): lan gsum brjod nas bzhugs par bya// rol mo'i sgra dang spos dud dang // sna tshogs rol mos bsus nas kyang // 'phrin las gang 'grub mi shes bya// 'di ni rang bzhin rten yin no// dpal
92b1(rgyud 'bum): mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ phyi nang gsang ba dang sku gsung thugs kyi rten gzugs pa'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya//
92b2(rgyud 'bum): dpal ldan nag po chen po yi// bka' yi tshogs kyi 'khor gyur pa// 'di ni kun tu shis par bya// las kyi mgon po rnams dang ni// lha mo chen mo 'khor dang bcas// lha srin sde brgyad ma
92b3(rgyud 'bum): lus pa/ / pho nya mngag gzhug las byed pa'o// gzhan yang phyogs skyong bcu dang ni// klu chen brgyad dang lha chen brgyad// gza' chen brgyad dang rgyal cher bzhi// rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad de//
92b4(rgyud 'bum): gnod sbyin brgyad dang 'phrog ma'i bu// sha za dang ni ma mo dang // 'jig rten pa dang dam tshig gnas// zhing skyong ma lus 'khor dang bcas// 'di dag las kun byed pa yi// 'jig rten skyong ba
92b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhi bcas pas/ / grub pa rag stsol mdzad pa// lha dang lha min mi 'am ci// lto 'phye grul bum srul po dang // lus srul grib gnon skem byed sogs// nam mkha' lding dang dri za dang /
92b6(rgyud 'bum): 'byung po ma lus 'dus pa kun// 'di dag sgrub la grogs byed cing // mthu stobs dpung dang nus pa yis// srung zhing bar chad nges par sel// sgra gcan 'dzin pa'i rA hu la// 'di la sogs
92b7(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad la/ / tshogs kyi gtor mas tsher mchod na// dpal dang rdzu 'phrul myur du ster// 'di dag 'khor dang bcas pa yi// nye dang nye ba'i mtshan ma dang // rtags dang cho 'phrul dum
93a1(rgyud 'bum): 'byung / / sku gsung thugs kyi rtags dang ni// phyi nang gsang ba rtags gyur pa// dngos dang nyams snang rmi lam dang / sprul pa'i 'phrin las nges 'byung ba// gtso bo nyid
93a2(rgyud 'bum): dang 'khor rnams kyi/ / rim pa rjes su 'brel bar 'byung // rtags byung nas ni las la bskul// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ gtso bo dang 'khor du bcas pa mchod
93a3(rgyud 'bum): par bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o/ / // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dpal ldan mgon po chen po yi// thar pa'i grong khyer nyams dga' bar// dbang bskur cho ga/
93a4(rgyud 'bum): bshad par bya// 'dis ni bdud dang bdud kyi phyogs// de las rgyal bar byed pa yi// cho ga bzang po bla na med// dkyil 'khor bzang po bzhengs par bya// phun sum tshogs pa'i gnas dag tu//
93a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyud shes yang dag bla ma la// snod ldan dag pa'i slob ma yis// gsol ba lan gsum gdab byas la// maN+Dal me tog sngon 'gro yin// rdo rje 'dzin pa ma lus dang // rgyal ba mgon po ma lus
93a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / / dbang phyug dam pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // dbang bskur gnang bar mdzad du gsol// lan gsum brjod nas gnang gyur pas// dang po bsnyen pa brtsam par bya// mtshan ma nye ba'am
93a7(rgyud 'bum): tshul shes nas/ / de nas sngon 'gro brtsam par bya// dang po bgegs rnams nyer zhi yi// 'phrin las mchod pa gtor ma yis// ye shes lha rnams mchod pa dang // lus dang ngag dang yid
93b1(rgyud 'bum): kyis ni/ / sdig pa bral zhing bgegs dbyung ba'i// sngags dang bcas pa'i nyungs kar gyis// me sbar sreg dang bral bar bya// de rjes sa phyogs gtsang ma las// sa brtag pa dang sbyang bar bya//
93b2(rgyud 'bum): sa blangs nas ni bka' thob pas// brko zhing ro lnga bsal bar bya// de nas bsrung zhing bcag par bya// rdo rje 'dzin pa bzhengs nas ni// rdo rje gom pa'i gar stabs kyis// hUM hUM drag po'i sgra brjod
93b3(rgyud 'bum): pas/ / phyogs kun bcing ba byas nas ni// bgegs la bka' bsgo gtor ma sbyin// slob ma kun la bsrungs byas la// rdo rje mgon po chen po yi// ting nge 'dzin du gnas pa la// gsol ba gdab
93b4(rgyud 'bum): pas gnang ba sbyin/ / khyad par bdud rtsi 'khyil bas bsrungs// yang dag ye shes sems dpa' che// 'khor ba'i g.yul las rgyal byed pa// rgyal ba ma lus bstan skyong che// de nas lhag par
93b5(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa brtsams/ / sa 'dzin lha mo nyid mchod pas// bka' byin nas ni thim par blta// bum pa bkra shis yang dag ldan// ma nyams mtshan nyid ldan pa lnga// kha tshar ma nyams ras rung dkri/
93b6(rgyud 'bum): snying po sman dang 'bru lnga sogs// spros dang rin chen dag gis dgang // rgyun 'bab chu yis gang ba dang // 'bram ldan shing gis kha brgyan pa'o// de nas srung ba'i 'khor lo yi// bka' yi khro/
93b7(rgyud 'bum): bo rnam par sgom// dkyil 'khor dri yi thig le la// me tog gcal bkram lha rnams ni// bskyed cing mchod la gnyis med bstim// so shing dor dang lhas brtag pa// bsrung skud ku sha sbyin
94a1(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / de nas sems bskyed sdom gnas pas// dam tshig gsang ba sbyin par bya// khyad par lha la gsol btab nas// rdul tshon dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya//
94a2(rgyud 'bum): dang por ye shes thig gdab cing // phyi nas dam tshig nges par gdab// go rims ma nor nges pa'i tshul// srad bu shes rab can thig gdab// tshon ni byin gyis brlabs nas kyang / pra brtag
94a3(rgyud 'bum): rdul tshon rim par dgye/ / gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes pa yi// zlum bskor pho brang ling tshe dgu// dbus ma e dbyibs drag po nyid// phyi rol pad+ma 'dab brgyad pa/
94a4(rgyud 'bum): lha khyams bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'dod yon rin chen sked bad dang // dra phyed ba ku li yi 'phreng // yang na kha bang mdzes pa'i rgyan// chos 'khor ri dgas gdugs dang bcas//
94a5(rgyud 'bum): thong skam pad+ma'i 'phreng bar ldan// dur khrod brgyad kyis yongs su 'khor// rdo rje me 'od 'bar bas 'khrigs// dam tshig ye shes gnyis med pa'i// gsang sngags nye ba sngags par gnas/
94a6(rgyud 'bum): bstan zhing mchod la gsol ba gdab// nye bar brgyan cing yongs su bskor// de nas slob dpon bdag 'jug bya// sbyin sreg las ni rab tu shis// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung
94a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rgyud las/ gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar byed pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang rnam bshad bya// yang na ling tshe dgu ldan pa'o//
94b1(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma 'dab brgyad phyi rol du// mu khyud 'khor lo rim gsum la// e dbyibs zhing skyong rim pa dgod// lha dang sa bon phyag mtshan ni// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgyas mtshan// slob ma
94b2(rgyud 'bum): khrus byas rgyan btags te/ / maN+Dal me tog phyag bya zhing // ras kyis mig ni bkab nas su// dang por me tog dor bar bya// mtshan ma mthong bas legs par drang // sgo bzhi nas ni nang 'jug
94b3(rgyud 'bum): cing / / gu gul bdug cing ting 'dzin gyis// nag po chen po'i lha tshogs kyang // nges par spyan drang bstim par bya// de las nges par rtags rnams byung // yang na so so'i mgon por bskyed//
94b4(rgyud 'bum): ye shes sems dpa' byin gyis brlab// bla ma dkyil 'khor gtso bcas las// 'od 'phros rang byin brlab par 'gyur// mthong ba dri dang bdud rtsis gtor// gdong g.yogs bkrol zhing
94b5(rgyud 'bum): lha ngo bstan/ / de nas dbang po'i bye brag gis// nges par rim pas dbang bskur te// bstan pa 'dzin cing bstan pa skyong // bstan pa srung bar byed pa yi// sangs rgyas bstan pa 'phel mdza
94b6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ sku yi mgon po 'khor bcas kyis// bla med dngos grub sbyin pa'i phyir// yang dag ye shes dbang bskur ro// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // 'phrin las lha yi khyad par ro//
94b7(rgyud 'bum): me long ye shes dbang nyid can// rdo rje rigs kyi mgon po yis// dkyil 'khor chen po'i nang du ni// zhe sdang dag pas dbang bskur ro// mnyam nyid so sor rtog pa dang // bya ba nan tan chos
95a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbyings/ / ye shes lnga yi rigs kyi gtsang // nges par dbang bskur brtan par bya// 'phrin las bzhi yi dbang yang bskur// lha mo brgyad kyis las rnams 'grub/
95a2(rgyud 'bum): bum pa spyi bor byin pa dang // thod pa'i bdud rtsi blugs pa yis// gsang ba bde chen ye shes nyid// rang byung dri med dbang bskur ba'o// de rjes pa ling gtad pa yis// nus pa thogs med sbyin

95a4(rgyud 'bum): ba can la sbyin par bya'o/ / he ru ka dang nag po che// bla ma tha dad med pa la// tshogs kyi 'khor los legs mchod cing // zhabs la gtugs la smon lam btab// 'di ni thob par the tsom med//

95a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang bshad bya ba/ / dpal ldan mgon po de nyid kyi// phyogs bzhi yongs su skyong ba yi// rgyal po chen po rnam pa bzhi// shar phyogs nas ni yul 'khor srung // lce phyogs nas ni 'phags
95a7(rgyud 'bum): skyes po/ / nub phyogs nas ni sman mi bzang // byang phyogs nas ni rnam thos sras// sangs rgyas bstan pa srung byed pa// 'di nyid grub pa sder byed pa'o// rab tu dben zhing gtsang ba dang // bkra
95b1(rgyud 'bum): shis nyams dga'i sa phyogs su/ / rnam thos sras ni bsgrub par bya// sa gzhi pa yi lci bas byug/ dri bzang tsan dan dkar dmar dang // a ka ru dang du ru ka/ kha che gi wang sna tshogs sman/
95b2(rgyud 'bum): sreg cing tshogs pa'i sman du bya// maN+Dal gru bzhi mda' gang ba// dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi rta babs dang // rin chen khang pa yid 'ong ba// pho brang rin chen las grub pa// sna tshogs pad+ma rin chen
95b3(rgyud 'bum): gling / / gter dang dpag bsam ljon shing bcas// ka ba stong phrag du ma yis// rab tu rgyas shing yongs su bskor// lte ba rin chen mu khyud la// lha mo brgyad kyis yongs su bskor// bar ma
95b4(rgyud 'bum): lha khyams mdzes pa la/ / gnod sbyin chen po brgyad kyis bskor// phyi ma ra bas bskor ba la// klu chen brgyad kyis yongs su bskor// sgo bzhir gnod sbyin bzhi bkod pa// dbus su rin chen seng ge'i
95b5(rgyud 'bum): khri sna tshogs pad+ma ge sar bcas/ / de dbus zla ba dar gyi gdan// de la sku gsung thugs kyi gnas// sa bon phyag mtshan sku dgod bya// sna tshogs mchod pas yongs bskor te// 'bras dang

96a2(rgyud 'bum): dang bla re la sogs pa/ / sna tshogs dar gyi lda ldi dang // de ltar bkod pas legs brgyan nas// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas kyang // rang lhar bskyed pa'i sa bon las// 'od 'phros mdun gyi dkyil
96a3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor la/ / rab tu 'phros pas 'od du 'bar// de las dbus su rgyal chen ni// sku mdog gur kum mdog 'dra ba// rin chen sna tshogs rgyan gyis brgyan// seng ge'i khri la legs bzhugs pa'i//

96b1(rgyud 'bum): swAhA/ oM pUd+d+ha b+ha drA ya swA hA/ oM ma Ni d+ha drA ya swA hA/ oM ku be rA ya swA hA/ oM sa pra dza nA ya swA hA/ oM gu h+ya ta nA ya swA hA/ oM pA tsi kA ya swA hA/ oM ba tsi kuN+Da lA ya swA hA/ dang po lcags
96b2(rgyud 'bum): kyu'i phyag rgya ste/ / gnyis pa rin chen 'bar ba nyid// gsum pa kun nas bstod par bya// de nas gtor ma dbul bar bya// gsol ba btab nas 'phrin las bcol// de nas ye shes gshegs su
96b3(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ / der gnas pa ni bzhugs par bya// phyi rten nang rten khyad par bya// rim pa 'khor lo sngags dang bcas// mis mi mthong bar sbas te bcang // khyad par rtags ni gsal bar 'byung //

98a1(rgyud 'bum): mas zhags pa tho ba 'phyar/ / stag gi pags pa'i sham thabs can// dar gyi cod pan dag gis mdzes// skad cig gis ni bsam par bya// oM badz+ra bi ru ka ku be ra

99b1(rgyud 'bum): dur khrod de/ / gnas 'di dag tu bsam gtan bsgom// las kyi mgon po 'jigs pa'i gzugs// gru gsum pho brang la gnas pa// dur khrod gzhal yas 'bar ba ni// me dpung 'bar ba 'phro
99b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dbus/ / zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis pa// sku mdog nag cing mche ba rno// yan lag zung zhing gsus pa 'phyang // thod pa skam po'i dbu brgyan byas// spyan gsum ldang mig khro tshul ston//

99b7(rgyud 'bum): nas ni rtse la 'jig/ / las byed ma mo tsaN+Di kas// gsang ba'i mdoms sor dngas ma jug/ rtsa 'jib ma dang khrag 'thung ma// srog 'phrog mas ni las la sbyor// nyin mtshan dus las 'da' ma
100a1(rgyud 'bum): byed/ / 'di dag gsang sngags ma yengs bzlas// dus gsum dag tu ting 'dzin 'bad// rtsa ba'i sngags ni srog yin te// gsung gi dngos grub snying po yin// nye ba'i snying
100a2(rgyud 'bum): pos thugs bskul ba'o/ / ye shes sa bon mi shigs pa// dngas ma'i gnas par de bshad do// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// rim par bzlas pas bsam gtan 'grub// rtags
100a3(rgyud 'bum): rnams nye bar ma byung na/ / 'bad pas bsten cing mchod par bya// gzhan du 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// oM ma hA kA la gu Na hri da hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kA la tra ga shad dzaHma hA kA la sid+d+hi yi du dza/ A li kA li
100a4(rgyud 'bum): mnyam ldan pa'i/ / rtsa brgyad 'phreng ba rab tu bsgrags// rim par byin rlabs ldan bya'i phyir// bzlas pa brgya rtsa brgyad du bya// bgrang 'phreng nus par ldan pa yis// las ni myur bar shes pa
100a5(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / shel gyis zhi ba chen po 'grub// mu tig gis ni rgyas pa la// dreng po'i so yis gsad pa 'grub// de gnyis 'gyur ba bong bu'i so// sdang dang bskrad pa rnga mo'o so// ka sogs rnam
100a6(rgyud 'bum): ngag yum bcu drug/ byis pa 'tsho byed dbang sogs la// dbyangs dang gsal byed rnams bsres pas// bzhi yis lhag pa'i pad 'bras shing // lung tang dmar po bdun gcig drug/ yang
100a7(rgyud 'bum): na tsan ngan 'bru dgu 'am/ / rgyu skar phyed pos grangs mnyam pas// lung tang nag pos rmongs byed nus// dbyangs dang gsal byed phyed sbyangs pas// ru rag sha ni mngon spyod la// de lta'i cho ga
100b1(rgyud 'bum): shes pa yis/ / tshar gcad phan gdags las rnams spyad// gsang sngags yi ge'i 'khor lo ni// mgal me bzhin du bskor bar bya// de ltar dus bzhir bsgrub par 'gyur// des ni nye bar 'grub
100b2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / des kyang grub par ma gyur na// rang nyid ye shes nag po yis// gdug pa 'dul bar bsams nas ni// las byed mgon po'i srog rtsa 'phrog/ de ltar bskul bas las la sbyor//
100b3(rgyud 'bum): gzas pa po de sgrol bar byed// gal te las la 'gyangs pa na// srog gi thigs pa blang ba dang // gsang sngags snying po go bzlog cing // lto ba dkrugs pa'i las byas na// shis bstan par 'gyur/
100b4(rgyud 'bum): bste// srog ni dmar len byed par 'gyur// ma rungs 'dul ba'i las 'di dag/ sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba las// gzhan du byas na nyes par 'gyur// sbyin sreg dang ni mnan pa dang //
100b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin zor dgye las bya ba// gsad pa rang gshed gnad la dbab// de las myur bar rtags byung tshe// thugs dam bskang zhing gtor ma 'bul// tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i mchod pa dang // rnal
100b6(rgyud 'bum): 'byor nar mar 'grub par 'gyur/ / dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung po'i rgyud las/ las nye bar sgrub par bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// / de nas
100b7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang bshad par bya/ / dpal ldan lha mo 'khor dang bcas// nag mo mngon par 'byung ba yi// las kyi dngos grub cho ga bshad// dam tshig gsang ba'i sngags pa yis// brag nag rtse
101a1(rgyud 'bum): mo rno ba yi/ / kha lhor bltas pa'i brag phug gam// gzhan yang ri bo'i zom mam shaM gcig dur khrod ma mo'i gnas// rab tu 'jigs pa'i gnas mchog tu// maN+Da
101a2(rgyud 'bum): dang ni mchod pa dang / / gtor ma legs par bshams nas ni// sha chen bsregs spos phul nas kyang // bar chad bgegs rnams bskrad par bya// gru gsum khrag dang dug gis byug/ dug shing
101a3(rgyud 'bum): tsher ma can gyis rtsig/ gzhan yang ling ga byas pa la// mi ba sad lcags kyu tri shU la// de yi lus la gdab par bya// tshil chen mar me zur gsum pa// btang nas bdag nyid lhar bskyed
101a4(rgyud 'bum): la/ dkyil 'khor gsum la legs gnas pa// ma hA kA la phyag bzhi pa// mdog nag khrag 'dzag me dpung dbus// zhal gcig spyan gsum 'bar ba ste// g.yas kyi dang po chu gri dang /
101a5(rgyud 'bum): 'og ma tri shU rtse gsum pa// g.yon gyi dang pos mda' gzhu dang // gnyis pas mgo bo khrag 'dzag bsnams// dur khrod kyis brgyan sham thabs can// de yi g.yas dang g.yon gnyis su// sha za
101a6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis ni gnas par bsam/ / las kun byed pa'i pho nyar bskul// dang po lha mo chen mo ni// e dpas gsang sngags las grub pa'i// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// spyan gsum shin tu
101a7(rgyud 'bum): sku mdog gnag/ shin tu brngam zhing sgeg pa'i sku// g.yas kyi dang po ral gri 'chang // 'og ma shag ti 'bar ba can// g.yon gyi dang po thod khrag 'dzin// 'og ma kha T+wAM bsnams pa'o//
101b1(rgyud 'bum): ral pa kham nag gyen du brdzes// mche gtsigs thod pa dug sbrul brgyan// glang po'i stod g.yogs stag sham dang // re lde nag po'i sham thabs gsol// bong bu gA dmar stengs na ni// phyed krung
101b2(rgyud 'bum): 'bar bas bzhugs pa'o/ / yang na zhal gcig phyag gnyis ma// ral gri ne'u le'i rkyal pa 'dzin// dam tshig bskyed la ye shes dgug/ 'phrin las bcol bar bya ba'o// oM shrI ya de bi kA li kA/
101b3(rgyud 'bum): li ma hA kA li b+h+yAM hUM/ oM ru ru ro ru bi tiSh+Tha bA to si tri tsa pa la a shug me b+h+yo dzaHma hA kA li de wI ka rA li bi kr-i ta kA la ra tri ni tsaN+Da rU pi Ni hUM hUM phaT/ rag mo tsi ta kha rag ma hUM b+h+yoHoM ma hA kA li de wi gr-ih+Na ba
101b4(rgyud 'bum): l-i da kha kha khA hi khA hi da ha da ha ha da te/ pa tsa pa tsa/ mA ra ya mA ra ya/ s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya/ khA hi hUM phaT/ bdud rtsi lnga dang sha lnga dang // skyes pa grir shi'i stong khrag gis// nag po chen po'i gtor mar
101b5(rgyud 'bum): blugs/ / ma nyams grir shi'i baM blangs la// ma hA ru dra bstim nas ni// mgo bo lho nub mtshams su bstan// rkang pa byang shar mtshams su bstan// gan kyal bzhag la bsgul bar bya// de mi
101b6(rgyud 'bum): sha dang khrag dang ni/ / pags pa tshil bu rkang mar bcas// klad pa klang rgyas zhag dang ni// dbang po lnga dang dong snying lnga// rus pa'i bye brag thams cad kyis// ye shes nag po chen po dang // dpal
101b7(rgyud 'bum): ldan nag mo re ma ti/ / las kyi mgon po 'khor dang bcas// pho nya bran g.yog dur khrod gnas// DA ki'i tshigs kyi thugs dam bskang // de yi sha yi tshogs rnams kyis// nag po stong gi thug
102a1(rgyud 'bum): dam bskang / / de yi khrag dang chu ser gyis// ma mo bye ba'i thugs dam bskang // de yi chu rgyus rus pa rkang // sha za 'bum gyi thugs dam bskang // mkha' 'gro lnga dang lha
102a2(rgyud 'bum): mo brgyad/ / de yi 'phrin las mgon po dang // sha za 'khor dang bcas la dbul// phung po bsgral ba'i tshogs kyis mchod// rnam shes bsgral ba ye shes bsgyur// mi bskyod pa yi zhing khams
102a3(rgyud 'bum): su/ / rgyal ba'i sras su skyed pa yin// rnal 'byor 'chi ba slu ba dang // bar chad thams cad zlog par byed// ma rungs bstan la sdang zhing 'tshe// sgrub la gnod na las 'di bya// gzhan du byas na
102a4(rgyud 'bum): rlag par 'gyur/ / de yi sha la sbyin sreg bya// tshil ni zhun chen mar me bya// klang rgyas thod pa'i rnga lpags bya// pags pa tshogs kyi gdan du bya// bsregs pa'i rus pa tsha tsha bya// 'di ni mamo
102a5(rgyud 'bum): po 'khor bcas tshogs/ / mnyes par gyur cing thugs dam bskang // gzhan yang phran tshegs las kyi gsang ba rab tu bshad par bya'o// dkyil 'khor ba'i lha'i 'phrin las kyi
102a6(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor dang rab tu ldan pas zhi ba'i las sgrub pa la ni/ bil ba la sogs pa la sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad du bya'o// 'bras ldan gyi shing gang las rgyas pa'i las sgrub na stong phrag gis bya'o//
102a7(rgyud 'bum): khA Di ra'i shing dang dmar ba'i shing gis ni dbang gis sgrub na khri phrag gis bya'o// shin tu rtsub pa'i tsher ma dang ldan pa'i shing dag gis ni mngon spyod la 'bum phrag gis bya bar shis so// bskrad pa la
102b1(rgyud 'bum): ni shing gi lo ma rlung mar byung ba'i tshe sa la ma lhung bar blangs te/ / gzugs brnyan bris nas yul gzhan gyi hor khra la btags te gtang bar bya'o// gal te bzlog par 'dod na zhi ba'i sbyin sreg
102b2(rgyud 'bum): gi thal bas gtor zhing ba ser skya'i 'o mas lus bkrus na zhi bar byed do/ / rus phye sna tshogs pa la khrag byugs te gzugs brnyan bris la dgra bo de'i phyogs su gtor bas ni sha za chen pos 'jigs
102b3(rgyud 'bum): par byed do/ / yang na ce spyang gi sha la sbyin sreg byas te dur khrod du thal ba phyar nas/ lhag ma gzas pa po'i sgo la gtor nas btang na dur khrod kyi ce spyang gi tshogs rab tu 'du zhing du la sgo la sder
102b4(rgyud 'bum): mos 'brad par 'gyur ro/ / de lta bu lan gsum byas na ce spyang gis za bar 'gyur ro// gang du thog gis shi ba'i rus pa la rab tu bsngags te ri bong gi thod par bcug ste shing rkang gcig pa'i rtse mo
102b5(rgyud 'bum): la btags na thog 'bab pas 'chi bar 'gyur ro/ / yang na de nyid kyi gzugs byas te de nyid dang rigs mthun pa'i rus pa rnyed na nyungs kar gyis brdeg cing / pha mes kyi dur khrod du grib so lhags
102b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dang sbas te gtor mas mnan cing dong brus par spras la/ ro bsregs pa'i g.yam pas mnan na rigs 'chad par 'gyur ro// grog mkhar gyi sa la gzugs byas la/ de la dug dang til
102b7(rgyud 'bum): mar gyis byugs la 'bras phub kyi me la rab tu bsro zhing sngags brdegs na rims tsha ba chen pos btab par 'gyur ro/ / gzhan pa la ni spra tshil gyis byugs shing tsher ma'i rigs mang po btab
103a1(rgyud 'bum): par byas nas du ma yin pa'i rlung la phyar na yul gzhan du ga shis ngan du 'chi bar byed do/ / mtsho nang gi nyes pa bzung ste gro ga la ling ga bris pa de bag zan gyi gzugs dang
103a2(rgyud 'bum): bcas pa la rab tu bsngags te slar btang na chu grir myur du 'chi bar byed do/ / bse shing la ling ga bsregs te sgo khang du sbas na spangs pa chen pos btab par 'gyur ro// gal te grog mkhar gyis
103a3(rgyud 'bum): la gzugs byas te/ / mchod rten rnying pa'i 'og tu 'byung po'i nyi ma la mnan nas ro g.yam gyis kha bcad na ni 'khor dang bcas pa nus pa med cing rab tu gnon par 'gyur ro// de nyid kyi zag
103a4(rgyud 'bum): pa gang yin pa dang phung shul nas sa blangs te gzugs brnyan byas la gnas kyi sar rus pa'i phur bus btab na ni 'on pa dang / / long ba dang / yan lag nyams pa dang / lkug par 'gyur te/
103a5(rgyud 'bum): klu gnas pa'i sar sbas na dbang po nyams pa nyid byed do// gal te sa phyogs der char mi 'bab par gyur na ka ra bI ra'i shing btsugs la/ ba dmar ser gyi 'o ma gtor bar byas pas klu gnas
103a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sar song nas/ rang ting nge 'dzin du gnas pas bka' bsgon char chen po 'bab par byed do// bal po se'u shing dang 'brug shing du bcas pa g.yab cing klu gzir na char 'bab cing sprin sang
103a7(rgyud 'bum): par byed do/ / gal te sprin dral bar 'dod na rlung lha'i gtor ma byas la rlung gi ba dan g.yab par bya'o// khrag sa tshog grangs kar nyungs rab tu sbyar te klu gnas pa'i sar tsun sreg tu byas nas bzlas pa
103b1(rgyud 'bum): thun bar du gtor na ser ba mod la 'bab par 'gyur ro/ / nyungs kar zhungs nag thal chen la rab tu bsngags nas gtor na ser ba mong la gcod par byed do// d+ha du ra'i shing la sbyin sreg byas na sno
103b2(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur ro/ / nim pa'i shing gis ni rengs par byed do// me tog ban d+hu ri ka ngang pa la sha yis 'gugs par 'gyur ro// tsan dan dkar po'i sbyin sreg byas na gang la'ang gso bar byed do//
103b3(rgyud 'bum): a ru ra'i sbyin sreg gis myur du zhi bar byed do// ma he'i 'o mas bkrus na bcings pa thams cad grol lo// a ka ru'i shing 'bras bu dang ldan po'i shing dang gcig tu bsregs te mtshor dor na rgyas
103b4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ro/ / glang po che'i rus pa la gi wang dang bcas pa'i glang sna can gyi me tog dang ser ba'i rigs kyi me tog dang bcas pas kun dga' ra bar sbyin sreg byed na 'byor pa phun sum tshogs par
103b5(rgyud 'bum): byed do/ / de dag thams cad sngags dang bcas pa'i nus pas 'grub bo// drang srong gi rus pa ri bo'i rtser sbas te 'bru snas mchod pa byas te chu bo rgyun du 'bab pa mthong ba'i sar spyod yul du gyur na
103b6(rgyud 'bum): rigs thams cad rab tu 'phel bar byed do/ / a mra'i 'bras bu dang / shing thog dzi tsin ta ka dang / dzu lu dang / dzaM ba ka rnams la snod du bkang ste gtor ma byas nas sku gzugs kyi mdun du
103b7(rgyud 'bum): phul na ni gnod sbyin gyis 'byor pa thams cad spel bar 'gyur ro/ / phur bus gdab cing nyungs kar thal chen gyis mtshams bcad par gyur na gnod pa thams cad las srung bar 'gyur ro// dpal
104a1(rgyud 'bum): mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ sna tshogs pa'i las kyi rab tu byed pa bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o// // de nas gzhan
104a2(rgyud 'bum): yang bshad bya ba/ / shin tu gsang ba bla na med// nag po mngon par 'byung ba yi// las kyi dngos grub cho ga bshad// dpal nag po chen po'i phyogs kyi 'phrin las kyi lha mo la/ shar gyi lha
104a3(rgyud 'bum): mo 'phrog mas 'gugs pa'i las byed pa'o/ / lho'i lha mo glang sna mas 'ching ba'i las byed do// nub kyi lha mo ral pa can gyis sdom pa'i las byed do// byang gi lha mo sa'i gtsug gis myos shing dbang
104a4(rgyud 'bum): du byed par 'gyur ro/ / lha mo bya rgod kyi mgo bo can mas rengs pa'i las byed do// stag gi mgo bo can mas bskrad pa'i las byed do// phag rgod kyi mgo bo can mas spror 'jug pa'i las byed do//
104a5(rgyud 'bum): ce spyang gi gdong gis dbye ba'i las byed do// khyi gdong mas ni rnam par rmongs pa'i las byed do// khwa'i gdong gis ni rnam par gnon pa'i las byed do// 'ug pa'i gdong gis ni khrag drang ba'i las byed
104a6(rgyud 'bum): do/ khyung gi gdong gis ni brgyal ba'i las byed do// gzhan yang grong khyer dkrug pa'i las bya bar 'dod na gro ga 'am shing shun la dbyangs dang gsal byed spel zhing go bzlog tu bris la/ bsnol bar
104a7(rgyud 'bum): byas la rlung gi shugs kyis bsgrub bya gang gi gzugs dang ming spel gyis 'khrul 'khor go bzlog tu bris la bsnol bar bya ste/ rlung gi shugs kyis bsgrub bya dag gi gzugs dang ming spel gyi gnas de
104b1(rgyud 'bum): myur du bskyod pa rlung dang / me dang / chu bsnol ma rnam par 'khrug par byed do// de nas yang kha sbyar dbye ba'i las dag gis pha rol gyi sde dag gi lus dang / ngag dang / sems kyi dbye bas phyag rgya dang /
104b2(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags dang / ting nge 'dzin gyis bskul nas lan bdun myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro// gal te klu'i dug gis gzas pa po 'dzin du 'jug par 'dod na ti tha la'i 'bru la byas pa'i dug sbrul gyi gzugs
104b3(rgyud 'bum): mgo gsum pa lce brgyad pa 'am/ ci rigs su byas pa de'i kha'i nang du gang la dmigs pa'i rdzas de ming dang bcas pas klu gnas pa'i phyogs su btang na sbrul gyis 'dzin pa'i las byed do// ma he dang rta'i
104b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khrul 'khor 'byung po'i nyi ma la sa ti tsa'i khu bas bris te/ de nyid kyi sha khrag dang bcas pas bskul bar gyur na ni shin tu 'khrug cing 'bye bar 'gyur ro// yang na bi ta na ro pa la tre zhes bya ba'i tshe
104b5(rgyud 'bum): ga'i thabs kyis bgegs chen po bskal ba'i gzugs la brjen nas cho ga phyag mtshan dag btsugs te las su bya'o/ / yang nas nag po gru gsum pa la nag po'i chog 'brir rnas pa dang ma du smras padag rjod
104b6(rgyud 'bum): de/ pha rol rgol ba'i phyogs su bskyal na ni myur du yul dang bcas pa rlag par byed do// sha za chen po'i gzugs shin tu 'jigs pa kha gdangs pa nag po gri gug dang zhag pa thog pa mdun du dmigs la/
104b7(rgyud 'bum): phur bus btab pa dang bcas pa'i thabs kyis pha rol gyi dpung g.yo ba dang bcas pa thog par byed do// gtor ma chen po byas te yang gtor na g.yul bshams pa las rnam par rgyal bar byed do//
105a1(rgyud 'bum): ri rab kyi gzugs la sna tshogs pa'i gzugs brnyan bkod de 'phrin las sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i phyag rgyas btab na g.yul chen po las rgyal bar byed do// dpag bsam
105a2(rgyud 'bum): gyi shing ljon pa'i tshul du bya ba las a sho ka 'am bi Da ka'i shing la brten nas thabs dang ldan pa'i yul phyogs de yongs su rgyas pa'i gnas thob par byed do/ / rdo rje bya khyung gi phyag rgya bcas la/ nges klu
105a3(rgyud 'bum): non par byas na/ de nyid kha dog dkar por gyur pa'i 'jam pa'i spyod kyis 'dul ba la/ nag por bsgyur ba'i rtsub pa'i thabs kyis dkrugs pas klu'i gnas thams cad du ltas chen po drug byung
105a4(rgyud 'bum): bas thams cad 'dar zhing mgo bo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin du 'gas pa snyam byed nas/ myur bar 'ongs te bka' nyan cing 'dzam bu'i gling du char gyi rgyun chen pos rab tu gang bar byed par 'gyur ro//
105a5(rgyud 'bum): gang du skyes pa g.yul ngor bsad pa'i mgal dum dang lag ngar gyi rus pa la dpal nag po chen po'i gzugs brnyan ji lta bar byas la bskyed pa dang bstim ste bzlas pa bya/ dben par sbas nas gsol
105a6(rgyud 'bum): ba btab na gang 'dod pa 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ / sa kun la'ang srung bar 'gyur ba dang / 'das pa la sogs pa'i don shes pa dang / de'i mdun du khrus byas te nyal na lung ston pa 'am/ dge mi dge
105a7(rgyud 'bum): gsal por ston par 'gyur ro/ / yang na dur khrod kyi ras sam dar nag po la'ang rung ste/ dam tshig dang ldan pas bris te/ mchod pa dang gtor mar ldan pas rab tu gnas par byas na sku byin
105b1(rgyud 'bum): rlabs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ / de nyid kyang rin po che las byas nas de'i mdun du gsol ba btab na zla ba drug gis nges par yang 'grub par 'gyur ro// yang na nag po chen po'i gsang sngags sngon du
105b2(rgyud 'bum): byas te shes rab yongs su 'dzin pa khri phrag gcig bzlas na thos pa'i gzungs yongs su 'dzin pa dang / blo yongs su dag pa dang / mi brjed pa'i gzungs thob par 'gyur ro// bsrung bas
105b3(rgyud 'bum): srung zhing bcings pa thams cad las yongs su grol lo/ / gang du sgrub pa po phun sum tshogs pas sku gsung thugs yon tan 'phrin las kyi rten la rab tu gnas pa mtshan nyid dang ldan par byas
105b4(rgyud 'bum): na dngos grub thams cad 'grub pa dang bar chad thams cad las bzlog par 'gyur ba yin no/ / khyad par du'ang gsang ba chen po'i dam tshig la nges par gnas pa nyid kyis phyogs dang dus thams
105b5(rgyud 'bum): cad du ye shes kyi nag po chen pos rjes su skyong ba dang / rgyang ring po nas kyang nges par gzigs par mdzad do// 'jigs pa thams cad las rab tu sgrol bar 'gyur ro// stobs dang
105b6(rgyud 'bum): tshe dang / dpal rab tu ster cing mi zad pa'i ye shes thob par byed pa dang / nyam nga ba dang bag tsha ba med par seng ge'i stobs kyis rgyu zhing / bdud kyi ris kyi phyogs ma lus pa pham zhing skrag
105b7(rgyud 'bum): ste 'gas pa tsam byed par 'gyur zhing rgya mtsho chen po'i mthar thug par 'byer bar 'gyur ro/ / gang gis gtum pa dang / dpa' ba dang / drag po'i brtul zhugs kyis kun tu spyod la
106a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin mi shigs par 'gyur ba med pa'i tshul gyis khyab par rgyu ba'o/ / gnas kyi mkha' 'gro ma dang / pho nya'i mkha' 'gro ma dang / 'jig rten gyi mkha' 'gro
106a2(rgyud 'bum): ma dang / dam tshig gi mkha' 'gro ma dang / sha za'i mkha' 'gro ma'i dbang phyug tu 'gyur ro// rdo rje rigs kyi mkha' 'gro pho nya mo drug cu rtsa bzhis kyang 'phrin las thogs pa med par 'grub
106a3(rgyud 'bum): par byed do/ / zhing skyong chen po dang nye ba'i zhing skyong nyi shu rtsa bzhi po dag gis kyang 'phrin las thogs pa med pa sgrub par byed pa'o// gdul dka' ba ma lus pa 'dul zhing 'jig rten gsum las
106a4(rgyud 'bum): rnam par rgyal bar byed do/ / gang du rgyud 'di 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / 'dzin pa dang / sems pa dang / de bzhin du gang gnas pa dang / rnal 'byor du gang gnas pa la nye bar skyob par
106a5(rgyud 'bum): byed do/ / nye bar dgongs pas mkhyen par 'gyur ro// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyud las/ sa gsum du sgrub pa'i dbang phyug tu bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//
106a6(rgyud 'bum): de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba mngon par 'byung ba'i gnas// drang srong thub pas yang dag bstan// nges par gsang ba 'dzin gyur pa// rgyal ba yon tan 'byung
106a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gter/ / ye shes mgon po chen po dang // las kyi mgon po du mar bcas// dpal ldan lha mo nag mo ni// 'khor bcas dkyil 'khor bstan pa ste// skal ldan lam 'di 'dzin pa gang /
106b1(rgyud 'bum): nga yis lung bstan gyur pa yin// gdug pa rnams ni gzung ba'i phyir// mkhas pas snying rje bskyed nas ni// cho ga kun mchog gis rab sprug/ bdag nyid ji bzhin sems can de// de bzhin bdag
106b2(rgyud 'bum): de dam pa'i bdag/ dpal he ru ka'i go 'phang gnas// 'di la the tsom mi bya ste// sun 'byin pas ni 'grub mi 'gyur// rnam ngag rnam pa can sems kyi// rang bzhin gyis ni mya ngan 'das// ma rungs
106b3(rgyud 'bum): pa ni gang dag gis/ / skye bo bcings par gyur pa gang // de nyid thabs dang bcas pa yis// srid pa'i bcings las grol bar 'gyur// de ltar grub pa'i lam brten cing // thun mong khyad par 'grub
106b4(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / dus bzhi dag tu gtor ma 'bul// bgegs med bsod nas 'phel byed pa'o// 'dir 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dpal ye shes kyi mgon po lcam dral 'khor dang bcas
106b5(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams la gtor ma dbul bar bya ste/ sha chen po dang bcas pa'i gtor ma bshams la/ oM ba liM ma Ni raM hUM dza/ rak+Sha Ni rak+Sha Ni rak+Sha mi/ kha kha khA hi khA hi gr-i h+Na gr-ih+Na ba laM/ ma hA bi Sha NaM/ pra sA d+ha
106b6(rgyud 'bum): / ya pra sA d+ha ya/ hu lu hu lu phaT/ kha kha khA hi lA hi mA ra mA ra/ sar+b+ba ta sa na sa traM/ wa ri ha d+hi ra pra yats+tshan+tu swA hA/ oM AHhUM zhes pas mtshan phyed na gtor ma sreg spos dang bcas pa dbul bar bya'o//
106b7(rgyud 'bum): oM hAHka ha ka ha ma li ni mu khe yaM sA d+ha ya/ ma hA kA la bud d+ha dzaM/ pra ti ta si/ kA ra ya kA ra ya/ pra duny+dzan/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ mA ra mA ra/ kha kha khA hi khA hi/ shI g+h+raM/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ hu ra
107a1(rgyud 'bum): ma pa ga mdzin pa byung d+hA ba sa/ na pa dzin pa/ na pasnod / bdun pa
107a2(rgyud 'bum): ngas pa/ gsang ba bdud dpung 'dul bar byed pa'o// dpal mgon po chen po dngos grub 'byung ba'i rgyu kun gyi snying por gyur pa gdod nas rtsub pa'i tha ma tshan no// rdzogs so//
107a3(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar gyi mkhan po mehA pa N+Di a d+ha lA kar gu pa'i zhal snga nas dang / za byam cab mkhas pa chen po 'i nad 'khor lo grags kyis bsgyur ci zhus pa'o//
107a4(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ he badz+ra tan+ta ra dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ kye'i rdo rje zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rdul po/ kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig
107a5(rgyud 'bum): na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi snying po rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / bsung
107a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / thugs kyi snying po rje btsun gsang ba las ches shin tu gsang ba'ang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ e ma'o byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ rdo rje snying po
107b1(rgyud 'bum): snying rje chen po legs so legs so/ / rdo rje sems dpa' dang / sems dpa' chen po dang / dam tshig sems dpa' chen po snying po kye'i rdo rje zhes bya ba nyon cig/ rdo rje snying pos gsol pa
107b2(rgyud 'bum): gang phyir rdo rje sems dpa' lags/ / ji ltar sems dpa' chen po lags// gang gis dam tshig sems dpa' lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis
107b3(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ / rdo rje mi phyed ces byar brjod// sems dpa' srid pa gsum gcig pa// 'dis ni shes rab rigs pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar brjod// ye shes chen po'i ros gang
107b4(rgyud 'bum): ba sems dpa' chen por brjod par bya/ / rtag tu dam tshig la spyod phyir// dam tshig sems dpar brjod par bya// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ ming bsdus pa ni ji lta bu// gang gis kye yi rngo
107b5(rgyud 'bum): rje lags/ / he yi rnam pas ci zhig bshad// badz+ra yis kyang de bzhin ci// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// he ni snying rje chen po nyid// badz+ra'ang shes rab brjod par bya// thabs dang
107b6(rgyud 'bum): shes rab bdag nyid rgyud/ / de ni nga yis bshad kyis nyon// lta stangs dgug dang brda chen dang // don byed rnam mang brjod pa dang // rengs par byed dang skrod pa nyid// sde rengs byed dang mngon
107b7(rgyud 'bum): spyod dang / / ji ltar rigs par rnal 'byor ma'i// bskyed dang gnas dang byed rgyu dang // don byed ye shes rnam shes dang // lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba'o// he ru ka ni bskyed pa'i rgyu// dang
108a1(rgyud 'bum): por gcig ni bsgom par bya/ / rdo rje snying po snying rje che// dngos po nyid kyis rnam grol zhing // dngos po'i 'ching bas 'ching bar 'gyur// de yongs shes pas grol ba yin//
108a2(rgyud 'bum): dngos po med pa'ang yongs shes pas// dngos po sgom 'gyur shes rab can// dngos po med pa yongs shes pas// de ltar he ru ka bsgom bya// lus la ye shes chen po gnas// rtog pa
108a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad yang dag spangs/ / dngos po kun la khyab pa po// lus gnas lus las ma skyes pa'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das rdo rje'i lus la rtsa du lags/ bcom ldan
108a4(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rtsa rnams ni sum cu rtsa gnyis te/ byang chub kyi sems sum cu rtsa gnyis 'bab pa bde ba chen po'i gnas su 'dzag pa'o// de rnams kyi nang nas rtsa rnam pa gsum ni gtso ma
108a5(rgyud 'bum): ste/ brkyang ma dang / ro ma dang / kun 'dar ma'o// brkyang ma shes rab rang bzhin gyis// thabs kyis ro ma yang dag gnas// kun 'dar ma ni dbus gnas su// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par
108a6(rgyud 'bum): spangs/ / brkyang ma mi bskyod 'bab pa ste// ro ma de bzhin khrag 'bab cing // shes rab zla ba 'bab bshad pa// de ni kun 'dar mar rab grags// mi phyed ma dang / 'phra gzugs ma dang / rtse ba
108a7(rgyud 'bum): ma dang / g.yon pa ma dang / zung ngu ma dang / rus sbal skyes ma dang / sgom pa ma dang / dbang ma dang / skyon ma dang / 'jug ma dang / ma mo dang / mtshan mo dang / bsil sbyin ma dang
108b1(rgyud 'bum): tsha ba ma dang / brkyang ma dang / kun 'dar ma dang / ro ma dang / gzhol ma dang / rengs ma dang / shin tu gzugs can ma dang / spyi ma dang / rgyu sbyin ma dang / sbyor bral ma dang / sdug gu
108b2(rgyud 'bum): ma dang / grub ma dang / 'tshed ma dang / de bzhin du yid bzang ma dang / sum bskor ma dang / 'dod ma dang / khyim ma dang / gtum mo dang / bdud bral ma'o// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/
108b3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di rnams ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// srid gsum yongs gyur thams cad ni// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs//
108b4(rgyud 'bum): yang na thabs ni thams cad kyis// dngos po'i mtshan nyid du ni brtag/ sdom pa'i dbye ba'ang bshad par bya ste/ A li kA li ni zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / shes rab dang / thabs so// chos dang / longs
108b5(rgyud 'bum): spyod rdzogs pa dang / sprul pa ni sku dang / gsung dang / thugs so// e baM ma ya ni/ e yi rnam pa lha mo spyan// pagi rnam pa dag mar brjod/ ma ni lha mo gos dkar mo// ya yi rnam pa sgrol mar brjod// sprul pa'i 'jo
108b6(rgyud 'bum): lo la 'dab ma drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / chos kyi 'khor lo la 'dab ma brgyad dang / longs spyod rdzogs pa'i 'khor lo la 'dab ma bcu drug dang / bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo la 'dab ma sum cu rtsa gnyis
108b7(rgyud 'bum): so/ 'khor lo'i grangs kyi rim pas rnam par gzhag pa/ skad cig ma bzhi ni/ rnam pa sna tshogs dang / rnam par smin pa dang / rnam par nyed pa dang / mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o// 'phags
109a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bden pa bzhi ni/ sdug bsngal ba dang / kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam mo// de kho na nyid bzhi ni/ bdag gi de kho na dang / sngags kyi de kho na dang / lha'i nga
109a2(rgyud 'bum): kho na dang / ye shes kyi de kho na nyid do// dga' ba bzhi ni/ dga' ba dang / mchog tu dga' ba dang / dga' bral gyi dga' ba dang / lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'o// sde pa bzhi ni/ gnas brtan pa dang /
109a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad yod par smra ba dang / kun gyis bkur ba dang / dge 'dun phal chen no// zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / A li dang / kA li dang / 'pho ba bcu drug dang / dbyug gu drug cu rtsa bzhi dang / chu tshod
109a4(rgyud 'bum): sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / thun tshod bzhi ste/ de ltar thams cad bzhi'o// lte bar gtum mo 'bar ba yis// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga bsregs shing // spyan la sogs pa yang bsregs te// bsregs
109a5(rgyud 'bum): pas ri bong can haM 'dzag/ rdo rje rigs kyi le'u ste dang po'o// / sngags kyi le'u bshad par bya'o// oM a kA ro mu khaM sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma NAM/ A d+ya nuta pan+d+hatA/ oM AHhUM phaT swA hA/ 'byung
109a6(rgyud 'bum): po thams cad kyi gtor ma'i sngags so/ / dz+ra oM hrI khaM hUM/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis bon no// oM de ba bi tsu badz+ra hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ kye rdo rje'i snying po'o// sngags thams cad kyi rkang par dra
109a7(rgyud 'bum): bor oM gyi rnam pa dang / mthar ni swA hA dang / hUM laT kyi rnam pa ni nang du gzhug go// oM a ka tsa Ta ta pa ya sha swA hA/ grong khyer dkrug pa'i sngags so// a A/ i I/ u U/ r-i r-I/ la lo//
109b1(rgyud 'bum): e e/ oM o/ aM/ rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis bon no// oM trai lo kyA k+She pa chu hu hu phaT swA hA/ phyag gnyis pa'i'o// oM dz+wa la dz+wa la b+h+yo h+ye hu hu phaT swA hA/ phyag bzhi pa'i'o// oM ka Ti ko Ti badz+ra/
109b2(rgyud 'bum): huhuM hu phaT swA hA/ phyag drug pa'i'o// oM AHhUM/ sku dang / gsung dang / thugs byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so// oM rak+Sha rak+Sha tsu hu~M hU~M phaT swA hA/ sa sbyang ba'i sngags so// oM hUM swA hA
109b3(rgyud 'bum): rengs par byed pa'i 'o/ / oM aM swA hA/ dbang du byed pa'i 'o// oM khaM swA hA/ skrod par byed pa'i 'o// oM dz+r-IM swA hA/ sdang bar byed pa'i 'o// oM buM swA hA/ mngon spyod kyi'o// oM hUM swA hA/
109b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gugs par byed pa'i 'o// oM g+hu swA hA/ gsod par byed pa'i 'o// oM ku ru kul+le hrIHswA hA/ ku ru kul+le'i sngags so// a phuH'i rnam pas mtha' yas kyi gzugs brnyan byas la bdud rtsi lngan
109b5(rgyud 'bum): ni blugs/ me tog nag pos ni mchod/ klu 'dul bar byed pa'i khu bas ni byug/ glang po che'i chang gis ni mgo bo byug/ kham phor kha sbyar du ni gzhag/ ba nag mo'i 'o mas ni dgang / gzhon nu
109b6(rgyud 'bum): ma nag mos bkal ba'i skud pas ni dkri/ rlung gi phyogs su rdzing bu byas te mtha' yas der gzhag go// de'i 'gram du dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya ste/ dur khrod kyi sol bas ni rdul tshon nag po
109b7(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa'i rus pa'i phye mas ni rdul tshon dkar po/ ldong ros kyis ni rdul tshon ser po/ dur khrod kyi so phag gis ni rdul tshon dmar po/ rkun ma'i lo ma dang / skyes pa'i rus pa'i phye ma dag gis
110a1(rgyud 'bum): ni rdul tshon ljang ku ste/ rdul tshon 'di rnams kyis dkyil 'khor bzhengs so// dur khrod kyi srad bus thig gdab cing dkyil 'khor khru gsum pa bya ste/ de'i dbus su mtha'
110a2(rgyud 'bum): yas mnan pa'i kye'i rdo rje zhal brgyad pa/ zhabs bzhi pa/ phyag bcu drug gis brgyan pa/ spyan nyi shu rtsa bzhis che ba/ 'jigs pa'ang 'jigs par mdzad pa bri'o// de nas slob dpon gyi nang gi ma
110a3(rgyud 'bum): / rungs pa'i sems kyis dben pa'i gnas su sngags bzla ste/ oM g+hu ru g+hu ru/ b+hu T+ya g+hu Du/ ma sa ma sa/ g+ha Ta g+ha Ta/ g+ho Ta ya g+ho Ta ya/ a nan+tak+Sho b+ha ka rA ya nA gA d+hi pa ta ye he he ru ru kaM sap+ta pA
110a4(rgyud 'bum): tA la ga tA na nA gA nA kaR+Sha ya baR+Sha ya/ gar+dz+dza ya tar+dz+dza ya/ phuHphuHphuHphuHphuHpuHphuHphuHhUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ gal te char mi 'bab na de'i tshe sngags 'di bzlog la bzla ste char 'bab bo// gal te mi
110a5(rgyud 'bum): 'bab na de'i tshe mgo ardza ka'i dog pa ltar 'gas so/ / char dbab pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga'o// sprin dral ba bshad de/ dur khrod kyi ras la nye bar 'dug nas sngags bzlas shing dral te/ oM AR+tha
110a6(rgyud 'bum): / yash+ma shA na pri yA ya hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ sprin dral ba'i cho ga'o// pha rol gyi sde rnam par gzhig par bya ba'i phyir kha Ti ka'i sgrub pa bshad de/ kha Ti ka dang / bdud rtsi lnga dang / kuSh+ka ra ts+tshi n+da dang ldan/
110a7(rgyud 'bum): cig btags la ril bu bya ste/ sngags ni oM badz+ra karta ri he badz+rA ya hUM hUM hUM phaT/ dngos grub kyi don du bye ba bzlas shing sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum byas te/ de bsgrubs la ril ba spyi blugs kyi
110b1(rgyud 'bum): mgrin par bskor zhing bskor nas bcag na dgra thams cad kyi mgo med par 'gyur ro/ / rdo rje gri gug gi cho ga'o// lha rnams dgas par 'dod pas thig le bsgrubs te/ tshangs pa'i sa bon rgyal
110b2(rgyud 'bum): la bsgrubs nas/ ku ShA ra ts+tshin+da dang bsres la nyi ma gzas zin pa na mi bskyod pa dang btag cing btags nas dgra sta byas te/ de rkang pas mnan nas sngags bzlas te/ oM badz+ra kuSh+Ta ra pA
110b3(rgyud 'bum): Da ya pA Da ya hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ bye ba bzlas la thig le byas te gang la phyag byas pa de 'gas so// lha dgas pa'i cho ga'o// tsha bas gdung bar bya bar 'dod pas/ arka'i lo ma la phu dang /
110b4(rgyud 'bum): / ske tshe dang / tsau tra ka'i khu bas dgra bo'i ming bri zhing 'bras phub kyi me la gdungs te sngags khri bzlas so// oM he badz+ra dzA ra dzA ra sha hUM b+h+rUM hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ tsha ba'i cho ga'o// khri bzlas pas 'grub bo//
110b5(rgyud 'bum): chang skyug par bya bar 'dod pas bsgrub bya'i lte bar yaM gi rnam pa sgom zhing / maM gi rnam par gyur pa las chang lte bar bsgoms te skyug par byed par bltas na chang skyug go// rab tu myos ma dbang du bya
110b6(rgyud 'bum): bar 'dod pas mya ngan med pa'i brgyad la mya ngan med pa'i 'og tu song ste gos dmar po bgos nas myos byed kyi 'bras bu bza' zhing / ka kA ma tsi ka'i khu bas thig la byas nas sngags bzlas te/ oM a
110b7(rgyud 'bum): mu kaM me hrIHba sI b+ha ba tu swA hA/ khri yis 'ong bar 'gyur ro// zla ba dang nyi ma dbang du bya bar 'dod pas sA lu btags pa'i 'gyur ba la zla ba dang nyi ma byas nas rdo rje'i chu la gzhug cing sngags bzlas te/
111a1(rgyud 'bum): oM badz+ra arka mA tsa la mA tsa la tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha he badz+ra ya hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ bye ba phrag bdun bzlas te nyi ma dang zla ba yang dag par gnas shing nyin mtshan bye brag med par 'gyur ro//
111a2(rgyud 'bum): zla ba dang nyi ma rnam par 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga'o// oM na grA na grA zhes bya ba'i sngags 'dis dus ma yin pa'i dus su don sgrub pa'i phyir gzhon nu ma'i mig dag la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags nas/
111a3(rgyud 'bum): me tog la sogs pa'i mchod pa lngas yang dag par mchod cing snyan gsan dbab bo// bcu bzhi pa'am brgyad pa'i snga ba'i dus su bum pa la sogs pa gzhag cing 'bru mar dang a lak+ta'i khu ba la
111a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'di nyid kyis lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngag go/ / de nas mngon par bsngags pa'i a lak+Sha'i khu bas sngags pa'i mthe bong rgan po la bskus nas/ 'bru mar gyis kyang blugs la/
111a5(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nu ma la bstan te/ nga'i rdzas sus khyer smros/ de la des smras pa/ che ge mo zhes bya bas khyer ro// rdo rje skar ma'o// be Du lA be Du yA zhes brjod na glang po che 'bros par 'gyur ro// Amra
111a6(rgyud 'bum): mAr+m+ma zhes brjod na stag 'bros par 'gyur ro/ / ti witAtil+li yA zhes brjod na bse 'bros par 'gyur ro// i li mi li phuHphuHzhes brjod na sbrul 'bros par 'gyur ro// nor skyong 'dul ba'i phyag gis
111a7(rgyud 'bum): lag pa rab tu bstan na khyi 'bros par 'gyur ro/ / rdo rje ma dang / dkar mo dang / chu ma dang / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang / bdag med ma dang / sa spyod ma dang / mkha' spyod ma'i rnal 'byor
111b1(rgyud 'bum): las rengs par byed pa la sogs pa brtul zhugs can gyis byed do/ / sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas lha'i le'u bshad par bya'o// dang por byams pa bsgom
111b2(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / gnyis par snying rje rnam bsgom zhing // gsum par dga' ba bsgom pa dang // kun gyi mthar ni btang snyoms so// yang ni stong pa'i byang chub ste// gnyis pa la ni sa bon bsdu//
111b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa la ni gzugs brnyan rdzogs// bzhi pa la ni yig 'bru dgod// re phas nyi ma sngon du rnam bsgoms nas// nyi der hUM byung sna tshogs rdo rje ste// rdo rje de nyid kyis ni ra ba dang // gur bcing
111b4(rgyud 'bum): ba yang rnam par bsgom pa nyid/ / dang por ro ni rnam bsgom pa// chos kyi dbyings kyi bdag nyid brjod// de stengs rnal 'byor pa gnas nas// he ru ka nyid rnam par bsgom// rang gi snying khar re pha
111b5(rgyud 'bum): bsgom/ / de las byung ba'i nyi dkyil 'khor// der ni hUM gi rnam pa nyid// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin can// hUM las byung ba'i rdo rje ni// kha dog nag po 'jigs chen po// rdo rje lte ba'i dbus
111b6(rgyud 'bum): gnas par/ / yang ni hUM gi de nyid bsgom// hUM gi rnam par gyur bltas nas// zhe sdang bdag nyid rnam par bsgom// rdo rje skye ba nag po che// 'dam skyes sngon po 'dra ba'i mdog/ yang na sngo dang
111b7(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma'i mdog/ dad pas nges par rnam par bsgom// nam mkhar rje btsun bltas nas ni// rdo rje skye ba snying rje che// rgyan rnams thams cad 'dzin pa yi// lha mo brgyad po rnams kyis mchod/
112a1(rgyud 'bum): dkar mo ri dgas mtshan ma 'dzin// chom rkun bdud las rgyal ba'i snod// ro langs ma ni chu lag ma// g+hasma rI ni sman 'dzin cing // puk+ka sI ni rdo rje'i lag/ de bzhin
112a2(rgyud 'bum): ri khrod ma ro 'dzin/ / gdol pa mo ni cing te'u rdung // 'di rnams kyis ni gtso bo mchod// 'dod chags chen po'i rjes chags pas// g.yung mos sku la 'khyud pa nyid// A li zla ba kA li
112a3(rgyud 'bum): nyi/ / sa bon nang du son gyur pa// de nyid sems dpa' zhes byar brjod// mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin can// nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor khyab pa yi// rang gi lus mtshungs rnam par spro// /
112a4(rgyud 'bum): bsdus nas snying kar bkug pa na// yo gi zhe sdang bdag nyid 'gyur// sngo dang nyi ma mtshungs pa'i mdog/ ban du dmar po'i spyan dang ldan// skra ser gyen du 'khyil ba dang // phyag rgya lngas ni rnam
112a5(rgyud 'bum): par brgyan/ / 'khor lo rna cha nor bu dang // lag gdub dang ni ska rags nyid// sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag pa// 'di rnams phyag rgyar rab tu grags// sdang mig brgyad gnyis lo yi tshul//
112a6(rgyud 'bum): g.yon na rdo rje thod pa dang // g.yon pa nas kyang kha T+wAM ga/ g.yas na rdo rje nag po nyid// hUM gi yi ge 'don pa'i bdag/ rnal 'byor ma brgyad yongs bskor nas// dur khrod du ni mgon po rol//
112a7(rgyud 'bum): dbugs rgyu zhes bya'i rigs pa 'dis// dur khrod ces ni mngon par brjod// phyag bzhi ni bdud bzhi las rnam par rgyal ba rnam par dag pa ste/ gong du brjod pa'i gzugs dang / sku mdog dang /
112b1(rgyud 'bum): hUM las byung ba'o// phyag g.yon gyi dang po na skyes pa'i thod pa lha dang lha ma yin gyi khrag gis bkang ba/ de bzhin du g.yas kyi phyag na rdo rje// phyag lhag ma ngag gis shes rab la 'khyud pa/ shes
112b2(rgyud 'bum): rab rdo rje phag mo ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs can no// phyag drug pa/ zhal gsum pa/ g.yon dmar ba/ g.yas zla ba dang nyi ma lta bu/ dang po sngon po'o// gcer bu gong du brjod
