112b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sku mdog dang gzugs can/ phyag rnams ni pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'o// phyag g.yon gyi dang po na rtse gsum pa/ phyag g.yas kyi dang po na rdo rje/ phyag g.yon gyi gnyis pa na
112b4(rgyud 'bum): dril bu/ phyag g.yas kyi gnyis pa na gri gug/ phyag lhag ma dag gis rdo rje lu gu rgyud ma la snyoms par 'jug pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji lta ba de ltar shes rab ste/ g.yas pa dang g.yon pa
112b5(rgyud 'bum): na gri gug dang thod pa/ khams gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi ro mnan pa'o// lha'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas lha dbang bskur ba'i le'u bshad par bya'o// rang gi
112b6(rgyud 'bum): snying khar sa bon bsam mo/ / sa bon las 'od zer nag po lcags kyu'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis phyung nas/ des khams gsum du bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drangs la/
112b7(rgyud 'bum): ma mo brgyad kyis yang dag par mchod nas gsol ba gdab par bya'o// oM a b+hi Shiny+tsan+tu mAM sarba ta thA ga ha zhes sangs rgyas de rnams he ru ka'i rnam pa'i gzugs kyis de bzhin gshegs pa
113a1(rgyud 'bum): lnga'i bdag nyid kyi bdud rtsi lngas gang ba'i bum pas dbang bskur bar bya'o/ / dbang bskur ba na me tog gi char 'bab par 'gyur ro// rnga'i sgra 'byung bar 'gyur ro// gur kun
113a2(rgyud 'bum): gyi char 'bab par 'gyur ro/ / gzugs kyi rdo rje ma la sogs pa rnams kyis mchod par bya'o// rdo rje'i glu spyan la sogs pa rnams kyis blang bar bya'o// dbang bskur nas spyi bor rang gi rigs kyi
113a3(rgyud 'bum): bdag por 'gyur ro/ / 'dis ni he ru ka rdzogs pa nyid do// thun gsum du byin gyis brlabs pa'i sgom pa rnam par bsgoms nas langs te lha'i gzugs su gzhag go// dbang gi le'u ste bzhi pa'o//
113a4(rgyud 'bum): / de nas de kho na nyid kyi le'u bshad par bya'o// ngo bos gzugs med mthong ba po// sgra med thos pa po yang med// dri med snom pa po yang med// ro mong myong ba po
113a5(rgyud 'bum): yang med/ / reg med reg pa po yang med// sems med sems las byung ba'ang med// skyed byed ma dang sring mo nyid// rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod// gar ma chos ma rdo rje ma
113a6(rgyud 'bum): gdol ma de bzhin bram ze mo/ / thabs dang shes rab cho ga yis// de nyid rigs pas rtag tu mchod// ji ltar bye bar mi 'gyur bar// rab tu 'bad pas bsten pa nyid// ma gsang sprul
113a7(rgyud 'bum): dang chom rkun dang / / sa spyod me yis sdug bsngal byed// rigs lnga'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba// thar pa'i rgyur ni brjod par bya// rdo rje 'dis ni gdab pa nyid// des na phyag rgyar brjod par bya//
113b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje pad+ma de bzhin las// de bzhin gshegs dang rin chen nyid// snying rje chen po dam pa yi// rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru brjod// rdo rje'i phyag rgya g.yung mo nyid// de bzhin pad+ma'i gar ma nyid//
113b2(rgyud 'bum): las ni chos mar rab tu bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bram ze mo// rin chen gdol mar shes par bya// phyag rgya lngar ni rnam par nges// 'di rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs//
113b3(rgyud 'bum): mdor bsdus pas ni brjod par bya// dpal ldan de bzhin nyid gshegs shing // de bzhin slar yang gshegs pa nyid// 'dis ni shes rab rigs pa yis// de bzhin gshegs zhes brjod par
113b4(rgyud 'bum): bya rigs ni rnam pa drug brjod cing / / mdor bsdus pas ni rnam pa lnga// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// phyi nas rnam pa gsum du 'gyur// rigs dang 'byung ba lnga rnams dang // phung po
113b5(rgyud 'bum): lnga yi rang bzhin gyis/ / rigs dang bgrang bya 'di yis ni// rigs zhes mngon par brjod par bya// sgom pa po med sgom pa'ang med// lha med sngags kyang yod ma yin// spros pa med pa'i rang
113b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin las/ / sngags dang lha ni yang dag gnas// rnam snang mi bskyod don yod dang // rin chen dpag med sems dpa' bo// tshangs pa khyab 'jug zhi ba dang // thams cad sangs rgyas de nyid
113b7(rgyud 'bum): brjod/ / tshangs pa sgrib bral sangs rgyas nyid// 'jug phyir khyab 'jug brjod par bya// rtag tu dge bas zhi ba nyid// thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid gnas// dam pa'i bde bas de nyid de/
114a1(rgyud 'bum): bde ba rtogs phyir rnam sangs rgyas// gang phyir lus las byung ba nyid// lha zhes mngon par brjod par bya// sangs rgyas 'di la b+ha ga mnga'// bcom ldan 'das zhes brjod/
114a2(rgyud 'bum): par bya// b+ha ga rnam pa drug tu brjod// dbang phyug la sogs yon tan kun// yang na nyon mongs la sogs bdud// bcom phyir bcom ldan 'das zhes bya// gang phyir skye 'gro skyed pa yi//
114a3(rgyud 'bum): shes rab ma zhes brjod par bya// gang phyir skal ba ston pa yi// shes rab sring mo zhes bya nyid// btso blag ma dang bu mo dang // gar mkhan ma yang brjod par bya// sems can thams cad
114a4(rgyud 'bum): 'tshed pa'i phyir/ / btso blag ma zhes de bzhin brjod// yon tan 'jo phyir shes rab ni// bu mo zhes ni brjod par bya// snying rje chen po g.yo ba'i phyir// shes rab gar mar brjod par bya//
114a5(rgyud 'bum): gang phyir bcom ldan mi reg pa// de phyir g.yung mor brjod par bya// A li kA li rab brtags pas// brjod pa bzlas par yang dag bshad// rkang pa'i rjes ni dkyil 'khor nyid// nyed phyir
114a6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor brjod par bya/ / lag pa bsgyur ba phyag rgya yin// sor mo nyid pa'ang de bzhin no// gang phyir rnam sems bsam gtan ni// gang bsams de ni bsam gtan no// ji ltar pha las
114a7(rgyud 'bum): bde thob pa/ / de yi bde ba rang gis bza'// bde ba gang gis 'chi ba 'di// de yi bde ba bsam gtan brjod// de kho na nyid kyi le'u ste lnga pa'o// de nas gzhan yang
114b1(rgyud 'bum): rab bshad bya/ / spyod pa pha rol phyin mchog nyid// gang gis dngos grub mthar 'gro ba// kye yi rdo rje'i dngos grub brgyus// sgom pa po yis rnam 'dzin pa// rna ba dag la rna cha bzang // spyi bor
114b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo rnam par 'dzin/ / lag pa dag la lag gdub nyid// rked pa la yang ska rags nyid// rkang par de bzhin rkang gdub bo// lag pa'i rtsa bar dpung rgyan nyid// mgrin par rus pa'i 'phreng
114b3(rgyud 'bum): ba ste/ / bgo ba stag gi pags pa nyid// bza' ba mi 'chi bcu phyed de// he ru ka sbyor skyes bu nyid// kha dog lnga la rnam par gnas// rigs lnga dag dang mnyam ldan pa// rigs ni gcig tu
114b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam par brtag/ kha dog du ma nyid kyis ni// gang phyir dbye ba mtshon mi bya// shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang // ma mo'i khyim dang mtshan mo dang // yang na dben pa'am pas mtha' ru// sgom
114b5(rgyud 'bum): pa bzang por brjod par bya/ / cung zad drod ni thob pa na// gal te spyod pa byed 'dod pas// gal te 'grub 'gyur 'dod yod na// 'dis ni spyod pa spyad pa nyid// shin tu bzhin bzang mig yangs
114b6(rgyud 'bum): ma rang gis dbang bskur snying rje can/ / rdo rje'i bu mo 'di khyer nas// spyod pa bya bar rtogs par bya// rdo rje rigs kyi dngos med na// rang 'dod lha yi rigs kyis bya// yang na gzhan gyi rigs byung
114b7(rgyud 'bum): ba byang chubs bon gdob pa dang / / sbyang ba yis ni gzung bar bya// gal te dga' bas gru brang ste// de tshe rdo rje mchog ldan no// gal te dga' ba skyes pa na// thar pa'i rgyur ni gar byaste/
115a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje rkang pas gar// yo gis mnyam par bzhag pas byed// 'khor lo'i gzugs kyis mi bskyod pa// rna cha'i bdag nyid 'od dpag med// mgul gyi 'phreng ba rin chen
115a2(rgyud 'bum): bdag/ lag par rnam par snang mdzad brjod// ska rags la ni don yod gnas// kha T+wAM ga gzugs shes rab ste// thabs kyi gzugs kyis cang te'u nyid// zhe sdang rnam dag rnal 'byor pa//
115a3(rgyud 'bum): glu ni rnam dag sngags su gnas// gar ni bsgom pa byas pa nyid// de yi phyir na klu dang gar// yo gis rtag tu rtag tu byas// sman ni rnam par bza' ba ste// chu ni rtag par btung ba nyid// rga shrIs
115a4(rgyud 'bum): zil gyis mi non cing / / rtag tu srung bar 'gyur ba yon// rkun ma'i sgra las cod pan byas// de la hUM byung sbyar bar bya// sangs rgyas lnga yi thod pa rnams// rnal 'byor spyod pas rnam par 'dzin//
115a5(rgyud 'bum): thod pa sor lnga pa yi tshad// byas pas cod pan 'dzin par byed// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las// skra yi ska rags nyis bskor nyid// thal ba skra yi mchod phyir thogs// rnal 'byor pa
115a6(rgyud 'bum): yi spyod pas 'dzin/ / cang te'u sgra ni bzlas pa ste// kha T+wAM ga sgom shes rab nyid// rdo rje thod pa'i spyod pa yis// 'di dag bzlas dang sgom pa yin// brkam dang rmongs dang 'jigs dang khro//
115a7(rgyud 'bum): ngo tsha'i 'bras bu rnam par spang // bdag nyid kyis ni gnyid spangs nas// the tsom med par spyod pa bya// lus kyis sbyin pa byin nas ni// phyi nas spyod pa yang dag spyad// skal dang skal min rnam
115b1(rgyud 'bum): spyad pas/ / de phyir sbyin pa sbyin mi bya// bza' bca' de bzhin btung ba nyid// ji ltar rnyed pa rab tu bza'// yid 'ong mi 'ong rnam chog phyir// zhen pa tsam du mi bya'o// bza' dang bza' min
115b2(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa dang / / de bzhin btung dang btung min nyid// bgrod dang bgrod min sngags pa yis// rnam rtog nyid du mi bya'o// dngos grub rnyed pa'i slob ma gang // yang dag ye shes snang ba po//
115b3(rgyud 'bum): mnar med spang ba'i rgyu yi phyir// grub pas bla ma mngon phyag btsal// bslab dang dbang las rnam par grol// de bzhin ngo tsha'i 'bras bu nyid// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin gyi// yo gis rnam dpyang
115b4(rgyud 'bum): snying rje che/ / sbyin sreg mchog sbyin dka' thub 'das// sngags dang bsam gtan rnam par spangs// dam tshig sdom las rnam par grol// rnal 'byor ldan pas spyod pa byed// nges par sngon du lnga
115b5(rgyud 'bum): min gang / / brgya byin lta bu yin na yang // de la 'jigs par mi bya ste// seng ge'i gzugs kyis rnam par rgyu// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// rtag tu snying rjes btung bar bya// rnal
115b6(rgyud 'bum): 'byor btung dga' rnal 'byor pa/ / gzhan gyi btung bas bzi ba med// spyod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// de nas ts+tsho ma'i le'u bshad par bya'o// gang gis spun dang sring
115b7(rgyud 'bum): mor yang / / the tshom med par shes par bya// gang zhig sor mo gcig sngon dang // gnyis kyis legs par 'ongs pa yin// g.yon pa'i mthe bong bcangs pa las// bskur gyi phyag rgyar rnam
116a1(rgyud 'bum): par shes/ / gang zhig srin lag ster ba la// de yi mthe'u chung rnam par sbyin// gang zhig gung mo ston pa la// de yi mdzub mo rnam par sbyin// gang zhig srin lag ston pa
116a2(rgyud 'bum): la/ de yi mgrin pa rab tu bstan// gang zhig gos ni ston pa la// de yi rtse gsum rab tu bstan// gang zhig nu ma ston pa la// de yi mtshams ni rab tu bstan// gang zhig so ni ston pa la//
116a3(rgyud 'bum): de yi kha ni rab tu bstan// gang zhig khro gnyer ston pa la// gtsug pud dgrol bar brjod par bya// gang zhig dpral ba ston pa la// de yi rgyab ni rab tu bstan// gang zhig rkang mthil ston pa la//
116a4(rgyud 'bum): lnga yos rnam par rtse bar bya// phyag rgya phyag rgya'i lan gyis ni// dam tshig gis ni rnam par dbye// de la rnal 'byor mas smras pa// e ma bu ni snying rje che// gal te 'phreng ba lag ston na// 'du
116a5(rgyud 'bum): bar bya zhes smra ba yin/ / 'phreng ba mngon par gtang byas na// dam tshig la gnas brtul zhugs bzang // de la phyi rol zhes 'du ba// bzang po'i spyod yul gnas pa ni// de la 'du bar
116a6(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor mas/ / gang smras de ltar thams cad bya// kye bcom ldan 'das 'du ba'i gnas du lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gnas dang nye ba'i gnas dang ni//
116a7(rgyud 'bum): zhing dang nye ba'i ning nyid dang // tsAn+do 'i ba'i ts+tshan+do dang // de bzhin 'du ba nye 'du ba// 'thung gcod nye ba'i 'thung gcod nyid// dur khrod nye ba'i dur khrod nyid// 'di rnams sa ni bcu gnyis
116b1(rgyud 'bum): te/ sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po nyid// 'di ni gzhan gyis brjod mi bya// kye bcom ldan 'das gnas la sogs pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gnas ni
116b2(rgyud 'bum): dzA lan d+ha ra ra bshad/ / de bzhin du ni u Di nyid// gnas ni ko lpa gi rI nyid// de bzhin du ni kA rU nyid// nye gnas mA la wa zhes brjod// sin d+hu na ga ra nyid do// zhing ni mum+bu nir bshad
116b3(rgyud 'bum): de zhing ni byed pa'i grangs nyid do/ / de wi ko Ta de bzhin zhing // zhing ni lhags pa'i grangs nyid do// nye zhing ku lu ta zhes brjod// de bzhin arbu ta nyid dang // bA yi mchog sbyin lta ba'i
116b4(rgyud 'bum): ri/ nye ba'i zhing ni mdor bsdus pa'o// tsun+do ha ri ke la dang // lan tshwa rgya mtsho'i nang skyes dang // lam pa kA dang kAny+tsi nyid// de bzhin sor lnga nyid do// nye ba'i tsAn+do ka ling ka/ gser
116b5(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa'i gling dang ni/ / kong ka NA yang nyets+tshan+dor// mdor bsdus pas ni brjod par bya// 'thung gcod grong khyer gyi dang yang // 'thung gcong grong gi mthar gnas pa// tsa ri tra dang ko sa
116b6(rgyud 'bum): la bin d+ha gnon nu'i grong khyer ro/ / rdo rje snying po snying rje che// zhi ba'i 'thung gcod ngo' ba'o// dur khrod rab son dge 'dun dang // dur khrod rgya mtsho'i 'gram nyid do// phreng tshal rab
116b7(rgyud 'bum): rdzing bu'i 'gram/ / nye ba'i dur khrod brjod par bya// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// rnal 'byor ma rgyud kye rdo rje// rnal 'byor ma yi legs 'du ba// nyin par nyid kyang rab bshad bya/
117a1(rgyud 'bum): kye bcom ldan 'das nyi ma gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// yi dgas zla phyed bcu bzhi dang // de bzhin du yang brgyad pa nyid// rgyal mtshan/
117a2(rgyud 'bum): dang ni mtshon bskun nyid// lan bdun pa yang bza' bar bya// 'bad pas snying rje bskyed pa yis// gsang par bya bar brjod pa nyid// snying rje med na mi 'grub pas// de phyir snying rje bskyed pa
117a3(rgyud 'bum): nyid/ / thams cad gdug par gzhug pa ste// cho ga'i gtso bos dgag par bya// de la 'di ltar blta ba nyid// nyin mo bcom ldan rdo rje can// mtshan mo shes rab brtag par bya// mi bya/
117a4(rgyud 'bum): cung zad yod ma yin// rtag tu mi bza' yod ma yin// 'di la mi bsam yod ma yin// bzang ngan mi smra gang yang med// ji ltar bdag nyid de ltar gzhan// de bzhin bdag nyid nga
117a5(rgyud 'bum): mchog nyid/ / 'di ltar sems pa'i rnal 'byor bdag/ bza' dang btung ba la sogs spyad// yan lag ji snyed bsgyur ba dang // tshig rnams rab tu rgyas pa nyid// he ru ka dpal gnas
117a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs pas/ / de snyed sdug dang phyag rgya yin// shrI ni gnyis med ye shes te// he ni rgyu sogs stong pa nyid// ru ni tshogs dang bral ba nyid// ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o// rdo rje thong ba'i
117a7(rgyud 'bum): spong ba yis/ / skye bo gang dang gang rnams kyi// sha ni mkhas pas bza' bar bya// sems can de de'i dbang du 'gyur// brda dang gnas gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// /
117b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo bshad par bya'o// nam mkha'i khams su b+ha ga bsam// dbus su rnam par sgom pa ni// 'khor lo sngon du ci rigs par// lnga rnams ji lta
117b2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba nyid/ / 'khor lo sa dang chu ni sngon// ji ltar rigs par byin za dang // lha rnams kyis ni rlung chen dang // ji ltar sgom pa po 'byung ba'ang // chos 'byung las skyes 'khor lo 'di//
117b3(rgyud 'bum): 'phar ma gnyis dag skyon med pa// ze'u 'bru las ni gcig 'gyur te// gru gsum gyi ni phyi mar brjod// de dbus shi ba bco lnga yi// gdan gyi bdag nyid rnam par bsam// de yi steng du zla
117b4(rgyud 'bum): ba yin/ / zla ba'i steng du sa bon nyid// phyi nas bdud las rgyal bas mnan// gnyis 'dus pa las bde chen po// A li zla ba'i gzugs kyis gnas// kA li'i gzugs kyis snang byed do//
117b5(rgyud 'bum): zla banyi ma 'dus pa las// dkar mo la sogs rab tu grags// zla ba me long ye shes ldan// bdun gyi bdur pa mnyam nying ldan// rang lha'i sa bon phyag mtshan no// so sor rtog par
117b6(rgyud 'bum): brjod par bya/ / thams cad gcig gyur nan tan nyid// rdzogs pa chos dbyings dag pa ste// mkhas pas cho ga gsungs pa yis// rnam pa lnga po sgom pa nyid// A liM kA li mnyam
117b7(rgyud 'bum): sbyor bas/ / rdo rje sems dpa' nyid kyi gdan// yi ge las byung gong bu la// hUM phaT rnam pa'ang 'dod mi bya// sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan las byung ba'i// dkyil 'khor bdag po
118a1(rgyud 'bum): rnam par sgom/ / phyag mtshan zhal sogs gong ma bzhin// zla ba chu shel nor bu'i 'od// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las// 'di ltar thams cad rdzogs pa nyid/
118a2(rgyud 'bum): zla ba nyi ma'i rab dbye bas// A li shes rab kA li thabs// 'di las dkar mo la sogs pa// kha dog dbye bas so so yin// re zhig nang gi 'phar ma la// rnal 'byor ma lnga nges gnas pa/
118a3(rgyud 'bum): phung po lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu sgom// dbang por rdo rje gshin rje dkar// chu bdag chu yi rnal 'byor ma// lus ngan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// dbus su bdag med
118a4(rgyud 'bum): / rnal 'byor ma// phyi rol gyi ni 'phar ma la// dkar mo chom rkun ro langs ma// g+hasma rI dang puk+ka sI// ri khrod ma dang gdol pa mo// brgyad pa Dom+b+hi ni ru brjod// 'og ldan ma dang steng ldan nyid//
118a5(rgyud 'bum): mkha' spyod ma dang sa spyod brjod// srid dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyis// snying rje chen po 'di dag gnas// lha mo thams cad kha dog gnag/ drag chen phyag rgya lnga yis brgyan// zhal gcig
118a6(rgyud 'bum): spyan ni dmar ba dang / / lag par gri gug thod pas khyab// 'khor lo rna cha mgul rgyan dang // lag par lag gdub ska rags na// sangs rgyas lnga ni rnam dag pas// 'di lnga phyag rgya dag
118a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / ji ltar bdag med rnal 'byor ma// de ltar thams cad rnam par bshad// lag pa gcig ni thod pas brel// g.yas pa na ni gri gug 'dzin// g.yon pas kha T+wAM ga nyid do// stag
118b1(rgyud 'bum): gi pags pas rnam dkris shing / / ro la zhon zhing gzi brjid 'bar// phyag gnyis gyer du dbu skyes ser// nga rgyal la sogs skyon drug rnams// gcod phyir gri gug rnam par gnas//
118b2(rgyud 'bum): dngos dang dngos med rnam rtog gi/ mgo bo pad+ma'i snod du ni// bdud rnams rnam pa bzhi yi khrag/ dngos grub phyir ni btung bar bya// stong pa'i rnam pas kha T+wAM ga/ thabs kyis ro ni rnam par brtag/
118b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dis ni 'khor lo rnam bsgoms na// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// dang por nag po rab tu bsgom// gnyis par dmar po rnam par bsgom// gsum pa la ni ser po bsgom// bzhi
118b4(rgyud 'bum): par ljang ku de bzhin no/ / lnga par kha dog sngon po dang // drug par dkar po'i lus can te// yan lag drug bsgom rnal 'byor pas// dga' bral mthar yang de bzhin no// bskyed pa'i rim
118b5(rgyud 'bum): panyid dang ni/ / rdzogs pa yi yang rim pa nyid// rim gnyis mnyam par gnas nas ni// rdo rje can gyis chos 'chang do// bskyed pa yi ni cha bshad do// nam mkha'i khams ni pad+ma la// b+ha ga
118b6(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ye shes brjod/ / sgom pa zhes bya snyoms 'jug nyid// de yi bde ba 'khor lor brjod// sngon du byung ba zhu ba nyid// rig pa ji bzhin rang rig nyid// lha zhes bya ba byang chub sems//
118b7(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar 'byung ba khu ba yin// lhan cig skyes pa rnam pa gnyis// re zhig btsun mo shes rab yin// skyes bu thabs su brjod pa nyid// kun rdzob don dam dbye ba las// phyi nas de yi rnam pa
119a1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis/ / re zhig skyes bu rnam pa gnyis// de yi khu ba'ang bde ba nyid// skyes bu ji bzhin shes rab la'ang // de yi khu ba bde ba nyid// de nyid phyir na dga' ba nyid//
119a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhi yi rab tu dbye ba yis// skye med rim pa'i phyogs las ni// 'di ltar lhan cig skyes rnam bzhi// dga' ba dang po dpa' bo nyid// mchog tu dga' ba rnal 'byor ma// shin tu bde dga'
119a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad nges/ / de ba de'i thabs las thams cad rig/ dga' ba'i bde ba cung zad de// mchog tu dga' ba de bas lhag/ dga' bral dga' bas chags bral yin// lhag ma lhan cig skyes
119a4(rgyud 'bum): dga' nyid/ / dang po reg par 'dod pa dang // gnyis pa bde bar 'dod pa dang // gsum pa 'dod chags 'jig pa nyid// des na bzhi pa bsgom par bya// mchog tu dga' ba srid par brjod//
119a5(rgyud 'bum): dga' bral las ni mya ngan 'das// dbu ma dga' ba tsam nyid de// 'dis ni lhan cig skyes pa spangs// 'dod chags med cing chags bral med// dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// 'di
119a6(rgyud 'bum): la thabs dang shes rab med/ / yang dag de nyid snang ba'o// gzhan gyis brjod min lhan cig skyes// gang du yang ni mi rnyed de// bla ma'i dus thabs bsten pa dang // bdag gi bsod nams
119a7(rgyud 'bum): las shes bya/ / dman pa 'bring dang mchog rnams dang // gzhan dang gang rnams de rnams kyang // ro mnyam de nyid bsgoms pa yis// 'di kun mnyam pa nyid du blta// dman pa rnams ni dra
119b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i don/ / mchog ni dngos por brjod par bya// dbu ma gnyis kyis spangs pa nyid// gzhan rnams zhes bya dbang po drug/ gang rnams de rnams brtan dang g.yo// 'di kun zhes bya ba nyid de/
119b2(rgyud 'bum): ma'am nyid mtshungs par 'dod pa nyid// ro mnyam de nyid bsgoms pa ni// mnyam zhes bya ba mtshungs par brjod// de yi 'khor lo ro zhes brjod// sgom pa ro gcig mnyam pa nyid// 'dis ni don
119b3(rgyud 'bum): gyis brjod par bya/ / nga las 'gro ba thams cad 'byung // nga las gnas gsum po yang 'byung // nga yis 'di kun khyab pa ste// 'gro ba'i rang bzhin gzhan ma mthong // de ltar rnal 'byor pas
119b4(rgyud 'bum): shes na/ / shin tu ma'am gzhag gang goms pa// bsod nams chung ba'i mi yis kyang // de ni 'grub par the tsom med// bza' dang btung dang blugs pa dang // nyal dang log dang sems pa na//
119b5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya chen po mngon 'dod pas// de nas mngon du 'gro bar 'gyur// gang phyir yid kyis mi sgom par// 'gro ba thams cad bsgom par bya// thams cad chos ni yongs shes na// sgom pa nyid ni/
119b6(rgyud 'bum): sgom pa min// brdar dang g.yo ba'i dngos po gang // rtswa lcug 'khri shing la sogs pa// bdag gi dngos po'i rang bzhin las// dam pa'i de nyid nges bsgom bya// de rnams dam pa gcig yod min
119b7(rgyud 'bum): rang rig bde ba chen po nyid/ / rang rig nas ni byang chub 'gyur// rang rig phyir na sgom pa nyid// rang gis rig par 'gyur ba las// mnan pa las ni las skyes te// rang gis 'phrog cing rang gis
120a1(rgyud 'bum): byed/ rang rig rgyal po rang gtso bo// 'dod chags zhe sdang phrag dog dang // de bzhin gti mug nga rgyal nyid// de kun de gnas nyams dga' bar// bcu drug char yang mi
120a2(rgyud 'bum): phod do/ / chos 'byung las skyes ye shes ni// mkha' mnyam lhan cig thabs dang bcas// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin las// 'jig rten gsum po de las skyes// khu ba'i rnam pa bcom
120a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan yin/ / de yi bde ba 'dod mar brjod// gcig dang du ma bral ba ste// skad cig gcig las mchog dga' ba// rang gis rig pa'i ye shes 'di// ngag gi lam 'das spyod yul te// 'di ni
120a4(rgyud 'bum): byin rlabs rim pa'i phyir/ / kun mkhyen ye shes de lta bu// sa dang chu dang rlung dang ni// me dang nam mkha' nyid dag ni// rang gzhan rig pa'i tshor ba yis// kun gyis skad cig mi gnod de// mtho ris mi yul rkang 'og gi/ skad
120a5(rgyud 'bum): cig las ni gzugs gcig 'gyur/ / rang gzhan cha yi rnam rtog gis// gnod pa nyid ni rus pa min// thams cad rig byed grub mtha' dang // de bzhin las rgyas la sogs pas// srid pa dag
120a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dngos grub min/ / yang ni srid mthar skye bar 'gyur// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// de med pas kyang dngos grub med// gang gis mi shes kye'i rdo rje// de ni ngal ba don med 'gyur// chu bo'i
120a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyun ni rab 'bab dang / / mar me'i rtse mo rab bcings ltar// rtag tu de nyid rnal 'byor gyis// nyin dang mtshan du mnyam par gzhag/ rnal 'byor ma'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'du ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o//
120b1(rgyud 'bum): / de nas mchog tu rnam par dag pa'i le'u bshad par bya'o// nges par dngos po thams cad kyi// dag pa de bzhin nyid du brjod// phyi nas re re'i dbye ba yis// lha rnams kyis
120b2(rgyud 'bum): ni brjod par bya/ / phung po lnga dang dbang po drug/ skye mched drug dang 'byung chen lnga// rang bzhin gyis ni rnam par dag/ nyon mongs shes bya'i sgrib byang bya// rang rig bdag nyid dag pa nyid// dag pa
120b3(rgyud 'bum): gzhan gyis rnam grol min/ / yul gyi dngos po dag pa'i phyir// rang gis rig pa'i bde chen mchog/ gzugs la sogs pa'i yul rnams dang // gzhan yang rnal 'byor pas mthong ba// dngos po
120b4(rgyud 'bum): de kun dag pa ste/ / 'di ltar 'gro ba sangs rgyas 'gyur// kye bcom ldan 'das rnam par ma dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gzugs la sogs pa'o// ci'i
120b5(rgyud 'bum): slad du zhe na/ gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po'i phyir ro// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'ang gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
120b6(rgyud 'bum): mig gis gzugs ni gzung bar bya// sgra ni rna bas mnyan par bya// dri ni sna yis tshor bar bya// lce yis ro ni rig par bya// dngos po lus kyis reg par bya// yid kyis bde sogs thob pa ni//
120b7(rgyud 'bum): dag pas dug med byas nas ni// bsten bya 'di dag bsten pa nyid// gzugs phung rdo rje ma yin te// tshor ba la yang dkar mor brjod// 'du shes chu yi rnal 'byor ma// 'du byed rdo rje mkha'
121a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ma/ / rnam shes phung po'i tshul gyis ni// bdag med rnal 'byor ma gnas so// rtag tu 'di dag rnam dag pas// de nyid rnal 'byor pas 'grub 'gyur// de ni nang gi 'bar/
121a2(rgyud 'bum): ma la'o// de nas phyi yi 'phar ma bshad// dbang ldan du ni puk+ka sI// mer ni de bzhin ri khrod ma// bden bral gdol pa mo gzhag cing // rlung du g.yung mo rnam par gzhag/ phyi ma lha mo dkar
121a3(rgyud 'bum): mo sogs/ / dbang dkar gshin rjer chom rkun ma// chu bdag phyogs su ro langs ma// lus ngan por ni g+hasma rI// 'og tu sa spyod ma zhes brjod// steng du mkha' spyod ma zhes bshad// bskyed
121a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rim pa nyid kyi phyogs/ / srid dang zhi ba'i rang bzhin gyis// lha mo 'di gnyis rnam par gnas// gzugs la dkar mor rtag tu bshad// sbal chom rkun ma rab grags// dri yi cha la ro
121a5(rgyud 'bum): langs ma/ / ro la g+hasma rI rab grags// reg la sa spyod ma zhes bshad// chos kyi dbyings la mkha' spyod ma// rtag tu 'di dag rnam dag pas// de nyid rnal 'byor pas 'grub 'gyur// phyag
121a6(rgyud 'bum): gi dag pa stong pa nyid/ / bdud dag pa las zhabs rnams nyid// rnam thar brgyad kyis zhal rnams nyid// rdo rje gsum gyis dag pa'i spyan// sa ni puk+ka sI zhes bshad// chu khams rngon pa ma zhes
121a7(rgyud 'bum): brjod/ / me ni gtum mor shes par bya// rlung ni g.yung mor rab tu grags// zhe sdang zhes bshad rdo rje ma// 'dod chags chu yi rnal 'byor ma// phrag dog rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// ser sna gsang ba'i
121b1(rgyud 'bum): dkar mo nyid/ / gti mug de bzhin rdo rjer bshad// zhe sdang la sogs rnam sbyong ba// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs las ni// 'dis ni phung po sbyang bar bya// gang dang gang gis 'jig rten 'ching
121b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba/ / de dang des ni 'ching ba las grol te// de nyid mi shes 'jig rten mi grol zhing // de nyid rnam spangs dngos grub rnyed mi 'gyur// de phyir dri med sgra med gzugs nyid med// ro dang
121b3(rgyud 'bum): sems kyi rnam par dag pa med/ / reg med chos med thams cad rnam par dag/ rang bzhin dag pa'i 'gro la 'gro bar shes// rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de
121b4(rgyud 'bum): nas ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi/ / rim pa yang dag rab tu bshad// gang gis slob ma dbang bskur ba'i// cho ga'ang rab tu bshad par bya// dang po lha yi bdag nyid kyi// rnal 'byor pas ni nor 'dzin
121b5(rgyud 'bum): sbyang / / 'bad pas hUM las rdo rje can// byas te phyi nas dkyil 'khor bri// tshal dang skye bo med gnas dang // byang chub sems dpa'i khyim dang ni// dkyil 'khor khang pa'i nang du yang // dkyil
121b6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor dam pa rab tu bzhengs/ / rdul tshon dam pa'i tshon dang ni// yang na 'bring po nyid kyis te// rin chen lnga yi phye ma 'am// yang na 'bras la sogs pas so// de nas dkyil 'khor khru gsum
121b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / / mthe bong gsum ni lhag par bya// der ni rigs lnga las byung ba'i// rig ma babang mo rnam par gzhug/ yang na ji ltar gang rnyed de// de ltar bcu drug lon pa nyid// ji srid khu ba ldan
122a1(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa/ / de srid phyag rgya bstan par bya// phyag rgya'i gdong yang bcing ba dang // thabs kyi gdong yang de bzhin no// bsten pa de las gang byung ba// slob ma'i khar ni btung
122a2(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / ro mnyam slob ma'i spyod yul nyid// de nyid la yang bya bar bya// rang rig ye shes nyid du 'gyur// rang gzhan yang dag rig pa spangs// mkha' mnyam rdul bral stong pa nyid// dngos
122a3(rgyud 'bum): dang dngos med bdag nyid mchog/ thabs dang shes rab shin tu 'dres// chags dang chags bral rnam par 'dres// de nyid srog chags rnams kyi srog/ de nyid yi ge dam pa nyid// de nyid
122a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba'i bdag nyid de/ / de nyid thams cad khyab pa po// thams cad lus la rnam par gnas// dngos dang dngos med de las byung // gzhan dang gang rnams de rnams dang // rnam par shes pa
122a5(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi tshul/ / skyes bu sngon rabs dbang phyug dang // bdag dang gso ba sems can dang // dus dang gang zag nyid dang ni// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin 'di// sgyu ma'i gzugs kyis yang
122a6(rgyud 'bum): dag gnas/ / dang po dga' ba tsam nyid de// gnyis pa'i grangs la mchog dga' nyid// gsum pa las ni dga' bral bshad// bzhi pa lhan cig skyes par brjod// de bzhin gshegs/
122a7(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams dang ni// rdo rje snying po la sogs kun// mkhas pas de skad nges thos nas// mchog tu ngo mtshar gyur nas ni// brgyal zhing sa la 'gyel bar gyur// dang po dga' ba 'gro ba'i
122b1(rgyud 'bum): gzugs/ / de bzhin mchog dga' 'gro ba nyid// dga' bral dga' ba'ang 'gro ba nyid// gsum pa lhan cig skyes pa med// bcom ldan bka' stsal kye'i rdo rje// sangs rgyas kun gyi
122b2(rgyud 'bum): sku gcig pa/ / rdo rje snying pos rtogs bya'i phyir// the tshom legs par sel ba ni// 'dod chags med cing chags bral med// dbu mar dmigs par mi 'gyur ro// gsum po spangs pa nyid kyi
122b3(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ / lhan cig skyes pa byang chub brjod// yang na de nyid thams cad bdaka/ yang na kun gyis rnam par spangs// de yang dga' bral dang por mtshon// dga' ba gsum po rnam par spangs// dang
122b4(rgyud 'bum): po sprin dang 'dra ba yin/ / grub pa sgyu ma lta bur 'gyur// gnyid log sad par mi byed par// nyal dang log pa'i khyad par las// rtag tu rmi lam 'dra bar 'gyur// dngos grub mtshan nyid mi
122b5(rgyud 'bum): phyed pa'i/ / phyag rgya rnal 'byor pa yis 'grub// ston pas dkyil 'khor 'di skad gsungs// gru bzhi yang dag 'bar ba nyid// sgo bzhi gzi brjid chen po ste// do shal ngo shal phyed pas
122b6(rgyud 'bum): brgyan/ / 'phreng ba sna tshogs rnga yab ldan// ka ba brgyad kyis nye bar brgyun// rdo rje srang bu mnyam par ldan// ma tog sna tshogs nye bar brgyan// bdug pa mar me de bzhin dri// bum pa brgyad
122b7(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pas ldan/ / de yang yal ka la sogs ldan// mgrin pa gos kyis dgab pa dang // rin chen lnga ni yongs su gzhug/ rnam par rgyal ba shar du sbyin// rang 'dod lha yi gzugs
123a1(rgyud 'bum): kyis ni/ / gsar pa legs par bkal ba dang // shin tu tshad ma mdzes pa mi// srad bus shes rab can gyis gdag/ 'khor lo'i bdag po'i bzlas pa 'bum/
123a2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor can gyi de bzhin khri// gong du gsungs pa'i sngags nyid kyis// mkhas pas nor 'dzin rnam par sbyang // gong gi a sogs sngags kyis ni// de la gtor ma rnam par sbyin// ji ltar
123a3(rgyud 'bum): bsam gtan de bzhin 'dir/ / srung ba ji ltar gsungs pa nyid// gang zhig dbang ni rab phye ba// rang gi dkyil 'khor cho gas sbyin// mchod dang gsol ba gdab pa nyid// ji ltar bshad pa de
123a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin 'dir/ / 'phar ma gnyis bzang rnam bris nas// myur du dkar mo la sogs bri// shar du gri gug rnam par bri// lho dang nub tu'ang de bzhin no// byang dang me yi mtshams dang ni// bden
123a5(rgyud 'bum): bral rlung du'ang de bzhin no/ / dbang ldan du ni ci gsungs pa// de lta de ltar 'og dang steng // rdo rje sems dpa'i snyems byas nas// rkang pa g.yas pa brkyang byas te// phyag gnyis kye yi rdo rjer sbyor//
123a6(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon dkyil 'khor 'jug pa nyid// khrus dang gtsang sbra dri zhim lus// sna tshogs rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// hUM hUM snyems pa byas nas ni// hi hi rnam par 'jig byed bdag/ phyi nas de nyid
123a7(rgyud 'bum): yang dag bshad/ / rnam dag ye shes gzugs can dang // 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// khyab par cung zad yod ma yin// mchog dgar sgom pa med cing sgom pa po'ang med// lus kyang med
123b1(rgyud 'bum): cing gzung ba med dang 'dzin pa'ang med/ / sha dang khrag kyang med cing bshang dang gci ba'ang med// skyug bro rmongs med gtsang sbra mchod phyir thogs med dang // chags med sdang ba med dang rmongs med phrag
123b2(rgyud 'bum): dog med/ / ser sna med dang nga rgyal med cing mthong bya med// sgom dang sgom pa po med bshes dang dgra med cing // rlom sems med pa'i lhan cig skyes pa sna tshogs nyid// rdo rje snying pos 'di skad
123b3(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ / gzod nas rang bzhin med pa yi// lus kyi rang bzhin dag pa ni// ci slad 'byung ba'i bdag nyid lags// de nas bcom ldan rdo rje can// mkha' 'gro bde ba sbyin pas gsungs// rlom
123b4(rgyud 'bum): sems med pa'i rang bzhin bdag/ thams cad lus la rnam par gnas// kye bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du 'byung ba chen po las gyur pa'i phung po lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
123b5(rgyud 'bum): bo la ka k+ko la sbyor bas// reg pa sra ba'i chos kyis ni// sa ni de las skye bar 'gyur// byang sems khu ba'i rnam pa las// chu yi khams ni 'byung bar 'gyur// bskyod pa las ni drod skye ste// 'gro ba
123b6(rgyud 'bum): rlung du rab tu grags/ / bde ba nam mkha' nyid kyi khams// lnga po rnams kyis yongs su bskor// gang phyir 'byung ba che bde ba// de phyir bde ba de nyid mni// lhan cig skyes pas gang skyes pa//
123b7(rgyud 'bum): lhan cig skyes par de brjod bya// rang bzhin lhan cig skyes zhes brjod// rnam pa thams cad sdom pa gcig/ phyag rgya rgyu dang bral ba las// yo gi snying rje thabs su 'gyur// stong nyid snying rje dbyer
124a1(rgyud 'bum): / med pa// byang chub sems zhes rab tu brjod// sngags kyi bzlas med dka' thub med dang sbyin sreg med// dkyil 'khor can yang med cing dkyil 'khor yang ni med// de ni sngag
124a2(rgyud 'bum): bzlas de dka' thub dang de sbyin sreg/ de ni dkyil 'khor can dang de ni dkyil 'khor nyid// mdor bsdus nas ni sems ni 'dus pa'i gzugs can no// dbang gi le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o// /
124a3(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par ma rungs dpral ba can// rtag tu ltung bar byed par brjod// dbang gi lta stangs g.yon na gnas// g.yon pa nas ni gzugs brnyan gnyis// g.yas pa'i cha la dgug pa/
124a4(rgyud 'bum): nyid// steng nas kyang ni gzugs brnyan gnyis// dbu ma rengs pa'i lta stangs nyid// sna yi rtse mo'i dbus su gnyis// 'byung ba nyid kyis ltung bar byed// rngub pa yis ni dbang du byed// dgang ba yis
124a5(rgyud 'bum): ni dgug pa nyid/ / zhi ba yis ni rengs par byed// rlon pa'i shing la ltung byed nyid// dbang ni me tog rab tu grags// rdo rje'i shing la dgug pa nyid// g.yo bcas rtswa la rengs byed nyid// rma drug
124a6(rgyud 'bum): goms pa'i sbyor ba yis/ / 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// 'di la 'khrul par mi bya ste// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul bsam mi khyab// lta stangs bzhi po bsgrubs nas ni// mkhas pas sems can
124a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhug par bya/ / gsad par 'di la bya ma yin// dam tshig nges par nyams par 'gyur// sems can bslu ba spangs nas ni// bya ba ma yin thams cad bya// sems can gnod pa tsam gyis ni//
124b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'i dngos grub rnyed mi 'gyur// de la dam tshig bza' bya ba// na dang ga ha dang po dang // mtha' yi shwa dang dang po'i shwa// kye yi rdo rje'i dngos grub phyir// bdud rtsi lnga yang de bzhin bza'/
124b2(rgyud 'bum): kye yi rdo rjes gsungs mtshan nyid// skye ba bdun pa'ang de nas mtshon// dga' bral dga' ba la smod pa// lan bdun pas ni 'grub par 'gyur// skad snyan mig dang ldan pa dang // dri lus gzi
124b3(rgyud 'bum): brjid chen po dang / / de yi grib ma bdun du 'gyur// mthong nas rnal 'byor pa yis mtshon// de ni zos pa tsam gyis ni// skad cig la ni mkha' spyod 'gyur// ku ru kul+le'i sgrub thabs bshad par
124b4(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ / gong du brtag pa bcu gnyis par// rgyas par gsungs pa mdo ru bsdu// hrIHlas byung ba'i lha mo ni// kha dog dmar zhing phyag bzhi ma// mnga' dang gzhu yi lag pa ma// ut+pa la dang lcag
124b5(rgyud 'bum): kyu 'dzin/ / 'di ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni// 'jig rten gsum po dbang du byed// 'bum phrag gcig gis rgyal po rnams// khri yis 'jig rten phal pa nyid// bye bas phyugs dang gnod
124b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sogs/ / 'bum phrag bdun gyis lha ma yin// 'bum phrag gnyis kyis lha rnams nyid// brgya phrag gcig gis sngags pa nyid// kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa las rdo rje snying po
124b7(rgyud 'bum): mngon par byang chub pa zhes bya ba brtag pa'i rgyal po rdzogs so/ / // rdo rje'i snying pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan rdo rje snying po bdag/ sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa/
125a1(rgyud 'bum): rab gnas mtshan nyid bzang po nyid// rim pa ji bzhin bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ci gsung sbyin sreg byas nas ni// dkyil 'khor
125a2(rgyud 'bum): dam pa bzhengs pa dang / / snga bar sku gzugs sbyang ba dang // sta gon la sogs byas nas ni// nam mkhar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun// sku gzugs snying khar rab tu gzhug/ rang 'dod lha
125a3(rgyud 'bum): mnyam rnal 'byor pa/ / rab mthong sngags kyi pha rol son// oM badz+ra puSh+pe AHhUM swA hA/ oM badz+ra d+hU pe AHhUM swA hA/ oM badz+ra dI pe AHhUM swA hA/ oM badz+ra gan+d+he AHhUM swA hA/ oM badz+ra nai wi d+ye AHhUM
125a4(rgyud 'bum): swA hA/ sna tshogs hUM ni rdzogs pa dang // me tog la sogs dbul ba nyid// gong ma'i rgyud kyi cho ga rim pas// mchod yon zhabs bsil gong ma bzhin// zhi ba'i thab khung zlum po nyid// rgyas pa
125a5(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyi gru bzhi pa/ / gsad pa la ni gru gsum brjod// 'di nyid la ni lhag ma sgrub// khru gang dang ni khru phyed nyid// zhi ba'i steng dang 'og tu yin// khru do dang ni khru gang nyid// rgyas pa'i steng dang
125a6(rgyud 'bum): 'og tu brjod/ / sor mo nyi shu'am de yi phyed// gsad pa'i steng dang 'og tu yang // zhi bar kha dog dkar por 'gyur// rgyas par ser po de bzhin no// gsad pa la ni kha dog gnag/ dbang la
125a7(rgyud 'bum): dmar por rab tu grags/ / dbang la ji bzhin de ltar dgug/ gsad la ji ltar zhe sdang sogs// zhi la til dang rgyas la zho// gsad la tsher ma de bzhin no// sdang la sogs pa'ang tsher mar
125b1(rgyud 'bum): brjod/ / dbang dang dgug la ut+pa la// oM ag+na ye ma hA te dza sarba kArma pra sA d+ha kaH/ ka ru Ni kr-i ta sa twAr+tha a smin san+ni hi to b+ha bA/ me dgug pa'o// ma ma rin chen sna tshogs 'dzin// kye yi rdo rje
125b2(rgyud 'bum): / khros mchod pa'i// lha mo khyod ni dpang du 'gyur// che ge bdag ni dkyil 'khor 'dri// swAr+thany+tse ba pa rAr+thany+tsa sA d+hi tAM gats+tsha ha bya b+hu ka/ A ga mi Sh+ya si ya thA kA le sarba sid+d+hi ku ru ShA me/ me dga' ba'i
125b3(rgyud 'bum): sngags so/ / oM dzaHhUM baM hoHkhaM raM/ mchod yon gyi sngags so// oM ni ri ti hUM khaM/ zhabs bsil gyi sngags so// oM d+hU dz+nyA/ lha bshos kyi sngags so// kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa
125b4(rgyud 'bum): las brtag pa gnyis pa rab gnas kyi le'u ste dang po'o/ / // rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ nam mkha' lta bu'i chos kun la// rgya mtshor bkur ba ji lta bar// rang 'dod lha
125b5(rgyud 'bum): yi gzugs las ni/ / sems can ji ltar 'grub par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bdag med rnal 'byor ldan pa 'am// yang na he ru ka dpal brtson// gzhan pa'i
125b6(rgyud 'bum): sems kyis skad cig kyang / / dngos grub 'dod pas mi gnas so// dang po goms par byed dus kyi// gnas ni gang du bsngags pa'i sems// gcig tu mnyam gzhag 'grub 'gyur ba'i//
125b7(rgyud 'bum): gnas ni bzang por nges par brtag/ rang gi khyim du mtshan dus su// bdag nyid 'grub pa'i sems kyis ni// rnal 'byor ma sgom shes rab can// yang na he ru ka dpal gzugs// rkang pa 'khrud
126a1(rgyud 'bum): dang za ba dang / / 'thor 'thung so rtsi za ba dang // tsan ngan gyis ni lag nyed dang // smad g.yogs kyis ni rked 'gebs dang // 'byung dang sgra dang 'gro ba dang // 'dug dang khro dang
126a2(rgyud 'bum): rgod pa dang / / bcom ldan 'das ma bsten pa dang // shes rab brtul zhugs can nyid kyis// rnal 'byor ma ni rnam par sgom// gzhan gyi tshul gyis skad cig kyang // 'dug pa'i sems ni ma rigs
126a3(rgyud 'bum): pas/ / dngos grub 'dod pas dngos grub phyir// mkhas pas 'bad pas mi gnas so// bsam gtan nyon mongs 'jigs byed pa// rdo rje snying po nga yis bshad// brtse bas dngos grub don du yang /
126a4(rgyud 'bum): zla ba phyed du yongs su rtogs// bsam pa thams cad yongs spangs nas// lha yi gzugs su sems pa yis// nyi ma gcig tu ma chad par// sgom pas yongs su brtag par bgyis// rang gzhan
126a5(rgyud 'bum): don ni rab sgrub phyir/ / 'khor bar thabs gzhan yod ma yin// rig ma lhan cig goms byas pas// 'phral du mngon du byed pa nyid// 'jigs spro de bzhin sdug bsngal dang // mya ngan gdung ba
126a6(rgyud 'bum): 'tshe ba dang / / 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug che// sgrub pa po ni nyon mi mongs// phan dang gnod pa'i 'bras 'byung bar// de ltar nges par shes nas ni// ji ltar de ni skad cig kyang // rnal 'byor
126a7(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams ngu 'bod gnas/ / mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang // srog chags gsod la dga' ba dang // gzhan yang skye ba dman gang dang // rmongs dang ma rungs las byed dang // gzugs ngan yan
126b1(rgyud 'bum): lag ma tshang bas/ / bsams pas de rnams 'grub par 'gyur// dge ba bcu la goms pa dang // bla ma la gus dbang po dul// nga rgyal khro las rnam par grol// des ni re zhig nges 'grub 'gyur//
126b2(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// mnyam par gzhag pas dngos grub thob// zla ba gcig tu gsang la sprad// ji srid phyag rgya ma rnyed par// gnang ba rnyed 'gyur sngags pa la// rnal 'byor ma
126b3(rgyud 'bum): yis bstan par bya/ / phyag rgya che ge mo khyer la// sems can don gyis rdo rje 'dzin// rnyed pa de yang mig yangs ma// gzugs dang lang tshos rnam par brgyan// si h+la ga pur yang dag ldan// byang
126b4(rgyud 'bum): chub sems kyis rnam par sbyang / / dge ba bcu las brtsams nas ni// de la chos ni rab tu dbye// lha yi gzugs kyi sems dang ni// dam tshig sems kyang gcig pa nyid// zla ba gcig gis skal
126b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan par/ / 'gyur ba 'di la the tshom med// mchog thob pa yi bud med gang // rtog pa thams cad yang dag spangs// yang na bdag gi nus pa yis// lha dang lha min mi rnams dang // gnod sbyin
126b6(rgyud 'bum): mi 'am ci las kyang / / phyag rgya bkug la rab tu brtag/ de yang khyer la spyod pa spyad// bdag gi dal ba mngon du'i phyir// gang bshad 'jigs pa'i gzugs can gyi// spyod pa longs spyod phyir
126b7(rgyud 'bum): ma gsungs/ / yid ni brtan nam g.yo 'am ci// rang gi sems ni so sor brtag/ rdo rje snying pos gsol pa// bdag med rnal 'byor ldan pa yis// phyag rgya nyid ces ji ltar brjod// phyag
127a1(rgyud 'bum): rgya phyag rgya nyid dag gis/ / phyag rgya'i dngos grub ji ltar 'grub// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bud med gzugs ni spangs nas ni// bcom ldan 'das
127a2(rgyud 'bum): gzugs su bya/ / nu ma spangs pa po lar 'gyur// kak+ko la dbus yang dag gnas// 'gram gnyis dril bu nyid du 'gyur// be'u 'bru bo la can du 'gyur// lhag ma bdag nyid chen po nyid//
127a3(rgyud 'bum): dga' chen he ru ka yi gzugs// he ru ka sbyor skyes bu nyid// 'bad pa med par skyes bur 'gyur// gsal bar nus pa'i rnal 'byor pas// de phyir phyag rgya'i dngos grub 'gyur// chags dang
127a4(rgyud 'bum): 'jig pa dag gis kyang / / thabs dang shes rab gnod mi 'gyur// gang phyir thabs ni 'byung ba nyid// 'jig pa shes rab srid mthar byed// des na rab 'jig yod ma yin// de nyid la ni
127a5(rgyud 'bum): chags pa med/ / la la 'jig pas 'jig par 'gyur// 'jig pa'i dngos med zad pa med// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// brtul zhugs can gyis spros pa sgom// spros pa rmi
127a6(rgyud 'bum): lam ltar byas nas/ / spros pa nyid ni spros med byed// ji ltar sgyu ma rmi lam dang // ji ltar bar ma'i srid yin pa// rtag tu goms pa'i sbyor ba las// dkyil 'khor nyid ni de bzhin 'dod//
127a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya chen por dbang bskur bar// ji ltar shes pa'i bde chen po// 'di ni de yi byin rlabs yin// gzhan las dkyil 'khor 'byung ba med// bde ba gnag cingabade ba ser/
127b1(rgyud 'bum): bde ba nga mar pob de ba da ka ra// bde ba ljang ku bde ba sngo// bde ba rgyu dang mi rgyu kun// bde ba shes rab bde ba thabs// de bzhin kun tu ru skyes bde// bde ba dngos po
127b2(rgyud 'bum): dngos med bde/ / rdo rje sems dpa' bde bar brjod// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor 'di// de yi bde ba bde chen brjod// rdzogs pa sgom pa med pa ste/
127b3(rgyud 'bum): bskyed pa yis na ci zhog 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// e ma'o byang chub sems dpa' che// dad pa'i shugs kyis rab tu nyon// lus kyi dngos med gang las ba de//
127b4(rgyud 'bum): bde ba smra bar mi nus so// khyab dang khyab byed tshul gyis ni// bde bas 'gro ba khyab pa nyid// ji ltar me tog la gnas dri// me tog dngos med shes mi 'gyur// de bzhin gzugs sogs dngos
127b5(rgyud 'bum): med pas/ / bde ba nyid kyang dngos med 'gyur// dngos po dngos po med pa nga // dngos po rtogs phyir sangs rgyas pa// gang zhig le los bsnun pa dang // rmongs pa gang gis nga mi shes// /
127b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje btsun mo'i b+ha ga ni// e yi rnam pa'i cha byad gzugs// sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog/ bde ba can du rtag tu bzhugs// 'chad pa po nga chos kyang nga// rang gi tshogs ldan nyan pa dag
127b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten ston pa bsgrub bya nga / / 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa nga // lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin nga // mchog mtha' dga' bral dang por ni// mun pa la ni mar me ltar// de bzhin bus
128a1(rgyud 'bum): kyang yid ches gyis/ / btsun mo'i b+ha ga bde chen du// ston pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// gtso bo dpe byad brgyad cur ldan// khu ba zhes bya'i rnam par gnas// de med
128a2(rgyud 'bum): pas na bde med 'gyur/ / bde ba med na de med 'gyur// nus pa med phyir ltos dang bcas// lha yi rnal 'byor las bde ba// de phyir sangs rgyas dngos po min// de nyid dngos med tshul yang
128a3(rgyud 'bum): min/ / zhal phyag rnam pa'i gzugs can nyid// mchog tu bde ba gzugs med pa// de phyir 'gro kun lhan cig skyes// rang bzhin lhan cig skyes par brjod// rnam dag rnam pa'i sems
128a4(rgyud 'bum): kyis ni/ / rang bzhin mya ngan 'das pa nyid// lha yi rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni// bzhin lag kha dog gnas pa ni// skyes pa tsam gyis rnam par gnas// 'on kyang bag chags pal pas so// /
128a5(rgyud 'bum): dug gi dum bu gang nyid kyis// skye bo thams cad 'chi bar 'gyur// dug gi de nyid shes pa des// dug gis dug ni 'bigs par byed// ji ltar rlung gis zin pa la// mon sran sde'u yi bza'
128a6(rgyud 'bum): ba sbyin/ / bzlog pa'i sman ni brtags pa yis// rlung gis rlung la snun par byed// rnam rtog las ni rnam rtog dang // srid pa nyid kyis srid pa dag/ ji ltar rna bar chu zhugs pa// chu
128a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan dag gis 'gugs par byed/ / de bzhin dngos po'i rnam rtog kyang // rnam par nges pas sbyang bar bya// ji ltar 'tshed pas tshig pa yang // me yis kyang ni gdud par bya// de bzhin
128b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags mes 'tshig pa/ / 'dod chags me yis gdung bar bya// skye bo mi bzad pa yi las// gang dang gang gis 'ching 'gyur ba// thabs dang bcas na de nyid kyi// srid pa'i 'ching
128b2(rgyud 'bum): ba las grol 'gyur/ / chags pas 'jig rten 'ching 'gyur pa// 'dod chags nyid kyis rnam grol 'gyur// bzlog pa'i sgom pa 'di nyid ni// sangs rgyas mu stegs kyis mi shes
128b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin las/ / kun tu rul lnga ru 'gyur// dga' ba chen po gcig nyid las// dbye bas lnga ru 'gro bar 'gyur// bo la kak+ko la sbyor bas// reg pa sra ba'i bag chags
128b4(rgyud 'bum): nyid/ / sra ba gti mug chos kyi phyir// gti mug rnam par snang mdzad brjod// gang phyir byang sems gsher ba nyid// gsher ba chu yi khams su brjod// chu ni mi bskyod gzugs kyi phyir/
128b5(rgyud 'bum): zhe sdang 'dren pa mi bskyod pa// gnyis kyis bskyod pa'i sbyor ba las// drod ni rtag tu skye bar 'gyur// 'dod chags dpag med rdo rje yin// 'dod chags drod las 'byung bar 'gyur// kak+ko
128b6(rgyud 'bum): lar ni gang zhig sems/ / de ni rlung gi rang bzhin can// phrag dog don yod grub pa yin// don yod rlung las 'byung ba nyid// bde ba 'dod chags khrag tu 'gyur// dga' ba nam mkha'i mtshan
128b7(rgyud 'bum): nyid do/ / nam mkha' ser sna rdo rjer 'gyur// ser sna nam mkha' las byung nyid// sems ni chen po gcig nyid la// lnga yi gzugs kyis rnam par mtshon// rigs ni lnga po de nyid las//
129a1(rgyud 'bum): stong phrag du ma skyes pa nyid// de phyir 'di dag rang bzhin gcig/ bde chen mchog tu rtag pa nyid// 'dod chags la sogs sems lnga yi// dbye bas lnga ru 'gro bar 'gyur/
129a2(rgyud 'bum): gang+gA'i klung ni bcu yi bye snyed nyid// rigs gcig la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshegs// rigs kyi tshogs la rigs ni du ma rnams// de rnams rigs la rigs ni rnam pa brgya// de rnams
129a3(rgyud 'bum): la yid 'bum phrag rigs chen rnams/ / bye ba'i rigs la grangs ni med par 'gyur// de la rigs la grangs med rigs rnams nyid// mchog tu dga' ba'i rigs las byung ba rnams//
129a4(rgyud 'bum): kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa las dngos grub gtan la dbab pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas rdo rje can gyis rnal 'byor ma rnams la rgyud thams cad kyi zla
129a5(rgyud 'bum): gzhi zhes bya ba'i thabs bka' stsal pa/ sdom pa dang ni dbang dang yang // de bzhin dgongs pa'i skad nyid dang // dga' dang skad cig dbye ba dang // gzhan yang bza' ba la sogs pa// de
129a6(rgyud 'bum): la sdom pa bka' stsal pa/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi sdom pa ni// e baM rnam par rab tu gnas// e baM rnam pa'i bde chen po// dbang las yang dag shes par 'gyur// de nas rnal 'byor ma
129a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis/ / bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan ston pa 'gro ba'i bla// mkha' 'gro ma yi sdom pa nyid// e baM rnam pa ci zhes brjod// rim pa
129b1(rgyud 'bum): ji bzhin bshad du gsol/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// e yi cha byad bzang po gang // dbus su baM gyis rnam par brgyan// bde ba thams cad kyi ni gnas// sangs rgyas rin
129b2(rgyud 'bum): chen za ma tog/ skad cig dbye bas phye ba nyid// dga' ba de las skye bar 'gyur// skad cig shes nas bde shes pa// e baM rnam par rab tu gnas// sna tshogs dang ni rnam smin dang // rnam
129b3(rgyud 'bum): nyed de bzhin mtshan nyid bral/ / skad cig bzhi ni rab shes pas// de ltar rnal 'byor pas shes 'gyur// 'khyud dang 'o byed la sogs pa// sna tshogs rnam pa sna tshogs bshad// rnam par
129b4(rgyud 'bum): smin pa de las bzlog/ bde ba'i ye shes za ba nyid de// bdag gi bde ba zos pa yi// gros ni rnam par nyed par brjod// mtshan nyid bral ba gsum las gzhan// chags dang chags bral rnam
129b5(rgyud 'bum): par spangs/ / sna tshogs dang po'i dga' ba nyid// rnam smin la ni mchog dga' nyid// rnam nyed dga' ba dga' bral nyid// mtshan bral lhan cig skyes dga' nyid// slob dpon gsang ba
129b6(rgyud 'bum): shes rab dang / / bzhi pa de yang de bzhin no// dbang ni bzhi yi grangs kyis ni// dga' ba la sogs rim shes bya// dgod pa dag pa slob dpon nyid// lta ba gsang ba de bzhin no// lag bcangs
129b7(rgyud 'bum): las ni shes rab nyid/ / gnyis gnyis 'khyud la de yang nyid// sems can rnams kyi dngos grub phyir// dbang ni rnam pa bzhi ru bshad// gtor dang blugs pa zhes bya 'dis// des na dbang zhes
130a1(rgyud 'bum): brjod par bya/ / shes rab bcu drug lon pa la// lag pa dag gis yang dag 'khyud // rdo rje dril bu mnyam sbyor bas// slob dpon dbang du rab tu brjod// shin tu ba
130a2(rgyud 'bum): bzang mig yangs ma/ / gzugs dang lang tshos rnam par brgyan// mthe bong srin lag dag gis ni// slob ma'i kha ru ltung bar bya// de nyid du ni mnyam pa'i ro// slob ma'i spyod yul dag tu bya//
130a3(rgyud 'bum): ston pas shes rab rab tu mchod// rjed par byas nas gtad par bya// ston pas smras pa sems dpa' che// phyag rgya bde ba ldan pa khyer// phrag dog khro ba rnam spangs pa'o// slob ma cher
130a4(rgyud 'bum): gyur shes nas ni/ / ston pas de la gnang ba sbyin// kun tu ru gyis rdo rje 'dzin// ji ltar dbang bskur gsol btab pa'i// slob ma'i bya ba bshad par bya// bla ma phyag rgya ldan mthong nas//
130a5(rgyud 'bum): bstod dang mchod pa ji bzhin bya// bcom ldan zhi ba chen po kye// rdo rje rnal 'byor gcig bzhed pa// mi phyed phyag rgya sgrub pa po// rdo rje rnal 'byor las byung ba// ji ltar khyod ni bdag nyid che//
130a6(rgyud 'bum): mnga' bdag bdag la'ang de ltar mdzod// 'khor ba 'dam gyi tshogs dag tu// bying ba skyabs med bdag la skyobs// zhim pa'i bza' ba btung ba dang // ba la che mchog ma da na// bdug
130a7(rgyud 'bum): palha bshos 'phreng ba dang / / dril bu rgyal mtshan byug pa yis// 'di rnams mchod pa rnams kyis ni// slob mas rdo rje 'dzin pa mchod// mchog tu dga' ba yang dag thob// sna tshog
130b1(rgyud 'bum): spangs pa'i skad cig la/ / ston pas smras pa sems dpa' che// bde ba chen po rnam par zung // ji srid byang chub bar du ni// sems can don gyis rdo rje 'dzin// slob ma snying rje can mthong nas// /
130b2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje can gyis 'di skad smras// 'di ni ye shes chen po nyid// thams cad lus la rnam par gnas// gnyis dang gnyis su med pa'i tshul// dngos po dngos med bdag nyid gtso// brtan dang
130b3(rgyud 'bum): g.yo ba khyab nas gnas/ / sgyu ma'i gzugs can nyid du 'dod// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i thabs kyis ni// rtag tu nges par 'gro bar 'gyur// de nas rdo rje snying pos rnal 'byor ma rnams la
130b4(rgyud 'bum): bzod par gsol nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ci zhes brjod// sangs rgyas kun bdag grong khyer la// bcom ldan bdag ni 'khrul gyur
130b5(rgyud 'bum): pas/ / rim pa ji ltar bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dkyil ni snying po zhes byar brjod// byang chub sems ni bde chen po// dang po mthar byed ces bya ba// 'dus
130b6(rgyud 'bum): pa dkyil 'khor nyid du brjod/ / 'khor lo zhes bya nam mkha'i khams// yul la sogs pa rnam par sbyong // bo la kak+ko la sbyor bas// de yi bde ba shes par 'gyur// rdo rje snying pos gsol
130b7(rgyud 'bum): pa sdom pa zhes bya gang gis dang / / dam tshig gang gis gnas par bgyi// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyod kyis srog chags gsad pa dang // brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra ba dang // /
131a1(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyis ma byin par yang long // pha rol bud med bsten par gyis// sems gcig srog chags gsod pa nyid// gang phyir srog ni sems su brjod// 'jig rten
131a2(rgyud 'bum): bsgral ba zhes bya ba/ / brdzun gyi tshig tu rab tu bsgrags// btsun mo'i khu ba ma byin par// gzhan gyi bud med rang mtshungs mdzes// de nas rnal 'byor ma thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das
131a3(rgyud 'bum): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / yul de rnams kyang ci lags/ dbang po rnams ni gang lags/ skye mched ni ci lags/ phung po rnams ni gang lags/ khams rnams de'ang ci lags//
131a4(rgyud 'bum): 'di rnams kyi rang bzhin ni ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ yul drug ni/ gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni// ro dang de bzhin reg bya nyid// chos kyi khams kyi rang
131a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin nyid/ / 'di rnams yul ni drug tu brjod// dbang po rnams ni drug ste/ mig dang rna ba sna dang ni// lce dang lus dang de bzhin yid// 'di rnams dbang po drug po ni// gti mug rdo rje
131a6(rgyud 'bum): la sogs ldan/ / yul dang yul can dag gis ni// skye mched bcu gnyis dag tu 'gyur// phung po lnga ni gzugs la sogs// mthar ni rnam shes snying rje che// dbang po dang ni yul nyid
131a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / / dbang po'i rnam par shes pa nyid// rnal 'byor ma rnams go cha'i phyir// khams ni bco brgyad rnams su bshad// rang bzhin gdod nas ma skyes pa// brdzun min bden min de bzhin
131b1(rgyud 'bum): du/ thams cad chu yi zla ba ltar// 'dod pas rnal 'byor mas shes gyis// 'di lta ste/ gtsub shing dang / gtsub stan dang / skyes bu'i lag pa'i rtsol ba las glo bur du me skye bar
131b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / me de gtsub shing la'ang mi gnas/ gtsub stan la'ang ma yin/ skyes bu'i lag pa dag la'ang ma yin te/ rnam pa thams cad du yongs su btsal na gcig na'ang yod pa ma
131b3(rgyud 'bum): yin pas/ me de'ang bden pa'ang ma yin zhing brdzun pa'ang ma yin no// de ltar chos thams cad rnal 'byor mas yid la gyis shig/ de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma la sogs pa rdo rje mkha'
131b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ma thams cad bdud rtsi lnga thogs shing dam tshig gi rdzas thogs pas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' la mchod par byed/ kun tu ru'i sbyor bas rjes su chags par byed// bdud rtsi
131b5(rgyud 'bum): lnga'i ro'ang 'thung bar byed do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes nas rang byin gyis brlabs pa bstan pa/ kye kye rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad pa// de nyid bdag gis
131b6(rgyud 'bum): gsang mdzad pa/ / rdo rje mchod pa'i byin rlabs kyis// bshad kyis 'dod pas rab tu nyon// lha mo thams cad dga' bar gyur/ rangs par gyur te/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas
131b7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung nyan no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bza' btung ji ltar rnyed pa dang // bgrod dang 'grod
132a1(rgyud 'bum): min mi spang zhing / / khrus dang gtsang sbra mi bya ste// grong gi chos ni rab tu spang // blo ldan sngags nyid mi bkra zhing // bsam gtan nyid ni dmigs mi bya// gnyid ni spang bar
132a2(rgyud 'bum): mi bya ste/ / dbang po rnams ni mo dgag go// ba la thams cad bza' bar bya// kha dog lnga la mnyam par spyad// dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// btsun mo thams cad dga' bar bya// mdza' bo
132a3(rgyud 'bum): sdug par mi bya zhing / / de bzhin gdug la zhe sdang nyid// rdo shing 'jim pa'i bdag nyid kyi// lha 'di rnams la phyag mi bya// g.yung mo gdol pa ko lpags mkhan// phyag bdar mkhan sogs
132a4(rgyud 'bum): reg rim dang / / bram ze rgyal rigs rje'u dmangs rnams// bdag gi lus ltar reg pa nyid// bdud rtsi lnga dang bu ram chang // dug dang nim pa bu btsas skyes// skyur dang dngar dang bska la sogs//
132a5(rgyud 'bum): kha ba lan tshwa tsha ba dang // dri nga dri zhim mchi rnag dang // byang chub sems kyis rab tu bza'// gnyis med ye shes sems kyis ni// mi bza' cung zad yod ma yin// rang byung me tog rnyed nas ni//
132a6(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i snod du gzhag pa dang // lud pa dang ni snabs dag gis// bsres nas brtul zhugs can gyis btung // smad g.yogs kha dog sna tshogs dang // ro bsregs thal bas de bzhin brgyan//
132a7(rgyud 'bum): me tog rab song gnas rnyed pas// mgo skyes legs par bcing bar bya// de nas rdo rje snying po sa gsol pa/ thams cad yul gyi rnam dag pa// bcom ldan 'das kyis sngar gsungs na/
132b1(rgyud 'bum): nges par dbang po drug gi grangs// rnam par dag par ma mdzad pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// mig la gti mug rdo rje ma// rna bar zhe sdang rdo rje ma// sna la ser sna ma zhes bshad// kha la
132b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dod chags rdo rje ma/ / lus la phrag dog rdo rje ma// yid la bdag med rnal 'byor ma// dbang po rnams ni dag bya'i phyir// 'dis ni go cha sems dpa' che// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ dgongs pa
132b3(rgyud 'bum): skad ni ci zhes bgyi/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis nges gsung gsol// rnal 'byor ma yi dam tshig che// nyan thos la sogs mi shes pa// dgod dang lta ba dag gis dang // 'khyud dang de bzhin gnyis
132b4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis kyi/ / rgyud kyang rnam pa bzhi rnams kyis// dgongs pa'i skad ni ma bsgrags pa// bcom ldan nges par gsung du gsol// dgongs pa'i skad ni skad chen po// dam tshig brda ni rgyas pa ru//
132b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje snying po ngas bshad kyis// khyod ni rtse gcig sems kyis nyon// ma da na chang ba la sha// 'du ba ma la ya dzaM brjod// 'gro ba khe Ta ro na shrI pa// rus pa'i rgyan ni ni r-i shu// 'ong ba pr-i kha Na ru brjod//
132b6(rgyud 'bum): cang te'u kr-i pi ti ru brjod// skal med du du ra zhes brjod// skal ldan ka li dza ra brjod// reg min Din Di ma zhes brjod// zod pa pad+ma b+hAny+dza naM// bza' bkr-i pi ta zhes bya// tshong ma mA la tin+t+ra
132b7(rgyud 'bum): naM/ bshang ba tsa tu sa maM brjod// gci ba kastu ri zhes brjod// rang byung si h+lar shes par bya// khu ba ka pu ra zhes brjod// sha chen shA li dza zhes brjod// dbang po gnyis sbyor kun tu ru/ rdo rje
133a1(rgyud 'bum): bo la zhes bshad de/ / pad+ma kak+ko la zhes zer// kha dog dbye bas phye ba las// rigs ni rnam pa lnga ru bshad// 'di ni gsang ba'i skad yin no// phyag rgya lnga ni bsdus pa
133a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid/ / g.yung mo rdo rje'i rigs su bshad// gar ma de bzhin pad+ma'i rigs// ras 'tshed ma ni rin chen rigs// skye gnyis de bzhin gshegs par brjod// chos ma las kyi rigs nyid de//
133a3(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya 'di rnams dngos grub sbyin// 'di rnams khu ba rdo rjer 'gyur// brtul zhugs can gyis mchod nas btung // rdo rje snying po sems dpa' che// gsang ba'i skad ni mtshar che ba// nga yis
133a4(rgyud 'bum): khyod la gang bshad pa/ / de rnams thams cad gus pas zung // kye rdo rje 'dir dbang bskur gang // gsang ba'i skad kyis mi smra ba// de yi dam tshig nyams par ni// 'gyur ba 'di la the tshom
133a5(rgyud 'bum): med/ / 'tshe ba dang ni rkun ma dang // gdon dang rims dang dug gis kyang // gal te sangs rgyas gsang ba'i skad// mi gsung na yang 'grongs par 'gyur// rang gi dam tshig rigs rnyed na//
133a6(rgyud 'bum): gal te tshig 'di mi smra ba// gnas bzhi las skyes rnal 'byor ma// de yi tshe na khro bar byed// kye'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa las rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi dang gsang ba'i skad ces
133a7(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o/ / / de nas rdo rje snying po la sogs pa'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma thams cad the tshom du gyur/ yid gnyis su gyur te bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
133b1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' la 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan the tshom bsal du gsol// spyod pa'i le'u las gang bshad pa// glu dang gar ni dngos grub sbyin// de la bdag ni the tshom mchis// glu ni
133b2(rgyud 'bum): ci lags gar yang ci/ / lha yi le'u las gang gsungs pa// zhe sdang la sogs phyag rgya rnams// de la bdag ni the tshom mchis// gang gi phyag rgya phyag rgya ci// sngags btu ba las gang gsungs
133b3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ bdag med la sogs sa bon nyid// de la bdag ni 'khrul par gyur// gang gi sa bon sa bon gang // rigs kyi le'u las gang bshad pa// bcu drug gnyis kyi bdag nyid rtsa// bcom
133b4(rgyud 'bum): ldan bdag ni 'khrul gyur pas/ / de rnams rnam dag bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// kol+la i reT+Ti a bo lA mum+ma Ni re kak+ko l+la/ g+ha Na ki pi Ta ho bA dzA i ka ru Ne ki
133b5(rgyud 'bum): a i na ro lA/ ta hi ba la khadz+dza i ga Do ma a NA pidzA a i/ ha liM kA liny+dza ra pa Ni a i du d+hu ra badz+dzi a i/ tsa u sa ma kAts+tsha ri si hA kap+sa ra lA i a i/ mA la i in+na Na shA lany+dzi ta
133b6(rgyud 'bum): hi b+ha ru khA i a i/ phreM kha Na khe Ta ka ran+te shud+d+ha a shud+d+ha na mu Ni a i/ ni ra shu aM ga tsan+da wI ta hi dza sa rA ba pa Ni a i/ ma la ya dze kun+du rU bA Ta i DiNI ma ta hir+b+ha bI dz+dza a i/ dran pa mi
133b7(rgyud 'bum): 'phrogs rnal 'byor pas/ / he ru ka yi gzugs kyis gar// chags bral min goms sems kyis ni// 'dod chags sems kyis bsgom pa nyid// rdo rje chos dang sangs rgyas dang // rnal
134a1(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma dang ma mo yis/ / glu dang gar ni 'di dag gis// legs par glu blang gar yang bya// 'di nyid kyis ni tshogs srung zhing // de bzhin bdag kyang srung ba nyid// 'dis
134a2(rgyud 'bum): ni 'jig rten dbang du byed/ / 'dis ni sngags kyi bzlas pa nyid// gang du gus pas glu len dang // gang du gus bcas gar byed pa// tshogs kyi bdag pos sngar byas nas// de la dri ni mtshon
134a3(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / sgog pa'i dri ni dang po nyid// de nas yang ni bya rgod dri// ga pur ma la ya dza nyid// ngang pa dang ni bung ba'i sgra// glu yi mtha' nas mnyan par bya// ba lang 'tshe yi sgra yang ni// phyi rol
134a4(rgyud 'bum): du ni mtshon bya ba/ / glu yi byin rlabs mtshan nyid do// phyag rgya rtags dang mtshan ma ste// 'dis ni rigs ni mtshon par bya// rigs 'tshol sgom pa'i sbyor ba las// dngos grub med cing
134a5(rgyud 'bum): sgrub po'ang med/ / zhe sdang phyag rgyas bdag med ma// gti mug phyag rgyas rdo rje ma// ser sna'i phyag rgyas dkar mo nyid// chags pas chu ma phyag rgyas gdab// phrag dog phyag rgyas mkha'
134a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ma/ / zhe sdang phyag rgya puk+ka sI// gti mug phyag rgyas ri khrod ma// ser sna'i phyag rgyas gdol pa mo// 'dod chags phyag rgyas g.yung mo nyid// yang ni dkar mo zhe sdang las// gti
134a7(rgyud 'bum): mug phyag rgyas chom rkun ma/ / ser sna'i phyag rgyas ro langs ma// 'dod chags phyag rgyas g+hasma rI// gti mug phyag rgyas sa spyod ma// 'dod chags phyag rgyas mkha' spyod ma// 'dod pas
134b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgyar shes par bya/ / a li dang po bdag med ma// a li gnyis pa rdo rje ma// a li gsum pa dkar mo nyid// bzhi pa chu yi rnal 'byor ma// lnga pa rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// drug pa puk+ka/
134b2(rgyud 'bum): sI zhes brjod// bdun pa nyid ni ri khrod ma// brgyad pa sme sha can du brjod// dgu pa yang ni g.yung mo nyid// yang ni lnga gnyis dkar mo nyid// bcu gcig chom rkun ma zhes bshad// bcu
134b3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis ro langs ma zhes brjod/ / bcu gsum pa ni g+hasma rI// bcu bzhi pa ni sa spyod ma// bco lnga pa ni mkha' spyod ma// rnal 'byor ma yi sa bon nyid// rigs kyi le'u las rtsa rnams gang //
134b4(rgyud 'bum): bcu drug gnyis kyi bdag nyid gsungs// rtsa ni gnyis gnyis rnal 'byor ma// re re rnam pa gsum du brjod// brkyang ma ro ma kun 'dar ma// bdag med rnal 'byor ma zhes brjod// gang
134b5(rgyud 'bum): phyir bcu drug cha med pas/ / 'bad pas kun gyi lhag ma spangs// de ci'i slad du zhe na khyod// don gyi bya ba mi phyed phyir// bco lnga'i cha yi bdag nyid kyi// zla ba byang chub sems su 'gyur//
134b6(rgyud 'bum): bde ba chen po a li'i gzugs// rnal 'byor ma rnams de yi cha// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ rnal 'byor ma kun las byung ba// lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin nyid// 'grib med btung
134b7(rgyud 'bum): mchog nam mkha' nyid/ / ga pur nges par cis mi spang // bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// ji skad smras pa de bzhin no// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ thabs gang gis byang chub kyi
135a1(rgyud 'bum): sems bskyed pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo'i thabs dang ni// rang byin brlab pa'i rim pas kyang // kun rdzob don dam
135a2(rgyud 'bum): gzugs can gyi/ / byang chub sems ni rab tu bskyed// kun rdzob kun da lta bu nyid// don dam bde ba'i gzugs can no// bud med kak+kol bde ba can// e baM rnam pa'i rang bzhin du// bde ba srung
135a3(rgyud 'bum): ba nyid kyi phyir/ / bde ba can zhes rab tu bsgrags// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // rdo rje 'dzin pa rnams kyi gnas// 'di nyid 'khor ba zhes bya ste// 'di nyid mya ngan 'das pa nyid//
135a4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ba spangs nas gzhan du ni// mya ngan 'das pa rtogs mi 'gyur// 'khor ba gzugs dang sgra la sogs// 'khor ba tshor ba la sogs pa// 'khor ba dbang po rnam nyid do// 'khor ba zhe sdang la sogs pa// 'di rnams chos ni mya
135a5(rgyud 'bum): ngan 'das/ / rmongs phyir 'khor ba'i gzugs can nyid// rmongs med 'khor ba dag pas ni// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das par 'gyur// byang chub sems ni mya ngan 'das// kun rdzob don dam tshul can no// /
135a6(rgyud 'bum): shin tu bzhin bzang mig yangs ma// gzugs dang lang tshos rnam par brgyan// sngo bsangs dal ma rigs bzang ma// si h+la ga pur 'byung ba'i gnas// rang gis dbang bskur kye'i rdo rje// sgra bzang
135a7(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa po la dga'/ / de yi chang yang btung bar bya// de nas rang yang btung ba nyid// rang gzhan don ni rab sgrub phyir// phyi nas phyag rgya rjes chags bya// bo la kak+ko lar bcug nas// kun tu ru
135b1(rgyud 'bum): byed brtul zhugs can/ / der ni sbyor ba las byung ba'i// ga pur mkhas pas mi spang ste// de ni lag tu mi blang zhing // nya phyis dung chos nyid du min// nges par blo dang stobs kyi phyir// mi 'chi lce
135b2(rgyud 'bum): yis blang ba nyid/ / ga pur nyid ni bdag med ma// bde ba bdag med tshul can nyid// de yi bde ba phyag rgya che// lte ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du gnas// dang po'i dbyangs yig rang bzhin te// blo zhes
135b3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnams kyis brtags/ / rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i rnal 'byor las// de nyid bcom ldan shes rab ma// de ni ring min thung ba min// gru bzhi ma yin zlum po min// dri dang ro dang mya ngan 'das//
135b4(rgyud 'bum): lhan cig skyes dga' byed pa can// de las skyes pa'i rnal 'byor pas// de yi bde ba myong ba nyid// de dang lhan cig phyag rgya che// bde ba sbyin pa'i dngos grub 'gyur// gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang
135b5(rgyud 'bum): ni/ ro dang de bzhin reg bya nyid// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin yang // shes rab nyid kyis dpyad par bya// de nyid lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs// bde chen bzang po'i rnal 'byor ma// de ring
135b6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang / / ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can// de ni me long ye shes gzugs// mnyam nyid ye shes dngos po can// yang dag gyur pa so sor rtog/ de nyid bya ba nan tan te//
135b7(rgyud 'bum): chos dbyings shin tu rnam dag pa// de nyid dkyil 'khor bdag po nga // de nyid bdag med rnal 'byor ma// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin can// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ 'khor lo bsgoms
136a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lam dang ni/ / lha rnams ji ltar 'byung ba nyid// thams cad bcom ldan 'das gsungs na// sdom pa yang dag bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
136a2(rgyud 'bum): stsal pa/ / rnal 'byor ma yi lus dbus su// a yi rnam pa'i sdom pa gnas// ji ltar phyi rol de bzhin nang // sdom pa de nyid rab tu phye// bo la'i bde ba phyag rgya che// rdo rje skye mched thabs
136a3(rgyud 'bum): chen nyid/ / 'dis ni gsang ba'i snyoms 'jug pas// phyi rol gnyis ni bstan du med// sku gsum lus kyi nang du ni// 'khor lo'i gzugs kyis brjod par bya// sku gsum yongs su shes pa ni//
136a4(rgyud 'bum): bde ba chen po'i 'khor lor brjod// chos dang longs spyod sprul pa dang // de bzhin du yang bde chen nyid// skye gnas snying mgrin mgo bor yang // sku gsum po ni rnam par gnas// ma lus pa yi
136a5(rgyud 'bum): sems can gyi/ / skye ba gang la brjod par bya// gang phyir sprul pa gnas brtan phyir// lte ba sprul pa'i sku nyid yin// gang gis bskyed dang sprul byed pa'i// sku ni sprul pa can zhes brjod// sems
136a6(rgyud 'bum): ni chos kyi rang bzhin te/ / chos kyi sku yang snying kar 'gyur// ro rnam drug gi gzugs can gyi// bza' ba nges par longs spyod brjod// mgrin par longs spyod 'khor lo'o// spyi bor bde ba chen po
136a7(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / e baM rnam par rgyu mthun nyid// rnam smin chos kyi 'khor lo las// longs spyod skyes bu'i byed pa nyid// bde ba'i 'khor lo dri med nyid// rgyu mthun sogs par rab phye ba'i// 'bras bu
136b1(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa bzhi zhes brjod/ / las kyi rlung gis bskul ba yi// las la bcom ldan shes rab spyod// ji ltar byas pa de bzhin spyod// rgyu mthun zhes ni rab tu bsgrags// las chung 'bras bu che ba'i
136b2(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ / rnam par smin pa de las bzlog/ rnal 'byor dag phyir dri med nyid// bskyed pa skyes bus byed pa nyid// gang phyir sprul pa gnas brtan phyir// sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas brtan nyid//
136b3(rgyud 'bum): chos ni smra ba 'byung ba'i phyir// chos kyi 'khor lor thams cad yod// gang phyir mgrin par kun bkur phyir// longs spyod 'khor lor kun bkur nyid// gang phyir bde chen mgor gnas pas//
136b4(rgyud 'bum): bde ba'i 'khor lor dge 'dun che// sde pa zhes bya sku ru brjod// lto ba gnas su brjod par bya// skye gnas 'dod chags bral bar 'gyur// mngal gyi phru ma chos gos nyid// de bzhin ma ni mkhan/
136b5(rgyud 'bum): po nyid// mgo bor thal mo sbyar ba phyag/ 'gro ba'i bya ba khrims kyi gnas// sngags kyi bzlas pa a dang haM// skye gnas 'khor lo'o rnam pa a// bde chen gyi yang rnam pa haM// gcer bu skra
136b6(rgyud 'bum): dang kha spu bregs/ / sngags 'don skyes pa dge slong nyid// 'di dag rkyen gyis sems can rnams// sangs rgyas nyid du the tshom med// zla ba bcu yang sa rnams yin// sems can sa bcu'i dbang
136b7(rgyud 'bum): phyug go/ / de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag med ma la sogs pa'i lha mo thams cad la 'di lta ste// spyan ma dang / mA ma kI dang / gos dkar mo dang / sgrol ma dang / khro gnyer can dang / tsun dA
137a1(rgyud 'bum): dang par+N+Na ri khrod ma dang / 'og zhal ma dang / de dag la sogs pa ri rab kyi rdul phra rab dang mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams tshig 'di dag thos nas mchog tu ngo mtshar
137a2(rgyud 'bum): du gyur cing brgyal ba dang / skrag pa dang / sa la 'gyel ba dang / 'dar bar gyur to// yang rdo rje can gyis lha mo de rnams thams cad gzigs nas bslang ba'i phyir yang dag par bstod pa/ sa
137a3(rgyud 'bum): dang chu rlung byin za yi/ / lha mo snod can khyed nyid la// gang zhig sus kyang mi shes pa// de nyid nga yis spro yis nyon// bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung rmi lam lta bu nye bar thos nas de rnams thams
137a4(rgyud 'bum): cad srog rnyed par gyur to/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sems can rnams ni sangs rgyas nyid// 'on kyang glo bur dri mas bsgribs// de nyid bsal na sangs rgyas nyid// lha
137a5(rgyud 'bum): mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin te/ bden pa'ang ma mchis shing brdzun pa'ang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang zhig mi shes 'jig rten pa//
137a6(rgyud 'bum): btsan dug zos pas brgyal bar 'gyur// rmongs spangs de nyid yid kyis ni// de yis de nyid yongs su gcod// de bzhin zhi ba'i thabs shes shing // kye yi rdo rjer ngal bsos na// ma rig sog/
137a7(rgyud 'bum): pas mi 'dzin cing // gti mug la sogs 'ching bas min// rang dang rang gis rtogs pa las// sangs rgyas ma yin sems can ni// gcig kyang yod pa ma yin no// dmyal ba yi dgas byol
137b1(rgyud 'bum): song dang / / lha dang lha min mi rnams dang // bshang ba'i srin bu la sogs pa// lha dang lha ma yin gyi yang // bde ba gang phyir mi shes pa// rtag tu rang bzhin bde ba can// 'jig rten khams ni gang du
137b2(rgyud 'bum): yang / / sangs rgyas gzhan du rnyed mi 'gyur// sems ni rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid// sangs rgyas gzhan du bstan du med// gdol pa smyig mkhan la sogs pa// gsod don don du sems pa
137b3(rgyud 'bum): po/ de rnams kyi rdo rjer shes na// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// byis pa mi shes pas bsgribs pa// 'di yi bgrod pa mi shes pa// 'gro ba drug gi srid pa'i mthar// gang zhig rmongs
