137b6(rgyud 'bum): ni/ mdzes pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// de phyir rnam par snang mdzad sems// sku la thugs kyi phyag rgyas gdab// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ chu khams ri khrod mar bshad pa// mi bskyod
137b7(rgyud 'bum): khu ba'i gzugs can nyid/ / gtso bo mi bskyod phyag rgyas ni// ri khrod ma la phyag rgyar rigs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lus spangs nas ni sems kyis ni// gnas
138a1(rgyud 'bum): pa gzhan du mthong mi 'gyur/ / de phyir sems ni gti mug 'gyur// thugs la gti mug phyag rgyas gdab// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ me ni gdol pa mor bshad
138a2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ 'dod chags phyag rgyas gdol pa mo// rigs te phyag rgya gzhan min na// ji ltar rin chen phyag rgya lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang phyir 'dod chags khrag
138a3(rgyud 'bum): bshad pa/ / khrag ni rin chen 'byung gnas nyid// drod ni khrag gi rang bzhin phyir// 'dod chags ser sna'i phyag rgyas gdab// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ gang phyir g.yung mo rlung nyid do// don
138a4(rgyud 'bum): yod rlung gi gzugs can nyid/ / don yod phyag rgyas g.yung mo la// gtso bo phyag rgya rigs par 'gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dod chags ma gtogs phrag dog ni//
138a5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan du 'byung ba ma yin te// de phyir 'dod chags phyag rgya yis// mkhas pas g.yung mo phyag rgyas gdab// gang phyir gzugs ni sra ba nyid// dkar mo snang mdzad gsungs pa nyid// sngar
138a6(rgyud 'bum): gsungs nyid kyi rim pa yis/ / sems kyi bdag po phyag rgyas gdab// de nyid rim pas chom rkun ma// de bzhin ro langs ma nyid dang // de yi rigs pas g+hasma rI// ma log pa las phyag rgya'o//
138a7(rgyud 'bum): kye yi rdo rje rdo rje 'dzin// snyoms 'jug gnas pa'i lha nyid la// sems can don phyir gtor ma che// de la bdag med mas zhus pa// e baM rnam par bzhugs nas ni// bgegs dang log par
138b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dren pa las/ / sems can rnams kyi srog bsrung phyir// rdo rje sems dpas gtor ma bstan// oM in+da dza ma dza la dzak+Sha/ b+hU da ba h+ni bA u rak+Sha/ tsan+da sudz+dza mA da bA p+pa ta la pA tA le aT+TA sa p+pa
138b2(rgyud 'bum): swA hA/ i daM ba liM b+huny+dza dzi g+ha pul+la d+hU pa mAM sa pa~M g+ha/ aM b+ha sa p+pa kadz+dza sA da khan+ti khu Ni phe Da gA da/ oM a kA ro mu khaM sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma NAM A d+ya nut+pan+na tASha oM AHhUM phaT swA hA/ gang gi tshe 'di'i gtor mas
138b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byung po thams cad mchod par byed na rnal 'byor pa rnams legs par 'gyur te/ de rnams la bde ba dri ma med pa dang / lha mo rnams dang / 'gro ba rab tu 'byor pa rnams dga' bar 'gyur ro//
138b4(rgyud 'bum): gal te 'dir 'byung po'i tshogs kyi phyir rtag tu gtor ma byin na dbang dang / mngon spyod dang / dgra'i sde 'jigs pa dang / bskrad pa dang / gsad pa dang / dgug pa dang / zhi ba dang /
138b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas par yang 'gyur ro// rdo rje snying pos gsol pa/ phyag rgya gang gis mkha' spyod ma// gang gi phyag rgyas sa spyod ma// gtso bo bdag gis sngar ma 'tshal// bcom ldan ji ltar phyag rgya bgyi//
138b6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang gsum 'khor lo'i dbus su ni// sku gsung thugs su phye ba las// steng dang 'og dang dbus gnas pa'i// 'khor lo'i dbus su rnam par gnas//
138b7(rgyud 'bum): sa spyod sku yi phyag rgya can// steng zhal sku yi rdo rje ma// mkha' spyod 'dod chags phyag rgya can// 'og zhal gsung gi rdo rje ma// thugs kyi rdo rje bdag med ma// sems ni bdag med tshul can nyid//
139a1(rgyud 'bum): sems ni dbus kyi gnas su ste// des na bdag med ma dbus skye// rgyas par rab tu phye ba las// rigs ni rnam pa drug tu brjod// rnam gsum rnam pa lnga nyid kyang //
139a2(rgyud 'bum): bshad kyis rnal 'byor ma nyid nyon// mi bskyod rnam snang rin chen 'byung // dpag med phrag dog rdo rje sems// zhe sdang gti mug ser sna dang // 'dod chags phrag dog bde ba dag/ 'dis ni
139a3(rgyud 'bum): rim pas sgom pa nyid/ / rdo rje sems dpa' spangs nas ni// phyi nas rigs ni rnam pa lnga// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gis// de rjes rnam pa gsum du 'gyur// mi bskyod zhe sdang gzugs
139a4(rgyud 'bum): can gyi/ / thugs kyi bdag po rigs gcig nyid// zhe sdang rdo rje'i byin rlabs 'di// rigs ni drug dang lnga ru brjod// kye'i rdo rje las rgyud thams cad kyi phyag rgya bsdus pa'i don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste/
139a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa'o// // phyag ni bcu drug zhal brgyad pa// zhabs bzhi pa dang 'jigs pa po// dpa' bo thod pa'i 'phreng ba can// bdag med mas ni mgul nas 'khyud// phyag rgya lnga
139a6(rgyud 'bum): ni 'dzin lha la/ / bdag med ma ni nyid kyis zhus// bco lngas yongs su bskor ba yi// bdag gi 'khor lo khyod bshad na// khyod kyi dkyil 'khor ji ltar lags// gtso bo bdag gis sngar ma
139a7(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal/ / bdag med tsum b+ha na mdzad nas// rdo rje thod par stsal nas ni// lha yi nu ma mnyed mdzad de// dkyil 'khor yang dag rab tu dbye// 'khor lo ji ltar sngar gsungs pa// do shal do shas
139b1(rgyud 'bum): phyed pas brgyan/ / mtshams bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rdo rje srad bus yang dag brgyan// 'dod chags chen po'i rjes chags pas// lhan cig skyes dga'i rang bzhin las// khyod dang lhan cig bzhin
139b2(rgyud 'bum): bzang ma/ / de la dbus su nga yod de// zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa// phyag ni bcu drug dag gis brgyan// bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan pa nyid// 'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs pa po// mgo bo'i
139b3(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba'i do shal mdzad/ / nyi mar bzhugs shing rol mor bcas// kha dog nag po 'jigs pa po// sna tshogs rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin// nyid kyi zhal nas hUM spro zhing // thal bas lus la byugs pa nyid//
139b4(rgyud 'bum): bdag med lhan cig mnyam sbyor zhing // dga' ba gnyis gnyis snyoms 'jug pas// dpa' rlabs med pa'i bde ba thob// rlom sems med pa'i rang bzhin can// rtsa ba'i zhal ni nag po che// g.yas
139b5(rgyud 'bum): pa la ni kun da mtshungs/ / g.yon pa dmar zhing cher 'jigs pa// spyi bo'i zhal ni gtsigs pa can// spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi che// lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba bzhin// grong khyer nyams dgar khyod dang //
139b6(rgyud 'bum): dga' bas shin tu rol pa las// dkar mo dbang po'i phyogs phyung nas// shar gyi sgo ru yang dag gnas// srub dang srub pa'i sbyor ba las// chom rkun ma yang phyung nas ni// phyung nas lho yi sgo ru
139b7(rgyud 'bum): ni/ chom rkun ma ni sgo srungs ma// bo la kak+ko la sbyor bas// ro langs ma yang phyung nas ni// phyung nas nub kyi sgo ru ni// bdud 'joms ma ni rnam par gnas// dga' ba chen po'i snyoms 'jug
140a1(rgyud 'bum): las/ g+hasma rI yang phyung nas ni// phyung nas byang gi sgo la ni// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can ma nyid gnas// gnyis kyis bskyod pa'i sbyor ba las// puk+ka sI yang phyung nas ni//
140a2(rgyud 'bum): phyung nas dbang ldan mtshams su ni// drag po'i gzugs can ma nyid gnas// yang ni srub pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'tshed pa'i mtshams su ri khrod ma// srin po'i mtshams su gdol pa mo// rlung gi
140a3(rgyud 'bum): mtshams su g.yung mo nyid/ / de nas rdo rje chags chen las// rig mar bcas pa khu bar 'gyur// sna tshogs glu yi mchod pa las// de nas lha mo rnams kyis bskul// rje btsun snying rje'i yad
140a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhengs shig/ puk+ka sI ni bdag la skyobs// stong pa'i rang bzhin nyid spongs la// bdag la bde chen sbyor bzhed mdzod// khyod med na ni bdag 'gum pas// kye yi rdo rje khyod bzhengs shig/ stong pa'i
140a5(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin nyid spongs la/ / ri khrod ma 'bras grub par mdzod// dga' gtso 'jig rten mgron gnyer ba// stong pa nyid la bzhugs sam ci// khyod med phyogs ni mi 'tshal bas// gdol pa mo
140a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag zhu ba bgyid/ / bdag gis khyod kyi thugs 'tshal gyis// mig 'phrul mnga' ba khyod bzhengs shig/ g.yung mo bdag ni dran nyams pas// snying rje rgyun chad ma mdzad cig/ glang po rta bong glang
140a7(rgyud 'bum): rnga mo/ / mi dang sha ra b+ha byi la// g.yas pa'i thod pa brgyad rnams la// gnyis 'thung la sogs rim shes bya// sa dang chu dang rlung dang ni// me dang zla ba nyi ma nyid// mthar byed dang ni nor sbyin nyid//
140b1(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na'o// sgeg cing dpa' bo mi sdug pa// rgod cing drag shul 'jigs rung ba// snying rje rngam dang zhi ba yis// gar dgu'i ro dang ldan pa nyid// aM dang hUM gi rdo rje che//
140b2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gzugs las bzhengs nas ni// zhabs rnams sa la rdeb pa dang // lha dang lha min bsdigs par mdzad// gaM tsaM baM g+haM paM shaM laM DaM// 'di yi sa bon phyung ba dang // bdag po'i sa bon dag gis
140b3(rgyud 'bum): ni/ aM hUM sngon po 'bar 'jigs pas// ma mo'i 'khor lo grong nyams dgar// kha dog nag po 'jigs chen po// bdag med bde ba sbyin pa po// gtso bo 'di ltar sgom pa nyid// dkar mo'i
140b4(rgyud 'bum): g.yas na gri gug ste/ / de bzhin g.yon na ro hi ta// chom rkun ma g.yas cad te'u ste// g.yon pa'i phyag na phag pa nyid// ro langs ma g.yas rus sbal te// g.yon pa yis ni pad+ma'i snod//
140b5(rgyud 'bum): g+hasma rI yi g.yas na sbrul// g.yon pas rnal 'byor lhung bzed nyid// puk+ka sI g.yas seng ge ste// g.yon pas dgra sta de bzhin no// ri khrod ma g.yas dge slong ste// g.yon pas gsil
140b6(rgyud 'bum): byed de bzhin no/ / gdol pa mo g.yas 'khor lo ste// g.yon pas thod pa de bzhin no// g.yung mo'i g.yas na rdo rje nyid// g.yon na sdigs mdzub de bzhin no// skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis
140b7(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / dkar mo la sogs phyag gnyis brjod// spyan gsum sgra ni gyen du ste// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// gau rI kha dog nag por 'gyur// chom rkun ma ni btsod dang mtshungs/
141a1(rgyud 'bum): ro langs ma ni gser bcos bzhin// g+hasma rI ni mar gang mtshungs// puk+ka sI ni dbang sngon mtshungs// ri khrod ma ni zla nor 'od// gtum mo nam mkha'i sngo bsangs ma/
141a2(rgyud 'bum): g.yung mo sna tshogs pa zhes brjod// tshangs pa dbang po nye dbang drag/ gshin rje dang ni nor bdag dang // bden bral dang ni thags bzang ris// gau rI la sogs pa yi gdan// bo la gzhib par
141a3(rgyud 'bum): mdzad nas ni/ / ngam du 'khyud cing 'o mdzad pas// bcom ldan gus pas mchod nas ni// bdag med ma yis sngags zhus so// bud med rnams kyi dbang byed sngags// de bzhin gdug pa bsdigs
141a4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / klu rnams sdigs par byed pa nyid// lha dang lha min rnam nyed pa// de ni nga yis bshad bya yis// lha mo bde ba sbyin ma nyon// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' la// bdag gis gzhan du
141a5(rgyud 'bum): ma bstan no/ / 'di yi sngags kyis gang byung dang // rdo rje sems dpas gang mdzad pa// lha mo shin tu 'jigs pa ste// ngo mi chog pas khyod la bshad// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrug pa yis//
141a6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor rab tu bzhengs nas ni// rdo rje snying po dbang sbyin phyir// thig le mchog ni bkug pa nyid// bzlas pa khri yis gsal ba dang // sgra ring ba dang bzang ba yis// kye yi rdo rje sbyor ldan
141a7(rgyud 'bum): pas/ / btsun mo thams cad dgug par bya// bzlas pa 'bum gyis rnal 'byor bdag/ kye yi rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis// dogs pa med pa'i sems kyis ni// 'di yis las rnams thams cad byed//
141b1(rgyud 'bum): rig byed rnams kyi dang po sbyin// zla phyed thig les rnam par brgyan// de nas/ alpA na nA ya pi ga Ur+d+ha ke sha bar+t+ta ne/ tsa turbi sha ti ne tA ya/ de'i rjes su/ Sho Da Sha b+hu dzA ya/ kr-iSh+TA dzI mU ta wa pu She ka
141b2(rgyud 'bum): pA la mA lA ne kaM d+hA ri Ne/ a d+hA ta krU ra tsit+tA ya ar+d+hen du daMSh+mi Ne/ oM mA ra ya mA ra ya/ kA ra ya kA ra ya/ gar+dz+dza ya gar+dz+dza ya/ tar+dz+dza ya tar+dz+dza ya/ sho Sha ya sho Sha ya/ sap+ta sA ga rA na/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha na gAny+dza
141b3(rgyud 'bum): kAM gr-ih+Na gr-i h+Na sha hUM/ / ha hA hi hIM/ hu hU/ he haM/ ho hau/ haM haHphaT swA hA/ de nas lha mo de dgyes nas// srub dang srub pa'i sbyor ba las// dam du 'khyud dang 'o byed pas// dkyil 'khor
141b4(rgyud 'bum): yid du 'ong ba zhus/ / de la ston pa ye shes che// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyar nas// dgyes pa'i thugs kyis mnyam bzhag pas// nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bri bar mdzad// 'phar ma gcig dang sgo bzhi pa//
141b5(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs 'od kyis yang dag 'khrug/ rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan// rdo rje srad bus mnyam par brgyan// re khA lnga dang yang dag ldan// de nas bum pa brgyad po bri/ rin chen lnga yi phye ma'am//
141b6(rgyud 'bum): yang na 'bras la sogs pa 'am// dur khrod kyi ni so phag gam// de bzhin dur khrod sol ba yis// de dbus pad+ma 'dab ma ni// brgyad pa ze bar bcas pa bri/ snying por skyes pa'i thod pa nya
141b7(rgyud 'bum): mdog dkar cha ni gsum pa bri/ / dbang ldan du ri sha ra b+ha// me yi mtshams su dge slong bri// bden bral du ni 'khor lo bri// rlung du rigs kyi bdag po bri// shar sgor de bzhin gri gug nyid//
142a1(rgyud 'bum): lho ru cang te'u bri ba nyid// nub tu rus sbal bri ba nyid// lto 'phye byang du de bzhin no// lha mo kha dog dbye ba yis// phyag mtshan brgyad du rab tu grags// dbus su thod pa
142a2(rgyud 'bum): dkar po yang / / sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa bri// de nas rnam rgyal bum pa nyid// yal ga'i rtse mo gos bzang can// lto ba rin chen lngas gang ba// sA lu skyes pas yongs bkang gzhag/
142a3(rgyud 'bum): mang du rab tu brjod pas ci// ji ltar de nyid bsdus pa yi// dkyil 'khor cho ga de bzhin bya// bcu gnyis brgyang gnyis lon pa yi// rig ma bde chen brgyad po nyid// do shal rkang gdub kyis
142a4(rgyud 'bum): brgyan nas/ / dkyil 'khor du ni rab tu gzhug/ ma dang sring mo nyid dang yang // bu mo sring mo'i bu mo dang // de bzhin zhang po'i chung ma dang // ma yi spun dang sgyug mo dang // de bzhin pha yi srid
142a5(rgyud 'bum): mo nyid/ / rig ma brgyad du rab tu grags// dam du 'khyud dang 'o byed pas// 'di rnams rnal 'byor pa yis mchod// de las ga pur btung ba nyid// des ni dkyil 'khor bsang gtor bya//
142a6(rgyud 'bum): de rnams rnal 'byor pas btung bya// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur// de la chang yang btung ba dang // sha dang sA lu skyes pa bza'// de yang gos dang bral byas nas// b+ha gar 'o ni yang
142a7(rgyud 'bum): yang byed/ / des kyang po la gzhib par bya// gar bya glu yang blang bar bya// bo la kak+ko la sbyar nas// de la rtsed mo rtse bar bya// de nas thun tshod gnyis pa la// gos kyis mig ni bkab nas
142b1(rgyud 'bum): su/ / der ni slob ma gzhug pa nyid// phyi nas dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan// mtshan mo skye bo med khyim du// slob dpon la sogs rab phye nas// dbang ni ji ltar gsungs pa nyid// de la dbang
142b2(rgyud 'bum): ni sbyin par bya/ / ji ltar mchod dang bstod bshad pa// slob ma bzang pos sngar shes bya// de la de nyid bstan pa ni// dga' bral dang po mchog mtha' can// thams cad rgyud du sbas pa ste//
142b3(rgyud 'bum): mtha' yi mtha' yis phye ba nyid// rdo rje mchod pa rab sbyar nas// de la lha mo des zhus pa// lha de'i skad cig ji ltar lags// gtso bo chen po bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis
142b4(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ / der ni thog ma dbus mtha' med// srid med mya ngan 'das pa med// 'di ni mchog tu bde chen nyid// bdag med gzhan yang med pa nyid// longs spyod kyi ni rlabs gnyis/
142b5(rgyud 'bum): la/ rang gi g.yas dang lag gzhan gyi// mthe bong dang ni srin lag gis// de ni rnal 'byor pa yis btsir// de nas ye shes skye bar 'gyur// de las ci zhig skye zhe na// gzhon nu'i dga'
142b6(rgyud 'bum): ba ji lta 'am/ / lkugs pa'i rmi lam ji lta ba'o// mchog gi mtha' dang dga' bral dbus// stong dang stong min he ru ka/ kye'i rdo rje las kye'i rdo rje mngon par 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga
142b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / / lha mo la ni dam 'khyud cing // bo la thod par bcug nas ni// dam du nu ma bzung mdzad nas// skyes pa'i sna ni gzhibs nas kyang // tshems kyis ma mchu bci
143a1(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / mtshan khung sen mos rma mdzad de// mnyam sbyor bde ba myang mdzad nas// phyag rgya lnga ni rab phye ba// bla ma slob dpon 'dod lha la// phyag 'tshal don du 'khor
143a2(rgyud 'bum): lo 'dzin/ / bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa la// smod tshig mi nyan pa yi phyir// rna ba dag tu rna cha 'dzin// sngags kyi bzlas pa'ang mgul rgyan nyid// gdub bu srog chags gsod pa spangs// phyag rgya
143a3(rgyud 'bum): bsten pa ska rags nyid/ / sangs rgyas lnga yi phyag rgyas ni// rtag tu lus la phyag rgyas gdab// de nas rab tu bzhang mdzad nas// tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni// kye yi rdo rje zhes bya ba//
143a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan cig skyes pa'i gzugs can nyid// de la lha mo des zhus pa// gtso bo cho ga gang gis dang // de bzhin bya ba gang gis ni// kye yi rdo rje'i bris sku yi// byed pa bde ba chen pos gsungs//
143a5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// 'dir na 'bri mkhan dam tshig can// sgrub po'ang dam tshig can gyis ni// bris sku 'jigs pa bri ba nyid// skyes pa'i thod gnas kha dog lnga// ro yi/
143a6(rgyud 'bum): sgra yi pir nyid kyis// bris sku bla ma bri ba nyid// gang gang skud pa 'khal ba dang // gang gang ras yugs 'thag pa yang // de yang dam tshig can nges pas// dam tshig byin brlabs rnal
143a7(rgyud 'bum): 'byor las/ / zla ba zla ba'i mar ngo yi// bcu bzhi pa la khyim dben par// phyed na ma rung sems kyis ni// chang gi btung ba cung zad las// lus la ni raM shu bsams nas// de bzhin /
143b1(rgyud 'bum): gcer bur gyur pas kyang // 'bags pa dang ni ma dag pas// de nas dam tshig rab tu bza'// bzhin bzang snying rje ldan pa dang // gzugs dang lang tsho skal bzang ma// me tog bcas
143b2(rgyud 'bum): shing sgrub por dga'/ / rang gi phyag rgya g.yon du gzhag/ kye'i rdo rje las bris sku'i cho ga'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / de nas de la lha mos zhus// bo la kak+ko la sbyar
143b3(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni// glegs bam yang ni ji ltar 'gyur// rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyar nas// dgyes pas lha yis rab phye ba// glegs bam nga yis bshad bya yis//
143b4(rgyud 'bum): lha mo skal ba chen mo nyon// sbrang chen snag tsha byas nas ni// mi yi rus pa'i sbu gus ni// glegs bam sor ni bcu gnyis pa// gro gar dam tshig can gyis bri// glegs bam dang ni bris
143b5(rgyud 'bum): sku nyid/ / gal te skal med mthong na ni// skye ba 'dir ni dngos grub med// 'jig rten pha rol spyod yul med// yang dag rab sbyin ldan pa la// res 'ga' tsam zhig bstan pa nyid//
143b6(rgyud 'bum): glegs bam lam gyi spyod yul du// skra dang mchan khung nyid du sba// b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag nas// yang dang yang du'o mdzad nas// bde chen mnyam par myang mdzad de// rdo rje can gyis
143b7(rgyud 'bum): bza' ba bsngar/ / tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bza' ba ni// nyon cig lha mo mig yangs ma// gang du zos pas 'dod don kun// sgrub pa can gyis dngos grub 'gyur// dur khrod ri yi bya
144a1(rgyud 'bum): skyibs dang / / de bzhin mi med grong khyer dang // yang na dben pa'am rgya mtsho'i mthar// bza' ba 'di ni rab tu bza'// de la gdan du brtags pa ni// ro yi gzugs
144a2(rgyud 'bum): can dgu dang ni/ / yang na stag gi pags pa dang // dur khrod ras ni de bzhin no// dbus su kye yi rdo rje'i gzugs// ji ltar sngar bzhin gnas shes nas// phyogs dang phyogs bral dag tu yang // /
144a3(rgyud 'bum): de nas rnal 'byor ma rnams dgod// dam tshig mA la tin+t+ra naM// stag gi pags pa'i steng du bza'// 'bad nas rgyal po'i sA lu yi// bza' ba der ni bza' ba nyid// der ni zos nas zos
144a4(rgyud 'bum): nas kyang / / der ni ma mo mchod par bya// sring mo bu mo sgyug mo dang // gal te ma sring yin na yang // de rnams rtag tu legs mchod na// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur//
144a5(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa'i thod chen cha gcig par// chang ni bzang pos yongs bkang ste// bla ma la dbul skal chen ma// phyag 'tshal nas ni rang yang btung // pad+ma'i lag pas blang ba dang // de nyid kyi ni
144a6(rgyud 'bum): lag pas dbul/ / yang nas yang du rab 'dud pa// de ltar sgrub pa po yis bya// kye'i rdo rje las bza' ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// / de nas rnal 'byor mas zhus pa/
144a7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya chen po ji lta bu// kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni// bde ba sbyin pas bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// shin tu ring min thung ba min// gnag pa ma
144b1(rgyud 'bum): yin dkar ba min/ / pad+ma'i 'dab ma'i rnam pa 'dra// de yi dbugs ni dri zhim ldan// rdul yang dri zhim ldan 'gyur te// ri dwags lte ba'i dri dang mtshungs// pad+ma la yang dbang mchog dri/
144b2(rgyud 'bum): skad cig pad+ma khA bur 'byung // de yi ga pur sih+la dag/ mkhas pas dri bzang mtshon par bya// ut+pa la yi drir 'gyur zhing // a ka ru ni nag po mtshungs// dal zhing mi g.yo ba nyid dang /
144b3(rgyud 'bum): snyan par smra zhing yid 'ong ma// skra bzang dbus su gnyer ma gsum// phal pa pad+ma can du brjod// lhan cig skyes pa'i gzugs can ma// de rnyed nas ni dngos grub 'gyur// de nas rnal
144b4(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma bdag med mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das smon lam ji ltar gdab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rigs su skye dang dam tshig can// smyo med kye yi rdo rje ston//
144b5(rgyud 'bum): bla ma la gus snying rjer ldan// skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar shog/ lag pas rdo rje dril bu 'khrol// zab mo'i chos ni klog pa dang // btsun mo'i khu ba mnyam zas can// skye zhing skye bar 'gyur bar
144b6(rgyud 'bum): shog/ de nas lha mo de dgyes nas// tshig ni 'di nyid yang zhus pa// skal med sems can gdul dka' ba// gang gis 'dul bar 'gyur ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
144b7(rgyud 'bum): dang por gso sbyong sbyin par bya// de rjes bslab pa'i gnas bcu nyid// de la bye brag smra ba bstan// mdo sde pa yang de bzhin no// de nas rnal 'byor spyod pa nyid// de yi rjes su dbu ma bstan//
145a1(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyi rim pa kun shes nas// de rjes kye yi rdo rje brtsam// slob mas gus pas blangs nas ni// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// kye'i rdo rje las 'dul ba'i le'u ste
145a2(rgyud 'bum): brgyad pa'o/ / // de nas kha sbyar 'byed pa yi// mtshan nyid yang dag rab tu bshad// gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis// sgrub pos dngos grub thob 'gyur ba// bsgrub bya'i
145a3(rgyud 'bum): lte ba'i rtsa ba la/ / brtul zhugs can gyis lag pas gdon// he ru ka mnyam rnal 'byor gyis// nang gi ma rungs sems kyis ni// 'di ni bsgoms pa tsam gyis ni// sangs rgyas kyang ni nges par
145a4(rgyud 'bum): 'jig/ bstan la gnod pa byed pa dang // bla ma sangs rgyas 'jig pa ni// bla ma thub pa la zhus nas// snying rjes gsad par bya ba nyid// ji ltar phyugs kyi gzugs mthong nas/ khrag ni skyug pa
145a5(rgyud 'bum): nyid dang yang / / 'dar zhing mgo skyes grol ba dang // kha ni 'og tu rnam par sgom// de yi lam du khab ni me'i// gzugs can 'jug par bsam pa ste// snying kar byin za'i sa bon nyid//
145a6(rgyud 'bum): dmigs nas skad cig gsod par byed// rgyud 'di la ni sreg blugs med// phyag rgya bcing dang bya ba'ang med// rgyud chen bklags pas 'grub pa nyid// bsam gtan tsam gyis 'grub par
145a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rtog med dngos grub sbyin pa po// srid pa sbyong ba nyams dga' bar// gsang ba mchog ni bshad bya yasi// nyon cig lha mo bzhin bzang ma// rin chen gzi brjid 'bar ba yi//
145b1(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba 'khrug pa lha mo ltos// ma phug pas ni sbyor bral 'gyur// phug pas dga' ba sbyin pa po// de ltar 'khor bar 'dod pa yi// yon tan lnga ldan rin chen nyid// ma dag pas ni dug
145b2(rgyud 'bum): tu 'gro/ / dag pas bdud rtsi lta bur 'gyur// 'khor ba'i rnam pa he ru ka/ 'gro ba sgrol ba'i gtso bo nyid// gang gi gzugs kyi 'gyur ba nyid// de ni nga yis smra yis nyon// snying rje'i spyan
145b3(rgyud 'bum): ni dmar po la/ / byams pa'i thugs las yan lag gnag/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi yis ni// zhabs ni rnam pa bzhi zhes brjod// zhal brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad// phyag ni stong pa bcu
145b4(rgyud 'bum): drug nyid/ / gug skyed kyis ni sangs rgyas lnga// gdug pa 'dul phyir khro bo nyid// de nyid gsum ni spyan gsum mo// sha ni puk+ka sI ru brjod// de bzhin khrag ni ro khrod ma// gdol pa mo ni
145b5(rgyud 'bum): khu bar brjod/ / g.yung mo rkang dang tshil bu dag/ pags pa byang chub yan lag bdun// rus pa bden pa bzhi po nyid// bdag med mas gsol pa/ sngags btub ni ji ltar 'gyur//
145b6(rgyud 'bum): gang gi sngags kyis skye bo yi// las kyi dngos grub 'gyur ba nyid// bde ba chen pos bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can chen po rdo rje snying po gzi brjid chen pos bka' stsal
145b7(rgyud 'bum): pa/ sngags ni khyod la ngas bshad kyis// lha mo shes rab chen mo nyon// dang po rnam par snang mdzad sbyin// uSh+ma rnams kyi bzhi pa la// puk+ka sIs brgyan stong pas mnan// mdog
146a1(rgyud 'bum): dkar mthar ni swA hA sbyar/ / 'dis ni bzlas pa 'bum gyis ni// 'gro ba rtag tu rengs par byed// dang por yi ge'i bdag po gzhag/ de rjes mkha' spyod ma de nas/
146a2(rgyud 'bum): mthar ni swA hA sbyar byas na// sangs rgyas rnams kyang dbang du byed// rig byed rnams kyi dang po sbyin// dang po yi ni gnyis pa la// stong bcas mthar ni swA hA sbyar// sangs rgyas kyang skrod shes
146a3(rgyud 'bum): rab can/ / dang po rnam par snang mdzad sbyin// gnyis pa yau ni gsum pa la// ra dang ldan zhing chu mas brgyan// stong bcas swA hA yang dag ldan// mi rnams thams cad sdang bar byed//
146a4(rgyud 'bum): dang por yi ge'i dbang phyug gzhag/ lnga pa nyid kyi gsum pa la// stong pa mkha' 'gro ma dang ldan// mthar ni swA hA mngon spyod che// yang ni yi ge'i thu bo sbyin// hUM ni khrag dang 'dra ba la/
146a5(rgyud 'bum): mthar ni swA hA thig le mchog/ dga' bzang ma sogs rtag tu 'gugs// gti mug rigs ni dang por sbyin// g+hu ni yang dag rab tu sbyar// mthar ni swA hA yang byas na// lha dang mi rnams gsod
146a6(rgyud 'bum): par byed/ / dang por rnam par snang mdzad gzhag/ dang po nyid kyi dang po la// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang sbyar// mthar gnas pa yi gnyis pa la// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang ldan// yang ni dang
146a7(rgyud 'bum): po'i rtse mo la/ / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dang ldan// mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa la// yang ni de nyid yang dag ldan// steng du chom rkun ma yis brgyan// de rjes hrIHyi rnam par sbyar// mthar yang
146b1(rgyud 'bum): swA hA spyod pa nyid/ / ku ru kul+le'i sngags so// oM ni dang po bzhi pa yi// gsum pa chom rkun ma yis brgyan// mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa la// pi tsu badz+ra sbyar ba dang // uSh+ma rnams kyi brda
146b2(rgyud 'bum): pa la/ / puk+ka sI yis rnam par brgyan// spong pas mnan cing sum 'gyur nyid// lnga pa yin gnyis pa dang // gsum pa'i dang po mthar swA hA// kye yi rdo rje'i snying po'o// snang mdzad dang po
146b3(rgyud 'bum): la gnyis/ / sbyar nas lnga pa'i bzhi pa la// mthar gnas rnams kyi dang po ldan// g+hasma rIs ni rnam par brgyan// uSh+ma rnams kyi bzhi pa la// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yis brgyan// stong pas mnan
146b4(rgyud 'bum): cing sum 'gyur nyid/ / lnga pa yi ni gnyis pa dang // gsum pa'i dang po mthar swA hA// phyag bzhi pa'i sngags so// dang por rnam snang dang po yi// dang po nang gi dkar mos brgyan// gsum pa nyid
146b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi dang po la/ / nang gi dkar mos rnam par brgyan// nyis 'gyur lnga pa'i gsum pa dang // gnyis pa'i gsum pa me yis brgyan// hUM gi rnam pa gsum sbar nas// lnga pa nyid kyi gnyis pa dang //
146b6(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa'i dang po mthar swA hA/ phyag drug pa'i sngags so// dang po rnam snang bzhi pa yi// dang po byin za yang dag ldan// ro langs ma yis rnam par brgyan// mthar gnas pa yi gsum pa la//
146b7(rgyud 'bum): g+hasma rI yis rnam par brgyan// dang po yi ni dang po la// mthar gnas pa yi dang po dang // rdo rje ma yis rnam par brgyan// k+Sha ni chom rkun ma yis brgyan// lnga pa nyid kyi dang po dang // uSh+ma
147a1(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi bzhi pa la/ / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma yis brgyan// stong pas mnan cing sum 'gyur te// phaT dang mthar ni swA hA nyid// phyag gnyis pa'i sngags so// bdag med dang
147a2(rgyud 'bum): po'i dang po dang / / gnyis pa nyid kyi dang po dang // gsum pa nyid kyi dang po dang // bzhi pa yi ni dang po dang // lnga pa yi ni dang po dang // mthar gnas rnams kyi dang po dang // uSh+ma rnams kyi dang po
147a3(rgyud 'bum): nyid/ / dang por rnam snang mthar swA hA// grong khyer dkrug pa'i sngags kyi bzlas pa ni 'bum mo// mthar gnas rnams kyi gnyis pa dang // k+Sha yi rkang pa gnyis 'gyur nyid// hUM gi rnam pa gsum dang ldan
147a4(rgyud 'bum): dang po rnam snang phaT nyid kyi/ / rnam pa nang bcug mthar swA hA// sa sbyong ba'i sngags so// dang por rnam snang de rjes su// rdo rje ma yi mtha' ru hUM// bza' ba dang datung ba byin gyis brlab pa'o// dang por
147a5(rgyud 'bum): rnam par snang mdzad nyid/ / de rjes a kA ro mu khaM// uSh+ma rnams kyi gsum pa dang // mthar gnas pa yi bzhi pa ni// steng du me yis rnam par brgyan// d+har+m+ma NAM de rjes rdo rje ma// byin la d+ya nut+pan+na tAtra/
147a6(rgyud 'bum): oM AHhUM phaT swA hA/ 'byung po thams cad kyi gtor ma'i sngags so// kye'i rdo rje las sngags btu ba'i le'u sde dgu pa'o// de nas chos kun sdom cig pa'i// rdo rje sems
147a7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' zhes byas gsungs/ / bdag med ma la 'o mdzad nas// bzlas pa'i yul ni rab tu dbye// shel gyis rengs pa'i bzlas pa nyid// dbang la tsan dan dmar po nyid// lung tang gis ni mngon
147b1(rgyud 'bum): spyod nyid/ / ni raraM shus ni sdang ba la// rta yi rus pas skrod pa nyid// bram ze'i rus pas dgug pa nyid// glang po'i rus pas char pa la// ma he yis kyang gsad pa la// rengs par 'o ma'i btung ba
147b2(rgyud 'bum): nyid/ / dbang la rang gi 'dun pas spyad// gsad pa la ni si h+la nyid// dgug pa la ni bzhi mnyam nyid// sdang la sA lu skyes pa brjod// bskrad pa nyid la gla rtsir brjod// yang na mtha'i sha dang /
147b3(rgyud 'bum): dang po'i sha dang / na dang po dang / ga dang po dang / ha dang po nyid kyang de bzhin no// kye'i rdo rje las bzlas pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu pa'o// / kye'i rdo rje la dam 'khyud cing /
147b4(rgyud 'bum): tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni// lus can rnams kyi rigs kyi gzugs// de la bdag med mas zhus pa// b+ha gar ling ga bzhag nas ni// 'khor lo'i 'dren pas 'di skad gsungs// lus can rang
147b5(rgyud 'bum): gi rigs bshad kyis/ / shes rab pha rol phyin ma nyon// bud med dam ni skyes pa yi// gang gi srin lag rtsa ba la// rdo rje rtse dgu par gyur pa// mi bskyod pa yi rigs mchog nyid// rnam snang mdzad
147b6(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'khor lor gyur/ / dpag med mgon gyi 'dam skyes nyid// rin chen 'byung gi rin chen nyid// las kyi rigs kyi ral gri nyid// rnal 'byor pa gang nag po nyid// de yi lha ni mi bskyod pa// rnal
147b7(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pa gang dkar po che/ / de yi ldan rnam snang mjed// rnal 'byor pa gang sngo bsangs che// de yi lhani don yod nyid// rnal 'byor pa gang ser po che// rin chen bdag po rigs kyi lnga// rnal
148a1(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pa gang dkar dmar nyid/ / 'od dpag med pa rigs kyi lnga// rnal 'byor pa gang dkar dang ser// de ni sems dpa'i rigs su 'gyur// skye bo rnal 'byor mthar phyin pas/
148a2(rgyud 'bum): nga rgyal mi bcag mtho mo btsam// kun rdzob gzugs su gnas nas ni// de rnams bde gshegs rigs su 'gyur// bud med rnams kyi mtshan nyid ni// ji ltar skyes pa de bzhin no// kun rdzob tha
148a3(rgyud 'bum): spyad tshul las ni/ / de yi rigs su'ang de 'gyur ro// b+ha gar ling ga'i 'o mdzad nas// de la rdo rje che mnyes nas// bdag med ma yis go mdzad pa// lha mo rab tu mchod pa nyon// tshal dang
148a4(rgyud 'bum): skye bo med gnas dang / / bdag gi khyim gyi nang du yang // gcer bus phyag rgya che byas nas// rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod// 'o dang 'khyud pa byas nas ni// de bzhin b+ha gar reg pa nyid//
148a5(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa'i sna ni gzhib pa dang // ma mchu'i sbrang rtsi btung ba nyid// rtag tu myos pa'i mtshan ma las// bo la ldan pas lag pas bya// khyogs dang brla zhes bya ba dang // de bzhin shin tu skal
148a6(rgyud 'bum): ba yis/ / yang yang rdo rjes 'dod pa bya// steng dang 'og tu lta ba nyid// dngos grub rgyas pa thob pa ste// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// de la ga pur btung bar bya// de la ga pur rgyu
148a7(rgyud 'bum): yi phyir/ / sha ni bza' ba nyid du 'gyur// khyad par du ni chang nyid do// kye'i rdo rje las lhan cig skyes pa'i sbyor ba'i don gyi le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas
148b1(rgyud 'bum): rje can gyis dbang / / bzhi pa'i don ni bka' stsal pa// rdo rje rab gnas rdo rje nyid// tshe dang dril bu chen po zung // ngi ring rdo rje slob dpon 'gyur// slob ma bsdu ba nyid du gyis// ji ltar 'das
148b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ / byang chub sras rnams dbang bskur ba// bdag gi gsang ba'i dbang gis ni// sems kyi rgyun gyis dbang bskur ro// lha mos dga' sbyin gnas sbyin ma// sna tshog
148b3(rgyud 'bum): gzugs can yid 'ong ma/ / khyer cig khyer cig sems dpa' che// khyer la mchod pa rtag tu gyis// ye shes 'di ni ches phra zhing // rdo rje nam mkha'i dkyil lta bu// rdul bral mthar phyin
148b4(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba nyid/ / khyod rang yang ni de yi pa// rdo rje dang pad+ma byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags ni/ oM pad+ma su khA d+hA ra ma hA rA ga su khaM da da tsa tu rA nan+da b+hA ga bi shwa hUM hUM hUM kAr+yaM ku ru Sha me/ oM badz+ra ma hA dwe ShaH
148b5(rgyud 'bum): / tu rA nan+da dA ya kaH/ kha ga mu khaM ka ra so nA tha hUM hUM hUM kAr+ya ku ru Sha me oM AHhUM/ spyi bor ni oM gyi rnam pa/ snying kar ni hUM gi rnam pa/ ze 'bru la ni AH'i rnam pa'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu
148b6(rgyud 'bum): ma'i brtag pa zhes bya ba brtag pa sum curtsa gnyis las phyung ba brtag pa gnyis kyi bdag nyid kyi'i rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma dra ba'i sdom pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po rdzogs so/ /
148b7(rgyud 'bum): gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//
149a1(rgyud 'bum): gar skad du/ Ar+ya DA ki nI badz+ra pany+dza ra ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza kalpa nA ma/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po'i brtag pa/ kye'i
149a2(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/ / nam mkha' bems bcas dang ba dang // go skabs med dang 'byed pa dang // sna tshogs rdo rje'i gzhi gnas khang // sems can khams dang yid 'ong dang // sems can
149a3(rgyud 'bum): snod dang 'jig rten dang / / sa dang sa 'og par snang dang // yid dang lus dang ngag dang ni// gcig dang gnyis dang mkha' bde dang // drug dang lnga dang drug gnyis dang // bzhi dang skye 'gro rnams/
149a4(rgyud 'bum): dang ni// gcig gis nyi shur ma tshang dang // khams gsum ma lus pa dang ni// pha dang bu dang ma mo dang // phyi rol dang ni nang dang ngam// btsun mo kun dang chos dang ni// thams cad las dang
149a5(rgyud 'bum): bdag med dang / / 'bras bu rgyu dang bya ba zhes// bsgrub bya sgrub thabs rdo rje dang // de bzhin kun gzhi rnam shes dang // chos kyi dbyings dang ma byung dang // nam mkha'i khams dang rang dbyings
149a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / / bdag med pa dang bdag ces dang // dngos po med dang dngos med min// bde ba can dang gru gsum dang // a skyes dang ni skyon bral dang // rdul bral dang ni sdig bcom dang // dpa'
149a7(rgyud 'bum): rlabs med pa'i rang bzhin dang / / mthar ni zhi ba'i bde rig dang // gsang dang mchog dang dgyes pa la// sangs rgyas kun khyab sems dpa' ni// mkha' 'gro ma yi rdo rje gur// 'di ni rang byung
149b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das/ / lha yi bdag po gcig pu nyid// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// 'bum phrag lnga bdag kye'i rdo rje// las ni dkyil 'khor lnga gsungs pa// rdo rje can dang phan pa
149b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / / de bzhin rdo rje gzi brjid nyid// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug dang // rta bdun rgyal po lnga po'o// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor du// dkar mo rkun ma ro langs ma// g+hasma ri dang puk+ka sI//
149b3(rgyud 'bum): ri khrod gdol pa g.yung mo'o// rdo rje phan pa'i dkyil 'khor du// skam pa zhags pa nyi ma dang // rol zlum ma dang lcags kyu 'dzin// me tog ma sogs mtshams kyi char// rdo rje nyi ma'i
149b4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor du/ / nyi lag ma dang mar me dang // rin chen sgron ma glog lag ma// lA s+ye la sogs mtshams char ro// pad+ma chos 'byung lcags sgrog dang // 'khyud ma gar gyi dkyil 'khor du/
149b5(rgyud 'bum): gling bu ma sogs mtshams kyi char// bdag nyid cha byad sbyor bas so// rta yi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje sgo lcags lde kyog ma// sgo ma dang ni gos 'dzin ma// de bzhin mtshams su spyan
149b6(rgyud 'bum): la sogs/ / rdo rje mkha' 'gro de rnams kun// rkang pa g.yon pa brkyang bas gnas// snying khar g.yon bcangs sdigs mdzub ste// kha dog sna tshogs che 'bar ba'o// shin tu zhe sdang zhe sdang tsho//
149b7(rgyud 'bum): go rI la sogs rab tu grags// shin tu gti mug rmongs chen las// skam pa ma sogs cher gzung ngo // shin tu gzi brjid cher gsal ba// nyi ma la sogs rab tu grags// shin tu 'dod
150a1(rgyud 'bum): chags chen po la/ / pad sogs chos kyi dkyil 'khor du'o// phrag dog chen po'i sgrib chen las// sgo lcags ma sogs myur 'gro bdag/ rgyal ba mgon po phan pa ni//
150a2(rgyud 'bum): gti mug thams cad zad par mdzad// rdo rje nyi ma rgyal po che// rnam par rtog pa'i rab rib 'phrog/ rta mgrin 'dod pa chen po ni// 'dod chags can gyi byang chub ster// rdo rje mgyogs 'gro
150a3(rgyud 'bum): phrag dog che/ / theg pa gzhan ni rnam par spangs// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// mi bskyod ye shes 'byung ba'i gnas// skye 'gro mi zad mgron gnyer phyir// sgrib pa lnga ni 'joms pa po// de
150a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par dag pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / zhe sdang gti mug nga rgyal dang // 'dod chags ser sna skye bo rnams// bsdu phyir rang gi 'khor lo la// rdo rje gzugs ni
150a5(rgyud 'bum): dum 'dzin/ / shin tu gdug pa drag po la// zhi ba nye bar mi sbyar te// 'di mkhyen rdo rje can chen ni// rang gis kye yi rdo rjer 'gyur// shin tu stong par zhen rnams kyi// yod min brtul zhugs
150a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin rnams kyi/ / sangs rgyas gti mug spyod don du// rdo rje rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'gyur// shin tu nga rgyal gdug rnams kyi// skye 'gro'i nga rgyal zad par mdzad// rdo rje nyi ma bdag nyid rgyal//
150a7(rgyud 'bum): nga rgyal chen po'i mun pa 'joms// byang chub chags bral las skyes spangs// sems can gang zhig bde byed pa// chags pas byang chub rab grub phyir// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug 'gyur//
150b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam gnas shing // gang zhig lam gzhan nas 'gro ba// de rnams byang chub rab sbyin phyir// rdo rje mgyoms 'gro rang gtso bo// dbang po gang dang gang lam nyid// de dang de
150b2(rgyud 'bum): yi ngo bor 'gro/ / mchog tu phan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid 'gyur// gang dang gang gis dngos po yis// skyes pa rnams kyis yid sbyor la// des na de yi rang bzhin
150b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / sna tshogs gzugs nor ji bzhin no// gang dang gang gis 'dul ba yi// sems can 'dul bar 'gyur ba ste// de dang de yi rnam pa yis// chos kyi bshad pa bya ba'o// sems kyi rdo
150b4(rgyud 'bum): rje las byung ba'i/ / sems can sna tshogs rang bzhin can// sems ni rang gi rnam rtog gis// skye bo'i dri mas nag por byas// de bas kun tu rab 'bad pas// sems kyi rdo rje rnam par sbyang //
150b5(rgyud 'bum): sems dag pa ni bde ba yi// nyon mongs dug ni thams cad 'phrog/ gal te stong pa thabs yin na// de tshe sangs rgyas nyid mi 'gyur// 'bras bu rgyu las gzhan min phyir// thabs ni stong pa
150b6(rgyud 'bum): nyid ma yin/ / lta ba rnams la log rnams kyi// bdag tu lta ba tshol rnams kyi// bdag zhen bsam pa bzlog pa'i phyir// stong pa rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs// de phyir dkyil 'khor
150b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo zhes/ / thabs ni bde ba'i sdom pa ste// sangs rgyas nga rgyal rnal 'byor gyis// sangs rgyas nyid du myur bar 'gyur// ston pa sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan// gtso bo dpe byad brgyad
151a1(rgyud 'bum): cur ldan/ / de phyir thabs kyis bsgrub bya dang // de ni thabs kyi gzugs can no// thams cad kyi rnam pa mchog tu zhi ba sems can 'jug pa'i le'u ste dang po'o// /
151a2(rgyud 'bum): / de nas rdo rje khams gsum thob// rnal 'byor ma ni rdo rje gur// dam tshig mchod pa yid 'ong ba// 'khor la rab tu bka' stsal pa// glu ni rdo rje can la dbul// gang ni sangs
151a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas rnams la 'bul/ / ha rI mchog la de bzhin dri// 'jig rten rje la bza' dang btung // gos kyis mchod pa rta mchog la// 'di rnams dam tshig dam pa ste// rdo rje mchod pa byas pa yis//
151a4(rgyud 'bum): / rdorje can kun mnyes par byed// a ka ru gnas kye rdo rje// phan pa la ni tsan dan dkar// dmar po 'jig rten rjel 'bul// kha che rdo rje snang ba la// bdun gyi rgyal po thams cad do// hUM rdo rje
151a5(rgyud 'bum): las byung ba'i dri/ / 'di rnams dri yi rab sbyor bas// dam pa'i sangs rgyas nyid thob bo// tsha ba kha ba rdo rjer 'bul// mngar ba rdo rje rtag pa la// sgyur ba rdo rje nyi ma la// de bzhin lan tshwa 'jig
151a6(rgyud 'bum): rten rjer/ / rta yi rgyal po thams cad dam// bsra ba rab tu brtag par bya// kye yi rdo rje rdor can gyis// me tog mdog gnag rkang 'thung byung // ma l+li kA dang mA la ti// kun nga rtag tu sangs rgyas
151a7(rgyud 'bum): 'bul/ / shing gi dbang mchog dri med mdog/ snang byed la ni sbyar bar bya// dbang mchog dmar po chu skyes dang // b+han d+hu dmar po pa ta lar// pad+ma gar gyi dbang la 'bul// rta mchog rdo rje can
151b1(rgyud 'bum): la kun/ / rdo rje can gyi khru gsum ste// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor khru bzhi pa// snang byed la ni khru lnga nyid// pad+ma gar dbang drug pa ste// lcags kyi rgyal po de bzhin bdun// bza' la rdo rje nyi ma yi//
151b2(rgyud 'bum): lam du lcags kyu mchog gi dang // gnyid la sangs rgyas mgon po yi// shin tu bde la gar dbang gi/ glu gar de bzhin rol mo'i sgra// sa gzhi yongs gzung dus su ni// rdo rje'i gzugs su bzhag
151b3(rgyud 'bum): nas su/ / bdag gi rnal 'byor rab tu sgrub// rdo rje'i dbang po sngon po ste// zla ba chu shel thub chen gyi// mkhar phyin skyes pa'i me tog dmar// nor bu dmar rgyal mkha' mdzod kyi// pad+ma dmar po spyan
151b4(rgyud 'bum): ras gzigs/ / rta yi yang mar ka ta ste// rin lnga'i rdul gyi rdul tshon mchog/ de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can chen po mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje gur 'byung po 'dul ba'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so//
151b5(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig yang dag rab phye bya// kun tu bzang po'i sa bon bdag/ dbang po sngon po lta bu'i 'od// phyag bzhi 'jigs byed chen po ste// mdzes pa'i khro bo yi ni lus// dbang ldan 'byung po mnan pa ste//
151b6(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pas rigs kyi bdag po nyid// lag pa g.yon pas mi lpags nyid// gnyis po dag gis phyag rgya sbyor// zhabs g.yon brkyang bas yang dag gnas// cung zad mche bas 'jigs par byed//
151b7(rgyud 'bum): mgo bo'i 'phreng ba'i rgyan mchog ste// mgo 'dzings phyed du bcings par ni// ri yi rtse mor bsgom par bya// 'byung po 'dul bar 'grub par 'gyur// gnod sbyin du ma 'byung po dang // gnod sbyin
152a1(rgyud 'bum): mo dang klu mo dang / / mi mo lA yi mdzes mni// sgrub pa po yis nges par 'grub// sngags ni/ oM b+hU ta DA ma ra thA tA pa Thi ak+Sho d+hA ki ri nI na sarba b+hU ta pre babi shA tsi sA dA ya hU la
152a2(rgyud 'bum): de nas rdo rje chen po rdo rje can mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje gur stobs po che'i ting nge dzin la bzhugs so/ / char chen rab tu dbar bya ste// pad+ma'i deb ma brgyad pa bsam// der ni klu brgyad dgod par bya/
152a3(rgyud 'bum): stobs po cher ni rab sbyor bas// de rnams rnga ma yang dag mnam// char med stobs po che las ni// chu yi tshogs ni dbab par bya// kha dog gnag cing cher gsal ba// 'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs
152a4(rgyud 'bum): par mdzad/ / phyag brgyad zhal ni bzhi pa ste// skar nyi rdo rje gdan mdzad pa// phyag rnams kyis ni klu bdag bsnams// phuHzhes bya ba'i sngags zlos shing // hUM dag nang du chud byas te// phaT ni mtha'
152a5(rgyud 'bum): ru sbyar bar bya/ / dang po'i zhal ni nag po ste// gnyis pa zla 'od bzang po nyid// gsum pa ser po'i mdog lta bu// bzhi pa dmar po nyid du brjod// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis yang dag brgyan// rdo rje sems
152a6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' rnam par brgyan/ / klu rnams kyis ni char dbab phyir// stobs po che ni rab bsgrub bya// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin 'dzin pa rdo rje gur smra ba pos sangs rgyas
152a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi kho na dbye bar bya'o/ / rdo rje pad+ma'o byas dang // ri dgas brgyan pa bos pa dang / dze rje chu thung nor ldan pa// sangs rgyas po nyid 'di rig pa// dag pa'i gnas ni gnas chen po// sangs rgya
152b1(rgyud 'bum): kun gyis rab gang ba/ / rdo rje rin chen kun khyab pa// gang gyur pa yis bshad par bya// phan pa'i grong khyer yid 'ong bar// mkha' 'gro rdo rnga lu gu rgyung// zhen pa chen po sangs rgyas kun// lug
152b2(rgyud 'bum): sgrog rdo rjes bcing bar bya/ / dga' ldan du ni 'deg par 'gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'dod pa thob// rgyal ba mgon po byams pa ni// ye shes spyan gyis rnam par gzigs// rdo rje lu gu rgyud
152b3(rgyud 'bum): bcings pas/ / rgyal po'i tshigs rnams bcing bar bya// gang zhig dngos grub mi ster na// sgrog gis bcings nas dgug par bya/ rdo rje kyo ba dkar mo che// rdo rje zhags pa chom rkun ma/ rdorje
152b4(rgyud 'bum): lcags sgrog ro langs ma/ / rdo rje dril bu g+hasma rI// sangs rgyas rnams ni dbang du byed// bzlas dang bsgom pa mngon dga' ba'i// dngos grub gal te mi ster na// de tshe ma'agro ma bzhi yis//
152b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnams ni dral shul sgrub// de nas rdo rje 'dzin gyi rgyal po mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje gur gyi rgyud kyi nang du 'bum phrag lnga bris pa yang dag par bshad par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi ni dkyil 'khor
152b6(rgyud 'bum): 'bum/ / rdo rje can gyi de bzhin 'bum// 'bum gyis rdo rje 'i ma yi// 'bum gyis rdo rje chos kyi'o// 'bum phrag phyed kyis rdo rje ste// 'byung po 'dul ba stong phrag lngas// lnga yis las ni rab rgyas pa/
152b7(rgyud 'bum): lnga yis sangs rgyas gar malam ring // stong phrag sum sru ngadag gis mi// ku ru kul+le'i brtag pa'o// lhag ma stong phrag lnga yis ni// cho ga'i rim pargyad kun gyi'o// rdo rje 'gro kye'i rdo rje'i/
153a1(rgyud 'bum): 'bum phrag lnga ni bris pa'o// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa blo dang ldan pa mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur sangs rgyas kyi gar gyi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs so// gar dang glu la rab zhen pa'i/
153a2(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas gar mkhan rol pa mdzad// sangs rgyas gar mkhan rdo rje yis// 'dod chags can gyis byang chub sgrub// de nas rdo rje can 'byung ste// me tog
153a3(rgyud 'bum): snyim pas rab sbyor bas/ / sems can kun la phan ldan pa'i// dam tshig der ni bshad par bya// sems can ji snyed pa rnams sems can du bsdu bas bsdus pa sgo nga las skyes pa 'am/ mngal las
153a4(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa 'am/ drod gsher las skyes pa 'am/ rdzus te skyes pa 'am/ gzugs can rnams sam/ gzugs med rnams sam/ 'du shes can rnams sam/ 'du shes med pa can nyid rnams
153a5(rgyud 'bum): sam/ 'du shes med pa rnams sam/ sems can de rnams thams cad bdag gis kyang phyag rgya chen po'i go 'phang la dgod par bya'o// dam tshig che bshad de nas ni// zur mig mi g.yo mgon byung
153a6(rgyud 'bum): ste/ mi bskyed ye shes brnyes ldan pa'i// ston pa la ni rnam par spong // ci khyod dam tshig hUM zhes bya// thub pa chen po gzhu can yin// nga ming snying rje'i stobs dpal ldan// bdag stobs bcom
153a7(rgyud 'bum): pa min nam ci/ / ci khyod dam tshig oM zhes bya// khyod ni tshangs pa thub pa rnams// nga ming rnam par snang mdzad dpal// khyod ni me bcom 'dod pa bral// ci khyod dam tshig aHzhes bya// ma
153b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag mkha' lding mkhyen nam ci/ / nga ming pad+ma gar dbang dpal// khyod ni gar mkhan nyer bzhad mkhan// ci khyod dam tshig tAM zhes bya// khyod ni gdugs te tsha ba 'phrog/ nga ming rdo rje nyi ma dpal/
153b2(rgyud 'bum): gdugs kyi rnam khyod ji ltar min// ci khyod dam tshig la zhes bya// khyod ni mkha' stong rang bzhin no// nga ming rdo rje mgyogs 'gro yin// khyod ni rta ste pha rol 'gro// ci khyod dam tshig snying rje chang/
153b3(rgyud 'bum): e ma chang 'tshong mdzes ma'o// mi g.yo bdag min ma mA kI// zhang po'i grong khyer 'dzin nam ci// ci khyod dam tshig zhi ba nyid// bud med g.yo sgyu 'dzin nam ci// bdag ni ma yin lha mo sbyin//
153b4(rgyud 'bum): spyan yin na ni g.yo dang bcas// ci khyod dam tshig 'dod chags che// smad 'tshong ma la smar ci yod// bdag ming lha mo dkar mo'o// ji ltar dri ma dkar ba yin// ci khyod dam tshig dbang
153b5(rgyud 'bum): byebyang che/ / btsun mo'i pho la min nam ci// bdag ming zur mig sgrol ma'o// sgrol ma mig ni bcom pa yin// mig yon bdag ni nor ldan dpal// de ltar ngo tsha med pas legs// ngo tsha med
153b6(rgyud 'bum): pas sangs rgyas min/ / mthong dang mi mthun myur du smos// de nas rdo rje mig yin po smod pa pos gsungs pa/ rdo rje sems dpa' zhe sdang che// thub pa rnam par snang mdzad rmongs// 'dod
153b7(rgyud 'bum): la zhen pa 'jig rten bdag/ ser sna rdo rje snang byed de// don yod skyon ni thams cad byed// 'dren pa lnga ni skyon ldan no// sgong skyes mngal nas skyes pa 'am// drong gsher skyes dang mtha'
154a1(rgyud 'bum): 'khob bzhin/ / gzugs can rnams sam gzugs med dam// rdzus nas skyes pa nyid dang ni// thams cad sangs rgyas bya'o zhes// khyod kyis dang po gsungs pa ni//

154a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas nyid de ngo mtshar rmad/ / 'chi bdud tshe'am mu ge 'am// phas kyi 'khor lo'i gnod pa dang // rab gnas dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg dang // char med pa dang zhi ba dang // sngags dang bsgoms par

154a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gnas nyid du/ / sangs rgyas gar mkhan rol pa mdzad// khams gsum de bzhin rtsa ba 'am// ma dag pa'i yang rgyan rnams kyis// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gar mkhan gar// bde ba dga' bar

154b2(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa/ nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// pad+ma 'dab brgyad bsgom par bya// dbang po shar gyi 'dab mar bsam// mthar byed lhor ni dgod par bya// chu bdag nub kyi 'dab ma la/
154b3(rgyud 'bum): byang du nor sbyin dgod par bya// mer ni byin za chen po nyid// bden bral mtshams skyong de bzhin no// rlung du gnas med bsam par bya// dbang ldan du ni 'byung po'i gtso// zla'i tshangs pa la sogs

154b5(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul dga'i gnas rnams dang / / gtsang ma'i gnas su gang gnas dang // bde ba can du 'dug pa dang // 'og min du ni gnas pa dang // 'od zer can gyi 'jig rten khams// sum cu rtsa gsum

155a6(rgyud 'bum): haha ha ha hoHb+ha ga waM sarba ta thA ga to badz+ra mA me muny+tsa badz+ri b+ha wa ma hA sa ma ya satwa aHmuH/ de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur rdo rje ming gi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te rdo rje ming phye ba'o//
