157a1(rgyud 'bum): pa sum cu par ni bshad// stong phrag sum cu'i grangs kyis ni// mkha' 'gro mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi// 'bum phrag lnga yi rgya mtsho che// kye yi rnga rje rdor 'chang gi/ rgyud ni e
157a2(rgyud 'bum): ma rgyas bstan pa/ / 'bum phrag lnga bdag kye rdo rje// dag pa'i snying po yongs su gzung // rdo rje mkha' 'gros gsungs pa ste// 'di ni rgyud kyi nges pa'o// kye yi rdo rje rnal 'byor rgyud// dang por
157a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba rnams kyis bshad/ / phyi nas rnal 'byor ma rgyud ni// de nyid bud med gzung phyir ro// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na spros pa las bsdus pa lags/ bskal pa bzang po la byang chub sems
157a4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' rnams dang so so'i skye bo rnams tshe thung bar 'gyur na/ ji ltar na de rnams 'dzin par 'gyur/ ji ltar na de rnams thos par 'gyur/ ji ltar na sems par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na/
157a5(rgyud 'bum): skye bo phal pa tshe zung bar 'gyur/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ re zhig gang dag slob dpon rnams su 'gyur ba de rnams rtsa ba'i ltung ba 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag spyod pa po de rnams
157a6(rgyud 'bum): mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la spyod par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag so so'i skye bo de rnams srog chags gsod par 'gyur ba dang / gang dag bud med kyi tshogs rnams gcig tu 'dod pa la zhen
157a7(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ba ste/ de'i phyir rgyud rnams thams cad rgyas par bstan pa ma yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rdo rje gsung thos nas mnyes par gyur
157b1(rgyud 'bum): cing dgyes pa brnyes nas tshig 'di gsungs pa/ snying rje chen po kye rdo rje// nga ni dur khrod chu 'gram dang // nags tshal skye bo mang grong du// bsnyen bkur can la dngos grub ster// mtsho skyes
157b2(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa'i 'gram yid 'ong / / sku gdung zab mo'i mchod rten dang // rkang 'thung rlon pa'i 'og tu ni// nga ni sangs rgyas dngos grub ster// tshong dus tshong rdal nyid dang ni// tshong dus nam pa'i khyim duni/ rdo rje nyim brtan pa ra
157b3(rgyud 'bum): bsnyen bkur can la dngos grub ster/ / glu gar rab tu 'ching ba dang // chang 'tsheng ma yi khyim du ni// 'di ltar pad+ma gar mkhan nga // bsnyen bkur can la dngos grub ster// rtag tu 'gro mgyogs
157b4(rgyud 'bum): zhon 'gyur dang / / res 'ga' lam du 'gro ba na// rta ni don yod brtan pa nga// dngos grub rdo rje rnams ster ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can chen po mkha' 'gro ma rdo rje gur phyag rgya rnam par
157b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ phyag rgya dang phyag mtshan yang dag par bshad pa/ sku gsung thugs kyi brtag pa las// phyag rgya rnam gsum shes par bya// sku la lag pa'i phyag
157b6(rgyud 'bum): rgya yin/ / sngags bzlas pa las ngag phyag rgya// sems la mtshan ma'i phyag rgya yin// de nyid bsam gtan dkyil 'khor la'o// lag pa g.yas na skam pa ste// g.yon na sdigs mdzub de bzhin no//
157b7(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro skam pa ma 'jigs ma// gdug pa rnams kyi 'khor ba 'don// g.yas pa'i lag na zhags pa ste// gdug pa rnams bcing rnam par dgug/ de 'di zhags pa ma shes bya// g.yon pas
158a1(rgyud 'bum): gdug pa sdigs mdzub ma/ / g.yas na nya rgya zlum po ste// gdug pa rnams ni dkri bar 'dod// 'di ni rtag tu rol sbrum bshad// g.yon pas gdug pa sngags mdzub mdzad/
158a2(rgyud 'bum): lag pa g.yas par lcags kyu ste// gdug pa rnams ni dgug par 'dod// 'di de rdo rje gyo mar bshad// g.yon pas bdud la sdigs mdzub ma// lag pa g.yas pa nyi ma ste// gti mug mun pa
158a3(rgyud 'bum): rnam par dral/ / g.yon pa sdigs mdzub mar ni bshad// de ni rdo rje nyi mar brjod// lag g.yas mar me'i sdong snod de// de bzhin g.yon par sdig mdzub bo// 'di de rdo rje mar mer bshad// rnam par
158a4(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa'i rab rib 'joms/ / lag pa g.yas na rin po che// sems can rnams la sbyin pa ster// g.yon na sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mo// rin chen sgron ma 'di rab brjod// glog ni lag pa g.yas
158a5(rgyud 'bum): par te/ / rnam par rtog pa'i chu 'dzin 'joms// de 'di glog lag mar shes bya// de bzhin g.yon pas sdigs mdzub ma// lag pa g.yas par pad+ma ste// pad+ma'i 'dod chags brjod par bya//
158a6(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pas sdigs mdzub ma nyid de// 'di ni mkha' 'gro pad+mar brjod// g.yas par b+ha ga'i pad+ma ste// bde ba chen po rnam par 'phel// g.yon na sdigs mdzub 'dzin ma ste// 'di ni chos 'byung
158a7(rgyud 'bum): mar ni brjod/ / g.yas pa'i lag na lcags sgrog ste// byang chub zhen pas kun 'ching ba// g.yon na sdigs mdzub 'dzin ma ste// 'di ni rdo rje sgrog mar brjod// sangs rgyas rjes chags 'a
158b1(rgyud 'bum): ba yis/ / bdag nyid 'khyud par 'dod pa ste// byang chub chags pas rab sgrub ma// de 'di rdo rje 'khyung mar bshad// g.yas pa'i lag na sgo lhags te// ye shes kun gyi srung ba mo// g.yon na
158b2(rgyud 'bum): sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mo/ / 'di de rdo rje sgo lcags brjod// g.yas pa'i lag tu lde kyog ste// ye shes blangs nas gcod pa mo// g.yon na sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mo// 'di de rdo rje lde kyog brjod//
158b3(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa'i lag tu sgo mo ni// ye shes skyes pa ma spangs pa// g.yon na sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mo// 'di ni rdo rje sgo mar brjod// lag pa g.yas par yol ba ni// rang mtshungs btsun mo srung ba nyid//
158b4(rgyud 'bum): g.yon na sdigs mdzub 'dzin pa mo// rdo rje yol ba mar ni brjod// de 'di sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// mkha' 'gro ma ni dam pa'i tshogs// mkha' 'gro lnga ni rab sgrub phyir// mkha' 'gro ma yi
158b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyud gsungs so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams cad mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje'i gsung thos nas ngo mtshar skyes par gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya 'phrog pa 'di ci nyi tshe ba'i dam
158b6(rgyud 'bum): tshig phyag rgya 'phrog pa lags sam/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ 'od zer
158b7(rgyud 'bum): can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams na rdo rje nges par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i lung bstan pa yod de/ 'di ni de'i yin te/ De baM ha ya sa ga ma ne'i skad kyi dbyings 'dir rnam par rtogs pa ste/ thams cad kun
159a1(rgyud 'bum): tu nam mkhar spyod par grub pas 'di ni mkha' 'gro mar rab tu grags so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' de rnams thams cad tshig 'di thos nas dga' ba dang mgu ba nye bar skyes
159a2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur ba dang tshig 'di gsol pa/ e ma mkha' 'gro ma yi rgyud// rgyud kun las ni phyi ma dang // rtogs sla rtogs par dka' ba dang // rig dang mi rig pa nyid pa'o// de nas de bzhin
159a3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa mi bskyod pa la sogs pa rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskul ba'i phyir 'di skad ces gsungs so/ / bcom ldan 'das byang chub
159a4(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' thams cad 'di la rdo rje gur rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po 'dir ji ltar rnal 'byor ma rnams dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyi bsdu ba yin/ byams pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'
159a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyis gsol pa/ sgo nga las skyes pa la sogs pa mtha' yas pa ngas srid pa las bsgral bar bya'o// zhes smon lam sngon du 'gro ba'i byang chub gong du rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs na/ ci'i
159a6(rgyud 'bum): phyir na srog chags rnams bsad pa dang / gcig tu 'dod pa'i btsun mo rnams spangs lags/ lta ba rnams las log rnams dang // btsun mo rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir// mkha' 'gro ma yi
159a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyud bshad do/ / bde ba'i thabs ni mdor bsdus pa// gzhung nyung don ni rgyas pa ste// blo dman rab tu sad byed pa// rgyud kun gyi ni snying por nges// sngags rnams kyi ni khyad par du'o// rdo rje
159b1(rgyud 'bum): nges par brjod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / 'di ni bshad pa tsam gyis ni// bdag med rnal 'byor ma nyid kyis// sngon du gar gyis mchod byas te// rang gi 'khor lo 'di gsungs pa//
159b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rdo rje sems dpa' dang // gal te rdo rje chos dang ni// rta mchog rdo rje nyi ma yang // bdag gis spangs na mi 'grub ste// nga nyid sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yum gyi gzugs kyis skyed
159b3(rgyud 'bum): par byed/ / de rnams kyi ni mdzes mang // de la nga ni dngos grub ster// mig sman dang ni rkang byug dang // ral gri sa 'og sgrub pa dang // ri lu mkha' la spyod pa dang // mi snang ba dang bcud kyis
159b4(rgyud 'bum): len/ / rig 'dzin 'khor los sgyur nyid dang // bu mo dam pa dgug pa ni// bdag mnyes pas ni sgrub pa pos// dngos grub rdo rje rnams thob bo// spros pa rnam pa mang por ni// smras pa 'dir ni ci
159b5(rgyud 'bum): zhig bya/ / bdag spangs nges par mi 'grub cing // byang chub med cing bsgom pa med// gang zhig rtag tu bdag dran zhing // rtag tu klog cing sems pa dang // sngags kyi 'phreng ba bzlas pa dang //
159b6(rgyud 'bum): nga yi sku ni sgom byed pa// gal te sgyu ma'i tshul gyis sam// gal te rmi lam 'dra bar lta// shin tu bsgom pa'i rim pa las// mngon sum du ni mthong bar 'gyur// gzugs brnyan rab tu sbyor ba las/
159b7(rgyud 'bum): de yi dngos grub sbyin par bya// rdo rje pad+ma rab sbyor bas// shin tu bde chen sbyor ba las// gang zhig bdag la 'dod ster ba// lus can de la smos ci dgos// gang zhig nyi ma gcig bsgom pa/
160a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i mchod pa'i sbyor ba las// shes rab pha rol phyin dngos grub// ster te 'di la the tsom med// bdag nyid he ru kar byas shing // rang gi btsun mo rang bsgoms nas/
160a2(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig rnal 'byor cher 'dod pa// de rnams la ni nga mnyes 'gyur// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ldan zhing // spro ba dga' bar ldan pa dang // glu dang rol sgra'i rnam pa dang // 'dod kun bden pa spro ba
160a3(rgyud 'bum): dang / / sna tshogs sgeg par ldan pa dang // sna tshogs ro yi btung ba dang // sna tshogs gos ni ri mo can// sna tshogs dri yi byug pa yi// gang zhig bdag dang rtag nyal ba// de yi dngos grub
160a4(rgyud 'bum): ster ba nga / / phyag rgya chen po'i gnas 'dug pa// de yi 'dod pa mar gyur to// oM a A i I u U r-i r-I l-i l-I e A oM o aM swA hA/ gang zhig 'dis bskul bar byed pa'i rgyal ba'i sras de
160a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi lag tu bud med kyi sgyu ma'i bde ba yang dag par gnas kyi 'dug go/ rdo rje ma ni shar du sbyin par bya'o// lho phyogs su dkar mo'i gzugs can ma'o// nub phyogs su ni chu'i mkha' 'gro
160a6(rgyud 'bum): ma'o/ / byang du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma'o// nga dbus su bzhag ste snying po dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor du gang zhig bsam par byed pa de'i bdag mdzes ma ste/ phyag gnyis ma zhal gcig ma'o// gri gug
160a7(rgyud 'bum): dang skyes pa'i thod pas 'brel ba/ stag gi pags pa bgos pa/ spyan gsum pa/ skra gyen du brdzes pa/ phyag rgya lngas rnam par brgyan pa/ shar gyi sgor ni dkar mo chen mo'o// lhor ni chom
160b1(rgyud 'bum): rkun ma'o/ / nub phyogs kyi sgor ni chu ma'o// de bzhin du byang du ni g+hasma ri'o// dbang ldan du ni puk+ka si'o// 'tsheng pa'i mtshams su ni ri khrod ma'o// srin po'i phyogs su ni gdol pa ma'o// rtag tu 'gro
160b2(rgyud 'bum): bar ni g.yung mo'o/ / 'di rnams ni mtshams dang mtshams bral du sbyin no// gang zhig bdag rab tu sgom par byed pa de'i lag mthil du phyin pa'i dpal sus kyang dbrog par mi nus so// thams cad
160b3(rgyud 'bum): kyang kha dog nag por mtshungs pa rab tu son pa'i steng du gar dang bcas pa khro mo chen mo dpa' mo/ g.yon pa kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje can mkha' 'gro ma'i rdo rje gur mchog tu
160b4(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ rig ma'i dbang yang dag par bshad pa/ rang gi rig ma skyes bu'i chus// bum pa brgyad po thams cad kyis// rdo rje thugs ni rab bsgoms pas// rdo rje can
160b5(rgyud 'bum): bsam dbang bskur bya/ / rdo rje nyi ma rab bsgoms pa// der ni dbu rgyan sbyin par bya// thams cad sngon sbyin nges bsam nas// rdo rje'i tshogs bcad sbyor ba las// rdo rje chen po rtse dgu pa// snying
160b6(rgyud 'bum): khar rang gi lag pa bya/ / slob ma'i 'jig rten dbang phyug byas// rdo rje sems dpas dbang bskur bya// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang gis ni// di ring khyod ni dbang bskur 'gyur// 'di de sangs
160b7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas thams cad nyid/ / bzang bsgrub phyir ni rdo rje bzung // slob ma lcags mchog lha mo ni// sgrol mas 'khyud par bsam par bya// lag pas rdo rje dril 'khrol zhing // rdo rje bdag pos
161a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur bya/ / oM badz+ra d+hi pa ti dzA b+hi Shiny+tsA mi tiSh+Tha badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ slob ma rnam snang byas nas ni// ming gis kyang ni dbang bskur bya// oM badz+ra satwA tAM b+hi Shiny+tsA mi badz+ra/
161a2(rgyud 'bum): nA mA b+hi She ka ta/ kye che ge mo rdo rje/ gang gang kun gyi rang gtser gyur// de de bdag nyid he ru ka/ sangs rgyas ye shes 'byung ba'i phyir// chos kyi rang bzhin dag pa'o// 'di de sangs rgyas
161a3(rgyud 'bum): / thams cad nyid// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag na gnas// rdo rje snying po brtul zhugs brtan// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung // oM sarba ta thA ga ta sid d+hi badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM d+ha rA ya mi hrIHhi hi hi hi
161a4(rgyud 'bum): hUM/ kun kyang cho ga gcig pa yis// rtag tu bla med mchod pas ni// slob ma rdo rje brtul zhugs sbyin// phyis ni rdo rje lag nas lag/ sems dpa' thog ma tha ma med// rdo rje sems
161a5(rgyud 'bum): dpa' dga' chen po/ / kun tu bzang po kun gyi bdag/ rdo rje snying po'i bdag po'i bdag/ yang ni der ni dril bu sbyin// shes rab pha rol phyin skyes pa'i// rdo rje dril bu zhes bya ba// sems
161a6(rgyud 'bum): can kun gyi don gyi phyir/ / 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes rab dbyangs kyi rjes 'gror brjod// rgyal bas byang chub mchog brjod pa// khyod kyis kyang ni rtag tu zung // dbug
161a7(rgyud 'bum): 'byin thams cad byin nas ni/ / shAkya thub par rang gyur pas// slob ma chen po lung bstan te// sangs rgyas nyid du the tsom med// khyod kyis 'chi 'jigs mya ngan med// de bzhin nang
161b1(rgyud 'bum): dang tsha ba med/ / bde chen theg pa chen po ni// 'di las nga lis lung bstan bu// oM e Sho haM byA ka ro mo tAM badz+ra sa twasta thA ga ta/ srid pa'i ngan 'gro las bsgral te// shin tu srid pa'i dngos grub
161b2(rgyud 'bum): phyir/ / kye 'grub 'gyur de bzhin gshegs pa yi// ming ni rdo rje zhes byar 'gyur// de ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis rig ma chen mo'i dbang gi dam tshig bka' stsal to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
161b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje chen po ting nge 'dzin rdo rje ston pa pos/ dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba bton te/ tshig 'di bka' stsal pa/ bla ma rdo rje rnams mchod cing // bdun po rnam par dag par bya// byang chub sems ni
161b4(rgyud 'bum): bskyed nas su/ / chos kyi 'byung gnas rnam par bsgom// de la sangs rgyas gnas bsams nas// rnam pa lnga ni bsgom par bya// dang po skyes bu bsam de nas// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor lo
161b5(rgyud 'bum): spro/ dri za mnyam par zhugs pa ni// khu bar rjes su dran par bya// mtshams kyi lha mos bskul bar bya// 'khor lo'i 'dren pa bskul nas ni// mig la sogs pa gti mug sogs// rdo rje gsum
161b6(rgyud 'bum): ni gnas gsum dgod/ / phyi nas rjes chags rdo rje ste// ye shes rnam par gzhug pa dang // dbang ni rig ma brgyad rnams kyi// yang ni bdud rtsi myang ba dang // lha mo brgyad kyis mchod pa nyid//
161b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo'i 'dren pa bstod pa'o// rang byin brlab pas byin brlabs te// de la yan lag drug bsgom bya// phyi nas yang ni dam tshig gi/ cho ga'i go rims rim pa yis// mtshan ma yang dag
162a1(rgyud 'bum): mtshon par bya/ / dang po sprin gyi rnam pa ste// gnyis pa du ba 'dra ba yin// gsum pa me khyer rnam pa yin// bzhi pa mar me nyer 'bar ba// lnga pa rtag tu snang ba ste// sprin
162a2(rgyud 'bum): med nam mkha' 'dra ba nyid/ / de ni thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu// dngos grub nye bar 'gyur ba yin// phyi nas sgyu ma'i rnam pa ltar// rmi lam rnam par skad cig 'gyur// khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu
162a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i/ / ma lus lus pa med pa 'grub// 'jig rten khams ni thams cad du// ji srid rdo rje'i lus can rnams// ye shes phung po'i blo ldan pa// de yi rjes su thams cad 'brang // ji srid skye
162a4(rgyud 'bum): gnas las byung ba/ / khams gsum lam ni nyams dga' bar// phyag rgya chen po rab sbyar bas// de rnams thams cad bza' bar bya// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// tshig gi rngo//
162a5(rgyud 'bum): rje rnam thos nas// dga' zhing rangs par gyur nas ni// smra ba'i rdo rje mdzad par ldan// rig ma chen po bdag med dang // rdo rje rnam snang mnga' bdag dang // rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal chen dang // rta mchog
162a6(rgyud 'bum): thub pa chen po dang / / rdo rje nyi ma gzi brjid che// rta mgrin mnga' bdag chen po ni// sku gsung thugs ni nyid dang yang // lus kyi gong bu 'gul bar 'gyur// lan cig rgyal po ston pa yis// 'phral
162a7(rgyud 'bum): du mngon sum byed pa po/ / de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po sku gsum mchog gi rdo rje 'dzin pa po mnyam pa nyid kyi rdo rje'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te tshig 'di gsungs so// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor la
162b1(rgyud 'bum): zhugs pa/ / zhal brgyad pa la stobs po che// phyag ni bcu drug rnams dang ldan// dbang po sngon po mtshungs pa'i 'od// gzi brjid chen po zhabs bzhi pa// sgeg cing khro bo'i gzugs can te//
162b2(rgyud 'bum): skyil krung phyed pa'i gar gyis gnas// rus pa'i rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// dang po'i zhal ni nag po ste// dkar po dmar pos rnam par brgyan// lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba bzhin// bdud bzhi
162b3(rgyud 'bum): mnyam par mnan pa ste/ / spyi bor rdo rje 'dzin pa mchog/ der ni rdo rje mdog nag po// 'od zer chen po'ang bsgom par bya// dbang bskur ba yi gnas nyid du// sangs rgyas lngas ni rnam par
162b4(rgyud 'bum): brgyan/ / glang po rta bong glang rnga mo// mi dang sa ra b+ha byi la// g.yas pa'i thod pa brgyad du ni// gnyis 'thung la sogs rim shes bya// sa dang chu dang rlung dang ni// drod dang zla ba nyi ma nyid//
162b5(rgyud 'bum): mthar byed dang ni nor sbyin nyid// g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na'o// skyes bu chen po bzhengs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// gti mug rdo rje mig la dgod// zhe sdang rdo rje rna ba la//
162b6(rgyud 'bum): ser sna 'dod chags de bzhin du// reg dang bdag med bsgom par bya// phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa yin// sna tshogs gzugs ma btsun mo nyid// lag pa gri gug thod pas brel//
162b7(rgyud 'bum): srog song steng du yang dag gnas// sa spyod mkha' spyod ma nyid dang // de bzhin rkang 'og gnas pa mo// 'di nyid kyi ni cho ga yis// gnas gsum du ni gnas par sgom// oM mdzad rgyal po chen
163a1(rgyud 'bum): bo na/ / sgra ya rdo rje rnam par brgyan// thugs kyi rdo rje rgyal po che// rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas na bzhugs// a ni mchog gi de nyid de// ngag gi lam ni gsal byed
163a2(rgyud 'bum): brjod/ / sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje yi// chos can las ni rigs gsum 'byung / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// dkar mo gzugs can bsgom par bya// lcags kyu
163a3(rgyud 'bum): mdzub 'dzin pa mo/ / kha dog dkar mo 'od chen mo// dkar mo rdo rje can zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dmar po dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// chom rkun ma ya~M gzugs can sgom//
163a4(rgyud 'bum): btso ma gser gyi mdog 'dra ba// rdo rje zhags pa mtshon chen po// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ro langs ma ni khrag dang mtshungs// rdo rje lcags sgrog nga rgyal byed// byang chub
163a5(rgyud 'bum): 'ching bar mdzad pa mo/ / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// de nas g+hasma rI bsgom bya// rdo rje dril bus lag pa brel// margad ut+pal 'dra ba'o// rdo rje sgo skyong ma rdo rje brtson ma zhes
163a6(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / mtshams su lha mo bzhi rnams ni// cho ga'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya// byang sems bum pa ri rab dang // me yi thab khung rgyal mtshan che// byi bcas gnyis med
163a7(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pas/ / mgon po de ltar bsgom par bya// 'dod chags chen po rjes chags pas// dpa' rlabs med pa'i bde ba 'thob// 'byung ba bzhi'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
163b1(rgyud 'bum): de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po theg pa gsum gyi dam pa ston pa po thams cad kyi rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te dbyangs 'di gsungs pa/ hUM las byung ba'i khro bo ni// rtag tu zhe sdang
163b2(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'o/ / nang du ma rungs sems kyis ni// rab tu 'bad pas bsgrub par bya// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ na mo badz+ra mud ga ra hastA ya tsaN+Da maN+Da lAk+She pa ka rA ya hUM phaT/ de nas 'dir khro bo
163b3(rgyud 'bum): chen po bshad pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'jigs shing 'dor bar gyur nas mnga' bdagi rdo rje 'dzin pa dran par byed do// skyes pa'i pad+ma gas
163b4(rgyud 'bum): chag med/ / srubs gcig pa dang srubs gnyis pa// rig ma bzhi yi rab sbyor bas// sangs rgyas kun gyis rab tu dgang // rkang rjes rdul gyi sbyor ba yis// rkang pas mnan cing
163b5(rgyud 'bum): bsdigs par bya/ / sku gsum bskyed pa'i sgom pa yis// bu mo chen mo dgug par bya// gshin rje gshed rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// na moHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ ma hA daN+Da d+ha ra bi bi d+ha ra
163b6(rgyud 'bum): su rA su ra marda na b+hU tin+nar+m+ma tha hUM phaT/ de nas khro bo chen po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i stobs po che bshad pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / de bzhin du gzhan rnams kyang 'dar bar gyur
163b7(rgyud 'bum): cing de dran par byed do/ / 'byung po yi dgas sha za nyid// mkha' 'gro grul bum zin pa la// hUM gis dregs byas phyag rgyas gdab// rdo rje btsi rabs bde ba nyid// gzhan gyis mi thub parje/
164a1(rgyud 'bum): rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ oM hu lu hu lu/ ma hA pad+ma a mr-i ti ku ru ma hA biSh+Tan+t+ra AHbtsan dug chen po dgug par bya'o// brgyal ba
164a2(rgyud 'bum): bslang ba de bzhin no/ / pad+ma'i dregs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ na mo badz+ra kro d+hA ya ma hA daMSh+Tota Ta b+hai ra wA ya/ badz+ra san+do ha dad+hA ya/ oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da li
164a3(rgyud 'bum): hUM phaT/ de nas khro bo chen po bgegs 'joms rdo rje bshad pas sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid mi dga' bar gyur to// rlung gis bteg pa po dang /
164a4(rgyud 'bum): rkang rjes kyi rdul blangs nas bsgrub bya de'i ming byang bzung ste/ tshogs kyi bdag po'i rkang pa'i 'og tu dgod cing hUM phaT ces bya ste/ hUM gis nga rgyal byas nas rdo rje bdud rtsi ting nge 'dzin las
164a5(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa/ khro bos sngags kyi rab tu sbyor bas sangs rgyas rnams kyang skrod par byed do// rdo rje bdud rtsi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// shin tu legs par gsang bar ni// bya ba 'di ni
164a6(rgyud 'bum): rab bskul bar/ / ye shes rdo rjes bya ba ste// nyi ma bdun gyis 'grub par 'gyur// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ oM ya ma daN+DA la nI lA ya nI la daN+DA ya/ tu ru tu ru/ mu ru mu ru sarba duSh+Tan
164a7(rgyud 'bum): mA ra ya hUM phaT/ de nas khro bo chen po dbyug pa sngon po skyes bu chen po bshad pas sems can thams cad dang / sangs rgyas rnams srog la the tshom du gyur to// brgya phrag brgyad bzlas
164b1(rgyud 'bum): pa tsam gyis kyang shin tu sgom par sbyor ba'i cho gas bskul ba las gdug pa thams cad 'ching bar 'gyur ro/ / dbyig pas mnan pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/
164b2(rgyud 'bum): na mo ma hA ba lA ya/ uts+tshaSh+pa kro d+ha rA dza ya sar+b+bA nA gA nA hr-i da yaM tA Ta ya hUM phaT/ de nas gtum po chen po bshad pas/ dug gis gdong 'jigs shing stobs dang bral ba dang / skrag cig
164b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dar bar gyur te stobs po che dran par byed do/ / rdo rje stobs kyi spyan ras gzigs shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ na mo a tsa la ke Na tsen+d+ra tsen+d+ra moT+Ta mor+N+Na/ tun+da tu
164b4(rgyud 'bum): g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya hUM phaT/ de nas khro bo chen po mi g.yo ba skyes bu chen po bshad pas lnga dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin chen po brgyal te sa la 'gyel to// 'di ni khro bo rgyal po yis
164b5(rgyud 'bum): seng ge zhon pa'i cho ga yis/ / rdo rje dkyil 'khor rnal 'byor las// skyes pa dang ni lha rnams khugs// oM sum b+ha ni sum b+ha hUM/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM/ gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya hUM/ A na yaH
164b6(rgyud 'bum): b+ha ga waM bid+yA rA dza ya hUM phaT/ rdo rje sa 'og gnas pa yis// khro bo chen po bshad pa yis// lha min bu mo klu mor bcas// nu ma 'dar zhing nar ba 'am// rdo rje zhags pas nges bcings
164b7(rgyud 'bum): te/ lcags kyu yis ni dral nas ni// sku gsung thugs ni bsgoms pa yis// bu mo thams cad 'gug par bya'o// 'jig rten gsum dgug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rdo rje chos
165a1(rgyud 'bum): ni char sprin che/ / rdo rje sems dpa' char mchog ste// rdo rje nyim dge 'dun che// rnga mchog tshogs ni chen po dang // phan pa'i yang ni char sprin gyi// zhags pa lcag
165a2(rgyud 'bum): kyu'i sgom pa yis/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyang 'gugs brjod na// so so skye bo smos ci dgos// rang gi rig ma skyes bu bsams// sku gsum rdo rjes rnam par brgyan// lcags kyu la
165a3(rgyud 'bum): sogs sbyor ba yis/ bu mo bkug la bza' bar bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje chen pos dgug po'i dam tshig bka' stsal to// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+he b+h+yo/ oM Tak+ki hUM dzaH
165a4(rgyud 'bum): ti dang ni btsag la yang / / rdo rje lcags kyu'i sbyor ba las// zla ba nye bar chags dus su// khar bcug nas ni bsgrub par bya// ming ni bris pa tsam gyis kyang // brgya ni gsal bar bzlas
165a5(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / sgra ldan gnas med dbang po drag/ chung mar bcas pa dgug par bya// dam tshig lcags kyu'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bsam gtan sngags dang ting 'dzin gnas//
165a6(rgyud 'bum): rang gi rig ma skyes bu bdag/ dgug pa'i gnas su gzung bar bya// thub pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ na ma sa mad+ha rbA r+b+h+yAM/ namaHsa man+ta saM g+ha nAM/ oM si tA ta pa tA/ oM bi ma
165a7(rgyud 'bum): la/ oM shaM ka ra/ oM pra t+yaM gi ra/ oM badz+ra uSh+NI Sha tsakra warti sar+b+ba yan+t+ra man+ta mU la kar+m+ma ban+d+ha nAM tA Da nA kI la nAM bA ma maM kr-i te ye na ke na tsit+ta kr-i taM ta ta/ sarban+dats+tshin+dats+tshin+de/ b+hin+da D+haM
165b1(rgyud 'bum): tsi ri tsi ri/ gi ri gi ri/ ma ra ma ra/ d+hU rbA d+hAr+thA r+N+Nar+d+han+na d+hU hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ bdag nyid srung ba'i sbyor ba la// sbyor ba rgyud sogs gzhig pa la// dpung pa'i rig mar gyur byas nas/
165b2(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten gsum gyis 'da' mi nus// khro bo chen po 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// dben pa'i nags tshal nyid du yang // yid gnyis thams cad rnam spangs la// rnal
165b3(rgyud 'bum): 'byor mchog ni 'di bsgrubs na/ / thub pa gzhan du mi 'gyur ro// khro bo chen po 'khor lo'i sngags la 'jug pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas
165b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan rdo rje can/ / sems can kun gyi snying la zhugs// kun mkhyen ye shes las byung ba// yang dag nges par rab tu dbye// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab bsgoms te/
165b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa' rab bsgom bya// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab bsgoms nas// rdo rje rnam snang dran par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab bsgoms te// rdo rje nyi ma rab bsgom
165b6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rab bsgoms nas// 'dod chags rdo rje rnam par bsgom// sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan rnam bsgoms te// rta yi don yod rab bsgom bya// sangs rgyas
165b7(rgyud 'bum): gzugs brnyan las byung ba'i/ / dkyil 'khor rnams ni rtag bsgom bya// thams cad rnams kyi sngags 'di yis// snying khar ye shes gnas su dgod// ye shes sems dpar rab sbyor
166a1(rgyud 'bum): bas/ sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// rang sngags maM ge rdzogs pa dang // phyag rgya dang ni phyag mtshan brtag/ spro dang bsdu ba byas pa ni// dkyil 'khor rnams
166a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba nyid/ / sgra la rnam gsum shes byas nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rdo rje can// rdo rje sems dpa' grags chen po// gzugs la rnam gsum shes byas nas/
166a3(rgyud 'bum): lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan rgyal po ni// rdo rje rnam snang mdzad bdag nyid// dril rnam gsum rnam shes nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan sangs
166a4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas ni/ / rin chen phung por rab tu grags// ro la rnam gsum rnam shes nas// lha rnams la yang dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan 'dod chags nyid// rdo rje chos ni de bzhin gshegs//
166a5(rgyud 'bum): reg la rnam gsum rnam shes nas// lha rnams la ni dbul bar bya// de nyid bcom ldan sna tshogs pa// don yod 'bras bu ster ba po// srung ba'i dam tshig bsdus pa yi// dkyil 'khor lnga ni/
166a6(rgyud 'bum): bsgom par bya// lnga lnga'i bdag nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas// ye shes lnga ni rnam par bsgom// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang ldan// 'od zer sna tshogs kun tu khyab// sna tshogs las ni byed par
166a7(rgyud 'bum): brjod/ / thams cad bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// nyi shu rtsa lnga'i dbye ba yis// rdul chen gyis kyang bri bar bya// sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin gyis// phung po lngar ni rab tu grags// sangs
166b1(rgyud 'bum): / rgyas mgon po'i dkyil 'khor ni// shar gyi char ni rab tu grags// g.yas su rdo rje'i ma yi// nub tu 'dod chags rdo rje yi// byang du rta yi rgyal po yi// dbus su rdo rje sems dpa' yi//
166b2(rgyud 'bum): shar du dkar po chen po ste// lho ni ser po yang dag ldan// dmar po nub kyi cha nyid du// btsod ni byang du yang dag ldan// mtshams kyi char ni thams cad dang // sgo yi logs dang ya phubs
166b3(rgyud 'bum): su rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis brgyan/ / sna tshogs snang ba rnams kyis mdzes// sangs rgyas mgon po gang nyid kyi// dkyil 'khor dbus su 'gyur ba ni// de nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor brjod//
166b4(rgyud 'bum): snying po yongs bzung dkyil 'khor te// dkyil 'khor re rer bsgom pa 'am// yang na bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// brgyad brgyad dbus su gnas pa'am// yang na nyi shu rtsa lnga ru// gang+gA
166b5(rgyud 'bum): tshe dkyil 'khor bsdus pa yi/ / sgor ni lcags kyu 'gas pa dang // lcags sgrog de bzhin rdo rje nyid// 'jug pa'i sgo srungs dgod par bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis bsdus pa chen po'i dam
166b6(rgyud 'bum): tshig 'di bka' stsal to/ / dom dang bya rgor de bzhin bse// sdug glang dang ni steg nyid dang // spre'u dang sna thung ba glang 'tshe// rdo rje chos kyi g.yas na'o// khri'ug chu skyar seng ge dang // mtsher
166b7(rgyud 'bum): gnas de bzhin ra dang ni/ / ri dgas phag dang yang dag ldan// g.yas min par ni rtag tu gnas// rma bya ma he chu srin dang // nya yi rgyal po rus sbal dang // 'og gi rlung dang ngang pa dang /
167a1(rgyud 'bum): ri bong phan pa'i g.yas pa ma// sbal pa thu bo sprin shugs kyis// kha chu mig sman mtshungs byi la// g.yag dang dri ldan de bzhin bzhad// g.yon pa'i thod pa brgyad na'o//
167a2(rgyud 'bum): ka ran da dang 'khor lo dag/ lug dang tsa ko ra dang ni// bye khra hor mo 'ol ba dang // ku rar nyi ma'i g.yas na'o// stobs kyi rgyu dang dung skyong dang // rigs ldan pad+ma pad bzang dang // 'jog
167a3(rgyud 'bum): po nor rgyas mtha' yas ni/ / rin chen rgyal po'i g.yon na'o// gza' lag phur bu mjug rings dang // sgra gcan mig dmar pa wa sangs// spen pa khyab 'jug rta rgyal nyid// g.yas
167a4(rgyud 'bum): pa nyid du rab tu grags/ / dbang po tshangs pa de bzhin drag/ 'dod lha de bzhin thod pa can// gcer bu dang ni thag bzangs ris// stobs ldan zhes bya g.yon na'o// glo dang dbugs dang de
167a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin 'bog/ khong skem mdze dang rkang shu dang // mchin pa mcher pa'i rang bzhin yang // glang po la sogs rab tu grags// lcags stegs dang ni brjed byed dang // khrag rdo gcong nad
167a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po dang / / gzhang 'brum sman dang bkres nang dang // mig ser ngom la sogs pa'o// rdzi ma byi dang so nang dang // mkhris pa khrag dang de bzhin rlung // bad kan 'dzag dang lus skam dang /
167a7(rgyud 'bum): skya rbab 'bras ni rma bya sogs// rkang 'bam tshil nang tshig spangs dang // rgyu ma 'phel dang gsung pa dang // tshad pa rims dang rab gas ni// ka raN+Da sogs rab tu grags// rlung mkhris
167b1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin ma zhu ba/ / sgrib g.yogs rab rib gcin srib// gzhogs phyed na dang lkog 'bras dang // rlung rgyas gza' lag la sogs pa'o// mi yi 'gro ba dam pa ni// rab mchog de lta bu/
167b2(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba// thams cad nad kyis khyab mthong nas// sangs rgyas lngar ni cher grags pa// bdag gi lus la gzhug par bya// sems can rnams la gdungs ma gyur// nad rnams zhi
167b3(rgyud 'bum): phyir sangs rgyas ni/ / glang po la sogs nang 'dzin to// de ltar bsgoms par gyur pa la// nad med ru dza trang grum med// 'chi med nges par byA d+hi med// nga rgyal med cing gti mug med//
167b4(rgyud 'bum): bkres pa med cing skom pa med// sdug bsngal ngan 'gro de bzhin med// lha dang lha min mi rnams sam// gang gis kyang ni nad byed min// nad thams cad rab tu zhi ba dbugs dbyung ba
167b5(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o/ / / de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal po lus thams cad 'dzin pa po mkha' 'gro ma'i yid 'phrog pas tshig 'di bka' stsal pa/ sems kyi
167b6(rgyud 'bum): rjes dran dmigs nas ni/ / sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom// sems kyis rin chen bsams nas ni// chos ni rjes su dran pa bsgom// las rjes dran pa'i rnal 'byor pas// 'khor
167b7(rgyud 'bum): lo chen po rab bsgom bya/ / rnal 'byor 'di ni mchog rab ste// ma byung 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam bsgoms nas// phyag rgya bzhi yis phyag rgyas gdab// rdo rje rnam
168a1(rgyud 'bum): snang bsams nas ni/ / phyag rgya bsgoms pas phyag rgyas gang ba// rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis// rin chen phung po rab bsgom bya// chos kyi phyag rgya rab sbyor bas/
168a2(rgyud 'bum): las kyi rdo rje phyag rgyas gdab// zhe sdang rgyal po rgyal po che// skyon rnams thams cad zad par mdzad// spro zhing sbyor bar bsgom par bya// bsdu ba yang ni yang dag bshad// sangs
168a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas mgon po rab bsdoms na/ / sangs rgyas sprin gyis kun tu khyab// spro dang bsdu ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgom bya// sems kyi rin chen rin po ches//
168a4(rgyud 'bum): bdud kyi skyon rnams zad par mdzad// sems kyi cher sprin sbyor ba yis// yang ni bsdu ba bstan par bya// chos kyi rgyal po gti mug che// spro dang bsdu ba'i gzugs can de// thun chod
168a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhir ni byin brlabs pa/ / bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// sems ni 'gro mgyogs ltar bsams nas// gzhal med 'bras bu stsol ba'o// rta mchog char sprin chen po yis//
168a6(rgyud 'bum): bsdu ba yang ni bsgom par bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spro ba dang bsdu ba'i dam tshig chen po de skad ces bka' stsal to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sems kyis
168a7(rgyud 'bum): rnam par bsgom par bya/ / rnyog med dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sku yi yi ge rnam par bsgom// khrag gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sems kyi rin chen yi ge dgod//
168b1(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi 'khor lo dbus gnas par// gsung gi yi ge rnam par bsgom// las kyi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// don yod yi ge gzugs can te// sku gsum mi phyed bsgom pa
168b2(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / ye shes rdo rje bsgom par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' mi phyed pa'i// chos kyi 'khor lo rnam snang la// rin chen sems kyi rin po che// pad+ma bzang po 'dab mar dmar// shes rab ral
168b3(rgyud 'bum): gri don yod kyi/ / shes rab rnon po'i rang bzhin gyis// rnam rtog ri bo gcad nas ni// phyag rgya chen po ldan par 'gyur// dpag tshad bye ba brgya par ni// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya/
168b4(rgyud 'bum): phan pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid dang yang // rin chen phung po 'od chen dang // chos kyi phung po mgon chen dang // de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje las// sna tshog 'od zer cher 'bar ba// sangs rgyas sprin gyis
168b5(rgyud 'bum): rnam par brgyan/ / nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// ye shes dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yis gang // thams cad du ni sna tshogs gzugs// mchod pa
168b6(rgyud 'bum): kun gyis mchod par bya/ / mtshams kyi lha mo'i sbyor ba yis// ye shes rgya mtsho rab bsgrub bya// dam tshig 'khor lo bcug pa yi// ye shes rdo rje chen po 'bar// sangs rgyas kun mnyam
168b7(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pas/ / skad cig la ni gnyis med 'gyur// ru rak+Sha dang dung ral gri// bu yi 'tsho ba pad 'bras dang // mu tig la sogs byu ru sogs// bsam gtan ldan pa sngags bzlas bya//
169a1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang rang btsun mo// mngon sum du ni bya ba'i phyir// sngags ni snyun gsan 'bebs par brjod// dper na skyes
169a2(rgyud 'bum): chen la la zhig/ skad kyi nga ros bos pa na// thos pa tsam gyis 'ongs gyur pa// de ltar skad cig sangs rgyas gshegs// 'jig rten khams ni stong phrag dang // nam mkha'i khams kyi mkha'
169a3(rgyud 'bum): grong du/ / phyag rgya chen po'i bde gnas kyi// mkha' dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs// de rnams sngags rig drung ni gshegs// rdo rje spyan gyis rnam par gzigs// gang gis sngags kyi
169a4(rgyud 'bum): rim thob pa/ / e ma de yis byang chub thob// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yang // sngags kyi spyod pa dang por 'dzin// rdo rje sngags ni rab sbyor bas// mchung
169a5(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i ye shes 'thob/ de ltar shes pa'i sangs rgyas te// sngags kyi spyod pa'i rim gnas pa// 'bras bu nyid la mi gzigs pa// de ni sangs rgyas mnyam pa brjod// sangs rgyas pa
169a6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal dmigs nas ni/ / chos kyi dbyings ni 'od gsal ba// gang zhig bsgom po de bas na// sems can sangs rgyas mnyam par gyur// 'jig rten ji ltar sangs rgyas te// ji ltar chos ni /
169a7(rgyud 'bum): mang ba// sems tsam 'ams tshad stor bshad// mamama'a' sa bur drim med// ngan par brtags pa'i rnam rtogs// rin chen sems na tsho can byas// sems dag pas ni dag par 'gyur
169b1(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar nam mkha' mi 'jig pa/ / nam mkha' ji bzhin de bzhin sems// sems kyi rin chen bskul ba las// sems nyid bsgom pa sangs rgyas te// skye bar sangs rgyas dam pa nyid//
169b2(rgyud 'bum): rin chen sems las phyir gyur pa'i// sangs rgyas med cing gang zag med// rnam par shes pa'i gnas don nam// phyi rol gyur pa cung zad med// yid kyis sangs rgyas thams cad nyid//
169b3(rgyud 'bum): khams gsum dbang phyug chen po ste// 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal po che// sems gcig gis ni thob par 'gyur// gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri// ro dang reg bya'i rang bzhin te//
169b4(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi dbyings ni mchog tu zhi// 'di ni rin chen mchog tu brjod// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang // 'du byed dang ni rnam shes nyid// 'di dag thams cad sems las skyes//
169b5(rgyud 'bum): thub pa 'di ni gzhan mi 'gyur// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// 'dod don 'bras bu rab ster ba// sems kyi de nyid rang bzhin dag/ sangs rgyas byang chub 'bras bu ster// de nyid phyir na
169b6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyis/ / sems kyi rdo rje bskul ba yis// zab mo'i rnam pa nges ldan pa'i// phyed par dga' ba'i dngos grub ster// rdo rje sems dpa'i snying po snang ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// /
169b7(rgyud 'bum): / de nas rdo rje chen po rdo rje can mkha' 'gro ma'i gur bskyed pa'i rnal 'byor gyi ting nge 'dzin la bzhugs te/ bdag nyid kyi rnal 'byor gsungs pa/ sangs rgyas gnas ni rab
170a1(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs dang / / rnam pa lnga po bsgoms pa dang // kun tu bzang po'i rang bzhin dang // rang gi lhag pa'i lhar bsgrub dang // dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dgod pa dang /
170a2(rgyud 'bum): mchod pastod bdud rtsi la sogs pa// rim pas rjes su bsgom par bya// rnal 'byor yan lag drug tu 'dod// oM sar+b+ba ta thA ga ta a b+hi She ka badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ bcom ldan 'das
170a3(rgyud 'bum): / de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de skad ces bka' stsal to// oM sarba ta thA ga tA mr-i ta sA da na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med pas de skad
170a4(rgyud 'bum): ces bka' stsal to/ / oM sarba ta thA ga ta s+thA ti badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhi ni gshegs pa rin chen tog gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza
170a5(rgyud 'bum): / badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rta mchog gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// oM sarba ta thA ga tA nu rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+hAHAt+ma kohaM/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
170a6(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma de bzhin gshegs pas de skad ces bka' stsal to/ / spro ba dang ni bsdus pa'i sku// rgyal chen rnam par snang mdzad de// chos dbyings yi ge las skyes pa// des ni sangs rgyas gnas
170a7(rgyud 'bum): / dgod bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a nI la ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// 'byung bzhi'i bdag
170b1(rgyud 'bum): nyid dkyil 'khor nyid/ / de yi steng du sangs rgyas bsam// spros nas gzhal yas gnas dgod bya// rdo rje lta bu mi phyed phyir// des na mi bskyod bsgom par bya// ma skyes rjes su dran pa
170b2(rgyud 'bum): las/ / rnam par snang mdzad phan pa nyid// rin chen rnams kyi mchog gi mchog/ 'di ni rin chen sems su bshad// rdo rje chos ni rgyal po che// 'dod chags mtshan nyid 'dzin pa las//
170b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas 'dug pa'i// sems ni 'dod chags zhes byar bshad// gang phyir 'bras bral mi 'grub ster// de phyir don yod rab tu grags// rig ma mdzes ma rdo rje zhes
170b4(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / bum pa'i dbang ni dang po ste// gnyis pa la ni gsang ba'i dbang // gsum pa shes rab ye shes te// ji ltar lus ni de bzhin gshegs// dkyil 'khor dam
170b5(rgyud 'bum): pa bris nas ni/ / dam tshig khu ba'i cho ga yis// ha dang bsam gtan bskyed byas nas// de tshe dbugs dbyung sbyin par bya// mkha' 'gro lnga dang ldan pa dang // dam tshig lnga yis bkang
170b6(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / mkha' 'gro ma yis tshegs ldan pas// rdo rje sa bon rab sbyor bas// rang gi lhag pa'i lhar byas la// slob ma rtag par nges bsams te// rgyun gyis rigs kyi ming gis ni// slob
170b7(rgyud 'bum): ma rdo rje can dbang bskur/ / spyan dang bdag mo sgrol ma dang // dkar mo la sogs bdag gzugs kyis// rdo rje btsun mo rab sbyor bas// rdo rje bla med bshad par bya// bla na med pa'i de nyid
171a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di/ gnyis su med cing yi ge med// chos kyi dbyings ni 'od gsal byed// bde ba bzang po'i ro myong gis// sgrib pa med pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
171a2(rgyud 'bum): ga dang ha zhes bya ba dang // dang po mthar yang shwa ldan pa'i// rab tu gsal ba dam pa nyid// dngos grub thams cad rab ster ba// tshogs kyi rdo rje bdud rtsi myang // 'di dag zos pa
171a3(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyis ni/ / sangs rgyas kun mnyam rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje dang ni mnyam par 'gyur// nad rnams thams cad rab tu zhi// de ni gzi brjid lus chen po// 'jig rten kun gyi yid 'phrog pa//
171a4(rgyud 'bum): phas kyi rgol ba kun las rgyal// 'jig rten kun gyi bdag pos brgyan// lha rnams kyi ni 'dren par brjod// mkha' 'gro lnga yi bdag nyid 'gyur// chos kyi zas ni za ba po// dam tshig chen po'i
171a5(rgyud 'bum): bsam gtan zos pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / mi bskyod brten pa'i rnal 'byor pa// nad rnams thams cad rnam par spangs// rtag par chu shel chen por ldan// rdo rje nyi ma rgas pa
171a6(rgyud 'bum): med/ / don yod rgyal po chen po ni// rdo rje srog gi yan lag 'byung // don kun sgrub cing dpal dang ldan// des ni rnal 'byor par ni brjod// mi bskyod btung ba'i sbyor ba las// stong phrag
171a7(rgyud 'bum): lngas ni 'tsho bar 'gyur/ / phan pa'i sa ni khri ru brjod// rdo rje nyi ma rdo rje'i 'bum// tshe dpag med kyis dpag med dang // bdun gyis nam mkha'i ji srid bshad// rdo rje nyi ma dpag med dag/
171b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ba'i sgrub thabs rtsa ba nyid// 'di dag bsten pas rnal 'byor pa// kun tu bzang po 'dra bar gyur// shes rab pha rol phyin ye shes// 'di ni rdo rje nyi mar brjod// chos rnams thams
171b2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyi ni gnas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med// sangs rgyas rdo rje can nyid kyi// thabs dang shes rab zhon pa dag/ khams gsum dag ni thams cad du// sa dang sa 'og par
171b3(rgyud 'bum): snang la/ / khrag dang khu bas khyab pa'i lus// rigs kyi dbang phyug gis 'di gsungs// sen mo ba spu de bzhin khams// khu ba la ni rnam snang gzigs// pags dang khrag la gzi brjid
171b4(rgyud 'bum): che/ / tshil dang rkang la rdo rje 'dzin// thams cad mgon po rnam snang mdzad// rtsa dang sha la bdun rgyal po// 'di rnams la ni sangs rgyas lngar// rdo rje mkha' 'gros rnam par bshad// sa
171b5(rgyud 'bum): yi khams ni rnam dag pa/ / spyan ni 'khor lo mdzes pa nyid// rdo rje btsun mo dang ba ste// pad+ma'i bu mo che ba nyid// sgrol ma rlung ni rnam par dag/ rdo rje btsun mo dang ba ste// rdo rje mkha' 'gro zhes
171b6(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / gur gyis de rnams bka' stsal to// sngags thams cad rnam par dag par bdud rtsi lnga mchog tu byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te le'u bdun pa'o// // khyod
171b7(rgyud 'bum): min sdang rdo rje yongs skyong ba/ / thugs dang chos ni shin tu rnam dag pas// lha yi lus ni yang dag brgyan mdzad pa// puk+ka sI ni bdag la myur du gzigs// rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten dzin
172a1(rgyud 'bum): gyi phyir/ / stong pa nyid spangs skye ba bzhes par mdzod// khyod ni gti mug rdo rje yongs sbyong ba// sku yi bdag po chos kyi gzugs brnyan gyis// lha yi lus ni yang dag
172a2(rgyud 'bum): brgyan mdzad pa/ / ri khrod ma ni bdag la myur du gzigs// rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten sman slad du// stong pa nyid spangs skye ba bzhes par mdzad// khyod ni 'dod chags rdo rje yongs spyor
172a3(rgyud 'bum): ba/ / gsung dag legs par so sor rtog pa yis// lha yi lus ni yang dag brgyan mdzad pa// gtum par ldan pa bdag la myur du gzigs// rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten sman slad du//
172a4(rgyud 'bum): stong pa nyid spangs skye ba bzhes par mdzod// khyod ni sangs rgyas thams cad yongs skyong ba// gzugs kun nan tan thams cad mnyam nyid kyis// lha yi lus ni yang dag brgyan mdzad pa//
172a5(rgyud 'bum): Dom bi bdag la mgon pos myur du gzigs// rnam par 'dren pa 'jig rten sman slad du// stong pa nyid spangs skye ba bzhes par mdzod// thams cad bzhes par mdzad pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
172a6(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin to/ / 'khor lo can rnams thams cad kyi// 'dis ni bskyed par 'gyur bar ni// ye shes rdo rje can gyis bya// dkyil 'khor bdag po de skad gsungs// oM sarba ta thA ga ta khe tsa rI
172a7(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta b+hU tsa rI badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pA tA la wa si nI badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ sku gsung thugs kyi chos rnams kyi// byin brlabs
172b1(rgyud 'bum): gnas su rtag par ni/ / ye shes rdo rje can gyis bya// 'di ni byang chub rim bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi bdag pos de skad ces bka' stsal to//
172b2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya chen por rab sbyor ba// sku yi rin chen sbyang bar bya// bsam gtan rdo rje bsams nas ni// sems kyi rin chen rab sgrub byed// rdo rje bzlas pa'i khyad par gyis// ngag gi rdo rje drim
172b3(rgyud 'bum): med/ / gti mug rdo rje rab sbyor bas// mig gi rnam par shes pa sbyang // zhe sdang rdo rje bsams pa yis// sgra yi sgo yi bsams pa'o// sna ni ser sna rdo rje yis// ro drug 'dod chags rdo rje
172b4(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / lus ni phrag dog rdo rje yis// yid ni kun tu bzang po yis// de nyid mkha' 'gro bdag med ma// 'di rnams kyis ni rnam par sbyang // gal te 'gal ba yod pa ma yin yang //
172b5(rgyud 'bum): de'i tshe rgyal ba'i dngos po sbyang ba yod// kun rdzob bden par yang dag gnas pa ni// 'khor lo gzugs kyi chos tsam rnam par bsgom// chos kyi dngos po ma byung spyad pa la// gang zag
172b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad rnam spangs 'jig rten pa/ / 'jig rten 'gro bar bsam par mi nus te// chos kyi tshul gyis thams cad rnam par dag/ tshig pa rnams kyi gdung dang dug khyab pa'i// lus kyi
172b7(rgyud 'bum): sman ni gzhan gyi dug nyid de/ / ji ltar chu ni rna bar zhugs pa la// yang ni chu ni thabs su 'gyur ba nyid// ji ltar rlung gis dkrugs pa'i sems rnams kyi// de bzhin mkhas pas mon sran
173a1(rgyud 'bum): gre'u bzhin/ / 'dod chags kyis kyang rmongs pa yi// skye bo 'dod chags me yis gdung // 'dod chags kyis bskyed 'jig rten pa// 'dod chags smad pas zad par/
173a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur// 'dod chags rdo rje yongs shes pas// yid ni rdo rje sems dpar 'gyur// 'dod chags zhags pas 'ching ba yis// 'jig rten chags pas khyab par brjod// 'dod chags/
173a3(rgyud 'bum): bral ba'i mngon byang chub// 'dod chags mthar phyin rnams mi 'dod// de nas rdo rje sgrol ma yi// sgrub thabs sbyin sreg las kyi ni// go chas 'dod don thams cad kyi// sgrub thabs yang
173a4(rgyud 'bum): dag ra ba bshad bya/ / de la 'di rnams ni sngags kyi rkang pa yin te/ oM na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ Ar+yA ba lo ki te shwa rA ya/ bo d+hi satwA ya/ ma hA satwA ya/ ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM tA re
173a5(rgyud 'bum): tut+tA re tu re sarba duSh+TaM ma ma kr-i te dzam+b+ha ya/ stam+b+ha ya/ mo ha ya/ ban+d+ha ya/ hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ sarba duSh+paM staM b+ha ni tA re swA hA/ ma mo dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// lha mo sgrol ma
173a6(rgyud 'bum): bsgom par bya/ / phyag brgyad zhal ni bzhi pa ste// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// gser gyi kha dog 'dra bar bsgom// gzhon nu ma yi mtshan nyid 'bar// rdo rje nyi ma'i dbang skyes
173a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ / sangs rgyas bzhi yi dbu rgyan can// lang tshol ni bab pa'i lus// g.yo ba gser gyi rna cha ma// sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// 'od zer dmar pos rnam par brgyan//
173b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje nags pa de bzhin dung // g.yas pas mda' ni 'gengs pa'o// rdo rje lcags kyi ut+pa la// sdigs mdzub g.yon pas 'dzin pa mo// rdo rje skyil krung sbyor ba yis// gnas gsum
173b2(rgyud 'bum): pa ni bsgrub par bya/ / shar du me tog sgrol ma ste// kha dog dkar zhing yid 'ong ma// yi ge oM las skyes pa'o// me tog 'phreng bas lag pa khyab// phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig ma nyid//
173b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// g.yas su bdug spos sgrol ma ste// mdog gnag mdzes pa'i gzugs can ma// spos dang dung gis lag pa brel// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam
173b4(rgyud 'bum): par brgyan/ / nub tu mar me sgrol ma ste// mar me sdong bus lag pa khyab// mdog ser rnam par rgyan chen mo// g.yo ba gser gyi rna cha ma// byang du dri yi sgrol ma ste// dri yi dung gis
173b5(rgyud 'bum): lag khyab pa/ / khrag gi mdog ltar lha mo ni// dkyil 'khor snying po bsgom par bya// lcags kyu la sogs rab dbye bas// der ni sgo yi srung ma bsam// steng du gtsug tor rnam
173b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ma/ / 'og tu gnod mdzes ma rab bsgom// 'khor lo klu zhabs bsnams nas ni// spro zhing sngags ni bzla bar bya// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swa hA/ yi ge bcu yis lha mo bcu// pha
173b7(rgyud 'bum): rol phyin bcu la gnas ma/ / 'bras bu thams cad rab bsgrub phyir// rab tu 'bad pas bsgom par bya// sngags ni mchog dang phul du phyin// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad pa//
174a1(rgyud 'bum): bklags pas 'gyur byed drag po ste// rdo rje gur gyis bshad pa'o// sngags 'dis gos kyi thu bar bdun// mngon par bsngags par bya ba ste// mdud pas bcings te/
174a2(rgyud 'bum): nags tshal du// 'gro na'ang sus kyang mi 'khyer te// stag dang / chom rkun dang / chu srin sna 'thung dang / seng ge dang / sbrul dang / mche ba can dang / ma he dang / dom dang /
174a3(rgyud 'bum): smusdug gla nga la sogs dran pa tsam gyis nyams shing yib bo// sngags 'dis ut+pal la sbyin sreg ji srad du lan brgya rtsa brgyad ji tsam bsku bar bya ste/ oM tA re tut+tA re a mu ka me wa Sham+b+ha nA ya swA hA/
174a4(rgyud 'bum): / yang sngags de nyid kyis khA'i sgro la lan sum cu rtsa gnyis yongs su bzlas te dgra'i khyim du sbas na/ nyi ma bdun gyis skrod par byed do// oM tA re tut+tA re tu ri tsa la pra tsa la shI g+h+raM gA mi ni de wa
174a5(rgyud 'bum): / dat+ta/ uts+tsha Ta ya hUM phaT/ de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re/ a mu kA b+hI d+hA na ku mA rI ma d+ya mung+ga he na ta s+ya si ta dzA yAts+tshan+tu me swA hA/ spra tshil dang / gtum pa'i sa bon
174a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / myos byed dang / a sho ka'i lo ma dang / me tog sreg blugs byi zhing / mar dang sbrang rtsi bu ram du bcas pa stong phrag lnga'i sbyin sreg ni bu mo'i dngos grub la rab tu bsngags te/ nyi ma
174a7(rgyud 'bum): bdun gyis de'i tshe rnal 'byor pas rang 'dod pa'i bu mo thob bo/ / de nas gzhan yang rab tu sbyor bar 'gyur ba/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re a mu kA b+hi d+hA nA swas+thA na ta A kaR+Sha ya ma mAn+ti ke dzaHsngags
174b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dis ba da ra'i tsher ma stong phrag lnga rang byung gi me tog sreg blugs bya bar brjod pa 'di byas pas skyes pa skyong ba rnams kyi bu mo'ang 'gugs par byed do/ / de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba zla
174b2(rgyud 'bum): mtshan 'dzag pa'i ras la bcom ldan 'das ma phyag gnyis ma/ zhal gcig ma/ lag pa lcags kyu dang / ut+pal dang zhags par bcas pa rnam par bris te/ de'i mdun du mchod pa
174b3(rgyud 'bum): byas nas me tog 'di rnams bza' zhing legs zhes bya ba la sogs pas mchod nas phyi nas sgom pa dang ldan par sngags bzlas so/ / oM tA re tut+tA re tu re a mu kI ma ma i ba si taM swap+na ka thA ya hUM
174b4(rgyud 'bum): phaT/ stong phrag lngas 'ong bar 'gyur ro// zhags pas mgrin par bcings te/ lcags kyur drangs nas bsgrub bya rkang pa'i 'og tu bsams te/ khol mo'i tshul gyis bza' bar bya'o// de
174b5(rgyud 'bum): nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba sgrol ma'i gzungs bdun mngon par bsngags par bya ste/ bdag gi mig gnyis mig sman gyis bsku bar bya zhing rgyal po'i rigs kyi drung du 'jug par bya'o//
174b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas rgyal po slob ma dang 'dra bar gus par byed cing 'gal bar mi byed pa dang / bka' dran stsol zhing snyan par rjod par byed pa dang / bran du yang dag par 'gro zhing khros pa'ang dbang du 'gyur ba
174b7(rgyud 'bum): ste/ 'di ni mngon sum du mthong ba dang ngo mtshar dang bcas pa'o// de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba sgrol ma'i gzungs lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ kha gnyis pa'i so dug thal bar byas/
175a1(rgyud 'bum): ba kha dog dmar mo'i mar dang / arka'i shing bal las sdong bu rab tu ska la ming sman bsdu bar bya'o// mig sman rdo rje nyi ma dang / rdo rje chos dag mnyes la rta mchog gis bdug
175a2(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / thal ba dang lhan cig mig la bsku bar bya ste/ rdo rje mig gis gang bltas pa de/ gal te pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug mi 'bab na de'i tshe bdag sgrol ma ma lags te/ bdag gis
175a3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bkrongs pa lags so/ / de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba byis pa so med pa'i lce blangs la sgrol ma'i gzungs bdun mngon par bsngags par byas nas bud
175a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rgyal po'i rtsa ba dang / ba glang gi gi wang lhan cig byas pas dpral bar thig le yongs su bzung ste/ gang bltas pa de dbang du byed do// de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba lto ba'i srin
175a5(rgyud 'bum): bu la gzungs bdun mngon par bsngags pa bya ste/ rdo rje dang lhan cig so rtsis byas la byin te/ sbyor ba mchog zos pa ni mi spong ba dang / gzhan du mi dga' ba dang / gzhan du mi 'gro ba dang //
175a6(rgyud 'bum): rang gi bdag po'ang spong ngo // de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba mar khu chen pos nye bar byugs la/ sgrol ma'i gzungs bzlas la de bsgom par bya'o// bzlas pa'i mthar sA lu btags
175a7(rgyud 'bum): pas mdag gu'i dri ma la khu ba byas te/ gang la byin pa de lnga por yang mi spong ngo // de nas gzhan yang sbyor bar 'gyur ba zla dang nye bar chags pa'i dus su sgrol ma'i gzungs zlos shing brten pa
175b1(rgyud 'bum): byas la/ de las byung ba'i 'jig rten dbang phyug blangs te/ dung gi thal ba dang mnye bar bya zhing rab tu dreg ma nyid la sbyin te/ ji srid du sngar yang rjes su 'brang ngo // de nas gzhan yang //
175b2(rgyud 'bum): sbyor bar 'gyur ba sgrol ma'i gzugs kyis ma ngani pa la lan brgyad yongs su bzlas te/ 'dod pa'i 'bras bu nges rta mgrin dang lhan cig pas bskus na dbang du 'gyur ro// oM tA re tut+tA
175b3(rgyud 'bum): r-i tu re a mu ka s+ya ban+d+ha naM muk+ti ku ru muHswA hA/ zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di arka'i lo ma la bsgrub bya'i ming nang du bcug par bris la/ ne'u le'i khung bur sbas na bcings pa las grol bar
175b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / de nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'byung gnas yang dag par rab tu bshad par bya'o// gang gis bsgoms pa tsam gyis phas kyis rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod par 'gyur
175b5(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / lha mo phyag gnyis ma/ zhal gcig ma/ sku mdog dkar ba/ yid 'phrog ma/ skra phyed du li pa/ chu skyes shin tu dkar ba la yang dag par gnas ma/ lag pa gnyis par pad+ma
175b6(rgyud 'bum): mdog dkar ba yang dag par bsgoms shing / g.yonar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa/ rdo rje skyil krung du gnas pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par brgyan pa/ lte ba'i dkyil 'khor
175b7(rgyud 'bum): du bsgom par bya'o/ / oM las skyes ma/ mchog tu dga' bar byed ma/ dam tshig sems dpa' bskyed nas ye shes sems dpa' bsgom par bya zhing / rnal 'byor zla ba drug tu goms
176a1(rgyud 'bum): pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par 'gyur ro/ / mtshan mo bdun du sbyar bas bstan bcos thams cad shes par byed do// 'bum bzlas pa'i sbyor bas nyi ma re re la
176a2(rgyud 'bum): tshigs brgya byed par 'gyur ro/ / rab tu 'bad pa med par gzhung brgya'ang 'dzin par byed do// de la sngags kyi rkang par gyur pa/ oM pi tsu pi tsu pradz+nyA bar+d+ha ni/ dz+wa la dzA la me d+hA bar+t+ta ni/
176a3(rgyud 'bum): d+hi ri d+hi ri bud+d+hi bar+d+ha ni swA hA/ khwa mi zer ba na sngags 'dis bdun du mngon par sngags pa byas te/ ma bslangs pa'i sings po skyur po ji srid zla ba drug tu gang 'thungs pa shes rab chen
176a4(rgyud 'bum): por 'gyur ro/ / de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyi// mtshan nyid yang dag rab bshad bya// de yis nye bar bsten pa'i sngags// sgrub pa po yis nges par 'grub// dal zhing zab mo chos
176a5(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan/ / thams cad rig par mkhas dang bcas// sbyin sreg dkyil 'khor sngags shes shing // rab gnas gtor mi'i pha rol son// de nyid bcu ni rnam par rig/ nyan thos
176a6(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa srung ba'o/ / sngags spyod rim pa gus pa dang // gzugs ldan mthong na dga' ba dang // dkyil 'khor 'dri zhing bzlas par ldan// rtsa ba'i ltung ba 'joms pa po//
176a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags dang lus skyob sbyor ba yis// 'jig rten rnams ni bde bar byed// de ldan bla mar bcas nas ni// gang zhig bla ma smod byed cing // skye bo bla ma smod pa gang // dmyal ba
176b1(rgyud 'bum): chen por 'tshed par 'gyur/ / ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis dang por mchod// rdo rje gur gyis 'gro ba yis// de ltar bla ma'i nan tan bya// bla ma'i grib ma bud med
176b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / / lham dang stan dang mal stan rnams// rmongs chen gang zhig 'god byed na// skyes pa de ni spu gri 'dzin// legs par dbang bskur slob ma gang // bla ma'i bka' las 'da'
176b3(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ / 'jig rten 'dir ni 'on par 'gyur// 'jig rten pha rol dmyal bar gnas// g.yo dang sgyu yi sbyor ba yis// brdzun gyis mi nus smra ba las// khong skems mdze nad
176b4(rgyud 'bum): chen po can/ / dmyal ba la sogs skye bar 'gyur// de ltar shes pa'i slob ma yis// bla ma'i bsnyen bkur pha rol phyin// bla ma'i bka' ni rab bsrungs na// dngos grub rgyas pa
176b5(rgyud 'bum): grub par 'gyur/ / tshogs kyi zas ni rtag tu bya// zhi ba la sogs rab tu bskul// snga bar dge 'dun chos stor bya// bla ma sangs rgyas yang mnyes bya// bla ma la ni yon dbul
176b6(rgyud 'bum): zhing / / de yi rjes su tshegs kun la'o// bdag gi las ni brtsams nas ni// cho ga 'dis ni bsgrub par bya// yan lag rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan// rdo rje'i rgyan gyis rnam par
176b7(rgyud 'bum): brgyan/ / rdo rje dril bu blangs nas ni// lam kyi mami mdor gtor ma gdang // me 'og bdug spos mar ma dang // de bzhin dri yi drung sogs g.yas// g.yon du sngags kyi
177a1(rgyud 'bum): mchod yon sdod / / mdun du snod ni gzhag par bya// zhabs bsil gong ma'i cho ga yis// me tog spos sogs rim pa bzhin// lA s+ye la sogs mchod pa
177a2(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / mchod par byas na bzang por sbyin// me tog sgyur ba'i tshul gyis dang // dri ni 'thor ba'i tshul las dang // sdong pos mar me'i mchod pa dang // byugs pa'i lus kyis rjes
177a3(rgyud 'bum): su dris/ / lA s+ye'i lag pa lA s+ye ste// 'phreng bas 'phreng ba'i mkha' 'gro ma// glu yis hUM gi dam tshig glu// brla bskum pas ni ger nyid de// mchod pa 'di rnams bla na med//
177a4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed// sangs rgyas rnams ni mchod pas mchod// 'dod pa'i dngos grub byed par 'gyur// bzlas dang bsgom pa mngon dga' zhing // rtag tu 'khor
177a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i pha rol 'gro/ / rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i bka' ji bzhin// 'di rnams bla med mchod pa'o// me tog spos sogs mngon sum du// 'jig rten spyod par gnas pa yis// sna tshogs mchod
177a6(rgyud 'bum): pa mchog nyid min/ / de nyid byang chub yan lag min// dkar po zhi bar byed par brjod// ser po rgyas pa'i sgrub thabs la// dbang dang dgug par dmar po ste// tha ma'i las la
177a7(rgyud 'bum): nag po'o/ / zhi ba la ni me tog dkar// ser po rgyas pa'i rdo rje la// me tog nag po tha ma la// dbang dang dgug la dmar po bzang // rnal 'byor pa gang dbang bskur med// dkyil
177b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor du ni ma zhugs dang / / gang zhig rab gnas ma mthong dang // gang zhig sbyin sreg ma byas pa// 'jig rten 'di dang pha rol tu// de yi dngos grub mchog nyid med// gang gis slob
177b2(rgyud 'bum): dpon gsol ma btab/ / 'dir ni rigs su skye ba med// sangs rgyas thams cad bsgom par bya// gang gis byang chub ma thob na// 'khor lo sgyur ba'i gnas su de'i// skye zhing skye bar
177b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba'o/ / yang na sa yi bdag po nyid// dag pa'i gnas su mngon par 'gro// bde ba can dang mkha' 'gro dang // dga' ldan du ni blo ldan skye// 'jig rten 'dir ni gang 'grub pa//
177b4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas de ni ci zhig smos// khams gsum bdag po chen po 'di// 'chi med rgas pas khyab pa med// tshangs pa brgya byin de bzhin drag/ sgra gcan me dang rlung dang ni// 'dod
177b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lha dang mthong ldan nyid/ / 'di rnams de yi 'khor du 'gyur// lha klu de bzhin gnod sbyin dang // dri za lha ma yin dang mau// mi 'am ci dang mkha' spyod gang // de rnams 'khor 'gyur
177b6(rgyud 'bum): the tshom med/ / 'di ni rang byung bcom ldan 'das// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang // rigs dang byang chub byed pa dang // de bzhin du ni lhar gshegs dang // khyim nas 'byung bar byed
177b7(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / rab tu byung ba 'dzin pa dang // skye ba yongs su len pa dang // yongs su mya ngan 'das pa ston// 'dul ba'i 'jig rten mthong nas ni// 'di ni gzugs ni du ma byed// sangs
178a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyas sems can bskyab bzhed pas/ / sangs rgyas gar ni rol pa mdzad// ri bong stag dang seng ge dang // glang po rnams kyi rigs su yang // snying rjes phan pa'i sems
178a2(rgyud 'bum): kyis ni/ / phyag rgyas grub pa skye bar 'gyur// bud med sgyu ma'i spros pa yis// 'dod chags can la chos gsung ngo // bud med sgyu ma sangs rgyas nyid// sgyu ma thams cad sel bar byed//
178a3(rgyud 'bum): shes rab pha rol phyin gzugs su// bud med rtag tu yang dag gnas// sgyu ma chen mo gnas 'dug nas// sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu ster// g.yo zhing dade che ngo tsha med// rtag tu 'dod
178a4(rgyud 'bum): chags pha rol 'gro/ / dngos grub kyang ni rab tu ster// gzugs dang yon tan nor la yang // 'dod pa gang yang btsun mo med// rdo rje 'dod chags yid 'dod pas// rang gi bde ba
178a5(rgyud 'bum): myang bar ldan/ / skyes bu tshul khrims ldan pa dang // bde gshegs bka' las mi 'da' zhing // bla ma bsnyen bkur snying rje can// kye'i rdo rje rab phye ba'o// de nas rnal 'byor ma bdag
178a6(rgyud 'bum): med ma gtso mo dang / mkha' 'gro ma rnams kyis bstod pa'i rgyal po 'dis gsol ba btab pa/ zhe sdang rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// gti mug rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// ser sna rdo rjes
178a7(rgyud 'bum): bdag la spobs/ / 'dod chags rdo rje bdag la stsol// yid dang phrag dog chen po dang // rdo rje kun gyis dam tshig mgon// las rnams thams cad sgrub pa po// rdo rje can kun dgyes
178b1(rgyud 'bum): par mdzod/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi dam tshig la gnas te dbyangs 'di gsungs pa/ thig skud gsar pa mdzes par ldan// shin tu tshad ma gtsang ma
178b2(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / he zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi// shes rab can gyis thig gdab bya// de la 'di ni slob ma chen po'i gsol ba gdab pa'i dam tshig go// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad zhi// /
178b3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i// dkyil 'khor 'dren pas bshad du gsol// dkyil 'khor gyi rdo rje la gsol ba gdab pa rnam par rgyal ba
178b4(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin te/ da ni snying rje sdebs dpal ldan// bsrung ba'i 'khor le sbyor ba po// rdo rje yis ni gsal ba'i lus// sku gsum las ni skyes pa spro// gal te la la
178b5(rgyud 'bum): 'da' byed na/ / 'jig ste 'di la the tshom med// lus srul po dang kha cig gang // bango chen ye shes 'byung ba dang // rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin skyes// zur cig bgegs ni chen po
178b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / 'khor lo yis ni brgyad nyid kyi// cha yis sgro ni rab tu grags// sgo khang lha yi snam bu ni// sgo yi tshad kyi tshad du bya// sgro yi phyed kyi cha ru ni// ya phubs dang ni 'gram nyid
178b7(rgyud 'bum): do/ / rig byed nyid kyang de bzhin bya// dra ba'i snam bu rig byed phyed// dang por tshangs pa'i thig dang ni// gnyis par mtshams kyi thig dang yang // gsum par ngos ni bzhi yi bzhi//
179a1(rgyud 'bum): thig ni rab tu gdab par bya// tshangs thig cha gnyis bor nas ni// cha drug tu ni bdab par bya// de nas sgo yi tshad bor nas// dgu yi char ni rab tu gdab// de la
179a2(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni sa sbyang ba'i dam tshig go/ oM khaM hUM b+h+rUM/ de la 'di ni ye shes spyan drang ba ste/ oM me di ni badz+rI b+ha ba badz+ra ban+d+ha hUM/ de la 'di ni thig gdab pa'i dam tshig ste/ oM sa ma ya su
179a3(rgyud 'bum): tra mA ti kra ma hUM/ de la 'di ni rdul tshon bri ba'i dam tshig ste/ 'di ni chos dbyings dag pa ste// sems can khams ni thar par byed// kye yi rdo rje rgyal po ches// dkyil 'khor dam
179a4(rgyud 'bum): pa bzhed par bya/ / dbang ldan du ni sa ra b+ha// me yi mtshams su dge slong bri// chos kyi 'khor lo bden bral du// rlung du rdo rje bri bar bya// ljags kyu shar du bri bar bya// lho yi sgor ni
179a5(rgyud 'bum): zhags pa nyid/ / nub sgor de bzhin lcags sgrog ste// byang du rdo rje dril bu'o// dbus su thod pa dkar po ni// sna tshogs rdo rjes mtshan pa bri// de nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rgyal pos sbyin
179a6(rgyud 'bum): sreg gi grong khyer rab tu phye ba/ rdo rje thab khung sbyor ba yis// rdo rje'i sreg rdzas sbyor ba las// zlum por zhi bar byed par brjod// rgyas pa ra ba'i rdzing bu'i gzugs// dbang ni zla bo
179a7(rgyud 'bum): phyed pa 'dra/ / dgug pa la ni lcags kyu'i dbyibs// gsang dang zhe sdang las la ni// nam mkha'i khams dang mtshangs pa'o// de bzhin spong byed skal ngan dang // yan lag 'a
179b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sbyor ba yis/ / tsan dan a ka ru shing dang // gzhan yang dri yi rkang 'thung gis// sbyin sreg yan lag me sbar nas// phyis ni yang ni dgug par bya// oM e h+ye hi ma hA b+hU ta de ba
179b2(rgyud 'bum): r-i Shi dI dze satwa ma gr-i hI tA A hu ti mA hA raM asmin+man+do hi to b+ha ba/ lcags kyu nyid kyis dgug par bya// zhags pa nyid kyis gzhug bya zhing // lcags sgrog gis ni zhabs dag bcing //
179b3(rgyud 'bum): dril bu 'khrol bas dbang du byas// lA s+ye la sogs mchod pa brgyad// mchod yon cho ga byas nas ni// mar la sogs pa'i sbyor ba las// yang ni ma ni mnyes par bya// de la
179b4(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni rdo rje mchod yon gyi dam tshig ste/ oM pra ba ra sat+kA ra pra tIts+tsha swA hA/ de la 'di ni zhabs bsil gyi dam tshig ste/ oM sarba pA pa da ha na badz+ra ya satwa s+ya sarba pA paM da ha swA hA/
179b5(rgyud 'bum): de la 'di ni bsreg rdzas thams cad 'chu ba'i dam tshig gi sngags te/ oM badz+rA na ma la ma hA b+hU ta dz+wa la ya/ sarba b+hasmi ku ru sarba duSh+Tan hUM phaT/ dr-i sh+ya dzaHhUM raM hoHsa ma ya s+t+waM a
179b6(rgyud 'bum): / phyi nas rang 'dod pa'i lha spyan drang ba ste/ oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga wan+di ha b+hak+Sha Na sa ma yen tsa a gan+d+ha sa mA ti tsi ti pU dza dA dA pra sid+d+ha me/ de la 'di ni dgyes pa'i dam tshig ste/ oM kr-i
179b7(rgyud 'bum): baHsarba satwar+thaHsid+d+hi dzatA ma thA nu g+ha/ gats+tsha d+ha bud+d+ha ba~M Sha ya~M pun rag ma nA la muH bzhengs pa dang / las sna tshogs kyi sbyor ba dang / sbyin sreg gi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//
180a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gyis// rdo rje sems dpa'i rab gnas ni// 'jig rten tha snyad la gnas te// mdor bsdus nas ni bstan par bya// dang po re zhig rig ma 'dzin/
180a2(rgyud 'bum): dril bu 'khrol bar 'dod pa dang // rkang g.yas brkyang ba'i sbyor ba las// g.yas par rdo rje gsor ba dang // srong thun skad ni chag pa ni// gos kyis mgrin pa bcings pa dang // rin chen sman
180a3(rgyud 'bum): gyis yongs gang ba'i/ / bum pa sta gon gnas par bya// oM da wa pi tsu badz+ra a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM mo ha ra ti a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM dwe Sha ra ti a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM rA ga ra ti a d+hi tiSh+Tha/ oM badz+ra ra ti a d+hi tiSh+Tha/
180a4(rgyud 'bum): / oM badz+ra gau rI A kaR+Sha ya dzaHoM badz+ra tsau rI pre be sha ya hUM/ oM badz+ra bai tA lI ban+d+ha baM/ oM badz+ra g+hasma rI wa sh+yaM ku ru hoH'di ni ye shes dgug pa'i cho ga'o// shun pa lnga dang ba spu lnga// khyad par du
180a5(rgyud 'bum): yang dri lnga dang / / lus bshal la ni blugs par bya// mchod yon la sogs sngar bzhin bya// yang na de nyid sbyor bar bya// snga bar blugs shing byin gyis brlab// mig la sogs par ga
180a6(rgyud 'bum): mug sogs/ / rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod// dbang ni rang gi rigs nyid kyi// mchod pa la sogs rim pas brtsam// rang gi snying nas ye shes bsam// sangs rgyas bzhugs par
180a7(rgyud 'bum): bsang gtor bya/ / ye shes rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis// rim pas mchod pa'i lha mo spro// byang chub sems mchog bsams nas ni// sangs rgyas bstod pa yang dag brtsam// dngos po
180b1(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi rang bzhin gyis/ / stong pa snying rje tha dad med// khyod ni rnal 'byor ma tshogs yongs su bskor// khyod ni nyid kyi thugs kyi mchog mnyes pa// khyed kyi rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'gro ba kun
180b2(rgyud 'bum): bsgrubs shing / / snying rje'i thugs kyis sems can sad mdzad pa// sgyu ma'i spros pas rdo rje 'phen mdzad pa// he ru ka dpal rdo rje yid kyis dgyes// rdo rje se so la sbyor ba yis// rdo rje
180b3(rgyud 'bum): sgom pa bsgom par bya/ / rdo rje yi ge blangs nas ni// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje phung po rnam par bsgom// de nas rdo rje mched pa bsam/
