180b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje mdzub mo'i sbyor ba las/ / gal te dngos grub mi ster na// rdo rje sems dpa' gsad par bya// oM du ru du ru/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/ hUM hUM/ bcom ldan 'das kyis phur bus gdab pa chen po rdo rje
180b7(rgyud 'bum): de skad ces bka' stsal to/ / ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// cha mgrin rnam par bsgom par bya// dbu rgyan la ni rdo rje chos// phyag rgya chen por brjod pa las// pad+ma dmar ba
181a1(rgyud 'bum): spyi bor 'dzin/ / sku mdog dmar po stobs po che// gos dkar gnyis med sbyor ba'i las// bcu drug phyag gis rnam par brgyan// g.yas pa'i zhal ni nag po ste/
181a2(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa zla mdzes dri ma meng // dang po dmar po shes par bya// lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs// zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa// rdo rje chos ni gzi brjid che// 'dod chags chen
181a3(rgyud 'bum): po'i rjes chags pas/ / bdud bzhi mnyam par mnan pa'o// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje rnam snang dran par bya// dbu rgyan rdo rje 'dzin pa bsam// sku mdog dkar
181a4(rgyud 'bum): po gzi brjid che/ / phyag ni bcu drug zhal brgyad pa// zhabs bzhi pa ste 'jigs pa po// chos kyi 'khor lo spyi bor 'dzin// 'dod chags chen po rjes chags pa// spyan dang gnyis
181a5(rgyud 'bum): med sbyor ba yis/ / 'jigs pa 'di ni 'jigs par mdzad// dang po'i zhal ni dkar po ste// nag po dmar pos rnam par brgyan// lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs// ma mo'i
181a6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ / rdo rje nyi ma rnam par bsgom// cod pan rin chen 'dzin par bsam// rdo rje gzi brjid 'ongad po che// phyag ni bcu drug zhal brgyad pa// zhabs bzhi
181a7(rgyud 'bum): pa ste 'jigs pa po/ / sems kyi rin chen spyi bor 'dzin// bcom gser ltar gzi brjid che// dang po'i zhal ni ser po ste// g.yas pa sngon po 'dra ba'o// g.yon pa zla 'od
181b1(rgyud 'bum): bzang po ste/ / lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs// ma mo'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rta mchog rnam par bsgom par bya// dbu rgyan ral gri 'dzin par bsam// mar gang
181b2(rgyud 'bum): ut+pal mtshungs pa'o/ / zhal brgyad pa la zhabs bzhi pa// bcu drug phyag gis rnam par brgyan// dang po'i zhal ni sngo bsangs te// rta yi gzugs te 'jigs pa po// g.yas pa
181b3(rgyud 'bum): kha dog nag po ste/ / g.yon pa zla mdzes dri ma med// ral gri dngos grub spyi bor 'dzin// lhag ma'i zhal ni bung ba mtshungs// rdo rje nyi ma rta nyid kyis// phyag rgya 'di ni sgrol ma'i gzugs
181b4(rgyud 'bum): lha mo rnams kyi phyag gnyis brjod/ / gri gug dang ni thod pa 'dzin// kye yi rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchog/ ral gri dag ni rtag pa nyid// phan par me long de bzhin no// rta mgrin la ni
181b5(rgyud 'bum): gos bzang ste/ / rdo rje nyi ma la ni gser// rta mchog la ni 'gro mgyogs te// mchog tu phan pa nyid kyi yon// sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yis// bla ma la rtag rgyun du dbul/
181b6(rgyud 'bum): skal bzang rdo rje sems dpa' bdag/ skal bzang thub pa rnam snang mdzad// skal bzang dpal ldan 'jig rten dbang // skal bzang nyi ma bdun rgyal po// de nas rdo rje 'dzin
181b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyal po sku gsum mchog gi rdo rje 'dzin pa pos mnga' bdag rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dam tshig mchog gsungs pa/ oM d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hA ra ya d+hA ra ya/ marda marda/ badz+ra d+h+r-ika phaT swA hA
181'a1(rgyud 'bum): de nas sngags chen bshad pa na/ / rdo rje skye ba'i snying rje che// 'jigs shing skrag par gyur nas ni// rdo rje'i dngos grub rab tu stsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdorje
181'a2(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi rnam pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rta mgrin gyi sngags 'di gsung pa/ oM badz+ra d+har+m+ma sa ma ya s+t+waM/ hu lu hu lu oM A ro li ka phaT swA hA/ de nas 'di ni bshad tsam
181'a3(rgyud 'bum): na/ rdo rje chos ni grags chen po// 'jigs shing skrag par gyur nas ni// chos kyi dngos grub rab tu stsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
181'a4(rgyud 'bum): snyoms par zhugs te/ phan pa'i sngags 'di gsungs pa/ oM sA shwa taM pa ra ma sA shwa ta e h+ye hi dzi na dzi ka phaT swA hA/ de nas 'di ni bshad tsam gyis// sangs rgyas kun dang de bzhin gshegs/
181'a5(rgyud 'bum): brgyal zhing 'jigs par gyur nas ni// de nas sangs rgyas dngos grub stsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das rin chen nyi ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje gzi
181'a6(rgyud 'bum): brjod kyi sngags 'di gsungs pa/ oM badz+ra sAr+ya ta mo bi d+ha ma na ma hA sa ma ya s+t+waM a haM rat+na d+h+r-ika phaT swA hA/ de nas 'di ni bshad tsam gyis// rdo rje gzi brjid 'ong po che// 'jigs shing brgyas
181'a7(rgyud 'bum): bar gyur nas ni/ / nyi ma'i dngos grub rab tu stsol// de nas bcom ldan 'das don yod rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs te/ rta mchog rdo rje'i sngags 'di gsungs so// phu
181'b1(rgyud 'bum): phuHphuHhi hi hi/ pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika phaT swA hA/ de nas 'di ni bshad tsam gyis// rdo rje don yod rigs byung ba// 'jigs shing brgyal bar gyur nas ni// de rnams don yod dngos grub stsol/
181'b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor de nyid de// rdo rje can gyi zla phyed mtshungs// rdo rje chos kyi pad+ma 'dra// nyi ma'i yid bzhin nor bu sbyin// rta mchog ces bya de yi ni// thams cad du ni gru gsum
181'b3(rgyud 'bum): mo/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che// phan pa'i phyag rgya nyid dang ni// rdo rje chos kyi phyag rgya che// rin chen tog gi 'od byed ma// don yod grub pa'i phyag rgya re// rus pa'i rgyan gyis
181'b4(rgyud 'bum): brgyan par ldan/ / stag gi pags pa bsnams pa dang // dbu skra thod pa phyed pa ste// mchod par brtson pa'i sems dpa' yis// chags pa mig dmar mthong nas ni// phyag rgya
181'b5(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i sbyor ba las/ / chags pa'i sbyor bas bsgom par bya// las sna tshogs sgrub pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gyis// spyod pa'i mtshan
181'b6(rgyud 'bum): nyid bshad par bya/ / rdo rje spyod pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje phyag rgya yang dag brtsam// me tog 'bras sogs kyis brgyan pa// nags chen po yi mtha' nyid du// sems dpa' chen po 'gro bar bya// nag tshal du ni slong mo rgyu//
181'b7(rgyud 'bum): zas ni bzang pos brgyan pa nyid// de rnams 'jigs shing skrag nas ster// nags tshal bdag po'i rigs kun ni// rdo rje can ni 'khor du 'gyur// skyes pa dang ni skye ba kun// skye bo gang
182a1(rgyud 'bum): zhig skye 'gyur ba/ / gti mug rdo rje'i sbyor ba las// rdo rje'i mig gis mthong bar 'gyur// khams gsum lam ni nyams dga' bar// sgra ni gang zhig rab grags pa/
182a2(rgyud 'bum): rna ba'i drung du gnas pa bzhin// zhe sdang rdo rje'i sbyor ba las// drang srong mngon par shes pas thos// sems can kun gyi sems chen po// mtshon ka lta bu'i mtshan nyid ni// lag mthil skyu ru ra
182a3(rgyud 'bum): lnga bzhin/ / rdo rje'i sems kyis shes par 'gyur// skye ba bye ba stong phrag tu// rang gi rigs ni stong phrag gcig/ rdo rje sbyor bas dran 'gyur te// nyi ma gsum bzhin dran par 'gyur// sgyu
182a4(rgyud 'bum): 'phrul dra ba du ma yis/ / 'dis ni snang bar byed par 'gyur// mngon shes lnga yis sbyor ba yi// sangs rgyas mngon shes thob par 'gyur// rdo rje skye mched rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//
182a5(rgyud 'bum): / phan pa nyid kyis zhi ba ste// rdo rje nyi mas rgyas pa'o// rdo rje chos kyis dbang zhes bya// rdo rje sems dpas gsad par bya// zhi ba'i sems kyis zhi ba ste// dbang ni yang
182a6(rgyud 'bum): ngag brtsam par bya/ / rgyas pa'i sems kyis rgyas pa ste// rdo rje char sprin rab bsgom bya// rjes su chags pa'i sems kyis ni// bu mo bkug nas bza' bar bya// me yi char sprin 'bab pa dang //
182a7(rgyud 'bum): gdug pa'i sems kyis gsad par bya// 'phrog pa las ni dkar mo ste// skye gnyis pa las tshangs pa nyid// dpal ni sred med bu las kyang // ma bcag pa las raM b+ha nyid// rga ma chu sin rgyal
182b1(rgyud 'bum): mtshan las/ / phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba yis// de rnams thams cad re bar bza'// shin tu dga' ba'i sems kyis rtse// 'dod pas gos par mi 'gyur ro// mthar ni sA hAs zhi bste/
182b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa'i dus su bo Shan+da// mthar ni hU~M phaT gsang pa la// dbang dang dgug la dzaHdang hrIH// las thams cad pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// / de nas rdo rje 'dzin
182b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal ni/ / mkha' 'gro ma ni rdo rje gur// rdo rje mkha' 'gro rab bsgrub phyir// thub pas tshig 'di bka' stsal to// me tog 'bras bus brgyan byas pa'i// ri khrod dang ni sman ljongs su// rdo rje
182b4(rgyud 'bum): skyoskyil krung bcas nas ni/ / bla ma sangs rgyas mchod par bya// dkon mchog gsum la bdag skyabs mchi// sdig pa thams cad so sor bshags// 'gro ba'i dge la rjes yi rang // sangs rgyas
182b5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub yid kyis gzung / / sangs rgyas chos dang tshogs mchog la// byang chub bar du skyabs su mchi// rang gzhan don ni rab bsgrub phyir// byang chub sems ni bskyed par bgyi// byang
182b6(rgyud 'bum): chub mchog gi sems ni bskyed bgyis nas/ / sems can thams cad bdag gi mgron du gnyer// byang chub spyod mchog yid 'ong spyad par bgyi// 'gro la phan phyir sangs rgyas 'grub
182b7(rgyud 'bum): par shog/ tshangs pa'i gnas ni bzhi po yis// sems kyi ngal ni bso bar bya// phyi nas byang chub sems gnas te// rdo rje bsrung ba'i dam tshig go/ bden dang rdzun par spyad pa yis//
183a1(rgyud 'bum): brtag pas nye bar mi gos te// ma skyes pa yi sbyor ba yis// skye ba 'dir ni rab tu brjod// oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/ nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus
183a2(rgyud 'bum): gnas par/ / sna tshogs rdo rje bsgom par bya// hUM ni bcu yi sbyor ba yis// khro bo bcu ni rim pas dgod// gshin rje mthar byed shes rab mthar// pad+ma mthar byed bgegs mthar byed//
183a3(rgyud 'bum): Tak+ki khro bo dbyug pa sngon// mi g.yo ba dang stobs chen dang // gtsug tor gdugs ni dkar po dang // rdo rje zhabs 'og gnas pa ni// bdud rtsi sbyor bas thams cad du// khro bo'i sgom
183a4(rgyud 'bum): pas bsgom par bya/ / dpag tshad brgyar ni khyab pa ru// bsams nas bgegs ni bskrad par bya// nam mkha'i khams kyi dbus gnas par// rdo rje dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// rdo rje
183a5(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ / 'od kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// me yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// yang ni chu ni bsgom par bya// chu yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par//
183a6(rgyud 'bum): brtul zhugs can gyis dbang chen bsgom// dbang chen dkyil 'khor steng du ni// bdag nyid kyang ni bsgom par bya// bruM las gnas ni bsams nas su// rnam pa lnga ni rab brtag bya//
183a7(rgyud 'bum): ye shes lnga las byung ba yi// sems dpa'i gzugs brnyan bsgom par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i// rig ma'i skyes bu bsgom par bya// oM d+harma d+hA tu badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma kohaM/
183b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje bzhengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// mig la sogs par gti mug sogs// rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod// thugs kyi rdo rje mkha' spyod ma// gsung gi rdo rjes
183b2(rgyud 'bum): spyod ma/ / sku la zhabs 'og gnas ma ste// oM AHhUM las byung ba'o// rdo rje dkar mo chu bdag ma// rdo rje mkha' 'gro bdag med ma// zhe sdang rdo rje'i gnas mnan cing // dkyil 'khor snying
183b3(rgyud 'bum): por bsgom par bya/ / dkar mo chom rkun ro langs ma// g+hasma rI ni sgo srungs ma// puk+ka sI dang ri khrod ma// gdol pa g.yung mo mtshams su dgod// steng du mkha' spyod ma zhes bshad/
183b4(rgyud 'bum): 'og tu de bzhin sa spyod ma// dbus su bdag med mkha' 'gro ma// mkha' 'gro dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom// byang chub rdo rje sangs rgyas la// ji ltar mchod pa che stsal ba// bdag kyang
183b5(rgyud 'bum): rab tu bskyab pa'i phyir/ / nam mkha'i rdo rje bdag la stsol// dbang bskur rdo rje chen po ni// khams gsum gyis ni phyag byas pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang gsum gyi// gnas las byung
183b6(rgyud 'bum): ba stsol bar mdzad/ / ye shes kyi dbang la gsol ba gdab pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rig ma'i skyes bu dbang chen la// cod pan rang gi lhag pa'i lha// des ni dkyil 'khor
183b7(rgyud 'bum): dbang dang ni/ / bstod dang mchod pa la sogs bya// ye shes gzhug pa de bzhin yang // lce yis rdo rje bdud rtsi myang // nang du brjod pa'i sbyor ba las// brtul zhugs can gyis sngags
184a1(rgyud 'bum): bzlas bya/ / rnal 'byor ma 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas byams pa la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams
184a2(rgyud 'bum): kyis rang rang gi rnam par rtog pa skye bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud ces spyad par bgyi/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs//
184a3(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma zhes mngon par brjod// phyag rgya chen po rab sbyor las// gang phyir de nyid brten pa yi// rnal 'byor ma yi rdo rje gur// rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud ces bshad// pha rol phyin pa
184a4(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi thabs/ / bsam gtan tsam gyis grub par 'gyur// dga' mdzes mkha' 'gro ma yis mtsho// mkha' dang gser gyi char pa dang // dga' chen ma dang g+hasma rI// shin tu dgyes
184a5(rgyud 'bum): rol gsang yig 'phrog/ rdo rje mkha' 'gro phan rgyud brgyad// kye yi rdo rje sangs rgyas kun// gsang mdzod rdo rje bdud rtsi 'byung ba dang // 'khor lo sdom pa gur gyi 'byung gnas ni// rnal
184a6(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma rgyud du ni rab tu grags/ / skyes bu rnams ni 'dul ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor rgyud ni yang dag bshad// btsun mo rnams ni bsdu ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud bshad do//
184a7(rgyud 'bum): dman pa rnams la bya ba'i rgyud// bya ba rnal 'byor de lhag la// sems can mchog la rnal 'byor mchog/ rnal 'byor gong med de lhag la// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams
184b1(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ re zhig bdag cag gi yul rnams ni 'tshal na/ sems can gzhan rnams kyis ji ltar sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa 'tshal ba lags//
184b2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// stong pa snying rje tha dad med// gang du sems ni rab bsgoms pa// 'di ni sangs rgyas chos dang ni// dge 'dun gyi yang bstan pa'o// mu stegs can
184b3(rgyud 'bum): sun dbyung ba dang / rgol ba rnams tshar gcod pa dang / rang gi sde'i gzhung mngon pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// bdag gi byang chub thob bya'i phyir// gang phyir gzhan dag bsgrub pa'i phyir
184b4(rgyud 'bum): des na sangs rgyas chos dang ni/ / dge 'dun gyi yang bstan pa'o// bdag 'dzin zhen pa bzlog pa'i phyir// chos dbyings bdag nyid sgrub thabs ni// thabs dang shes rab 'dus pa yis//
184b5(rgyud 'bum): des ni sangs rgyas bstan pa'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang rgyal ba'i sras po rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung 'di thos nas dga' bar gyur te tshig 'di skad smras pa/ e ma
184b6(rgyud 'bum): kun tu bzang po yi/ / bstan pa nam mkha' las byung ba// nam mkha'i dbus su sbyor ba yis// ye shes rgya mtsho nyan par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ni// bde ba chen po rnam 'phel
184b7(rgyud 'bum): bas/ / dam tshig thams cad bshad par bya// sangs rgyas 'bras bu 'dod pa yis// bde dang rangs shing gar dang ni// glu gar rol mo sgra byed pas// dri dang 'phreng ba byug pa yis//
185a1(rgyud 'bum): rig pa'i rgyal po rab tu 'grub// ji ltar bde ba bde bzung nas// ji ltar 'dod pa spyad par bya// ji ltar gnas su gnas nas kyang // yi ge dam pa 'grub par 'gyur
185a2(rgyud 'bum): bza' dang btung ba'i sbyor ba dang / / bzang po'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa yis// nyi ma gcig tu bskul ba yis// dam pa de nyid 'grub par 'gyur// rtag tu rang gi dam tshig myang // rtag tu de
185a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa mchod/ / rtag tu bla ma la yang dbul// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// ji ltar mgon po rnam snang mdzad// rdo rje 'dzin sbyin bla ma nyid// ji ltar nam mkha' rgya mtsho
185a4(rgyud 'bum): che/ ji ltar thub pa rgya mtsho chos// ji ltar mgon po bdun rgyal po// de ltar rdo rje slob dpon brjod// des na 'bad pa thams cad kyis// rdo rje slob dpon bla ma che// dge ba mchog tu
185a5(rgyud 'bum): gsal ba po/ / nam yang smad par mi bya'o// rdo rje sdom pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chen po rdo rje gsor bar bzhed pa'o//
185a6(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro bdag med mas 'khyud pas// bzang po spyod pa dbye bar bya// rdo rje'i gzugs su bzhag nas ni// ji ltar 'dod par 'dod pa yis// rig 'dzin 'khor lo sgyur ba nyid//
185a7(rgyud 'bum): dogs pa med par 'grub par 'gyur// dri lnga yang dag blangs nas su// rdzas lnga dang ni bsre bar bya// lcags gsum gyis ni dkris nas ni// ril bu'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur//
185b1(rgyud 'bum): / gur kum a ka ru ldan pa// nyi ma 'char ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i// ril bu kha ru bcug byas nas// nyi ma'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// sha lnga dang ni ldan pa ru// lcags gsum gyis ni
185b2(rgyud 'bum): dkris nas ni/ / rdo rje nyi ma rab sbyor bas// nyi ma gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur// tsan dan dmar po kha che dang // dga' ba sbas par sbyar ba ni// lcags gsum gyis ni dkris byas
185b3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ rta yi rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// 'jig rten mgon po rnam bsgoms nas// tsa na'i rus pa'i tshad tsam las// gu gul lcags kyis dkris pa ni// mgon po'i rig pa 'dzin par
185b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / ril bu sgrub thabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// klu yi rgyal po'i mgo bsregs nas// rang byung khrag gis bsgo bar bya// rdo rje phan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// mig sman
185b5(rgyud 'bum): rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ / ba bla'i sa bon ldan pa dang // stag gi pags pa'i tshol bu mnye// sku yi rdo rje'i rnal 'byor gyis// rkang pa'i byug pa 'grub par 'gyur// yan lag med
185b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dkyil 'khor dbus/ / dbang po'i brag phug 'gram du ni// rdo rje rkang 'og rnal 'byor gyis// lha yi bu mo rab bsgrub bya// o Di'i yul du nye ba na// a mra 'bras chen po yi ni//
185b7(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje gnod mdzes sbyor ba yis// rkang 'og rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// yang nas yang du bskul bar bya// de nyid dngos grub thams cad kyis// yid
186a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin nor bu lta bur mtshungs/ / rdo rje gnod mdzes sku chen po// phyag gnyis zhal ni gcig pa can// sdigs mdzub klu yi zhags pa dang // kha dog nag por bsgom/
186a2(rgyud 'bum): par bya// rdo rje mdzod ni blangs nas ni// rnam pa thams cad bsgom par bya// mi bskyod pa yis yang dag mnan// phuHzhes bya ba'i sngags brjod do// rab tu byung ba dang mig sman rdo rje zhes
186a3(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyi gsung thos nas/ dga' zhing mgu ba skyes par gyur te tshig 'di skad smras so// e ma ho rdo rje e
186a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje/ / e ma rdo rje'i bstan pa ni// chos rnams thams cad stong pa la// gang phyir dngos grub rab gnas pa// snying po med pa'i chu shing la// ji ltar snying po'i 'bras zhim pa// de ltar
186a5(rgyud 'bum): snying po med lus la/ / dngos grub 'bras zhim de bzhin no// nam mkha' 'byung po thams cad dang // chos rnams kun gyi gnas yin te// sems ni nam mkha' lta bur dag/ dag pa'i
186a6(rgyud 'bum): sems ni mchog tu bde/ / don dam dbang po'i rang bzhin gyis// sems las phyi rol 'gyur ba med// gzugs sogs so sor 'dod pa yi// sems nyid du ni 'dod par bya// de nas
186a7(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ji ltar sems stong la/ sems las phyi rol gyi don
186b1(rgyud 'bum): sems mi stong pa rab tu 'byung zhes bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa// thogs med srid pa'i bag chags kyis// phyi rol don ni rnam par brtags// sems kyis tham
186b2(rgyud 'bum): cad rnam par brtags/ / sems ni kun tu 'gro bar brjod// byang chub sems rab tu 'byung ba bstan pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// shin tu bzhin mdzes mig yangs ma// si h+la ga
186b3(rgyud 'bum): pur 'byung ba'i gnas/ / dpang du gzhug par byas nas ni// skra nas gzung bar yang dag brtsam// rdo rje'o yis 'o byas shing // rdo rje nyed pas mnye bar bya// rdo rje 'khyud pas yang dag
186b4(rgyud 'bum): blang / / rdo rje ma mchu rab bcir bya// rdo rje mdzub mo'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje gnas ni rab bskul bya// rdo rje sems ni phyung ba yis// rdo rje lce yis yang dag bza'// phyi nas de yi bde
186b5(rgyud 'bum): can du/ / rdo rje sems dpa' gzhug par bya// rdo rje 'chi ba'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje mchod pa yang dag brtsam// rdo rje sems dpa' 'byung ba la// sems ni brtul zhugs can gyis
186b6(rgyud 'bum): / dbrog/ pad+ma me tog ldan pa yis// pad+ma dmar pos mchod par bya// pad+ma sa mnyes pa'i rdo rje can// pad+ma dmar pos khyad par du'o// dri nga'i rab tu sbyor ba yis// rgyal mtshan ga
186b7(rgyud 'bum): bur mchod pa ni/ / 'di ni brtson 'grus bde chen dang // stobs dang rgyas par 'gyur ba dang // mthong ba nyid kyis bskul ba yis// 'jig rten 'di ni dbang du byed// gang gis
187a1(rgyud 'bum): dkon mchog gsum bsang dang / / gang gis sems can bsang byas dang // gang gis slob dpon smod pa dang // sangs rgyas lam la 'phya ba rnams// lcags
187a2(rgyud 'bum): kyu yis ni yang dag dgug/ lcags sgrog gis ni rkang pa bcing // zhags pas mgrin pa dam par bcing // rdo rje bdag gis dgug par bya// mkha' 'gro sangs rgyas bsams nas ni//
187a3(rgyud 'bum): de rnams dpang por gsol bar bya// 'dis ni sangs rgyas dpa' bo dang // rdo rje sems dpa' bkrongs pa ste// 'di ste sdig pa chen po ste// mnar med 'gro ba'i bdag nyid de// 'di
187a4(rgyud 'bum): ni dmyal ba chen por ltung / / de ltar bsams nas gsad par bya// rdo rje'i gzugs ni bsams nas su// nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsgom par bya// rdo rje dbyig pas brdungs byas nas//
187a5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje can gyi gnas su skye// lcags kyu la sogs mi nus na// zan gyis kyang ni 'du bya zhing // de nyid kyis ni gzugs bsams nas// rdo rje dkyil 'khor nyid du gzhag/ Tak+ki rgyal
187a6(rgyud 'bum): po lcags kyu ste/ / dbyug sngon can la rang gi ming // stobs kyi rgyal po rtse gsum pa// mi g.yo gri rtse'i dkyil 'khor can// rnam par rtog pa chen po gsod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
187a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal gyis// thams cad dbugs dbyung rab gsol bas// dam tshig rdo rje bsrung don du// sbas pa'i spyod yul 'di gsungs pa// rdo rje khro bo'i skyes bu che// thams cad
187b1(rgyud 'bum): zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ / snying khar g.yon pa'i khu tshur mdzub// g.yas na rang gi mtshon cha 'phyar// gshin rje gsod pa'i dbyig to can// gzhan gyis mi thub rdo rje dbyig/ rta mgrin la ni
187b2(rgyud 'bum): dbang mchog dmar/ / mi phyed bdud rtsi'i thab sbyor las// Tak+ki rgyal po lcags kyu ste// dbyig sngon can la rang gi ming // stobs kyi rgyal po rtse gsum pa// mi g.yo yi ge'i dkyil 'khor rtse/
187b3(rgyud 'bum): tshad skyob rgyal po rgyal po la// chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par bsgom// gtun shing rdo rje rkang 'og la// zhabs g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa'o// dbang po sngon po'i rnam pa ltar// mthar byed rnam
187b4(rgyud 'bum): par bsgom par bya/ / gzhan gyis mi thub rdo rje ni// 'jigs byed zla ba'i nor bu 'dra// pad+ma'i khro bo dmar po che// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i bdag nyid gnag/ mtshams kyi khro bo char gnag cing // spyi bor rdo
187b5(rgyud 'bum): rje 'dzin pas mtshan/ / gshin rje rnam snang nyid kyis te// rdo rje sems dpa' dbyig pa can// pad+ma'i khro bo rnam gzigs rjes// rdo rje sems dpa' la sbyor ba// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas
187b6(rgyud 'bum): par/ / rdo rje nyi ma bsgom par bya// 'og tu pad+ma'i gdan bsams nas// khro bo bcu rnams rab bsgom bya// ye shes rdo rje rang dngos su// bcu phyed dkyil 'khor bdag nyid de// bdud rnams zhas
187b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi 'og bsams nas/ / dkyil 'khor lnga po bsgom par bya// bsrung ba'i 'khor lo gzi brjid che// bskal ba'i me ltar 'bar ba ste// 'khor zhing rab tu mi g.yo bar// dpag tshad lnga brgya'i
188a1(rgyud 'bum): tshad tsam mo/ / srung ba'i dam tshig stobs kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// de nas bcom ldan dpa' chen po// rang gi byin rlabs rim gnas te//
188a2(rgyud 'bum): rang gi byin rlabs rnal 'byor gyis// de nyid las ni bshad par bya// snying gi dbus su zla bar gyur// gzugs brnyan zla bar ma bcos pa// sna tshogs 'od kyis yang dag khyab// de las rdo rje
188a3(rgyud 'bum): bsgom par bya/ / rdo rje bdag med mkha' 'gro ma// cho gas bskul bas bsgom par bya// mkha' 'gro sna yi mthar gnas pa// yungs kar tsam du rnam par bsgom// yungs kar la ni 'gro ba
188a4(rgyud 'bum): kun/ / khams gsum rgyu dang mi rgyu ba// de ltar sgom par byed pa yi// rang gi byin rlabs rab tu 'grub// gzugs sgra de bzhin dri dang ni// ro dang reg bya mngon 'dod pa// der ni rnal 'byor nyid kyis
188a5(rgyud 'bum): ni/ mi 'dzin de phyir bdag gzhan med// ji ltar rdor pa de las byung ba// zhi ba'i bde ba'i rnam par 'dod// rba rlabs med cing snang ba med// rnam rtog med cing yi ge med// myos byed cung zad
188a6(rgyud 'bum): rab 'thungs pa'i/ / bdag gi bdag nyid mi rig go/ dga' bral dga' ba dag gi mthar// rtog pa'i dra ba rnam par spangs// 'gyur med 'khrul pa las 'das shing // kye yi rdo rje rnam par gsal//
188a7(rgyud 'bum): bems min rnam pa he ru ka/ rnam pa rnams kyis yongs su bskor// rang nyid mgon po he ru ka/ de yis bdag nyid mi rig cing // de yis dus na thams cad rig/ 'byung po 'gro dang 'ong ba ni//
188b1(rgyud 'bum): / rang gi kun mkhyen lta bur gzigs// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas sras po dang // yan lag kun dang bu ga kun// mgo bo dra ba'i skud par bcas// lus ni yod min ltar gzigs shing // skad
188b2(rgyud 'bum): cig kye rdo rje'i gzugs 'dzin/ / ji ltar nam mkha' mi gzigs shing // mtshan ma med cing ma byung dang // gos pa med cing 'khrul pa med// sgrib pa lnga ni rnam par spangs// ji ltar me long
188b3(rgyud 'bum): gzugs brnyan ni/ / rtogs nas bde ba rnam spangs pa// de bzhin bdag nyid he ru ka'i// rnam pa lta bur gsal bar mthong // de nyid don dang dbang po dang // phung po nam mkha' lta bur yod//
188b4(rgyud 'bum): lus ni bde ba nyid brjod cing // 'du byed rnams kyis zil mi non// gzugs ni mig gis mi 'dzin te// sgra ni thos pa po yis min// lce yis ro ni mi tsher te// dri ni sna yis yang ma yin//
188b5(rgyud 'bum): reg bya lus kyi gong bus min// 'on kyang bde chen tshul las ni// bud med bzang mo reg pas bde// rna bas glu yi bde bas bzang // mnams pas dri yi bde ba che// skye gnas reg pa'i
188b6(rgyud 'bum): bde chen dang / / ro yis btung ba'i sbyor ba las// gang gis bde ba 'gog par byed// bde ba chen pos 'gro ba khyab// bde ba ma rtogs mi shes so// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' la// /
188b7(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro ma dang btsun mo bzang // sangs rgyas lnga dang du ma ni// bde bar phyin cing rnam par sad// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das
189a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi bde ba chen po'i tshig thos nas tshig 'di skad smras pa/ phal pa'i rnam rtog gzhom pa'i phyir// sgom pa yang dag rab tu bsgrags// phal pa'i gnas skabs gzhom
189a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyir/ / sgom pa yang ni sgom pa min// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis rtogs pa de bzhin de/ 'on kyang mi gtsang ba'i tshad mnyam par sbyang ba'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku
189a3(rgyud 'bum): gzugs bsgom par bya'o/ / phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das lus can sgom pa'i thabs kyi dgos pa nyid de ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsang ba
189a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bdag po dgos pa yod do/ / bcom ldan 'das ming ci lags/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas nyid do// sangs rgyas nyid ci lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
189a5(rgyud 'bum): do/ / de ci lags/ lus can 'di ni bden pa'o// de ci'i slad du zhe na/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ 'di ltar nga ni mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus
189a6(rgyud 'bum): brgyan pa'o/ / de ci'i slad du zhe na/ mi 'dra ba'i phyir sgrub pa yin no// phyag na rdo rjes gsol pa/ ci bcom ldan 'das bems po lags sam/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ nga nyid
189a7(rgyud 'bum): me long lta bu'i ye shes so/ / me long lta bu'i ye shes de ci lags/ rdo rje 'dzin pas bka' stsal pa/ bden pa ma yin pa dang / brdzun pa ma yin pa dang / rgyu ma yin pa dang / skye ba ma
189b1(rgyud 'bum): yin pa ste/ de ltar nga nyid mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / nga nyid so sor rtogs pa'i ye shes dang / nga nyid bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes dang / de ltar chos kyi dbyings shin tu rnam par dag pa'o// /
189b2(rgyud 'bum): de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnam pa dang bral ba'i byang chub de skad ma smra zhig/ nga nyid dngos dang dngos med nga // dang po'i de bzhin gshegs par brjod// gzugs dang gzugs med
189b3(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa'i mchog/ zab mo zhi ba'i chos dang ldan// sems dpa' chen po he ru ka/ bdag med lhan cig mnyam sbyor ba // bde chen las ni bems min nga // 'jig rten kun rdzob bems po
189b4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / skyes pa bud med ma ning dang // 'gro ba nga yis yang dag khyab// de phyir 'dus pa zhes bya nyid// rgyal ba rgya mtsho bdag gis bshad// rdo rje can dang byang sems rnams// ma ning
189b5(rgyud 'bum): gnas su yang dag grub/ / gang zhig lha mo bdag med de// rang bzhin gyis ni btsun mo yin// sangs rgyas he ru ka nga yin// de nyid phyir na ma ning ste// 'gro ba'i dngos po gnyis mthong
189b6(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / thabs dang shes rab bdag nyid nga // shin tu mnyam sbyor rnal 'byor gyis// mi bskyod med cing bdag la'ang med// dam pa'i rang bzhin bde ba chen po'i gnas rdo rje zhes bya ba'i
189b7(rgyud 'bum): ting nge 'dzin to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo chen po rdo rje 'dod pa bde ba chen po rdo rje yan lag med pa shin tu dga' ba chen pos tshig 'di dag bka' stsal pa/ phyag drug pa dang sgeg
190a1(rgyud 'bum): par bcas/ / zhal gcig ral pa 'dzin pa dang // brgyad gnyis lo dang ser mo ni// rdo rje yan lag med pa 'grub// dpa' bo'i g.yas par mda' nyid de// lag pa
190a2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis par ral gri nyid/ / gsum par me long rig par bya// lag pa g.yon par gzhu nyid de// gnyis pa la ni dbang mchog nyid// kaM ke l+li ya yal ga ste// phyag drug nyid du bsgom par bya//
190a3(rgyud 'bum): zhabs g.yon brkyang bas gnas par ni// bu mo'i snying khar bsams nas ni// rdo rje btsun mo 'grub par 'gyur// mda' yis 'o ma 'dzin pa 'bigs// a sho ka yis snying khar brab// ral
190a4(rgyud 'bum): gris skyes ma bsdigs par bya/ / de nas me long bstan par bya// g.yu yis rkang pa bcings nas ni// ut+pal zhags pas dgug par bya// skra grol 'ong bar 'dod pa dang // snyan pa'i skad ni
190a5(rgyud 'bum): rab tu smra/ / ha dang si ni byed pa mo// rangs shing yan lag tshed mas brgyan// kha ni so rtsis gang ba dang // 'dod pa stobs dang bral bar bsam// rdo rje mchod pa'i sbyor ba yis// mi 'gyur
190a6(rgyud 'bum): sems kyis rjes chags bya/ / 'dod pa'i sngags ni ma bcos pas// de yi snying ni bskul bar bya// oM a mu kI me A rA ya many+dzu g+ho Sha hrIHdzaHde ltar bsgom pa byas pa yis// 'jam pa'i mgon
190a7(rgyud 'bum): po'i btsun mo ni/ / sgrub pa po la 'dod pa dang // dbang du byed cing 'ong bar 'gyur// zla ba phyed kyi sbyor ba yis// bzlas pa khri yis sbyor ba las// g.yo ba gser gyi rna cha ma// shin tu dag
190b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sems kyis bsgrub/ / haM gi sa bon las skyes pa// thams cad rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// chang gi btung ba'i rab sbyor bas// rdo rje yan lag med pa sgrub// ma bcos mchog gi sa bon
190b2(rgyud 'bum): bde dang sdug bsngal rang bzhin can/ / bde ba chen po mchog tu zhi// sems can thams cad dga' bar byed// 'di ni srog ni chen po ste// mchog tu dga' ba mdzes ma nyid// bde dang
190b3(rgyud 'bum): sdug bsngal rtag tu de'i/ / dran pa de ltar rab tu grags// mya ngan 'dod chags de bzhin gdungs// dga' dang dga' bral de bzhin no// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// de nyid dbyangs yig
190b4(rgyud 'bum): drug par brjod/ / zla ba phyed pas yang dag ldan// thig les mgo bo nyid du mchod// sems can gyi ni kun gzhi ste// rgyud rnams kyi ni khyad par du'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
190b5(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po rdo rje sa bon gyi yi ge thos nas sems sgrub pa gsal ba nye bar gyur nas tshig 'di dag gsungs pa/ sems pa med
190b6(rgyud 'bum): cing sgom pa med/ / sngags med lha yang med pa ste// sems kyi rdo rje las byung ba// 'di ni byang chub rim bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to//
190b7(rgyud 'bum): bsod nams med cing sdig pa med// byang chub med cing sangs rgyas med// ye shes lnga yi sbyor ba yis// byang chub sems ni brtan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das 'khor lo'i dam tshig gis
191a1(rgyud 'bum): de skad ces bka' stsal to/ / sngags med bzlas pa'ang yod ma yin// 'gro ba gsum po thams cad med// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis// bsgom pa dang ni sgom
191a2(rgyud 'bum): pa med/ / bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// kun rdzob 'jig rten pa yang yod// dpyad na gang du 'jig rten pa// rtag tu 'jig rten pa nyid 'khor// /
191a3(rgyud 'bum): 'di ni byang chub rim bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das pad+ma dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// ma skyes pa dang mi dmigs pa// mi phyed nam mkha' lta bu ste// zab cing zhi ba'i rang
191a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin ni/ / 'di ni byang chub rim bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ral gri'i dam tshig gis de skad ces bka' stsal to// sgyu ma ji ltar me long ltar// nam mkha' ji ltar bde ji ltar//
191a5(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar dngos po yongs shes pa// 'di ni byang chub rim bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ma mkha' 'gro ma bdag med mas de skad ces bka' stsal to// stong nyid dri med dam pa'i gnas//
191a6(rgyud 'bum): rmi lam sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid// ji srid ma zhig bar du ni// sems kyi rang bzhin sgom par gyis// mA ma kI'o// srid med mya ngan 'das pa med// 'di ste bde chen rdo rje ste// gang zhig yid kyis
191a7(rgyud 'bum): sgom pas bsgom/ / de ni mchog gi sgom pas bsgom// spyan gyi'o// sngags dang yi ge rnam par spangs// 'di ni sems med thig le med// 'di de dam pa'i bde chen te// bri ba med cing gang
191b1(rgyud 'bum): ba med/ / gos dkar mo'i 'o// gzugs brnyan rang bzhin ji lta bar// de ltar dngos po bsgom par bya// stong nyid dri med mchog gi gnas// de ni bsod nams sdig pa med// sgrol ma'i'o// /
191b2(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar chu nang zla ba ste// bden min brdzun pa min pa ltar// de ltar dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yi// lus kyi rang bzhin rnyog pa med// 'khor thams cad kyis de skad ces bka' stsal to//
191b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das sna tshogs byed pa rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ mnga' gzhu char 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo //
191b4(rgyud 'bum): muHts+tsha Di dang ser sna yis// chang gzungs khu tshur bzung ba yis// g.yon ni 'dod pa'i khu tshur gyis// bsdams pas dgra rnams bsdigs par bya// yan lag kos skor bzung nas ni/

191b6(rgyud 'bum): la khu tshur bzung nas ni/ / brang ni rgyas pa nyid du bya// sems dang dmigs ni 'ben la bya// hUM gi sa kha ni dgang ba dang // g.yas brkyang la sogs sbyor ba yis// gshin rje srin po gsang
191b7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / 'dir mang brjod pas ci zhig bya// kun rdzob tu ni bsdus pa tsam// gzhu yi rig byed rtsa ba gang // de ni rdo rje 'dzin spyod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rol mo'i sgra zhes bya
192a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ ral mo'i sku'i sdug pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // tha ha~M u0f7fha~M/ bka ba ka/ tha4/
192a2(rgyud 'bum): thA/ Tha ho u0f7fho/ ba hi ba hi/ ur+thA ur+d+ha/ kr-i ka kr-i ka/ tha ka tha ka/ dz+dzaha~Mn+dI/ ta Da wa taM Da wa dz+dza/ chu lang dang ni rnga dang yang // dza dza la gcig pi wang rgyas// dang ra ba can dang g
192a3(rgyud 'bum): ling bru dang / / rgyud gsum kar ta ka ni// rnam gsum brdung bas brdung bar bya// chung ngur brdungs pas rgyal byas te// dkyil 'khor gsol gang ba la sogs pa// mchod pa 'din bla na med/
192a4(rgyud 'bum): rang gi tshogs bcang mang po ma// bstan pa 'dis ni cizhig bye// ji snyid rol mo'i bstan bcos su// de ni rdo rje rol mo'i sgra// de nas bcom ldan 'das dri bzang po'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin

192a6(rgyud 'bum): rnams rdzas ni badrug smos che/ / hUM ru ka la rab tu dbul// gtsir dang klu ma nyid// de bzhin du yang swa sgra nyid// bdug byed snying po 'di rnams ni// phan pa lo ni sbyar bar bya// kun tu
192a7(rgyud 'bum): dang po la ka/ ri dgas lte ba sen mo mo// rin chen rgyal po'i bdug pa 'di// kun la mi 'jigs sur dkum dang // shriM trA~M tra~M mi sha shrI dang // sha lI dza dang sha mi kaM/ 'jig rten mgon
192b1(rgyud 'bum): bdug pa 'di/ / rtag tu rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs// sna tshogs dri ni khyad par du// sna tshogs rdo rje mchod pa las// bdun gyi rgyal po mchod pa 'di// kun tu stobs kyis bsgrubs pa ste// ji snye
192b2(rgyud 'bum): dri yi bstan bcos su/ / gong bu'i dum bu'i bdug pa mchog/ de kun phyag na rdo rje'i 'o// rdo rje'i mchod pa rab tu grags// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gom pa rnam par dgod pa zhes bya ba'i ting

192b6(rgyud 'bum): du brdungs pas de bzhin gar/ / byas nas 'khor lo lta bur bskor// phyi nas gru bzhi dgang bar bya// phyi nas 'dod pa'i lag pas bskor// sa la pus ni gnyis btsugs nas// lag pas mchod
192b7(rgyud 'bum): rten legs par bya/ / ji snyed gar gyi bstan bcos su// byed pa'i cha lugs brjod pa ni// de snyed rdo rje sems dpa' yi// sgeg pas byang chub sgrub pa'i thabs// de nas bcom ldan 'das dam tshig
193a1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje mnyes par byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ tshogs kyi 'khor lo 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // rang gi lhag

193a3(rgyud 'bum): gnas rnams ni dga' bar bya/ / phyogs bral rnams su lha mo rnams// dam pa'i tshe yis mchod par bya// yid kyis mar khu bsams pa dang // 'bras so chag med 'bras dang ni// 'bru dang
193a4(rgyud 'bum): zho yi zan dang ni/ / til dang de bzhin mnyam pa'i shing // dur ba rab tu gzhon pa nyid// bsam gtan rdo rje sbyin sreg bya// de la 'di ni sngags kyi rkang pa yin te/ oM ag+na ye swA hA/ mar gyi'o//
193a5(rgyud 'bum): oM sarba pA paM da ha na badz+rA ya badz+ra satwa s+ya sarba pA paM da ha nA ya swA hA/ til nag po'i 'o// oM badz+ra puSh+pa ye swA hA/ 'bras ma chag pa'i 'o// oM sarba saM pa de swA hA/ zho dang zan dam pa'i 'o//
193a6(rgyud 'bum): / oM badz+ra bI dzA ya swA hA/ 'bras so ba'i 'o// oM ma hA be gA ya swA hA/ nas kyi'o// oM ma hA ba lA ya swA hA/ mon sran gre'u'i 'o// oM badz+ra g+hasma ri swA hA/ gro'i'o// oM badz+ra A yu She swA hA/ dUr
193a7(rgyud 'bum): ba gzhon nu'i 'o/ / oM badz+ra a pra ti ha ta badz+rA ya swA hA/ ku sha'i'o// oM badz+ra ya dzA ya swA hA/ u dum ba ra'i 'o// oM bo d+hi br-ik+ShA ya swA hA/ byang chub kyi shing gi'o// oM badz+ra la tA ya swA hA/
193b1(rgyud 'bum): pa lak+Sha'i'o// oM badz+ra ku be rA ya swA hA/ n+ya gro d+ha'i 'o// oM ha ma sa ka rA ya swA hA/ a mra'i'o// tsam pa a sho kA ya klu// ka dam pa dang srid sgrub nyid// ji ltar rnyed pa bzlas byas nas// me
193b2(rgyud 'bum): tog 'dis ni sbyin sreg bya/ / rgun 'brum a mra sbrul 'jig dang // kha 'dzag skyes ma brtse ma ni// 'khor lo lnga yi mchog rim pas// 'bras bu rnams kyi sbyin sreg bya// sha lnga dang ni bdud
193b3(rgyud 'bum): rtsi nyid/ / dkyil 'khor lnga yi sgom pa yis// 'dis ni rdo rje mnyes par 'gyur// ye shes me ni rab dgyes bya// rgyal ba phan pa mnyes pa dang // gser gyi mnga' bdag mnyes pa dang //
193b4(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma gar dbang mnyes pa dang // lcags sgrog bdag po mnyes pa dang // tshangs pa brgya byin dbang chen dang // khyab 'jug rlung dang me chen dang // thong ldan nyid dang 'dod lha dang // zla ba nyi ma

193b6(rgyud 'bum): min du ni gnas pa dang / / gang zhig rgyal chen gnas pa dang // gzhan 'phrul dbang sgyur nyid dang ni// 'phrul dga' yi ni lha rnams dang // gang zhig dag pa'i gnas son dang // 'od zer
193b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten khams gnas dang / / mi mjed khams su gnas pa dang // gling bzhir gnas pa'i sems can dang // gang zhig khams gsum gnas pa dang // snod ldan sems can 'jig rten
194a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / / lcug ma'i tshogs dang rtswa sogs dang // gang zhig rab dga'i sar gnas dang // pha rol dri med gang phyin dang // 'od 'phro can du gnas pa dang // mi g.yo'i gnas
194a2(rgyud 'bum): su byas pa dang / / gang zhig chos sprin rjes song dang // gang zhig sbyang dkar son pa dang // gang zhig ring song thob pa dang // 'od byed du ni gnas pa ste// sa bcu'i dbang phyug mgon po dang //
194a3(rgyud 'bum): 'phags pa'i gang zag brgyad po dang // rdzogs sangs rgyas dang nyan thos nyid// ra ni ral gri'i gzugs can dang // rang gi lhag pa'i lha sbyor bdag/ shAkya seng ge mnyes byas nas// dmyal
194a4(rgyud 'bum): ba yi dgas byol song dang / / lha dang lha min mi rnams ni// sbyin sreg cho gas dgyes pa nyid// de nyid tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ro// bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po rgya mtsho rdo rje
194a5(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes su chags pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ dam tshig la gsol
194a6(rgyud 'bum): ba gdab pa gsungs so/ / rdo rje sems dpa' bskyed pa ni// rdo rje pad+ma'i sgom pa ste// de yi mgo bo'i sna rtse la// phyag 'tshal yid bzhin nor bu ste// sbu gu'i nang du phaT kyi ni// ye shes ma
194a7(rgyud 'bum): lhung yang dag gnas/ / rdzogs sangs rgyas kyi dgyes par mdzod// 'di ni phyag rgya'i cho ga las// rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas// rdo rje sems dpar snyems byas nas// gnas ni thams cad
194b1(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub par bya/ / phyag rgya chen po'i gnas 'dug nas// rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor ba dag/ shAkya seng ge snyems byas nas// rgyal po thams cad thob par 'gyur// las kyi phyag rgya'i gnas
194b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dug nas/ / rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor ba dag/ kun gyi rgyal po thob par 'gyur// rdo rje gzi brjid ting 'dzin ldan// dam tshig phyag rgya sbyor ba yis// gnas gsum po yang bsgrub par bya//
194b3(rgyud 'bum): rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas// pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug bdag/ chos kyi phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin gnas// rdo rje chos ni bsgom par bya// rang gi lhag pa'i lhar sbyor bas// rta mchog rim pas
194b4(rgyud 'bum): gnas nas ni/ / dam tshig phyag rgyar sbyor ba yis// sgrol ma'i dngos grub rab bsgrub bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gar gyi 'dod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ rdo rje'i
194b5(rgyud 'bum): gar mdzad pa 'di nyid kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // g.yon pa brkyang ba dang / g.yas brkyang ba dang / mnyam pa'i rkang stabs dang / rdo rje'i rkang stabs dang / dkyil

195a1(rgyud 'bum): tshul dang / dbyig pa'i tshul dang / dbyig to'i tshul dang / gtun shing gi tshul dang / rdo rje rtse gcig pa'i tshul dang / kha bcu pa'i tshul dang / ral gri bu mo'i tshul

195a3(rgyud 'bum): tshul dang / mar me'i tshul dang / dri'i tshul dang / lA s+ye'i lag pa dang / 'phreng ba'i lag pa dang / glu'i lag pa dang / gar gyi lag pa dang / gling bu'i lag pa dang / pi wang gi lag
195a4(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / rdza rnga'i lag pa dang / mu kun da'i lag pa ste/ lag pa'i dgod pa'o// rdo rje skyil krung dang / pad+ma'i skyil krung dang / pad+ma'i 'dug stangs dang / bzang po'i 'dug stangs dang /
195a5(rgyud 'bum): skyil krung phyed pa dang / bkra shis kyi 'dug stangs te/ 'dug stangs kyi dgod pa'o// sgeg pa'i nga ro dang / dpa' ba'i nga ro dang / mi sdug pa'i nga ro dang / dgod pa'i nga ro dang / drag
195a6(rgyud 'bum): po'i nga ro dang / 'jigs su rung ba'i nga ro dang / zhi ba'i nga ro dang / brngam pa'i nga ro dang / snying rje'i nga ro dang / drug gi rjes su skyes pa'i glu dang / drang srong gi rjes kyi glu dang / dri za'i
195a7(rgyud 'bum): rjes kyi glu dang / bar ma'i rjes kyi glu dang / lnga pa'i rjes kyi glu dang / blo gsal gyi rjes kyi glu dang / 'khor nyan pa'i glu'o// nyung ngu'i dbye ba dang / sgrol ma'i dbye ba dang / 'jigs
195b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dbye ba dang / gang ba dang / phyed phyi ba dang / rnam par 'dre ba dang / 'dod chags gnyis mtshungs par byed pa dang / 'dod chags gsum mtshungs par byed pa dang / lkog ma nyed
195b2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / rkan nyed pa dang / lce nyed pa dang / so nyed pa ste/ glu dgod pa'o// sa gzhi yongs gzung dus su ni// dam tshig 'di ni rab bskul ba// ye shes rdo rje can gyis bya// 'di ni
195b3(rgyud 'bum): dam tshig rim pa'i mchog/ me tog 'di rnams bzang zhing dge/ dag pa'i skye gnas las dag pa// bdag gi dad pas 'bul lags kyis// bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod//
195b4(rgyud 'bum): tshal bdag ro yi phan pa dang // gang zhig dri dang bdug spos mchog/ bdag gi dad pas 'bul lags kyis// bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod// srin po 'joms shing dag byed pa// /
195b5(rgyud 'bum): dge zhing mun pa rnam sel ba// bdag gis dad pas 'bul lags kyis// bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod// 'di ni dri bzang dge ba ste// dag pa'i skye gnas las dag par//
195b6(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis dang pas 'bul lags kyis// bzhes nas bdag la dgyes par mdzod// oM badz+ra g+haN+De a/ dril bu blang ba'i sngags so// oM ma hA badz+ra hUM/ rdo rje gzung ba'i sngags so//
195b7(rgyud 'bum): dngos po sna tshogs rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// / de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// rnal 'byor ma yi rdo rje'i gur// sangs rgyas kun dang sangs rgyas la/

196a3(rgyud 'bum): sgrog ma dang lhan cig sbyor/ / sangs rgyas lnga yi thod pa can// zhal gsum nyid du sbyor bar bya// mdog dmar phyag ni bzhi pa dang // zhal gcig ma dang dbang byed ma// rdo rje chos kyi gnas mnan
196a4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / 'di ni ku ru kul+ler brjod// 'di ni sngags ni brjod pa'o// btsun mo chos la gnas pa ni// khyod kyi spyan sngar bdag gis ni// dus gcig pa yi dus su ni// bdag nyid kyis ni 'di thos
196a5(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / rgyas pa nyid du rab tu dbye// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa ste// dus gcig dus ni gcig na'o// bdag gis bcom ldan spyan sngar ni// btsun mo'i chos su rnam rgyas pas// lta stang
196a6(rgyud 'bum): dgug dang brda chen dang / / don byed nus dang char sogs dang // lam gyi de nyid las skyes pa// thub pa chen po 'jig rten mgon// phyag gnyis pa la zhal gcig pa// mchod sbyin dang ni
196a7(rgyud 'bum): pad+mas brgyan/ / pad+ma'i gdan la yang dag gnas// dbu rgyan rdo rje chos dang ldan// mAM gyi de nyid las skyes pa// 'jam pa'i dbyangs ni ser po ste// yan lag mchog sbyin ut+pal
196b1(rgyud 'bum): brgyan/ / mi bskyod rdo rje spyi bor 'dzin// hUM gi ye shes las byung ba// lag pa ral gri sdigs mdzub nyid// ma he chen po'i rgyab tu ni// dpa' bo g.yon brkyang ba yis gnas// khro bo'i gdug
196b2(rgyud 'bum): can 'jigs byed pa/ / kha sbyar mdun du mi bskyod 'dzin// hU~M gi ye shes las byung ba// rdo rje hUM mdzad rdo rje can// rdo rje dril bu'i sbyor ba yis// lag pa gnyis kyis phyag rgya bcings// rkang
196b3(rgyud 'bum): pa g.yon nyid brkyang ba yis/ / 'jigs byed mnan pa yi ni lus// spyi bor rdo rje'i rigs bsams nas// 'jig rten gsum rgyal dran par bya// tAM gyi yi ge las byung ba// mchod sbyin dbang
196b4(rgyud 'bum): mchog mtshon cha ste/ / lha mo ljang ku lta bu nyid// rtag tu bzang po'i 'dug stangs gnas// sna tshogs pad+mar yang dag bzhugs// spyi bor don yod 'dzin pa po// sgeg mo chen mo skal
196b5(rgyud 'bum): bzang ma/ / sgrol ma'i gzugs can bsgom par bya// mAM gyi yi ge las byung ba// mchod sbyin a sho ka 'dzin ma// nyi ma shar ba lta bu ste// rnam snang dpal ni spyi bor skyes// g.yon
196b6(rgyud 'bum): brkyang ba yi sbyor ba yis/ / 'gro mgyogs bdun gyi shing rta mnan// yan lag sgeg pa'i ro yis brgyan// 'od zer can ni bsgom par bya// tsu gyi yi ge las byung ba'i// ston ka'i zla ba
196b7(rgyud 'bum): lta bu'i 'od/ / snying khar rin chen snyim par gnas// mdzes pa'i tshul gyis yang dag bzhugs// lha mo sna tshogs par gdan can// phan pas mgo bo mnan pa ste// byang chub sems
197a1(rgyud 'bum): ni 'dzag 'bab pa'i/ / lha mo stobs dang bral ba bsgom// rbam+b+ha li ga las byung ba// nor 'dzin shin tu la dog ser// lag pa mchod sbyin 'bras skem// rdorje sbrul
197a2(rgyud 'bum): krung sbyor ba las/ / yan lag rin chen 'byung gnas brgyan// spyan ni shin tu sgeg par ni// gnod sbyin rgyal mo bsgom par bya// nor gyi bdag po mtshungs par 'gyur// dza gyi yi ge las
197a3(rgyud 'bum): las byung ba/ / nam mkha' mdzod ces bya ba bsgom// kha dog sor zhing g.yas pa na// mchod sbyin rin chen ne'u le ste// rin chen 'byung gnas rdo rje yis// spyi bor dkyil 'khor rnam par
197a4(rgyud 'bum): brgyan/ / rin chen char ni bsam par bya// sbyor gang rdo rje chur gzhug bya// praM gyi yi ge las skyes pa// lus ni dkar zhing yid 'ong ba// lha mo ral gri'i 'khor lo 'dzin// spyi bor phan
197a5(rgyud 'bum): pas mnan pa'o/ / rang gi mang po'i dus lta bur// dkyil 'khor gnas su yang dag 'dug/ nam mkha'i gnas nas 'jam pa'i dbyangs// 'byung bar rnam par bsam par bya// de nas
197a6(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po sngags sna tshogs nang du chud pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ sngags kyi tshig 'di dag gsal bar mdzad pa/ oM ma Ni pad+me/
197a7(rgyud 'bum): hUM phaT swA hA/ oM maM dzu badz+rA ya muHswA hA/ oM hrISh+Ti wi kr-i tA na na hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ oM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ oM ma ri ts+yai swA hA/ oM tsa le tsu le tsun de swA hA/ oM ba su d+hA ra/

197b2(rgyud 'bum): bzang / / gshin rje gshed kyis yi dgas bsrung // lha dang lha min hUM mdzad kyis// sgrol mas 'jig rten dbang du mdzad// 'od zer can gyis chom rkun 'jig/ tsun+d+ra sems can thams
197b3(rgyud 'bum): cad ni/ / dgug pa yi ni cho gar rjod// dzam+b+ha la dang nor sbyin bdag/ nor gyi sgrub pa'i thabs su 'dod// bud med gang zhig pu shi bas// so sor 'brang ma rtag dran bya// rdo rje mkha' 'gros
197b4(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa'o/ / sngags kyi rkang pas thams cad 'grub// bzlas pa 'bum gyi sbyor ba yis// las rnams thams cad rab tu 'grub// snying gi bde ba bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//

197b7(rgyud 'bum): khrag ni 'dzag pa ste/ / slob dpon la rtag gang sdang dang // gang zhig dkon mchog gsum khro dang // sems can du ma gsod byed pa// nag po chen pos za bar byed// rang gi lag g.yas sha
198a1(rgyud 'bum): gcod byed/ / khrag gi rgyun ni 'thung bar byed// de nas spyi bor de 'dug nas// de ni til tsam gcod par byed// mon sran gre dang 'dzam bu ni// me tog 'dug pa byug

198b1(rgyud 'bum): rol son/ / rdo rje pad+ma mchod bya zhing // pad+ma'i 'dod pa spang bar bya// bdag nyid rang bdag bsams nas ni// rdo rje pad+ma rab sbyor bas// rdo rje bu mo cher grags pa// rdo rje nag po lta bu mchog/

199a1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / 'di ni phyag rgya chen por brjod// mi yi phyag rgya blangs nas ni// de la 'khor lo rab tu dbye// dri dang me tog mthun byas nas// 'khor lo goms par yang dag
199a2(rgyud 'bum): brtsam/ / spun dang bdag ma sgrol ma dang // dkar mo shin tu yid 'phrog ma// me tog dri yis 'thun byas nas// rdo rje mchod pa yang dag brtsam// sngags pas phan pa 'grub 'gyur zhing //
199a3(rgyud 'bum): phyag na rdo rje 'grub pa dang // rdo rje nyi ma 'grub pa dang // dam pa'i yi ge 'grub pa dang // bdun pa'i rgyal po 'grub pa dang // thams cad 'dren pa 'grub par 'gyur// chu yi dbang ni dang

199a5(rgyud 'bum): bum pa'i dbang gis te/ / gsang ba'i dbang gis brgyad pa'o// shes rab dbang las dgu pa ste// de nyid rdo rje'i sbyor ba yis// kun gyi de nyid brtul zhugs brjod// ston pa rang gis lung
199a6(rgyud 'bum): bstan te/ / de 'dir dbang gi cho ga'o// slob dpon smad par mi bya ste// bde gshegs bka' las 'da' mi bya// spun la smad pa nyid mi bya// sems can rnams la gdug byams dang //
199a7(rgyud 'bum): skal med de nyid gtam mi bya// skal ldan sems can smad mi bya// bdag gi lus la nges mi smad// chos nyid tshang ni gzung mi bya// gzhan gyi chos la smad mi bya// bud med nyid la'ang
