199b3(rgyud 'bum): / po che la gtor ma sbyin// phyag rgya bcing ba rnam spang zhing // mchod rten las ni mi bya ste// rdo rje gsum mchog phyag mi bya// dkyil 'khor la sogs lus kyi las// rmi lam du yang mi bya zhing //
199b4(rgyud 'bum): / slob dpon gzhan la phyag mi bya// bla ma'i rgan rabs phyag 'tshal lo// rtag par rgyun du sngags bzla zhing // bsam gtan nyid kyang 'bral mi bya// rtag tu slob ma bsdu bya zhing // rtag pa ru ni
199b5(rgyud 'bum): bshad par gyis/ / rtag tu sems can bskyang bar bya// rtag tu sangs rgyas cher mnyes bya// dzam+b+ha la la chu sbyin zhing // las rnams thams cad yang dag spyad// bye ma'i mchod rten las la
199b6(rgyud 'bum): yang / / mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du bya// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / pho nya mo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje nges par brjod pa 'di
199b7(rgyud 'bum): thos nas tshig 'di dag gsungs pa/ sems can kun gyi thams cad khyod// sdig pa thams cad rnam sbyong ba// chos rnams thams cad yongs su rtogs// rdo rje mkha' 'gro phyag 'tshal bstod//
200a1(rgyud 'bum): sdang bas mnan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas// gti mug thams cad zad bya'i phyir// rgyal ba mgon po rnam snang mdzad// gti mug rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// 'gro ba bud
200a2(rgyud 'bum): med 'dul gzigs nas/ / bdag med rnal 'byor mar gyur gang // phyag 'tshal pha rol phyin thub la// sgyu ma'i phyag rgya phyag 'tshal bstod// gti mug mnan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas// gti
200a3(rgyud 'bum): mug thams cad zad mdzad pa/ / rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// zhe sdang rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// nga rgyal mnan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas// nga rgyal thams cad zad mdzad pa'i// rdo rje'i ma rgyal
200a4(rgyud 'bum): po che/ / 'dod chags rdo rje phyag 'tshal bstod// chags pas mnan pa'i 'gro gzigs nas// 'dod chags thams cad zad mdzad pa// rta mgrin rgyal po chen po ste// ser sna rdo rje phyag 'tshal
200a5(rgyud 'bum): bstod/ / 'gro ba phrag dog mnan gzigs nas// phrag dog thams cad zad mdzad pa// bdun gyi rgyal po rgyal po che// thams cad gzigs la phyag 'tshal bstod// de nas bcom ldan 'das byang
200a6(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dpal kye'i rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i slob dpon ji ltar blta bar
200a7(rgyud 'bum): bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa// slob dpon ston par gyur pa ni// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag mdzad pa// bdag cag rnams kyi pha dang ma// 'di nyid yid la bsam par bya//
200b1(rgyud 'bum): de ci'i slad du zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pas bka' stsal pa// rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas dang // rdo rje chos dang gzi brjid dang // bdun gyi rgyal po'i dngos grub rnams// gang phyir de yis
200b2(rgyud 'bum): dka' ba med/ / mig sman dang ni rkang byug dang // ral gri rkang 'og sgrub pa dang // ril bu dang ni mkha' spyod dang // mi snang ba dang bcud kyis len// gang phyir ye shes rdo rje dang // mnyes pas
200b3(rgyud 'bum): myur du thob par 'gyur/ / de phyir slob dpon drung gshegs te// de bzhin gshegs rnams phyag mdzad do// rdo rje sems dpa' ji lta ba// de ltar slob dpon gzugs 'dzin te// sems can rjes
200b4(rgyud 'bum): su gzung dmigs nas/ / phal pa'i gzugs su gnas pa'o// slob dpon gyis ni mthar dus su// shi ba 'jig rten mi gnas pa// skyes pa glen zhing rmongs pa gang // de 'di shi shes smra
200b5(rgyud 'bum): bar brjod/ / 'chi ba zhes bya'i rnam rtog gis// dag pa'i gnas su khyer bar byed// yang na bde ba can du nges// 'dod pa'i rigs su 'gro bar 'gyur// me tog sna tshogs lag thogs shing //
200b6(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs rgyal mtshan byug pa dang // glu yi mchod pa sna tshogs kyis// sangs rgyas sras dang rdo rjer bcas// sna tshogs sgra dang sil snyan che// bkra shis tshigs bcad sna tshogs dang /
200b7(rgyud 'bum): dbang gi gnas rnams nyid kyis ni// lus las lus gzhan 'gro bar 'gyur// rdo rje dril bu lag byin te// mgo bo'i gtsug tor mnan nas ni// rdo rje'i sdom pa byin nas su// bum pa'i
201a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang ni bskur nas ni/ / mig la sogs par gti mug sogs// rdo rje gsum ni gnas gsum dgod// rdo rje thab khung rab sbyor bas// sbyang bar yang dag bstan pa'o// nyi ma
201a2(rgyud 'bum): ngag ni gsum la ni/ / rus pa'i 'phreng ba bsdu bar bya// 'o ma dri bzang bsang gtor nas// de yi mchod rten yang dag brtsam// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas// thams
201a3(rgyud 'bum): cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par dga' 'o// 'phags
201a4(rgyud 'bum): pa mkha' 'gro ma'i dra ba'i rdo rje gur rgyud kyi rgyal po'i brtag pa'o/ / rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po ga ya d+ha ra dang / lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur ba'o//
201a5(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ shrI ma hA mu drA ti la kaM nA ma ma hA yo gI ni tan+ta rA dza a b+hi rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le zhes bya
201a6(rgyud 'bum): ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i mnga' ba dag/ dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan mkha' 'gro ye shes nyid// gsang pad snying po'i kha 'byed pa//
201a7(rgyud 'bum): gsang par lte ba'i nang na bzhugs// bdag gi zhu ba khyod gson cig/ ye shes rgya mtsho'i kye rdo rje// 'bum lnga yi ni bdag nyid rgyud// gang zhig khyod kyis de nyid gsungs// sbyor drug rnal
201b1(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma yi gzhung / / thams cad mkhyen pa dbang phyug mchog/ de ni dpa' bo bdag gis shes// don dam pa ni ji lta bu// de ru bdag ni the tshom skyes// char yang thig le tshul dang ni// tshul
201b2(rgyud 'bum): tsam mchog gi mchog gzhan yin/ / sbyor ba drug gis rnam par shes// de yi gnas ni nang na yod// srog ni gang nas 'byung ba yin// rdo rje 'dzin pa gang du brlag/ rdor sems mtshan mo gang
201b3(rgyud 'bum): nyid ci/ / mtshams gang shar ba gang zhig lags// gang na nub pa'i dus dang rtsa// mchog gi dbang phyug du tsam mchis// dus kyi mtshan nyid gang lags gsungs// de yi dus kyis don ci byed// /
201b4(rgyud 'bum): A li kA li bya ba gang // mnga' bdag gang nas 'byung ba lags// ro yi bye brag du zhig bstan// dga' ba yang ni de bzhin no// gang gi dus kyi dga' ba rnams// rdo rje dbang phyug 'byung ba
201b5(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / chos kyi dbyings ni ji ltar bshad// rdo rje yang ni ji ltar bstan// bdag gi sgra ni ji ltar gsungs// gsang ba zhes bgyi ji ltar lags// mchog ces bgyi ba ji ltar bshad//
201b6(rgyud 'bum): dgyes pa'i don ni gsol bar mdzod// rigs kyi bye brag du tsam bstan// phung po la sogs skye mched ci// tshangs dang khyab 'jug drag po dang // dbang phyug rtag tu zhi ba dang // gang nas
201b7(rgyud 'bum): skyes shing gang du gnas/ / chen po'i chen po de ji ltar// phyag rgya'i bye brag du zhig bshad// phyag rgya chen po ji ltar lags// mgon po mchod pa'i bye brag ci// de ru me tog ji ltar yin//
202a1(rgyud 'bum): mgon po chen po mchod sbyin ni// ji lta bu zhig 'tshal ba lags// mchog gi dngos po'i dkyil 'khor ni// bcom ldan 'das de ji lta bu// de ru lha mo ci 'dra ba// lha mo
202a2(rgyud 'bum): ba gang lags gsungs/ / bcom ldan dur khrod du zhig mchis// de ru shing ni ji ltar bshad// dur khrod dang ni shing rnams ni// rgyal ba'i dbang phyug de gnas gsungs// mgon po nang gi sbyin
202a3(rgyud 'bum): sreg dang / / bdud rtsi lnga yi cho ga dang // rnal 'byor ma yi 'du shes dang // de ru skad ni ji lta bu// bdag nyid kyi ni rang ngo bo// mgon po chen po khyod kyis gsungs// dpal phyag rgya chen po thig
202a4(rgyud 'bum): le las rgyud thams cad kyi rgyu zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o/ / / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dris pa yang dag gting dpag dka'// snying po yi ni snying po mchog
202a5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen po/ / mchog las mchog gi yang dag mchog/ lha chen po ni la sogs pa// bzang mo de ru byol song yin// don dam de ni khyod gcig pu// zhal bzang mo yi snod yin
202a6(rgyud 'bum): no/ / gsang ba'i gsang ba yang dag rab// nyon cig yang dag bdag gis bshad// dang po re zhig slob ma la// dbang rnams lan cig bskur ba yis// de tshe gsang chen bshad pa yi// nges par
202a7(rgyud 'bum): snod du gyur pa'o/ / dbang med na ni dngos grub med// bye ma btsir yang mar med ltar// gang zhig rgyud lung nga rgyal gyis// dbang bskur med la gsal byed pa// slob dpon slob ma shi ma thag/ dngos
202b1(rgyud 'bum): grub thob kyang dmyal bar 'gro/ / de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis// bla ma la ni dbang don zhu// dbang bskur yod dang de nyid shes// ye shes shes dang thugs rje che// yang dag rlabs che dpa' bo dang //
202b2(rgyud 'bum): ser sna med dang rang bzhin bzang // skal ldan mtshan nyid thams cad rdzogs// phrag dog yul ni rnam par spangs// rtag tu dga' ba'i yid ldan pa// 'dod chags chen po gcig pu'i yid// sdom pa/
202b3(rgyud 'bum): de ni shes pa na// bla ma de lta bu la bya// de lta bu yi bla ma yis// 'bad pas slob ma brtag par bya// ji ltar bsregs la sog pas gser// ji ltar mkhas pas rin po che// ji ltar bde ldan bu mo ni//
202b4(rgyud 'bum): de ltar slob ma brtag par bya// de bas thams cad rab 'bad de// phan tshun so sor brtag par bya// de ltar min na skyon du 'gyur// nam yang dngos grub thob mi 'gyur// ji ltar dug la rab sngags
202b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ / dag pa byas nas bdud rtsir 'gyur// de bzhin slob ma dbang sogs kyis// lus ni dri ma med par 'gyur// gang zhig dbang bskur sbyin byed pa// de ni rdor sems lta bur blta// bla ma sprul
202b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyal lta bur blta/ / dpal ni bla ma me 'drar blta// bla ma ston pa bas lhag blta// yid bzhin rin chen mnyam par blta// ji ltar rab sbyor dang sngags kyis// sbrul gyi rgyal po'i spyi bo las//
202b7(rgyud 'bum): tshad med pa yi rin chen rnyed// dbul ba thams cad med par byed// rab sbyor log dang sngags log gis// dga' mo nges par tshig par byed// de lta bu yi cho ga yi// khrims la sogs pa'i
203a1(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa yis/ / dpa' zhal de nyid rin dbang phyug/ tshe 'di nyid kyis rnyed par gyur// de ltar min te mgus na// gsung gi me yis nges tshig byed// ji ltar me yis shing
203a2(rgyud 'bum): tshig pa/ / skad cig gis ni thal bar byed// gal te de bzhin dpal bla ma// mnyes na skad cig gis sdig tshig/ rgyud 'di la ni mchog gi ni// bcom ldan dbang bskur du zhig mchis// bcom ldan
203a3(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ / dbang bskur bzhi yi rim pa la// 'bras bu yis ni gsum du bstan// dang por slob dpon dbang gcig ste// gnyis pa gsang ba'i dbang mchog go/ gsum pa
203a4(rgyud 'bum): shes rab ye shes dbang / / de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa'o// slob dpon dbang la bcu gcig dbye// gsang ba'i dbang dang bcu gnyis mchog/ shes rab ye shes bcu gsum pa// de ltar de bzhin
203a5(rgyud 'bum): bcu bzhi'o/ / dbang re la ni sa re ste// de rnams sa yi dbang phyug bdag/ rgyu rtsa gsum gyis shes par bya// de yi 'bras bu bzhi pa'o// yang na 'bras bu gsum dang bral// yang na bdag nyid
203a6(rgyud 'bum): gsum po yin/ / dga' ba'i bye brag shes par bya// 'khor lo rnams kyi rim pas so// yar ngo yi ni gsum pa'i tshe// slob ma la ni dbang bskur bya// bzhin bzang mig gi dkyus ring ba/
203a7(rgyud 'bum): gzugs bzang lang chos brgyan pa yi// bcu gnyis yang na bcu drug gam// ma rnyed nyi shu lon pa'ang rung // nyi shu yan chad phyag rgya gzhan// des ni dngos grub thag ring byed// sring mo
203b1(rgyud 'bum): yang na bu mo 'am/ / chung ma bla ma la dbul bya// de nas sna tshogs rdzas kyis ni// bla ma dad pas mchod par bya// sna tshogs ras ni brgya sogs dang // rin chen sna tshogs rgyal mtshan mchog/
203b2(rgyud 'bum): mu tig 'phreng ba rin thang med// grangs med gser gyis mchod bya'o// de ring phan chad bdag ni 'bangs// chen po'i chen po mchod pa bzhes// de lta bu yi cho ga yis// 'bad de bla ma
203b3(rgyud 'bum): mchod par bya/ / bla ma'i gzugs ni bdag rang yin// bdag mchod byas na dngos grub 'thob// de yis skad cig phyag rgya che// mchod pa byas nas bsnyen par bya// bsnyen pa las ni gang
203b4(rgyud 'bum): zhig 'byung / / slob ma'i kha ru dbab par bya// sbom po mtha' ltag sbyar ba yis// longs spyod nang du gzhug par bya// de tshe yang dag ye shes skye// bu mo'i bde ba ji lta bu// srog dang rtsol ba
203b5(rgyud 'bum): mnyam byas nas/ / shin tu legs dgyes kyis mchod bya// rin chen kha la hUM phaT sngags// bkod nas mnga' la bskyon par bya// de yi dus su dga' skad cig/ ji ltar rang bzhin skye bar
203b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / de ltar phyag rgya la bshad bya// 'di ni dga' ba'i mtshan nyid do// de nas slob ma'i lag tu ni// byin nas 'di skad smra bar bya// nga yi bka' lung rtog med pas// pad+mo'i don la ji
203b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gyis/ / pad+mo'i snying po'i dbus na ni// rdor dbyings dbang phyug ma ni bzhugs// de ma rnyed pa'i bar du ni// thabs gzhan la ni byang chub med// de ni rang bzhin dga' ba'i gzugs//
204a1(rgyud 'bum): phra mo'i phra mo yang dag mchod// dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las slob dpon slob ma brtag pa dang / yon dbul ba dang / dbang bskur ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste
204a2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa'o/ / // de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba// mchog dang rab mchog mchog gi mchog/ phung po lnga yi bdag nyid sku// legs dgyes dbang po 'khor lo drug
204a3(rgyud 'bum): zla phyed byad gzugs char yang ni/ / rlung gi 'khor lo'i nang na bzhugs// phyed min gang ba yang ma yin// chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong // sgyu 'phrul chen po 'gro ba'i ma// char yang grangs
204a4(rgyud 'bum): med rten pa yin/ / de ni mchog dang gzhan mchog phra// skye med gnyis med bsam du med// rlung gi 'khor lo skyed byed ma// sangs rgyas kyis kyang rnyed dka' ba'o// me yi 'khor lo'i/
204a5(rgyud 'bum): nang na ni// thig le gcig pa yi ge med// thams cad nang yod yig kun yin// thams cad khyab dang bde ba 'byung // bde ba 'phel bar byed pa'o// dbyangs dang dpe byad dang bral lo//
204a6(rgyud 'bum): grangs med pa yi khams gsum ni// rgyu dang skye bar byed pa'o// tshul ni glo bur ba yi gnas// rnam pa thams cad dang bral ba// dngos po sbrul lce 'dra ba yin// mtho ris sa ni skyed
204a7(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'o/ / yi ge ma yin khams kyang med// zla tshes thig le rgyan dang bral// skye med grangs med mi zad pa// de ni don dam tshul yin no// sprul pa yi ni 'khor lo'i gnas// lte ba'i snyoms
204b1(rgyud 'bum): pa zhes su grags/ / chos kyi 'khor lo'i tshul tsam ni// dri ma med pa'i sbrul mi 'dra// dri med ma bcos pa yi gnas// gnas med rnam pa med pa'o// g.yo ba med dang brjod du med
204b2(rgyud 'bum): dbugs kyi rgyu ba med pa'o/ / mchog gi ye shes tshul tsam ni// bcu gsum dbang phyug gis ma shes// mchog gi longs spyod 'khor lor gnas// mchog gi rnam pa bdud rtsi mchog/ theg
204b3(rgyud 'bum): mchog mchog gi mtha' na yod/ / ji ltar chang gi mthu bzhin no// thams cad bdag nyid byang gzugs bral// gzugs mer bdag nyid kyis bzhugs so// gzhan mchog bde chen 'khor lo
204b4(rgyud 'bum): la/ thams cad mtha' yi mtha' na bzhugs// lta bar byed dang blta bya med// mtshan ngan thams cad med pa'o// brjod med mi zad zhi ba ste// rang dga' nyams myong rnam pa'o// bla ma
204b5(rgyud 'bum): yi ni bka' drin gyis/ / legs dgyes dbang mo rnyed par 'gyur// de lta bu yi ye shes che// rnam par shes drug rang bzhin can// 'khor lo drug gi dbus su ni// don dam par ni bshad pa'o//
204b6(rgyud 'bum): steng dang 'og gi sbyor ba yis// kha sbyar byad gzugs kyis ni yod// bcu gnyis phyed dang drug gi phyed// drug cu rtsa bzhi de bzhin brgyad// brgyad gnyis dang ni brgyad bzhi ni// 'di ni 'khor
204b7(rgyud 'bum): lo chu skyes drug/ dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las sbyor ba drug gi mtshan nyid dang / 'khor lo drug rang gi ngo bo zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / nyon cig lnga
205a1(rgyud 'bum): mo skal chen mo/ / rtsa yi 'khor lo 'byung ba mchog/ stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis te// rtsa rnams kyi ni rigs bshad do// rigs chen po yi rgyud chen por// rgyas par
205a2(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis gsal bar byas/ / 'di ru 'khor lo drug gi grangs// mdor bsdus pa ni bshad par bya// rlung gi 'khor lo'i rtsa drug ni// g.yo ba nam mkha' me dang sbubs// rab bskor dang ni
205a3(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs chen po/ / rtsa de rlung gi 'khor lo'i gnas// 'dzin ma dang ni ro ma dang // rtog med ma ni gru gsum gnas// me yi 'khor lo'i nang du ni// rtsa yi dbang mo lngar shes bya// mgyogs ma
205a4(rgyud 'bum): dang ni yang dag mgyogs/ / shin tu bzang dang bzang 'gro dang // stobs chen ma dang 'jigs chen ma// nga rgyal che dang 'jigs byed che// mthus myur ma dang mthu yi cha// mthu yi chu dang mthu dri
205a5(rgyud 'bum): dang / / mthu ma dang ni mthus 'bab ma// rtsub dang nur dang mthu du ma// rngam pa za ba nam mkhar 'gro// bya yi yan lag bya 'gro ma// phyug mo 'jigs ma nga ro dang // brtul ma mchod ma myos
205a6(rgyud 'bum): ma dang / / sgra ma sgra 'byung sdig can ma// pad+ma'i sdong bu ma sngon mo// zil pa zil 'byung sgra ma dang // phyin phyogs kha dang dbyig pa dang // dbyig pa'i nga rgyal dang po ma// tshe'u lto ma dang
205a7(rgyud 'bum): tshe'u drug ma/ / tshe'u bdud ma dang brtson 'grus ma// tshe'u khyim ma dang tshe'u kham// tshe'u 'od ma dang tshe'u lug ma// 'bud ma bdag ma 'od ma dang // dri med dang ni dri sreg dang // thag lnga
205b1(rgyud 'bum): ma dang thag dga' ma/ / thag mo dang ni thag dus ma// phug ron phum skyes phra ma dang // lo ma dang ni tsher lo dang // gos gyon ma dang gsal byed ma// rtsa 'di brgyad po brgyad du dran// drug
205b2(rgyud 'bum): cu rtsa bzhi chu skyes ni/ / lte ba'i sprul pa'i 'khor lor gnas// rin chen ma dang pad chen mo// gshes chen ma dang stobs chen ma// mgo chen ma dang myos chen ma// dga' chen ma dang mi
205b3(rgyud 'bum): dga' che/ / de brgyad chos 'khor 'dam skyes ni// zhal bzang snying kha'i rgya mtshor ro// chags ma longs spyod longs spyod min// nyi 'od 'od ma b+ha ga dang // lu ma dang ni thil gdong ma//
205b4(rgyud 'bum): bza' ster rang za ltogs ma dang // ra sa ya na ro sgyur ma// ro 'dzag dang ni ro ma dang // skur ma longs spyod 'khor lo'i gnas// brgyad gnyis 'dam skyes 'dab ma ni// mgrin pa yi ni rim
205b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rigs/ / 'dod ma 'dod spyod tshe'u lus ma// zla 'thung zla lho mdzod ma dang // skad snyam lkugs ma du rab ma// ce spyang brgya ma skams pa ma// me ma rngon ma zla ba ma// gang ba gnyid ma
205b6(rgyud 'bum): gnyid skyes ma/ / chang 'tshong chang ster bdud rtsi ma// dung ma dang ni dung rnam// dung mig ma dang dung snu ma// mthus phyug ma dang mthu ser ma// mthu rmongs ma dang mthu rngam ma// 'gyings ma dang
205b7(rgyud 'bum): ni ri rten ma/ / sum cu rtsa gnyis thod pa'i gnas// bde chen 'khor lo'i rgyal po 'di// des ni 'khor lo rnams la khyab// thams cad phra mo reg bya med// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par
206a1(rgyud 'bum): spangs/ / bde chen bde ba'i rnam pa can// bde chen la sogs sbyin par byed// de yi rtsa ba'i 'byung ba mi// yang dag thar 'dod pas shes bya// lha mo rtsa 'byung med p
206a2(rgyud 'bum): hung po'i 'byung ba ji ltar 'gyur/ / phung po med na ye shes che// rnal 'byor rnams kyis ji ltar rnyed// phung po lnga ni bdag nyid sku// mkha' 'gro lngar ni rab tu grags// mkha' 'gro lnga ri ye
206a3(rgyud 'bum): shes lnga/ / 'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin can// rtsa nyid 'byung ba med gyur na// phung po rnams ni 'byung ba med// phung po med na dngos grub ni// rnal 'byor chen pos rnyed mi 'gyur// de ba
206a4(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad kyis/ / rtsa yi 'khor lo btsal bar bya// ji ltar sprin gyi char gyis ni// rtag par de ni che bar 'phel// 'bras bu mang zhing mtha' yas ni// the tsom med par sbyin par byed//
206a5(rgyud 'bum): ltar phung po'i shing zhes bya// rtsa yis chu yi che bar 'phel// cher gyur 'bras bu thar pa ni// the tsom med par sbyin par byed// lha mo'i dngos po gzugs su ni// rtsa yi byad gzugs yin
206a6(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / reg khams rgyal mtshan sbyor ba yis// me 'khor nang du chu skyes ni// gang tshe rdo rjes skyod par byed// de tshe me ni khong du chud// 'khor lo chu skyes thams cad ni// je gsal je
206a7(rgyud 'bum): gsal kha dbyer 'gyur/ / de nas rtsa kun 'dzag 'gyur te// snod 'dzag pa yi chu thigs bzhin// de nas sprul pa'i 'khor lor ni// 'dus nas gcig tu gyur pa'o// rtsa gnyis la yi
206b1(rgyud 'bum): rtse mo las/ / zla ba dang ni nyi ma 'dzag/ mngal gyi dbus na rtsa gnas pa// thag pa'i rnam pa'i gzugs su yod// de ni gcig pu rgyu zhes bya// 'bras bu'i bye brag gnyis su 'gyur// g.yos
206b2(rgyud 'bum): nas khu ba 'byung ba dang / / g.yas nas khrag ni 'byung ba'o// gang tshe g.yas phyogs nyi ma ni// de tshe bde ba dmar por 'gyur// g.yon nas zla ba 'byung ba'i phyir// de ni bde ba dkar por
206b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / de gnyis nang na me gnas pa// sgong skyes gnyid log ji bzhin no// sngon gyi las rlung rnam shes ni// gang tshe 'khor bar gyur pa ni// de yi tshe na b+ha ga'i nang // 'dod chags chen
206b4(rgyud 'bum): pos yid 'gyur ro/ / gang tshe ma yi zla mtshan 'byung // me dang nyi ma gsal bar 'byung // de tshe 'dod chags chen po'i yid// reg bya 'dun pa mchog tu 'gyur// bo la kak+ko la
206b5(rgyud 'bum): zhugs nas/ / ji ltar chu la chu bzhag bzhin// de tshe sa bon 'byung ba yin// sa bon las ni gong bu 'byung // lha mo de las rtsa rnams 'byung // 'bras bu nges par 'byung ba'o//
206b6(rgyud 'bum): dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig laM las 'khor lo drug gi rtsa 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / srog ni 'byung bar thim pa'i tshul// nyon cig lha mo bdag
206b7(rgyud 'bum): gis bshad/ / ma skyes pa yi char yang ni// gsang ba'i mngal gyi nang du bzhugs// de ni rnam shes med pa dang // bdag nyid med pa'i ye shes sku// de yi gnas nas srog 'byung ste/
207a1(rgyud 'bum): srog can rnams kyi srog ni mchog/ rtag tu bdag nyid srog chen po// gnas lnga'i gnas na bzhugs pa'o// nam mkha' lnga zhes bya bar grags// nam mkha' lnga
207a2(rgyud 'bum): yi nang du thim/ / 'byung ba chen po bzhi po ni// srog gi rten du shes par bya// yang na srog ni de rnams rten// legs dgyes dbang mo shes par 'gyur// rnam shes las ni rlung skye'o//
207a3(rgyud 'bum): de las me ni skye bar 'gyur// de las chu ni skye 'gyur te// de las sa ni skye ba'o// de rnams kun las phung po 'byung // de nas skye mched 'byung bar 'gyur// de nas ye shes rang bzhin skye//
207a4(rgyud 'bum): brgya rtsa brgyad kyi rim pas so// rdo rje 'phreng ba'i rgyud chen las// sngar ni bdag gis bstan pa'o// mtshan mo gang yin nyin gang yin// mtshan mo bdag gis bshad par bya// mtshan mo
207a5(rgyud 'bum): shes rab tu ni grags/ / shes rab mtshan mo yin par 'gyur// mtshan mo'i rnam pa zla bar 'gyur// zla ba mya ngan 'das rang bzhin// kun rdzob dang ni don dam par// shes rab gnyis
207a6(rgyud 'bum): kyis shes par bya/ / kun rdzob reg byar shes par bya// gang zhig reg bya med par bde// blta bar dka' ba'i mtshan nyid do// rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin can// de ni bdag gis
207a7(rgyud 'bum): mtshan mor bshad/ / nyin mo thabs su grags pa ste// thabs ni nyi ma yin par 'gyur// b+ha ga'i 'byung ba nyi ma yin// nyi ma b+ha ga'i bdag por 'gyur// srid pa'i rnam pa nyi ma yin/
207b1(rgyud 'bum): zla ba mya ngan 'das pa'i gzugs// srid pa de ni rigs zhes bstan// nyi las 'byung ba zla ba'i rigs// dri ma med phyir nyi ma ste// rtog pa'i dra ba med pa'o// dri ma med pa mchog phrag/ shin
207b2(rgyud 'bum): tu gsal ba stong sku'o/ / yang dag dri med gnas zhi ba// thams cad kun na bzhugs pa'o// rgyud rnams kun tu sbas pa yi// de lha'i nyin mo bdag gis bshad// mtshams ni gnyis ka phrad pa
207b3(rgyud 'bum): ste/ / rdo rje pad+ma nyi zla 'byung // lte ba gnyis ka phrad pa ni// phra ltar skad cig mtshan nyid do// nyon mongs las grol mtshams yin te// rnam pa med pa mchog gi mchog/ sbyor gnyis dbus na
207b4(rgyud 'bum): yod pa ste/ / byug pa dang ni sred pa med// de mtshams sems can thams cad kyi// 'khor ba'i lam rab dag par byed// shar ni mchog tu grags pa ste// dga' bral la sogs dang bral ba// /
207b5(rgyud 'bum): mdud pa'i rtse mo mchog gi gnas// tsa na ka yi rus rnams gzugs// shar ni zla ba'i bdag por shes// zla ba gyen du 'gro ba'i phyir// zla ba thig le mnyam par grags// thig le bzhir
207b6(rgyud 'bum): gyegyis bstan pa'o/ / thog ma tha ma'i dbus gnas na// bzhi pa gang na'ang med pa'o// rang gi rig pa'i bdag nyid phyir// de bas brjod du med pa'o// de ni gsang bar bstan pa ste// shar ba'i
207b7(rgyud 'bum): don ni 'dus pa'o/ / nyon cig lha mo bde sbyin ma// nub pa'i yang dag bdag gis bstan// gang tshe sems ni nub pa na// sngar ni zla ba'i rnam par 'gyur// de tshe nub pa'i gnas su 'gro// mi 'gro/
208a1(rgyud 'bum): ba ni 'gro bar 'gyur// gang tshe thog ma tha mar nyagre// de tshe nub par bstan pa'o// tha ma nub par bstan pa ni// brten pa'i gnas la rten med gnas// bstan pa yis na
208a2(rgyud 'bum): mchog bde la/ / bstan med bde ba pa la yod// dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las srog dang / mtshan mo dang / nyin mo dang / mtshams dang / shar ba dang / nub pa bstan pa zhes bya
208a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o/ / / rtsa yi 'byung ba thog mar bstan// dus ni nyon cig bdag gis bshad// dus ni tshed ces bstan pa ste// dus la bye brag gnyis su dbye// dus
208a4(rgyud 'bum): ni bsam du mer pa dang / / shin tu'i dus ni dus yin no// shin tu dus dang ngan dus dang // snga yi 'phar ma bu ga gnyis// 'ong ba de ni bzang dus bstan// bzang ba min dus chad ces bya// bzang ngo //
208a5(rgyud 'bum): de ni mchog tu dran// gnyis ka dang bral de kho nyid// de ni sngar meng 'di ru dus// lta ba med dang blta ru med// mtshan ngan thams cad dang bral lo// de lta'i dus ni bdag gis bshad// zhal
208a6(rgyud 'bum): bzang yang dag bshad pa yin/ / de yi dus su gzhan du yid// rnal 'byor pa de mi bgyid na// dam tshil dbang mo bad ka ji ltar// gzhan min rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur// A li kA li gang las
208a7(rgyud 'bum): 'byung / / nyon cig de ni bdag gi bshad// yang dag dri med gnas nas 'byung // snang ba mched pa'i gzugs can no// dpe byang sum cu gsum dang ldan// kA li'i dkyil 'khor shin tu
208b1(rgyud 'bum): gsal/ / snang ba mched pa'i gnas nas te// snang ba de ni gsal bar 'byung // dbyangs kyi yi ge bcu drug ldan// rgyas pa A li'i dkyil 'khor ro// de gnyis mnyam par sbyor ba yis//
208b2(rgyud 'bum): ngal bus ro chen skye bar 'gyur// mchog gi bdud rtsi rnam pa ni// bde ba chen po'i bde ba'i gnas// rig ma'i sna rtse'i gnas na bzhugs// chu skyes 'khor lo drug gsal byed// de yi reg bya
208b3(rgyud 'bum): bde sbyin pa/ / ro chen brgyad ni shes par bya// 'dar dang rdul dang ba spu langs// skad 'gag pa dang mdog gsal dang // kha dog 'gyur zhing mtsho ma myos// de ni snying po'i ro brgyad do// ro yis
208b4(rgyud 'bum): dgug byas dga' ba rnams/ / shin tu bzang po skye bar 'gyur// dga' dang mchog gi dga' ba dang // dga' bral lhan skyes de bzhin no// dga' ba zhes bya snang ba yin// mchog dga' snang ba
208b5(rgyud 'bum): mchod par bstan/ / dpa' bral snang ba thob ces bya// lhan skyes de ni yang dag 'od// de yi dus na skad cig skye// sna tshigs la sogs mtshan nyid do// snang ba zla ba zhes su bstan// snang ba
208b6(rgyud 'bum): mched ba nyi ma'o/ / mtshams ni snang ba thob par grags// gsum dang bral ba yang dag 'ong // gang tshe mdud pa'i nang du sems// de tshe dga' ba 'byung bar 'gyur// mdud pa'i mtshams nas
208b7(rgyud 'bum): nas gsum tsam/ / mchog gi dga' ba 'byung bar 'gyur// gsum gyi gnas nas gsum du 'gro// dga' bral 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o// gang zhig gsum dang gsum spangs pa// de lon
209a1(rgyud 'bum): nyid rang bzhin par/ / de ni gsang ba chen po'i mchog/ gsang ba'i gsang ba yang dag mchog/ 'dus pa la sogs rgyud rnams su// legs dgyes dbang mo sbas pa/
209a2(rgyud 'bum): bya/ sdom pa 'am ni kye rdo rje// der yang gsal bar ma byas so// khyed kyi ngor mdzad mchog de ni// gsang chen bdag gis gsal bar byas// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang /
209a3(rgyud 'bum): gzhan ma shi med kun nyon mongs// de lta'i mchog gi de kho na// bdag min na ni de mi shes// gzhan yang ches kyi dbyings grags pa// de nyid nyon cig bdag gis bshad// nam mkha' chos
209a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbyings yin te/ / dbyings ni sa bon zhes su dran// chos rnams kun gyi nang na yod// rgyu dang mchog gi gnas yin no// ji ltar til la mar yod dang // ji ltar shing la me yod pa//
209a5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin chos rnams kun la yang // chos kyi dbyings kyis khyab par ni// yod na yang ni mthong mi 'gyur// chos kyi dbyings ni b+ha gar grags// b+ha ga rin chen snod yin no// dbang phyug la
209a6(rgyud 'bum): sogs yon tan ldan/ / de ni b+ha gar kun tu grags// chos ni b+ha ga zhes byar bstan// dbyings ni sems su shes par dran// khams gsum gyi ni mtha' yas la// sems ni de yi rgyu yin no
209a7(rgyud 'bum): kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs su ni/ / chu zla lta bur mthong bar 'gyur// don dam de ni mthong ba med// mthong med ma yin dngos med min// rang rig pa ni mchog zhi ba// dngos dang dngos ra
209b1(rgyud 'bum): dang bral ba/ / de ni mchog gi de kho na// chos kyi dbyings bdag zhi ba'o// dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las A li kA li 'byung ba dang / dus kyi mtshan nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings bstan/
209b2(rgyud 'bum): pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// / gzhan yang nyon cig bdag gis bshad// ji bzhin rdo rje'i mtshan nyid can// mi phyed rdo rje zhes su bstan// ye shes lnga yi
209b3(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid mchog/ nam mkha' lnga yi dbus su thim// nam mkha' lnga yi bdag nyid do// pad+ma'i lte ba'i nang na bzhugs// thig le gcig pu yi ge med// rnam pa thams cad rnam pa
209b4(rgyud 'bum): med/ / de ni rdo rjer kun tu grags// bdag gi sgra yi nges pa'i don// nyon cig bdag gis de nyid bshad// a ni yig 'bru gzugs kyi mchog/ thams cad kun gyi lus nang yod// rnam
209b5(rgyud 'bum): pa thams cad mchog ni rdzogs/ / kun yod ma skyes thams cad mkhyen// rtag tu stong pa thams cad khyab// thams cad kun gcig byed pa'i rgyu// srid pa srid mchog nyin mo ni// sprul pa'i
209b6(rgyud 'bum): sku yi bde ba'o/ / lus ni de bzhin gshegs skyabs sbyin// thams cad don ni byed nus pa'o// haM gi yig 'bru gzugs dang bral// lus gnas lus las ma skyes pa'o// rnam pa kun
209b7(rgyud 'bum): las rnam par grol/ / byang gzugs dpe byad kun dang bral// dngos dang dngos min rnam par grol// skye dang 'jig pa'i byed pa po// dngos po thams cad nub pa po// chos kyi sku yi rang
210a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin can/ / sems ni rdo rje 'dzin skyabs sbyin// yi ge thams cad dang bral la// stong pa'i rnam pa mya ngan 'das// ye shes sku yi rang bzhin can// dri med brjod med
210a2(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba ste/ / de ni haM du kun tu grags// bdag ni thams cad kun gyi nang // thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid la// de ni khyab par yod pa ste// bdag
210a3(rgyud 'bum): / ni med na 'gro ba kun// ji ltar rtsa bcang shing bzhin no// haM gi yig 'bru mtshams kyi mthar// a ni yig 'bru mgo bo'i rtser// a ni yig 'bru zla ba dag/ haM gi yig 'bru nyi ma'i 'od//
210a4(rgyud 'bum): a ni yig 'bru rten yin te// haM gi yig 'bru brten pa'o// a yi yig 'bru srog ces bshad// haM gi yig 'bru rtsol bar dran// gang zhig gnas su de gnyis sbyor// de ni bdag
210a5(rgyud 'bum): nyid gsal bar 'gyur/ / rgyud rnams kun las rnyed dka' ba// de ni yang dag bdag sgrar bshad// dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las rdo rje'i mtshan nyid dang / bdag sgra'i nges
210a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ngor zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o/ / // gsang ba'i don ni bshad bya ba// gsang ba zhes bya ci zhes brjod// gsang ba zhes bya dga' bar bstan// mchog
210a7(rgyud 'bum): ces bya ba mchog yin no/ / dgyes pa zhes bya dga' bral bstan// thams cad bdag nyid lhan skyes dran// gsang ba nyid ni gsang ba yin// gsang ba khu bar bstan pa'o// khu ba srog
210b1(rgyud 'bum): ces bstan pa ste/ / srog ni rten du dran pa'o// rten ni sar ni shes par bya// khams gsum kun ni 'byung ba'o// mchog ni chu zhes bstan pa ste// chu ni srog gi tshe yin no// cha ngal de ni 'od
210b2(rgyud 'bum): ces bstan/ / 'od ni rnam par dag ces dran// rnam par dag pa bde chen dngos// de ni rang bzhin bstan pa'o// rnam par dag pa 'byung min gnas// babs pa rnam dag brjod pa yin//
210b3(rgyud 'bum): babs pa dngos min zhes byar bstan// dngos min rnam dag brjod ma yin// rnam dag phra ba'i phra mo ste// phra mo'i rnam dag gzhan na gnas// phra mo'i rang bzhin zhes byar bstan// gzung
210b4(rgyud 'bum): dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs/ / rang dngos bde ba chen po ni// ye shes rlung du rab tu grags// de ni nam mkha' zhes su bshad// nam mkha' stong par bstan pa'o// stong pa las ni thams
210b5(rgyud 'bum): cad 'byung / / stong pa'i nang du thams cad thim// stong pa yang dag dri med gnas// rnam pa thams cad dang bral ba// mchog gi rnam pa skye med dag/ rang dga' nyams su myong ba
210b6(rgyud 'bum): dngos/ / de ni rang bzhin zhes su bshad// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// rigs lnga yi ni mtshan nyid de// nyon cig bdag gis bshad par bya// rigs ni ka pA la zhes brjod//
210b7(rgyud 'bum): ka pA la ni ka ru bshad// ka ni rtsa ba zhes byar grags// rtsa ba bye brag lnga ru dran// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga yi sku// de ni phung po lnga zhes dran// phung po lnga ni grub pa'i sku// 'byung ba
211a1(rgyud 'bum): lnga yi rang bzhin can/ / tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag po dang // dbang phyug rtag tu zhi ba la// lnga la khyab pa gcig pu ste// bdag ni don dam pa yi pha// thams cad
211a2(rgyud 'bum): khyab pa'i stong chen po/ / bdag ni 'pho med ma skyes pa'o// ka ni ci zhig thugs rje 'thung // pA ni dam tshig skyong ba yin// la ni ngan 'gro'i pha rol phyin// de ni ka pA la ru bshad// ka yi/
211a3(rgyud 'bum): sgra ni rang bzhin yin// ka ni gang du'ang mi gnas pa'o// dngos po thams cad khyab pa'o// des na ka zhes bstan pa'o// de dag he ru ka yi dngos// chos kyi 'khor lo'i gnas na bzhugs//
211a4(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu zhi ba longs spong 'khor// dbang phyag bde chen 'khor lo'o// drag po lte ba'i 'khor lor gnas// khyab 'jug me yi 'khor lo'o// tshangs pa rlung gi 'khor lor te// rlung ni thams
211a5(rgyud 'bum): cad nang yod che/ / bdag ni 'khor lo drug gi dbus// kun la de ni khyab par bzhugs// stong nyid gzhan mchog stong pa nyid// bdag dpal he ru ka yi mchog/ mkha' 'gro lnga yi gtso bo ste//
211a6(rgyud 'bum): ye shes mkha' 'gro dbang phyug bdag/ 'byung ba lnga yi rang bzhin can// mkha' 'gro ma yis kun tu bskor// dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las gsang ba dang / dga' ba bzhi dang /
211a7(rgyud 'bum): rigs lnga'i mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// phyag rgya'i brda ni rab yin te// rna chag du bu 'khor lo dang // mgul ror/
211b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin thal ba dang // tshangs pa'i skud pa phyag rgya drug/ pha rol phyin drug dran pa'o// sbyin pa tshul khrims bzod brtson 'grus// bsam gtan shes rab drug yin no// sbyin pa chos zhes bstan pa
211b2(rgyud 'bum): ste/ tshul khrims las zhes dran pa'o// bzod pa dam tshig ces su dran// brtson 'grus ting 'dzin shes par bya// bsam gtan ye shes zhes byar dran// shes rab ces bya phyag rgya che//
211b3(rgyud 'bum): don dam par ni shes par bya// skye mched drug ni dag par bya// phyag rgya drug tu rab tu grags// rigs drug rim par shes par bya// lha mo'i bdag nyid phyag rgya drug/ yaM ra laM ba oM haM ste// lha ma
211b4(rgyud 'bum): yi ni rim pas so/ / de ru mchod pa rab tu bya// mchod pa ro mnyam rig pa'o// thim dang longs spyod dbang gis ni// gnas kun gyi ni de bzhin no// gtum mo btso blag DoM bi dang // gar mkhan
211b5(rgyud 'bum): thod pa bram ze mo/ / gtum mo pad+ma'i rigs yin te// btso blag rin chen rigs su dran// DoM bi rdo rje'i rigs zhes bya// gar mkhan ral gri'i rigs su dran// thod pa can ni 'khor lo'i
211b6(rgyud 'bum): rigs/ / de lnga dag pa phyag rgya'o// ye shes phyag rgya bram ze mo// rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs su dran// bram ze mo ni ma yin te// thod pa ma ni sring mor dran// gar mkhan bu mor shes par bya//
211b7(rgyud 'bum): Do bi chung mar rab tu grags// btso brag mkhan ni mna' ma yin// gtum mo sgyug mor dran pa'o// shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis// rtog pa med pas mchod par bya// rnam rtog med pas
212a1(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub 'grub/ / ji ltar bsnyen pa skad cig gis// ma ni sems zhes bstan pa ste// gsung ni 'di ru sring mor dran// bu mo sku ru rnam par grags// chung ma srog ces bya
212a2(rgyud 'bum): bar dran/ / mna' ma rtsol bar dran pa ste// sgyug mo mnyam par dran pa'o// ma ni mthu yi rtsa yin te// sangs rgyas rin po che yi snod// sring mo khu ba'i rtsa yin te// 'tshogs ma'i gnas na yod pa'o//
212a3(rgyud 'bum): bu mo khrag gi rtsa yin te// khu ba'i rtsa yi 'og ni yod// chung ma dri chu'i rtsa yin te// gnyis kyi bar na yod pa'o// mna' ma mchi ma'i rtsa yin te// mgrin pa'i gnas na yod pa'o// sgyug mo snabs kyi
212a4(rgyud 'bum): rtsa yin te/ / dpral ba'i gnas na yod pa'o// ma ni sa ru shes par bya// sring mo chu ru dran pa'o// bu mo me ni yin par dran// chung ma rlung du rab tu grags// mna' ma de ni nam mkha' ste// sgyug mo
212a5(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' ma yin no/ / ma ni mngar ba yin par 'gyur// sring mo ngo ni sbyar bar dran// bu mo kha bar shes bya ste// chung ma lan cher 'di ru dran// tsha ba de ni mna' ma ste// smug mo bsku bar dran pa'o//
212a6(rgyud 'bum): dede rnams 'bad pas mchod par bya// myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor rgyud las rnyed dka' ba// phyag rgya'i rigs su bdag gis bshad// dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las phyag
212a7(rgyud 'bum): rgya'i brda dang / mchod pa'i cho ga zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// / de nas mchod pa'i cho ga ni// phyi dang nang ni bdag gis bstan// sa rdo la sogs mchod rten la// nam
212b1(rgyud 'bum): yang de la phyag mi bya/ / rab gnas dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg rnams// nam yang de ni mi bya'o// dri chen rdor chu sa bon sogs// rtag tu bdag nyid mchod par bya// 'gro dang mi 'gro gang zhig ni/
212b2(rgyud 'bum): de ni thams cad sems yin no// de yi gzugs grub sems ma yin// sems ni stong pa'i rang bzhin no// ngo bo nyid bral stong pa ste// de bas 'gro ba sems su grub// de lta bu yi dag byas na// rtsa sogs/
212b3(rgyud 'bum): la yang mchod pa bya// nyid ni mnga' bdag rdo rje sems// sems ni bdag nyid dran pa'o// sems ma yin pa lha yi dngos// phyi rol gzhan ma med pa'o// de ltar shes nas bdag nyid ni// dang po de
212b4(rgyud 'bum): nyid mchod par bya/ / rigs lnga dag tu kun spyod pa// rigs gcig tu ni rnam par brtag/ byams dang sdang ba'i bye brag dang // btung dang mi btung spang bar bya// bud med gang yang snod min med//
212b5(rgyud 'bum): dge dang mi dge smra mi bya// dngos grub rnal 'byor med pa dang // sngags med sngags pa med par ni// dngos grub chen po thob 'dod na// de lta bu yi sems mi bya// rlabs che gting ring yang dag
212b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ / skyes bu chen pos sems de bya// nyan thos rnams dang mnyam pa'i sems// nam yang de ltar mi bya'o// brtan med nyan thos skal ldan min// log pa'i mun pas ye shes g.yogs// de
212b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams la ni gtam tsam yang / / skyes bu chen pos mi sbyin no// smad par yang ni yong mi bya// de la nam yang phyag mi bya// phyi dang nang gi sbyor ba yi// 'di ru gnas ni bdag gis bshad// rdo rje'i
213a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas ni aur+Yan dang / / gnas ni dzA lan d+ha ra ra dran// gnas ni pu lI ra ma dang // gnas ni kA ma rU pa'o// nye ba'i gnas ni mA lar bstan// sin d+hu na gar sing la la//
213a2(rgyud 'bum): zhing ni mum+ma ni ru grags// de bzhin de wi ko Ta dang // nye ba'i zhing ni ku lu ta// ar bu dar ni de bzhin dran// ha ri ke la tshan do ha ra// go dA ba ri de bzhin no// lAM pa ka dang kAn tsi ste// nye ba'i
213a3(rgyud 'bum): tshan dor bstan pa'o/ / 'dus pa de ni ka mar te// de bzhin du ni gser gling ngo // kong ka dang ni b+hin da ste// nye ba'i 'dus par dran pa'o// yi dgas 'dus pa'i dur khrod dang // dur khrod rgya
213a4(rgyud 'bum): mtsho'i ngogs su'o/ / nye ba'i dur khrod tsa ri tra// de bzhin ko mar pa ra'o// kasma ri pI la wa ru grags// de bzhin ke rang yul yin no// nye ba'i pI la ne pa la// nye ba'i pI la kar no dza// u
213a5(rgyud 'bum): ya na spyi bo'i gnas/ / dzA lan d+ha ra spyi gtsug dran// pul+lI ra ni 'tshogs ma ste// kA ma rU ni smin phrag dbus// mA la ba ni sna rtse ste// sin d+hu mig gnyis yin par grags// nA ga ra rna ba gnyis
213a6(rgyud 'bum): su dran/ / sing ga nam mkha'i pad+mar gnas// mum+mu ni ni kos sgo'o// de wi ko Ta mgrin gling du// ku lu ta ni rgyab gling du// ar bu da ni bu gnyis su// ha ri ke la snying la'o// go dA ba ri lde
213a7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gnas/ / lAM pa ka ni gsang bar ro// kA tsi ling ka'i dbus su gnas// ka mar ling ka'i rtse mor ro// gser gling gzhang ka'i gnas su ste// kong ka na ni brla gnyis dran// b+hin dbus
213b1(rgyud 'bum): mo gnyis yin no/ / yi dgas 'dus pa byin pa ste// rkang bol gnyis su rgya mtsho ngogs// ko mA ri ni mthe bong ste// tsa ra tra ni sor mor ro// la che'i yul ni lus rnams kun// ke ra ta ni
213b2(rgyud 'bum): rkang mthil lo/ / ne ba la ni lhag pa ste// kaM po dzi ni rkang pa'o// de ni don dam pa yi gnas// ri bong can 'od me tog dang // me tog dmar po nyi mnyam gyis// mchod pa'i dus su mchod
213b3(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / srog gcod pa yi mchod sbyin ni// 'bad pas de ru dbul bar bya// pad+ma chen po'i mcho gnas su// srog ni gcad par bya ba'o// chad pa nam yang mi bya ste// de la brtson 'grus
213b4(rgyud 'bum): chen po bya/ / srog gcod pa yi bsod nams bya// mchog gi mchog ni yang dag rnyed// gru gsum dri med dag par ni// de ru dkyil 'khor 'phar ma gnyis// nang gi 'phar mar dpal bcom
213b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ / byang chub sems nyid ldan pa'o// phyi rol rigs gsum rnal 'byor ma// 'dzin ma la sogs mchog chen mo// lus kyi nang nas 'byung ba'i phyir// de ni lha mo zhes su bstan//
213b6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor lus su bstan pa dang // b+ha ga dkyil 'khor yin par bshad// dkyil 'khor byang chub kyi ni sems// dkyil 'khor gsum ni rtog pa'o// dur khrod brgyad kyi dbus gnas
213b7(rgyud 'bum): su/ dkyil 'khor gsum ni sgom pa'o// dbugs 'byung dur khrod ces su bshad// sgo dgu dang ni ldan pa'o// yang dag nyon cig zhal bzang mo// de yi 'byung ba bdag gis bshad// gtum drag gzhang ka'i
214a1(rgyud 'bum): dbyibs can ni/ / gsang ba'i tshang tshing kha ru'o// 'bar ba zhes bya'i dur khrod ni// sna yi bu ga gnyis na gnas// dmyal sogs de bzhin mi bzad pa// mig gnyis la ni
214a2(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa'o/ / ha har rgod dang g.yer ka can// rna ba gnyis la gnas pa'o// dur khrod re re'i shing re ni// dbang byed pa ni de na yod// gtum drag pa ta la yi shing // dbyibs can nang na shi
214a3(rgyud 'bum): ka ra'o/ / tshang tshing sa li shing yin no// 'bar ba zhes bya so ri sha'o// dmyal sogs u dum pa ra ste// mi bzad pa ni 'ba' ta'i shing // ha ha ra rgod na a shwang tha// g.yer ka'i nang na ge sar
214a4(rgyud 'bum): shing / / shing gi rnam pa rtsa brgyad ni// yan lag mang po yod pa'o// gzhang mthu rtse mo mthus byed ma// ro yi rtse mor ro lus ma// nam mkha' ma dang char sbyin ma// rul pa pa dang ltogs ma ste//

214a6(rgyud 'bum): le las dkyil 'khor dang / lha mo dang / gnas dang / dur khrod dang / shing dang / mchod pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// / nyon mongs thams cad med
214a7(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ / nyon cig sbyin sreg bdag gis bshad// lte ba'i gnas na tshul yod pa// tshul gyi mtha' na gsang pad // de ru rang 'bar gyi ni rlung // bskor ba byas nas ngal bso ste// dbang
214b1(rgyud 'bum): po gnyis shing sbyor ba yis/ / rlung gis me ni sbar ba'o// mar yod pa ni steng 'khor lo// de ni mar snod ces su dran// ha ni blugs gzar zhes su bshad// dgang gzar 'di ru rdo rjer bstam/
214b2(rgyud 'bum): hom khung b+ha ga zhes su bshad// 'bru ni dbang po lnga ru dran// yam shing phung po zhes byar bstan// byang chub sems ni mar du sreg/ mar ngo yi ni min chad du// nyal thug nas gshegs su gsol//

214b7(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis bshad/ / rnam snang mi bskyod don yod grub// dpag med rin 'byung zhes byar bstan// rin chen 'byung ldan khrag ces bstan// snang ba mtha' yas khu bar brjod// don yod grub pa
215a1(rgyud 'bum): sha chen te/ / mi bskyod pa ni rdo rje chu'o// rnam par snang mdzad dri chen bshad// de ni bdud rtsi lnga yin no// dben dang mi med dgyes pa yis// gnod pa thams cad dang bral ba'i//
215a2(rgyud 'bum): de ru khang pa rab tu bya// nyis rtseg dang ni sgo dang ldan// gcig ni sa yi 'og tu bya// de yi steng ni gnyis pa'o// 'jig rten pa yis gcig tu shes// de ltar mkhas pas khang pa bya// re zhig sgrub

215a4(rgyud 'bum): chags bral gnyis med pa/ / ser sna med cing brtson 'grus ldan// khro ba med cing dpa' chen po// bla ma la gus thos pa che// 'bras bu gsum la sogs pas lus// dang por yang dag nges

215b7(rgyud 'bum): na gsum/ / sgrub pa'i grogs kyis khyer nas 'ong // sna tshogs mchod sbyin mchod pa yis// rtse gcig gis ni mchod par bya// de yi yan lag rab ni blang // pad+ma'i snod ni de la bya// shes rab dang
216a1(rgyud 'bum): ldan thabs kyis ni/ / de yi snod du chang btung bya// stobs chen rang nyid cung zad tsam// dngos grub phyir ni bza' bar bya// pad+ma'i snod du bsrubs pa las// cung zad 'bad de
216a2(rgyud 'bum): gzhag par bya/ / gzhan ma sman gyis 'bad de ni// grogs kyi dbang pos btse bar bya// ra yi 'o ma til mar dang // mar ni sha ka ra dang bcas// kha ra la sogs mnyam pa'i cha// stobs ni lnga ru gyur

216a7(rgyud 'bum): kyi steng du btso bar bya/ / ma rnyeng na ni rdzi snod du// dag pa'i rigs kyi me tog gis// nyi ma bdun du 'dug par bya// de nas snying po'i sman de ni// rim pas che bar blug par bya// li shi ga pur la ta dang /
216b1(rgyud 'bum): gla rtsi tsan dan dzA ti dang // dzA ti pha la sug smel dang // dA tsha tsha ba gsum dang ro// dkar po'i sha kar dang ldan pa'i// mar dang bcas nas btso bar bya// me ni 'jam par smin pa yis// grogs kyi
216b2(rgyud 'bum): dbang pos btso bar byas/ / a ka ru sogs kyis bdug gis// rdo yi snod du gzhag par bya// nyin re zhing ni zho gnyis ni// zhu ba yin na bza' bar bya// zhu ba yin na zho bzhi dang // de nas zho drug rtag

216b7(rgyud 'bum): ma dan chang ba la sha/ ma la a tsa 'dus par dran// 'gro ba le Ta ro shrA ba// ni ri shu ka rus pa'i rgyan// phreng kha na ni 'ong ba yin// kun tu ru ni dbang po sbyor// du dur skal ldan min par bshad//
217a1(rgyud 'bum): kA liny+dza ra skal ldan gzhung // DiN+Di reg bya min par bstan// thod pa pad+ma b+hA dza na// dri chen bzhi mnyam yin par bstan// dri chu gla rtsir dran pa'o// khu ba ga pur bstan pa ste/

219a1(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma gar gyi dbang phyug rigs// pad+ma'i gtso mor de shes bya// smin mtshams bar na rtse gsum yod// lus ni sngo bsangs skye ba dang // de yi khyim na rdo rje yod// tang ku dmar
219a2(rgyud 'bum): pos mchod pa bya/ / he ru ka dpal rigs 'byung ba'i// kun gyi ma mor shes par bya// rtse gsum gang gi dpral ba 'am// yang na shak+ti gsal 'gyur ba// mig dmar gdong ni dmar ba dang /
219a3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin rkang pa lag pa dmar// rtag tu phug ron la rtsed rtse// de bzhin khyi dang khyim bya'o// de yi khyim du rdo rje'i mtshan// rtag tu gang zhig mchod byed pa// dpal ldan rdo rje'i rigs su byung //

219a6(rgyud 'bum): du rdo rje 'dri ba dang / / mtshan mo phyed na mchod pa byed// rdo rje phag mo'i rigs 'byung ba'i// dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// bcom gser dang mnyam pa'i 'od// mig mau g.yo zhing basmra
219a7(rgyud 'bum): mang / / rdo rje gang gi dpral ba 'am// khyim du yang ni gsal 'gyur ba// rgyal po'i btsun mo rtag tu sgeg/ skal ldan cho ga ni bden smra dang // mA li kI yi dri 'byung zhing // khyim du rdo rje mchod
219b1(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ / khaN+Da ro ha'i rigs 'byung ba'i// mkha' 'gro ma ni ye shes rgyal// shin tu sha la dga' ba dang // mig sman nag po'am nam mkha' 'dra// rtse gsum rnam pa phra ba ru// gdug
219b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i las la rtag tu dga'/ / dur khrod rtag tu 'gro ba dang // 'jigs pa med cing snying rje med// de la khyim du mchod pa ni// chang la sogs pas mchod byed pa// he ru ka dpal rigs 'byung/
219b3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i// mkha' 'gro yin par gdon mi za// gas sa sprin gyi mdog 'dra ba// g.yon gyi mche ba gtsigs pa dag/ de yi khyim du dgra sta ni// 'dri zhing rtag tu mchod byed pa// he ru ka dpal rigs
219b4(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba'i/ / mkha' 'gro mar ni the tshom med// mkha' 'gro ma ni thams cad kyi// mdog dang mtshan ma rigs 'byung ba// mdor bsdus pa ni 'di ru bshad// rgyas par ye shes snying por ro//
219b5(rgyud 'bum): dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las mkha' 'gro ma'i gzugs dang / mtshan nyid dang / rigs 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // gang zhig gzhan min bdag
219b6(rgyud 'bum): nyid bzhugs/ / nyor cig dkyil 'khor rgyal dbang po// hUM gi rnam pa'i rnam pa can// bdag nyid hUM gi dngos po yin// hUM gi rnam pa las gzugs 'byung // mtshan dang dpe byang ldan pa dag
219b7(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor steng na bzhugs/ / nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang mnyam// khyod dang lhan cig sbyor ba yis// chu skyes sngon po'i gzugs dang ldan// zhal bzhi spyan gsum phyag brgyad de//
220a1(rgyud 'bum): g.yas brkyang bas ni gnas na bzhugs// rdo rje dril bu nyizla dang // mnga' gzhu dag ni 'gengs pa dang // kha T+wAM ga dang ka pA la// khrag chen po yis gang ba'o// bde ba'i gnas
220a2(rgyud 'bum): su bdag dang khyod/ / legs dgyes dgyes par rol bgyid de// de nas dang po'i ro las ni// spro nas rdo rje ro langs ma// gzugs gnag pa la phyag bzhi pa// mnga' gzhu lag na 'gengs pa dang //
220a3(rgyud 'bum): chu srin g.yas na thogs pa dang // ka pA la dang kha T+wAM ga/ g.yon gyi lag na thogs pa ste// shar gyi sgo na gnas pa ste// yang ni srub thabs sbyor ba yis// gnyis pa yi ni ro rab las// rdo rje dra ba
220a4(rgyud 'bum): 'phros pa ni/ / gcer bu dang ni spyan gsum pa// mdog dmar lag na nya thogs te// byang gi sgo yi gnas na bzhugs// yang ni ro ni gsum pa las// rdo rje rtse mo spros pa ni// mdog ser lag na
220a5(rgyud 'bum): seng ge thogs/ / nub sgo yi ni gnas na bzhugs// yang ni ro ni bzhi pa las// rdo rje zlum po 'phros pa ni// mdog dkar lag na bya khyung ste// lho yi sgo na bzhugs pa'o// ro lnga de ni rnyed pa yis//
220a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje ska rags ma ni spros// rdza rnga gling bu lag na thogs// shar lho mtshams na gzugs gnyis pa'o// yang ni drug pa'i 'byung ba las// rdo rje ser mo spro ba ni// rgyud mangs rnga chen lag na thogs//
220a7(rgyud 'bum): lho nub mtshams na bzhugs pa'o// yang dag bdun pas rnyed pa ni// rdo rje rgod ma 'phro ba ste// rdza rnga dang ni cha lang thogs// nub byang mtshams na bzhugs pa'o// ro brgyad pa ni rnyed pa yis//
220b1(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje nyi ma spro ba ni// tam bu ra dang kA ra thogs// phyag gnyis rtag tu mdzes pa'o// spros nas byang shar mtshams su ni// bdud kun bcom nas bzhugs pa'o// yang ni srub dang bsrub thabs
220b2(rgyud 'bum): las/ / dang po dga' ba 'byung ba yis// rdo rje legs dgyes 'phros pa ni// ro yi snod ni lag na 'dzin// spros nas shar gyi phyogs kyi grwar// chos 'byung gi ni grwa na bzhugs// b+ha ga'i phyag rgya spyi
220b3(rgyud 'bum): bor ni/ / mdzub mo tshangs pa'i bu ga'i gnas// yang ni mchog gi dga' ba las// rdo rje mtshem 'phros pa ni// khrag gi snod ni lag na brel// lho nub gra na bzhugs pa'o// yang ni dga' bral 'byung
220b4(rgyud 'bum): ba las/ / rdo rje glang chen ma 'phros pa// khu ba'i snod ni lag na thogs// nub byang phyogs kyi grwa na bzhugs// de rnams gnag dang ser dang dmar// g.yon brkyang bas ni bzhugs pa'o// yang ni
220b5(rgyud 'bum): yang dag bsrub thabs las/ / lhan cig skyes dga' 'byung ba ste// lhan cig skyes dga' 'dod chags che// me chen rab tu 'bar ba'o// khyod dang lhan cig de ru bdag/ rang bzhin gyi ni yongs su
220b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / dngos po med par bdag mi 'gyur// bdag ni rang bzhin gnas su bzhugs// bdag gi ngo bo brjod mi nus// sangs rgyas kun gyis kyang rnyed dka'// yang dag rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
220b7(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ / gal te kun rdzob gzugs su rnyed// 'jig rten khams ni grangs med pa// gzhan ni ma yin bdag gis khyab// khyod dang lhan cig kun rdzob tu// 'byung ba'i rgyu phyir rol pa byed// bdag
221a1(rgyud 'bum): ni rol pa mi byed na/ / sangs rgyas thams cad 'byung mi 'gyur// 'di ni thams cad mi g.yo bar// 'gro 'gyur bar ni the tshom med// rang bzhin las ni mchog gnas su// de
221a2(rgyud 'bum): dus bdag ni cang mi smra/ / bde chen legs dgyes mgon po bzhengs// rdo rje bzang dgyes bdag dga' mdzod// mgon po khyod min bdag ro 'dra// thugs rje ro yis bdag skye mdzod// kye mgon chad
221a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i stong pa'i min/ / mgon po stong pa'i rang bzhin min// rdo rje mtshon ma bdag dga' mdzod// pad+ma kha phyi rol cig rol// a la la la a la la// a la la la legs dgyes mgon// rdo rje glang
221a4(rgyud 'bum): chen ma dga' mdzod/ / khyed rang gis gsungs bdag min na// sangs rgyas 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// ye shes sku las oM hUM 'dir// bdag dang khyod ni lhan cig bzhengs// 'khor lo dang bcas
221a5(rgyud 'bum): khro sku mchog/ sum cu rtsa gnyis yan lag ldan// bde ba'i gnas su bdag dang khyod// dur khrod brgyad kyi dbus su ni// skye ba'i rgyu yi don phyir rol// bskyed pa'i rim pa yi ni phyogs// mdog
221a6(rgyud 'bum): gnag pa la 'od che ba/ / dbu sgra me bzhin 'bar ba dang // zhal ni bcu drug spyan gsum pa// phyag ni bcu drug ldan pa dang // zhabs ni rnam pa bzhi yis ni// bdud bzhi yi ni steng na bzhugs//
221a7(rgyud 'bum): legs dgyes dbang phyug ma khyod bcas// ye shes mkha' 'gro dbang phyug bdag/ khyod kyang nga yi gzugs dang mnyam// 'jigs byed chung mar bcas pa'i steng // gru gsum dbus su nyi ma'i
221b1(rgyud 'bum): gdan/ / gyen du zhabs ni gar dang ldan// 'jigs ma dpa' mo chang 'thung ma// 'jigs byed po la stobs ma dang // rta mgrin ma dang rta rnam// glang chen sna dang lto ba ma// me ma dang ni chu rgyun ma/
221b2(rgyud 'bum): zla ba ma dang nyi 'od ma// dung rnam dang dung gtsug ma// dung lte ma dang stobs chen ma// bya rgod rgod kha hor pa ma// hor mig ma dang hor mgo ma// mig dmar skra dmar rin chen ma// phug ron dmar
221b3(rgyud 'bum): mo nag mo ma/ / ri bong ri dgas ram mo// phyag bzhi ma la sna tshogs gzugs// spyan gsum pa la bzhin yang 'jigs// phyag gnyis mda' gzhu 'gengs par ldan// gzhan gyis gri
221b4(rgyud 'bum): dang thod pa 'dzin/ / rdo rje 'phreng ba dpral ba ru// phyag rgya lnga yis yan lag brgyan// de lta bu yi 'khor lo tshe// khyod dang bcas pa bdag gi gnas// gang zhig nyi shu rtsa brgyad gnas// de ni tshog
221b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi gnas su dran/ / rdol dril rin chen 'khor lo dang // ral gri rtse gsum mda' nyi ma// zla ba dgra sta Da ma ru// gzhu dang tho ba ka pA la// b+hU ta'i pags pa gyen du 'phyar// gshin rje'i pags
221b6(rgyud 'bum): pa rked la dkris/ / zhal gcig pa la phyag gnyis te// khyod kyang bdag gi mdog yin no// thams cad rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang // phyag gnyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa'o// de nas rdzogs pa'i
221b7(rgyud 'bum): rim pa ni/ / rtsa yi 'byung ba rim pa mchog/ lha mo re re rtsa re ste// de yi bde ba bdag dang khyod// 'dzums pa dang ni 'byed pa yis// rlung gis me ni khong du chud// yang dag pa yi dbang po'i shing /
222a1(rgyud 'bum): de yis gtum mo 'bar ba'o// rnam par rtog pa'i phung po'i gzugs// thams cad lus ni sreg pa'o// de yi me 'bar yang dag gis// bde chen 'khor lo bzhu bar 'gyur//
222a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhu bas rtsa ni thams cad las// mchog gi bdud rtsi 'dzag pa'o// yang ni lus ni sos 'gyur te// lha yi sku ni thob par 'gyur// de ni goms pa'i sbyor ba yis// rtse gcig gis ni goms par bya//
222a3(rgyud 'bum): phyi yi phyag rgya med na yang // bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur pa yod// blta ba tsam ni dgos pa ste// de bzhin thams cad thams cad min// phyi nas rnam par rtog pa skyes// de la dngos grub med par 'gyur// /
222a4(rgyud 'bum): jidzaji ltar mun pa'i snod rnams ni// mar me med na mthong mi 'gyur// mar mes mthong bar gyur tsam na// phyi nas mar me dor bar bya// snod ni 'bang de bsrung bya ste// mar mes don bya mi dgos so//
222a5(rgyud 'bum): mar me'i mtshan nyid 'di ru rtsa// rtsa ni shes rab mtshan nyid do// thabs ni bde ba zhes su bstan// bde ba ye shes zhes byar dran// bde ba'i ye shes rang bzhin ni// gang zhig shes rab ma las rnyed//
222a6(rgyud 'bum): de ni shes rab ye shes dbang // de ni rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o// de dngos bde chen ye shes ni// dkyil 'khor nang du yang dag bzhugs// bde ba chen po gnyis su gyes// kun rdzob dang ni don dam mo// /
222a7(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba la sogs nyid las ni// bde ba gnyis gyes shes par bya// de yi rim pa yang dag gnyis// dad pas nyon cig bdag gis bshad// snang ba reg bya sbyor ba dang // 'gro ba de ni bzhi pa'o// /
222b1(rgyud 'bum): rim pa yis mi shes par bya// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs kyi ni// shes rab ma yi lta ba yis// gnyis ka'i 'dod chags 'byung bar 'gyur// de tshe dga' ba 'byung ba ste// rnam pa sna tshogs
222b2(rgyud 'bum): skad cig ldan/ / gang tshe de dang lhan cig tu// dad pas reg bya yod gyur na// de tshe mchog gi dga' ba ni// dri ma med pa 'byung bar 'gyur// yang ni dbang po gnyis phrad las// gang tshe de dang //
222b3(rgyud 'bum): lhan cig sbyor// de yi tshe na dga' bral ni// gsal bar 'byung bar 'gyur ba'o// gang tshe dbang po gnyis shing las// yang dag pa yi me 'bar na// de tshe lhan cig skyes dga' ni// srid
222b4(rgyud 'bum): pa med pa 'byung bar 'gyur/ / nu mas reg pas blta ba ni// 'dod pa de ni dang por dga'// phyi nas de dngos rgyas pa ni// gang tshe nges par yin par 'gyur// de tshe skad cig gis de rgyas//
222b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi dga' ba byed pa'o// gang tshe de nyid shin tu yis// 'dod chags me ni 'bar 'gyur na// de tshe 'bar ba'i thig le ni// dga' bral dga' ba 'bab pa'o// rdo rje pad+ma rol byed pa/
222b6(rgyud 'bum): / de bzhin dga' bral dga' ba'o// de ni bskyed pa'i rim pa yin// u ti'i ye shes dang bral lo// yang ni gang tshe u ta ni// skad cig gcig las gcig tu 'gro// de tshe u ta'i thig le ni/
222b7(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyi rnam pa dag par 'gro// de nas dir ni lhan cig skyes// rdo rje lta bu'i bde ba byed// de ni bcom ldan shes rab ma// rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i phyogs yin no// u ta'i sgras ni bde bar
223a1(rgyud 'bum): bstan/ / legs dgyes dbang mo de ni bdag/ de ru sbyor ba bzhi rnams ni// rgyas par bdag gis bshad par bya// 'dod dang 'dar dang 'gro ba dang // dga' ba dang ni
223a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhi yin te/ / de ni dang po sbyor ba yin// de ni dga' ba'i don yin no// rgyas dang 'dun dang 'byung ba dang // mchog gi dga' ba bzhi yin te// de ni sbyor ba gnyis pa yin// mchog gi dga'
223a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i don yin no/ / 'bar dang thig le myos pa dang // dga' bral dang ni bzhi yin te// de ni sbyor ba gsum pa yin// dga' bral dga' ba'i don yin no// u ta dang ni tshul dang gnyis// lhan
223a4(rgyud 'bum): cig skyes dga' bzhi pa'o/ / de ni sbyor ba bzhi pa yin// dga' ba'i bye brag bcu drug go// bzhi rnams gzhan min 'di ru ni// rab kyi don ni 'di ltar 'gyur// 'dod pa 'dun pa yin par bshad// /
223a5(rgyud 'bum): dpal ldan shes rab mas sprul lo// de ni 'dun pa las ni dkrug/ rang gi yid kyis byed pa'o// 'dod pa'i sgras ni dga' ba yin// mthong ba las ni byed pa'o// de nyid bcom ldan shes
223a6(rgyud 'bum): rab ma/ / 'dod chags chen pos rgyas pa na// de tshe rgyas pa yin par 'gyur// mchog gi dga' ba gnyis pa'o// rgyas pa'i dus su phyi dang nang // gang tshe shin tu 'bar 'gyur na// de tshe yan
223a7(rgyud 'bum): lag rab de ni/ / skad cig gis ni zhu bar 'gyur// de ni 'bar ba'i thig les ni// ming ni gsal bar gyur pa'o// de ni dga' bral dga' ba ste// gsum pa zhes bya bshad pa'o// yang ni de
223b1(rgyud 'bum): nyid gtso mo ni/ / mchog gi rnam pa rab bde ba// de tshe u ta'i dgug pa ni// srid pa dang bral byed pa'o// de ni bzhi pa yang dag mchog/ lhan cig skyes dga' bstan pa'o// de ni u ta'i
223b2(rgyud 'bum): dgug pa ni/ / thig le'i thar pa gsum gyi mthar// lhan skyes kyi ni gnas su'o// dga' ba la sogs bye brag gis// lhan cig skyes rim shes par bya// bde ba chen po'i gtsug tor nas// smin
223b3(rgyud 'bum): phrag 'khor lo'i dbus yan chad/ / de tsam dga' ba'i gnas yin te// thig le gcig pu'i mtshan nyid do// smin phrag 'khor los mgrin 'khor lo// de tsam mchog gi dga' ba'o// mgrin
223b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i gnas nas snying 'khor lo/ / de tsam dga' bral dga' ba'o// de nas yang ni rim pa yis// rim pa'i gnas ni rab tu bshad// lte ba'i 'khor nas rgyu zhabs su// de tsam du ni dga' ba
223b5(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / rgyu zhabs su ni mdung pa'i rtsar// de tsam mchog gi dga' ba'o// mdud pa'i gnas nas rin chen khar// de tsam dga' bral dga' ba'o// rdo rje rin chen rtse nang yod// lhan skyes
223b6(rgyud 'bum): de ni don dam pa'o/ / dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las dkyil 'khor dang / dga' ba'i bye brag dang / thig le'i mtshan nyid dang / bskyed pa dang / rdzogs pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba'i le'u
223b7(rgyud 'bum): ste bcu drug pa'o/ / ye shes mkha' 'gro bcom ldan 'das// bdag ni the tshom cung zad skyes// char yang dang ni thig le'i tshul// ye shes gang nas shes par bya/
224a1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// tshul ni dpral ba'i gnas su ste// thig le mgrin pa'i gnas su bzhugs// char yang snying kha'i gnas su shes// ye shes skye
224a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gnas su bzhugs/ / rtog pa las ni rtog pa med// gang du phyinan 'gro ba na// de ni de rnams rang bzhin gnas// lte ba'i gnas su rab tu grags// gang tshe bdud rtsi gnas su 'gro// de tshe
224a3(rgyud 'bum): ye shes zhes su dran/ / bdud rtsi byang chub sems su grags// tshul la sogs pa'i thig le bzhi// de yi gnas ni bzhi yin te// dga' ba'i bye brag 'gro bar 'gyur// dpral bar dga'
224a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i thig le dang / / mgrin par mchog tu dran pa'o// snying kha ru ni dga' bral te// lte ba ru ni lhan cig skyes// rtsa yi kun spyod sbyor ba yis// dga' ba la sogs rnyed par 'gyur// dpral
224a5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i steng na pad+ma yod/ / de yi steng na gtsug tor ro// de ni gsang chen ye shes te// rgyal ba yis kyang mi shes so// lte ba'i 'og gi gsum gnas su// de yi steng du rgyu zhabs so// gsum
224a6(rgyud 'bum): dngos 'og gi lte ba'i dbyibs/ / de ru rdo rje byang gzugs gsal// gsum dngos gnas na rtsa rnams kyi// yang dag mchog gi gnas yin no// ro ma 'dzin ma gnyis yin te// gsum pa de
224a7(rgyud 'bum): ni rtog med ma/ / rtog mong de na gcig pu ste// kun rdzob tu ni gsum du 'gyur// de ni gcig tu lu gu rgyud// ji ltar sbrul 'khyil bzhin du'o// sku gsung thugs kyi dbye ba yis// rtsa ni bye
224b1(rgyud 'bum): brag gsum du 'gyur/ / rdo rje rtse mo thugs rdo rje// gsum gyi dngos po gsung yin no// lte ba sku zhes bya bar grags// de ni rdo rje gsum des don// snying khar thugs kyi rdo rje ste// mgrin pa
224b2(rgyud 'bum): gsung gi rdo rje'o/ / dpral ba sku yi rdo rje ste// rgyas par bdag gis rab tu gsal// de yi dbus su srog yod pa// de bzhin du ni nye ba'i srog/ snying ba'i steng las srob gi drung/ lde ba'i 'og las gso ba'i rlug/ gang
224b3(rgyud 'bum): tshe rkang mthil las gso rlung / / gal te 'byung ba yin par 'gyur// de yi tshe na srog gi rlung // gyen du lam du 'gro ba'o// gso rlung lte ba'i gnas su ni// nges pa yi ni gnas byed do//
224b4(rgyud 'bum): yang ni gang tshe srog gi rlung // gtsug tor las ni phyir 'gro na// de tshe gso ba'i rlung de ni// rang gi gnas su 'gro ba'o// de ni srog gi rlung yin te// lte ba'i gnas su 'dugs byed// dpal
224b5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya chen po'i thog lo las tshul dang / char yang dang / thig le dang / ye shes kyi gnas dang / rtsa'i kun spyod ces bya ba'i le'u sde bcu bdun pa'o// bcom
224b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan de ru bdag zhu ste/ / de yi bsam gtan ji lta bu// kha sbyar rnam pa'i sbyor ba yi// pad rnams 'dug sa'i mtshan nyid do// rim pa gang gis sems de ni// 'gro dang 'ong ba ji ltar 'gyur//
224b7(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dri ba yang dag gsang ba ste// 'di ni sus kyang mi shes so// gang gis khyod kyis gsal bar shes// nyon cig yang dag bdag gis bshad//
225a1(rgyud 'bum): gang tshe legs dges shin tu bde// shes rab thabs kyi sbyor ba las// de tshe rtog pa med pa'i lam// byang chub sems ni 'byung bar 'gyur// lte ba'i rtsa bar srog
225a2(rgyud 'bum): rlung ni/ / skad cig tsam yang mi byed na// gang zhig pad+ma khas sbu ba 'di// skad cig gis ni gyen du 'gyur// de yi lte ba'i dbus su ni// sems ni bstan par 'gyur ba'o// de tshe 'thur
225a3(rgyud 'bum): du 'gro bar 'gyur/ / ji ltar ma rdol snod du ni// chu ni 'dzag pa med par gnas// de bzhin nges par sems 'gyur ro// de ni skad cig sgom byed do// sangs rgyas nyid 'gyur the tshom med//
225a4(rgyud 'bum): dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las byang chub kyi sems bstan par byed pa dang // bsam gtan brtan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// // dbang bskur ye
225a5(rgyud 'bum): shes mtshan nyid ni/ / bcom ldan de nyid don ni gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dbang bskur ba yi ye shes don// nyon cig yang dag bdag gis bshad// gzugs
225a6(rgyud 'bum): bzang bcu drug lon pa dang / / si sma ga pur yod pa yi// phyag rgya gcer byas nas ni// legs dgyes kyis ni mchod par bya// pad+ma kha sbyar sbyor ba yis// yang dang yang du 'dod pa bya//
225a7(rgyud 'bum): rim pa yis ni bskyod par bya// khu ba ji ltar 'byung 'gyur ba// thams cad 'byung bar gyur pa na// pad+ma'i nang du spang bar bya// legs dgyes kyi ni dbang phyug ma// 'di ni slob dpon
225b1(rgyud 'bum): dbang gi rab/ / yang ni gsang ba'i dbang 'di ni// dad pas nyon cig bdag gis bshad// gang tshegasang gnas na sems yod// de ni gsang bar rab tu grags// gsang ba pad+ma'i khu
225b2(rgyud 'bum): ba yin/ / mdud pa'i nang du gsang ba'o// de yi gnas su brtan par bya// sems ni nam mkha'i pad+mar min// thams cad rgyud las rnyed dka' ba'i// shes rab ye shes bdag gis bshad//
225b3(rgyud 'bum): shes rab mya ngan 'das zhes bshad// ye shes srid pa zhes byar dran// 'khor ba de ni mchog dga' ba// mya ngan 'das pa dga' bral dran// yang na mya ngan 'das grags pa// sangs rgyas
225b4(rgyud 'bum): rin chen pad+ma'i snod/ / bud med b+ha ga'i phyag rgya'o// de ni shes rab ces byar dran// ye shes snod ni yin par grags// thams cad bde ba'i mchog gi gnas// khu ba shes rab ces su shes//
225b5(rgyud 'bum): ye shes bde ba zhes su dran// dbang bskur 'ong du zhu bar 'gyur// ye shes dus las gzhan pa'o// de ni 'gog pa bzhi pa ste// rang bzhin ye shes mtshan nyid do// 'od dang stobs dang sprin
225b6(rgyud 'bum): ngadang tshul/ / dbugs dang ut+pal sa dang yid// snying po zla nya mun pa dang // mchog dang sgra dang ro dang glog/ de ni bcu drug shes par bya// bde ba'i thig le dri med do// tshangs bug nas ni
225b7(rgyud 'bum): mgrin gnas su/ / de tsam du ni thig le bzhi// de yi gnas su dga' ba bzhi// ro gnyis dang ni ldan pa'o// mgrin pa nas ni snying ra gnas/ yang ni tsam bzhi yin mo// mchog gi dga' ba'i bzhi yin te// ro gnyis
226a1(rgyud 'bum): dang ni ldan pa'o/ / snying kha'i gnas nas rin chen sker// yang ni de tsam bzhi yin no// dga' bral dga' ba'i bzhi yin te// ro gnyis dang ni ldan pa'o// rin chen ske
226a2(rgyud 'bum): nas steng gi gnas/ / yang ni de tsam bzhi yin no// lhan cig skyes dga' bzhi yin te// ro gnyis dang ni ldan pa'o// dga' ba bcu drug thig le ste// thig le zla ba'i cha ru dran// A li thig
226a3(rgyud 'bum): ler shes par bya/ / 'khor lo bzhi yi rim pas so// tshangs pa yi ni zhal dang bral// ro dang bcas pa bdag gi zhal// bcu gnyis de ni nyi zhes shes// kA li thig ler rab tu grags// bcu
226a4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis phyed ni bde thig le/ / dga' dang mchog gi dga' bar dran// dga' bral dga' ba'i thig le gsum// rang bzhin gsum dang bral ba'o// yang ni thams cad bdag nyid nyid//
226a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhi po'i don ni bdag gis bshad// gnas bzhi la ni dbang bzhi ste// legs dgyes dbang mor shes par bya// rgyu dang 'bras bu'i rim pa yis// mdor bsdus pa ni bzhi yin te// sbrul dang
226a6(rgyud 'bum): chos dang longs spyod dang / / bde ba chen po bzhi pa'o// de dag sku na bzhi yin te// don dam par ni shes bya'o// sum cu gnyis phyed rtsa nang du// A li thig le bcu drug go// gzhan phyed kA
226a7(rgyud 'bum): li thig le ste/ / rtag tu lam nas 'bab pa'o// A li ye shes sems su 'gyur// kA li ye shes sems las 'byung // bde ba chen po gcig pu ste// kun rdzob gnyis su 'byed par
226b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / shes rab rang bzhin zla ba ste// thabs ni nyi mi'i rasazhin mo// b+har+dz+dza A li 'bras bu ste/ A li n+yaste zla 'bras bu// nyim d+hu ste kA li 'bras/ kA la rgyu sde nyi 'bras bu// nyi ma'i dbus las rdza 'byung ste/ khu ba'i gzugs ni

226b3(rgyud 'bum): dpon gyi ni dbang bskur ro/ / dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las dbang gi ye shes dang / A li kA li'i rgyu 'bras dang / zla ba 'byung ba dang / rtsa dang / thig le dang / dga' ba zhes bya
