232b1(rgyud 'bum): ba la lar byed pa ni/ / de la chad pa rab rtogs bya// yang ngag dga' ba byung gyur na// thar pa'i rgyu phyir gar bya'o// 'on kyang rdo rje rkang pa'i gar// ji ltar rnal 'byor ma mnyes 'ong // ma 'am//
232b2(rgyud 'bum): sring mo chung ma dang // sgyug mo dang ni mna' ma la// shes rab thabs kyi cho ga yis// 'bad de de la mchod par bya// de rnams mchod pas dngos grub ni// gang zhig sems la bsams pa
232b3(rgyud 'bum): yod/ / lhag ma'i gtor ma bzung nas ni// dgon pa chen por gtang bar bya// gal te de ru rnal 'byor ma// blta ba de ni ston byed na// de rnams mtshan nyid 'di lta bu// mkhas pas 'bad
232b4(rgyud 'bum): pas shes par bya/ / gang zhig bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor ni// kun tu zlum por snang 'gyur zhing // kha ni smrar rtag par yod// spu dang smin ma ring ba dang // gos bzang gtsang zhing zhi ba dang //
232b5(rgyud 'bum): mi g.yo bden par smra ba dang // rtag tu dam pa'i chos la dga'// dpa' bo'i sring mo de ni dran// pad+ma'i phyag rgya sbyin par bya// de bzhin rus sbal phyag rgya'o// lpags pa bum pa spyi blugs
232b6(rgyud 'bum): nyid/ / phyag rgya'i lan du shes par bya'o// de ni tshes bcu'i res dag la// khyim du pad+ma 'dri bar 'gyur// lA ma yi ni bud med kyi// mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di nyid ni// ma mchu 'phyang zhing
232b7(rgyud 'bum): mig dkyus ring / / mig ni dmar zhing ser sku gnas// phyug cing skal bzang yon tan can// ser zhing tsam pa lnga bur snang // shin tu ring dang thang ba'ang min// sna tshogs pa yi gos
233a1(rgyud 'bum): la dga'/ / dpral bar ri mo gsum yod cing // mtshan ngan gyen du bltas pa las// rgod cing dga' ba nyid ngag dang // lam ni rnam par mnan cing gnas// g.yul//
233a2(rgyud 'bum): du shi ba rnams kyi ni// gtam dag la ni rtag tu dga'// de ltar rab dregs mthong na na// rtse gsum phyag rgya bstan par bya// rkang pa g.yon pa bskum pa yis// gar nyid kyang ni bstan par
233a3(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / g.yon pa dag ni yongs bzlog pa// phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad// tshes bcu dang ni bco brgyad ni// de yi dus tshigs yin par bstan// khyim du mdung rtse gsum pa yang //
233a4(rgyud 'bum): bris nas de ni rtag tu mchod// 'jig rten dbang phyug lA ma yi// mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin// gang gis mkhur chos dag tu ni// khung bur snang bar gnas gyur cing // de bzhin
233a5(rgyud 'bum): dmar ser lag pa dmar/ / mig ni ljang ser dag tu snang // skra ni de bzhin 'khyil ba dang // mgo la dar ni bcings pa dang // dpral ba la ni gsal bar ni// gzhu yi dngos por rab tu
233a6(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / de bzhin mgrin ring sna ring ba// rtab tu gos dmar la dga' zhing // dgod cing glu ni len pa dang // lan dga' zhig ni khro ba dang // sems ni rnam par g.yo ba dang // rtsod pa
233a7(rgyud 'bum): la ni dga' ba ste/ / 'di 'dra'i rab dregs mthong nas ni// sha ga ti'i phyag rgya bstan par bya// gnyis pa nyid ni 'bad pa yis// dril bu'i phyag rgya bstan par bya// g.yon gyi
233b1(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su log pa ni/ / phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bstan// thung zhing byin pa sbom pa dang // rtag tu gos ser la dga' zhing // phrag pa dag nas gos kyang 'phyang // de 'dra'i bud med
233b2(rgyud 'bum): mthong nas ni/ / 'khor lo'i phyag rgya bstan bya zhing // 'bad pa yis ni gnyis pa yang // dung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya// g.yon nas yongs su bzlog pa ni// phyag rgya'i lan ni yin
233b3(rgyud 'bum): par bshad/ / bcu bzhi de yi dus yin te// de yi khyim du rdo rje 'dri// he ru ka dpal lA ma yi// mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di dag yin// lus kun la ni ba spu yod// mig ni gnag cing
233b4(rgyud 'bum): ser ba dang / / sbom zhing rnam 'gyur mi bzad pa// bzhin 'phel che zhing kha che la// mchu ni 'phyang zhing kha dog gnag/ mig zlum sna ni nyams pa dang // rtag tu glu dang gar la mkhas//
233b5(rgyud 'bum): sprin gyi gzugs can gsus pa che// 'di 'dra'i rab dregs mthong nas ni// glu yi phyag rgya bstan par bya// gnyis pa yang ni 'bad pa yis// mdung gi phyag rgya bstan par bya// g.yon
233b6(rgyud 'bum): nas yongs su bzlog pa ni/ / phyag rgya'i lan ni yin par bshad// tshes grangs bcu gcig de yi dus// khyim du mche ba 'dri byed pa// rdo rje phag mo lA ma yi// mtshan nyid gyur pa 'di
233b7(rgyud 'bum): dag yin/ / mtshan mo'i dus su lam du ni// de ltar 'bad de shes par bya// de kun 'jigs par yong mi bya// phyag rgya rnams kyis mnyes par bya// ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du ni// mnyes
234a1(rgyud 'bum): nas dngos grub ster ba'o/ / dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga dang / mkha' 'gro ma'i yan lag gi mtshan nyid ces bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa
234a2(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa'o/ / / de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// de ru las ni rab yin te// gang zhig bsten pa tsam gyis ni// myur du dngos grub la 'jug pa// yan lag dri nim shin
234a3(rgyud 'bum): tu 'jam/ / rdul ni dri zhim gyur pa dang // ngo tsha che zhing bden par smra// yun rings mig ni mi 'dzums pa// khro ba med cing snying rje che// skad cig 'jam par smra ba dang // skye ba bdun nam yang
234a4(rgyud 'bum): na gsum/ / 'bad pa yis ni btsal bar bya// bsod nams dang ldan sems pa yi// des ni lag tu rnyed par 'gyur// de yang zos par byas nas ni// de yi snying khar ro tsa na// rtse gcig pa
234a5(rgyud 'bum): yi sems kyis ni/ / he ru ka yi sngags lan bdun// bzlas nas 'bad pas thig le bya// 'phral du steng du lding 'gyur zhing // dpag tshad bye bar 'gro ba'o// de ni zos pa tsam gyis ni// khams
234a6(rgyud 'bum): sum ye shes can du 'gyur/ / dpag tshad bye ba lnga bcur ni// nyin mtshan kun tu 'gro ba'o// lha yi lus kyang thob 'gyur te// bskal pa stong du gnas par 'gyur// brgya byin gyi ni stobs
234a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dra'o/ / bud med bltas pa tsam gyis ni// ji ltar me yis mar bzhu ltar// dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig laM las las kyi cho ga zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o//
234b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan ye shes rgyal dbang po// bdag la the tshom skyes pa mchis// sngags pas sngags rnams 'grub don du// bzlas brjod de ni ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa//
234b2(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor rnams kyis bzlas dang bsgom// nyon cig lha mo 'gro ba ma// srog dang rtsol ba mnyam byas nas// srog dang rtsol ba bza' bar bya// srog dang rtsol ba 'gog byas te// srog dang
234b3(rgyud 'bum): / rtsol ba la blta'o// pad+ma'i kha sbyar sbyor ba las// shes rab thabs ni sprad par bya// lte ba gnyis kyi nam mkha' las// khab rtse dbye ba med pa yi// yi ge shel gyi 'od ldan pa// A li'i
234b4(rgyud 'bum): 'phreng ba dran par bya/ / yi ge re raM yid kyis ni// rtag tu rgyun mi 'chang par bzlas// 'khor lo rnams kyi lte ba'i nang // bzlog pa byas nas drang bar bya// ha ha'i sgra ni 'jam pa yis// mgrin
234b5(rgyud 'bum): pa ya rkan mgul med pas/ / nang gi reg bya 'jam pa yi// snying kha kho na'i gnas su bya// shes rab gtum mo gzugs su grags// rnam pa dang bral bde sbyin ma// de lta'i shes rab dang
234b6(rgyud 'bum): lhan cig/ rdo rje skyil krung sems kyis ni// sems ni g.yo ba med par bya// thigs tshul char yang dang bral ba// thigs tshul char yang dag nyid dang // thig le tshul dang char yang nang //
234b7(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor gyis ni der sems bya// char yang gi ni nang du sems// yang ni tshul gyi nang du sems// tshul ni thig ler 'gro bar bsgom// thig le yang ni stong par 'gro// stong pa rang bzhin
235a1(rgyud 'bum): zhes su bstan/ / gsum dang bral ba ma skyes mchog/ de lta bu yi cho ga yis// 'di yi cho ga'i thabs kyis ni// gang zhig rtse gcig gis ni bzlas// nges ni dngos grub
235a2(rgyud 'bum): chen po 'thob/ / zla ba gcig gis gdon mi za// dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las rang bzhin gyi bzlas pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o// // bcom ldan
235a3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo dpa' dbang phyug/ sngar ni khyod kyis dus bka' stsal// thams cad mkhyen pa mchog dbang phyug/ de yi don ni bshad du gsol// de yi dus kyi don 'di ni// spyan ring lha mo khyod
235a4(rgyud 'bum): nyon cig/ dus ni char yang zhes su bshad// de rnams kyi ni sbyor ba'i don// sbyor ba bzhi yang bzhi bzhir gyis// yan lag gcig ni spangs pa'o// rgyal ba rnams kyis rnyed dka' ba//
235a5(rgyud 'bum): de yi skye ba bdag gis bshad// rten gyi srog gi dbyig pa la// de ru sbyor ba bstan pa'o// srog gi dbyig pa dbus na gnas// phra ba'i phra ba yang dag mchog/ sum cu rtsa gnyis mdud dang
235a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ / de ni phyi rol nang du min// mdud pa yi ni gnas su sbyor// de ni char yang rnams kyi don// char yang sbyor ba nang du min// nang du de ni rtog med ma// mdud pa'i nang du g.yas dang g.yon//
235a7(rgyud 'bum): rom dang ni brkyang ma gnas// mdud pa gnyis dbus gcig cig ste// sum cu gnyis kyis bcu drug dran// bde chen 'khor lo mgrin pa gnas// lte ba'i steng ni yan chad do// sor bcu
235b1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis kyi skud pa ni/ / mdud pa med pa gcig pu'o// de 'og mdung pa dang ldan pa// rlung gi 'khor lo yan chad do// spyi bo nas ni mgrin yan chad// de tsam sbyor ba bzhi yin no// mgrin
235b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i 'og nas snying kha'i gnas/ / de tsam gzhan ni bzhi yin no// snying kha'i gnas nas lte ba'i bar// de tsam gzhan yang bzhi yin no// lte ba'i nas ni nor bu'i mgrin// de tsam gzhan ni bzhi
235b3(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / de ni sbyor ba bzhi ru bshad// char yang dga' ba dang ldan pa// 'dod dang rdul dang 'dar dang stobs// 'gro dang bdud rtsi yang yin te// dga' dang pad+mo de bzhin te// de ni dang po'i
235b4(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba bzhi/ rgyas dang rdul dang mdung dang myos// 'byung ba dang ni mtshan mo dang // mchog gi dga' dang ro yin te// de ni gnyis pa'i sbyor ba'o// 'bar dang zhi dang thig le gnas// myos
235b5(rgyud 'bum): dang 'og ma de bzhin no/ / dga' bral dga' ba dgug pa ste// de ni gsum pa'i sbyor ba'o// u ta 'bad ma tshul rlung ma// gnyid dang ma ma de bzhin no// lhan cig skyes dga' ma skyes pa/
235b6(rgyud 'bum): de ni sbyor ba bzhi pa'o// rin chen ske ru phyin tsam na// de ni zla ba gang bar dran// dga' ba yod pa'i sbyor ba ni// de ni shar bar shes par bya// bco lnga pa ni 'byung ba'i rgyu// bcu drug pa la rtog
235b7(rgyud 'bum): mi byed/ / skye dang 'dzag pa med pa'i phyir// de la sbyor ba med pa'o// char yang rnam skyed sbyor ba ni// rtse gcig gis ni khyod nyon cig/ bcu drug de bzhin nyi ma dang // gang du gnyis ka sbyor
236a1(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / de la ma skyes cha zhes bya// de rang ngo bo rang bzhin no// bcu drug de bzhin nyi ma dang // char yang 'byung ba rgyu yin no// de ni 'byung ba kun gyi pha// thabs
236a2(rgyud 'bum): dang shes rab mnyam par ldan/ / bcu drug pa ni shes rab yin// nyi ma thabs su bstan pa'o// bcu drug phan chad shes par bya// nyi ma mchog tu dran pa'o// de gnyis dbus bzhugs
236a3(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin ni/ / ngag gi lam gyis rnyed par dka'// de lta bu yi dus kyi don// yang dag par ni bdag gis bshad// 'di las gzhan mchog gsang ba ni// zhal bzangs yang dag med
236a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / 'bad pa yis ni sba bar bya// su la yang ni mi sbyin no// dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las dus kyi don gyi rang bzhin gyi don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o//
236a5(rgyud 'bum): / sngar sbas sngags kyi gsal ba de// nyon cig lha mo bdag gis bshad// dad ldan rnams kyis shes don du// dad pa med la nam yang min// hA swA Ta pha hUM hUM ya b+han+tis gIlpA/
236a6(rgyud 'bum): hA ma sa hAn+tan+d+ha rA ya dza bi ya dza rA shA de kro hA ma oM/ gsang chen po yi sngags 'di ni// thams cad don kun grub byed pa// Ta pha hAM hrIM gri dze ta dz+wa ba oM/ nye ba'i snying po'i sngags chen po//
236a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kun gyi dbang du byed// hA swA Ta pha hUM hUM ri shwa ye ma sa ta ra su oM/ khyod kyi snying po'o sngags dbang po// grangs med yon tan dang ldan no// sngags pa'i ye shes grub don du//
236b1(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i sngags ni gsal byas so// hA sA Ta pa dzI b+h+r-i kr-i oM/ khyod kyi nye ba'i snying po 'di// sangs rgyas kyis kyang rnyed dka' ba// bdag gis re yi sngags kyis ni// grangs med dbang du
236b2(rgyud 'bum): byas pa'o/ / dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le las sbas pa'i sngags gsal ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// // yang ngam du 'khyud pa byas nas skad snyan pa
236b3(rgyud 'bum): yis/ bcom ldan 'das ma legs dgyes dbang phyug mas 'di skad ces zhus so// bcom ldan ye shes mkha' 'gro nyid// mi shes mun pa 'jig byed pa// gsang ba kun ni gsungs
236b4(rgyud 'bum): pa las/ / phyag rgya chen po de ma gsungs// phyag rgya chen po ji ltar lags// rgyal ba'i dbang phyug yang dag gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rab tu bde ba'i rnam pa
236b5(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ nyon cig lha mo phyag rgya che// phyag rgya chen po gsang ba che// brjod med mi zad ma skyes pa// thams cad gzugs can gzugs dang bral// gzugs med gzugs kyi bdag
236b6(rgyud 'bum): nyid mchog/ sbom phra la sogs dang bral ba// gzhal du med pa'i rang bzhin no// yang dag dri med rnam pa'i 'od// gang du yang ni gnas med pa// shar ba ma yin nub pa min// rtag tu
236b7(rgyud 'bum): shar ba char yang mchog/ dus dang gnas skabs grol ba ste// ske dang 'jig par byed pa'o// rnal 'byor ma rnams rnyed mau dka'// rnal 'byor cung zad rnyed dka' ba// thabs mchog
237a1(rgyud 'bum): gis ni rnyed 'gyur te/ / thabs mchog med na nam yang min// dpa' bo chen po bcom ldan 'das// de la thabs ni bka' stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
237a2(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ / rtsa yi kun spyod sbyor ba yis// slob dpon kha las rnyed par 'gyur// rlung 'khor char yang gnas na ni// rlung ma gnyid ma yod pa'o// g.yas pa dang ni g.yon gyi cha// char
237a3(rgyud 'bum): yang la ni shin tu bskor/ / de gnyis khong du chud pa yis// de las mchog gi bde ba 'byung // bde ba'i nang nas phyag rgya che// the tsom med par rnyed par 'gyur// char yang dbus na rtsa yi
237a4(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / phra mo'i phra mo yang dag mchog/ rtsa yi gnas na rtsa yi gnas// de tsam la ni des khyab bo// phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin ni// lha mo chen mo de ni khyod// nga yi 'od ni yang dag khyod//
237a5(rgyud 'bum): phyi dang nang na yod pa'o// gang zhig phyag rgya mi shes pa// sangs rgyas yin yang rnal 'byor min// phyag rgya chen po'i thig le 'di// gang zhig dri med shes pa min// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor
237a6(rgyud 'bum): ma yi rgyud/ / 'bum gcig rnal 'byor des shes kyang // de lta mod kyi 'bras rab des// nam yang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// thams cad chos kun rab shes na// de ni nges par sangs
237a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas yin/ / phyag rgya chen po rab shes na// de ni dpal rdor sems dpar 'gyur// de yi rang bzhin ye shes ni// phyag rgya chen po'i mtshan nyid do// de skad ces thos nas bcom ldan 'das
237b1(rgyud 'bum): ma bye ba 'bum phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi mkha' 'gro ma dang bcas pas bskor ba lan gsum byas nas phyag 'tshal te khrag dron mos mchod do/ / bcom ldan 'das la mkha' 'gro ma thams
237b2(rgyud 'bum): cad kyis phyag rgya chen po thig le'i rgyud thos nas dga' mgu yi rangs te cang mi smra bar bzhugs so/ / yang dam du 'khyud pa byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan rnal 'byor ma yi bdag
237b3(rgyud 'bum): cung zad bdag la the tshom skyes/ / gang zhig dkyil 'khor cho ga ni// rtsa ba yi ni rgyud du bshad// bdag dang gzhan gyi gnas de ni// sngar ni bdag gis ma shes so// bcom ldan 'das kyis
237b4(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ / bdag gi gnas dang gzhan de bzhin// nyon cig yang dag bdag gis bshad// gzhan gyi gnas ni b+ha gar brjod// bdag gi gnas ni snying po'o// sgo yi phyi rol gzhan gyi gnas//
237b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi gnas ni dkyil 'khor ro// yang na gzhan gnas sbyor ba yin// nye ba'i sbyor ba bdag gnas so// sbyor ba mtho ris zhes su bstan// de bzhin du yang mi yul sbyor// nye ba'i sbyor bas
237b6(rgyud 'bum): 'og ste/ / mtho ris chos kyi snying pad+ma// nye ba'i sbyor ba ri rab rtse// mi yul lte ba'i lte ba'o// sa 'og sprul pa'i snying po ste// ri rab rtse mo gsang sna'o// de ltar gzhan ni gsang chen po// yang
237b7(rgyud 'bum): ngag gzhan du ngas ma bshad/ / 'bad de de ni bsrung bya ste/ u la yang ni mau sbyin no// rnal 'byor ma rgyud dbang phyug rgyal// rnal 'byor ma la bshad par bya// yang na sems dpa' chen po 'di/
238a1(rgyud 'bum): legs par brtags nas gsal bar bya// dpal he ru ka chen po'i dang po'i dang po grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba las kyang ches gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma
238a2(rgyud 'bum): dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le rnal 'byor ma chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i mnga' ba dag/ thams cad mkhyen pas kyang rnyed par dka' ba/ rmad du byung ba'i rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa
238a3(rgyud 'bum): brgyad pa'o/ / // dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le rnal 'byor ma chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i mnga' bdag ces bya ba rdzogs so// / rgya gar gyi slob dpon
238a4(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po dpal shes rab gsang ba'i zhal sngar ka chos kyi ye shes dang / phyug mtshams dgra bcom gyis dad cing gus pas zhus te bsgyur cing gtan la phab pa'o//
238a5(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+nyA na gar+b+ha nA ma yo gi nI ma hA tan+t+ra rA dzA ya de rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal ye shes snying po zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal
238a6(rgyud 'bum): po'i rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri rab kyi rtse mor bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi grangs kyi
238a7(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro mas yongs su bskor nas b+ha gu la chen po'i skyed mo'i tshal na bzhugs so// der bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo legs dgyes dbang mo dang lhan cig tu rol pa
238b1(rgyud 'bum): mdzad pa'i tshe rje btsun la ba spu langs so/ / de'i dus su bcom ldan 'das ma legs dgyes kyi sbyor ba las langs te lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas zhabs la mgo bos phyag btsal te/
238b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das ci'i phyir nyid kyi skul ba spu langs lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das ma de la dgos pa ci zhig yod//
238b3(rgyud 'bum): gang gi don gyi phyir nga'i sku la ba spu langs pa de ni gsang ba chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ gsang ba chen po lags mod kyang // mchog gi dbang phyug bka' stsol cig/
238b4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nga yis legs dgyes kyi bde ba nyams su myong zhing steng dang 'og na gnas pa'i dga' ba'i skyed byed ma rnams la 'dus pa las ba spu langs so// bcom
238b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ steng dang 'og na gnas pa'i dga' ba skyed byed ma rnams la 'dus pa ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ steng dang 'og na gnas pa'i
238b6(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba skyed byed ma rnams la gang zhig 'dus pa de ci'i phyir mi shes/ bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du de ltar ni lags mod kyi/ 'on kyang mi shes pa'i
238b7(rgyud 'bum): phyir bcom ldan 'das kyi drung du bdag gis ni zhus so/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'di ni so so rang gis nyams su myong ba yin mod kyang / 'on kyang khyod kyi ngor ngas bshad
239a1(rgyud 'bum): par bya ste/ dga' bral gyi dga' ba 'byung ba'i stong phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid kyi rtsa'i dra ba 'dar zhing g.yos pa tsam gyis tshul shar ro// tshul shar bas thig
239a2(rgyud 'bum): le'i rgyal po zhu'o/ / thig le'i rgyal po zhu ba las steng dang 'og na gnas pa'i dga' ba skyed byed ma rnams la 'dus pa'o// de skad ces thos nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag
239a3(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal te/ dam du 'khyud pa byas nas ma mchu'i bdud rtsi'i btung bas dgyes par byas te phyi nas yang zhu ba mdzad do// kye bcom ldan 'das dga' bral gyi dga' ba'i dus su 'dus pa lags na/
239a4(rgyud 'bum): de la sbyor ba med pa gang gi dus lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dris pa yang dag dgyes pa mchog/ sangs rgyas rnams kyis rnyed dka' ba// dga' bral dus su sbyor
239a5(rgyud 'bum): ba med/ / de ni dga' bral dga' ba min// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das dga' bral gyi dga' ba dang dga' bral la khyad par ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das
239a6(rgyud 'bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' mo khyod ci'i phyir de skad ces smra/ dga' bral gyi dga' ba dang dga' bral gnyis la khyad par cher yod pa de brjod par bya'o// gang zhig dga' bral gyi dga'
239a7(rgyud 'bum): ba de zhu ba gnas pa ste 'pho ba la sogs pa dang bral ba'o/ / gang zhig dga' bral de ni dga' ba dang bral ba zhu ba 'pho zhing 'jig pa'o// dga' bral gyi dga' ba ni zhu ba gnas pa ste/ 'gro
239b1(rgyud 'bum): ba la sogs pa dang bral ba'i phyir rang gis nyams su myong ba'i ngo bo'o/ / bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ rang gis nyams su myong ba'i mtshan nyid dga' bral gyi dga' ba dang / lhan cig/
239b2(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa'i dga' ba'i khyad par ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ni dngos po'ang ma yin// dngos po ma yin pa'ang ma yin// gsang ba'ang
239b3(rgyud 'bum): ma yin/ ye shes kyang ma yin/ ye shes las byung ba'ang ma yin/ srid pa'ang ma yin/ mya ngan las 'das pa'ang ma yin/ char yang ma yin/ thig le'ang ma yin/ tshul yang ma yin//
239b4(rgyud 'bum): tshul tsam yang ma yin/ mchog kyang ma yin/ gzhan mchog kyang ma yin/ shar ba'ang ma yin/ nub pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs kyang ma yin/ sgra'ang ma yin/ dri'ang ma yin/ ro'ang ma yin//
239b5(rgyud 'bum): reg bya'ang ma yin/ yi ge'ang ma yin/ rten yang ma yin/ brten pa'ang ma yin/ khams kyang ma yin/ shes rab kyang ma yin/ thabs kyang ma yin/ thim pa'ang ma yin/ longs spyod
239b6(rgyud 'bum): kyang ma yin/ dbang yang ma yin/ sprul pa'ang ma yin/ chos kyang ma yin/ longs spyod kyang ma yin/ lus kyang ma yin/ ngag kyang ma yin/ yid kyang ma yin/ rnam pa thams cad dang
239b7(rgyud 'bum): rnam par bral ba/ mi bzang pa/ dri ma med pa/ skye ba med pa/ 'gag pa med pa/ rtag tu shar ba'o// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ de lta bu'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba gang
240a1(rgyud 'bum): las rnyed/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dga' bral gyi dga' ba nyams su myong ba las rnyed de/ de bzhin du bsam gtan la sogs pas ma yin no// bcom
240a2(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba de dga' bral gyi dga' ba'i nyams su myong ba'i rgyu lags sam 'bras bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ldan
240a3(rgyud 'bum): cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rgyu yin te 'bras bu ni ma yin no/ / bcom ldan 'dase mas gsol pa/ lhun gyis grub pa'i lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba 'byung ba la rgyu'i dngos pos dgos pa ci mchis//
240a4(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin med pa'i phyir ro// ji ltar sreg pa la dud pa bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de skad du smra ba ni tshad ma ma yin te/ dang por sreg pa med par der dud pa 'byung ba gang
240a5(rgyud 'bum): las 'ong / de lta bu'i rigs las lhan cig skyes pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ de ltar lags na lhan cig skyes pa las dga' bral gyi dga' ba ni rgyu'ang yin la 'bras bu'ang
240a6(rgyud 'bum): yin na/ 'on kyang 'dir rgyu ni gnyis su dbye ba dang / 'bras bu'ang gnyis su dbye ste/ gsal ba'i rgyu dang / 'byung ba'i rgyu'o// 'bras bu'ang de bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol
240a7(rgyud 'bum): pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das gsal ba'i rgyu ci 'dra ba dang / 'byung ba'i rgyu ci 'dra ba bstan du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gsal ba'i rgyu ni dga' bral gyi dga' ba ste/
240b1(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar mar me bzhin no// 'byung ba'i rgyu ni dga' ba las mchog gi dga' ba ste/ ji ltar sa bon las myu gu bzhin no// dga' bral gyi dga' ba ni gzhan rnams dang mi 'dra ba'i phyir 'byung ba'i
240b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyu ma yin te/ dga' ba gzhan dang mi 'dra ba las 'byung ba yin no// dpal ye shes snying po las lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// /
240b3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ gang zhig dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las phyag rgya chen po'i don bstan pa de thob par bya ba'i don du de'i thabs bcom ldan 'das kyis
240b4(rgyud 'bum): bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyod kyis bdag la zhus pa gang // nyon cig lha mo rab tu bshad// phyag rgya chen po ni 'dir bzhir dbye ba ste/ las kyi phyag rgya dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya
240b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / chos kyi phyag rgya'o// gang zhig las kyi phyag rgya ni snang ba'i rang bzhin dga' ba'i lo dang ldan pa'o// gang zhig dam tshig gi phyag rgya de ni snang ba mched pa'i rang
240b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin skye mched kyi lo dang ldan pa'o/ / gang zhig ye shes kyi phyag rgya de ni snang ba thob pa'i rang bzhin khams kyi lo dang ldan pa'o// gang zhig chos kyi phyag rgya de ni 'od gsal gyi rang bzhin no//
240b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya chen po de'ang 'od gsal ma yin pa gzhan las mi rnyed do// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'od gsal zhes bgyi ba ji ltar lags/ gang du gnas pa
241a1(rgyud 'bum): yin/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'od gsal ni nam mkha'i dbus su gnas pa'i thig le'i ngo bo ste/ de ni phyag rgya chen po rnyed par 'gyur ro// bcom
241a2(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ re zhig 'od gsal ni ji ltar rnyed pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ las dang / dam tshig dang / ye shes dang / chos kyi phyag rgyas
241a3(rgyud 'bum): so/ / bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ phyag rgya rnam nyid ni gang las rnyed par 'gyur lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dbang bskur ba phyi'i phyag rgya la brten nas nang gi
241a4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya rnams rnyed do/ / bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ phyi dang nang gi phyag rgya de gnas gang du gnas par 'gyur/ mtshan ni ji lta bu/ rang gi ngo bo ni ji lta bu/ der dbang ni ji lta bu lags/
241a5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ 'dir dbang ni bzhi ste/ slob dpon dang / gsang ba dang / shes rab ye shes dang / de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa'o// slob dpon gyi dbang ni dga' ba'i lo dang /
241a6(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa gzhon nu ma la rdo rje dang dril bu mnyam par ldan pa yis nu ma dang 'dza' gu ni reg par byas pas so// gsang ba'i dbang ni skye mched kyi lo dang ldan pa'i gzhon nu ma la rang gi rkang yongs su 'jing
241a7(rgyud 'bum): pa las so/ / shes rab ye shes ni khams kyi lo dang ldan pa'i gzhon nu ma la lhan cig srub pa dang bsrub pa'i thabs chen po las zhu ba 'pho ba'i dus su ye shes nyams su myong bas so// de ltar
241b1(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin bzhi pa ni shes rab ye shes de nyid brtan par byed pa ste/ de'i phyir de ltar de bzhin zhes bstan pa yin no// brtan par byas pa tsam gyis drug cu rtsa bzhi'i 'dab pa'i nang du phyag rgya bzhi mnyam
241b2(rgyud 'bum): par sbyor bar 'gyur ba yin no/ / de'ang 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang / 'gro ba dang / rten pa'i ngo bos so// 'jug pa ni gtum mo'o// gnas pa ni rang bzhin gyis rtog pa med pa'o// 'gro ba ni
241b3(rgyud 'bum): bya gdong ma'i rtsa'o/ / rten pa'i ngo bos sgrog pa'i rtsa'o// don dam par phyag rgya chen po gcig pu ste/ 'on kyang las kyi rang bzhin gyis bzhir dbye'o// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ bcom
241b4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das de rnams la las kyi rang bzhin gyi bye brag ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang dang / drag po ste/ las kyi bye brag gis phyag
241b5(rgyud 'bum): rgya chen pos thob pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zhi ba dang / rgyas pa dang / dbang dang / drag po rnams kyi ming dang spyod pa ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das
241b6(rgyud 'bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ zhi ba ni rgod pa'o// rgyas pa ni lta ba'o// dbang ni lag pas 'khyud pas so// drag po ni gnyis kyis gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa'o// de rnams la spyod pa'i tshangs pa'i
241b7(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa'i spyod pa dang / brtul zhugs chen po'i spyod pa dang / gos bral gyi brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa dang / rang dbang gi spyod pas so// dpal ye shes snying po las phyag rgya chen po dang
242a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur ba'i don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o/ / // bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ dbang bskur ba'i dus su dkyil 'khor rnams ji lta bu//
242a2(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon ni ji lta bus bya/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ slob dpon gyi dbang bskur ba'i dus su rdul tshon la sogs pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// gsang ba'i dbang la bla ma la dbul ba'i
242a3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor ni rang byung gi me tog dang ldan pa'i me tog gis so/ / shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi dus su byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'i bzhi mnyam gyis so// bzhi pa'i dus su gzhan ma yin
242a4(rgyud 'bum): pa byang chub kyi sems 'ba' zhig dkyil 'khor gyis so/ / de la slob dpon ni mtshan thams cad kyis brgyan pa dang / rgyud thams cad mkhyen pa dang / dbang bskur ba la mkhas pa dang / thugs
242a5(rgyud 'bum): rje dang ldan pa dang / rgya che ba la mos pa dang / sngags la sogs pa dang / rab tu sbyor ba la mkhas pa dang / dngos grub thob pa'i slob dpon la sogs pas dbang bskur ba dang / dngos grub
242a6(rgyud 'bum): / thob pa'i bla ma'i bka'i gnang ba thob pa dang / yang na rang nyid dngos grub thob pa des ni dkyil 'khor dang / dbang bskur ba'i rim pa dang / sgrub thabs la sogs pa bya'o// de bzhin du rtog
242a7(rgyud 'bum): ge pa la sogs pas ni ma yin no/ / bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das/ slob dpon gyi ni dbang bskur ba'i// dkyil 'khor mtshan ma ji ltar lags// dkyil
242b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyi ni tshid ji tsam/ / gtso bo bdag po yang ni gang // ngo bo gang gis slob ma gzung // las kyi slob dpon ji lta bu// mchod pa rnams ni ji ltar lags// bla ma'i yon ni ji ltar lags/
242b2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyod kyis bdag la gang zhus pa// lha mo nyon cig bdag gis bshad// mtshan ma'i slob ma'i mos pas so// yang na ji ltar dkyil 'khor gyi// slob
242b3(rgyud 'bum): dpon gyi yid dang 'thad pa'o/ / de bzhini mthe bo'i sor gsum lhag pa'i khru phyed dang de'i dkyil 'khor bya'o// de ni mtshan ma'i dkyile 'khor yin te/ de'ang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi go rims
242b4(rgyud 'bum): kyis bya'o/ / de'ang yan lag thams cad tshang ba'o// de yi dbus su nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bri'o// de'i steng du sna tshogs rdo rje ste/ sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba'i nang du hUM gi rnam pa/ phyi rol du
242b5(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad dang ldan pa/ rdo rje'i 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan par bya'o// de'i shar gyi 'dab ma la 'khor lo mdog dkar po dang / lhor rin po che mdog ser po dang / nub tu
242b6(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma mdog dmar po dang / byang du ral gri mdog ljang ku dang / me'i mtshams su rin po che'i shing dang / chu'i mtshams su ze 'bru dang / rlung gi mtshams su rgyal mtshan dang / dbang ldan
242b7(rgyud 'bum): gyi mtshams su ka pA la'o/ / shar sgor rdo rje lcags kyu dang / lhor zhags pa dang / nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrog dang / byang du rdo rje dril bu'o// mtshams rnams su me tog gi chun 'phyang dang /
243a1(rgyud 'bum): bdug spos kyi reng bu dang / mar me dang / dri'i dung chos so// de'i phyi rol du rdo rje 'phreng ba'o// sna tshogs rdo rje'i lte ba'i nang du hUM gi rnam pa yongs su gyur pa las rdo rje
243a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa chen po zhal gsum pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag bzhi pa/ rgyal po'i bzhugs thabs kyis gnas pa/ rang 'od kyi reg mas 'khyud pa/ nam mkha' sngon po'i mdog can/ rgyan
243a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ brgyad gnyis kyi lo dang ldan pa/ nyi ma bya ba'i 'od dang ldan pa/ ral pa'i dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje dang / dril bu dang / rnge'u chung dang / ka pA la dang /
243a4(rgyud 'bum): kha T+wAM ga 'dzin pa'i bdag po'o// mtshan ma'i skabs su dbus su rdo rje dang rdo rje dril bus bya'o// de nas slob ma sta gon byas la sman sna tshogs kyis khrus byas pa/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi ngo
243a5(rgyud 'bum): bos slob ma gzung bar bya'o/ / las kyi slob dpon ni bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas pa/ ser sna med pa/ mtshan ma cung zad thob pa'o// der mchod pa rnams shin tu mkhas pa/
243a6(rgyud 'bum): chags pa la sogs pa dang bral ba/ mtshan ma rnyed pa/ dbang gsum thob pa'o// slob dpon la dbang bskur ba'i dus su 'am/ rgyud thos pa'i dus su shin tu gces pa'i chung ma dang /
243a7(rgyud 'bum): bu mo dang / gzhan yang gser dang / mu tig dang / nor bu dang / glang po che dang / rta dang / zhing dang / bran dang / bran mo dang / na bza' du ma la sogs pa ci tsam nus pa dbul bar
243b1(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / nor la sogs pa yod nas gang zhig mi 'bul na de ni bskal pa sbyong gi bar du dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro// longs spyod med par gyur pas kyang rang gi lus po dbul bar bya ste bran du bya'o//
243b2(rgyud 'bum): des ni tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas nyid dam/ yang na rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// lha mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sbyin pa la sogs pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas sam/
243b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ram ci/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha mo sbyin pa la sogs pa tsam gyis sangs rgyas sam/ rdo rje 'dzin par mi 'gyur te/ 'on kyang bla ma la mchod
243b4(rgyud 'bum): pas bsod nams chen po'i tshogs skye'o/ / bsod nams chen po'i tshogs bsags pa las sdig pa'i phung po zad de/ bla ma'i mchog sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rang bzhin rang gi lha'i sku yang
243b5(rgyud 'bum): dag pa dang phrad pa thob bo/ / phrad pas yang dag pa'i man ngag gnang bar 'gyur ro// man ngag thob pa las brtson 'grus chen po dang ldan pa yin na/ des tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas sam
243b6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'dzin pa thob par 'gyur ro/ / dpal ye shes snying po las dbang bskur ba dang / dkyil 'khor gyi don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// / bcom ldan 'das
243b7(rgyud 'bum): mas gsol pa/ khyod kyi dkyil 'khor ji ltar lags// mnga' bdag chen po bka' stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bdag gi dkyil 'khor dge ba ni// nyon cig lha
244a1(rgyud 'bum): mo rab tu bshad/ / gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan// dra ba dra phyed chun 'phyang dang // 'dod yon rin chen la sogs brgyan// de yi dbus su
244a2(rgyud 'bum): gzhan min bdag/ zhal bzang khyod dang lhan cig go/ phyag bzhi pa la zhal bzhi pa// spyan gsum ut+pal sngon po'i mdog/ phyag rgya drug dang ldan pa dang // sna tshogs rus pa'i rgyan dang
244a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ / zhi ba chen po'i rang bzhin can// sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du ni// 'jigs byed dus mtshon zhabs kyis mnan// rgyal po'i bzhugs thabs kyis ni bzhugs// rdo rje dril bu rnge'u chung dang /
244a4(rgyud 'bum): ka pA la dang kha T+wAM bsnams// zhal gzhan ser dang dmar dang ldang // lha mo khyod kyang bdag gi mdog/ zhal gsum ma la spyan gsum pa// phyag gnyis gri gug pad snod 'dzin// sna tshogs
244a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/ / bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ 'di yi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la// 'khor ni gang lags grangs du mchis// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang
244a6(rgyud 'bum): zhig khyod kyis bdag la zhus/ / nyon cig lha mo bdag gis bshad// dkyil 'khor phyogs bzhir dpa' chen po// shes rab yan lag mas 'khyud cing // mtshams su rdo rje ma mo bzhi// sgor na
244a7(rgyud 'bum): khros pa'i lha mo bzhi'o/ / bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ de rnams la bskyed pa'i cho ga ni gang / mdog dang / phyag rgya dang / bzhugs thabs la sogs pa ji ltar lags/ bcom
244b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ khyod dang bdag rol ba mdzad cing / srub pa dang bsrub pa'i thabs chen po'i sbyor ba'i dga' ba'i rtags las dpa' bo chen po tshangs pa zhes bya ba phyag bzhi pa
244b2(rgyud 'bum): zhal gsum pa/ spyan gsum pa/ gser gyi mdog nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rgyal po'i bzhugs thabs kyis gnas pa/ ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan pa/ shes rab ma'i yan lag gis
244b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khyud pa/ phyag rgya lnga 'dzin pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'o// rdo rje dang / dril bu dang / rde'u chung dang / ka pA la dang / kha T+wAM ga bsnams pa shar gyi 'dab mar ro// yang srub pa dang
244b4(rgyud 'bum): bsrub pa'i thabs kyi mchog gi dga' ba'i rtags las dpa' bo chen po khyab 'jug ces bya ba ma ra ka ta'i mdog lhag ma ni tshangs pa bzhin du byang du'o/ / yang srub pa dang bsrub pa'i thabs kyi dga'
244b5(rgyud 'bum): bral gyi dga' ba'i rtags las dpa' bo chen po drag po zhes bya ba mdog nag po khyab 'jug bzhin nub tu'o/ / yang srub pa dang bsrub pa'i thabs kyi lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rtags las dpa' bo
244b6(rgyud 'bum): / chen po dbang phyug ces bya ba mdog dkar po khyab 'jug bzhin lho phyogs su'o// pad+ma'i mtshams su dri zhim pa dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba'i bum pa'i steng du bdud rtsi lngas bkang ba'i ka pA la bzhi'o//
244b7(rgyud 'bum): yang srub pa dang bsrub pa'i thabs kyi ro brgyad las me'i mtshams su dpa' mo mdog dkar mo'o// chu'i mtshams su gzhan gyis mi thub ma bai DUR+Ya'i mdog go// rlung gi mtshams su dus mtshan
245a1(rgyud 'bum): ma nam mkha' sngon po'i mdog go/ dbang ldan gyi mtshams su gau rI mdog ser po'o// thams cad kyang shin tu lang tsho la bab pa zhal gcig pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag bzhi/
245a2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rgyal po'i bzhugs thabs kyis bzhugs pa/ phyag rgya lnga 'dzin pa/ phyogs kyi gos can/ gri gug dang / ka pA la dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / rde'u chung ba snam
245a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / shar phyogs kyi sgor rdo rje gtum mo ni nag mo chen mo'i mdog go/ byang sgor rdo rje 'jigs byed ma ser mo'i mdog go/ nub sgor rdo rje sgra ma dmar mo chen mo'i mdog go/ lho sgor rdo rje tsa
245a4(rgyud 'bum): ka ljang ku'i mdog go/ phyag bzhi/ zhal gcig pa/ spyan gsum pa/ g.yon brkyang ba/ na bza' spangs pa/ rim pa bzhin du nam mkha' lding dang / seng ge dang / stag dang / ma he'i
245a5(rgyud 'bum): steng na gnas pa'o/ / phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa/ mgo chen po'i chun po 'chang ba 'dzin pa/ 'jigs byed chen po mche ba gtsigs pa/ ljags 'dril ba/ dbu skyes 'bar ba/ sgra chen po'i
245a6(rgyud 'bum): sgra sgrogs pa/ ral gri dang / rtse gsum pa dang / ka pA la dang / kha T+wAM ga bsnams pa/ rang 'od kyi thabs dang 'khyud pa'o// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpa'
245a7(rgyud 'bum): bo chen po rnams la shes rab ma'i yan lag ma ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dpa' bo chen so rnams la shes rab ma'i yan lag rang rang gi mdog dang mtshungs
245b1(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ 'on kyang khyod bzhin du zhal gcig pa'o// de lta'i dkyil 'khor rgyal po ni// rnal 'byor rgyud du rnyed par dka'// dgyes pa thams cad grub byed cing // sdig pa thams cad 'jig
245b2(rgyud 'bum): par mdzad/ / bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ bcom ldan khyod dang bdag bskyed pa'i// sa bon gang lags snying po ci// nye ba'i snying po ji lta bu// 'khor gyi sngags ni ji ltar lags//
245b3(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// khyod kyis bdag la gang zhig zhus// nyon cig lha mo bdag gis bshad// sa bon ya sde'i bdun pa ni// dbyangs yig lnga pa dang ldan pa// lha mo
245b4(rgyud 'bum): chen mo thig le ldan/ / khyod kyi sa bon rab mchog go/ ya sde'i sa bon brgyad pa ni// dbyangs yig drug pa dang ldan pa// dbu ni thig le yis ni brgyan// bdag gi sa bon rab mchog go/ de
245b5(rgyud 'bum): ni sa bon gnyis ka rab/ / thams cad dbang du byed pa ni// lus can kun gyi snying la bzhugs// skye ba dang ni sdud byed do// drug pa brgyad pa bzhi pa dang // bcu gnyis pa dang bcu dang nyi//
245b6(rgyud 'bum): dang por oM dang hUM phaT mthar// bdag gi snying po rab tu mchog/ nyi shu pa dang bcu gnyis mkha'// dang po dang ni bcu drug nyi// dbang po tshangs pa hUM phaT mthar// khyod kyi snying po dgyes pa
245b7(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ dang por oM dang hUM phaT mthar// dbus su ming dang spel ba ni// tshogs kun gyi ni sngags yin te// mchod pa'i dus su mchod par bya// oM sarba mA ra bi mdza na ma hA bI ra rA dza hUM hUM pha
246a1(rgyud 'bum): phaT/ skal ldan mo de khyod kyi ni// nye ba'i snying po drag po che// oM ha haM hi ha~M haM/ ke le ke le sarba do sta pra b+ha dza ka d+hu hUM phaT phaT/ pad+ma'i zhal de bdag gi ni// 'od chen/
246a2(rgyud 'bum): nye ba'i snying po'o// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ sngags 'di la nus pa'i mthu ci tsam zhig mchis lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grub pa tsam gyis khams
246a3(rgyud 'bum): gsum thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur ro/ / rnal 'byor pa khro bo'i lta bas 'bum phrag gcig bzlas pa byed na/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po lta bu la 'bum phrag gcig gis gsod par
246a4(rgyud 'bum): byed do/ / zhi ba'i tshul gyis bzlas pa byas na grangs med pa'i nad dang / nyon mongs pa dang / dbul po dang / mdze dang / phol mig 'jig par byed do// phra mo'i grub pa brgyad skad cig
246a5(rgyud 'bum): gogis byed do/ / gzhan yang las du ma rjes su 'brang bar byed do// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ bcom ldan 'das ma legs dgyes dbang mo stan las langs nas
246a6(rgyud 'bum): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'khor thams cad dang lhan cig tu lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis mchod pa byas te/ bcom ldan 'das mchog gi dbang phyug legs
246a7(rgyud 'bum): so legs so zhes brjod nas yang gnyis su med pa'i sbyor bas bzhugs so/ / de'i dus su nam mkha' la me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i char dang / rin po che sna tshogs kyi char chen po bcom
246b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung du babs par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog dang rin po che de dag gi thog tu bcibs te/ 'khor dang bcas pa mi snang bar gyur to// dpal ye shes
246b2(rgyud 'bum): snying po las gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'byung ba'i don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o/ / // dpal ye shes snying po zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgyal
246b3(rgyud 'bum): po rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dpal shes rab gsang ba'i zhal snga nas bsgyur ba'o// dpal phyag rgya chen po'i thig le rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i phyi ma'i
246b4(rgyud 'bum): phyi ma'o/ / / rgya gar skad du/ shrI dz+nyA na ti la ka yo gi nI tan+t+ra rA dza pa ra ma ma hA ad b+hu taM nA ma/ bod skad du/ dpal ye shes thig le
246b5(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po mchog tu rmad du byung ba zhes bya ba/ dpal ye shes thig le la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de
246b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi snying po dpa' bo chen po dang / dpa' mo'i dbang phyug mas rnam par bskor nas rdo rje'i btsun mo'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so//
246b7(rgyud 'bum): der dpal nam mkha' dri med dang / shin tu stobs chen po dang / lha'i dbang phyug dang / gsang ba'i bdag po dang / 'od drag dang / nyi gra dang / mchog dga' dang / thams cad
247a1(rgyud 'bum): byed pa po dang / ut+pa la'i snying po dang / zhi ba chen po'i bdag po dang / nag po 'dul ba dang / rmad du byung ba'i dpa' bo dang / dregs chen dang / nag po chen po dreg/
247a2(rgyud 'bum): 'joms dang / ri rab brtan pa dang / nam mkha'i zhal lo// yang dpa' mo'i dbang mo'i dbang phyug ma rnams la 'di lta ste/ zla ba mo dang / g.yon pa ma dang / nyi mnyam ma dang / rlung
247a3(rgyud 'bum): za ba ma dang / bsil sbyin ma dang / snying po'i 'dab ma dang / bag yod thor cog ma dang / nyi ma 'dul ma dang / zhi ba 'chi ba'i pho nya ma dang / ldang brtson ma dang / 'od 'dun ma dang //
247a4(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa'i ma dang / khyab 'jug gi ma dang / thog kha ma dang / thams cad bskyed ma dang / dpa' bo'i yum mo// yang ma mo'i btsun mo rnams la 'di lta ste/ skam ma dang / 'jigs

247a6(rgyud 'bum): dang / 'dod pa bden ma dang / mig stong ma dang / stag ma dang / gtum mo dang / 'dod gzugs ma'o// de lta bu'i rab zhal la sogs pa dpa' bo chen po dang / dpa' mo'i dbang
247a7(rgyud 'bum): phyug ma dang / ma mo'i btsun mo bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi grangs kyi 'khor gyi dbus su legs dges chen po'i sbyor ba la bzhugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'
247b1(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug la bos te/ kye byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dang / zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang / phyag rgya
247b2(rgyud 'bum): chen po'i mtha' dang / de la rang gi ngo bo dang / rnam pa dang / tshad dag dpal ye shes thig ler grags pa nyon cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems
247b3(rgyud 'bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug 'khor thams cad dang lhan cig tu lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ sa la lta zhing cang
247b4(rgyud 'bum): mi smra bar 'dug go/ de'i tshe nam mkha' la me tog man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dang / ut+pa la dang / nyi ma'i 'od mnyam dang / chu skyes dang / pu na ka dang / a sho ka dang / tsam pa
247b5(rgyud 'bum): ka dang / ardzu na dang / na ga ge sar la sogs pa dri zhim pa'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa dang / rin po che'i char du ma bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi drung du babs so// yang bcom ldan 'das
247b6(rgyud 'bum): kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug la bos te/ khyod ci zhig la ya mtshan du gyur/ lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag
247b7(rgyud 'bum): nyid kyi dang / zla ba bde ba mchog dang / phyag rgya chen po'i mtha' dang / de la rang gi ngo bo dang / tshad dang / rnam pa yod dam ci lags zhes bdag ya mtshan du gyur lag so// dpa' bo chen po lha'i dbang
248a1(rgyud 'bum): phyug la rdo rje 'dzin pa'i mchog gis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / e ma'o de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dang / zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang / phyag rgya chen po'i mtha'
248a2(rgyud 'bum): la de'i rang gi ngo bo dang / rnam pa dang / tshad med dam ci/ de ltar ma yin na chos thams cad kyi ngo bo stong pa nyid 'di ga la shes/ mig yor tsam gyi rgyu'i rten ni chos thams cad do// de ltar gla rtsi
248a3(rgyud 'bum): la brten nas dri 'byung ba gla rtsi'i dngos po med na dri ji ltar rnyed par 'gyur/ de bzhin du rang gi ngo bos dang / chos kyi tshad dang / rnam pa dag med par gyur na/ de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid
248a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang / phyag rgya chen po'i sku'i rnyed pa med do// de bas na/ khyab dang khyab byed bye brag tu// gnyis su med pa'i bde ba che// bde ba sku la rten pa'i phyir// bde la
248a5(rgyud 'bum): brten na de nyid 'gyur/ / bde sku rnam par shes yin na// thams cad gnyis su med pa'i dngos// drug gi bde ba ye shes mchog/ bde dang sku ni gnyis las 'byung // 'khor lo drug gi dbus
248a6(rgyud 'bum): na bzhugs/ / de nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid mchog/ zla ba la sogs 'bral bdag nyid// de nyid gsum bdag rgyu ru grags// lus rten srog gi dbyug pa la// sbyor ba drug gi ye shes bzhug/
248a7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo drug gi lte ba'i dbus// phra mo'i lus ldan rtsa ni drug/ thig le dang bcas de rnams sbyor// srog gi dbyug pa'i nang du'o// bde chen 'khor lo'i lte ba yi// zla mo tshe dang ldan pa
248b1(rgyud 'bum): ste/ de ni srog dbyug rtsa ba yin// zur gsum gyi ni rnam pa'i tshul// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i lte ba yi// lce ma bde ba ldan pa ni// de ni srog gi dbyug pa'i ske// rigs kyi me tog dang 'dra ba//
248b2(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi 'khor lo'i lte ba la// nam mkha' ma ni ye shes ldan// de ni srog gi dbyug pa'i snying // ba yi mig gi rnam pa'i gzugs// lte ba sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i nang // 'od ma dang ni dus ldan ma//
248b3(rgyud 'bum): de ni srog gi dbyug pa'i ste// pad+ma rgyas pa'i rnam pa bzhin// me yi 'khor lo'i snying la yi// 'dod pa dang ldan rab 'od ma// de ni srog gi dbyug pa'i 'doms// rdo rje'i rnam pa bzhin du gsal//
248b4(rgyud 'bum): rlung gi 'khor lo'i lte ba la// stobs ni brtson 'grus ma dang ldan// srog gi dbyug pa de yi mtha'// til gyi me tog rgyas pa bzhin// de ni sbyor drug gi rnam shes// rtsa dang thig le dang ldan no//
248b5(rgyud 'bum): jog med mas ni 'khyud yin phyir// de tshe tshangs pa'i dbyug pa yin// de yi dus ni bdag gis bshad// shar dang nub pa rnam gnyis so// gang gi tshe tshangs pa'i dbyug pa la mdud pa sum cu rtsa
248b6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis yod de/ de la lce ba'i 'og tu 'pho ba bcu drug/ steng du 'pho ba bcu drug/ byang chub kyi sems dang rlung gnyis phrad pa'i phyir 'pho ba ste/ steng 'og gcig pu'i dngos po sbyor ba'i rtsa ba sum cu rtsa gnyis so// byang
248b7(rgyud 'bum): chub kyi sems dga' ba dang ldan pa'i gdu bu'i rnam pa sku dang / gsung dang / thugs kyi ngo bo gcig pu'i rtog med bde legs yid mas tshangs pa'i dbyug pa 'khyud nas/ bde ba chen po'i
249a1(rgyud 'bum): gtsug tor nas gsang ba bde ba chen po nor bu'i kha rlung gi 'khor lo yan chad / / ji ltar tsan ngan gor shina'i shing la sbrul chen po yod pa lta bu'o// lha'i dbang phyug de la
249a2(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar rang gi ngo bo bshad par bya ste/ tshangs pa'i rus pa'i dbyug pa'i snying po'i dang por zur gsum gyi rnam pa mdud pa lte ba'i srog gi rlung dang ldan pa'i byang chub kyi sems 'od kyi thig le shes rab
249a3(rgyud 'bum): ma'i lte bas zla ba yar ngo'i tshes dang po'i chu tshod gcig gi bar du 'dod pa'i dga' ba shar ba'o/ / pad+ma'i 'bras bu'i 'dod pa las 'bar bar nye ba dang ldan pa tshes gnyis kyi chu tshod gnyis kyi bar
249a4(rgyud 'bum): du stobs nub pa'o/ / drag po'i mig gi 'dus pa las 'gro ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa tshes gsum gyi chu tshod gsum gyi bar du sprin gyi thig le shar ba'i dus su'o// rigs kyi me tog gi nu ma reg pa
249a5(rgyud 'bum): las dga' ba gyen du 'gro ba dang ldan pa'i tshes bzhi'i chu tshod bzhi'i bar du nub pa'o/ / tshangs pa'i mig ma mchu'i bdud rtsi btung ba sbyin pa las rgyas pa thur du byung ba dang ldan pa tshes lnga'i chu tshod
249a6(rgyud 'bum): lnga'i bar du dbugs shar ba'i dus so/ / dung gi mig gis sen mo btab pa las drag po 'jigs pa'i tshul dang ldan pa'i tshes drug gi chu tshod drug gi bar du ut+pa la'i nub pa'i dus so// rna ba'i
249a7(rgyud 'bum): mig gi sbyor ba las byung ba'i khyab byed dang ldan pa'i tshes bdun gyi chu tshod bdun gyi bar du mgo ka la shar ba'i dus so/ / ba'i mig gis 'bras bu'i bskyod pa las mchog gi dga' ba bzhi dang
249b1(rgyud 'bum): ldan pa tshes brgyad kyi chu tshod brgyad kyi bar du yid nub pa'i dus so/ / dung gi lte ba'i nu ma dam por 'khyud pa las 'bar ba lhod pa dang ldan pa'i tshes dgu'i chu tshod dgu'i bar du snying po shar ba'i dus so//
249b2(rgyud 'bum): glang po che'i lte ba'i sgo'i sgra las thig le mtha' dang ldan pa'i tshes bcu'i chu tshed bcu'i bar du zla ba nub pa'i dus so// ut+pa la'i lte ba'i mig gi 'o las myos pa khrung khrung dang ldan pa'i tshes bcu
249b3(rgyud 'bum): gcig gi chu tshod bcu gcig bar du nyi ma shar ba'i dus so/ / pad+ma'i lte ba'i sprug cing gsigs pa las dga' bral gyi dga' ba kro d+ha dang ldan pa'i tshes bcu gnyis kyi chu tshod bcu gnyis kyi bar du drag
249b4(rgyud 'bum): po nub pa'i dus so/ / bung ba'i kha'i grong khyer las u da mi rim pa dang ldan pa'i tshe sa bcu gsum gyi chu tshod bcu gsum gyi bar du mchog gi shar ba'i dus so// rma bya'i kha'i bkum pa las tshul 'byed
249b5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang ldan pa'i tshes bcu bzhi'i chu tshod bcu bzhi'i bar du sgra nub pa'i dus so/ / rdo rje'i kha ru mnyam par sbyor ba las gnyid 'on pa dang ldan pa'i nya'i chu tshod bco lnga'i bar du ro'i shar ba'i dus so//
249b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam par rgyas pa'i til gyi me tog ha brjod pa las tshes bcu drug gi chu tshod bcu drug gi bar du lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba gsal ba dang ldan pa'i thog gi nub pa'i dus so// thog ni sngags 'jigs
249b7(rgyud 'bum): byed pa ste/ / de la nub pa bcu drug yin// shar dang nub pa gang la lar// lhan cig skyes la de yod min// yon po'i gdu bu'i rnam pa yi// rtsa yi lte dbus thig la dang // dga' ba la sogs
250a1(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / de ni nub pa'i dus so// de lta'i bde chen rnam pa yin// 'pho ba ru ni bdag gis bshad// dngos dang rten dang rnam par 'byed// ye shes dga' bral lhan rtag bzhug/
250a2(rgyud 'bum): dngos po ro mnyam lta ba yin// 'dod pa chags pa'i rnam dag byed// 'dus pa reg bya byed pa yi// dngos ni srid pa med par byed// 'o dang 'khyud pa longs spyod rnams// dngos ni dngos po rab gcod byed//
250a3(rgyud 'bum): puN+Da ri ka'i 'byung sa yi// zur gsum la sogs rten pa yis// rten ni bsam du med pa ste// chos dbyings rang gi ngo bo yin// steng dang 'og ni mnyam pa'i rten// mya ngan 'das pa rtog med byed//
250a4(rgyud 'bum): bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i rten// rigs lnga yi ni mchog gi gzhi// ye shes 'dod pa lhun gyis grub// 'dar ba dga' ba mchog gi dga'// ye shes shes pa lhun gyis grub// gzhi med pa yi lhan
250a5(rgyud 'bum): cig skyes/ / gzhi dang bcas pa dga' bral dga'// ye shes nga rgyal med par byed// chos kun rnam par shes pa ste// ye shes shes bya don grub byed// rnam par 'byed pa 'od gzugs grags//
250a6(rgyud 'bum): tshul dang sprin dang stobs bdag nyid// rnam par 'byed pa dngos kun tu// rnam pa'i gzhi dang bcas pa thim// skye dang gnas pa sgyu 'phrul gyi// rnam par 'byed pa gti mug gsod// 'khor lo sngag
250a7(rgyud 'bum): dang bya ba la/ / 'joms byed de ni rnam par 'byed// rtsa yi snying po thams cad ni// bcom pa'i phyir na rnam par 'byed// ye shes kyi ni snying po'i mtha'// rnam par 'byed pa gsol ba yin// ye
250b1(rgyud 'bum): shes shin tu bde byed phyir/ / rnam par 'byed par de phyir brjod// gnyis su med pa mchog zhi ba// chags pa dang ni chags bral min// dri ma med pa bcos med pa// rgyud dang sngags dang rim pa bral// /
250b2(rgyud 'bum): rang rig pa dang brjod du med// thams cad khyab cing dpe byad med// de lta bu ni don dam pa// lha yi dbang phyug rnam par 'byed// sangs rgyas byang chub sems kun gyi// thugs kar rtag tu bzhugs
250b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / rnam par 'byed la sgom pa med// phung po khams la sogs dang bral// sgra la sogs pa'i chos kyis stong // stong dang snying rje'i bdag nyid yin// tshangs pa khyab 'jug drag po dang //
250b4(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug rtag tu zhi ba dang // de rnams kun gyi yab yin no// 'byed pa dang ni mchog rmad byung // de nyid ye shes thig le 'dir// mchog rnams grub pa'i mnga' bdag go// 'byung ba kun gyi
250b5(rgyud 'bum): nang yod pa/ / sku lnga'i bdag nyid rab mchog yin// mkha' 'gro dbang phyug lnga bdag po// nam mkha' bdag nyid skye med do// nam mkha' lnga yi nang du thim// sangs rgyas kun gyis phyag byas pa//
250b6(rgyud 'bum): de lta'i gsang chen ye shes ni// ye shes dbang po rnyed dka' ba// ji ltar nor ni rkun mo yis// ma rnyed byed ltar 'bad pas smra// dpal ye shes thig le las 'pho ba'i dus shar ba dang nub pa zhes
250b7(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i le'u ste dang po'o/ / / lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das/ de nyid gsum bdag nga ro ci// de bzhin zla ba bde ba mchog/ phyag rgya chen po'i rnam pa
251a1(rgyud 'bum): cing de yi mtha' ni ji ltar lags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de nyid gsum ni sku gsung thugs// rdo rje gsung ni ye shes mchog/ zla ba bde ba mchog ces/
251a2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ de yi phung po dbang po khams// phyag rgya chen po rdor snying po// de yi mtha' ni b+ha gar dran// mtha' dang snang ba rnam par shes// chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong // chos kun rang bzhin dri ma med//
251a3(rgyud 'bum): snang ba las ni thams cad 'byung // skye ba dang ni 'gag pa med// yang dag 'od las thams cad 'byung // de'i phyi rol chos thams cad kyi bdag nyid ni bcom ldan 'das dpal ye shes thig le'o//
251a4(rgyud 'bum): de la dang po rnam pa dang bcas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo'i bskyed pa sgom pa dang / sngags dang / bzlas pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / mchod sbyin dang / gtor ma dang / mchod pa dang /
251a5(rgyud 'bum): gnas kyi brjod pa dang / dbang bskur gyi rim pa de dag bshad do// dpal ye shes thig le las de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid dang / zla ba mchog gi bde ba dang / phyag rgya chen po'i mtha' la sogs
251a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyogs tsam bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o/ / // lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ tshangs pa'i rus pa srog gi dbyug pa'i ster dang 'og gi 'pho ba cha gnyis su rtsa sum cu
251a7(rgyud 'bum): rtsa gnyis kyi rang bzhin las le'u dang por gang gsungs pa ni de rnams kyi nang nas gcig tu rtog med bde legs yid ma gcig tu nges par bstan par mdzad kyi/ bcom ldan 'das rtsa gzhan rnams//
251b1(rgyud 'bum): ci'i don phyir 'dir ma gsungs/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gcig pu rtog med bde legs ma de ni bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi rtsa phra mo'i dra ba rnams rol mo'i don du byas nas/
251b2(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs kyi bdud rtsi bsam gyis mi khyab pa chos kyi 'byung gnas chen po'i sa stengs su 'byung zhing skye ba'i char 'bab pa'i don du bstan pa'o// lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ de ltar lags
251b3(rgyud 'bum): mod kyis kyang / rtsa sum cu rtsa gcig po rnams kyi mtshan dang grangs 'dir mchog gi dbang phyug la bka' drin zhu'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i dbang phyug sum cu rtsa gcig
251b4(rgyud 'bum): gi ming rnams nyon cig/ gsang ba dang / zab pa dang / sred pa dang / phra mo dang / bdud rtsi ma dang / bdud rtsi khri ma dang / dag pa ma dang / bde ba ma dang / stobs ma dang / thabs ma dang /
251b5(rgyud 'bum): hUd hrung ma dang / ser ma dang / 'o rgyun ma dang / dga' ma dang / snum ma dang / khro ma dang / mngar ma dang / skyur ma dang / kha ba ma dang / bska ba ma dang / tsha ma dang / lan tshwa ma dang /
251b6(rgyud 'bum): rtsub ma dang / dad ma dang / stobs ma dang / dga' byed ma dang / dga' sbyin ma dang / gnyid ma dang / bcang skyed ma dang / khong chung ma dang / tshe ma ste/ de dag ni rtsa sum cu rtsa gcig ste/ steng
251b7(rgyud 'bum): dang 'og tu 'pho ba gnyis kyi zla ba dang nyi ma gzas zin pa'i dus su tshogs rgyas pa'o/ / de nas dbang gi rim pa bshad de/ ji lta yin go rims su// dbang bskur mchog ni rnyed pa gang // thams
252a1(rgyud 'bum): cang du ni nus par 'gyur/ / yon tan tshul khrims ldan pa'i bu// bla mas dang por dbang bskur byas// khrus byas mig dag ras kyis dgab// snyim pa me tog gis bkang
252a2(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ / yon phul nas ni dga' dang bcas// lha yi dbang phyug dbang bskur byas// dbang bskur nas ni sangs rgyas sa// the tshom med par rnyed par 'gyur// de bas kun tu rab 'bad de// dpal
252a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan dbang rgyal blang bar bya/ / dbang bskur bzhi ru phye ba ni// slob dpon la sogs dbye ba yin// dang por slob dpon gyi ni dbang // gnyis pa de ni gsang ba'i dbang // gsum pa shes rab ye
252a4(rgyud 'bum): shes dbang / / de ltar de bzhin bzhi pa'o// bzhi gnyis rab tu dbye ba ni// slob dpon dbang la sogs par bskur// rdo rje slob dpon dbang gsum du// nam mkha' mnyam du bdag gis
252a5(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / de gnyis la ni bcu gcig phye// rdo rje slob dpon dbang rgyal lo// dbang bskur de ni rin po che// khams gsum gyis ni phyag byas pa// thar par 'gro ba 'grub don du// 'di ru rim pas
252a6(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis bshad/ / chu dang dbu rgyan rdo rje dang // dril bu ming dang brtul zhugs dang // lung bstan pa dang skabs sbyin dang // phyag rgya sngags dang ye shes so// rnal 'byor rgyud la mos pa la//
252a7(rgyud 'bum): dbang brgyad phye la sbyin par bya// rnal 'byor bla ma la mos la// bcu gcig bdag nyid sbyin par bya// rnal 'byor ma la mos pa rnams// gsang ba'i dbang ni sbyin pa'o// gsang ba gnyis su dbye
252b1(rgyud 'bum): bar gsungs/ / de ni phyi dang nang gis so// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor bla ma'i phyi// dbang bskur shes pas sbyin par bya// nang gi rnal 'byor ma yi rgyud// gsang ba'i dbang ni rab tu sbyin// de ni gsang
252b2(rgyud 'bum): ba gsum du dbye/ / skye dang mdud dang de bzhin sang // shes rab rnam pa gnyis su dbye// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i bye brag go// shes rab brgyad gnyis lo dang ldan// spyan rings cha la mkhas pa dang /
252b3(rgyud 'bum): yan lag tsan dan gsar pa'i dri// shin tu 'jam pa'i khu bas tshim// gzugs bzang sngo la skal ldan ma// 'o 'dzin mkhrang zhing 'jam la mtho// bsam gtan sngags la dad cing zhi// dbang
252b4(rgyud 'bum): bskur dang ldan thugs rje grub/ / de lta'i rab grags 'bad de btsal// dbang gi don du bla ma zhu// de kun mtshan nyid dang ldan pa// chung ma yang na sring mo 'am// bu mo yang na mna' ma 'am/
252b5(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pas 'bad de blang bar bya// rang gi rigs ni ji bzhin rnyed// khu ba dang bcas gzhon nu ma// sna tshogs rgyan gyis legs par brgyan// mkhas pas bla ma la ni dbul// dbang gi man ngag
252b6(rgyud 'bum): gsum du bzhugs/ / nang gi yo ni brda byed pa// bzhi pa 'bras bu'i ngo bor grags// gsum dang bral ba'i gsum bdag nyid// dga' ba la sogs bye brag tu// rdo rje gzhon du mas gsal dbye//
252b7(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur gyis ni 'khor los sgyur// the tsom med par yin par 'gyur// dbang gis dzam med par byed// chu la sogs pas ras bkrus bzhin// cho ga thams cad rdzogs pa'i dbang // lan
253a1(rgyud 'bum): lag de nyid dang ni bcas/ / gcig nas gcig tu rim pas brgyud// bla ma rab kyi zhal nas blang // gzhan du rtog ge'i tshogs la mkhas// sgra yi bstan bcos rtag mos la//
253a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang gi mchog ni rnam pa gsum// blang bar mi bya sbyin mi bya// yang dag 'bras bu 'dod pa na// de ni ring du spang bar bya// de ltar yang bye ma du ma bsdus pa'i phung po la 'bad de rnam par btsir bas
253a3(rgyud 'bum): mar khu'i thigs pa phyed kyang mi 'byung ngo / / de bzhin du rtog ge mang po dang / ngag gi dra ba dang ldan pa bstan pa'am/ nyan pa las ni de la nyon mongs pa 'ba' zhig las gzhan 'bras bu ni rnyed pa med
253a4(rgyud 'bum): do/ / de bas na gcig nas gcig tu rim pas brgyud de rnyed pa'i dbang shes pa de ni rdo rje slob dpon bla ma chen po'o// mi gsal mchog gi bkra shos can// sangs rgyas 'bras bu sbyin pa'i sprin//
253a5(rgyud 'bum): bla ma'i gzugs so gzhan ma yin// bsod nams thams cad kyi ni gnas// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // tshangs pa brgya byin khyab 'jug lha// de kun gyis ni bdag mchod 'os//
253a6(rgyud 'bum): ma grags kyang ni grags gzugs yin// de ltar shes nas sgrub pa pos// 'bad pa yis ni mchod par bya// bla ma'i zhal snga mchod byas na// ci 'dod pa yi 'bras bu rnyed// rgyud kyi don nam dbang
253a7(rgyud 'bum): gi don/ / shes nas bla ma mi mchod pa// sa steng nyi zla yod bar du// de ni mnar med pa ru 'gro// de bas kun tu 'bad pa yis// gus pas bla ma mchod par bya// rin chen sna tshogs bzor byas
253b1(rgyud 'bum): legs/ / gser gyi pad+ma dri ma med// mu tig do shal rin thang med// sna tshogs du ma yi ni gos// gces pa'i btsun mo bu dang bcas// glang chen rta dang bran la sogs// dpal ldan bla ma'i spyan
253b2(rgyud 'bum): snga ru/ / dang gus brtan pas dbul bar bya// dpal ye shes thig le las yon dbul ba dang bcas pa'i dbang gi rim pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// de nas
253b3(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang rab bshad nyon/ / gnas kyi rnyed pa ji bzhin don// ka ba gcig dang sgo dgur ldan// rdo rje rtsig pa'i rgyan dang ldan// rdo rje'i thig dang bla re ni// kun tu yongs su bskor ba yin// rlung la
253b4(rgyud 'bum): sogs pa'i rim pas dbye/ / 'byung ba bzhi dang ldan pa yin// ji snyed nam mkha'i mtha' kun tu// thams cad bdag nyid rtag tu bzhugs// rdo rje gur gyi dbus su ni// srung ba'i 'khor lo
253b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor bzhin pa/ / rtsibs bcu pa la gser gyi mdog/ khro bo bcu dang bcas pa'o// khro bo thams cad zhal gsum pa// spyan gsum pa la phyag rgya drug pa// g.yas brkyang bas bzhugs pa/
253b6(rgyud 'bum): gsus pa smyo ba/ sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ ljags 'dril ba/ mche ba 'jigs par gtsigs pa/ dbu skra ser po gyen du 'greng ba/ ag tshoms dang smin ma che zhing ring ba ste/ shar gyi
253b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo'i rtsibs le gshin rje gshed sku mdog nag po g.yas dang g.yon pa'i zhal gnyis ni ser ba dang dmar po/ phyag g.yas gnyis na ral gri dang rtse gsum pa/ phyag g.yon gnyis nathong
254a1(rgyud 'bum): pa dang dbyug pa'o/ / lho phyogs kyi rtsibs la shes rab mthar byed dkar po g.yas kyi zhal dmar ba/ g.yon sngo ba/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis kyis dbyug pa dang ral gri
254a2(rgyud 'bum): phyag g.yon pa gnyis na mtshon rtse gcig pa dang mgo bo'o/ / nub tu pad+ma mthar byed dmar po zhal g.yas dkar zhing g.yon sngon po/ g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag bzhin ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang /
254a3(rgyud 'bum): zla ba phyed pa dang / ri rab zur brgyad pa'o// byang du bgegs mthar byed sngon po g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal gnyis ni dkar po dang dmar po'o// g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyag bzhin rdo rje rgya gram
254a4(rgyud 'bum): dang / / ral gri dang / mdung thung / me'i mtshams su 'dod pa'i rgyal po'i gzugs can g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal gnyis ni dkar ba dang dmar ba/ g.yas kyi phyag gnyis na ral gri dang rin
254a5(rgyud 'bum): po che/ phyag g.yon na sta re dang mdung thung ngo // srin po'i mtshams su dbyug pa sngon po chu srin 'dzin ser po'i gzugs/ g.yas dang g.yon gyi zhal ldang ba dang dmar ba/ phyag g.yas gnyis
254a6(rgyud 'bum): nargya gram rtse gsum dang ral gri/ phyag g.yon gnyis na sa la'i shing chen po dang / de bzhin du me'o// rlung mtshams su stobs po che ngu ba'i mdog g.yas pa dang g.yon pa'i zhal gnyis ni ser ba
254a7(rgyud 'bum): dang dmar po/ phyag bzhi la ral gri dang / dung dang / 'ga' ta dang / rnga ma'o// dbang ldan gyi mtshams su mi g.yo mgon dkar nag zhal g.yon dmar po dang g.yas sngon po/ g.yas g.yon
254b1(rgyud 'bum): gyi phyag bzhin ral gri dang / lcags kyu dang / pi wang dang / rde'u chung ngo // steng du gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba sku mdog ser po g.yas dang g.yon pa'i zhal gnyis ni sngo ba dang dkar ba
254b2(rgyud 'bum): phyag bzhin 'khor lo dang / ral gri dang / ka pA la dang / kha T+wAM ga'o// 'og tu sum b+ha'i rgyal po sku mdog nam mkha' ltar sngo ba/ g.yas kyi zhal mthon mthing chen po'i 'od can// g.yon
254b3(rgyud 'bum): pa ni nyi ma gzhon nu'i 'od can/ g.yas kyi phyag gnyis na ral gri dang lcags kyu/ g.yon gnyis na gri gug dang thod pa'o// thams cad kyi rtsa ba'i phyag gnyis kyis rdo rje dang pad+ma bsnams pa/
254b4(rgyud 'bum): rang gi 'od kyi shes rab ma la 'khyud pa'o// 'dod pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa ni 'jig rten skyong ba brgyad kyi steng du'o// gtsug tor 'khor los sgyur ba dang sum b+ha'i rgyal po ni zla ba dang nyi ma'i steng
254b5(rgyud 'bum): du shes par bya'o/ / 'di'i 'khor lo'i lte ba gru gsum gyi gzugs te ri bong can dkar po'i 'od chos kyi 'byung gnas so// de'i dbus su sngar bstan pa'i 'byung bzhi ji lta bu'i rim pas/
254b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam par snang mdzad yongs su gyur pa las dur khrod brgyad dang ldan pa'i gzhal yas khang yangs pa chen po'i 'phar ma gnyis nyi ma'i gdan du sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad kyi lte bar 'jigs byed
254b7(rgyud 'bum): dang dus mtshan gyi bde byed ma'i steng du tshul dang thigs pa'i rang gi ngo bo A li dang kA li gnyis las byung ba/ maM hUM las dpal ye shes thig le phyag rgya chen pos 'khyud cing zhal brgyad pa
255a1(rgyud 'bum): drug bcang / gams brkyang ba/ zham byan ni gnag pa dang me ba/ dmar ba dang ljang tshus/ gnan mnan mut+pa ma ldan pa'i bdabs lta du'o// dzadza dang /
255a2(rgyud 'bum): dang / che rlung dang / ke pA la dang / kha rA ga dang / ral gri dang / mnga' gcu'o// sna tshogs rdo rje 'thab ches pas ral pa'i dbu rgyan dang / dpral bar thod pa'i steng du mi bsgod
255a3(rgyud 'bum): co pan can no/ / phyag rgya drug gis sku bcings pa/ rgyu mas brgyus pa'i mgo bo chen po'i do shal gyis sku brgyan pa/ tshangs pa'i pags pa rkang pa'i sham thabs can gyi skur bzhengs shing

255a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / dpal ye shes thig le las dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bskyed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// / da ni sngags mchog bshad bya ba// sgrub pa po ni 'grub
255a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba/ / sa yi cha ni mnyam pa'i mchog/ sbrang rtsig pur gyis ni byug/ dri zhim pa yi me tog bkram// me tog gis ni chal par dgram// chu ngogs yang na thang stong du// rdo rje srung
255b1(rgyud 'bum): pa yis ni bskor/ / mig mdzes rdo rje gzhon nu ma// zla ba 'ims pad+ma khengs// lang tshe ga sar la reg bya 'jam// dang po mkhas pas 'jug par bya// sngags kyi gnas su lugs ji
255b2(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ / legs dgyes shin tu sbyor bar bya// de yi sbyor bas gang zhig 'byung // kha dang sa sogs mchod par bya// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bya// rdo rje yi ni phur bu bcu// mkhas pas
255b3(rgyud 'bum): khro bo'i sngags kyis gdab/ / A l-i kA l-i mnyam byas nas// 'dab ma kun la rim pas dgod// A li ye shes 'dab mar gcig/ kA l-i 'dab ma mdun du dra// 'dab ma re re mi
255b4(rgyud 'bum): ge lnga/ / lnga pa lnga ni lnga la'o// 'dab ma gnyis su bzhi gnyis te// k+Sha yi yig 'bru ste nang ngo // dbyangs yig gsal yig bye brag tu// A li kA li 'du shes yin// gnyis kyi yi ge
255b5(rgyud 'bum): 'dab ma yis/ / sngags kyi rgyal po de nyid dran// dang po'i gzugs kyis rgyal po'i dbang // de nas 'dab gnyis kyi dang por// bzhi pa'i dbyangs yig dang bcas pa// 'og tu re pa yis
255b6(rgyud 'bum): ni brgyan/ / de nas nyi shu rtsa ldan// 'dab ma gnyis pa'i bzhi pa'o// dbyangs yig gnyis pa dang ldan pa// khro bo'i ngan 'gro dag byed pa// 'dab gnyis dang po bzhi pa yin// de nas gsal
255b7(rgyud 'bum): byed pa yis brgyan/ / 'ong ba gnyis dang po'i gnyis pa yin// ldan pa thams cad rims 'phrog byed// gsal byed pa la gsum pa ste// bcu pas yang dag ldan pa'o// dbyangs kyi yin
256a1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa yis/ / lha yi dbang phyug brgyan pa'o// bzhi pa'i lnga pa gang yin dang // de nas de yi dang po'o// bcu drug pa la gsum pas ldan// thams cad sngags kyi tshig/
256a2(rgyud 'bum): gi gzhi// de nas sa ni dag pa dang // de bzhin gsal byed dang po'o// yan lag gsal byed sum cu gsum// dbyangs yig drug pa yang dag ldan// thams cad kyi ni 'byung ba'i gzhi//
256a3(rgyud 'bum): zla tshes thig le rnam par brgyan// de ni de dang nye bar gnas// sems kyi dbang phyug yi ge mchog/ gang zhig lnga pa'i gnyis pa dang // gsum pa'i dang po dang ldan pa// mthar ni swA hA ldan
256a4(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ / snying po'i sngags ni rmad byung mchog/ dang po ru ni gzugs kyi mchog/ 'dab ma gnyis pa'i bzhi pa'o// 'og tu re pha yang dag ldan// dbyangs kyi yi ge bzhi pas sbyar// rig
256a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyal po'i yi ge mchog/ thig le yis ni mgo bo mnan// de rang du ni nye bar gnas// thams cad zhi ba zhi pa'i mchog/ thigs pa mnan pas sum cu gsum// bcu drug pa ni gnyis
256a6(rgyud 'bum): par ldan/ / yang ni de nyid yi ge mchog/ khams gsum mun pa sel bar byed// hUM phaT de ni gnyis ka sbyar// tha mar sA hA yis ni ldan// nye ba'i snying po'i sngags zhes bya// bcom ldan
256a7(rgyud 'bum): ye shes thig les so/ / dang por rnam par snang mdzad dag/ nyi shu rtsa dgu de nas si// gsal byed pa no gzhi gnyis pa// nyi shu rtsa bdun pas ni ldan// nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa yi gzhan/
256b1(rgyud 'bum): / dbyangs kyi yi ge bdun pas bdun// bzhi pa las ni gsum pa'o// de dang nye bar rlung yin no// dbyangs yig bcu gcig pa dang ldan// 'bras bu thams cad don sbyin no// lnga pa yi ni lnga pa
256b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / / ha yi yig 'bru de dang nye// lnga pa yi ni gsum pa dang // nyi shu rtsa brgyad de nas so// lnga pa yi ni dang po dang // nyi shu rtsa bdun de nas so// dbyangs yig gi ni gnyis pas ldan// khams
256b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum dgug par nus pa'o/ / gsal byed kyi ni dang po dang // nyi shu rtsa bdun pa ni ldan// nyi shu rtsa lnga pa dag dang // dbyangs kyi yi ge gnyis pas ldan// nyi shu rtsa drug yi ge mchog/ dbyang
256b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi yi ge bcu gcig ldan/ / swA hA mtha' ru ldan pa ni// hUM hUM phaT kyis spel bar bya// de ni phyag rgya che snying po// yid bzhin rin chen mnyam pa'i 'od// dang po yi ni pra Na pa// de nas 'dab
256b5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa yi gsum/ / ya yi sde tshan gnyis pa dang // nyi shu rtsa dgu de nas so// dbyangs kyi yo ge gsum pa yis// snying la khong du chud par bya// drug cu rtsa ba ni phyed dag pa// ra yi yig
256b6(rgyud 'bum): 'bru de dang mnyam/ / tha mar swA hA dang ldan pa// hUM hUM phaT ni spel ba yin// nye ba'i snying po sngags chen po// thams cad sngags kyi bdag po mchog/ oM shrI ma hA ka ru Na kru ta/ ma hA be be da/
256b7(rgyud 'bum): s+pha ra Na ma hA kalpAn tAg+ne/ sa ma pra b+ha dza ya bi dza ya a mA hA sa/ ma hA g+ho ra g+ho ra shwa ra ma hA bI ra bI re shwa ra/ ma hA ru dre raM traM ma le Da ra/ su ma sUr+ya ag+ni lo tsa ne/ A kA sho da ra/ ma hA sA gar
257a1(rgyud 'bum): klog ge/ han ha na/ da ha daha/ bcab tsa/ ma tha ma tha/ bi d+hi sa ya dzi dz+nyA sa ya/ A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya/ b+hany+dza ma b+hany+dza sa/ tsun ya tsUd+ha ya/ ha ha ha ha/
257a2(rgyud 'bum): him hA ru d+hi ra/ pA Ni mdzA ya hUM hUM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT+Ta phaT phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA kro d+he shwa rA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA bai be De sA raNA ya hU~M phaT swAhA/ oM ma hA kalpAn+te ag+ne sa ma pra b+hA ya hUM phaT
257a3(rgyud 'bum): swA hA/ oM dza ya bi dza yAT+TAr+tha hA sA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA g+ho ra g+ho re shwa ra ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA bI ra bI re shwa rA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA ru dre rAn+ta mA lA d+ha rA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM su ma sUr+ya
257a4(rgyud 'bum): ag+ne lo tsa nA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM A kA she da rA ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma hA su ka ra ko ke ni hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ha na ha na hUM phaT swA hA/ oM da ha da ha hUM phaT swA hA/ oM pa tsa pa tsa hUM phaT swA hA/
257a5(rgyud 'bum): oM ma da ma da hUM phaT swA hA/ oM bi d+h+wa~M sa ya bi d+h+waM sa ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM b+hAny+dza ya b+hany+dza ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM tsu rna ya tsur+Na ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ha ha
257a6(rgyud 'bum): hahUM phaT swA hA/ oM tsa hi hi hi hUM phaT swA hA/ oM ma ny+dzu ru d+hi ra pA Ni mdza ya hUM phaT swA hA/ oM hUM hUM hrI hUM hUM phaT swAhA/ oM phaT phaT phaT phaT hUM phaT swA hA/ 'phreng ba'i sngags ni mchog gi lha// las
257a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad ni rab grub byed/ / oM ma hA kA ma rU pe 'i yi sa ra sa ra/ baM sar po sa ra/ A gats+tsha A~M gats+tsha/ sarba dz+ra sA d+ha ya sA d+ha ya/ sarba mA ra/ ni ma tha ni mtha/ ma hA bI ra bI ri shwa ra sa p+ta bA/
257b1(rgyud 'bum): tA la/ bad ra N+De/ sap+ta swA kar/ u Nis d+ha n+tes ts+tshin+te/ dam+ba ne/ g+hAm+b+ha ne/ lo kyaHmaM ka re/ !ha ha tid+han+tu/ ka lai k+She me/ snre le s+ye l+ye/ le d+hi le/ nI m+le N+De le/ ma thAka
257b2(rgyud 'bum): sem pra bA ma dz+nyA swA pAHswA u0f7f/ 'phreng ba'i sngags ni mchog gi / bcom ldan mo yi bdag gis bstan/ hat+kang+ku/ kyA k+Sha/ mra/ tra~M// / rmAmra/ d+hAdz+dza
