270a1(rgyud 'bum): gnas kyi mdor bstan pa dang / sbyin sreg dang / gtor ma chen po'i rim pas 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la nges pa'i don bstan pa bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom
270a2(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ / sngags kyi bzlas pa'i nges pa'i don// nyon cig yang dag bdag gis bshad// dga' ba la sogs pa las 'byung // yid ni sngags zhes brjod pa yin// yang ni
270a3(rgyud 'bum): srub dang bsrub pa'i sngags/ / sngags ni bdud rtsir bstan pa'o// lam gyi thar pa de ni sngags// tshigs rgyas pa ni de bzhin no// phrad pa gnyis kyi dbus na gnas// de ni don dam pa yi sngags//
270a4(rgyud 'bum): sngags ni A li kA li yin// brjod pa de ni bzlas pa'o// bskyed dang rdzogs dang bye brag tu// sngags kyi bzlas pa rab tu grags// gang du ske dang rkan ni gnyis// bskyod pa gang du mi 'byung ba//
270a5(rgyud 'bum): srog gi rtsa ba'i nang yod pa// lugs dang lugs min rgyun mi 'chad// thig le gsum dang yig gsum dag/ rang 'od ma bcos brjod par bya// rkan gyi nang du lce 'jug pa// ro ma yis ni mnan
270a6(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / yang na rtse mo'i cha yis reg/ mnyam sbyor rnam pa'i bsam gtan gyis// grags pa yod pa'i bdud rtsi bzhin// de nas tshul ni 'byung bar 'gyur// sprul pa'i rim pa'i bye brag tu//
270a7(rgyud 'bum): thig le drangs pa bde ba'i sku// mchod sbyin dkyil 'khor gyis ni brgyan// de yi bskyed rim bdag gis bshad// dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa yis// dgyes pa'i gnas bsten mchod sbyin no//
270b1(rgyud 'bum): mchog dga' 'byung ba'i mchod sbyin ni// rab kyi dkyil 'khor de ru bya// mchog gi dga' ba 'khor bar bstan// kA li ye shes mtshan nyid do// sku brgyang bdag nyid mchod sbyin ni// gnas
270b2(rgyud 'bum): brgyang par ni mchod par bya/ / ji bzhin rnal 'byor ma yi 'byung // de yi don ni bdag gis bshad// sum cu rtsa gnyis yig gzugs kyis// kA li'i thig les gtso bo'i phyir// sgom pa'i dbang
270b3(rgyud 'bum): pos gnas la sogs/ / lha mo bcas pas mchod par bya// lha mo kun dang gnas la sogs// lha yi dbang phyug skyabs yin no// lha mo 'di ru rtsa yin te// 'byung ba dang ni gnas sa byed// /
270b4(rgyud 'bum): skyabs las rnam par rdzogs pa yin// mtshan dang dpe byad ldan pa'o// glu gsum dbus su bcom ldan 'das// ut+pal sngon po'i mdog dang 'dra// sna tshogs pad+ma'i gdan dbus su// bdud
270b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhi yi ni steng na bzhugs/ / zhal ni bcu drug phyag bcu drug/ zhal ni so sor spyan gsum mo// ser po dmar po ljang ku'i zhal// ri bong can ni g.yon bskor zhing // zhal gzhan kun ni bung ba
270b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ / steng gi zhal ni 'jigs pa'o// gshin rje'i pags pas rnam dkris byas// dam bcas don phyir brtul zhugs don// sangs rgyas 'phreng ba'i do shal byas// mgo ba yo ni chun 'byung
270b7(rgyud 'bum): brgyan/ / gar dgu yi ni ro dang ldan// sku ni phyag rgya drug gis mdzes// sna tshogs rus pa'i rgyan dang ldan// sna tshogs 'od kyi snang bas 'bar// ye shes mkha' 'gro bde 'che// legs dkyis
271a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang mo gnyis med sbyor/ / dur khrod kyi ni thal bas byugs// steng du bgrang pas bde bar bzhugs// g.yas brkyang ba yi gar dang ldan// gsang ba'i don gnas brda byed/
271a2(rgyud 'bum): pa/ mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs kyis bskor// dur khrod brgyad kyi dbus na bzhugs// rdo rje dril bu gnyis med sbyor// tshangs pa yi ni pags pas khebs// mda' gzhu 'khor lo rin chen dang //
271a3(rgyud 'bum): ral gri rtse gsum rnge'u chung dang // zla ba nyi ma star snod// kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa'o// bcom ldan 'das ma de dang 'dra// yang na phyag ni gnyis ma'o// rdo rje gri gug 'dzin pas 'khyud// zhi ba spyan ni
271a4(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa'o/ / nang gi 'phar ma dgyes pa ni// zla ba gang ba bzhin du bdag/ sna tshogs pad+ma yi ni gzhi// 'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam par mdzes// phyi ma gru bzhi ru ni grags// sna tshogs rdo rje'i
271a5(rgyud 'bum): steng du'o/ / yi dgas chen po'i 'phreng bas ldan// sna tshogs dpa' bos nye bar mdzes// sna tshogs pa yi shing gis bskor// sna tshogs rnal 'byor ma dang ldan// de'i nang du gru gsum gyi phyag
271a6(rgyud 'bum): rgya'i grwa ni dpal u rgyan dang / dz+wa lan d+ha ra dang / pA li ras+t+waM/ mgo bo dang / gtsug pud dang / spyi bor legs dgyes rdo rje ma dang / rdo rje 'tshed ma dang / rdo rje glang chen ma bcom ldan 'das la
271a7(rgyud 'bum): skul bar byed cing phyag gi 'phar ma 'bar bar ro/ / ro mchog chen po'i snod kyis mchod sbyin 'bul bar byed cing tshangs pa'i bu gar rtse sbyar gyi phyag rgya byed pa ste/ mthe'u chung lu gu rgyud du sbrel
271b1(rgyud 'bum): te lhag mas mthe bong mnan nas mdzub mo sbyar ba 'og tu bcings pa'i sku yi dgas chen po'i steng na g.yon brkyang bas gnas pa/ spyan gsum pa/ skra gral zhing na bza' grol ba/ chu skyes
271b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas pa/ bcom ldan 'das la lta zhing bzhugs pa'o// shar gyi phyogs su sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte bar kA ma ru pa sde smin ma'i dbus su 'jigs ma'o// de'i shar gyi 'ad
271b3(rgyud 'bum): mar mA la wa ste/ sna'i rtse mor dpa' mo'o// byang gi 'dab mar sin d+hu ste/ mig gnyis su char 'thung ma'o// nub kyi 'dab mar na ga ra ste/ rna ba gnyis su 'jigs byed ma'o// lho yi
271b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dab mar sing ga la ste/ kha'i pad+mar pho nya ma'o// byang mtshams su sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte bar mum+mu Ni ste/ kos skor stobs chen ma'o// de'i shar gyi 'dab mar de bi ko Ti s+yai
271b5(rgyud 'bum): ske'i gling bur rta mgrin ma'o/ / byang gi 'dab mar ku lu ta ste/ rgyab kyi gling bur rta rna ma'o// nub kyi 'dab ma'i a raM bu ta ra nu ma gnyis su glang chen sna ma'o// lho'i 'dab mar ta li ka li
271b6(rgyud 'bum): bste/ snying khar glang chen lto ba ma'o// nub phyogs kyi sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte bar go ba ri ste/ lte ba'i gnas su me ma'o// de'i shar gyi 'dab mar lam pa ka ste/ gsang ba'i
271b7(rgyud 'bum): pad+mar chu rgyun ma'o/ / byang gi 'ad ba mar ka ts+tsha ka ste/ mtshan gyi dbus su ri bong can ma'o// nub kyi 'dab mar las kyi yul te/ mtshan rtser nyi ma'i 'od ma'o// lho'i 'dab mar gas
272a1(rgyud 'bum): gling ste/ bshang la'i gnas su dung snga ma'o// lho phyogs kyi pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa'i lte bar ko kan ste/ bcwa gnyis su dung bcug ma'o// shar gyi 'dab mar ban du rtse/
272a2(rgyud 'bum): pus mo gnyis su dung lte ma'o// byang gi 'dab mar yi dgas 'dus pa ste/ rje ngar gnyis su stobs chen ma'o// nub kyi 'dab mar rgya mtsho'i ngogs te/ rkang pa gnyis su bya rgod ma'o//
272a3(rgyud 'bum): lho'i 'dab mar tsa ra tra ste/ sor mo la rgod kha ma'o// de'i sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad pa bzhi'i 'dab ma bzhi la dgod do// 'dab ma lhag ma kun la khrag chen pos shin tu gang ba'i ka pA la
272a4(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa'i sna tshogs chen po'i bum pa kha rgyan btsugs pa/ bdud rtsi chen pos lto ba gang ba/ dar sna tshogs kyis mgrin pa mtho bar bskor ba'o// shar mtshams su ku ma ra pu ri dang /
272a5(rgyud 'bum): kasmi ra ste mthe bong dang lus thams cad la hor pa ma dang hor mig ma'o// byang mtshams su ke ra ta dang / ne pa la te rkang pa gnyis la lhag par hor mgo ma dang de bzhin du dmar mo'o// nub
272a6(rgyud 'bum): mtshams su kar pu dza dang / shar gyi lus 'phags te rked pa dang / snying khar mig dmar dang srog ma'o// lho mtshams su byang gi sgra mi snyan dang ba lang spyod de lte ba'i lte ba dang / sprul pa'i
272a7(rgyud 'bum): snying por 'dzin ma dang ro ma'o/ / 'dzam bu'i gling du gdags pa'i pad+ma'i snar bcom ldan 'das dang a ba d+hU tAM'o// de lta bu ni nang gi 'phar mas bde ba chen po'i 'khor lo na yod pa'i rtsa sum cu
272b1(rgyud 'bum): rtsa gnyis rnam par dag pas phyi ma'i phyi mar rgyud kyi go rim rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi nang gi dag pa'o/ / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug phyi rol tu mtshan dang dpe byang /
272b2(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pa rnam pa dang bcas pa brgyad gnyis kyi lo'o// byad gzugs mdzes pa chen po'i sha rgyas pas dregs pa/ sdig pa'i nga rgyal can/ phyag bzhi pa/ spyan gsum pa/ sra zhing
272b3(rgyud 'bum): mtho ba'i nu ma dang / rus pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ phyag rgya lnga 'dzin pa/ g.yon brkyang bas ro'i steng na gnas pa/ ka pA la dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / mda' gzhu khengs par 'geng
272b4(rgyud 'bum): pa/ bdud grangs med pa 'joms pa kho na/ sku mdog sna tshogs pa mdzes pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa/ thugs rje chen pos sems can 'gugs ma/ sems can gyi don mdzad pa la brtson pa/ brel
272b5(rgyud 'bum): ba dang mi mkhyen pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o/ / phyi'i 'phar ma sha ra dang / byang dang / nub dang / lho mtshams re rer nang gi lha mo bzhin du lha mo gnyis gnyis te/ skra dmar ma dang / rin
272b6(rgyud 'bum): chen ma dang / phug ron ma dang / ser mo dang / nag mo dang / ri bong ma dang / ri dgas mo dang / ram mo'o// shar dang / byang dang / nub dang / lho'i sgo re rer sgo skyong ma gnyis gnyis te/
272b7(rgyud 'bum): de dag kyang dregs pa chen po 'jigs pa chen mo mchog gi legs dgyes kyis ring ba/ sna tshogs kyi nyams kyis sku khyab pa'o// shar sgor rdo rje ro langs ma dang / rdo rje dra ba ma sku mdog nag po
273a1(rgyud 'bum): phyag ba ni ma mnga' gzhu 'gengs shing chu srin dang nya bsnams pa/ ka pA la dang / kha nAg 'dzin pa/ spyan gsum pa/ phyag rgya lngas brgyan pa/ gcer busgra grol ba/ mi'i
273a2(rgyud 'bum): rus pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ g.yon brkyang ba/ mgo bo'i chun 'phyangs rgyu ma la brgyus pa 'chang ba'o// byang sgor rdo rje rtse mo ma dang / de bzhin du rdo rje zlum pa ma sku mdog ser po/ seng
273a3(rgyud 'bum): ge dang bya khyud bsnams pa'o/ / nub sgor rdo rje ska rags ma dang / rdo rje ser mo ma sku mdog dmar mo/ gling bu dang rdza rnga chen po'i sgra kho na'o// lho sgor rdo rje rgod ma dang / rdo rje nyi ma mo sku mdog ljang ku
273a4(rgyud 'bum): rdza rnga dang pi wang gi rol mo'i sgra kho na ste/ ji ltar shar sgor bzhugs pa'i rnal 'byor ma de ltar thams cad kyang rus pa la sogs pa'i rgyan dang / bzhugs thabs dang / phyag mtshan dang ldan pa'o//
273a5(rgyud 'bum): longs spyod kyi 'khor lo'i nang na yod pa'i rtsa brgyad gnyis kyi grangs ni de dag kun gyi rnam par dag pa'o// sku brgyad bdag nyid kyi ni mgon// mchod sbyin sgra yis kun tu brtags// mchod pa
273a6(rgyud 'bum): de ni mchod sbyin brjod/ / rtsa ni kun gyi gnas rab mchog/ gnas ni gdan la sogs pa'i dgyes// gnas kun gyi ni bla na med// gsang chen dag pa pad+ma yi// 'dab ma brgyad pa lte bar bcas
273a7(rgyud 'bum): bde ba yi ni yangs pa'i sar/ / rtsa yi dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan no// gnas ni gdan la bya bar grags// gnas ni rten du brjod pa'o// bde ba 'byung ba'i ngal sos ni// de yi zhing ni don
273b1(rgyud 'bum): dam par/ / bde ba'i ye shes 'byung ba ste// tshan d+ho ha ni 'di ru bshad// thig le gsum gyi ye shes bde// gcig byed pa yi gtan tshogs kyi// de yi 'dus sar bstan pa yin// rnal
273b2(rgyud 'bum): 'byor rgyud du rnyed dka' ba/ / gang du tshor ba yod pa ste// bde ba 'byung ba'i thim de bzhin// de ni 'di ru dur khrod brjod// yang na bde ba'i rnam shes so// gang du bde ba yang dag rnyed// de
273b3(rgyud 'bum): ni bi la ba ru grags/ / skye dang thim pa'i ye shes te// gang du bde ba'i zla ba skye// de ni lam rab tu ni bstan// 'gro ba'i bdag nyid lam yin no// bde ba'i rgyal po gang zhig 'gog/ de ni sbyor
273b4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ye shes rab/ / de ni gnas brgyad dgyes pa yin// sku brgyad rang gi ngo bo can// ye shes brgyad kyi bdag nyid bdag/ sangs rgyas kun gyis rnyed dka' ba// rtsa kun gyi ni dag pa'i gzhi//
273b5(rgyud 'bum): de la yang ni rtsa kun gnas// nye ba'i gnas ni thams cad kun// lha yi dbang phyug rnam par smin// bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i sbyor ba yis// thig le drug ni rab tu grags// thig le'i dbus na ye
273b6(rgyud 'bum): shes yod/ / ngag gi lam gyis rnyed par dka'// bskyed pa dang ni rdzogs pa med// drug min de bzhin gsum pa min// gsum dang bral ba gsum par grags// ye shes rang bzhin de skyed
273b7(rgyud 'bum): med/ / nyi ma'i thig le'i ye shes shar// 'bad pa yi ni mchod sbyin bya// gang tshe mchog byung ma shar bar// de tshe'i ma 'byung mi 'gyur// zla ba de ni dga' bral dga'// chags pa
274a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di ru thim par byed/ / nyi ma'i dbus nas zla ba 'byung // zla ba'i dbus nas nyi ma 'char// dri ma med phyir yangs par 'gro// shes rab bdag nyid gzugs kyi phyir/
274a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad la ni tshim par byed// thams cad kyi ni skye ba'i rgyu// 'bras bu byed pa'i bdag nyid zla// rgyu byed bdag nyid zla ba ste// 'bras bu byed bdag nyi ma'o// rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis
274a3(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i/ / bde ba chags chen bdag nyid do// chags pa chen po dngos med na// ji ltar bde ba 'byung bar 'gyur// bde ba ye shes dri med grags// tha mal bde nyid bde ba min// byol song bas
274a4(rgyud 'bum): chags rab rmongs pa/ / dbang po gnyis kyi bde bar 'dod// bde ba mchog gi rang rig pa// chags pa dang ni chags bral med// bde ba thig le'i nang du ni// char yang nang du bde ba che// de
274a5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis ye shes tshul gyi nang / / rnam par shes pa'i tshul can dang // rnam par shes pa'i ye shes bral// gzhan dang gzhan min nang yod pa'o// sbyor drug gyes pa rnam par shes// char yang
274a6(rgyud 'bum): ra ba kun brtags bral/ / rtog pa spangs pa de nyid ni// bsam gtan 'dzin pa med pa'o// tshor bya tshor byed gnyis las grol// srid dang mya ngan 'das dag pa'i// de ni gsang chen de nyid do//
274a7(rgyud 'bum): gang du yang ni gsal ma byas// 'bad pa yis ni sba bar bya// smra bar mi bya gang la lar// rnal 'byor rgyud du mos gyur pa// lha yi dbang phyug gsal mi bya// dpal ye shes thig le las sngags
274b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi bzlas pa'i rim pa dang / mchod sbyin gyi cho ga dang / dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i rim pa dang / gnas kyi don dang / rtsa'i 'khor lo 'byung ba dang / de kho na nyid kyi don bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig
274b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / // de nas mchod pa'i cho ga 'di'i// nges par bstan pa bdag gis bshad// thim dang longs spyod dag gis ni// yid 'phrog yang dag mchod pa'o// zla ba nyi ma me
274b3(rgyud 'bum): tog gis/ / sku yi rgyal po nyid la mchod// 'dod pa 'di ni dpral ba ru// mar ngo tshas kyi dang po dbang // yid las de ru 'dod par 'gyur// nges par a yi thig le las// thim pa 'di ni smin
274b4(rgyud 'bum): phrag tu/ / dga' bas de las 'da' bar 'gyur// a li'i thig le gnyis pas so// bde ba'i mkhur chos gnyis nas su// tshes gsum pa la longs spyod 'gyur// de la rnam par smin pas 'gro/
274b5(rgyud 'bum): a li'i thigs pa gsum pas so// bdud rtsi kos sgo'i gnas su ni// tshes bzhi pa la thim pa 'byung // de la mgu ba las dga' ba// bzhi pa'i ye shes thig les so// bde ba yi ni mgrin gnas
274b6(rgyud 'bum): su/ tshes lnga pa la longs spyod 'byung // de la dgyes pas rgyas par 'gyur// thig le lnga pa'i khengs pas so// 'dod pa brang gi gnas su ni// tshes drug pa la thim pa 'byung // de la bsam ga
274b7(rgyud 'bum): las drag po/ / thig le drug la gang bas so// bde ba'i nu ma'i gnas su ni// tshes bdun pa la dbang ni 'byung // de la bdun pas 'byung ba yin// thigs pa bdun pas khengs pas so// 'dod pa'i
275a1(rgyud 'bum): rtsib logs gnas su ni/ / tshes brgyad pa la thim pa 'byung // de la chags pas mchog gi dga'// thig le brgyad pa gang bas so// bde ba'i lte ba'i gnas su ni// tshes
275a2(rgyud 'bum): dgu pa la longs spyod 'byung / / de la rnam smin las 'bar 'byung // thig le dgu pa khengs pas so// 'dod pa'i mdoms kyi gnas su ni// tshes bcu pa la thim pa 'byung // de la brtan las thig
275a3(rgyud 'bum): ler 'gyur/ / thig le bcu pa gang bas so// bde ba'i spyi bo'i gnas su ni// bcu gcig pa la dbang ni 'byung // de yi stobs las myos par 'gyur// bcu gcig thig le khengs pas so// bde
275a4(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rdo rje'i rtsa gnas su/ / bcu gnyis tshes la thim pa 'byung // de la 'od las dga' bral dga'// bcu gnyis thig le gang bas so// rgyas pa'i rdo rje'i dbus gnas su// bcu gsum tshes la
275a5(rgyud 'bum): longs spyod 'byung / / de las snang bas ur tar 'gyur// a li'i bcu gsum thig les so// bde ba'i mdud pa'i gnas su ni// bcu bzhi pa la thim pa shar// de la reg bya las tshur 'gyur//
275a6(rgyud 'bum): bcu bzhi'i zla ba'i thig les so// bde ba'i nor bu'i dbus su ni// nya gang ba las dbang ni shar// de las phrad las gnyid du 'gyur// bco lnga pa yi thig les so// dbang po bcu drug pa yi cha//
275a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan ni gang du'ang mi dmigs so// de bzhin du ni so sor gzugs// rang bzhin de ni yod pa min// dga' ba'i bye brag lhan skyes dga'// bcu drug pa yi don du yod// tshar yang bcu drug 'di ru ni/
275b1(rgyud 'bum): yod pa ma yin med pa min// de bzhin du ni ye shes che// lha yi dbang phyug rang bzhin no// g.yas g.yon yan lag gnyis su ni// khu ba yi ni 'byung bar dran// mar ngo de bzhin yang ngo yi// 'dod pa yis
275b2(rgyud 'bum): ni 'byung ba'i tshe/ / bcu dang lnga yis gnyis med sbyor// bde ba 'di yi 'byung ba min// de nyid gsum shes bcu dang lnga// shes rab dang bral bde ba che// bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin gyis// gnyis su
275b3(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i bde ba shes/ / rtag tu mos pa yis ni shar// bsam gtan gyis ni shes pa'o// bcu drug gi ni yi ge'i gzugs// a li'i thig le rang ngo bo// a sogs yig 'bru'i char yang 'byung
275b4(rgyud 'bum): a li'i ye shes bde bdag nyid/ / ka sogs yig 'bru'i char yang 'byung // ka li'i ye shes bde ba che// a li ka li gnyis sbyor las// mchod sbyin gyis ni rab mchod bya// mchod pa yang
275b5(rgyud 'bum): ni de bzhin te/ / gsang ba'i pad+ma'i snying khar ro// gsang ba de nyid gsum zhes bya// la la 'da' la gnyis sbyor las// mchod sbyin gyi ni rab mchog bya// mchod pa yang ni de bzhin te// gsang
275b6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i pad+ma'i snying khar ro/ / gsang ba de nyid gsum zhes bya// thim dang longs spyod sogs bye brag/ thim pa dang ni longs spyod dbang // dga' ba gsum du bstan pa'o// de yi thig le gsum zhes
275b7(rgyud 'bum): bya/ sku gsum yig gsum bdag nyid do// tshangs pa'i bu ga de bzhin mgrin// snying kha ru ni thig le gsum// de yis bskyed pa'i rim zhes bya// mdud pa'i nang ni man chad do// bzlog pa yi
276a1(rgyud 'bum): ni thig le gsum/ / gyen du rdzogs pa'i rim pa yin// rgyu 'bras rnam dag bye brag tu// thig le drug ni rab tu grags// dri med ye shes char yang drug/ de ni rnam shes sbyor
276a2(rgyud 'bum): drug bshad/ / de yi dbus su de nyid bzhugs// lhan skyes dga' ba'i bde ba che// mchod pa'i las sbyor che ba yis// the tshom med par rnyed par 'gyur// mchod pa'i dam tshig dus su ni// gsang
276a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sgra ni 'bad pa yis/ / gang zhig 'dod pa grub pa che// dam tshig sems dpas brjod par bya// la la rdo rje d+ha la pad// a li zla ba ka li nyi// ri bong can ni khu ba'o// nyi ma khrag tu rab
276a4(rgyud 'bum): tu grags/ / khu ba ga pur shes bya ste// khrag ni si h+la zhes su dran// sbrul ni nag po gnyis ka yin// 'dus pa phung por brjod pa'o// na rag ka pA la ru brjod// chags pa chang du rab tu grags//
276a5(rgyud 'bum): zhe sdang de ni sha yin te// gti mug tshod ma ru ni dran// nga rgyal 'di ru sha chen po// zan ni phrag dog nyid du dran// gci 'khor bshang ba mya ngan 'das// mtho ris gzugs zhes dran pa'o// mi
276a6(rgyud 'bum): yi yul ni sgra zhes bstan/ / sa 'og ro ru bshad pa'o// dri ni ri rab rtse mo'o// gling bzhi po ni reg bya'o// sa ni pha ru rab tu grags// chu ni sring mo yin par dran// me ni yum ste bu mo ni// rlung
276a7(rgyud 'bum): du rab tu grags pa'o/ / nam mkha' sgyug mor shes par bya// bcings pa med pa nam mkha' yin// skal ldan dang pa 'on pa mtsho// 'on pa min pa rgya mtshor brjod// dbang bskur grong khyer ba ru
276b1(rgyud 'bum): dran/ / dbang bskur min pa grong pa bzhin// gsang ba snying la yin par brjod// khyer shog dri ma med par brjod// gsal byed nam mkha' yin par dran// gzhang kha dgyes pa Na Ni 'bras//
276b2(rgyud 'bum): rungs lcags su kun tu grags// stan ni pad+ma yin par brjod// sbyin pa ge sar dran pa'o// gzhon nu ma ni mtshe 'ur grags// rgan mo gtsang por dran pa'o// gnas pa rna ba zhes su brjod//
276b3(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba 'di ni ar po d+ha// dus ni dbyug pa bde ba nyid// thal ba min dga' dga' stobs so// de dag tshogs kyi mchod sbyin gyis// dus su 'bad pas brjod par bya// khrung khrung la sogs
276b4(rgyud 'bum): 'jug min phyir/ / gsang ba'i tshig ni smra bar bya// rnal 'byor ma 'am rnal 'byor pa// shin tu dgyes pas gsang skad smra// dpal ye shes thig le las mchod pa'i rim pa dang gsang ba'i
276b5(rgyud 'bum): skad ces bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o/ / // dbang bskur la sogs nges bstan ni// lha yi dbang phyug ngas 'dir bshad// rgyud gsum gyi ni rim pa yis// dbang
276b6(rgyud 'bum): drug dbye ba bstan pa'o/ / chu yi dbang bskur dbu rgyan dag/ bya ba'i rgyud las rab tu grags// rdo rje dril bu de bzhin ming // spyod pa'i rgyud las rab tu gsal// phyir mi ldog pa yi ni dbang //
276b7(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor rgyud du gsal bar byas// de ni drug gi bye brag dbang // de ni slob dpon dbang zhes bya// rnal 'byor bla ma yi ni mtshon// gsang ba yi ni dbang rgyal bshad// shes rab ye shes bla na
277a1(rgyud 'bum): med bzhi pa de ltar de bzhin no/ / dgu yi bye brag dbang la sogs// 'bras bu'i phyir na brgyad dbyer 'gyur// bzhi pa de ltar de bzhin brjod// shes rab ye shes de mi
277a2(rgyud 'bum): 'bras/ / dngos po so sor shes mi bya// de ltar zhes ni tshad med do// de bas 'bras bu'i tshig don ni// rigs pa ma yin pa yi sems// de bzhin re zhig dga' ba'i sems// de bzhin re zhig dga'
277a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i rim/ / ji lta bur ni yod par 'gyur// dga' ba lus su grags pa ste// mchog tu dga' ba 'di ru gang // yid ni dga' bral shes par bya// lhan skyes de ni gang na yod// kun na yod pa'i
277a4(rgyud 'bum): ye shes sems/ / sems las gzhan ni yod pa min// gang zhig ci zhig 'di thams cad// de ni thams cad sems yin no// sems las thams cad 'byung ba ste// sems kyis yongs su 'das pa'i/
277a5(rgyud 'bum): 'o/ lus kyi mgo bo dga' ba'i gnas// ngag ni mgrin pa mchog tu dga'// sems ni snying khar shes bya ba// chags pa'i dga' ba rtag tu shar// lus rgyu 'bras bu de ni ngag/ ngag ni rgyu ste/
277a6(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu yid// yid nyid yongs su shes pa ni// 'bras bu de ni don dam par// de nyid gsum bdag ye shes gang // rtsa gsum nang gi dbus na bzhugs// gnas gsum khyab pa skye ba med//
277a7(rgyud 'bum): 'od gsum srid pa gsum dang bral// 'od rab gnas ni rab kyi mchog/ de ni bzhi pa mchog gi dbang // bdun gnyis bye brag tu ni yod// yan lag rab kyi mdor bsdus la// chu yi dbang
277b1(rgyud 'bum): bskur dga' ba'o/ / gsang ba'i dbang bskur mgrin pa ru// mchog tu dga' ba'i bdag nyid mchog/ shes rab ye shes kyi ni dbang // snying kha ru ni dga' bral dga'// gsang ba pad+ma'i lte ba
277b2(rgyud 'bum): ru bzhi pa'i rang bzhin bdag nyid do/ / de ltar dbang ni bzhi ru dbye// bskyed pa'i rim pa'i phyogs yin no// chu yi dbang ni mdoms su ste// sna tshogs 'bras bu sbyin pa'o// gsang ba'i dbang ni
277b3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa ste/ / rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu ster// rdo rje yi ni rtsa ba'i gnas// rtsa ba dang ni mdoms kyi 'og/ shes rab ye shes kyi ni dbang // mdud pa'i gnas su rtag tu dran// dbang rnams
277b4(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi bla ma'i bla/ / rnam par 'joms pa'i 'bras bu ste// shes rab ye shes nor bu'i khar// shes rab pad+ma'i yid 'gro'i phyir// rlung ma dang ni gnyid skye'i rtsa// gnyis ka rgyas pa yis ni
277b5(rgyud 'bum): bde/ / gyen gyi lam gyis bzlog par bya// mdud pa'i nang gi gnas su 'gro// de ltar bzhi pa rab tu bstan// mtshan nyid dang bral 'bras bur grags// mdud pa'i gnas su rim pa yis//
277b6(rgyud 'bum): tshangs pa'i sprul pa snying man chad// de tsam du ni lhan skyes dga'// rlabs dang bral ba dpe med do// de ni de kun don dam par// dbang gi ye shes nges bstan to// rdo rje ka ba de bzhin gsang //
277b7(rgyud 'bum): sdom dang sdom pa'i rgya mtsho dang // rigs chen ye shes snying po dang // kye rdor 'jigs byed rdo rje dang // mtshan dang gsang ba 'dus pa ru// lha yi dbang phyug bdag gis sbas// khyod kyi ngo
278a1(rgyud 'bum): mdzad dbang gi don/ / rgyud 'di ru ni rab tu gsal// rtog ge ba dang rgan po dang // dge slong mos par gnas pa la// yang dag lam shes slob dpon gyis// de rnams de nyid
278a2(rgyud 'bum): bshad mi bya/ / a yi yig 'bru dga' ba yin// b+hi yi yig 'bru mchog tu dga'// She yi yig 'bru dga' bral dga'// ka yi yig 'bru lhan skyes so// gang du yang ni mi dmigs shing //
278a3(rgyud 'bum): a ni skye med rang bzhin te// kun gyi rgyu ni yin phyir ro// She yi yig 'brur yang dag brjod// gtsug tor gsang ba'i pad+ma ra b+hi// bskur dang khrus ni byed pa'i phyir// ka ni rnam rtog dngos por grags// /
278a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba chad pa'i bdag nyid do// gsang ba'i pad+ma'i snying kha a// rtsa kun gyis ni 'bigs pa gang // de phyir mngon par dga' ba mchog/ b+hi yi yig 'bru thig le 'bigs// She bde ye shes kun
278a5(rgyud 'bum): brtags bral/ / yang dag don gyis gsal bar byed// dang po'i dga' ba rgyu yi dngos// a yi yig 'bru mchog gi gnas// mchog dga' dga' bral dga' bar grags// dbang bskur rab tu
278a6(rgyud 'bum): grags pa'o/ / de gnyis dbus su de nyid bzhugs// rang bzhin dga' ba bzhi dang bral// mngon par dga' dang dga' bral dga'i// gang zhig rang bzhin mi shes na// dpal ldan rdo rje sems
278a7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' yis/ / sangs rgyas yin yang mi bstod do// rdo rje 'dzin pa thams cad kyi// thams cad khyab par mnga' bdag bdag/ sangs rgyas thams cad rgyal chen po// sangs rgyas thams cad yid
278b1(rgyud 'bum): / ltar mgyogs// thams cad kun gyi dbang phyug bdag/ 'byung ba kun gyi bdag nyid do// dpal ye shes thig le las dbang bskur ba'i nges pa bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba ste bcu gsum pa'o//
278b2(rgyud 'bum): / de nas yang ni bshad bya ba// nang gi mtshan nyid sbyin sreg go// kha ni hom khung dgang gzar lag/ tshul ni rang byung me yin no// nga rgyal phrag dog sreg rdzas yin// bzlas pa de
278b3(rgyud 'bum): ni kham du brjod/ / sa 'og dang ni sring mo mar// de yi sreg rdzas rab tu dbul// ye shes bdud rtsi rnam dag pas// phrag dog la sogs bsang gtor bya// dum bu gsum pa'i snod mdun du// phrag
278b4(rgyud 'bum): dog bdud rtsis rab tu tshim/ / rdor gsum ye shes sa bon gyis// dag byas dkar byas rim gyis so// rlung mes bskul byas 'bar bas byas// bdud rtsi mchog ni zhu bar byed// ha ni ma mo'i
278b5(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyis ni/ / 'khor lo drug ni rab tshim bya// ri bo'i ma mo dang bral bas// phyi nang rtag tu rab tshim bya// de lta'i sbyin sreg las kyis ni// lha yi sku ru nges par 'gyur// lha yi sku ni bde chen
278b6(rgyud 'bum): po don dam par ni shes pa'o/ / lha yi yig 'bru yis 'byung gang // de ni don dam sbyin sreg go/ dpa' bo gnyis kyis mnyam sbyor ba// dus kyi gang du skyes dbang po// lte snying bde ba'i
278b7(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma yi/ / rtag par shes rab mas ni brjod// de ni sbyin sreg sreg rdzas ldan// mngon par dga' las 'byung ba'o// kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs su ni// shes rab thabs ni phrad pa las//
279a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg las kyi 'bras bu mchog/ myur ba ru ni rnyed pa'o// hom khung d+ha la dgyes pa che// la la 'di ru dgang gzar dran// blugs gzar gsang pad sna yi rtse// mar ni
279a2(rgyud 'bum): khu ba zla 'od mnyam/ / gsang pad zlum po'i rnam pa bzhin// mar gyi snod du rnam par grags// blugs gzar dgang gzar mar gyi snod// rtsa gsum du ni brjod pa'o// bsrub dang gtsubs pa'i
279a3(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba yis/ / rlung ma dang ni gnyid ma gnyis// gcig pa'i dngos po yang dag pas// ye shes me ni mchog tu 'bar// pad+ma'i 'khor lo drug rim pas// gzhan mni bde chen man chad do//
279a4(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi bdud rtsi rgyun ni 'dzag/ ji ltar mkha' las chu 'bab pa// rtsa yi dra ba du ma yis// 'khor lo drug snying khyab pa'o// sku gsum ye shes rdo rje mchog/ rtag tu sreg rdzas mchod par bya//
279a5(rgyud 'bum): me yi kha ru dgang gzar ni// mar gyis bkang ba dbul bar bya// me ni mchog tu dga' ba ste// rnam rtog hom shing tshig par byed// mdud pa'i hom khung gi ni me// de ni mchog tu dga' rang
279a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin/ / zhi ba'i zlum po'i rnam pa bzhin// longs spyod dang ni grol ba bzhin// sku yi rdo rje rin chen khar// gsung gi rdo rje dbus kyi dkyil// thugs kyi rdo rje mdud snying po// dga' ba yis ni
279a7(rgyud 'bum): mchod par bya/ / gsung gi rdo rje blugs gzar mchog/ dga' bral dga' ba sku rdo rje// lhan skyes dga' ba'i ye shes kyi// dgang thugs kyis ni mchod par bya// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad
279b1(rgyud 'bum): ces bka' stsal pas/ bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi grangs kun brgyal ba dang sa la 'gyel bar gyur to// de nas yun ring po zhig nas 'di skad ces gsol to// lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba
279b2(rgyud 'bum): la 'dir ye shes yod dam ci zhes yang ya mtshan du gyur to/ / yang de'i dus su bcom ldan 'das mas phyag rgya chen pos dam por 'khyud nas ma mchu btung ba'i bdud rtsi'i mchod sbyin phul te/ gsang
279b3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i pad+ma'i bskor ba dam po'i snyim pa mnyam par sbyor ba bcings nas gus pas zhus pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bla ma mgon// ye shes zab mo dri ma med// ci yi don phyir de lta'i tshig/ 'khor kun gyi ni nang
279b4(rgyud 'bum): du gsungs/ / lhan cig skyes dga'i ye shes gang // dgang blugs kyis ni mchod pa la// bdag kyang 'dir ni bcom ldan 'das// the tshom chen po skyes par gyur// gsang ba yi ni gsang ba mchog/
279b5(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma rgyud du ma ru// mgon pos gang du'ang ma gsungs so// de tsam yang ni brdar ma mdzad// lhan cig la ni ye shes yod// ma gsungs bdag gis thos ma lags// de ring de ltar the tshom dag/
279b6(rgyud 'bum): mnga' bdag chen pos gcad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ a la la rab tu ngo mtshar to// lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba la/ ci'i phyir ye shes med/ dad pa chen po dang /
279b7(rgyud 'bum): brtson 'grus can dang / ye shes dang ldan pa'ang rmongs par 'gyur na/ ye shes med pas lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba ji ltar rnyed/ de bzhin du'ang 'dir gzhan pa de ma yin pa'i dper nyon cig/
280a1(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar/ du ba las ni mer shes te// chu sbyar las ni chu yin no// byang chub sems dpa'i blo ldan gyi// rigs ni mtshan ma rnams las shes// de bzhin du lhan cig skyes pa'i
280a2(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba rnyed pa'i don gyi phyir skyabs sprin gyi ngo bo ye shes so/ / ye shes ni tshor bar yongs su shes pas spyod pa'i bdag nyid kyi thabs de ni ye shes su bdag gis bshad do// de bzhin du ji ltar mun nag
280a3(rgyud 'bum): tu rin po che phra mo'i phra mo yod pa de ni rin po che mar me ma yin pas rnyed par mi 'gyur ba de bas na blo gros can gyis rin po che mar me khyer nas tshol bar byed la/ gal te de rnyed na de ci mar me las rin po che skye 'am/
280a4(rgyud 'bum): 'on kyang mar me'i thabs kyis mthong ba dang rnyed pa de bzhin du ye shes kyi mar mes lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba'i rin po che'i rgyal po mthong zhing rnyed kyi/ ye shes las skye ba ni ma yin no// de bas na ye shes
280a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi sgra 'di ni don mi shes pa'i phyir mkhas pas 'dir the tshom mi bya'o/ / dpal ye shes thig le las mchod pa sna tshogs nges par bstan pa dang nang gi sbyin sreg ces bya ba'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// /
280a6(rgyud 'bum): / de nas gtor ma chen po'i las kyi nges par bstan pa'i don bshad do// sems can thams cad srung don du// 'bad pa yis ni gtor ma sbyin// b+ha yi yig 'bru b+ha gar brjod/
280a7(rgyud 'bum): li gi yig 'bru ling gar bstan// ling ga b+ha gar mnyam sbyor bas// sems can thams cad kyi ni tshogs// de las 'byung bar 'gyur ba ste// lha mo de nyid shes bya ste// thams cad sgra ni dga' ba yin//
280b1(rgyud 'bum): sems can don ni mchog tu 'gyur// tshogs pa de ni dga' bral dga'// gtor ma de yis srung ba'i don// dur khrod yang ni chu yi ngogs// ye shes ldan pas sbyin par bya// dur khrod dbugs byung gi/
280b2(rgyud 'bum): ni gnas// gsang ba'i pad+ma'i bya gdong ngo // sha yi yig 'bru pad+ma dag/ wa yi yig 'bru lte bar yin// sa yi yig 'bru bde ngo bo// na yi yig 'bru bcos pa med// dri med ma yi zhu ba'i bdag
280b3(rgyud 'bum): thig le'i ngo bo yi ge bral/ / dur khrod dbugs 'byung du ni grags// zhal bzang bdag gis bshad pa yin// chu yi ngogs ni rin chen la// yang na de ni rtog med ma// 'byung ba rnams ni srung ba'i phyir/
280b4(rgyud 'bum): de la gtor ma sbyin par bya// 'byung ba khu ba ru ni grags// khu ba sems can 'di ru bstan// sems can snying po ye shes bde// b+ha ga ling ga gnyis las 'byung // de la srung ba'i don du ni// gtor ma
280b5(rgyud 'bum): kun tu 'bad de sbyin/ / dpal ye shes thig le las 'byung ba srung ba'i don du gtor ma chen po nges par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das ma
280b6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya chen pos/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug la bos te/ kye dpa' bo chen po lha'i dbang phyug 'dir de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi dang / zla ba'i bde ba mchog
280b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / phyag rgya chen po'i mtha'i rgyas pa nges par bstan pa'i don du rang gi ngo bo nyid dang / tshad dang / rnam pa de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du legs par zhus shig/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
281a1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ mchog gi dbang phyug ma mchog gi bde ba chen po'i 'od kyi rang gi ngo bo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum/ sdig pa thams cad zad
281a2(rgyud 'bum): par byed ma/ bdud thams cad 'joms par byed ma/ dga' ba thams cad dang / skad cig dang / ro dang / ye shes kyi mtha' khyab pa/ lte ba'i pad+ma'i dbus nas bzhengs nas bde ba chen po rab tu
281a3(rgyud 'bum): tshim par mdzad ma/ bcom ldan 'das ma bzang mo mchog dri ma med pa'i sku nam mkha'i ngo bo legs so legs so// yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug gis/ bcom
281a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das mas gsungs pa de khong du chud pas mchog tu dga' ba chen po'i sems kyis rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rmad du byung ba chen po sprul te/ rnam pa du ma sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa chen pos mchod pa
281a5(rgyud 'bum): byas nas sngar gyi dri ba de dag zhus so/ / bcom ldan 'das de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid dang / zla ba'i bde ba mchog dang / phyag rgya chen po'i mtha'i rgyas pa nges par bstan pa'i don du rang gi ngo bo
281a6(rgyud 'bum): nyid dang / tshad dang / rnam pa de dag bdag la bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dri ba shin tu za ba las zab// thams cad mkhyen pas rnyed dka' ba// ji ltar de
281a7(rgyud 'bum): nyid mtshan nyid ni/ / nyon cig nga yis bshad par bya// mtshan nyid las skyes de nyid ni// de lta min na mi mthun no// rang rig pa ni bdag nyid phyir// de bas brjod par mi nus so// de nyid gsum
281b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag de snang ba/ / mtshan mo'i 'du shes rang ngo bo// zla ba'i bde mchog snang ba mched// nyin mo'i 'du shes rang ngo bo// phyag rgya chen po snang ba thob// mtshams kyi 'du shes rang ngo bo// mtha' yid/
281b2(rgyud 'bum): ni 'od kyi rab// nyin mo mtshan mo sogs dang bral// de ni gnas mchog ye shes te// blta bar dka' ba'i mtshan nyid do// char yang dang ni thig le'i tshul// de nyid gsum bdag brjod pa'o//
281b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo gsum yod me rlung chu// dngos po'i 'du shes rang ngo bo// tshul tsam zla ba yi ni bde// sa yi 'khor lor bde ni mchog/ de ni rten gyi 'du shes can// lha yi dbang phyug shes par bya//
281b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya chen po 'di ni mchog/ nam mkhar ye shes 'du shes so// de yi mtha' yi gzhan gyi mchog/ bde chen mchog gi nam mkhar ro// de ni rnam 'byed ngo bor grags// gnyis su med pa'i ye
281b5(rgyud 'bum): shes rab/ / de ni 'khor lo drug dbus gnas// rnam shes drug gi rang ngo bo// dngos po rten la sogs bye brag/ bzhir ni dbye bar yod pa'o// de nyid gsum bdag bye brag gis// de ni rnam pa
281b6(rgyud 'bum): gsum du dbye/ / mtshan mo nyin mo mtshams bral phyir// gcig pu yi ni bde ba che// rang bzhin bstan pa gang la lar// mchog gi nam mkha' gang la lar// la lar 'od rab kyi ni gnas// la
281b7(rgyud 'bum): lar dga' bar dran pa'o/ / la lar mchog gi dga' ba ste// la lar dga' bral dga' ba'o// sna tshogs du ma la sogs dbye// lhan skyes gcig pu rtag tu shar// du mar smra bas ci zhig bya//
282a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di kun bdag nyid lhan cig skyes// kun rdzob rnam pa'i gzugs kyis ni// chu yi zla ba bzhin du mthong // don dam pa yi rang bzhin du// yang dag rtog pa'i gnas med do//
282a2(rgyud 'bum): thabs la sogs pa'i rim pa yis// bla ma'i zhal nas rnyed par 'gyur// bla ma mtho ris thar pa'i bla// bla ma ye shes bla ma bde// bla ma ston pa bla ma mgon// bla ma rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid// bla ma'i zhal
282a3(rgyud 'bum): snga'i bka' drin las/ / mchog gi gnas ni rnyed par 'gyur// tshe 'di yi ni phyag rgya che// dngos grub rnyed par the tshom med// sa bcu yi ni dbang phyug bdag/ de yi bka' drin gyis ni bla// de bas
282a4(rgyud 'bum): bla ma las lhag gzhan/ / ston pa chen po ga la yod// gang zhig bla mas bstan bcos ni// mdzad dam bshad pa gang yin yang // de ni bstan bcos de tshad ma// de ni de nyid 'khrul pa med// slob
282a5(rgyud 'bum): dpon gsung dang bdag gis smras/ / de la bye brag mi dbye'o// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma rgyud shes// bla ma sa mdzad pa'i bstan bcos gang // de la sgra dang sgra ngan du// lha yi dbang phyug brtag mi bya//
282a6(rgyud 'bum): snyan dngags zlos gar bstan bcos las// sgra dang sgra ngan brtag bya yi// sngags kyi bstan bcos gtan la phab// ci yi phyir na brtag par bya// brtag par byed pas gti mug byed// rtsa ba'i don ni
282a7(rgyud 'bum): zad par song / / de phyir sgra dang rtog ge shes// de la de nyid bshad mi bya// de kun la ni dbang mi bskur// phyi yi don la mos pa'i phyir// thabs dang thabs las byung mtshan nyid// 'bras bu sbyin pa
282b1(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig phyir/ / de ni thams cad dngos rig pa// mchog gi don ni ster phyir ro// de ltar yang de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid dang / zla ba dang / bde ba mchog dang / phyag rgya chen po'i mtha' rnyed pa'i
282b2(rgyud 'bum): don du rnam pa dang / tshad dang / rang gi ngo bongs smras so// yang 'dir de kho na nyid kyi bdag nyid ni kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ste rnam pa'o// zla ba bde ba mchog ni tshogs kyi rnam par shes pa ste mtha'
282b3(rgyud 'bum): tshad do/ / phyag rgya chen po ni yid rnam par shes pa snang ba ste/ de ni rang gi ngo bo'i de'i mtha' la rnam pa med pa'i rnam par shes pa nam mkha' 'o// yang na sprul pa dang / chos dang / longs spyod dang /
282b4(rgyud 'bum): bde ba chen po'i rnam pa'i don khong du chud par bya'o// yang na rtsa bzhi'i don du rnam pa la sogs par shes par bya'o// dpal ye shes thig le las de kho na nyid gsum la sogs pa'i rgyas pa nges par bstan pa'i
282b5(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin gyi don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o/ / / de nas lha mo rab dgyes nas// rang bzhin don ni gsal ba'i phyir// dam po ru ni 'khyud byas nas// pad+ma dmar por rab
282b6(rgyud 'bum): tu bskor/ / dur khrod la sogs pa yi don// rdo rje rgyal po la ni zhus// bsrub dang bsrub pa'i sbyor ba las// dpal bdag dgyes nas bka' stsal to// dur khrod la sogs pa yi don// skal ldan lha
282b7(rgyud 'bum): mo khyod nyon cig/ mi bzad 'di ru rnam khyab pa// lha mo kha la rab tu grags// g.yas pa'i sna yi bu ga ni// mi sdug pa ni shin tu tshig/ lce spyang tshogs ni phyed tshig pa// sna bug g.yon pa ru ni dran// rna ba
283a1(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa 'jigs su rung / / swa swa dang ni tse ga tseg go// sha za'i kha ni rna ba g.yon// dum bu mgo bo la sogs brgyan// lha mo g.yas pa yi ni mig/ ha har rgod pa rab tu grags//
283a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa dang bcas yi dgas ldan// 'jigs pa shin tu 'jigs par byed// g.yon pa pho nya nag po me// me lce 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas khyab// rdo rje kha ru 'jigs par byed// rus pa dkar pos
283a3(rgyud 'bum): rab khyab pa/ / khu ba gzhan min rus dkar 'di// nges par lha mo shes par bya// de ni shin tu tsha ba skye// de tshe 'bar 'phreng khyad par che// byang chub sems ni bde ba che// mi brtan ma yin pa ru 'azhugs//
283a4(rgyud 'bum): de tshe rnam bcas yi dgas kyis// ldan par rab tu grags pa'o// gsum dbye bzhi dbye drug dbye 'am// mchog gi bdud rtsi gang du gshegs// de ni dum mgo la sogs bstan// gang tshe thi ma las
283a5(rgyud 'bum): longs spyod 'gro/ / de tshe swa swa tseg tseg go/ gang gi tshe ni dbang ma 'grub// de phyed tshig ldan dran pa'o// srog gi rlung ni nub pa'i phyir// shin tu tshig par brtag pa'o// khu ba nye ba'i shar ma thag/
283a6(rgyud 'bum): bkram par bdag gis bshad pa'o// lha mo shin tu gsang ba phye// dur khrod brgyad ni rab mchog go/ de ni shing brgyad dang ldan pa// nang gi bdag sbyor mtshan nyid do// dpal gyi me tog mig rtsi dang /
283a7(rgyud 'bum): na ga ge sar wa ta dang / pa la shing dang sha ra shing // khar ba dang ni sha mi yo// yal ga du ma la sogs dang ldan brgyad// 'bras bus dud pa'i gzugs kyis shin tu brgyan// 'dod ma rgyas ma klu stobs
283b1(rgyud 'bum): mdangs/ / mtsho skyes snying po 'dzin ma bya gdong ma// mgyogs dang bral mo zhi gnyis kun tu brtags// shing mchog chen po rtsa brgyad kyi ni gzugs// yang ni dur khrod chen po ni sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i
283b2(rgyud 'bum): chu skyes chos kyi 'byung gnas kyi nang gsang ba chen po 'dus pa'i gnas dang nye ba'i gnas la sogs pa'i gnas nas rnal 'byor ma re res shing re khyer nas song ngo / / lha mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
283b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dir ni rnal 'byor ma ni gang lags/ shing rnams kyi ming ni ci lags/ ji ltar na sprul pa'i 'khor lo'i chu skyes de kun gyi 'dus pa lags pa bka' stsal du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'

285a1(rgyud 'bum): par gyur na/ byang chub kyi sems kyi bdung rtsi bde ba'i ye shes 'di 'jug pa dang / gnas pa dang / 'gro ba'i skye ba shes pa ma yin no// ma shes na ji ltar phyag rgya chen po'i grub

285a3(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug gis/ / bsam gtan 'dir ni ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bsam gtan ni// nyon cig lha mo ngas rab bshad// kun rdzob ye shes brten

285a5(rgyud 'bum): lus ni ma bsgrims pa yis ni// spros pa med par stan bder bsdang // lte ba'i dbus na yod pa'i tshul// hUM gi yig 'bru grags chen grags// rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba// bskal pa'i me yi 'od
285a6(rgyud 'bum): dang ma'am/ / langs nas chos kyi 'khor lo yi// mkha' 'gro bsregs nas smin mtshams kyi// dbus na gang zhig 'khor lo yod// rang gi ngo bo srog gi rlung // snying khar 'ongs nas de gnas su//
285a7(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu de ni bzhugs pa'o// de ni oM yig ngo bor grags// sku yi rgyal po rnam par shes// srog dang rngub pa 'gog pa yis// srog dang rngub pa'i bza' ba gsol// srog dang rngub pa gnyis thos nas//
285b1(rgyud 'bum): des ni rdzogs par 'gyur ba yin// de nas de la rtags ni kun// mtshan ma 'di lta bu dag 'byung // 'dar dang rdul dang ba spu langs// dbyangs kyi bye brag de nas mdangs// kha dog 'gyur dang mchi ma
285b2(rgyud 'bum): dang / / lha mo de las de nyid skye'o// de nas rnal 'byor dbang shes nas// rnam par shes pa'i yi ge mchog/ nang du blta ba byas pas na// steng mtshams rtse mo zab pa ru// mchog gi nam mkha' ba de
285b3(rgyud 'bum): chen du/ / yi ge mchog ni shes byas nas// tshangs pa'i pad+mar byon te rgyas// chags pa dang bral gnas su 'gro// dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa yi// lha mo gnas der shes par bya// 'di lta bu yi 'dus

285b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dbang po mchog/ spros med 'od kyi gnas rnyed do// dpal ye shes thig le las dur khrod kyi nges par bstan pa'i don dang nang gi bsam gtan gyi nye bar 'gro ba bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// /

285b7(rgyud 'bum): ni gang lags/ mchog gi dbang phyug bdag la bka' stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang zhig dri ba mchog byas pa// spyan bzang ma ni khyod nyon cig/ dpal ldan ye shes
286a1(rgyud 'bum): thig le yi/ / de yi tshad ni don dam par// sus kyang smra bar nus ma yin// zhal bzang de ni bden ma yin// 'on kyang cung zad skal ldan mo// gsang ba'i ye shes rab mchog ni//
286a2(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig rgyal bas yang mi shes// khyod kyi ngor byas bdag gis bshad// srog gi dbyug pa'i gang zhig ste/ sor bcu gnyis ni mdud pa med// 'og gi cha ni bcu gnyis phyed// de bzhin sprul pa'i
286a3(rgyud 'bum): pad+mar ni/ / drug phyed pad+ma mig dang 'dra// rtsa ba dang bcas lte na du// rtsa ba rtsa ba'i nang 'ongs nas// 'dab ma'i skye ru bcar te gnas// dgug pa'i rnam pa'i ngo bor grags// bu ga phra mo nang na ldan// de ni
286a4(rgyud 'bum): srog pa rtsa nyid yin/ / khams gsum gyi na rten yin no// rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis med pa'i// rtsa dang 'bras bu rgya yis btab// drug phyed rtsa ba dang ldan ni// rtsa ba'i skud pa byad gzugs gsal// bcu drug
286a5(rgyud 'bum): phyed phyed bye brag tu/ / rtsa ba'i skud pa gcig pu'o// rtsa ba gsum dbye skal ldan mo// 'bras bu yang ni de bzhin no// rtsa ba 'bras bu gnyis kyi gnas// bcu gnyis phyed kyi gcig pu'o// de ni shin tu
286a6(rgyud 'bum): phra mo 'jam/ / rin chen kha nang man chod du// de tsam ye shes thig skud yod// rnam shes drug po'i rten mchog go// char yang dang ni thig le tshul// tshul tsam mchog dang gzhan mchog go/
286a7(rgyud 'bum): shrI ni gzhan min 'di ru shar// thig le dzA zhes su ni dran// rol ni na yi yig 'bru yin// ti yi yi ge tshul tsam mo// mchog ni la yi yig 'brur bstan// gzhan mchog ka ru dran pa'o// gug ma'i
286b1(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa'i kha ru ni/ / yungs kar che ba'i sbom po tsam// gnyis su med pa'i ye shes dpal// char yang du grags mchog dbang phyug/ de yi snying kha'i dbus su ni// ye shes thig le grub pa bzhugs//
286b2(rgyud 'bum): tshul ni mdud pa'i mgrin par gnas// na yi yi ge mtshan zhes mchog/ g.yon glo yi ni 'dab ma'i nang // ti ni thig le'i tshul tsam gnas// g.yas su la yi yig 'brur grags// lha mo mchog ni

286b5(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / thim pa'i 'gro ba'i gnas su yod// 'byung ba dbang gi gnas su ste// rang bzhin de ni mchog gzhan mchog/ g.yon gyi glo ru i Da'i rtsa// bi ga la ni g.yas su gnas// rtog med ma ni steng
286b6(rgyud 'bum): duganas/ / phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin no// steng dang 'og gnas yod pa'i rtsa// srid dang mya ngan 'das dag byed// g.yon glo ru ni yod pas yang // de bzhin 'di ni dran pa'o// de rnams lte ba'i
286b7(rgyud 'bum): dbus su ni/ / skra rtse bye ba brgya yi che// de yi tshad ni de bzhin gnas// zhal bzang ye shes thig le'o// rnal 'byor ma yi ye shes rab// gsang ba mchog ni bdag gis bshad// thos pa yis
287a1(rgyud 'bum): @/ ni sdig pa zang // de nas de la dga' ba skyes// dran pa yis ni bsod rnanams skye// de nas re la mchog dka' ste// lngang yis ni 'grub par 'gyur// dga' bral dga' ba rab tu /

287b2(rgyud 'bum): 'di ru tsi ru grags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sku ni de bzhin gshegs skyabs sbyin// sems ni rdo rje 'dzin par dran// phung po lnga las grub pa'i sku// rigs lnga yi ni bdag nyid mchog
287b3(rgyud 'bum): rigs ni drug pa thugs rdo rje/ / grangs med rigs kyi gtso bo'o// 'khor lo rin chen de bzhin pad// ral gri rdo rje lnga pa'o// gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang // 'du byed rnam shes de bzhin no//

287b5(rgyud 'bum): byed don yod grub pa ste/ / phrag dog rdo rje ru ni bstan// rnam par shes 'dir mi bskyod pa// zhe sdang rdo rje rab tu bsgom// nam mkha' rdo rje sems dpar grags// rnam pa dang bral grub mnga' bdag/ gti/
287b6(rgyud 'bum): mug me long ye shes blta// nga rgyal mnyam pa nyid du dran// so sor rtog pa 'dod chags yin// bya ba grub pa phrag dog che// zhe sdang chos dbyings rnam par dag/ bde chen gcig pa las ni 'dir//
287b7(rgyud 'bum): bye brag lnga ru gyur pa grags// bde ba dkar po bsrubs pa las// zhal bzang po ni sra ba gang // de ni rnam par snang mdzad ces// gti mug chos kyi mtshan nyid can// bde ba nag po zhu ba'i gzugs//
288a1(rgyud 'bum): de ni mo bskyod pa ru dran// bde ba dmar po'i 'od kyi phyir// 'od dpag med pa de bzhin gshegs// rlung gis khyab phyir bde ba sngo// don yod grub pa de rab bstan// nga rgyal las/

288a3(rgyud 'bum): 'bad pa yis ni de mchod bya/ / nam yang smad par mi bya'o// sha dang / khrag dang / bshang ba dang / gci ba dang / mig rngu dang / snabs dang / sen mo dang / so dang / skra dang / spu dang / rus pa

288a7(rgyud 'bum): nas phyi'i don gyis ci'i phyir gnas/ phyi yi thams cad skad cig ma// dpa' mo sems kyi rdzu 'phrul yin// de ltar sems las gzhan pa min// sems nyid nam mkha' lta bu'o// gzugs sogs
288b1(rgyud 'bum): kha dog gnas pa'i phyir/ / tha mal pa yi lus su snang // rnam par dag pas lha nyid du// bla ma'i zhal snga'i bka' drin no// lha mos gsol pa/ mgon po bla ma ji lta bu// slob ma yang ni ci 'drag
288b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyud kyi rim pa ji ltar lags/ / re zhig rgyud ni ji ltar gsungs// dpal ye shes thig le las dpal ye shes thig le'i tshad dang / gnas dang / sa bstan pa'i don dang / phung po rnam par dag pa
288b3(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o/ / // de nas yang ni bshad bya ba// bla ma slob ma'i mtshan nyid ni// bla ma tha mal dngos bral yon tan ldan// gzhan min mchog gi dbang
288b4(rgyud 'bum): gis dbang bskur sku/ / thugs rje dang ldan shin tu rlabs che'i sems// de nyid shes pa log pa'i nga rgyal med// bla ma yul gyis ma kos dmu rgod ma yin pa// rgyud lung bstan bcos du ma'i pha rol phyin//
288b5(rgyud 'bum): yan lag mtshan mchog kun gyis shin tu brgyan// dkyil 'khor 'dri dang dbang gi rim la mkhas// bla ma yid thub srid pa'i 'jigs bral zhing // mya ngan 'das la 'dod pa'i yid dang bral// dngos po
288b6(rgyud 'bum): chu zla lta bur nyid kyis mthong / / drug lhag bcu yi stong pa nyid du sems// bla mchog nyon mongs med cing skye ba med// phung po la sogs skye mched khams dang bral// mchog dang dga' bral gnyis
288b7(rgyud 'bum): ka'i dbus na bzhugs/ / de lta'i dpal bla rdo rje rgyal po nyid// slob ma khrims ldan dul zhing dad pa can// rlabs chen zab mo'i theg pa bsnyen par byed// rnam rtog 'dam gyis rtag tu ma gos shing //
289a1(rgyud 'bum): mkhas shing blo rno thugs rje'i bdag nyid can// spyan ring bzang mo 'di lta bu dag gi/ bla ma dang ni slob ma rnam gnyis kyi// mtshan nyid dang ni legs par brtag pa ni// ji lta'i
289a2(rgyud 'bum): don gyis rab tu gsal ba'o/ / dpal ye shes thig le las bla ma dang slob ma'i mtshan nyid brtag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas gzhan nyon bdag gis bshad//
289a3(rgyud 'bum): ji ltar rgyud kyi rim pa bzhugs// dpal dang ldan pa'i rigs chen rgyud// 'bum bdun gyi ni mtshan zhes bya// de ni gtso bo'i rtsa ba'i rgyud// sku brgyad bdag nyid rab kyi mchog/ de brtag kye yi rdo rje ni/
289a4(rgyud 'bum): 'bum lnga yi ni mtshan zhes bya// dpal ldan phyag rgya chen thig le// de yi phyi ma'i rgyud du dran// ye shes snying por grags pa'i rgyud// de yi phyi ma'i phyi ma'o// dga' mo ye shes thig le'i sgra// bshad
289a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rgyud ni gsang ba che/ / grub pa'i nges bstan thig le ni// zhal bzang mo de snying po dang // de kho na nyid sgron ma'i mtshan// 'bras bu'i rgyud grags 'chad par 'gyur// de bdun du ni bdag gis
289a6(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / shin rmad du byung ba'i rgyud// lha mo brgyad pa sku dang bral// de phyir smra bar mi btub bo// de ltar rim pa thams cad ni// lha mo de nyid shes par bya// sa bon las ni myu gu bzhin// rgyud kun
289a7(rgyud 'bum): rim shes rim pas so/ / rgyud ni rim pas 'di ru grags// yang na ye shes 'khor lo rgyud// yang na don ni rgyud yin te// yang na rim pa gnyis ni rgyud// lha mo gang du skal ldan mo// shes rab
289b1(rgyud 'bum): thabs gnyis phrad pa'i sa/ / de ni rgyud du bshad pa yin// yang na ye shes las 'byung ba// ta yi yig 'bru sku ru grags// na ni de nyid dri ma med// ta yi yig 'bru khu ba yab// ra ni yum ste khrag yin no//
289b2(rgyud 'bum): de gnyis 'dres pa thig le yin// gzhan min rnam shes ngo bo'o// de yi thig le a'i rnam pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nya gang ngo // ta yig dang ni ra yig 'bru// tshul tsam gyis ni gnyis ka ldan//
289b3(rgyud 'bum): de ni rab mchog a yig 'bru// rtsa dang dga' bdag nyid skye med// lha mo 'di ltar rgyud kyi rim// rgyud kyi don yang shin tu bshad// dpal ye shes thig le las rtsa ba'i rgyud la sogs pa'i rim pa
289b4(rgyud 'bum): dang don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o/ / // bcom ldan ye shes thig le lags// nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang mnyam// bdag gis zhu ba gang zhig ci// rgyal ba'i mnga' bdag de
289b5(rgyud 'bum): bdag gsungs/ / mnga' bdag rang gi ngo bo nyid// gang las skyes shing ci las 'ongs// de ni mdor bsdus pa yi tshig/ thub pa chen pos bka' stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
289b6(rgyud 'bum): pa/ dri ba 'di ni shin tu zab// ye shes kyis rnyed gsang ba'o// lha mo khyod ni 'byung ba min// skye ba dang ni 'pho med rab// mchog gi rnam rtog rlabs dang bral// rang gi ngo bo ye shes 'ong // bdag
289b7(rgyud 'bum): rang gi ni ye shes sku'i/ / mchog gi dbang phyug ma khyod 'od// gzhan min bdag dang khyod med na// sangs rgyas kun gyis rnyed dka' ba// khyod med na ni khams gsum kun// mgo bo chang pa'i mi bzhin
290a1(rgyud 'bum): du/ grangs med 'jig rten gyi ni khams// khyod ni ye shes 'od byed pa// khyod ni thams cad dngos kun gyi// thams cad bdag nyid 'byung ba kun// chos kun yongs su shes
290a2(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / de ni thams cad mkhyen par grags// de yang lha mo khyod kyi drin// brjod par mi nus yang dag don// khyod kyi drin gyis grangs med pas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas rnyed 'gyur// mchog gi
290a3(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha'i gnas nas byon/ / mchog gi nam mkha'i gnas su gshegs// mchog gi nam mkha'i ngal so nas// mchog gi nam mkhar rtag tu bzhugs// kun rdzob rnam pa'i mchog tu ni// pad+ma'i skud pa ji
290a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du/ / gsang ba'i sna rtse snying por gnas// langs nas bde ba'i pad+mar ni// thig le khong du chud pa'i phyir// gshegs nas brten pa thams cad sreg/ rgyas pas thig le khyer nas su// yang ni khyod
290a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dir byon pa'i don/ / lte ba sprul pa'i pad+ma yi// lha mo gang tshe khyod kyi gnas// de tshe khyod ni shes rab grags// legs dgyes rab mchog rmad du byung // bdag dang lhan cig gnyis med sbyor// legs
290a6(rgyud 'bum): dgyes dbang mo khyod ni bzhugs/ / tshangs pa'i g.yul sa bye ba mthar// legs dgyes khyod kyi rgya yis btab// grangs med pa la rgyas btab ste// de phyir phyag rgya che khyod grags// dpal ye shes thig le
290a7(rgyud 'bum): las dpal phyag rgya chen po bcom ldan 'das ma'i rang gi ngo bo bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u sa nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o/ / / gsang ba'i pad snying rgyas 'byed pa// rdo rje'i ma gzhan
290b1(rgyud 'bum): yang nu/ / re zhig ci yi gsang ba gsungs// gnas ni gang na yod pa lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// byang chub sems ni gsang ba yin// khu ba'i ngo bo chang dang bral// de yi
290b2(rgyud 'bum): gnas ni mngal yin te/ / phyag rgya dga' ba sbyin pa mo// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ byang chub sems ni khu ba'i gzugs// de ni ji ltar gsang bar brjod// gsang ba'i gnas ni mngal yin te//
290b3(rgyud 'bum): gzhung de bdag la 'phang ma lags// de lta na ni gang zag kun// nges par gsang ba shes par 'gyur// de yang dbang bskur la sogs ni// su la yang ni mi dgos lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis
290b4(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi yum khyod de ni bden// gang zhig khyod kyis nges par bzung ba'i don// 'on kyang drang ba'i don gyi tshig gis ldan// rten gyi don phyir yang na nges pa'i don// rten med na ni
290b5(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu rnyeng mi 'gyur/ / lus kyi dngos med ji ltar 'di ru sems// ji ltar don mthun gsang tshig de ni gsang // drang ba'i don min nges pa'i don yang min// dngos med yang min dngos po'i gzugs ma yin//
290b6(rgyud 'bum): bangan rim 'byung ba thim rnams kyi ni gzhan// khu gzugs gang du de ni yod ma yin// khrag kyang yin par ji ltar yang ni min// mchog dga' dga' bral lhan skyes dga' ba min// gnas mngal de la nam
290b7(rgyud 'bum): yang yod ma yin/ / rdo rje rtsa ba bde chen la sogs min// drug phyed rtsa dang mtsho skyes snying po min// rig min yang min rig pa nam yang min// brjod med nam mkha'i rang gi ngo bo'o// 'di lta bu ni don
291a1(rgyud 'bum): dam par/ / lha mo gsang bar rab tu gsal// yang ni 'bring gi don gyis su// bdag gis gsang bshad khyod nyon cig/ 'bring don de ni don gyi mchog/ mchog gi dga' ba sbyin/
291a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'o// 'bad pas dga' bral srung bar byed// dga' bral dga' bas lhan skyes 'gyur// nor mdud snying la yi ni gsang // byang chub kyi ni sems dang ldan// de ni thabs kyi gsang ba'i don// shes rab ma
291a3(rgyud 'bum): yi de bzhin no/ / gsang ba shes rab dbang gnyis las// dga' mo gsang ba'i don shes so// dpal ye shes thig le las gsang ba'i don zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o// /
291a4(rgyud 'bum): de nas bcom ldan 'das ma phyag rgya chen pos 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis yang zhu ba zhus pa/ mgon po thams cad gtan la phab// rang bzhin ji ltar lags pa gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis
291a5(rgyud 'bum): de lta bu'i tshig gsan pa dang cang mi gsung ba'i dngos pos skad cig tsam bzhugs te/ de nas mi snang ba'i rang gi ngo bor bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das ma phyag rgya chen pos/ bdag rang rten med
291a6(rgyud 'bum): par mthong nas zhus pas shin tu 'gyod nas cang mi smra bar bzhugs so/ / de'i dus su sna tshogs pad+ma la bzhugs pa'i 'khor bye ba phrag bdun cu rtsa gnyis kyi grangs rnams kyis chos kyi 'byung gnas stong
291a7(rgyud 'bum): par mthong nas shin tu ya mtshan du gyur pas kun smra zhing brgyal bar gyur to/ / kye byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' gang na bzhugs//
291b1(rgyud 'bum): / gar gshegs/ kun tu stong par bdag cag gis mthong lags so// lha'i dbang phyug gis gsol pa/ 'khor chen po rnams nyon cig/ bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la/ bcom ldan
291b2(rgyud 'bum): 'das dpal phyag rgya chen pos 'di ltar zhus te/ mgon po thams cad gtan la phab// rang bzhin ji ltar lags pa gsungs// de lta bu'i tshig gsan pa dang / bcom ldan 'das cad mi gsung bar mi
291b3(rgyud 'bum): snang bar gyur to/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rang bzhin de ni brjod du med pa dang / rtog ge med pa dang / brtsal du med pa dang / grangs med pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / gzugs med pa dang / rig pa
291b4(rgyud 'bum): med pa la de dris pas/ de nyid smrar mi btub pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das snang ba med par gyur to// yang 'khor thams cad kyis gsol pa/ kye blo gros chen po chos kyi mdzod/ snang ba med cing
291b5(rgyud 'bum): dngos po med pa chad par mi 'gyur ram/ de'i don la shin tu 'jigs shing yang dag par yid zhum par gyur to// lha'i dbang phyug gis bka' stsal pa/ snang ba med par 'du shes gang // de ni dngos
291b6(rgyud 'bum): med shes mi bya/ / nang gi rang ngor 'gro ba'i phyir// snang ba med par 'di ru brjod// de bas 'khor chen ma 'jigs shig/ yid skyo ba ni yongs su spongs// de la thabs ni gcig yod do// gang gis rdo rje
291b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa nyid/ / sngar ni khyod kyis mthong ba bzhin// pad+ma'i dbus bzhugs mthong bar 'gyur// de'i tshe 'khor thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug gi zhabs la
292a1(rgyud 'bum): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das mthong bar bya ba'i phyir thabs nus pa/ kye blo gros chen po dpa' bo chen po thabs ci yod pa bdag la bstan du gsol/ dpa' bo chen
292a2(rgyud 'bum): pos bka' stsal pa/ dus gcig tu mgrin gcig gis snyan pa'i glus mchod pa gyis shig/ de lta bu'i thabs kyi tshig thos nas thams cad dga' zhing mgu la yi rangs pas/ yang byang chub sems dpa'
292a3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' chen po lha'i dbang phyug gi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ de nas drug ldan la sogs pa'i glu thams cad len no// kye sku rab mchog gi ngo bo'i mtshan nyid ni// gang na bzhugs pa mya ngan
292a4(rgyud 'bum): 'das mtshan nyid/ / de nyid dang bral chad pa'i stong de ni// gnyis med bde bas mkhyen par mi 'gyur ram// rdo rje mtsho skyes mchog sbyor yongs su gzigs// gang zhig dngos med dngos de spyad par mdzod//
292a5(rgyud 'bum): de nas rang bzhin las bcom ldan// chu las nya ni bzhin du bzhengs// mchog gi dga' ba'i gzugs bdag nyid// mchog gi dga' ba'i sbyin pa'i bdag/ dngos dang dngos min gnyis kyi steng // gyen bltas
292a6(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i lte bar ni/ / zhal bzhi dang ni phyag bzhi pa// shin tu ngo mtshar sku dang ldan// rgyal po yi ni bzhugs thabs bzhugs// brgyad gnyis blo ldan byad gzugs can// spyan gsum mchog gi rnam pa can//
292a7(rgyud 'bum): zla ba nyi ma zhabs kyis mnan// rnge'u chung thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ rdo rje 'bar ba phyag na bsnams// de lta bu'i rmad du byung ba'i gzugs mthong nas/ 'khor thams cad dang lhan cig bcom ldan 'das ma phyag rgya chen
292b1(rgyud 'bum): mo langs nas lan gsum du bskor ba byas te dam por 'khyud nas bstod pas bstod pa/ mchog tu rmad byung chen po'i sku ni rgyal gyur cig/ ye shes zab mo rgya mtsho'i snying po rgyal gyur cig/ brjod bral
292b2(rgyud 'bum): bltar med dngos med sku mi mnga'/ / gti mug chen po 'joms de rgyal gyur cig/ mchog dang gzhan mchog de ni mchog gzhan mchog/ mkha' mchog 'od mchog mchog gi ye shes snang // mchog
292b3(rgyud 'bum): gi bdud rtsi'i snying po gang ba'i rgyun/ / mi 'chad rgyun 'bab byed pa rgyal gyur cig/ shin tu lkog gyur dbang pos bltar med pa// skye 'gag 'du byed mtshan med rgyal gyur cig/ de lta bu'i bstod pa'i
292b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po byas nas/ yang phyag rgya chen po lha mo chen mos bcom ldan 'das la dad pas zhu ba zhus pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das dkyil 'khor gyi lha rnams ci'i phyir ma gsungs lags/ bcom ldan 'das
292b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ sru ba dang bsrub pa'i sbyor ba las// lha rnams 'byung ba'i rim pa'o// dang po rtsom pa shin tu 'dar// rnam par shes pas lha mo skye// de ni grong las kha dog dkar// 'dod pa'i gti
292b6(rgyud 'bum): mug rnam par thos/ / grong khyer las ni longs spyod yin// spyod lam lha mo rgyal ba'i 'od// bskum pa las ni snang ba mched// snang ba mched las ye shes 'od// bgrad pa las ni skye ba sbyor// sbyor bas dga'
292b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i skye ma ste/ / mnyam sbyor las ni ye shes skye// ye shes las ni dngos zad ma// khyod las 'di ru dngos po ste// dngos las longs spyod zla ba ma// dkar mo las ni rten shes bya// rten las pad+ma'i lte ba
293a1(rgyud 'bum): ma/ / brang brdabs las ni rnam par 'byed// rnam par 'byed las pad mig ma// gnag dang ljang dang gur kum mdog/ dmar dang sngon po yi ni gzugs// zla ba dkar dang dmar gyi sngon//
293a2(rgyud 'bum): sgo la sogs dang mtshams na bzhugs// zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa// phyag rgya lnga yis rnam par brgyan// snod dang gri gug gis phyag brel// na bza' grol ba phyag gnyis pa// de ni nyi zla'i gdan la
293a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs/ / rus pa sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan// khyod kyi bzhugs thabs ji lta bar// lha mo rnams kyang de bzhin no// de rnams thabs ni bzhi gnyis kyi ni grangs// mnyam pa'i bzhugs thabs phyag dang zhabs la
293a4(rgyud 'bum): sogs/ / rab tu dga' ba'i yid ldan zhi ba'i gzugs// rtag tu sems can don byed 'on brtson// lha mos gsol pa/ dpa' bo rnams kyi ming gi brda// de bzhin nyid kyi rdo rjes gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis
293a5(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ / khyod kyis nga la gang zhus pa// skal ldan lha mo de ni nyon// 'di yi rgyud la bdag la gzhan// mtshan ni yod pa gang la lar// na ni lte ba gsang ba'i pad// dga' bral dga' ba sbyin pa'o//
293a6(rgyud 'bum): ma zhes nor bu bsrubs pa ni// mchog gi dga' ba sbyin pa'o// gang zhig de yi dbus nas langs// de ni bdag gi rang bzhin mtshan// dpa' bo rnams ni bdag gis bshad// shes rab pha rol phyin ma nyon//
293a7(rgyud 'bum): lha chen po dang khyab 'jug dang // pad+ma'i lte ba shin tu blta// lha yi dbang dang 'dod pa'i lha// pad+ma'i mig dang gzhon nu ma// re zhig de ni dkyil 'khor ba// rang gi phyag rgya mtshon cha 'dzin// dpal ye shes
293b1(rgyud 'bum): thig le las bskul ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o/ / / bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das dbang bskur ba'i dus su dkyil 'khor rnams ji lta bu
293b2(rgyud 'bum): lags/ cho ga gang gis dbang bskur ba sbyin zhing blang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chu la sogs pa'i dbang dus su// rdul tshon la sogs dkyil 'khor mdzes// gsang ba'i dbang bskur
293b3(rgyud 'bum): dus su ni/ / me tog sna tshogs mchog gis so// shes rab ye shes dbang bskur dus// sna tshogs dri zhim po yis brgyan// las dang po yi dang po la// nges pa'i don gyi chu la sogs// dbang bskur shes pas
293b4(rgyud 'bum): sbyisprin bya ste/ / de ltar min na skyon du 'gyur// shes rab can gyis drang don der// sbyin no de nas dam tshig sbyin// nor bu mgrin par byang chub sems// bla ma nyid kyis rang rig byed// shes rab lhan cig gnas
293b5(rgyud 'bum): las langs/ / slob ma'i kha yi pad+ma ru// nyid kyi rdo rje rab tu sbyin// de nas bde ba'i bdud rtsis bkrol// mgrin pa'i dbus su rtsa gnyis ni// g.yas dang g.yon na yod pa'o// sbom ma yangs mar 'di ru
293b6(rgyud 'bum): grags/ / srog dang nye ba'i rang ngo bo// g.yon ni srog tu shes par bya// nye ba'i srog ni g.yas na'o// de ru bde bar 'jug par bya// mthe bong srin lag gnyis kyis mnan// de nas ye shes 'byung bar 'gyur//
293b7(rgyud 'bum): bu mos rnyed pa'i bde ji bzhin// reg bya chen pos dga' ba che// dga' ba chen pos bde ba che// bde ba chen pos byang chub sems// shes rab bya gdong ma yi khar// nor bu'i kha las thigs pa gcig/ shes
294a1(rgyud 'bum): rab ye shes zhal bzang mo/ / shes rab bya gdong las bde ba// rdo rje rin chen kha ru 'gro// de ni dbang gi mchog rab yin// sangs rgyas grub pa'i 'bras sbyin bdag/ shes rab
294a2(rgyud 'bum): gzugs bzang b+ha ga rab/ / shin tu lang tsho dbang bskur ldan// dga' sogs bye brag mgu bar byas// de na slob ma la sbyin bya// sems dpa' chen po shes rab 'di// yang dag ye shes rab tu ster//
294a3(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig bka' lung skyabs sbyin te// de ni bu khyod dad par bya// de yi mngal gyi g.yon logs na// i Ta bya gdong ma ni bzhugs// de rnyed tsam gyis rang bzhin ni// shes rab bsnyen pas rnyed par 'gyur//
294a4(rgyud 'bum): de ni gzhan min yongs su shes// bzhi pa'i 'bras bu'i ngo bo yin// rang rig pa dang mchog ye shes// ngag gi lam gyis rnyed dang bral// de na lha mo skal ldan mo// gsang ba las ni shin tu gsang //
294a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyud kun tu ni bdag gis sbas// mtha' yi mtha' ru rab tu gsal// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ mtha' dang mtha' yi don ni ci// mchog gi dbang phyug bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan
294a6(rgyud 'bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ / mtha' ni rnam par 'byed par shes// rnam par 'byed pa bcom pa'i phyir// rnam par 'byed pa bcom pa'i mtha'// rnam par 'byed pa mthar gsal 'gyur// rnam par
294a7(rgyud 'bum): 'byed mthar ye shes che/ / de rang ngo bo'i rang bzhin no// lha mos gsol pa/ dgyes pa rdul tshon dkyil 'khor ni// mnga' bdag ji lta'i rnam pas bri// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang
294b1(rgyud 'bum): zhig khyod kyis yongs su zhus/ / nyon cig lha mo bdag gis bshad// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor 'di run// las la mkhas pas bri bar bya// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad par bya// pad+ma'i nang du char yang bya// char
294b2(rgyud 'bum): yang dang ldan sna tshogs 'dab/ / char yang gi nang thig le ste// de yi steng du rdo rje bri// sna tshogs pad+ma'i ze 'bru ldan// rdo rje gri gug gis ni bskor// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs pa ni yis rnam
294b3(rgyud 'bum): par brgyan/ / sna tshogs bum pa dang ldan pa// dkyil 'khor rab kyi mchog ni bya// shar gyi 'ang ba mar 'khor lo bri// byang du de bzhin pad+mo'o// nub kyi 'dab mar rin po che// lho ru ral gri bsgreng ba'o//
294b4(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma gzhan rnams thod pa ni// bdud rtsi lnga yis rab tu gang // dung gzhu de bzhin ri rab dang // rab tu 'bar ba yi ni me// me mtshams la sogs rim bzhin bya// 'bad pa yis ni yongs su bskor// shar
294b5(rgyud 'bum): gyi sgo ni dpag bsam shing / / byang du 'bras bu sa bon dang // nub tu rin chen sdong bu dang / lho ru sna tshogs rdo rje'o// sgo yi phyi rol rdo rje'i 'phreng // 'od dang ldan pas bskor bar bya// lha mo chen po de lta bu'i/
294b6(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor ye shes sbyin bdag po// dam tshig chen po dang ldan pas// rab tu 'bad pa yis ni bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni bdag po'i phyir// des na bdag ni rab tshim bya// dpal ye shes thig le las dbang
294b7(rgyud 'bum): bskur ba blang ba dang phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bzhi pa'o/ / / bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das/ dga' ba bzhi yi ngo bo dang // bskyed
295a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rim pa ji ltar lags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dga' ba las ni mchog dga' ba// mchog dga' ba las dga' bral dga'// dga' bral las ni lhan cig/
295a2(rgyud 'bum): skye/ dga' ba kun gyi de nyid do// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol pa/ de lta'i rig pa mgon chen po// rig pa sngar gyi gzhung ngam ci// mngon sum dang ni rjes su dpag/ sa bon dang 'dra 'bras bu yin/
295a3(rgyud 'bum): kau tra ba las sA lu ni// gang du yang ni mthong mi 'gyur// dga' bral las ni lhan cig skyes// bde min dga' bral sdug bsngal des// dga' ba kun ni 'joms par byed// mchog gi dbang phyug dga'
295a4(rgyud 'bum): bral 'di/ / dga' ba kun dang mi mthun no// dga' ba las ni mchog dga' ba// mchog dga' ba las shin tu dgyes// bcom ldan mkha' 'gro de rigs lags// yang na mchog las lhan skyes so//
295a5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma de bden// dga' bral las ni lhan skyes min// 'on kyang de bsrungs pa las yod// de min lhan skyes gang du gnas// dga' ba kun dang mi
295a6(rgyud 'bum): mnyam ste/ / dga' ba kun ni 'joms byed pa// 'di skad smra ba shin tu mchog/ don dam pa yi tshig yin no// dga' kun 'gro ba yang gcig pu// yid 'phrog lhan cig skyes pa'o// sprin med snying kha'i nam
295a7(rgyud 'bum): mkha' ru/ / ye shes nyi ma rab mdzes shing // dpal ldan ye shes thig le rgyud// nam yang de ni thos ma yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas ni mchog/ lha mo de ni gang las rnyed// rnal 'byor ma dang
295b1(rgyud 'bum): lhan cig tu/ / du ma'i rgyud du bshad na yang // de lha mod kyi rgyud 'di yi// bcu drug char yang mi phod do// de skad smra ba'i rgyud gzhan kun// dge ba'i yid dang ldan yang yin// 'di ru dad pa med gyur na//
295b2(rgyud 'bum): dmyal ba la sogs 'gro bar 'gyur// mdo sde la sogs gsung rab kun// dad cing gus pa kho na yin// gang phyir rgyud kun gyi snying po// de phyir rgyud 'di rab kyi mchog/ bcom ldan 'das mas gsol
295b3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ sbas pa'i yi ge drang ba gang // snying po ye shes 'bras bu ster// nye ba'i snying po de ni mgon// de ni de ring gsal bar mdzod// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sngags ni shin tu gsal
295b4(rgyud 'bum): ba mchog/ de lta na yang gsal bar byas// sngags kyi bzlas las 'grub par 'gyur// grub pa rnyed pas sangs rgyas sras// hA swA Ta pha hUM hUM ka la ti na dz+nyA dz+ra ba hA ma shrI oM/ hA swA Ta pha hUM hUM ye ma k+Sha la
295b5(rgyud 'bum): ba ma hA ma ye dam dz+re pa oM/ hA swA Ta pha hUM hUM ra sa wi ra sa oM/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa ni bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
295b6(rgyud 'bum): dpa' grangs med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa grangs med pa rnams kyis rdzu 'phrul gyis me tog rnam pa sna tshogs pa man da ra ba dang / man da ra ba chen po dang / sngon med pa'i me tog rnam pa sna tshogs
295b7(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi chun po 'phyang ba dang / rol mo sna tshogs dang / gar dang / glu dang / mchod pa dang / rig pa 'dzin pas byas pa rmad du byung ba'i chos gos dang / rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs dang / gser
296a1(rgyud 'bum): dang / nam mkha' las nor bu'i char bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi rtsar babs par gyur to// de nas nam mkha' las de bzhin gshegs pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems
296a2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' rnams kyis bstod pas bstod pa/ sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gcig pu// legs so legs so bcom ldan 'das// shin tu rmad byung ye shes che// mchog gi dbang phyug gtan la phab//
296a3(rgyud 'bum): 'di yi 'khor ni ngag byed dges// sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed// yang dag mchog gi gsang ba 'di// rnyed par dka' ba don dam pa// dpal ldan ye shes thig le'i rgyud// ye shes rgya mtsho
296a4(rgyud 'bum): gtan la phab/ / de lta bu'i tshogs mchod pa byas nas/ nam mkha' la gnas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa rnams de kho na nyid kyi bsam gtan la bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das mas gsol
296a5(rgyud 'bum): pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das/ bde ba chen po gcig pu'i sku// tshig rgyas pa yi snying po'i don// mchog gi dbang phyug bdag la gsungs// mchog gi dbang phyug gis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig lha mo
296a6(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i mchog/ rgyud kun du ni rnyed dka' ba// gsang sna pad+ma'i snying po ni// tshogs kyi gnas su 'di ru brjod// rdo rje'i rtse mo kha phye'i phyir// de ni rgyas par brjod pa'o// yang na thams cad kyi ni tshigs//
296a7(rgyud 'bum): snying po bya yi gdong mar dran// de la rdo rje rtse mo yis// phye ba de ni rgyas par brjod// i Da ping gal gnyis kyi dbus// rtog med ye shes ngo bo nyid// srub dang bsrub pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje'i mthe'u
296b1(rgyud 'bum): chung rtse mo las/ / reg byas gang gis bde bar 'dzag/ zhal bzang de ni tshig rgyas pa'o// lte ba'i gnas nas smin 'khor lo// de nas gnas pa'i rna ba'o// spyi rtse tshangs pa'i bu ga ni// tshig rgyas pa ni
296b2(rgyud 'bum): gsum du dran/ / ma ni srub dang bsrub pa ste// ra ni dga' ba yin par brjod// mu ni lha mo sgrol ma yin// nga yi yig 'bru zhu ba'i gzugs// g+ha yi yig 'bru sgra ru grags/ ta yi yig 'bru gsal
296b3(rgyud 'bum): bar byed/ / na ni lte ba'i gsang ba'i mthar// de yi dbus su rtag tu shar// zla ba'i sku dang 'dra ba gsal// nyi ma bye ba mnyam pa'i 'od// rdo rje sems dpa' bde ba che// byang chub kyi ni lam rab ster//
296b4(rgyud 'bum): de ni gsang ba ye shes che// rang bzhin tshig gis rab gsal byas// 'bad pa yis ni sba bar bya// su la'ang sbyin par mi bya'o// dpal ye shes thig le las tshig rgyas par bstan pa zhes bya ba'i le'u
296b5(rgyud 'bum): sde nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o/ / / de nas gzhan nyon bdag gis bshad// ye shes rab mchog gang gis smras// de kho na nyid bdag don zab// nges bstan la sogs bye brag tu// srog
296b6(rgyud 'bum): gi dbyug pa bzhugs thabs nas/ / rtsa dang ldan pa'i sbyor ba drug/ thig le shar ba nub pa dang // 'pho ba sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid dang // rtsa yi 'khor lo 'byung ba dgyes// dbang gi rim pa de bzhin no// srung
296b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'i 'khor lo lha mo che/ / snying po sngags kyi rgyal po nyid// sku brgyad bdag nyid mchod sbyin dang // thim dang longs spyod dang ni dbang // rdo rje lha mo ye shes sku// gsang ba'i sgra yang de bzhin no// srung
297a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dam tshig la sogs dang / / dpal ldan sbyin sreg don dam par// srub dang bsrub pa'i dgyes pa dang // sngags kyi bzlas pa mchod sbyin dang // gnas brgyad sku yi ngo bo dang //
297a2(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba la sogs pa yi mchog/ dur khrod rnam rtog med par grags// chu ngogs rtog pa med pa dang // snang ba la sogs mchog ye shes// dngos po la sogs bde ba che// thog ma tha mar dur khrod brgyad//
297a3(rgyud 'bum): zhing la sogs pa bstan pa dang // rlung gi de nyid snying po'i don// 'jug pa gnas la 'gro ba dang // nyer 'gro sbyor ba rab mchog dang // nyid ni ye shes thig le dang // rang gi ngo bo rnam pa mchog/ sa la sogs
297a4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bdag po dang / / de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyabs dang // rgyud kyi rim pa bstan pa dang // phyag rgya chen po'i rang bzhin no// gsang ba'i don ni don dam par// de nyid mchod pas bskul ba dang // shes
297a5(rgyud 'bum): rab ye shes ji bzhin no/ / gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo sogs// zhal bzang tshig rgyas bstan pa'o// gtor ma 'byung la phan don du// sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed// de ni bde ba chen po'i
297a6(rgyud 'bum): mtha'/ / de nyid bsdus pa'i snying po'i don// bzhi bcu'i bdag nyid de nyid don// gsang chen bdag gis rab tu bshad// de nyid sum cu drug bdag po// char yang ye shes tshor byed do// thig le ye
297a7(rgyud 'bum): shes bdag nyid tshor/ / de ni sum cu bdun dbang phyug/ tshul gyis ye shes bdag nyid tsher// de ni sum cu brgyad dbang phyug/ tshul tsam ye shes tshor byed pa// dgu lhag sum du nyid do// mchog shes pa yi rnal 'byor gang // bani bcu'i mnga' bdag chen po'o//
297b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhan mchog gsung lam brjod du med// rnam par dag pa de nyid mchog/ thams cad de kho'i bdag nyid phyir// de bas bye brag mi bya'o// dpal ye shes thig le las de kho na nyid kyi snying po bsdus pa zhes/
297b2(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa drug pa'o// / lha mos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ni mchog dga' ba// kun dga' ba yi rnam pa sku// de kho na nyid zhal brgyad pa'i// rnam par
297b3(rgyud 'bum): dag pa ji ltar lags/ / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de nyid bsgom pa rnam par dag/ skal ldan lha mo khyod nyon cig/ zhal brgyad rnam par thar pa brgyad// nang gi stong pa de nyid do//
297b4(rgyud 'bum): spyan ni nyi shu rtsa bzhi ni// sa dang stobs dang ye shes so// phyag rnams stong nyid rnam par dag/ brgyad gnyis phyag ni stong pa nyid// sbyangs pa'i yon tan sde dang ldan// thod pa rnams kyi ngo bo nyid// sangs
297b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyas chos ni ma 'dres pa/ / 'jigs byed ma ni brgyad gnyis dbye// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi po ni// zhabs bzhi ru ni dran pa'o// chags sdang de bzhin gti mug ni// legs skyes zla 'i 'jigs byed do//
297b6(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig srid pa'i gnas su bzhugs// zhal bzang de phyir g.yas brkyang ba// lha mo g.yon bskum mya ngan 'das// ye shes sku nyid bzhugs pa'o// srid dang mya ngan 'das min phyir// lha mo de phyir
297b7(rgyud 'bum): bzhengs pa'o/ / gzugs brgyad rnam par dag pa yis// sna tshogs pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad// gzugs med gnyis kyi 'du shes phyir// shes rab thabs gnyis bdag nyid do// gar dgu'i ro dang ldan
298a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyir/ / zhal bzang mo ni sna tshogs gzugs// lha mos gsol pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa mchog dbang phyug/ bcom ldan bdag gis rnam dag shes// gsang ba'i don
298a2(rgyud 'bum): gyis ji ltar mgon/ / rdo rje 'dzin pa bka' drin gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gsang ba'i bsgom pa rnam par dag/ lha mo shes rab chen mo nyon// zhal dang lhan cig pa yi spyan//
298a3(rgyud 'bum): / zhal bzang gnas la sogs pa'o// longs spyod rdzogs par yod pa'i rtsa// bcu drug phyag ni bcu drug pa'o// a li thig le rnam dag pa'i// thod pa yin par 'di ru bstan// 'jigs byed rnam par
298a4(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs byed ma/ / legs dgyes dga' ba bcu drug go// skad cig bzhi yi sbyor ba yis// zhabs ni bzhi ru dran pa'o// g.yas brkyang ba ni mchog gi dga'// g.yon brkyang dga' ba dga' ba yin//
298a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhengs pa ldan skyes dga' ba'o// phyag rgya pha rol phyin par dran// dbang gi rang gi ngo bo'o// thim pa smad kyi tshangs pa'i ras// longs spong zhi ba'i pags pa'i gos// legs dgyes dbang phyug yang na
298a6(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / bskyed pa tshangs pa'i pags par grags// bong bu'i zhal ni 'jigs pa'i sgra// phyag rgya shes rab thabs ni che// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med dran// byang chub sems ni rnam dag pas//
298a7(rgyud 'bum): rus pa sna tshogs rgyan la sogs// nam mkha' ru ni 'gro ba'i phyir// gyen du 'bar ba'i dbu skyes so// rang gi ngo bo bde chen phyir// sku mdog nag po mkha' dang mtshungs// dga' bral gyi ni bdud chen
298b1(rgyud 'bum): po/ 'jigs pa byed phyir 'jigs pa che// dpal ye shes thig le las rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das mas ma mchu'i/
298b2(rgyud 'bum): bdud rtsi'i ro phul te/ nyi ma dang zla ba'i me tog gis mchod nas/ bcom ldan 'das rab tu tshim par mdzad nas 'di skad ces gsol to// kye bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus su yang dag par
298b3(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i rgyud 'di skal ba dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams la sus 'chad par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dpal phyag na rdo rje mgon pos bshad par byed do// bcom ldan
298b4(rgyud 'bum): 'das mas gsol pa/ ye shes bdud rtsi char pa che// mgon po khyod kyis rmad byung sbyin// phyag na rdo rje mgon po che// de yi bskyed pa ji ltar lags// rgyal ba'i mnga' bdag ye shes rgyal//
298b5(rgyud 'bum): de yi tshig gcig bka' stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// gang zhig khyod kyis yongs zhus pa// bcom ldan ma de yang dag nyon// phyag na rdo rje mgon chen po// rdo rje 'dzin
298b6(rgyud 'bum): pa kun gyi bdag/ mtha' yas pa yi 'jig rten khams// skye dang 'jig pa'i rgyu yin no// de las skye ba gang yang med// rang byung mchog gi dbang phyug go/ de yi phyag gi rdo rje ni// ye shes bcu
298b7(rgyud 'bum): gnyis skye ba med/ / thog ma yi ni rwa lnga las// de bzhin gshegs pa lnga 'byung ngo // mtha' nas 'byung ba chen po lnga// dbus nas 'gro ba rigs drug 'byung // lta ba kun ni srung don phyir// sna tshogs
299a1(rgyud 'bum): pa yi gzugs su spyod/ / la lar rdo rje 'dzin pa dang // la lar sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs// la lar he ru ka yi gzugs// la lar de bzhin gshegs pa dang // la lar
299a2(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs/ / la lar nyan pa lta bur bzhugs// la lar 'chad do dgyes pad+ma// la lar klog pa'i tshul du bzhugs// la lar rgyud dang bstan bcos ni// mdzad pa dang ni la
299a3(rgyud 'bum): lar 'dzin/ / mang du brjod lta ci zhig dgos// de ston phyag na rdo rje rgyal// lha mos gsol pa/ dkyil 'khor dang ni 'khor la sogs// de la mdor bsdus ji ltar lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis
299a4(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ / dkyil 'khor rdo rje 'dzin pa yi// mkha' 'gro dbang phyug ma dgyes mdzod// gru bzhi la sogs dang ldan pa// dur khrod kyi ni brgyad kyis brgyan// shing brgyad kyis ni chal par bkram//
299a5(rgyud 'bum): rdzing brgyad kyis ni brgyan pa'o// de dbus sna tshogs chu skyes ni// 'dab ma dang ni ge sar bcas// de yi dbus su lha thod pa// dum bu gsum pa kun dang bzhi// rang gi ngo bo chos kyi dbyings// bdud rtsi
299a6(rgyud 'bum): / lngas ni shin tu gang // hUM gi yig 'bru de dbus gnas// ye shes me yi 'od dang mnyam// zla ba nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs// sdig pa thams cad 'jig par byed// hUM la sogs pa yongs gyur las//
299a7(rgyud 'bum): skad cig gcig gis rmad du byung // lha mo bcu gnyis dang ldan pa// phyag na rdo rje rgyal po bzhengs// zhal gcig pa la spyan gsum pa// char sprin gyi ni mdog dang mnyam// phyag bzhi pa ni rta la
299b1(rgyud 'bum): bcibs/ / nyi ma'i 'od dang mnyam pa'i spyan// bskal pa chen po'i me dang 'dra// nyi ma bye ba'i 'od dang mnyam// gdul dka' chen po 'dul bar mdzad// snying rje'i rlan gyis brlan par mdzad//
299b2(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya lnga 'dzin dpa' bo che// ral pa'i dbu rgyan gyis ni brgyan// ral pa sna tshogs rgyan dang ldan// sna tshogs rdo rje zla cod pan// phyag g.yas pas ni rdo rje 'dzin// sna tshogs kyi ni 'od zer 'phro//
