299b3(rgyud 'bum): g.yon ni thod pA T+wAM ga/ gzhan pas rdo rje'i mda' dang gzhu// rta ni 'di ru sngon po'i gzugs// spyan gsum pa la drag po'i 'od// zhi ba'i pags pas sga cha byas// rgod pa'i nga ro gshog pa can/
299b4(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs pad+ma'i 'dab ma la// shar dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang du rdo rje 'jigs byed ma dang / rdo rje drag mo dang / rdo rje gtum mo dang / rdo rje nag mo ste/ gnag pa dang / dmar ba dang /
299b5(rgyud 'bum): ldang ba dang / dkar po ste ngang pa la bcibs pa'o// phyag dang mtshon cha la sogs pa ni gtso bo bzhin no// mtshams kyi 'dab ma bzhir bdud rtsi sna tshogs pas gang ba'i bum pa'i steng na thod pa'o//
299b6(rgyud 'bum): mtshams su rdo rje 'dod ma dang / rdo rje gtsags bu ma dang / rdo rje 'phreng ba ma dang / rdo rje brtson ma rnams ni gzugs gnyis pa'i sku/ nam mkha' lding la bcibs pa gtso bo lta bu'o// shar sgo
299b7(rgyud 'bum): la sogs par rdo rje sha ba ri dang / rdo rje ro langs ma dang / rdo rje rab tu gtum ma dang / rdo rje Dom+bi ni sde/ nam mkha' sngon po dang / nyi ma'i 'od dang / me'i kha dog dang / du ba'i mdog bya rgod
300a1(rgyud 'bum): la bcibs pa mtshams kyi bzhin no/ / dkyil 'khor gyi phyogs bzhi'i snam bu la tshangs pa dang / brgya byin dang / drag po dang / mi mchog la sogs pa 'dre'i rgyal po rang rang
300a2(rgyud 'bum): gi mtshon cha phyag na bsnams pa du ma bya'o/ / lha mos gsol pa/ phyag na rdo rje gtso bo'i gsang sngags ni gang / sems can rnams kyis ji ltar bsgom par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
300a3(rgyud 'bum): lha mo sngags ni yi ge drug/ thams cad 'dod pa'i don grub byed// gdug pa thams cad 'jig byed cing // nad rnams kun ni zad par byed// dngos grub thams cad rab tu sbyin// thams cad mkhyen pas mi thub
300a4(rgyud 'bum): bo/ oM badz+ra pA Ni hUM/ rnal 'byor khro bo'i lta bas bzlas// skad cig gcig gis khams gsum gsod// yang na zhi ba'i lta bas bzlas// mtha' yas pa yi nad zhi byed// mchod sbyin yang dag cher byas nas/
300a5(rgyud 'bum): sngon du bsnyen pa bye ba bya// zhi ba la sogs sbyin sreg bya// ji ltar sngar ni bdag gis smras// dur khrod yang ni chu ngogs su// phyag na rdo rje bsgrub par bya// dung chen gyi ni 'phreng ba yis// 'grub pa'i don phyir bye ba
300a6(rgyud 'bum): bzlas/ / zhi ba zhi pa'i sems kyis ni// drag po drag po sgrub par dka'// dbang bskur med pa'i sems can la// sngags 'di sbyin par mi bya ste// mkhas pas bris sku glegs bam ni// nam yang de la bstan
300a7(rgyud 'bum): mi bya/ / de lta min na grub mi 'gyur// kun nas kun tu rab tu blta// gsang ba yis ni 'grub par 'gyur// kun nas kun tu zhal bzang mo// pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad gyes pa// 'dab ma sna tshogs pa yis
300b1(rgyud 'bum): mdzes/ / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// mnga' bdag phyag na rdo rje rgyal// rgyal po'i bzhugs thabs kyis ni bzhugs// nam mkha'i mdog ltar sngo ba ste// phyag bzhi pa la zhal gcig pa// spyan gsum
300b2(rgyud 'bum): pa la zhi ba'i gzugs/ / g.yas dang g.yon pa'i phyag gnyis ni// rdo rje thod pa kha T+wAM ga/ chos kyi don ni 'chad pa'i phyir// phyag gnyis chos kyi phyag rgya'o// 'dab ma bdun la sangs rgyas bdun// brgyad pa
300b3(rgyud 'bum): la ni byams pa'o/ / pa ti la sogs shing la brten// thams cad zla ba'i gdan du dran// gshin rje gshed la sogs pa bzhi// gzhan min sgo la sogs par dgod// rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs bzhi// sgo yi
300b4(rgyud 'bum): mtshams su gnas pa'o/ / sgo yi phyi rol snam bu'i gnas// yang dag lha chen la sogs pa'o// rdo rje 'phreng bas kun tu mchog/ mkhas pas yongs su bskor bya'o// dpal ye shes thig le las
300b5(rgyud 'bum): dpal phyag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor bskyed pa'i sgom pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o/ / / de nas de'i dus su 'khor thams cad stan las langs te/ lan gsum du
300b6(rgyud 'bum): bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag brjod do// mgon khyod bka' drin gyis ni bdag cag dag/ gzhan dang mi mnyam rgyal bas rnyed
300b7(rgyud 'bum): dka' ba/ / blta bar dka' ba shes dka' gzung bar dka'// gsang ba'i gsang ba mchog gi mchog rab nyid// dpa' bo dbang phyug chos dbyings phyag 'tshal bstod// log shes mun nag 'joms
301a1(rgyud 'bum): la phyag 'tshal lo/ / dang po'i sangs rgyas mchog char grags la 'dud// yig bral thig le skye med la phyag 'tshal// nam mkha'i rang bzhin tshul grags la phyag 'tshal// gnyis
301a2(rgyud 'bum): mu med pa'i tshul tsam la phyog 'tshal/ / mchog gi rang bzhin phyag 'tshal phyag 'tshal 'dud// gzhan tshan gzhan mchog rang bzhin phyag 'tshal lo// dpal me shes thig le las bskyod pa'i tshul
301a3(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o/ / yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'khor thams cad dang bcas pa'i bcom ldan 'das mo la bos te/ kye bcom ldan 'das mo shes rab kyi sa
301a4(rgyud 'bum): rol tu phyin ma sbyor drug gis grags pa bcu dang bral ba bcu gsum gyi bdag nyid/ dpal mchog gi bla ma'i zhal snga nas pad+ma btsal te/ bsam gtan la sogs pa yis yang dag par mthong ba zhes gtan la
301a5(rgyud 'bum): phang / / dpal ye shes thig le las mchog tu gsang zhing shin tu gsang ba thams cad mkhyen pa rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka' ba/ rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rmad du byung ba/ mchog
301a6(rgyud 'bum): chen po nang gi rnam par shes pa drug gi bstod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba'i le'u sa sum cu pa'o/ / dpal ye shes thig le rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so//
301a7(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po shrI pra dz+nyA gup+tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ slad kyis dpalas skya'i dben gnas su chu thig g.yar khral bgyis so//
301b1(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ shrI tad tA pra dI pa nA ma ma hA yo gi nI tan+t+ra rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal de kho na nyid kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba rnal 'byor chen mo'i rgyud kyi rgyal po/ dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag
301b2(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje dpa' bo chen po dang dpa' mo'i dbang phyug mas
301b3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag par bskor nas shes rab kyi b+ha ga la bzhugs so/ / der bcom ldan 'das ma rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug mas legs dgyes chen po'i rol pas sgeg pas nye bar longs spyod pa dang / ma mchu'i bdud
301b4(rgyud 'bum): rtsertsi'i btung bas bcom ldan 'das mnyes par byas te/ kha sbyor gyi thabs kyi sbyor ba las langs nas ri rab kyi nyi rdul gyi grangs kyi rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig pas lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas/ bcom
301b5(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan ye shes zla bar grags// lte ba'i ku mud kha 'byed pa// gang zhig bdag gis zhu ba kun// mnga' bdag chen
301b6(rgyud 'bum): pos bdag la gsungs/ / dpal ldan bla na med pa'i rgyud// rnal 'byor ma zhes rab grags pa// e waM ma yA la sogs sgra'i// don ni ji lta bur ni brjod// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
301b7(rgyud 'bum): nyon cig lha mo spyan bzang ring // khyod kyis nga la gang zhus pa// e waM ma yA sogs sgra yis// khams gsum 'gro dang mi 'gro bcas// shes rab thabs kyi rang bzhin gyis// thams cad rgyas btab
302a1(rgyud 'bum): gzhan gyis min/ / de kho na nyid sgron mar grags// dri med rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu'i gzugs// e waM ma yA de nyid gsum// thog mar bdag bcas pa dang ni// rang bzhin bzhi yi
302a2(rgyud 'bum): bye brag tu/ / don dam par ni shes par bya// thos pa'i don ni zla ba bde// de ni nam mkha' bzhin du mchog/ gcig ces bya ba gzhan mchog rab// srid dang mya ngan 'das pa spangs// dus ni phyag rgya chen po
302a3(rgyud 'bum): ste/ / bskyed pa dang ni rdzogs dang bral// bcom ldan 'das ni mtha' zhes bya// rang dga' nyams su myong ba'i dngos// thams cad ye shes gsum stong nyid// de nyid de nyid kyis ni spangs// de bzhin /
302a4(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa rnam 'byed grags// dang po'i gnas ni rab grub byed// sku ni dga' ba'i gzugs su grags// dbang po gnyis byung dang bral ba// gsung ni mngon par dga' zhes bya// dam tshig las
302a5(rgyud 'bum): byung gis ni spangs/ / thugs ni dga' bral dga' zhes bya// ye shes las byung ba de dang bral// rdo rje lhan skyes zhes su bstan// rang bzhin gyis ni spangs pa'o// lha mo dpal chen nyi ma skyes// zhu ba
302a6(rgyud 'bum): dga' bral dang bral lo/ / dpa' mo'i dbang phyug ma bde rten// dang po'i bdud rtsi las skyes so// yan lag kun gyis yang dag bskor// khyab pa srog gi pad+ma bzhin// shes rab tshangs pa'i sgo lnga'i
302a7(rgyud 'bum): khyim/ / tshangs pa'i ye shes 'dzin phyir ro// b+ha ga dngos po 'jig pa yis// yang na longs spyod myong bas so// bzhugs pa rang gi ngo bo la// gnas pa yang na gshegs pa'o// de lta bu ni don dam par
302b1(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad bdag la sogs par bshad/ / thams cad rnal 'byor rgyud du smras// de bzhin rnal 'byor bla mar yang // nges dang drang don bye brag tu// e waM ma yA la sogs gnas// rgyud shes pa yi don phyir te// gnyis
302b2(rgyud 'bum): su dbye ba'i rgyud rab bstan/ / 'bras bu ye shes chen po'i ro// rang gis nyams myong ngo bo nyid// rang rig rang gis mi rnyed pas// rtog pa thams cad rnam par spangs// lha mes gsol pa/ bcom ldan ye shes
302b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po nyid/ / log pa'i ye shes mun 'joms pa// de nyid nyi shu gnyis bdag nyid// gang zhig ye shes thig ler gsungs// de la yang ni nges pa'i don// mchog gi dbang phyug bdag la gsungs// bcom
302b4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ / gang zhig de nyid nges don du// zhal bzang de ni gsang ba'o// khyod kyis ngor byas bdag gis bshad// de lta min na sbas pa'o// e waM rnam pa'i dbus su ni// gang zhig drug
302b5(rgyud 'bum): cu rtsa bzhi'i 'dab ma'i dbyibs kyi rtsa'i 'khor lo de ni rnam pa dang bcas pa'i rnam par shes pa'o/ / de'i nang du gang du rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid ut+pa la'i rnam pa'i 'khor lo de ni mtha' ste/ de la
302b6(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig zur brgyad pa'i rnam pa'i lte ba de ni snang ba'o/ / gang zhig lte ba'i dbus yangs pa de ni nam mkha' 'o// der ni lnga gnyis nas bzung ste/ bco lnga'i bar gyi sa 'am/ dbang phyug gi mnga' bdag bzhugs
302b7(rgyud 'bum): so/ der gang zhig de kho na nyid gsum gyi bdag nyid de ni lan gsum 'bab pa'i phung po'i rnam par shes pa sems dang sems las byung ba dang / ma rig pa'i gzugs kyis gsum du dbye ba zur dang po la
303a1(rgyud 'bum): thun tshod gcig gi bar du 'bar ba'o/ / gang zhig srog gi dbyig pa de ni lu gu rgyud kyi rnam pa'i mdud pa sum cu rtsa gnyis su sgom pa dang / phra mo'i thig le ro gcig pa'i gzugs kyis dbyin
303a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bdud rtsi zur gnyis pa la thun tshod gnyis kyi bar du zhu ba'o/ / drug po de ni bskyed pa dang rdzogs pa'i grags pa dga' ba drug zur gsum pa la thun tshod gsum gyi bar du 'dzag pa'o// gang zhig thig le shar ba dang /
303a3(rgyud 'bum): nub pa de ni thim pa dang longs spyod du grags pa'i srog de ni zur bzhi pa la thun tshod bzhi'i bar du 'bar ba'o// gang zhig 'pho ba'i sbyor ba de ni steng dang 'og gi 'dab ma yod par byang chub kyi sems 'dus pa'i dbang
303a4(rgyud 'bum): ni zur lnga pa la thun tshod lnga'i bar du zhu ba'o/ / gang zhig rtsa'i 'khor lo 'byung ba de ni yan lag thams cad la bdud rtsi rgyas pa zur drug pa la thun tshod drug gi bar du 'dzag pa'o// gang zhig dbang gi rim pa de
303a5(rgyud 'bum): ni gcig nyid srog gi kha ru srog la 'bab pa dang / 'phur ba dang / khyab pa de'ang zur bdun pa la thun tshod bdun pa'i bar du 'bar ba'o// gang zhig srung ba'i 'khor lo de ni mthe'u chung gi mdud pa'i nang du
303a6(rgyud 'bum): bdud rtsi la bskor ba zur brgyad pa la thun tshod brgyad kyi bar du zhu ba'o/ / de dag ni g.yon du bskor ba'i srog gi rlung la zhon pa nyi ma skye ba la mtshan mo dang / nyin mo'i bar du sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi cha rgyas par
303a7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi nang na bcu drug bral ba'i mtshan nyid mi gsal ba dang / dga' ba'i mtshan nyid bcu drug gsal ba de'i don gyi phyir dga' bral gyi dga' ba'i mtshan nyid a li'i rang gi ngo bo
303b1(rgyud 'bum): / zla ba'o// phyi dang phyi ma'i don rnams kyis ni nang dang nang gi don gnas pas shes par bya'o// de'ang phyi'i chos kyi grangs kyis so// nang srog gi rlung gi grangs kyis so// lha mos gsol pa/ sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi
303b2(rgyud 'bum): chu skyes kyi ut+pa la'i rnam pa la bde ba chen po'i kun tu spyod pa nges pa'i don gyis gnas pa de mchog gi dbang phyug gi bka' drin bsgrub tu gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ nyon cig lnga
303b3(rgyud 'bum): mo skal ldan mo/ / gsang ba chen po ye shes mchog/ gang zhig shes pa tsam gyis ni// thams cad sa yi dbang phyug 'gyur// gang zhig snying po'i sngags ni nyid// de ni bdag nyid bcu drug bde// kun rdzob ri bong
303b4(rgyud 'bum): can gyi 'od/ / don dam par ni nam mkha' bzhin// gang zhig sku brgyad mchog sbyin ni// de ni mtshan mo brgyad mchog go/ lha mo yang na ye shes brgyad// mtshan mo nyin mo gnyis las 'byung // gang zhig
303b5(rgyud 'bum): thim dang longs spyod dbang / / de ni nges par bskyed rim mo// lha mo bskyed rim gsal ba ste// rim las byung ba'i bde ba che// skal ldan mo gang ye shes sku// da ni rim sogs yan lag spangs// yan
303b6(rgyud 'bum): lag bzhir dbye drug dbye 'am/ / bskyed dang rdzogs pa'i rim pa'o// lha mo gang zhig gsang ba'i sgra// de ni ye shes gsum dang bral// yang na gzhan min bdag nyid gsum// mtshams kyi ye shes yod
303b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i phyir/ / lha mo gang zhig dam tshig ni// srung ba la sogs nges par ro// de ni bde ba dbus gnas su// gzung bya yang na gang nang du// gang zhig sbyin sreg don dam par// de ni ha zhes glo bur te// char yang
304a1(rgyud 'bum): dbus yod thig le ni/ / gang du skad cig gis thim mo// gang zhig srub dang bsrub thabs ni// de ni thog ma'i dga' ba spangs// lha mo de bzhin tha ma'ang min// thog ma tha ma gnyis dang
304a2(rgyud 'bum): bral/ / skal ldan mo gang sngags kyi bzlas// de ni srid pa 'das pa'i yid// mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas kyang min// gnyis kyi ngo bo gnyis dang bral// gang zhig gnas ni brgyad du bstan// de ni nyi skyes ma rgyas
304a3(rgyud 'bum): pa/ / gnas kyi dbang gis shar ba la// nye bas myur du rgyas pa'o// gang zhig dga' ba la sogs rim// de ni rim pa gnyis su dbye// rnam bcas las ni dang po pa// rnam bral bcu yi dbang phyug go/ gang
304a4(rgyud 'bum): zhig dur khrod rnam rtog bral/ / dbugs dbyung la sogs rnam par spangs// byang chub kyi ni sems ro la// rnam par zhu ba dam tshig phyir// lha mo gang zhig chu yi ngogs// de ni rtog med ma yi mthar// yang ni de
304a5(rgyud 'bum): ru srog gi rtsa/ / bde ba'i chu bo 'bab pa'i phyir// gang zhig snang ba sogs ye shes// de ni dga' ba dang ldan yid// sa dang chu dang 'od kyi gzugs// de bzhin rlung gi ngo bo dang // gang zhig dngos po rten la
304a6(rgyud 'bum): sogs/ / de ni bde ba'i dngos por rig/ rang gi rnam pa'i bye brag gam// rnam par dpyod pas nges par spyod// lha mo gang zhig dur khrod brgyad// de ni bde ba la thim zhes// rnam par rtog pa 'dzin pa'i sku//
304a7(rgyud 'bum): de la thim zhing thim pa'o// gang zhig shing la sogs pa'i don// de ni dang po'i bdud rtsi rgyu// rtsa de rten pa'i gzugs su grags// thams cad rnam pa'i bde sbyin ma// gang rlung de nyid snying po'i don// de ni
304b1(rgyud 'bum): rin chen gdu bu'i bde/ / 'dzum pa yis ni yang dag par// pad+ma'i zhal de myong ba'o// lha mo gang zhig 'dzum la sogs// de ni gyen du gzung ba'i rlung // yang ni rtsa yi kun spyod las// 'gro ba'i bdud rtsi
304b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa'o/ / gang zhig nyer 'gro'i bsam gtan sbyor// de ni zla ba gyen du byed// yang na tshangs bzhi rnam dbye byas// rnam par shes pa legs gshegs gsol// gang nyid ye shes thig le ni// de na drug
304b3(rgyud 'bum): phyed gsum dang bral/ / bcu dang lnga yi sa rnams ni// dbang phyug 'pho med skye med do// gang zhig bdag gi rang ngo mchog/ de ni nges par bzhi pa'i 'bras// yang na tor ya nyams su myong // 'bras bu'i/
304b4(rgyud 'bum): sgras ni brjod pa'o// gang zhig sa yi dbang byed pa// de ni de nyid drug rang bzhin// de nyid drug las de nyid gsum// de nyid gsum las rang bzhin gcig/ gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku// de
304b5(rgyud 'bum): ni mya ngan 'das mtshan nyid/ / yang na dga' ba dang ni bral// dga' bral dga' min rang ngo bo// lha mo gang zhig rgyud bstan pa// de ni bde ba shin tu 'phel// bde dang bral ba'i bde ba ni// yang na de nyid
304b6(rgyud 'bum): rnyed pa'o/ / gang zhig phyag rgya che rang bzhin// de ni thim sogs yid las 'das// rang gis nyams myong rang ngo bo// bsam gtan 'dzin pa spangs pa'o// gang zhig gsang ba don dam par// de ni dga'/
304b7(rgyud 'bum): ba dga' dang bral// yang ni nang gi reg bya ste// reg bya dang bral rtog pa med// gang zhig bskul ba'i mchod pa'i don// de ni dri med bde ba 'byung // 'das pa las ni yang skye ba// skye ba de la 'phel ba'o//
305a1(rgyud 'bum): lha mo shes rab ye shes gang // de ni kha la snying khar bde// kha ni rtag tu shes rab yin// snying kha ye shes brjod pa'o// gang zhig gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'khor// de ni khu ba 'pho
305a2(rgyud 'bum): med dge/ yang na bde chen rang ngo bo// bde ba'i rnam par rtog dang bral// lha mo tshigs rgyas gang zhig ni// bya gdong ma de khong du chud// yang na tshigs ni zhu med khu// dga' mo rgyas pa mchog yin no//
305a3(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba srung don gtor ma gang // de ni srog chags bsad pa'o// bcad pa de ni mchog gi gnas// 'gro ba 'gog par byed pa'o// de dag ni mchog gi gsang ba chen po'o gsang chen bcom
305a4(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das ma bzhi bcu'i bdag nyid kyi de kho na nyid bde ba chen po'i rgyal po'i bdud rtsi'i gter la nges pa'i don to/ / lha mos gsol pa/ bzhi bcu'i bdag nyid de nyid ni// shin tu reg med gzung
305a5(rgyud 'bum): bar dka'/ / sa yi dbang phyug du tsam zhig/ mchog gi dbang phyug gis mkhyen lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// sna tshogs rnyed pa sum cu drug/ bcu gcig sa yi bdag po'o// dga'
305a6(rgyud 'bum): ba rnyed pa sum cu bdun/ / bcu gnyis sa yi bdag por brjod// mchog dga' rnyed pa sum cu brgyad// de ni bcu gsum pa yis// sum cu dgu lhag mthar thug pa// sa ni bcu bzhi rnyed pa'o// bzhibacu
305a7(rgyud 'bum): de ni lhan skyes so/ / bco lnga rnyed pa'i mnga' bdag go/ gang zhig bcu drug pa yis// brjod du med pa nam mkha' bzhin// de la dbang phyug mchog gi mkha'// thams cad mkhyen pa rnyed dka' ba//
305b1(rgyud 'bum): zad med 'pho med zhi ba ste// skye med rmad byung bas rmad byung // kye bcom ldan 'das sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i rgyal po'i bdud rtsi'i gter de kho na nyid de la kun tu spyod pa'i
305b2(rgyud 'bum): dus ni gang lags/ 'dus pa ni ci zhig lags/ nyams su myong ba ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bdag nyid la sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi chu tshod kyi bar du srog
305b3(rgyud 'bum): dang rtsol ba'i rlung gnyis shar ba ni kun tu spyod pa'o/ / rtsol ba'i rlung 'byung ba'i dus su gang zhig yan lag thams cad la khyab pa'i srog de ni g.yon bskor du 'byung ba yis/ ut+pa la'i rnam pa 'dzum zhing
305b4(rgyud 'bum): nang gi lte ba'i snying po rtsa ba'i sdong bus 'jug pa'o/ / 'jug pa tsam gyis zur brgyad pa'i nang na yod pa'i bde ba chen po'i srog gi rgyal po la gang zhig ro gcig pa'i mtshan nyid de ni 'dus pa'o// de'i dus su gang
305b5(rgyud 'bum): zhig bdag dang gzhan gyi bye brag med pa gnyis su med pa'i spros pa dang bral ba'i ye shes kyis thams cad gzigs pa de ni nyams su myong ba'o/ / lha mos gsol pa/ gang zhig nyams myong las rnyed de//
305b6(rgyud 'bum): mnga' bdag de ni ji ltar lags// nyams su myong bas gang rnyed pa// de nyid mdor bsdus bka' stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dris pa de ni rmad byung mchog/ nyon cig lha mo spyan
305b7(rgyud 'bum): bzang ring / / nyams su myong bas gang rnyed pa// dga' ba'i dbang mo de brjod med// bla ma'i zhal nas nyams su myong // dbang bskur las ni rnyed pa'o// lha mos gsol pa/ dbang bskur ba ni du ma zhig/
306a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyud rgyung nang du rab tu gsal// 'di ru bye brag ci 'dra ba// su la sbyin par bgyi ba lags// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dga' ba'i 'bras bu bye brag tu// dbang ni re
306a2(rgyud 'bum): zhig bzhi rung dbye/ / dang po dga' ba dang ldan pa// las dang po la sbyin par bya// gnyis pa mchog dga' dang ldan pa// snang ba gsum ni thob pa la// dga' ba gsum pa dang ldan pa// chos kyi sprin rnyed nges
306a3(rgyud 'bum): pas so/ / kun tu 'od sa zhes bya ba// rnyed pa bzhi la sbyin par bya// lha mos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das snang ba la sogs pa dang / chos kyi sprin dang / kun tu 'od rnyed pa la de lta bu'i dbang gi
306a4(rgyud 'bum): rim pa lags na/ sa la sogs pa ma rnyed pa la ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sa la sogs pa ma rnyed pa rnams la thog mar rang gi ngo bos so// sa la sogs pa rnyed pa
306a5(rgyud 'bum): rnams la mthar thug pa'i rang gi ngo bos so/ / gang gi phyir zhe na/ de rnams la brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis shin tu bsod nams kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis bya ba la sogs pa dang bral ba'i ye shes chen
306a6(rgyud 'bum): po mthong ba tsam gyis thob bo/ / ji ltar pad+ma yongs su smin pa nyi ma'i 'od kyis reg pa tsam gyis rgyas so// ma smin pa de bzhin du ma yin no// lha mos gsol pa/ ma smin pa rnams la yongs su smin
306a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dus gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sbyin sogs bsod nams bsags pa yis// mchog gi bla mas gtan la phab// skal ldan mo de smin pa'i dus// de las bla med
306b1(rgyud 'bum): byang chub ni/ / bla med gnas ni thob pa gang // phyi nas ci yang bslab mi dgos// bla med ye shes chen po'i gnas// 'bad mi malngar rim par tsam gyis/ sna tshogs gzugs
306b2(rgyud 'bum): ni mthong bar 'gyur/ / de bzhin bla med 'od kyis ni// ye shes chen po mthong bar 'gyur// ye shes chen po sku dang bral// gnyis su med pa ram mkha' bzhin// lus dang ngag dang yid gzugs
306b3(rgyud 'bum): min/ / sgra la sogs pa rnam par spangs// dpe med nam mkha' dang bral ba// srid dang mya ngan 'das pa spangs// sbom dang phra la sogs las 'das// char yang thig le dang bral ba/ tshul dang
306b4(rgyud 'bum): tshul tsam ma yin te/ / mchog dang gzhan mchog gnas las grol// skye ba med dang 'chi med pa// rmang byung chen 'du shes so// lha mos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das ye shes chen
306b5(rgyud 'bum): po'i dbang phyug bla na med pa'i yang dag pa'i byang chub rnyed pa la ye shes chen po brjod du med pa'i gnas ga'an rnyed pa yod dam ci/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grangs med pa'i
306b6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum khyod ci la de lta bur 'dri/ brjod du med pa'i ye shes chen po khyod kyis ci phyir mi shes/ de ltar yin na bdag gi rang gi ngo bo yang dag par khyod kyis mi shes so// lha mos
306b7(rgyud 'bum): gsol pa/ khyod kyi ngo bo bdag gis shes// 'on kyang bdag gis gzhan zhig zhus// sems can byang chub las gzhan ci// mchog gi dbang phyug rnyed pa 'am// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'
307a1(rgyud 'bum): stsal pa/ / byang chub rnyed las gzhan ci zhig/ zhal bzang mo de rnyed yod dam// 'on kyang de la mthong ba yod// tshol la bdud rtsi ji bzhin no// lha mos gsol pa/ bcom
307a2(rgyud 'bum): ldan dpa' bo'i dpa' dbang phyug/ rang bzhin ye shes sbyin pa po// bdag gis gzhan zhig zhu ba bgyid// de la bka' drin bdag la stsol// dbang gi rim pa'i ye shes gang // bzhi pa de ltar de
307a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhin no/ / de la re zhig ji bzhin don// rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag la gsungs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzhi pa de nyid ngo bor grags// de ltar ye shes 'du shes so// de bzhin ye shes
307a4(rgyud 'bum): las byung zhes/ / ye shes las byung lte bar bde// lha mo ye shes la la yod// ye shes las byung ske ru ste// ske ru longs spyod ngo bor grags// snying la ru ni dbang zhes bya// thim pa kha ru shes bya ste//
307a5(rgyud 'bum): bskyed pa'i rim pa yi ni phyogs// yang na de bzhin gyi ni sgra// ji bzhin shes rab la sngar thal// de ltar ye shes lta ba yis// bkug nas rang gi kha la bkod// rang gi snying kha'i pad gnas su//
307a6(rgyud 'bum): byas nas nyid kyis nyams su myong // de yi skad cig ye shes bde// spros pa dang bral rtog med pa// sems kyis thams cad mthong nas su// nam mkha' bzhin du bsam par bya// de yang bsam pa
307a7(rgyud 'bum): bor nas su/ / phyi nas bsam pa ci yang med// nyid ni bde chen ye shes te// nam mkha' zla ba bzhin du mthong // lha mo de ni rdzogs pa'i rim// don dam par ni shes par bya// lha mos gsol pa//
307b1(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan ye shes rin chen nyid// 'dod pa thams cad rab 'grub pa// snang ba bzhi la go rim gnas// mnga' bdag chen pos bka' stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
307b2(rgyud 'bum): snang ba bzhin la go rim gnas/ / sems dang sems byung 'du shes so// de dag las ni ma rig 'byung // mtshams kyi 'du shes mtshan nyid can// nyin mo'i rang bzhin sems las 'byung // sems
307b3(rgyud 'bum): ni mtshan mo'i ngo bo nyid/ / yang dag 'od ni gsum dang bral// lhan skyes ye shes mtshan nyid do// gang tshe tshangs pa'i tshigs su sems// lha mo de tshe nyin mor 'gyur// gang tshe de las srog 'pho ba
307b4(rgyud 'bum): de tshe mtshan mo 'og na gnas/ / steng yang ma yin 'og ma min// de tshe mtshams shes dran par bya// de yang me yi rang bzhin grags// nyi ma la ni srog 'dzin ma// gang gis nyi ma yod pa ni// snang ba
307b5(rgyud 'bum): las ni shar dus 'gyur/ / snang ba zla ba zhes par bstan// yongs su zhu ba'i bdud rtsi g.yo// lha mo chen mo g.yo ba'i phyir// dga' bral dga' bar rab tu grags// gang du chad pa las ni thim//
307b6(rgyud 'bum): mchog gi dga' ba shar ba'i dus// de ni snang ba dang po'i dga'// de las mchog ni gsal bar 'gyur// gsang phyir snang ba mched par grags// zhu med g.yo med ska ba'o// ska ba las ni phra mo'i
307b7(rgyud 'bum): dngos/ / bde sbyin yang na kun spyod do// kun spyod las ni thob pa yin// zhal bzang mo ni snang bas so// de ni mtshams zhes grags pa ste// dbus kyi gnas su yod pa'i phyir// dbus kyi gnas
308a1(rgyud 'bum): na yod pa na/ / de phyir kun tu spyod byed pa'o// dbus ni dngos po thams cad la// 'dus par byed pa dran pa'o// yang na gang du mtshan mo ni// ma byung nyi ma nub pa'o// de ni dbus rgya
308a2(rgyud 'bum): mtshams zhes grags/ / rang bzhin dga' ba sbyin byed ma// de nyid snang ba thob pa yin// thams cad skye ba'i rgyu yin no// gang du dbus mtshams skad cig gis// bde ba'i tshor ba ma shes na// skal
308a3(rgyud 'bum): ldan lha mo de ru ni/ / dga' bral gsal bar 'gyur ba'o// de yi nyams su myong shes pa// skyon ni cung zad mi byed do// mi shes pas ni skal ldan mo// rtsa ba dang bcas med par byed// rtsa ba snang
308a4(rgyud 'bum): ba zhes byar dran/ / khu ba'i gzugs ni zla ba'o// bde ba chen po'i bdud rtsi'i gter// bsrubs las skye ba yin pa'i phyir// lha mo me tog snang ba mched// dmar ba'i phyir ni nyi mar brjod// bde chen
308a5(rgyud 'bum): rnam par smin pa'i phyir/ / dmar ba'i gzugs ni sngar 'gyur ro// 'bras bu thob pa'i grags pa ste// mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan no// dngos dang dngos min bral ba'i phyir// zhal bzang mtshams
308a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi ye shes so/ / nyin mo snang ba mched 'khor grags// mtshan mo snang ba mya ngan 'das// srid dang mya ngan 'das bral ba// mtshams ni snang ba thob pa'o// de lta bu yi gsang chen mchog/ gang du yang ni
308a7(rgyud 'bum): gsal ma byas/ / skal ldan khyod kyi ngor byas pas// ye shes rin chen gsal byas so// lha mos gsol pa/ 'bras bu de nyid rin chen gang // mnga' bdag de ni ji ltar rnyed// bcom ldan 'das
308b1(rgyud 'bum): kyis bka' stsal pa/ / 'bras bu de ni rin chen gang // de ni gnyis su dbye bar gnas// mchog gi dga' ba'i ngo bo gcig/ mchog gi dga' ba dang bral ba// mchog dga' ngo bor grags pa ni// nyam/
308b2(rgyud 'bum): su myong bas rnyed pa yin// mchog gi dga' ba dang bral ba// rang las rab tu gsal bar 'gyur// skal ldan mo gang nyams su myong // de ni rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin no// nyams su myong mir rdzogs pa
308b3(rgyud 'bum): ni/ / gang du sus kyang mi shes so// ji ltar bu mo lang tsho ba ba// skyes bu med na nam yang min// legs dgyes kyi ni bde myong ba// legs skyes dbang mo mi shes so// gang zhig bsam pa la/ gas
308b4(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ / de ni bskyed pa'i mtshan nyid do// bskyed pa dang ni rdzogs bral ba// de ni 'bras mchog rang bzhin no// de ru gang zhig sgom pa ni// phra mo'i phra mo yang dag mchog/ gang gis bla na med pa dang / 'gro
308b5(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ma de yod pa min/ / bla na med pa'i ye shes che// bzhi dang bral ba rtag tu shar// rtag tu shar ba las gzhan ci// gang du yang na bsgom yod da// gal te gang gis bsgom pa de/ khyad pa
308b6(rgyud 'bum): yongs mi skye/ / mi skye'i phyir na bsam gtan ngal// gal te khyad par 'ong 'gyur na// de ni de nyid rang bzhin min// de nyid min par the tshom med// de nyid mi bsgom de nyid ni// su zhig de la rnyed par 'ding//
308b7(rgyud 'bum): de ni mkha' la ri mo ni// mchog gi dbang mo 'dri ba'o// lha mos gsol pa/ gsang ba chen po'i rgyud 'di ni// shes pa dang ni bshad pa su// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang phyogs su
309a1(rgyud 'bum): dpal rdo rje'i gnas su u rgyan du rgyal po in+d+ra b+hU ti zhes bya bas shes pa dang / bshad pa dang / sems can la gsal bar byed do// lha mos gsol pa/ kye bcom ldan 'das
309a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po chen po in+d+ra b+hU ti zhes bya ba de sa du'i dbang phyug lags bka' stsol cig/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ dpal ye shes thig le'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las gang zhig ngas bstan pa'i phyag
309a3(rgyud 'bum): nardo rje'i rgyal po de nyid in+d+ra b+hU ti sprul pa'i skus sa bcu'i dbang phyug ye shes kyi sku sa bcu bzhi'i dbang phyug go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / ri rab kyi nyi rdul gyi grangs
309a4(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das ma dang lhan cig tu stan las langs te/ lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas// zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ rang rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyis sna tshogs pa'i mchod pas mchod sbyin
309a5(rgyud 'bum): byas nas bstod pa/ de kho na nyid bdud rtsi rgya mtsho'i snying po rab mchog rgyal gyur cig/ ye shes nam mkha' skye med gzugs med brjod med sku rab rgyal gyur cig/ dngos dang dngos min ro gcig ngo bo'i
309a6(rgyud 'bum): rmad byung de nyid rab gter rgyal gyur cig/ stong nyid stong pa nyid min mchog dang gzhan mchog 'od kyis grub pa rgyal gyur cig/ de lta bu'i bstod pa'i rgyal pos bstod nas// 'khor thams cad bcom
309a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das dang bcas par mi snang bar gyur to/ / dpal rnal 'byor ma chen po'i rgyud kyi rgyal po'i rgyal po mchog chen po rmad du byung zhing / rmad du byung ba de kho na nyid kyi sgron ma zhes bya ba rdzogs
309b1(rgyud 'bum): so/ / rgya gar gyi mkhan po chen po pradz+nyA shrI gup+tas bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/ dus phyis dpal sa skya'i dben gnas su bsgyur cing nus te dag par byas so//
309b2(rgyud 'bum): rgya gar skad du/ shrI bud+d+ha ka pA la nA ma yo gi nI tan+ta rA dza/ bod skad du/ dpal sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi
309b3(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po/ dpal sangs rgyas thod pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
309b4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po rgyan dang ldan pa'i dbus su/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / rnal 'byor ma rnams dang lhan cig tu bzhugs te/ 'phags pa kun dga' bo la sogs pa 'dod
309b5(rgyud 'bum): chags dang bral ba'i gtso bo rnams dang / 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag brgyad cu dang yang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom
309b6(rgyud 'bum): ldan 'das rdo rje 'chang phyag rgya chen po'i rdo rje'i tshig gis rdo rje chen po'i gnas su/ rgyud thams cad dang sngags yang dag par bshad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos rdo rje dang
309b7(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma yang dag par sbyar bas/ btsun mo'i b+ha gar yongs su mya ngan las 'das so// de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa mthong nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rnal 'byor ma thams cad mang du
310a1(rgyud 'bum): gyur te gcig la gcig lta zhing / e ma'o bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po dkyil 'khor chen po rgyan dang ldan pa'i dbus su ji ltar yongs su mya ngan las
310a2(rgyud 'bum): 'das/ de nas rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs sde ma la/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// lha mo sems can bsod nams dman pa rnams nus pa la zhon par
310a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ba'i thabs cung zad mchis sam/ gsungs pa/ rnal 'byor gyi rgyud la bye ba phrag drug nyid do// rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud la ni bye ba phrag bcu drug nyid do// mdo sde so so la ni bye ba phrag brgyad cu'o//
310a4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa la ni bye ba bsgres pa'i 'bum phrag lnga'o// 'di dag thams cad ni thub pa'i dbang pos gsungs so// sngags dang bral na ni rgyud kyi nus pa mi snang ste/ rgyud la lar ni ci
310a5(rgyud 'bum): nas sngags bye ba bzlas par gsungs so/ / bsod nams 'bring po rnams kyis ni sngags 'bum bzlas pas myur bar 'grub par gsungs so// bsod nams che bas khri bzlas pas shin tu myur bar 'grub
310a6(rgyud 'bum): bo/ de ltar rdo rje chen po rgyud thams cad kyi bdag po'i gtso bos gsungs so// bsod nams chung ba'i sems can rnams kyis ni bye ba bzlas par gsungs so// sems can 'bad rtsol chung ba rnams kyis
310a7(rgyud 'bum): ni 'bum bzlas par bdag smra'o/ / sems can sgom pa la zhan pa rnams kyis ni khri kho na bzlas bya'o// sems can 'dod chags la zhugs pa rnams kyi sngags kyi bzlas pa ji ltar lags/ blun po dang lkugs
310b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rigs can rnams kyi sngags kyi grangs ji ltar lags/ shin tu sems la dmigs pa sngags kyi bzlas pa ji ltar lags/ 'di ltar phan tshun smra bas bzlas na dngos grub gzhan du'ang 'gyur ro//
310b2(rgyud 'bum): gal te dman pa'i sems kyis nyon mongs bzhin pas bye ba brgya bzlas pa de'i tshe bskal pa skar ma lta bu bye bar yang de la dngos grub med do// de ltar thos nas rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs sde ma bcom ldan 'das
310b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi zhal la lta bar byed cing zur mig dang bcas pa'i chags pas bltas te/ shin tu khro bas 'jigs par byed cing snying rje'i thugs 'khrugs pas/ bdud kyi dpung rab tu bcom mo// de ltar bzhugs
310b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lha mo chen mo rgyud thams cad kyi bdag po'i dbang phyug la de nas des gzigs pa tsam gyis bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu las sngags phyung ngo / / oM bud+d+he sid+d+he su sid+d+he/ a mri ta a ra dza bud+d+ha ka pA la s+pho
310b5(rgyud 'bum): Ta ne s+pho Ta ya trA sa ya ho hUM phaT/ de ltar sngags kyi mchog son pas sa rim pa bdun gyi 'og tu chud pa'i klu rnams bcom par byas shing phye mar byas nas slar 'ongs te sna tshogs sde ma'i zhal du zhugs te/
310b6(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i nang nas byung nas slar thod par zhugs so// sngags 'di'i mthus klu rnams zhig ste/ skrag cing dug skyug par gyur to// rdul byung bar gyur to// nor rgyas la sogs pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po'i klu thaH
310b7(rgyud 'bum): cad lpags te/ stobs kyi rgyu dang / dung skyong dang / 'jog po dang / mtha' yas dang / pad+ma dang / pad+ma chen po la sogs bkru chen po rnams dang / gzhan gang yang rung ba dug las byung ba thams ca
311a1(rgyud 'bum): kyang lhags so/ / rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs sde ma la phyogs te klu thams cad kyis zhus pa/ lha mo bka' ci stsol ci zhig bgyi zhes smra'o// gsungs pa dang / gang yang sangs
311a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyas nyams su myong ba de ltar gyis shig/ de ltar thos pa tsam gyis dkyil 'khor chen po rgyan dang ldan pa'i dbus su bcom ldan 'das kyis thod pa kha phye ste glegs bam byung ngo // nam mkha' la sgra
311a3(rgyud 'bum): byung ngo / / lha mo sna tshogs sde ma zung // sems can kun la phan 'dogs ma// rgyud 'di rgyal po chen po ste// rnal 'byor ma yi gong na med// sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba// sems can kun la phan/
311a4(rgyud 'bum): byed pa'o// de ltar thos nas sna tshogs sde mas glegs bam yang dag par bzung ste/ phyag na rdo rje la nye bar gtad do// phyag na rdo rje rgyud 'di zung // sems can kun la bde 'bab pa// rnal
311a5(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma yi dngos grub kun/ / 'bras bu myur du ster byed pa'i// mnan dang spar ba ye shes che// gong na med pa rnyed dka' ba// gsang ba mchog gi nyams dga' ba// lus kun la ni rnam
311a6(rgyud 'bum): par gnas/ / nam mkha' lding dang char dbab dang // dngul chu bcud kyis len pa dang // bskrad dang dbang du bya nyid dang // rmongs dang mngon spyod nyid dang ni// dpung la sogs pa rengs nyid dang //
311a7(rgyud 'bum): dus su zin pa bzlog pa dang // phur bus gdab dang gsad pa dang // rtag tu sgrub pa byed pa dang // sna tshogs sngags rim ji bzhin dang // ji bzhin rnal 'byor ma bskyed dang // dpal chen he ru ka yi ni// /
311b1(rgyud 'bum): baspyad pa dang ni gnas brgyad dang // dngos dang dngos med spros meng dang // srid dang spyod cing dgos med dang // dgongs pas bshad pa mchog chen dang // rnal 'byor ma yi mchog chen dang // rnal 'an/
311b2(rgyud 'bum): ma yi 'dus pa dang // nus pa rnam pa mang gsungs pa// thos pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// gzugs brnyan dag pa nyid dang ni// de bzhin bstan pa sbyong ba dang // dur khrod 'jigs pa che bzang
311b3(rgyud 'bum): dang / / ro langs sgrub la sogs pa dang // stobs po che rnams dgug pa dang // de bzhin 'jig rten gsum dgug dang // rims kyi gdung ba 'jigs chen dang // dgra yi la sogs bcings pa dang //
311b4(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin gsad dang bslu ba dang // mi snang byed pa mchog dang ni// mig sman dang ni ril bu nyid// bcud len ral gri nyid dang ni// sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis// thod pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// /
311b5(rgyud 'bum): mi snang ba ni mchog chen dang // sna tshogs sgyu 'phrul rnam 'phrul dang // rang gi gzugs ni bsgyur ba dang // gzhan gyi lus la gzhug sogs dang // sangs rgyas bye bas rab bsrungs pa'i// sangs rgyas
311b6(rgyud 'bum): bu mo mchog chen rnams/ / khros pa tsam gyis 'gugs byed na// gzhan dag smos lta ci zhig dgos// mig 'phrul byed pa nyid dang ni// dge mtshan rnam pa mang shes pa// 'dod pa lnga ni bsten bzhin
311b7(rgyud 'bum): pas/ / 'di ru 'grub par gdon mi za// 'jigs shing 'joms pa'i rtsod chen po// gcig gis 'bum las rgyal bar byed// skyes pa gcig gis 'dod chen gyis// bud med 'bum phrag 'dzag
312a1(rgyud 'bum): byed cing / / rdo rje byed pa rnyed dka' ba// gcig gis thams cad 'dod pa spyang // de nas gzhan yang rab bshung ba// mkha' lding sbyor ba rim ji bzhin// rgyud kun tu yang rnyed/
312a2(rgyud 'bum): dka' ba// mu stegs rnams kyi yul min pa// rlung gzhan du yang ma gsungs so// sangs rgyas thong pa'i gzhung ji bzhin// rdo rje mgon pos gsungs pa yi// mkha' lding shin tu rmad byung
312a3(rgyud 'bum): ba/ 'jig rten gsum na rnyed dka' ba'i// sbyor ba rnam pa bco brgyad gsungs// sha li ka yi sbyor ba dang // rig pa 'dzin dang rgyan po 'gyed// rnga rdung bud med 'phrog pa dang // shin
312a4(rgyud 'bum): bsnun zhags pas 'chang ba dang / / khu byug pad+mas 'byed pa dang // rtag byed chu blugs dung 'bud dang // thod le kor 'phrog skyug pa dang // ras g.yog thal lcag brdab pa dang // yig
312a5(rgyud 'bum): gsum bsam gtan gyi ni gtam/ / 'di rnams kyis ni dgug par bya// mkha' lding sbyor ba bco brgyad do// 'jig rten gsum na rab rnyed dka'// sems can rnams la phan byed pa// rdo rje
312a6(rgyud 'bum): mgon po nyid kyis gsungs/ / de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// mchog gi ye shes ji bzhin pa// b+ha ga'i dbus su rnam par bzhugs// bde ba chen po ster byed pa// de nyid du ni kun gnas
312a7(rgyud 'bum): kyang / / byis pa rmongs pas mi shes so// der ni bcud dang bcud len te// de nyid du ni sangs rgyas bzhugs// der ni dkyil 'khor bzang po'o// der ni slob ma dbang bskur ba'o// der ni he ru ka
312b1(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo/ / nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i dbang gtso bo// der ni nam mkha' lding 'jigs pa// de nyid du ni ro langs bsgrub// der ni dur khrod brgyad po rnams// skad cig tsam gyis bskyed pa'i rgyu// der ni
312b2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bdag nyid che/ / stong phrag gsum ni rnam par bzhugs// der ni 'jig rten khams kun te// de nyid bcom ldan 'das lha mo// sangs rgyas la sogs bskyed pa'i yum// byang chub
312b3(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' dpal chen po/ / shes rab pha rol phyin dpung gnyen// de nyid bsod nams kun ster ma// de nyid thar pa ster byed ma// phyag rgya chen po grags chen po// dngos grub kun ni 'dod
312b4(rgyud 'bum): byed ma/ / ma dang tsha mo sring mo dang // bu mo bud med rab brtan ma// shes rab mnyes shing 'jigs byed ma// 'gro drug bde sdug bag chags bcas// 'khor ba mya ngan 'das nyid dang // bdag
312b5(rgyud 'bum): nyid chen po de nyid de/ / rnam rtog kun tu rtog pa nyid// de bzhin 'char dang nub pa dang // nyin mtshan mal stan bza' ba dang // nges pa'i brtul zhugs rtsis dang grangs// rnam par mi rtog
312b6(rgyud 'bum): yang dag rtog/ dman dang mchog dang bar ma dang // gzhan dang gang dang de dang ni// de nyid bdag nyid chen po gcig/ sems can kun la bde ba 'bab// de ltar thos nas phyag na rdo rje la sogs
312b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang / 'dod can ma la sogs pa ri rab kyi rdul phra rab snyed kyi rnal 'byor ma rnams dga' ba'i spyan gdangs nas sna tshogs sde ma la yang dang yang du btud de/
313a1(rgyud 'bum): 'di ltar gsol to// e ma'o sna tshogs sde ma rnal 'byor ma// sems can kun la bde 'bab ma// glegs bam don dang ldan gang zhig/ de kun sangs rgyas byin brlabs
313a2(rgyud 'bum): bshad/ / de nas phyag na rdo rje'i phyag gnyis glang po che'i lag pa ltar rab tu brkyang ste/ glegs bam yang dag par blangs so// de nas sangs rgyas kyi byin rlabs kyis phyag rgya chen po'i rdo rje'i
313a3(rgyud 'bum): gnas su don dang bcas pa'i gzhung zhu bar gyur to/ / phyag na rdo rje'i snying ka nas byung ste/ sna tshogs sde ma'i thugs su ngal bsos so// de nas phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi bdag po chen pos rnal 'byor
313a4(rgyud 'bum): mchen mo la 'di ltar gsol to/ / sngags kyi bzlas pa gang zhig lags// las kyi tshogs rnams ji ltar 'grub// sngon du bsnyen pa gang zhig lags// mkha' lding 'grub pa'i nges pa gang /
313a5(rgyud 'bum): dngul chu bcud len sna tshogs pa// dngos grub ster byed gang zhig lags// sbar dang mnan pa gang gsungs dang // dus dang bya ba'i nges bcas dang // dngos grub thob dus gang zhig lags//
313a6(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas ji lta bu ru brjod// de bzhin thong ba ji lta bu// sna tshogs sde ma'ang ji lta bu// theg pa chen po ji lta bu// rnal 'byor ma yi rnam nges ci// gsungs pa/ rgyud 'dir sngon du bsnyen pa med/
313a7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin yul dang dus tshes dang // gza' dang rgyu skar sbyor med pa// blo dang ldan pas rtag tu bsten// dus dang bya ba'i nges mi bya// sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis// thos pa tsam gyis
313b1(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas rdo rje zhes su gsungs// thod pa gru gsum yang dag 'byung // sbyor ba dang ldan ji lta bu// sbyor ba gsang bar gnas pa'i rtsa// de yi sna tshogs ngo mtshar byed//
313b2(rgyud 'bum): sde ni bde chen ye shes so// 'di nyid theg pa chen po ste// rnal 'byor ma yi rtsa las byung // de ni rmad byung che mchog ste// sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba nyid// de nyid he ru ka dpa' bo//
313b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ba'i 'jigs las sgrol byed pa// sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyis bde ba 'bab// rnal 'byor chen mo sna tshogs bde// dpa' dbang bdag mo dbang/
313b4(rgyud 'bum): phyug ma// de yi thod pa'i dkyil 'khor la// sngags dang rgyud ni rnam par gnas// de yi ye shes bzang po ni// lhan cig skyes pa dag las byung // de ni rig pa'i dbang lnga dang //
313b5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas bdun gyi mtshan can te// sna tshogs sbyor dang tshe 'phel dang // dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa ni// sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'grub par 'dir ni gdon mi za// man
313b6(rgyud 'bum): ngag lam las gang shes pa/ / bla ma'i drin las shes par bya// sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud chen po rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ dngos
313b7(rgyud 'bum): grub thams cad dang / ye shes gtan la dbab pa dang / thod pa kha phye ba las glegs bam byung ba'i le'u ste dang po'o// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// sngags
314a1(rgyud 'bum): le'u ji bzhin gsungs pa ste/ / mkha' 'grom mo 'byung po rnams// sngags gang gis ni 'grub 'gyur ba// de ni bdag gis rab bshad kyis// khyod kyis dad pa brtan
314a2(rgyud 'bum): pas nyon/ / oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni ta Ta s+pho Ta ya sarba shu b+ha pra dA yi ni hUM phaT/ spos dbul ba'i sngags so// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni ma Ta ma Ta a swA hA/ me tog dbul ba'i sngags so// oM ma hA ka pA la
314a3(rgyud 'bum): badz+ri pa ra ba ra ta Ta ta Ta sta Ta ya sta Ta ya ma Ta ma Ta hUM he hrIHswA hA/ dri dbul ba'i sngags so// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya ba ra ba ra ta Ta ta Ta/ sta Ta ya sta Ta ya ma Ta hUM hUM hUM swA hA/
314a4(rgyud 'bum): / ma ra me dbul ba'i sngags so// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na gr-ih+NA pa ya gr-ih+NA pa ya khA khA hUM/ lha bshos dbul ba'i sngags so// oM ma hA ka pA li ni badz+ra d+harma d+harma me g+he ba re pra ba re ba ra ba ra ka ra
314a5(rgyud 'bum): ka ra/ ta Ta ta Ta ha he swA hA/ gos dbul ba'i sngags so// oM hAM ho hau ho hau haM ha/ go cha'i sngags so// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni a khaM kro d+hu shrI aHa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ spyan drang ba'i sngags so//
314a6(rgyud 'bum): / oM ma hA ka pA li badz+ri Ni gats+tsha gats+tsha u tiSh+Tha u tiSh+Tha/ dza dza dza ha dza dzaM dze/ trai lo kyo bi rba pA Ni hUM phaT/ gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so// oM ma hA ka pA la badz+re tsi tra su tsi tre a lam+ba ne phri na yA/
314a7(rgyud 'bum): sarba b+hU ta na ma ra Na kI la ya duSh+TAn u tsu Ta ya sarba big+h+nAM bi dra pa ya b+ha ga ba ti yak+Sha rak+Sha sa pi shA tsan sho Sha ya ta Ta ya sap+ta pA tA la ga tan/ sa ra sa ra/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ nU hUM hUM/ phaT
314b1(rgyud 'bum): phaT phaT/ 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma'i sngags so// 'bras sA lu blangs te 'o mas bkrus la bu mo gzhon nu mas de shin tu zhib par btag par bya/ de'ang shes rab can gyis gzugs
314b2(rgyud 'bum): brnyan byas te/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa gzhung bzhin cang te'u dang / kha T+wAM ga dang / ral gri dang / thod pa 'dzin pa'o// de nas ro bsregs pa'i sol ba phye mar byas la rdo rje gtsug gis mnya
314b3(rgyud 'bum): bar bya'o/ / de nas des gzugs brnyan la byug par bya'o// me tog dkar pos mchod par byas te/ sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pas he ru ka'i rnam pa'i sbyor bas sngags brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas
314b4(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / oM ma hA badz+ra he ru ka badz+re/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+hu ru d+huru/ ma hA dz+nyA na s+pho Ta ne shI g+h+raM sA d+ha ya staM b+ha ya kI la ya hUM phaT/ sngags 'di chu la lan bdun du mngon par bzlas te gzugs brnyan de
314b5(rgyud 'bum): bkru bar bya'o/ / chu des rang gi gdong bkrus na mi snang bar byed de/ lha rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka' 'o// nags kyi nang du stag gis kyang mi mthong ngo // gzhan dag gis kyang de mthong bar mi 'gyur
314b6(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / srog chags 'bum gyi nang du song na ngo mtshar sna tshogs byed do// gang gis kyang mi mthong ngo // lha'i bu mo 'phrog cing lha rnams kyis kyang mi mthong ngo // 'o mas gdong bkrus pa tsam gyis ni
314b7(rgyud 'bum): mthong bar 'gyur ro/ / gzugs brnyan de'i snying kar shing 'ba' bo las phul te/ dur khrod kyi me la 'ba' bo las dang tshangs pa rdo rjes rab tu sbar la/ de'i thal ba yang dag par blangs te/
315a1(rgyud 'bum): kham por du gzhag par bya'o// yang na badz+ra'i sdong du'o// sngags 'di brgyan brgyad du mngon par bzlas par bya'o// oM prad+ha ka pA mi naSh+Tadz+dza/ oM badz+ra bi mi sanA d+ha/
315a2(rgyud 'bum): oM ka mi ni khi hUM/ oM pA tA lA ba sI nAM aHhUM/ oM tsi traHse nA sa ma ya tiSh+Tha ya hrIHhUM/ sngags 'di dag ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang shin tu rnyed par dka' 'o// thal ba de dang rdo rje gtsug gis
315a3(rgyud 'bum): lus byug par byas na/ ji srid du lus la mtshon chas phog pa de srid du mi tshugs so// slar zhing dgra thams cad kyi mgo bo 'chad par 'gyur ro// gang sdang ba la bltas na de long bar 'gyur ro//
315a4(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig sdang ba'i sems 'dzin pa de smyo bar 'gyur ro// thal ba de nyid dang mar khu bzang pos mig byugs na dpag tshad stong mthong bar 'gyur ro// gang ci'ang rung ba'i sa'i 'og na gnas pa'i
315a5(rgyud 'bum): gter dpag tshad stong gi 'og tu son po'i dngul dang / gser dang / rin po che gang na yod pa de thams cad la sran lag gis sdigs mdzub byas pa tsam gyis thams cad mdun du lhags
315a6(rgyud 'bum): te gsol ba 'debs so/ / kye sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pa gter long la sems can gyi don gyis shig/ der gter blangs na gang 'dod pa de byed do// thal ba de dang go ra
315a7(rgyud 'bum): tsan lhan cig bsnos te/ mdzub mos mnyes pas dpung gi tshogs langs pa'i nang du mdzub mo bskor ba tsam gyis 'bum phrag stong gis dpung rnams khas phub tu ltung bar 'gyur ro//
315b1(rgyud 'bum): gang 'dod pa de byed do// bkrus pa tsam gyis langs par 'di la the tsom med do// thal ba de dang zha nye'i phye ma dang bsnos te gcig tu byas la/ rdo rje'i gtsug rjes su byin te khab len gyi
315b2(rgyud 'bum): lcags kyi phye ma bsre zhing gser gyi phye ma'ang cung zad bsre bar bya'o/ / rdo rje'i chu'i khu ba dang lhan cig tu bsnos te zangs ma'i snod du nyi ma bdun gyi bar du gzhag go/ de nas mkhris pa chen po mnyes te
315b3(rgyud 'bum): rta'i khrag dang lhan cig tu bsnos la/ yang snod de nyid du nyi ma gsum du gzhag par bya'o// de nas bton te lcags kyi snod du gzhag par bya'o// zangs ma'i snod du bzhag pa de me'i nang du bcug na gser
315b4(rgyud 'bum): dang dngul du 'gyur bar som nyi med do/ / srang gcig kyang srang stong gi rin thang du 'gyur te rin po che dang 'dra bar 'gyur ro// gser de ma sha gcig dang dngul srang gcig bsres te me la bzhu na srang sum
315b5(rgyud 'bum): brgya'i rin thang gi tshad du 'gyur bar 'di la the tsom med do/ / 'di lta bu'i sbyor ba ni sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dka' 'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' grags pa chen po
315b6(rgyud 'bum): snying rje dang ldan pa'i bdag nyid chen po stobs che ba de rnams kyis kyang sbyin par mi nus so/ / 'di yi sbyor ba rnyed dka' ba// sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud du gsungs// rgyud gzhan rnams su sbas pa yin//
315b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dus sogs rnal 'byor rgyud du ni// sbyor ba rnam pa ma gsungs pa// gang tshe sngon du bsnyen de'i tshe// de yi sbyor bas ci zhig bya// bsod nams dman pa'i sems can gang // mtshams
316a1(rgyud 'bum): med lnga ni byed pa yang / / sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'di lta'i sbyor ba 'grub par 'gyur// dngos po de yis blo chen rnams// sems can don la gcig tu brtson//
316a2(rgyud 'bum): srang gcig gis bsres bye ba'i rin// sbyor ba kun tu rnyed par dkang // sbyor ba glegs bam la mi bri// bla ma'i drin las shes par bya// bla mas dngos grub bla mas thar/
316a3(rgyud 'bum): bla ma ston pa rnams kun pa// des na slob ma blo can gyis// 'bad pas bla ma mnyes par bya// thal ba de nyid kyis ltas lta ba'i don du bu mo'i mgo la blugs te rdo rje'i gtsug gis bu mo
316a4(rgyud 'bum): bkru'o/ / yang thal bas thig le byas la/ tshangs pa rdo rjes maN+Dal gru bzhi byas te/ de'i dbus su bu mo gzhag par bya'o// bdug spos lngas bdugs shing sangs rgyas thams cad
316a5(rgyud 'bum): kyis byin gyis brlabs na bu mo la 'bab par 'gyur te/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba ston to// bu don gyi 'bras la sngags 'di lan bdun du mngon par bsngags
316a6(rgyud 'bum): so/ oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni de hi/ de hi de hi da dA pa ya da dA pa ya he he b+ha ga ba ti shI g+h+raM khad gaM d+ha ra hi bud+d+ha ka pA la badz+ra s+ya ya dz+nyA ma laM b+ha ya hUM staM hri phaT a phaT/ yungs kar bsnun pa tsam gyis ni/
316a7(rgyud 'bum): bu mo grags chen ma ni rgod// de yi kha nas ral gri bdun// 'byung ba la ni the tsom med// sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pas skad cig ma de nyid la 'grub par 'dir som nyi med do// de ltar ral
316b1(rgyud 'bum): gri gcig grub pas bye ba brgya stong gi rig 'dzin 'grub pas bskor bar 'gyur ro/ / 'di lta bu'i sbyor ba ni 'jig rten gsum na'ang rnyed par dka' 'o// bu mo bkrus pa tsam gyis rnal mar 'gyur
316b2(rgyud 'bum): ro/ / de'i thal ba lcags gsum gyis dkris te ril bu byas nas khar bcug pa tsam gyis ni mi snang bar 'gyur ro// shes rab can gyis sum cu pa'ang bskor ro// sangs rgyas thams cad
316b3(rgyud 'bum): kyis kyang mi gzigs so/ / ril bu lag par blangs pas dngos po gang dang gang la reg pa tsam gyis de dbang du 'gyur ro// thal ba'i sbyor ba 'di dag ni// sangs rgyas kyis kyang rnyed par dka'/
316b4(rgyud 'bum): oM bud+d+ha ka pA la dza hUM khaM raM a/ 'jig rten gsum sgrub pa'i sngags so// oM bud+d+ha ka pA la ni hrI hUM/ dgra rlag pa'i sngags so// oM mahA ka pA la badz+ra kha kha khA hi khA hi sarba duSh+TA nab+h+yag+ha
316b5(rgyud 'bum): / g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya sarba sha truM a hi traM hUM phaT/ bskrad pa'i sngags so// sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud chen po rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ thal ba'i sbyor
316b6(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / las sna tshogs gtan la dbab pa dang / sngags kyi le'u ste gnyis pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes/ sna tshogs sde ma la btud de/
316b7(rgyud 'bum): 'di skad ces gsol to// sems can don la gcig brtson pa// legs so bcom ldan 'das lha mo// 'di lta'i rab tu sbyor zhes pa// rgyud gzhan dag tu ma gsungs shing // sangs rgyas
317a1(rgyud 'bum): kun gyis rab smras pa/ / de ni babad de gsal bar mdzod// lha mo chen mo khyod kyis gsungs// wA'i le'u ni dzi lta bu// sangs rgyas thod pa rnal 'byor ma'i// rgyud
317a2(rgyud 'bum): du lha rnams du zhig gsungs/ / de ru gzugs ni ji lta bu// gus pa yis ni nyan par 'tshal// gsungs pa/ raM las nyi ma bsam par bya// nyi ma'i steng du hUM byung ba'i// rdo rje nag
317a3(rgyud 'bum): bo sreg pa'i bdag/ rdo rje de nyid 'od zer gyis// rab dra ba'i mtshams bcing ngo // de bzhin rdo rje nag gyur pa// rdo rje sa gzhi bsam par bya// rdo rje'i sa gzhi'i dbus chud par// a yi
317a4(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa bdag nyid che/ / gru gsum kham gsum bdag nyid can// yi ge laM gyur sa yi ni// dkyil 'khor gru bzhi rab ser ba'o// de yi dbus gnas sa bon ni// yi ge oM ste chos bdag
317a5(rgyud 'bum): nyid/ / oM las byung ba'i 'khor lo ni// rtsa rnams kun gyi rang bzhin can// rnal 'byor ma ni rnam par bzhugs// rtswa ni drug cu la rgyan dang // sprul pa drug cu rtsa bzhi 'dab//
317a6(rgyud 'bum): des na rtsa brgya nyi shu'o// rdo rje sku yi bdag nyid che// shes rab can gyis de ltar sems// de yi dbus gnas sa bon ni// baM dkar yi ge las byung ba// chu yi dkyil 'khor zlum po'o//
317a7(rgyud 'bum): rnams thams cad chu yi ni// dkyil 'khor la ni thim par 'gyur// slar yang bsam par bya ba ni// raM dmar las byung me'i dkyil 'khor// gru gsum 'bar ba'i bdag nyid can// rab tu
317b1(rgyud 'bum): 'bar bzhin pa yi ni/ / rtsa ba'i 'khor lo yang dag blta// de nas bsam par bya ba ni// yaM gyur rlung gi dkyil 'khor ni// zla ba phyed pa'i rnam 'dra sngo// rtsa rnams rab tu g.yo ba'i gzugs//
317b2(rgyud 'bum): thim 'gyur 'khor lo'i rig par gsungs// de dag thams cad thim gyur pa// de yi dbus gnas rnal 'byor pa// de ltar shes par byed gang zhig/ sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pas//
317b3(rgyud 'bum): de nas zla ba bsam par bya// zla ba'i steng du nyi ma'o// de yi dbus chud sa bon ni// hUM dang a yi rang bzhin no// yi ge ka yis ha brgyan te// ka ni ha la thim par 'gyur// mi phyed pa yi
317b4(rgyud 'bum): ha dang hUM/ / gnyis ka'i bdag nyid can blta'o// ha ni mi shigs shes rab kyi// bdag nyid dbu dang yi ge dag/ gnyis ka gcig tu gyur pa ni// yi ge hUM gi mchog blta'o// hUM las
317b5(rgyud 'bum): byung ba'i 'od zer rnams/ / de yi bde ba che bskul te// ba mo lta bu'i ri bong can// nyi mar lhan cig zhu gyur cing // dkyil 'khor gnyis ka gcig gyur pa// nyi ma'i mchog tu blta bar bya//
317b6(rgyud 'bum): yang ni hUM byung 'od zer des// rtsa ba'i 'khor lo thams cad la// reg ma thag pa'i mod la ni// rtsa yi 'khor lo las 'bab 'gyur// zhu ba de yis sa bon bkru// hUM gyur pa las rdo rje ste/
317b7(rgyud 'bum): dbus su de nyid kyis byin brlabs// sa bon rdo rje las byung ba// dpa' bo khrag 'thung mdog sngon po// zhal gcig pa la phyag bzhi pa// gtso bo hUM zhes 'don pa ste// skyil krung phyed pa'i
318a1(rgyud 'bum): gar gyis gnas/ / gnyis ka'ang khro ba'i bdag nyid can// stag gi pags pa'i na bzab mnabs// mgo bo rlon pa'i 'phreng ba 'chang // bsogs su mchod phyir
318a2(rgyud 'bum): thogs pa yi/ / shin tu bzhad pas 'jigs che ba'i// gtso bo snying rje'i bdag nyid blta// dpung rgyan mgul do 'khor gdub dang // gcar bu rus pa'i ska rags 'ching // g.yar ka bcas
318a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rkang gdub can/ / ma lus bdud rnams 'joms par byed// ral pa'i cod pan yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas rnam pa lnga yis brgyan// zla ba phyed pa 'dzin pa'i lha// dbu la sna tshogs
318a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rjes mnan/ / 'khor lo rna cha gdu bu dang // phyag rgya rnam pa lnga yis mtshan// thal ba'i rdul can 'jigs par byed// thod pa gti mug gis brgyan pa'i// dpa' bo 'khor ba sgrol byed pa/
318a5(rgyud 'bum): byang chub sa bon rang bzhin no// gtso chen de ye shes rab ma// sna tshogs snga ma rnal 'byor ma// gcer bu mgo bo'i 'phreng ba spangs// rgyan med mchod phyir thogs med ma// bde ba kun gyi gzugs
318a6(rgyud 'bum): can ma/ / phyag gnyis skra ni grol babo// he ru ka la 'khyud gnas ma// de ltar pha rol phyin lha mo// kha dog dmar mo rnam gsal ma// zhal ni shin tu rnam 'gyur ba// cung zad mche ba gtsigs
318a7(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs ma/ / g.yas na cang te'u gri gug ste// g.yo kha T+wAM thod pa'o// rang gi lus skyes 'od zer gyis// rtsa yi 'khor lo bskul bar bya// de yis bskul ba tsam gyis ni// rtsa yi 'khor
318b1(rgyud 'bum): lo'i rang bzhin las/ / 'dzag 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med// 'dzag pa de las rnal 'byor ma// brgyad po bu mo rnams kyi mchog/ mchod pa sna tshogs 'dzin pa yis// mgon po he ru ka mchod
318b2(rgyud 'bum): do/ rdo rje mgon po'i shar gnas pa// rdo rje mche ba ma yis ni// thod pa khrag gis bkang bzung ste// gzi brjid chen po gsol bar mdzad// rdo rje pho nya bdag nyid che// dbang ldan du ni
318b3(rgyud 'bum): cang te'u rdung / / rdo rje gdung ma dri snod dang // me yi phyogs su rnam par gnas// rdo rje can ma grags chen mo// mchod yon snod can bden bral na// rdo rje gtsigs ma lho yi ni// phyogs
318b4(rgyud 'bum): na rnga bo che 'dzin gsungs/ / rlung du rdo rje lte ba sa// ri bong can gyi snod 'dzin no// nub tu rdo rje 'jigs ma ni// ce spyang phyag na 'dzin par gsungs// byang du 'dod chags rdo rje ma// lha mo'i chags
318b5(rgyud 'bum): pas gtso bo mchod/ / da ltar he ru ka bsams nas// rnal 'byor ma ni brgyad kyis mchod// sna tshogs zas dang sna tshogs skom// sna tshogs rol mo mchog gsungs dang // dri zhim lnga dang me
318b6(rgyud 'bum): tog spos/ / 'di dag gis ni gtso bo mchod// mchod yon zhal bsil de bzhin khrus// glu yi mchog ni rnam mang pos// mgon po khrag 'thung bdag nyid che// 'di dag gis ni mchod par bya//
318b7(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo rdzogs par mthong nas ni// rtsa yi 'khor lo las ni 'dzag/ 'dzag pa de las rnal 'byor ma// rnam mang brtse ba cher ldan pa// bde gshegs kun gyis byin brlabs ma// sna tshogs
319a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyan gyis rnam par klubs/ / sna tshogs pa yin bza' mnabs// gzugs ni lang tsho gzhon pas brgyan// lo ni bcu dang gnyis lon pa// phyag g.yas byang chub sems
319a2(rgyud 'bum): bkang ba'i/ / bum pa a mra'i lcug bcas bsnams// zhal ni rab bzhad dang ba yis// he ru ka ni rgyal gyur cig/ rgyal gyur cig ces 'di ltar smra// mgon pos mdun du bltas nas ni// dbang
319a3(rgyud 'bum): bskur mchog ste gsol ba gdab/ / brtse dang ldan pa'i grags chen mo// 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba bdag/ dbang bskur ba yis bdag bsgral phyir// rdo rje rnal 'byor mas khrus shig/
319a4(rgyud 'bum): dper na bu tsha med pa'i khyim// shi ba tsam gyis stongs pa nyid// de bzhin dbang dang bral na ni// ye shes kun gyis stongs pa nyid// dper na pi wang sbyor kun tshogs// rgyud dang bral na rdung
319a5(rgyud 'bum): mi rung / / de bzhin dbang dang bral na ni// sngags dang bsam gtan 'grub mi 'gyur// rmongs pa gang zhig dbang med par// bdag ni dbang bskur zhes smra ba// ji srid sangs rgyas bzhugs
319a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi bar/ / slob mar bcas te dmyal bar 'gro// de ltar shes bya rnal 'byor pas// slar yang bdag la dbang bskur cig/ yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal te// thal mo sbyar nas gsol ba
319a7(rgyud 'bum): gdab/ / gal te dbang bskur med na ni// he ru ka ru bdag gyur cig/ de nas rnal 'byor ma de rnams// rgyal gyur rgyal gyur ces smra zhing // bcom ldan dbang bskur khrus gsol lo//
319b1(rgyud 'bum): phyi nang gsang bar bcas pa yi// dbang bskur tsam gyis nam mkha' yi// dkyil nas rnga yi sgra grags cing // me tog tsan dan char 'bab 'gyur// de nas rnal 'byor ma de rnams// rtsa yi
319b2(rgyud 'bum): 'khor lo la ni thim/ / sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ lha bskyed pa dang dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//
319b3(rgyud 'bum): / rdo rje sde la phyag byas nas 'di skad ces gsol to// ci yi phyir na bdag cag rnams// 'od zer gyis ni 'tshal te mchis// bcom ldan bdag la bshad du gsol// de nas
319b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi bdag pos/ rnal 'byor ma sna tshogs snga ma la 'di skad ces gsol to// nor rgyas la sogs bdag nyid che// klu rnams ci'i phyir dgug pa lags// rnal 'byor
319b5(rgyud 'bum): chen mo bdag la gsungs/ / de nas sna tshogs snga ma'i snying gi 'od zer gyis klu thams cad kyi snying ka dang spyi bo'i mthar thug par zhugs te/ tshim par byas nas slar log go/ de nas klu de
319b6(rgyud 'bum): rnams thams cad kyis phyag 'tshal te 'di skad ces gsol to/ / lha mo bka' ni ci zhig stsol// kye lags ji lta bu zhig bgyi// gsungs pa/ mu stegs la sogs mkha' lding sngags/
319b7(rgyud 'bum): ye shes las byung ji lta bu// dus su zin pa ji lta yin// ji ltar dug ni skye bar 'gyur// sbrul gyis zin pa tsam gyis ni// slar yang sems can 'chi 'gyur zhing // zhus pa/ khyab
320a1(rgyud 'bum): 'jug dbang phyug sogs lha dang / / tshangs pa tshangs pa mdun na 'don// de rnams la ni 'chi 'pho mchis// dug gi nyes pas gnod par 'gyur// de ltar dus su zin
320a2(rgyud 'bum): ces smra/ / sbrul gyi dug ni sel ba med// de bzhin sbrul la dug ni yod// sbrul zin 'tsho ba ma mi 'tsho ba// bde byed la sogs rdzu 'phrul che// lha de rnams ni de ltar smra// stong pa
320a3(rgyud 'bum): stong nyid nges gsungs pa/ / bcom ldan rdo rje 'chang bas gsungs// chos rnams thams cad stong pa la// sbrul gyi dug ni ji ltar yod// gang gis 'dzin cing gang zhig 'dzin//
320a4(rgyud 'bum): dus dang dus min ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar spyod cing ji ltar bsdu// gang phyir 'dzin cing gang du 'dzin// sems can dug zin mi 'chi ba// stong nyid smra ba'i nges pa yin// 'dod chags
320a5(rgyud 'bum): gti mug stong pa nyid/ / grags chen yul ni stong pa nyid// yul gyi rang bzhin dri ma med// dri ma dang bral ji ltar dug/ sbrul gyis kyang ni ci zhig byed// tha mal pa yi yul ni sbrul//
320a6(rgyud 'bum): yul gyis nyes pa dug nyid do// lha rnams yul rnams kyis ni bsgribs// thams cad dus su zin pa yin// yul gyi nyes pa sbyangs pa nyid// stong pa longs spyod gos mi 'gyur// sangs
320a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pas/ / 'dod kun nye bar longs spyod bya// ri gegs sbyor ba rnyed dka' dang // sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ldan pas// 'dir ni klu rnams thams cad lpags//
320b1(rgyud 'bum): phyir rab nges lha mo kye// dus zin the tsom med pa ru// blo med mu stegs can de smra// 'di ltar smras te klu rnams kyis// sna tshogs sde mar phyag 'tshal te// rang rang gi ni gnas su dong // de nas//
320b2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das mas yul gyi nyes pa spong ba'i sngags gsungs pa/ oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA wa At+ma kohaM/ stong dang stong min mtha' dag bcas// sgyu ma rmi lam lta bur gcig/
320b3(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten mtha' dag brdzun gyis bcings// kye lags bshes mo 'di ltar ltos// de nas phyag na rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi bdag po chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das ma'i zhabs la spyi bos gtugs
320b4(rgyud 'bum): te 'di skad ces gsol to/ / ri skegs sbyor ba rnyed dka' ba// lha mo yi ni bshad du gsol// sems can don la gcig tu 'bad// de ru bdag la ltad mo mchis// gsungs pa//
320b5(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor med par sbyin mi bya// slob ma bsdu bar mi bya'o// gtso bos ji ltar gsungs pa yi// dkyil 'khor las ni smra bar bya// mtho lnga pa yi sa bzung ste// khor yug tu ni
320b6(rgyud 'bum): gru bzhi'o/ / de yi phyed kyi zlum po la// brgyad las 'dam skyes 'dab ma brgyud// oM hUM hrIHhUM khaM hUM a hUM tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha badz+ra sa ma ya a d+hiSh+Tha yed/ sa sbyang ba'i sngags so// badz+ra he ru ka badz+ra sa ma
320b7(rgyud 'bum): la hri sarba duSh+Ta sa ma ya mu drA pra b+haM dza ha hUM ru lu ru lu b+h+yo hUM hUM phaT/ sa sbyang ba'i dus su gtor ma gtang ba'i sngags so// oM sarba ta thA ga ta a d+hiSh+Tha na i daM sU tra tiSh+Tha ma tsa la he he bud+d+ha ka pA
321a1(rgyud 'bum): la badz+ra he ru ka hUM hUM tha tha/ sngags 'dis lan bdun du srad bu la mngon par bsngags par bya'o// thig skud kyi sngags so// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs
321a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhi dang yang dag ldan/ / kha khyer snam bu spangs pa la// ba dan rnam pa brgyad kyis brgyan// sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis// rdul chen gzhan dang 'dres med pa'i// rdul chen dmar
321a3(rgyud 'bum): por rdzogs par bya/ / de ru bum pa bzhi po rnams// grwa dang grwa ru rnam par gzhag/ bum par mtshan ma bri bya ba// thod pa dang ni kha T+wAM ga/ gri gug dang ni cang te'u dang // cang te'u gnas su
321a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje bri/ / rdo rje'i steng du 'dam skyes te// de ltar bum par bris byas nas// chu yis yongs su dgang bar bya// bum pa la ni ras kyis brgyan// rin chen rnam pa lnga gzhug cing // bum par
321a5(rgyud 'bum): kun nas 'bru lnga dang / / a mra'i lcug mas dgab par bya// de nas 'o ma'i snod bzhag ste// de rjes slob dpon blo chen gyis// sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor dang ldan// pad+ma'i steng du nyi ma ste//
321a6(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma'i steng du hU~M yig bsam// hU~M gyur pa las rdo rje ni// sngon po hUM gi bdag nyid skyes// hUM dang rdo rje byung dpa' bo// he ru ka ni bdag nyid che// sku mdog sngon po phyag bzhi pa// gtso bo chen
321a7(rgyud 'bum): po zhal gcig pa/ / g.yas ni gri gug thod pa ste// g.yon na kha T+wAM rdo rje'o// sru la si yi rus pas brgyan// klu rnams skrag par byed pa po// skyil kyang phyed pa'i gar gyis bzhugs// gcer
321b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs byed rang bzhin te/ / zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs// dbu s+thA ser zhing gyen du 'bar// thod pas spyi bo brgyan byas pa// sa 'og bdun ni 'khrug par byed// dpa' bo de ltar bsam
321b2(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / phyis ni phyogs kyi 'dab ma la// oM dang hUM dang khaM dang swA// yi ge yongs su gyur pa las// rnal 'byor ma ni rnam pa bzhi// sna tshogs sde ma 'dod can ma// sa 'og gnas ma rab
321b3(rgyud 'bum): bzang ma/ / lha mo de dag mdog sngon mo// grags chen zhal gcig phyag bzhi ma// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par bzhugs// g.yon brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis bzhugs// g.yas na
321b4(rgyud 'bum): gri gug thod pa 'dzin/ / g.yon na kha T+wAM cang te'u// rus rgyan lha mo kun 'jigs ma// zhal gyi mche ba cung zad gtsigs// stag gi pags pa'i na bza' mnabs// sgra ni ser po gyen du 'bar//
321b5(rgyud 'bum): / thod pa'i 'phreng bas spyi bo brgyan// de rnams mgo brgyus 'phreng ba can// lha mo'i 'od zer spros gyur pas// klu rnams skrag par mdzad ma'o// phyogs kyi 'dab bzhugs cher bzhad ma'o//
321b6(rgyud 'bum): blo ldan mtshams kyi 'dab bzang la// nyi ma bzhi la hUM yig bzhi// hUM yig so sor gyur pa las// chang 'tshong ma dang 'byung po ma// bzhin bzang nam mkhar 'gro ma ste// mtshams kyi 'dab
321b7(rgyud 'bum): mar gnas lha mo/ / kha dog ser mo grags chen mo// thams cad na bza' ser po mnabs// g.yas brkyang ba yi zhabs kyis gnas// zhal gcig ma la phyag bzhi ma// klu brgyad rgyan
322a1(rgyud 'bum): byas lha mo ni/ / g.yas ni gri gug cang te'u 'dzin// g.yon na kha T+wAM thod pa'o// sku las 'od zer ser po 'phro// shin tu sgeg pa'i nyams dang ldan// cung zad mche
322a2(rgyud 'bum): ba gtsigs pa'i zhal/ / thams cad gar byed skra ser ma// klu rnams skrag pa skyed byed ma// mtshams kyi cha ru rnam par gnas// de nas bsam par bya ba ni// slob dpon he ru kas rang gi
322a3(rgyud 'bum): lus las skyes pa'i 'od kyis phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang dag par reg par byas nas/ slar log ste de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la yang dag par reg pa'i
322a4(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer las lha mo'i tshogs yang dag par spros pas/ / he ru ka dang rnal 'byor ma brgyad lhan cig tu bkrus so// bkrus pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa rnams cod pan du gyur to// dkyil
322a5(rgyud 'bum): 'khor rdzogs par mthong nas ni/ / slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis// phyis ni gtor ma gtang bar bya// khyad par du ni 'o ma'o// sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ldan pa'o// shes rab can
322a6(rgyud 'bum): gyis chang btung zhing / / mar me bzhi ni dbul bar bya// 'bras bu bzhi yang dbul bya zhing // de nas slob ma blo chen gyis// ras zung gsum ni dbul bar bya// der ni gdan yang bstab par
322a7(rgyud 'bum): bya slob dpon bdag nyid chen po yis/ / de ru ral 'byor ma mchod do// blo gros chen po thugs dgyes pas// sna tshogs zas dang sna tshogs skom// dpa' bo rnal 'byor mchim bya// mgu
322b1(rgyud 'bum): par sems pa'i yid kyis ni/ / 'khor lo khyad par che bya ste// phyis ni slob dpon brtse chen bdag/ phyi rol sa ru byung nas ni// bde ba yi ni gdan bzhugs te// slob mas maN+Dal gsum byas la//
322b2(rgyud 'bum): bla ma me tog sna tshogs mchod// zhabs la spri gtugs 'di skad gsol// ston pa bcom ldan bla ma kye// sems can don la gcig brtson pa// nam mkha' lding bzang sbyor ba dang // sha li/
322b3(rgyud 'bum): ka yi sbyor ba 'tshal// dus su zin pa bzlog pa yi// sems can don ni bzang po 'tshal// sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// ston pa chen pos de dag gsungs// bdag gi the tsom
322b4(rgyud 'bum): bzlog pa dang / / sems can don ni mthar thug bgyi// brtan pa dang ni rgyu ba dang // yan lag skyes dang bcos ma yi// dug rnams dug med par bgyi zhing // sems can thams cad 'tsho/
322b5(rgyud 'bum): bgyi ba// bla ma chen po de dag gsungs// de nas slob dpon brtse ba yis// byin gyis brlabs pa'i thugs kyis ni// khrag 'thung go 'phang gnas pa yi// slob ma la ni so shing sbyin// so/
322b6(rgyud 'bum): shing sngags ni sbyin par bya// oM hUM he b+ha ga wa ti mu khaM pa ri shud+d+he ku ru swA hA/ lan bdun mngon par bsngags byas la// so drung nas ni kha bshal te// slob ma lhag par gnas pa bya// rang
322b7(rgyud 'bum): gi lag pa drug bya zhing / / me tog gis kyang dkri bar bya// mgrin po lag par zla ba bsam// zla ba'i zer gyis phyogs bcu yi// sangs rgyas spyan drangs gdon mi za// sangs rgyas tshogs kun
323a1(rgyud 'bum): zla bar blta/ / grags chen thams cad rab zhugs shing // zla ba zhu bar gdon mi za// slob dpon skem pa'i nus pa yis// slob ma'i mgo ru lag bzhag ste/
323a2(rgyud 'bum): lhag par gnas pa'i gsang sngags bzlas// oM sarba bud+d+ha a tra a mu ka s+ya kA ya ma d+hiSh+ThA na/ yan+tu ma tsa la ma tsa la tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha ha ra ha ra/ bi d+ha ra bi d+ha ra d+ha ra d+ha ra/ tra pa tra pa/ b+ho b+ha ga bA ta sarba
323a3(rgyud 'bum): bud+d+ha ka pA la badz+ra sa ka taM ma la ya shrI g+h+raM ku ru ku ru hUM hUM ha ha/ sngags 'di lan bdun du bzlas pas lhag par gnas par bya'o// sangs rgyas de dag thams cad kyis de'i lus pa yang dag par byin gyis
323a4(rgyud 'bum): rlob par 'gyur ro/ / lhag par gnas pa tsam gyis rdzu 'phrul chen po'i klu rnams skrag cing dug gi bum pa'ang 'dor ro// nor rgyas la sogs pa'i klu stobs po che rnams dpyod par 'gyur ro// kye ma
323a5(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa'i/ / lhag par gnas pa tsam gyis ni// 'di lta'i sdug bsngal thob 'gyur na// mkha' lding rtog pa'i sems can gyis// bdag ni ji ltar 'gro bar 'gyur// da
323a6(rgyud 'bum): mthag tu slob dpon gyis/ / dkyil 'khor nang du me tog ni// rnam pa sna tshogs dbul bar bya// sna tshogs spos dang lha bshes dbul// dung chos zangs chos snod dag ni// man dzi'i stang
323a7(rgyud 'bum): du gzhag par bya/ / mchod yon gyi ni don ched du// bum pa rnams la lhag gnas bya// khrag 'thung go 'phang gnas pa yis// rnal 'byor ma brgyad bskor ba yi// khrag 'thung rnam pa spyan drang
323b1(rgyud 'bum): te/ / dkyil 'khor ji bzhin yang dag ldan// mdog dang mtshan mar ldan pa yi// de bzhin gshegs rnams sa bon gyi// 'od zer gyi ni rnam par bsam// bdag nyid chen po grags chen po//
323b2(rgyud 'bum): bum pa ru ni zhugs tsam gyis// dam tshig dkyil 'khor zhu bar gyur// rnal 'byor ldan pa'i sems dang ni// slob dpon gyis ni 'di ltar blta// de nas zangs ma'i snod du chu blugs shing dung
323b3(rgyud 'bum): phor chus bkang ste/ man ji'i steng du gzhag par bya'o// yang phyir byung nas slob ma'i don du bdag nyid kyis ras kyis mig dgab par bya'o// ras gsum gon par gyur pa'i slob ma phyis
323b4(rgyud 'bum): / dkyil 'khor gyi sgor bzhag la chus gtor te sngags bzla'o// a b+hi Shiny+tsan+tu mAM sarba yo gi ni ma ku Ta a d+hiSh+Tha yaM tu a tsa tu hUM swA hA/ cod pan byin gyis brlab pa'i sngags so// de nas slob
323b5(rgyud 'bum): dpon gyis kye khyod su zhes smra'o/ / slob mas bdag ni rgyal ba'i sras zhes smra'o// de'i rjes la dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su me tog lan gsum du gtor la/ mig ras bsal te dkyil 'khor
323b6(rgyud 'bum): mchod par bya'o/ / oM he ru ka badz+ra puSh+pA yaM pra tIts+tsha hUM/ dbus su'o// oM tsa tre sa nA puSh+pA yaM pra tIts+tsha hUM/ shAr du'o// oM kA mi nri puSh+pa yaM pra tIts+tsha hUM/ lho yi'o// oM pA tA la bA si ni puSh+pa maM
323b7(rgyud 'bum): thabyi tu/ dzub mo// chos byam ma hU~M/ khye 'o// mi satha khro d+hi ts+yai r+m+ma // so basbyin ma hrIts+tsha hU~M/ bad ma dzug/ mam mtha sa
324a1(rgyud 'bum): rlung ngu'o/ / oM a kA sha bA si ni puSh+pa yaM pra tIts+tsha hUM/ dbang ldan du'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi lha'i sku mdog ji lta bu dang mtshan ma la sogs pa de bzhin du slob ma la bstan
324a2(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / yang dung phor blangs te chu btung bar bya'o// de 'thungs pa tsam gyis klu thams cad skrag cing skyo bas dug skyug par 'gyur ro// brtan pa dang g.yo ba'i dug gang yin pa dang // gzhan
324a3(rgyud 'bum): yang sbyar ba dang nye bar sbyar ba'i dug gang yin pa dang / mda' dug dang / byug pa'i dug dang / dgra rnams kyis gang sbyar ba dang / bud med rnams kyis gang sbyar ba'i dug de rnams nye bar 'pho bar
324a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / gal to klu yis zin pa yang // de ru de ni nges par 'gro// gzhan yang sbrul gyi dug kyang rung // chu ni 'thungs pa tsam gyis kyang // de dag thams cad 'chi bar 'gyur// de yi
324a5(rgyud 'bum): phyir na dung gi chu/ / 'di ru btung bar the tsom med// de nas slob ma dri bar bya// 'dir ni sha li kar byed cing // mkha' lding shes pa'i slob dpon 'gyur// bsam pa rnam par dag shes
324a6(rgyud 'bum): nas/ / phyis ni bkas gnang sbyin par bya// stong ngam brgya ru gsol ba gdab// de nas sngags kyi man ngag sbyin// ji srid sbrul gyis zin dus dang // ji srid mkha' lding rigs
324a7(rgyud 'bum): yod par/ / de srid de dang de las kyang // ji srid dus su zin med par// sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// de srid 'bad rtsol bya ba min// dus zin 'chi ba'ang shes bya ste//
324b1(rgyud 'bum): nam mkha' lding gi bya ba bya// dus su zin no zhes smra ba// de srid rnal 'byor che 'di zhes// de ru las ni brtsam par bya// bdag nyid he ru kar gyur cing // rnal 'byor ma brgyad yang
324b2(rgyud 'bum): ngag ldan/ / blo ldan sngon gsungs gsang sngags kyis// phyis ni gtor ma sbyin par bya// de rjes dkyil 'khor byas nas ni// sngon du gsungs pa'i gsang sngags kyis// gnas
324b3(rgyud 'bum): dgu ru ni mchod par bya/ / mkhas pa yis ni mchod byas rjes// mnyam par bzhag pas las rnams brtsam// gang du rdzu 'phrul che klu yod// de ru sems bzang 'od zer spro// klu
324b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams kyi ni snying bskams pas/ / ci zhig bgyi'o zhes ni smra// gsung pa/ lha mo sna tshogs sde ma yis// sangs rgyas thod par sngon du gsungs// kye kye grags pa che ba'i klu// song
324b5(rgyud 'bum): ste 'di dus zin gyur pa'i/ / dus zin 'dzin dang gzung ba med// dug med sbrul yang med pa'o// gang phyir dogs pas rdzongs gyur pa// de phyir skye bo rnams 'chir 'gyur// de nas
324b6(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer slar log ste/ / snying ka ru ni thim par 'gyur// yang ni sems ni mnyam bzhag pa'i// slob dpon gyis ni ngo mtshar bstan// de nas sa la ma lhung ba'i lci ba blangs te 'dab
324b7(rgyud 'bum): chags ri skegs gnyis bya zhing snod dkar po byas te/ ro bsregs pa'i sol ba gzhag par bya'o// ro bsregs pa'i sol ba la snag tsha byas te/ sems can gyi don rig pas dben par snga
325a1(rgyud 'bum): bri bar bya'o/ / oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni hri tad tha ba ya b+ho sha li ka na a na ya na bud+d+ha ka pA la badz+ra s+ya A dz+nyA ma laM g+he ya hUM hUM sa raM tu sarba dA TI ka pa ti ka tse ta/ maM d+h+ya g+hi ti sarba dzi i na su naM ti pa
325a2(rgyud 'bum): ya ga ra re kar ko Ta ka pra b+hI ta ya nA ga rA dza na s+phu taM ti mu rda ne re re sa s+phu a ba sa s+yA ma tsa la ha ma bu la ha dza i tsa la ha bu la hi ro re b+ha ru kri pra b+hI ta ya nA ga rA dza na u ha puT Ta mu d+hi pra na dza i/ zhes pa ni sha li ka'i/
325a3(rgyud 'bum): snying po'i sngags so// de nas blo chen rnal 'byor pas// sems ni shin tu mnyam bzhag pas// yongs rdzogs sha li ka byas la// pho dang mo ru brtag par bya// snag tsha yis ni bri bar bya// mig
325a4(rgyud 'bum): gi sngon du mi bzhag cing / / sha li ka bzang pos phyogs blta// de nas lcug ma sngags kyis bsngags// oM haM ha la khyab 'jug gi sa bon no// oM bo tshangs pa'i sa bon no// oM saM zhes bya ba ni
325a5(rgyud 'bum): zhi byed kyi sa bon no/ / oM ha ha ha ha ha ha haM swA hA/ mngag pa'i sngags so// 'di lta bu yi sngags kyi mchog/ stong gsum na yang rnyed par dka'// lan bdun bsngags pa tsam gyis ni// 'gro
325a6(rgyud 'bum): bar 'dir ni the tsom med/ / klu rnams skrag par byed pa yi// mkha' lding nyams dga' song nas ni// klu yi gnas su zhugs de'i tshe// mkha' lding bye ba'i stobs dang ldan// ring nas kyang
325a7(rgyud 'bum): ni gshog rlung gis/ / stobs po che yi klu rnams skrag/ mtho ris mi yul sa 'og dang // gang yang gzhan na gnas pa dang // gzhan yang rung ste de thams cad// skrag nas ci bgyi zhes ni smra/
325b1(rgyud 'bum): klu gang gis zin pa de gal te yang shi na// bdag nyid chen po sha li ka mthong ma thag long bar 'gyur ro// klu dang sbrul de dag gis sha li ka la 'di skad ces gsol to// kye sha li ka gzhan du
325b2(rgyud 'bum): gsung bar ma mdzad cig/ de ltar thos nas sha li ka mgu ba'i sems kyis dug gis zin pa'i mdun du sbrul long ba khyer te 'jog go// de nas slob dpon gyis bltas te/ sa'i gong bu blangs la
325b3(rgyud 'bum): li ka mngag pa'i sngags kyis sbrul long ba la bsnun no/ / skad cig de nyid la de'i mig dbye bar 'dir som nyi med do// dug gis zin pa 'gyel te shi ba sbrul gyis mthong nas/ de'i lus la 'gro
325b4(rgyud 'bum): ba dang 'ong bar byed pas dus su zin pa dug med par 'gyur zhing / dga' ba'i sems kyis ldang ngo // zin pa langs pa tsam nyid na sha li kas sbrul bzung ste mi snang bar 'gyur ro// skad cig/
325b5(rgyud 'bum): ma de nyid la slob dpon gyis stong pa nyid kyi ye shes bsgom par bya'o// stong pa dri med kun rang bzhin// chos rnams stong pa'i rang bzhin kye// gang gis 'dzin cing gang zhig 'dzin// mtha'
325b6(rgyud 'bum): dag sgyu ma'i rang bzhin kye/ / dngos po ma lus pa mtha' dag dang dug kyang stong pa nyid du sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud las gsungs te/ zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gi mthar thug par ji srid du lus ma
325b7(rgyud 'bum): zhig pa de srid du slob dpon gyis yang dag par brtsam par bya'o/ / de ltar slob ma la rjes su gnang ba byin nas phyis lung bstan par bya'o// des lan brgya'am stong du gsol ba btab nas/
326a1(rgyud 'bum): dug 'joms pa'i sngags bstan par bya'o// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni AHhUM/ dug bza' ba'i sngags so// de nas gzhan yang don du gnyer ba'i sems can de rnams thams cad la
326a2(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor bstan te/ dung phor gyi chu thungs pa des ni dug med par 'gyur te/ sbrul gyis mi 'dzin no// gal te 'dzin na de'i tshe klu 'chi bar 'dir the tsom med do// de ltar slob ma sha li
326a3(rgyud 'bum): ka'i sbyor ba la mngon par brtson pa la bka' gnang ba byin te/ grong gang du gnas pa der dug gis 'dzin pa med do// gal te yod na de'i tshe klu 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de ltar thos nas slob ma rdo
326a4(rgyud 'bum): rje'i sbyor ba dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gang ci'ang rung ba'i yon der dbul bar bya'o/ / de nas phyi rol gyi sar byung ste/ gtor ma gtang bar bya'o// de nas slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi sngags
326a5(rgyud 'bum): kyis gshegs su gsol to/ / oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni hrIHu tiSh+Tha gats+tsha hUM gats+tsha hUM phaT/ dkyil 'khor gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags so// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// chu yi sbyor ba bla med pa/
326a6(rgyud 'bum): gang gis byin pa tsam gyis ni// dug gis zin pa 'tshe bar 'gyur// nyi ma bdun du 'chi ba dang // gzhan yang dug gis nyams pa rnams// chu ni byin pa tsam gyis ni// 'di ru 'tsho bar the tsom med
326a7(rgyud 'bum): sngags 'dis dkyil 'khor byas nas ni/ / gnas dgu rnams su mchod par bya// dung por chu yis bkang byas pa// dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhag par bya// de nas brtse ba chen po yis//
326b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid rnal 'byor pa yis ni// rang gi lag pa g.yon pa la// zla ba yi ni khyad par bsam// bcu drug cha las yongs rdzogs pa'i// dri med dge ba'i lus can te// de'i dbus sa bon
326b2(rgyud 'bum): mi shigs dge/ kha dog dkar po'i lus can no// lag des snod kyi kha bcad de// de nas gsang sngags bzla bar bya// oM sarba bi Sha ha ra ha ra hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/ sngags 'dis lan
326b3(rgyud 'bum): bdun gyi bar du mngon par bsngags te/ mi shig pa dang lhan cig zla ba zhu bar gyur nas chu'i nang du bim ste/ chu dang zla ba gcig tu 'dres pas shin tu dkar por 'gyur ro// gal te dug gis zin pa
326b4(rgyud 'bum): ma shi na de'i tshe chu blud do/ / yang na shi ba yin na mgo nas rkang pa'i mthar thug par lan gsum du chu rgyun mi 'chad par blugs na langs par 'dir the tsom med do// de nas chu blud na rnal mar
