326b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur ro/ / sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ sha li ka'i sbyor ba dang chu'i sbyor ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// /
326b6(rgyud 'bum): de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// shin tu rnyed dka'i bcud len le'u// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po mchog/ rnal 'byor ma yi gong na med// gzhon nu ma dang sha ri ka/ grub ma byis
326b7(rgyud 'bum): pa can ma dang / / de bzhin zod bzang can ma'o// 'di dag sman ni chen po lnga// sangs rgyas lngas kyang rnyed par dka'// 'di dag zos pa tsam gyis ni// bskal pa bye bar de 'tshe'o//
327a1(rgyud 'bum): gzhon nu ma ni zla drug tu// de bzhin sha ri ka zla gsum// grub ma zla ba gcig tu'o// byis can ma ni zla phyed gnyis// zod can ma yang zla bar te// tshe 'phel ba yi mchog
327a2(rgyud 'bum): yin no/ / bya rog ma ni bya rog gzugs// glang po ma ni ngang pa'i gzugs// drod ma drod kyi gzugs can te// sngo bsangs dkar mo sngon mo'i mig/ kha sbyar sbyor ba'i dus su ni// mig
327a3(rgyud 'bum): las byung ba'i rdzas gang yin/ / sman de'i ming ni gzhon nu ma// 'di ru bstan par som nyi med// de yi pad+ma las byung rdzas// rtsa yi nang na rnam par gnas// ge sar sbas pa'i spyod yul
327a4(rgyud 'bum): te/ sman de sha ri ka ru gsungs// me tog ldan pa'i bud med gang // kha dog nag mos rab mdzes ma// gang du thabs shes gnyis 'dus pa// de yi kha sbyar sbyor las byung // sman
327a5(rgyud 'bum): de'i ming ni grub mar bshad/ / sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis// bud med rab mdzes ma nyams dang // dbang po gnyis kyi sbyor ba yis// mi phyed nye bar spyad pa yi// de las dang
327a6(rgyud 'bum): por byung ba'i rdzas/ / sman de byis pa can ro zhes// bdag nyid chen po'i lha mos gsungs// lhan cig skyes dga' byung ba'i rdzas// byang chub sems mchog chen mar khu// chags pa'i yi
327a7(rgyud 'bum): chu dag dang ni/ / bsre 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med// sman de'i ming ni thod can mo'o// zla ba nyi ma'i sbyor ba yis// bya bar 'dir ni the tsom med// zla bas zla bar nyi mas nyir// de lus skra dka
327b1(rgyud 'bum): gnyer ma zhi/ / ji srid sangs rgyas bzhugs kyi bar// de yi tshe ni rgyas par 'gyur// sman 'di grub pa tsam gyis ni// dag pa'i lus su 'byung bar 'gyur// dngos po gang dang gang yang rung //
327b2(rgyud 'bum): lcags dang zangs ma'i spyod dag la// dngul ni byugs pa tsam gyis ni// dngul dang gser du 'gyur ba yin// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// dgongs bshad shin tu rnyed dka' ba// rgyud gzhan
327b3(rgyud 'bum): du ni rab sbas pa/ / 'bad pas de 'dir rab gsal bya// dri chu ye shes rdo rje ste// dri chen rdo rje bzang po nyid// khrag ni mar med rdo rje yin// khu ba rdo rje'i thabs byung nyid// sha ni chos kyi rdo rje
327b4(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / de lnga rnal 'byor ma yi mchog/ gang gis dam tshig rnyed dka' ba'i// thabs 'dir bdag gis bshad par bya// ba glang sha ni 'bar ba ste// khyi yi sha la spro bar gsungs// rta yi
327b5(rgyud 'bum): sha la bza' bar bshad/ / glang po'i sha la zhu bar gsungs// shwa chen la ni bzang por bshad// de lnga rnal 'byor mchog tu gsungs// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma ldan par// gal te gcig
327b6(rgyud 'bum): tu byed nus pa/ / de tshe rnam rtog de thams cad// 'jig 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med// zan la bsod nams zhes bya ste// tshod ma la ni sdig pa nyid// ro la shin tu rnyed dka' gsungs// byis
327b7(rgyud 'bum): pa la ni 'gal ba nyid/ / g.yung mo la ni bzang mor gsungs// rus pa'i 'phreng la rdzas zhes bya// skyes bu la ni rdo rjer gsungs// bud med la ni snod bzang nyid// dbang po gnyis kyis
328a1(rgyud 'bum): rab sbyor la/ / ga'i brji 'phre chen de bshad do// rab chags shin tu mthong ba nyid// bzung pa la ni chos zhes brjod// 'drib la ni mar me'o// shin tu 'dril ma
328a2(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya/ / 'gro ba la ni 'phreng can ma// 'od la shin tu 'phreng can ma// myur ba la ni byug ces bya// dpa' ba la ni bzang de brjod// pad+ma rtse 'jo 'phreng can ma// sngags kyis mtshan la rab nges
328a3(rgyud 'bum): she'o/ / bldag la lce 'og ces bya ste// so la bza' ba sA la bde// mig la rol rtsed mu tig rnga// gsang ba'i yul la rnyed dka' zhe'o// 'di dag bshad do lag chen po// 'jig rten gsum
328a4(rgyud 'bum): na rab rnyed dka'/ / sangs rgyas thod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// med par phan tshun smra mi bya// 'on kyang bshad chen de nyid 'di// gcig la gcig gis smra bar bya// rgyud rnams thams cad du sbas pa//
328a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyud 'di ru ni gsal bar byas// nye mdun grong mtha' lhan cig ce'o// 'dus pa phyi rol zhes su gsungs// nye ba'i 'dus pa nang de bzhin// gnas la 'bras bu zhes su gsungs//
328a6(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gnas la shing nyid do// grong mtha' la ni sa bon gsungs// nye ba'i grong mtha' myu gu'o// tshogs pa la ni sdong bur gsungs// gcig pu la ni 'dab ma ste// stong pa la ni rtsa bzhi'o//
328a7(rgyud 'bum): de ltar dgongs pas bshad pa ni// bde gshegs rnams kyis mi mkhyen no// spyan ma la sogs rnal 'byor ma// rnams kyi khong du mi chud cing // byang chub sems dpa'i yul ming zhing //
328b1(rgyud 'bum): bla ma gus pa'i rnal 'byor pas// spros pa thams cad spangs nas ni// rdzas la chags pa mi bya'o// shin tu stong sgom rnal 'byor pa// 'dod chags zhe sdang phrag dog med// gti mug dang
328b2(rgyud 'bum): ni nga rgyal spangs/ / nyon mongs thams cad rnam par spangs// za 'thungs de bzhin glu len na// shin tu spros pa spang bar bya// bde bas dga' ba nyid dang ni// shes rab thabs kyis bdag
328b3(rgyud 'bum): nyid gsungs/ / bla med de nyid zla phyed kyis// 'grub par the tsom med pa'o// kye lags grogs mo 'gro kun gang // mtha' dag dri ma med pa yi// blta dang bral la skye bo ltos// gsog/
328b4(rgyud 'bum): gsob rang bzhin brdzu slu ba// pad rtsi grib ma lta bur ltos// dbang po lnga ni sgyu 'dra zhing // lnga phung dag pa'i rang bzhin gyi// rnal 'byor 'di ni bsgoms pas 'grub// sangs rgyas thod pa'i
328b5(rgyud 'bum): rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las/ sman bzang po dang dgongs pas bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas yang dag rab
328b6(rgyud 'bum): bshad pa/ / dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa mchog gsang bar// thabs dang shes rab sgrub pa yin// gang gis slob ma dbang bskur ba// shes rab pad+ma'i nang dbus su// dpag tshad bye ba'i dkyil
328b7(rgyud 'bum): 'khor la/ / gsum brtsegs dag pa'i bdag nyid lus// 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa las skyob pa// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus gnas par// mkhas pas slob ma bzang dbang bskur//
329a1(rgyud 'bum): gal te byang chub bla med 'dod// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bya ba min// lha rnams bshig pa tsam gyis ni// sdig pa chen po skye bar 'gyur// des na rdul tshon tsam gyis ni//
329a2(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin lha rnams dag mi 'gyur// rdo rje 'khor lo rin chen dang // de bzhin pad+ma ral gri nyid// byas na slar yang 'jigs byed pa// skyes bu tha shal dmyal bar 'gro// gang gis
329a3(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas spyan drangs shing / / gang gis gshegs su gsol ba yis// rdo rje sems dpa' byon pa dang // de bzhin gshegs pa byon pa rnams// gang na'ang byon pa ma yin no//
329a4(rgyud 'bum): dri ma med cing dag pa'i lus// gang gis spyan drangs gshegs su gsol// de nyid kyis na brtag med par// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams phyag bya// lo bcu gnyis pa'i bu mo ni//
329a5(rgyud 'bum): tshul khrims ma nyams chags chung ba'i// thos dang ldan zhing grags chen mo// nad med snying rje dang ldan ma// sems can don la gcig nan tan// rgod cing pad+ma'i spyan dang ldan// zla ba'i
329a6(rgyud 'bum): cha 'dra gdong mdzes ma/ / mu cor mi smra brtan zhing dul// des na slob ma blo chen po// shin tu dad pa'i sems dang ldan// 'dod med dbang po dul ba dang // chags dang chags bral rnam par
329a7(rgyud 'bum): spangs/ / sems can don la shin tu sbyor// gti muka zhe sdang phrag dog spangs// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin gyis brlabs// de rnams la ni de nyid bshad// gsang ba phyi yi lnga dang
329b1(rgyud 'bum): ni/ bdun dang bcu bzhir bshad pa dang // gnyis ka gcig tu 'dus pa'o// gsang ba'i de nyid bshad par bya// slob ma legs dang ldan pa dang // brtse ldan sems gzhan med pa
329b2(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / gser ni 'bum phrag bcu drug dang // sa gzhi yul 'khor ldan pa dang // glang po bud med dam pa dang // ral gri 'khor lo rta dang ni// yongs 'dren skyes bu rin chen rnams//
329b3(rgyud 'bum): sbyor dang ldan pa'i sems kyis ni// de ni bla mar dbul bar bya// shin tu dri med sems kyis ni// de nas 'dir ni gsol ba gdab// 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba bdag/ dpung gnyen
329b4(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyis bsgral du gsol/ / bdag ni rtsol chung skal dman zhing // sangs rgyas chos ni rnam par spangs// kye kye ston pa bla ma che// mgon po khyod kyis brtse bar mdzod// de ltar
329b5(rgyud 'bum): gsol 'debs tshig gsan nas/ / de ru bla ma mi gsung bzhugs// man ngag 'di yi cha dag ni// glegs bam rnams las spyod yul min// dkyil 'khor gang la gang gis brgyan//
329b6(rgyud 'bum): mtshan ma'i don gzhan gar bkod kye// su yis sangs rgyas spyan drangs kye// 'gro ba brdzun 'dra'i som nyir lhung // mtha' dag stong pa gos med kye// chu nang zla ba nI 'dra ba// de
329b7(rgyud 'bum): 'dra'i dkyil 'khor pad dbus gnas/ / kye lags rnal 'byor ma tshogs ltos// der ni he ru ka gcig dang // thams cad skyed par byed ma yin// 'gro kun rmi lam sla bas na//
330a1(rgyud 'bum): gti mug las ni bskyed pa ltos// sangs rgyas thod pa'i rgyud rnal 'byor ma'i gong na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las// dkyil 'khor 'jigs pa bri ba dang slob ma
330a2(rgyud 'bum): dbang bskur ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o/ / / de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// ri dang phug dang tshang tshing ngam// yang na dur khrod dag dang ni// gdod nas grub pa'i gnas su 'am/
330a3(rgyud 'bum): 'on te rgya mtsho'i 'gram dag tu// phyi yi dkyil 'khor bla med bri// rdul tshon sngon po ni ro bsregs pa'i sol ba las bya'o// rdul tshon dmar po ni dur khrod kyi so phag las bya'o// rdul chen
330a4(rgyud 'bum): ljang khu ni nim pa'i ba dab ma las bya'o/ / rdul tshon dkar po ni mi'i rus pa'i phye ma las bya'o// rdul tshon ser po ni yung ba'i phye ma las bya'o// de ltar rdul chen lnga rnams kyis// mkhas
330a5(rgyud 'bum): pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya/ / pho brang rigs gsum zlum po la// rdo rje gsum gyis yongs su bskor// phyi rol gru bzhi lham pa yi// sgo bzhir rnga babs rnams kyis brgyan// ba dan
330a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam pa bzhi yis brgyan/ / dra ba dra ba phyed pas spras// phyi rol kha khyer dag pa dang // rin chen pha gur yang dag ldan// pad+ma nyi ma'i nyi shu lnga'i// gdun rnams kyis ni shin tu mdzes//
330a7(rgyud 'bum): de yi dbus chung sa bon ni// yi ge hUM gi rang bzhin sngo// skad cig tsam gyis he ru ka/ sku mdog sngon po grags chen po// g.yas na cang te'u gri gug ste// g.yon na kha Ta zod pa'o//
330b1(rgyud 'bum): skyil krung byed pas 'jigs chen po// zhal gyis mche ba cung zad gtsigs// ral pa'i cod pan gyis brgyan cing // sangs rgyas lnga yi cod pan can// dbu la sna tshogs rdo rje mnan//
330b2(rgyud 'bum): zla ba phyed pa 'dzin pa'i lha// sku la thal ba'i rdul gyis byugs// dpa' bo phyag bzhi phyag mtshan 'chang // shin tu hUM sgrogs 'jigs byed pa// gar gyi stabs kyis rnam par bzhugs//
330b3(rgyud 'bum): mgo bo rlon pa'i 'phreng ba can// mchod phyir thogs pa 'chang ba'o// thod pa gti mug rnam dag pa// 'phreng ba brgyus pas brgyan pa'i lA// mgul do dang ni 'khor lo dang // rkang gdub
330b4(rgyud 'bum): dang ni dpung rgyan dang / / gdu bu rked pa'i ska rags dang // dpa' bo rna cha mchog gis brgyan// 'di 'ad+ma'i gzugs can gtso bo ni// hUM zhes zlos par byed pa'o// de las byung ba'i rnam
330b5(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ma/ / nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i bdag nyid rnams// sku mdog sngon mo grags chen mo// shin tu 'jigs pa'i gzugs can ma// zhal gcig phyag gnyis thod pa 'chang // so so /
330b6(rgyud 'bum): yi ni ming ji bzhin// de rnams ming ni rab tu bshad// 'phreng bzang ma// 'dod can ma/ 'jigs ma/ thub dka' ma/ dge ba'i ska rags can ma/ gzugs can ma/ rnam rgyal ma
330b7(rgyud 'bum): 'byung gnas ma/ zod can ma/ mtsho chen ma/ byed ma/ gsod ma/ sgrol ma/ 'jigs ma/ mthong ma/ mi nga pham ma/ dge ma// mjur byed ma/ dus mtshan ma/ grags chen ma/ mdzes
331a1(rgyud 'bum): sdugs/ nor 'dzin ma/ sbrul bzung ma/ grags mthong ma'o// 'di lta bu mi dkyil 'khor mchog/ kha dog rnam pa lnga yis brgyan// de yi dbus gnasaH
331a2(rgyud 'bum): mo ni/ / he ru ka la 'di ster ma// skyil krung byed pa'i kar byed ma// mi yi nus pa'i 'phreng bas brgyan// mu mo 'od zer dpag dka' zhing // swa ser gyen du 'bar ba ste//
331a3(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid las skyes 'jigs// zhal nas khrog ni 'azor pyong ma// dkar mo nag mo ljang ku ma// thams cad khu ba ldan gyur ma// rtswa yi dkyil 'khor bskyed du ni// nyi shu rtsa ba
331a4(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid gsungs/ / bdag nyid he ru ka gzugs la// nyi shu rtsa bzhi'i lha mos mchod// thod pa bdud rtsi lngas bkang ba// he ru ka yis btung bar bya// de yis 'thungs
331a5(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyis ni/ / 'gro ba'i bla ma bdag nyid che// gtso bo las gzhan tha dad gzugs// rnal 'byor ma kun de dang 'dra// de ltar he ru ka mgon pos// rnal 'byor ma kun spyad
331a6(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / thams cad spyad pas zhu gyur to// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par gnas// de ni zhu bar mthong nas ni// shin tu srid pa sgrub pa'i phyir// sgo yi rnal 'byor ma yis bskul/
331a7(rgyud 'bum): ste 'jig rten snyan mnan no// ci phyir khyod ni mi dgyes gyur// gal te khyod bdag tshig gsan na// mi dgyes gyur pa mtha' dag zong // srid 'jigs skye bo kun lhung bas// stong pa'i thugs ni ma
331b1(rgyud 'bum): mdzad par/ / nyid kyi dgongs pa kun bsgrubs kye// rnal 'byor ma yi grogs po bzhengs// gal te sngon gtse tshigs gsan na// 'bras bu yal bar ma dor cig/ khyod mi snang na 'gro ba yi//
331b2(rgyud 'bum): skye bo mtha' dag gdung bas non// log pa'i nga rgyal ma mdzad par// stong pa'i rang bzhin spangs nas ni// khyod kyis dngos med kun thong la// rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs la spyod//
331b3(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma ni bzhi po yis// 'di lta bu yi glu yis bskul// sngon bzhin mdog dang mtshan sogs ldan// kun nas rnal 'byor pa rnams bskor// 'jigs pa 'khor ba sgrol byed pa'i/
331b4(rgyud 'bum): dpa' bo chen po 'di bzhengs so// sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las/ dkyil 'khor dang he ru ka bskyed pa dang bsgom pa'i
331b5(rgyud 'bum): le'u ste bdun pa'o/ / // de nas yang dag rab bshad bya// sprin sreg dkyil 'khor mchog bzang po// zhi ba dang ri rgas pa dang // de bzhin dbang dang mngon spyod de//
331b6(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg rnam pa bzhi ru gsungs// shing gi sbyin sreg mi bya zhing // 'bras dang 'bru rnams kyis kyang min// blo ldan ga TI da ra// me tog gis ni sbyin sreg bya// me tog lnga po
331b7(rgyud 'bum): mchog chen dang / / 'o mar yang dag ldan pas bya// gal te zhi ba'i sbyin sreg 'dod// zhi ba'i gzugs sogs ldan pa yis// zhi ba'i thab khung gru bzhi pa// zabs dang rgyar ni mtho
332a1(rgyud 'bum): gang ba/ / kha la rdo rje rtse lnga pa// dkar po rtse mo 'dus pa bri// rdo rje rtse gsum sngon po ni// zhi ba hUM bdag 'khor bar ni// de yi dbus su 'khor lo lo// gru gsum
332a2(rgyud 'bum): pa yi yi ges brgyan/ / e wa ma ya mchog chen gyi// lte ba ru ni bskyed par gsungs// rtse gsum 'jigs pa'i rdo rjes bskor// rdo rje'i nang du pad+ma ste// pad+ma'i dbus su nyi mA bsam//
332a3(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma'i dbus su yi ge hUM// kha dog dmar po'i 'od chen po// mtshams dang mtshams su rdo rje ni// rtse dgu ser po bri bar bya// bdag nyid he ru kar blta ste// phyis ni sbyin sreg
332a4(rgyud 'bum): yang dag brtsam/ / shes rab can gyis me yi lha// sngags 'di yis ni spun drang ngo // oM sarba de bA hI da pra d+he ne/ a bi kalpi su da ha ne da ha da ha dzA la dzA la/ pra sa ra pra sa ra/ A
332a5(rgyud 'bum): gats+tsha A gats+tsha/ ya tri kuM ne a tiSh+Tha ya tiSh+Tha ya/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ki li ki li/ ho he ho ha hraHhri hUM swA hA/ me lha spyan drang ba'i sngags so// sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor ba yis// shes rab can
332a6(rgyud 'bum): sngags lan bdun bzlas/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs shing // mdog dkar du ba dang brel ba'o// me lha rgyal dbang byon nas kyang // thab khung gi ni dbus su bzhugs/
332a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas blo ldan sbyin sreg bya// de ru sol ba bzhugs bya ba// a shwa ta dang n+ya gro d+ha// u dum wa ra ra ka ti// pa la sha ste shing lnga las// sol byas du med 'bar ba'i me// blo ldan
332b1(rgyud 'bum): thab khung dbus su bzhugs/ / gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// pad+ma brgyan ni rtsa brgyad dang // de bzhin ut+pa la nyid dang // ku mu da dmar dri zhim 'dra// ka ra bI ra gzhan nyis 'gyur//
332b2(rgyud 'bum): byas te bsregs pas zhi bar gsungs// sbyin bdag mdun na 'dug pa la// de tshe du ba dbab par bya// mkhas pas gsang sngags 'di bton zhing // pad+ma mar sbags bsreg par bya//
332b3(rgyud 'bum): oM pad+ma rA dze ag+ni pri na ya a mu ka s+ya shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ mkhas pa yis ni sngags bzlas te// ut+pal 'o mas sbyin sreg bya// oM g+ha g+ha g+hA ta ya g+hA ta ya te dze rA dza bi nA ya shAn+ti ku ru swAhA/
332b4(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pa bde gshegs kun bdag gis// gu ra kum ku mu da bsngags bsregs// oM su puSh+pe su ka ra tsa li dz+wa la nAM ye shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ gsang sngags rgyal po 'di yis ni// dr-i
332b5(rgyud 'bum): zhim tsan dan sbyin sreg bya/ / oM d+ha me hA me rA dze da ha da ha sarba bag+h+na shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ ka ra bI ra dri zhim mar// mkhas pas sngags rgyal bzlas te sreg/ oM ka li su ka li ka ra ka la tri
332b6(rgyud 'bum): sarba pA pa dA ha da ha shAn+tiM ku ru swA hA/ me tog re re re re la// gsang sngags rgyal po lan re bzla// zhi ba'i sbyin sreg bla med pa// 'jig rten gsum na rnyed par dka'// me ni 'o mas zhi
332b7(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / de nas gzhan yang rgyas pa yi// sbyin sreg khyad par bshad par bya// rgyas la thab khung zlum po ste// chu yi dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba// zabs dang rgyar ni mtho gsum ste/
333a1(rgyud 'bum): kha dog ser por rnam par bsam// de dbus rdo rje rtse dgu pa// sngo bri de steng pang 'dab brgyad// bdag nyid he ru ka rnam pa// khro ba'i sems kyis bdag nyid kyis/
333a2(rgyud 'bum): shing bsregs pa yi sbyin sreg bya// gal te rgyas pa mchog 'dod na// a mra kan tha pa la dang // arga bil ba du du ra// shin tu rnyed dka'i shing lnga las// sor bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam du/

333a4(rgyud 'bum): la ni brgya rtsa brgyad/ / bgrangs te de nas sbyin sreg bya// bdag nyid he ru ka yi tshul// sku mdog nag po 'od chen pos// mar dang yam shing thams cad ni// sngags bsregs 'dir ni the tsam
333a5(rgyud 'bum): med/ / oM ga ga ni ga ga na bi lo ka ne hUM phaT/ te dzo rA dza puSh+Ti ku ru swA hA/ shing rnams kun gyis sngags 'di yis// re re bzhin du sbyin sreg bya// phyis ni ser po'i chus zhi bya// 'di lha'i

333b1(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid he ru kar bsam pa// dmar po ltar snang chags pa'i bdag/ rdo rje dmar po thod pa bsnams// yongs su gang ba'i khrag nyid kyis// khams gsum pa la rjes su chags// A/

333b3(rgyud 'bum): trai lo kya ba sha mA na ya hrIHswA hA/ nyin bdun sbyin sreg byas tsam gyis// khams gsum dbang du 'gyur ba yin// chu ni dmar pos me zhi bya// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// mngon spyod

334a1(rgyud 'bum): cig de la the tshom med// phreng mdzad 'jigs shing 'jigs par byed// ha ha zhes mdzad 'jigs par mdzad// gdug pa thams cad gsad par ni// sbyin sgeg tsam

334a3(rgyud 'bum): rgyas thod pa yi/ / rnal 'byor nga rgyal dang bral bas// shin tu mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems// lha rnams kyis kyang rnyed par dkar// ljang ku'i chu yis me zhi bya// gang gis bsregs

334a6(rgyud 'bum): bud med shin tu mchog gyur dang / / rnal 'byor gang gis spyod kun byed// dngos grub brgyad dang yang dag ldan// de nas spyod pa yang dag brtsam// sems can dngos grub gang gang 'dod//

334b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad bya/ / rgyan rnams kun las rnam grol zhing // nam mkha' dang mtshungs gyur pa yi// shes rab can gyis khyim khyim du// slong mo bya bar the tsom med// yid dang mthun pa kun blangs

334b7(rgyud 'bum): bas/ / mu tig dang mi nya phyis dang // dngul chu dang ni byu ru yis// gang gi sems can nor ldan 'gyur// 'di ni phyi yi sman min te// shun lpags lo ma ma yin zhing // dngul chu bcud
335a1(rgyud 'bum): len ma yin te/ / mu zi lhang tsher ma yin zhing // lcags dang na nye zangs ma yin// lcags gzhan dag ni ma yin te// thub pa'i sman gyi mchog yin no// 'di lta du yi tshig

338b7(rgyud 'bum): gyur pa yis/ / mkhas pas he hi'i sngags bton te// rol rtsed 'phreng ma btung bar bya// de yi rjes la rtsed 'jo brtsam// shin tu bzhad gyur phod mdzad pa'i// brtse ba chen po'i lag g.yon du// dud
339a1(rgyud 'bum): chen mchog ni gzhag par bya/ / sbyor ba la ni mkhas pa yis// phyis ni bags kyis bya ba bya// pad+ma las byung rdzas gang zhig/ de nyid kyis ni dud pa mnye// ming med mthe bos me
339a2(rgyud 'bum): tog sbyin/ / ril bu brgya dang rtsa brgyad bya// ril bu ra re re re la// gsang sngags brgya dang rtsa brgyad bzla// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li ni traM hrIHhUM phaT/ 'jig rten gsum na rnyed dka' zhing // rgyud rnams kun
339a3(rgyud 'bum): tu rnyed dka' ba/ / rnal 'byor mas kyang rnyed dka' ba'i// sngags 'di yis ni dud pa sgrub// srin lag gis ni sor mo yis// mig la dud pa byugs tsam gyis// stong gsum rdul phran lta bu yi//
339a4(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur// dpag tshad 'bum phrag brgyad cu yi// steng dang 'og ni mthong bar 'gyur// lag pa g.yon pas mnyes tsam gyis// skad cig de la rnal mar 'gyur//
339a5(rgyud 'bum): mdzub mos byugs pa tsam gyis ni// rgyu dang mi rgyu mthong 'gyur te// 'byung po yi dgas sha za dang // gzhan yang grub pa rnams dang ni// dpag tshad bye ba stong phrag gi/ steng dang 'og ni mthong
339a6(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / lag pa g.yon pas mnyes tsam gyis// rnal mar 'gyur bar the tshom med// gung mos byugs pa tsam gyis ni// shin tu ngo mtshar byed 'gyur te// pheg brdabs bdun gyi sgra
339a7(rgyud 'bum): tshad du/ / nag po 'bar byed rtse mo yis// sprin rnams thams cad 'thor bar 'gyur// 'di lta'i dud pa rnyed par dka'// lag pa g.yon pas mnyes tsam gyis// skad cig de la mi ru 'gyur//
339b1(rgyud 'bum): mthe bong gis ni dud pa yi// bdag nyid chen po byugs tsam gyis// gzugs brnyan mtshan ma ri dang shing // gzhan dag gang yang rung ba rnams// khro ba'i lta bas bltas tsam gyis// dum bu stong du 'gyur ba yin//
339b2(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pas mnyes pa tsam gyis ni// rnal mar 'gyur bar the tshom med// mthe'u chung gis ni mig byugs na// skad cig de la mi snang 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyis kyang gzigs mi 'gyur// skad cig sum cu
339b3(rgyud 'bum): gsum du 'khor/ / mdzod pa bud med rdzas nyid dang // dngos po gang dang gang 'dod pa// dud pa'i bdag nyid chen po yis// skad cig de la 'phrog par 'gyur// 'di lta bu yi dud mchog gi/ sbyor ba sna tshogs/
339b4(rgyud 'bum): legs par bshad// de ni mig la byugs tsam gyis// rang gi gzugs ni sgyur bar byed// dud pa 'di ni byugs tsam gyis// rig pa 'dzin pa'i gtso bor 'gyur// bya rog 'ug pa bya rgod dang // sbrul dang khyi dang
339b5(rgyud 'bum): ce spyang dang / / stag dang gung dang byi la dang // sbrang bu glang po bong bu ru// de ltar dud pa chen po yis// sna tshogs pa yi las byed pa'o// kun la las kun yod mod kyi// sbyor ba 'ba' zhig rnyed par dka'// sbyor
339b6(rgyud 'bum): bapa glegs bam la ma bris/ / bla ma'i zhal nas shes par bya// de nas yang dag rab bshad de// sbyor ba shin tu rnyeng dka' ba// sngags dang rus pa'i sbyor ba yis// rtag tu sna tshogs las byed do// glang po'i
339b7(rgyud 'bum): / rus pas gsad pa'i sbyor ba bya'o// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI hrIHhUM// rta yi rus pas bskrad pa rnyed par dka' ba bya'o// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI khaM hrIHhUM phaT/ ba glang gi rus pas dgra'i snying kar phur bu gang ba
340a1(rgyud 'bum): par bya'o/ / oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI tra hrIH/ khyi'i rus pas rengs pa chen po bya bar gsungs so// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI oM U hUM phaT/ rus pa chen pos ni dgug par bya'o// oM bud+d+ha
340a2(rgyud 'bum): ka pA li nI hrIHbo ShaT/ bong bu'i rus pas rmongs par bya'o// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI bru hUM/ 'ug pa'i rus pas dbang du bya'o// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI tre hrIHhUM/ bya rgod kyi rus pas dbye bar bya'o// oM bud+d+ha ka
340a3(rgyud 'bum): pA li nI hA phaTaHhUM/ bong bu'i rus pas rengs par bya'o// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI badz+rI Na~M traM/ ce sbrang gi rus pas g.yul las rgyal bar byed do// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI b+ha ga wa ti d+ha ra d+ha ra ha he ho ha ha/ ma he'i rus
340a4(rgyud 'bum): pas dga' zhing rtse bas lo bcu gnyis su nyin dang mtshan du de'i byang chub sems mi ltung ngo / / oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI ra ma ra ma kri Ta kri Ta ha ha/ sbrul gyi rus pas shing rtsa nas 'don no// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI ta Ta ta Ta/
340a5(rgyud 'bum): Thatha ta ya tra ta ya/ ma ta s+pho Ta ya s+pho Ta ya uta pa Ta ya hUM phaT/ stag gi rus pas ri 'degs par byed do// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI/ g+ha ra g+ha ra/ ma Ta ma Ta/ tra Ta ya tra Ta ya/ g+ha nA pa ya g+ha Tu pa ya/ s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/
340a6(rgyud 'bum): mo Ta mo Ta ya saM kra ma ya hrIHhUM traM phaT/ lcags kyus ni nags stug po stongs par byed do// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI badz+re nA sha yA ma ra ye/ g+hu Ta g+hu Ti ni sarba ba na ya ti na hri ye yaM ta Da ya bi dra pa ya tsa mo tsa maM/
340a7(rgyud 'bum): b+h+ra ma ya b+h+ra ma ya/ b+ho b+ha ga wa ti aM aM ta Ta hUM phaT/ sems gcig dri med me long bzhin// gang bsams de yang gzugs brnyan dang // rmi lam lta bur shes mod kyi// 'on kyang rnam par rtog pas
340b1(rgyud 'bum): gsungs/ / sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa'i gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las/ sngags sna tshogs kyi rab tu sbyor ba'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// /
340b2(rgyud 'bum): / de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// rnam dag le'u rab rnyed dka'// ne ne mo dang tsha mo dang // ma dang bu mo chung ma nyid// gal te phyag rgya che 'dod na// shes rab can gyis 'di dag spyad// g.yung
340b3(rgyud 'bum): mo dang ni gar mkhan ma/ / khrus mkhan ma dang gtum mo yi// bu mo ko ba byed par gsungs// blo dang ldan pas 'di dag spyad// de lnga rnal 'byor ma yi mchog/ de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// ma dag pa yi
340b4(rgyud 'bum): sems sbyang phyir/ / mig ni sring mor gyur pa ste// rna ba tsha mo nyid yin no// sna ni ma ru 'gyur pa ste// lce ni bu mo nyid yin no// yid ni chung mar 'gyur ba ste// lnga po de rnams mchog lha mo// phyag rgya chen po rab
340b5(rgyud 'bum): ster ma'o/ / gti mug gar mkhan ma ru 'gyur// zhe sdang g.yung mo nyid yin no// 'dod chags khrus mkhan ma yin te// nga rgyal gtum mo nyid yin no// phrag dog ko ba byed ma'o// lnga po de rnams bud med
340b6(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ gzugs las gti mug skye ba ste// sgra las zhe sdang skye ba yin// dri la longs spyod pas 'dod chags// ro las nga rgyal nyid yin te// reg bya las ni phrag dog skye// sems kyi dag pa nyid yin/
340b7(rgyud 'bum): no// de phyir rnal 'byor blo chen gyis// shin tu sbyor ba'i sems kyis ni// skye 'dir dngos grub ma thob kyang // skye gzhan srid par dngos grub pa thob// ji ltar dngos po med par bsgom// ji ltar dngos po
341a1(rgyud 'bum): bsgom par bya/ / dngos po bsgom bya ji ltar 'gyur// sring mo'i gzugs ni ji ltar yin// dkar mo ljang ku'i sngon mo'i mdog/ 'di lta'i gzugs dang ldan par ni// dag pa'i
341a2(rgyud 'bum): sems kyis blta mi bya/ / tsha mos ji ltar sgra thos pa'i// sgra grags pa ni rnam gsum nyid// 'di lta'i sbyor dang ldan par ni// dag pa'i sems kyis mnyan mi bya// rab sbas skyes ma gang yin des//
341a3(rgyud 'bum): de ni rnam pa gsum bltas pa// lha min yid dang ldan pa la// ji ltar 'dod chags skye bar 'gyur// lce dang lhan cig longs spyod rdzas// ro drug myangs pa ci 'dra ba// myangs pas longs spyod ldan
341a4(rgyud 'bum): pa yi/ / myangs pa'i gzugs ni ji lta bu// yid kyis longs spyod dga' de nyid// yid kyis gnyis ka spyad pas bde// der ni rtag pa yod ma yin// dngos po las ni dngos med yod// dngos
341a5(rgyud 'bum): med la yang dngos po nyid/ / dngos dang dngos med gnyis ka stong // 'di dag sems kyi dag pa nyid// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// phyi yi lus ni sbyang phyir ro// lha dang ldan pa snying rje
341a6(rgyud 'bum): ste/ 'khyud pa byams par 'gyur ba'o// drud pa'i sbyor ba'i bdag nyid ni// dga' ba yan lag ma yi mchog/ gnyis ka 'dus las gang 'dzag pa// de ni bdag gis btang snyoms gsungs//
341a7(rgyud 'bum): de ltar dngos po'i sbyor ldan pa// ji ltar 'dod chags kyis 'ching 'gyur// mthong ba las ni 'dod chags skye// 'khyud las 'bras bu cung zad ces// drung ba las ni dga' ba skyes// kun
341b1(rgyud 'bum): gyi mtha' mar dga' bral lo/ / de ltar dga' dang dga' bral 'bras// khams gsum pa las skye bar 'gyur// rab dga' sems kyi sbyor ba yis// dngos po gsum gyis 'ching mi 'gyur//
341b2(rgyud 'bum): bza' dang btung ba gang cibang rung // bde ba 'bab pa'i kha zas rnams// de kun bshang dang gci sogs su// rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu brtag/ gang ci rung ba'i dga' rtsed 'jo// 'khyud pa
341b3(rgyud 'bum): dang ni 'o byed dang / / nyed dang 'chir ba nyid kyis ni// phyag rgya chen po'ang mthong bar 'gyur// 'di lha'i sgom dang ldan pas ni// 'di ru 'grub par the tshom med// rnal 'byor ma lngas sangs
341b4(rgyud 'bum): rgyas kyi/ / dpal dang phyag rgya che ste byed// rnal 'byor pa yis de mchod na// 'dod pa rnams kyis gos mi 'gyur// phrag dog la sogs kyis sbags kyang // de la nyes pas gnod
341b5(rgyud 'bum): pa med/ / rnal 'byor pa yi mchog de nyid// srid pa'i nyes pas gos mi 'gyur// ji srid khams phye de mi gsor// sangs rgyas sku srid sdig dang bral// byang chub sems ni 'dzag
341b6(rgyud 'bum): med pa/ / gang tshe phun sum tshogs pa'i shing // sangs rgyas thod pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las/ sems rnam par dag pa'i le'u ste bcu
341b7(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa'o/ / // de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// sna tshogs sde mas bsngags pa'i le'u// de ltar phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang // ri rab
342a1(rgyud 'bum): kyi rdul phra rab snyed dang mtshungs pa'i rnal 'byor ma rnams spyan drangs shing mgu ba'i sems kyis sna tshogs bde ma la btud de bstod pa/ kye ma'o bcom ldan 'das lha mo//
342a2(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas thams cad skyed byed ma// dpal dang grags pa che zhing 'jigs// sems can kun la phan mdzad ma// lha mo snying rje che ldan ma// phyag rgya chen po blo chen ma// don chen 'bras bu ston
342a3(rgyud 'bum): mdzad ma/ / sangs rgyas thod pa yi ni rgyud// rdo rje 'chang gis sbas pa dang // sangs rgyas rnams kyis ma gsungs shing // byang chub sems dpa'i yul min pa// gsungs gcig gis ni gsal/
342a4(rgyud 'bum): mdzad de// de ni lha mo khyod kyis gsungs// a ma'o snod chen lha mo khyod// rnal 'byor ma kun bsdus byas pa// de bzhin gshegs kun yul min pa// rnyed dka' dngos grub gang yin pa//
342a5(rgyud 'bum): de ni lha mos gsal bar mdzod// gsungs pa/ rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad nyon// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang // 'dod chags bral dang bdag chen nyon// sangs rgyas de
342a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gshegs pa nyon/ / klu dang lhar bcas mi rnams nyon// rgyud rgyal 'di ni bklags tsam gyis// bsod nams gang yin de kun gyi// bsod nams rjes rang yongs su bsngo// phyag
342a7(rgyud 'bum): / rgya chen po'i don du ni// sangs rgyas yon tan rnam pa dbul// sngags don zab mo rnams dang ni// sbyor ba shin tu rnyed dka' ba// gang zhig gsal byas bdag bzod mdzod// shin tu sbas
342b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i yul de yang / / sems can don du gsal byas pas// rgyal po'i mchog rnams bdag bzod mdzod// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa// sngags kyi bzlas pa stobs po che//
342b2(rgyud 'bum): gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// sangs rgyas thod sbyor bzang po bzla// oM hrIHbud+d+ha hUM kA pU li nI AH'jug pa la oM/ 'byung ba la hrIHgnas pa la bud+d+ha/ bde ba la hUM/ nub pa
342b3(rgyud 'bum): la ka pA li nI/ ldang ba la AH'o// de ltar bzlas pa rab rnyed dka'// sangs rgyas thod pa'i sbyor chud bzla// de ltar yid kyi bzlas ldan pas// dngos grub 'thob pa the tsom med//
342b4(rgyud 'bum): / oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI AHhrIHhaM hUM phaT/ snying po'i sngags so// oM bud+d+ha ka pA li nI badz+rI Ni ho hUM/ a dur lAk+She hUM phaT/ nye ba'i snying po'i sngags so// de nas yang dag rab bshad pa/
342b5(rgyud 'bum): dbang dus cho ga ji bzhin du// slob ma dang brtan gang zhig gis// shes rab ma la gsol ba gdab// dri zhim pa yi dngos po yis// maN+Dal rnam pa lnga byas te// sangs rgyas kun gyi
342b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyan byas pa/ / lha mo che la gsol ba gdab// zhal du bza' ba'i rdzas mchog btab// rdzas de rnams ni gsol ba dang // yid ni tshim zhing thugs dgyes so// lha mo dgyes par mthong
342b7(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / tshig 'di dag gis smra bar byed// rnam par rtog pa mang po yis// g.yogs pa'i bag chags rab ldan pa// 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba dag/ mdzes ma khyod kyis skyob par
343a1(rgyud 'bum): mdzod/ / grags chen snying rje ldan pa yi// lha mo de ni zhi bar mdzod// der ni rgyan rnams thams cad dang // lhab lhub rgyun rnams dbul bar bya// dad pa brtan
343a2(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sems kyis ni/ / de nas bdag nyid dbul bar bya// sna tshogs zas dang sna tshogs btung // de yi mdun du dbul bar bya// gang gis shes rab ma mnyes pa// sangs rgyas
343a3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kyis ni mchod/ / 'di nyid la ni sangs rgyas bzhugs// gzhan yang dngos grub gtso bo dang // snying rje ldan pa gzhan gang zhig/ mkha' 'gro ma kun 'di la bzhugs// gang
343a4(rgyud 'bum): du dbang po 'gags gyur pa/ / bdag rtog rang bzhin nyams pa ste// kye de lhan cig skyes dgar gyur// bla ma'i zhal snga gsal bar zhus// gang zhig 'char dus tshe na dpa' bo dang //

343a6(rgyud 'bum): ma'i rgyud bla na med pa gsang ba'i yang shin tu gsang ba las/ sngags kyi bzlas pa dang / shes rab ma la gsol ba gdab pa dang / rgyud thams cad kyi gleng gzhi'i le'u ste bcu bzhi

343b2(rgyud 'bum): gyi mkhan po shrI ga ya d+ha ra dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba gyi rngo zla ba'i 'od zer gyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// rgya grar skad du/
343b3(rgyud 'bum): ma hA mA yA tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rgyud ces bya ba/ dpal rdo rje mkha' bgro la phyag 'tshal lo// dpal ldan rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// mkha' 'gro ma yi 'khor los
343b4(rgyud 'bum): sbyar/ / ye shes lnga dang sku gsum nyid// 'gro ba skyob la phyag 'tshal lo// ji snyed rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// kun tu rtog pa'i 'ching gcod cing // 'jig rten bya bar rab 'jug pa//

343b6(rgyud 'bum): rgyu dang mi rgyu tshangs sgo nga / / lha mo thams cad skyed byed cing // tshangs la sogs pa'i bdag nyid che// de rnams kyi ni gsang chen 'di// sgyu 'phrul chen mo dbang phyug che/
343b7(rgyud 'bum): sgyu 'phrul chen mo drag chen mo// 'byung ba yang dag sdud mdzad ma// gang gis 'di kun la khyab pa// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten gsum// des ni de nas 'di bsdus nas// 'jig rten gsum
344a1(rgyud 'bum): po yang spro'o/ / gsang ba pa rnams ma 'di ni// sgyu ma'i bdag nyid ces rnam grags// 'jig rten gsum sgrub rig ma ste// 'dod pa thams cad rab ster ba// gang zhig
344a2(rgyud 'bum): rnam par shes tsam gyis/ / sgrub pa'i dbang phyug rig pa nyid// lha dang nor bdag dri za dang // gnod sbyin lha min mi dang bcas// rig pa 'dzin dang gang yang rung // mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye che//
344a3(rgyud 'bum): srin po dang ni sha za rnams// sgrub po rnams la 'grub par 'gyur// dbang du 'du 'gyur babyung po rnams// chu las skyes dang zang las skyes// chos rnams rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// gdod/
344a4(rgyud 'bum): nas dag cing rnyog pa med// thabs brjod pa yis de las ni// rang byung ye shes lnga ldan 'gyur// rnal 'byor ma rnams sbyor ba'i ma// khams gsum po ni me lus kun// ma lus
344a5(rgyud 'bum): lus pa med grub cing / / sgyu ma kun gyis rnam rol ba'o// sangs rgyas kun las phrogs nas su// lha mchog lha skyes bu mo spyod// rnal 'byor dbang phyug byed rig pa// de bzhin
344a6(rgyud 'bum): du ni mig 'khrul byed/ / rmongs pa dang ni rengs pa dang // bskrad dang gsad pa la sogs pa// dbang dang dgug pa la sogs dang // nam mkhar 'gro ba nyid kyang ngo // gzhan gyi grong sogs
344a7(rgyud 'bum): bya ba dang / / mi snang ba dang gang yang rung // zhe 'gras pa dang rmugs pa dang // de bzhin sa bog 'gro ba'o// rig 'dzin 'khor los sgyur nyid 'gyur// 'chi ba med cing rgas pa med//
344b1(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor sgyu ma'i rig pa 'di// 'di yis na ba med par 'gyur// sngags kyi yi ge'i gzugs kyis su// rnal 'byor pas ni rnam rol byed// bklags pa dang ni bsams pa yis//
344b2(rgyud 'bum): sgom pa dang ni ting 'dzin rnams// bklags pas byed pa'i rig pa ste// rig pa'i dngos grub byed par 'gyur// brtul zhugs med cing dka' thub med// dka' spyod bsnyung ba sdom med
344b3(rgyud 'bum): par/ / rtag tu shes rab thabs sogs kyis// rtag tu dga' dang bde bas 'grub// lte ba'i dbus gnas dpa' bo ste// ge sar gsang ba'i spyod yul la// sems dang sems med/
344b4(rgyud 'bum): sems kyi gzugs// ye shes shes bya'i rang bzhin bdag/ de ni bdag gis bshad bya ste// zab mo sangs rgyas bstan pa'o// A li kA li mnyam byas te// ri mo de la sbar bar bya// /
344b5(rgyud 'bum): ri mo steng du 'bar ba'i mthar// 'og tu 'bab par byed pa'o// khu ba'i tshul gyis 'bab pa ste// bdud rtsi'i theg pa'i gzugs las so// gang gang dbang po'i lam nas ni//

344b7(rgyud 'bum): sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rab sbyor ba'i// sdom pa'i sbyor bar byed par 'gyur// mchod pa lnga dang yang dag ldan// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga dang bcas// sgrub pa'i dbang po shes bya ba//
345a1(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub shin tu rtag pa'o// gang zhig shes pa'i dngos grub kyis// lha yi gnas su myur bar 'gyur// de ni bdag gis bshad bya ste// lha mo bden par smra ba'o//
345a2(rgyud 'bum): sgyu 'phrul chen mo khyod la ngas// 'jig rten gsum 'grub de bshad bya// rnal 'byor chen mo rnams kyi ni// bzang po'i yi ge'i 'phreng ba rnams// gang zhig bsams pa tsam gyis ni// rgyu
345a3(rgyud 'bum): dang mi rgyu 'grub 'gyur ba'o/ / 'dod pa kun la nyer spyod pa// ji ltar 'dod bzhin bsten byas na// rnal 'byor pa chen rtag rol te// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams dang // rnam pa sna tshogs
345a4(rgyud 'bum): gzugs su ni/ / rnal 'byor bdag nyid ston par byed// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dpal// dngos grub chen po ster bar 'gyur// bcud len rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// rtag tu
345a5(rgyud 'bum): sems can don byed pa'o/ / khu ba dgug dang chang dang ni// gong bu chen po dgug pa nyid// sha chen po ni bkug nas su// rnal 'byor ma dang lhan cig spyod// tshe ring brtson 'grus chen po
345a6(rgyud 'bum): drang / / gzi brjid che zhing stobs chen 'gyur// lha yi mig dang rdzu 'phrul ldan// nyin re zla ba 'thung ba'o// de yi tshe ni 'phel 'gyur te// bskal pa chen po'i bar du gnas// lta bas
345a7(rgyud 'bum): mi ngoms lus dang ni/ / cho 'phrul dag ni ston par byed// yid la bsams ma thag tu ni// rang gi gzugs ni yongs brjes shing // bklags pas 'grub pa'i don yod pa// rig
345b1(rgyud 'bum): ma'i dbang phyug rdzu 'phrul che/ / rig pa 'jig rten gsum po na// nga yi rig dang mnyam pa med// rgyud rnams kun gyi lung 'di ni// mdzes ma khyod la bshad pa yin// rnal 'byor
345b2(rgyud 'bum): ma'i dbang phyug ma'i rig ma chen mo las/ dngos grub kyi mtshan ma bstan pa ste le'u dang po'o// // de nas de las rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug chen mo rnams kyi sbyor ba'i
345b3(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub kyi 'bras bu rab tu ster ma'i gsang ba'i yi ge bzang po bshad par bya ste/ gang zhig bsams pa tsam gyis ni// rnal 'byor ma mchog ster 'gyur ba// dang po'i yi ge sbyor ba yis
345b4(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu dbugs ni rgyu bar bya/ / brgyad pa'i mtha' dang yang dag ldan// u dang thig ler bcas pa yi// rnal 'byor pa yi dbugs rngub byed// dngos dang dngos med rnams spangs pa'o//
345b5(rgyud 'bum): de la brtul zhugs ma bshad do// 'phreng ba sngags dang bzung ba dang // sbyin sreg gi ni las rnams kyang // gcig nas gcig tu ldog par 'gyur// sngags dang dbyibs dang chos bdag
345b6(rgyud 'bum): nyid/ / sbyor ba rnam gsum zhes bya ste// ye shes rnam pa gsum gyis ni// sred pa'i nyes pas gos mi 'gyur// de ltar rgyun du rnal 'byor pa// rtag tu goms pa nyid kyis ni// rdo rje
345b7(rgyud 'bum): sems dpa' dang mnyam pa'ang / / zla ba gcig gis de 'grub 'gyur// dbang po'i mdog dang yang dag ldan// dang po'i yi ge bsgom bya ste// rang gi rig pa rab sbyar na// des 'di mod
346a1(rgyud 'bum): la 'gug par 'gyur/ / yi ge gnyis pa dang ldan pa// bsam zhing rnam par bsgom byas na// sa gsum po ni ma lus pa// de dag thams cad dbang du 'gyur/
346a2(rgyud 'bum): tshangs dang khyab 'jug dbang po dang // de bzhin dbang po 'dod dbang phyug/ ye shes yi ges bskul byas nas// de dag chung mar bcas te 'gugs// yi ge a dang yang dag ldan//
346a3(rgyud 'bum): sku gsung thugs la legs gnas pa// sbyor ba rnam gsum bsgom byas na// gong bu 'gugs pa'i mchog yin no// yi ge khe dang yang dag ldan// sku mdog dmar po zhal bzhi pa//
346a4(rgyud 'bum): lag na thod pa chags pa'i bdag/ khu ba 'gugs pa'i mchog yin no// yi ge rtsi dang ldan pa yis// kha dog ser po kun tu 'od// rta yi zhal gyi tshul byas nas// chang 'gugs
346a5(rgyud 'bum): pa yi dam pa yin/ / yi ge ra dang yang dag ldan// kha dog dmar po 'od chen po// phyag bzhi pa dang zhal bzhi pa// ce spyang tshul du legs gnas pa// khro bo'i sems kyis bsgom byas
346a6(rgyud 'bum): na/ / khrag 'gugs pa yi dam pa'o// yi ge drug dang yang dag ldan// gnas drug tu ni nges sbyar bya// rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro ma yi tshogs// rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams 'grub//
346a7(rgyud 'bum): mig gnyis dang ni rna ba dang // de bzhin sna dang yid gnyis dag/ seng ge rnam rol phyag rgya yis// rnal 'byor pa yis bcing bar bya// srog dang rtsol ba bsdams nas su// bsgoms
346b1(rgyud 'bum): ni skad cig de la 'bar/ / 'og min srid pa'i mthar thug pa// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten bdun// thams cad kyis ni de bsgoms kyang // de ni rtogs pa ma yin no// gal te thams cad
346b2(rgyud 'bum): rab rtogs na/ / 'gro ba'i rol pa rnam par 'jig/ de phyir ye shes 'di gsang zhing // mi gsal yi ge med pa'o// gang phyir sangs rgyas rnams kyis mkhyen// rnal 'byor gnyid dang
346b3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag ldan/ / gong bur song ba'i yid de yis// gzugs gcig tu ni sgom par byed// sgo dgu las ni gang byung ba// rdzas kyi bdag nyid rnam bsgoms la// rang bzhin med pa'i blo ldan
346b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ / rnam par mi rtog pa yis bza'// mthe bong dang ni srin lag gis// kha ru yid bzhin nor bu ni// bdud rtsi'i rang bzhin las byung ba// rtag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur//
346b5(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma'i dbang phyug ma'i rig pa chen po las// sbyor ba gtan la dbab pa'i le'u gnyis pa'o// // de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// dam tshig sgrub pa'i dam pa ste//
346b6(rgyud 'bum): rdzas gzhan tshogs ni bza' bya ba// thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'bras ster ba'o// gang zhig zos pa tsam gyis ni// 'byung po'i ma rnams 'grub 'gyur ba// brtan pa dang ni myur 'gro nyid//
346b7(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin du ni ba glang khyi// chen por yang dag ldan pa ni// de bzhin ye shes bdud rtsi lnga// tshes grangs bcu bzhi brgyad la ni// lhan cig bsgos te sbyar byas nas// nyi ma bdun du ce spyang gi//
347a1(rgyud 'bum): dbus su bzhag la de nas bton// lnga po dag las yungs kar gyi// 'bras bu'i tshad tsam ril bu bya// de ni rgyud 'dir gsungs mod kyis// tshes brgyad dang ni bcu
347a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhi'i bar dag tu/ / nyi ma bdun du lhan cig min sgom ste// sbyar nas ce spyang dbus su legs bzhag la// de las bton te lnga po dag las ni// dngos grub 'bras bu'i tshad tsam ril
347a3(rgyud 'bum): bu bya/ / 'bras bu chen po rab tu rtogs pas na// de ni rgyud 'dir gsungs kyi kun tu sbas// 'bras bu chen po sangs rgyas kyis// thams cad du ni sbas pa'o// de nas sgrub thabs
347a4(rgyud 'bum): 'byung ba'o/ / yid kyis pad+ma bsam bya ba// kha dog dmar po kun 'od la// lha mo bzhi dang yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas gzugs kyis nyer brgyan pa'o// shar du ut+pal sngo 'od mdog
347a5(rgyud 'bum): lho ru ser po lta bu'o/ / nub tu dkar dang dmar ba'o// byang du mar gad 'od yin no// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas 'khrigs pa dang // zhal bzhi phyag bzhi spun gsum mdzes// shar
347a6(rgyud 'bum): phyogs kyi lha mo ni spyan gsum pa/ phyag g.yon na kha T+wAM ga dang dril bu/ g.yas na rdo rje dang thod pa bsnams pa bsam mo// lho phyogs kyi lha mo'i phyag ni mdung rtse gsum dang // rin
347a7(rgyud 'bum): po che dang / ba dan dang / ce spyang bsnams pa'o// nub phyogs kyi lha mo'i phyag na gzhu dang / mnga' dang / sna tshogs pad+ma dang // thod pa bsnams pa'o// byang phyogs kyi lha mo'i phyag
347b1(rgyud 'bum): nu ral gri dang / / zhags pa dang / rde'u chung dang / thod pa bsnams pa'o// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// de yi dbus su bsam par bya// thod pa nyid dang kha T+wAM ga/ de bzhin gzhu dang mda' nyid
347b2(rgyud 'bum): dongo/ / dang po'i sngags dang yang dag ldan// bsgoms na skad cig de la 'bar// de ltar rnal 'byor pas bsgrubs na// rdzas kyi dngos grub rab tu ster// rnal 'byor ma yi sgrub sbyor bas//
347b3(rgyud 'bum): 'phral du yid ches yang dag 'jug/ thams cad kyis ni mi mthong zhing // stong phrag gcig tu snang bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun las phrogs pa dang // lha yi bu mo mchog la spyod//
347b4(rgyud 'bum): gang+gA'i bye snyed sangs rgyas rnams// nyid kyi rdo rje'i gnas bzhugs pa// lag tu skyu ru ra bzhag bzhin// rdo rje'i mig gis mthong bar 'gyur// gang+gA'i bye snyed zhing dag kyang // sku gsung thugs
347b5(rgyud 'bum): kyi mtshan nyid dang / / dngos po kun gyi bdag nyid gnas// sems kyi gar las byung ba mkhyen// yi ge go bzlog sbyor ba yis// sngags ni de ru rnam bsgom bya// rdo rje chu dang yang dag ldan//
347b6(rgyud 'bum): ril bu re re bza' bar bya// yi ge brgyad kyi mtha' ldan pa// u dang thig le bcas pa ni// mtha' ru yang dag sbyar byas la// sngags ni kun tu brjod bya ste// guh+ya b+hak+Sha A b+hak+She hUM zhes
347b7(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / rnal 'byor ma kun sbyor ba yis// dang po'i yi ge yang dag ldan// gal te rdo rje can gyis grub 'dod na// lan bdun mngon bsngags rnal 'byor pa yis bza'// yi ge gsum
348a1(rgyud 'bum): mtha' zhes bya ste/ / brgyad kyi mtha' mar legs gnas pa// u dang thig ler yang dag ldan// yi ge mchog tu gyur pa'i gnas// yi ge dang po sbyor ba yi//
348a2(rgyud 'bum): hrI zhes bya ba yang dag sbyar// yi ge rnams kyi mthar sbyor la// sa bon lngas ni rab dgang bya// yi ge yis ni rnam bsgoms te// pad+ma rab tu rgyas par bya// ci ste rdo rje can 'grub
348a3(rgyud 'bum): 'dod/ / de lta'i sbyor ba kun shes bya// de nas 'dir rdo rje rnal 'byor ma rnams kyis dgongs pa dpal rdo rje'i glus srid pa shin tu sgrub pa blangs pa/ kye grogs po rdo rjes pad+ma kha 'byed
348a4(rgyud 'bum): sa mdzad pa/ / a la la ho/ bde ba chen po gar gyis rab tu mnyes mdzod cig/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor pad+ma'i kha ni rab bye ba// bde ba chen po'i gar gyis rab tu mnyes par mdzod// rdo rje
348a5(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa chen po la/ / de nas 'dir glu blangs tsam gyis// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma rnams gar// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bskul// de ltar rtag tu gus ldan pas// sbyor ba'i dngos grub 'gyur
348a6(rgyud 'bum): ba yi/ / dus bzhir rab tu sbyor ba yi// 'grub par 'gyur ba sgom pa'i mchog/ rgyan rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs shing // spos dang me tog rnams kyis brgyan// ji ltar sku gsum mchog

348b1(rgyud 'bum): sangs rgyas byang chub gnas zhi ba'i// de nyid bla na med pa 'grub// 'drar tshigs bcad du 'gyur ba ni// gzugs rnams dang ni de bzhin phyag rgya mtshan ma dang // rdzas rnams dang ni bsam gtan
348b2(rgyud 'bum): rnam sgom pa'i/ / cho ga'i thabs ni sna tshogs bstan pa dang // lha mo yid 'dod rnams ni gsungs pa'o// gang gi khyim du rgyud 'di gnas pa dang / rgyun du 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / rnam par sgom pa

348b4(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma chen mo rnams kyi dgongs pa mchog tu gsang ba gsang ba chen po nye bar spyod pa dang bcas pa'i sgrub thabs te le'u gsum pa'o/ / / sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i rgyud ces
348b5(rgyud 'bum): bya ba rdzogs so/ / / rgya gur gyi mkhan po dzi na par dang / bod kyi lo tsA ba chen po mgos lha btsas kyis bsgyur cing nus te gtan la phab pa'o//
348b6(rgyud 'bum): / rgya gar skad du/ ri gI A ra li tan+d+ha rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ ri gi A ra li'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ dpal rdo rje mkha' 'gro la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag
348b7(rgyud 'bum): gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das ri gi rnam pa'i oM waM sdom pa la bzhugs so// gnyis meng gnyis kyi rnal 'byor gyi// A ra li dang ri gir brtags// ri gi rnal 'byor dpa
349a1(rgyud 'bum): phyug gtso/ / de la A ra lis zhus pa// gnas kyi rnam pa du zhig lags// nye gnas rnam pa du ru 'gyur// de la zhing gi rnam pa du// nye zhing rnam pa du ru gsungs//

349a3(rgyud 'bum): gi che/ / rnal 'byor rnal 'byor cher gnas pas// a ra li dang bder go bar// sa bcu rnams ni rab tu phye// gnas ni shar gyi lus 'phags po// de bzhin du ni ba glang spyod// gnas ni byang
349a4(rgyud 'bum): gi sgra mi snyan/ / gnas ni de bzhin 'dzam bu gling // gling bzhir lha mo bzhi dang ni// ri rab spyi bor ri gi bzhugs// A ra li dang mnyam sbyor bas// gnyis kyis mnyam sbyor gnyis med
349a5(rgyud 'bum): las/ / si sa'i 'dod pa'i lcug ma dang // pad chen de bzhin sdom pa ma// ljang ku ser mo btsod mdog dang // dmar mo ru ni yongs su grags// zhal gcig ma ni phyag gnyis dang //

349b1(rgyud 'bum): gzhan dag tu ni dgra sta dang // thod par mgo bo 'dzin pa nyid// gnas su sems dang nye ba'i gnas// sa dang chu dang me dang rlung // 'dir yang lha mo rnam pa bzhi// kha dog dbye ba gong ma bzhin//

350b1(rgyud 'bum): 'jug pa'i las yang dag par rab tu bshad par bya ste/ ji ltar spyod pa'i gzugs bltas nas// bdag nyid ri gi yi gzugs su// ri gi A ra li'i sbyor bas// mgo ni 'og tu rnam par sgom/

351a2(rgyud 'bum): su ni/ / zhags pa'i phyag rgya'i sbyor ba yis// dam po la sogs bcing bar bya// ha hi ha hi de bzhin du// hu hu ho ho de bzhin te// lus kyi gnas ni brgyad rnams su// yan lag dgod par bya ba nyid//
351a3(rgyud 'bum): spyi bo mtshan khung lte ba dang // kha dang de bzhin mig gnyis dang // rkang mthil gsang ba nyid du ni// yan lag dgod par rab tu grags// sngags ni rim pa yis ni mtshon// lag pa ba spu'i khung kun nas//

351a6(rgyud 'bum): bas/ / phyogs bcur rnam par bzhugs pa yi// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas des bkug nas// cho gas 'dod pas mchod nas ni// dbang ni blo dang ldan pas blang // oM sarba ta thA ga tA DA ki n+yA nu ga ta ma hA
351a7(rgyud 'bum): b+hi She kA nu da nu zhes/ bdud rtsi lngas gang bum pa ni// sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin gyi// des ni lha rnams dbang bskur bya// lha yi dbang las bde ba nyid// oM sarba ta thA ga ta DA ki n+ya b+hi She ka badz+ra swa b+hA
351b1(rgyud 'bum): wa At+ma kohaM/ gru gsum me yi sa bon gyis// snang byed rnam par bsgom par bya// snying kar hUM las rigs bdag nyid// de nyid kyi ni de ru 'gyur// de nas rdo rje las byung kun// rdo rje gur dang ra ba nyid// ri gi
351b2(rgyud 'bum): A ra li gnas su/ / bdag nyid rtag tu bsrung bar bya// dmyal ba brgyad ni thod pa yi// dkyil 'khor 'phar ma gsum gnas pa'i// mkha' 'gro ma yi dra ba sdom// 'khor lo g.yas su bskor ba yin// zhabs
351b3(rgyud 'bum): g.yon brkyang ba'i A ra li/ / sems kyis 'jigs byed mnan nas ni// ri gi shing la mngon zhon pa// zhabs la zhabs kyis bskor bar bya// rnal 'byor ma kun thod par gnas// gar gyi rkang pas
351b4(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su gnas/ / tsha dang grang ba'i rab dbye bas// mtshams su thod pa brgyad po yin// las thams cad rab tu bsdus pa zhes bya ba'i gleng gzhi'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // ri
351b5(rgyud 'bum): gi A ra lis zhus pa/ / brda yi rnam pa du zhig lags// de la lha mo ri gi ches// brda ni yang dag rab tu phye// badz+ra ni chen po snom bcu// bdag nyid sngon du byed pa nyid// gang gis rnam par shes
351b6(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyis/ / sgrub po dngos grub thob 'dod na// gnas ni dpral ba'i rgyab tu 'dod// ngos ni nye ba'i gnas nyid de// pus mo tshan dor 'gro bar 'gyur// dpral bar nye ba'i tshan do nyid// lag pa
351b7(rgyud 'bum): g.yas pa 'du ba nyid/ / g.yon pa nye ba'i 'du ba nyid// rna ba g.yas pa dur khrod gnas// g.yon pa nye ba'i dur khrod do// snying ni zhing du yang dag 'gyur// lhag ma nye ba'i zhing nyid dang // tshong rdal
352a1(rgyud 'bum): nyams dga' tshong dus dang / / ma mo'i khyim du rtag tu blta// brda yi rnam par shes par bya// rang gi mtshan ma rang gis ston// ril bu mig sman la sogs pa// mchog/
352a2(rgyud 'bum): ni rab tu smin par 'gyur// A ra li yis lha mo zhus// ye shes dam pa ji ltar lags// gang gis rnam par shes tsam gyis// sgrub po dngos grub thob 'gyur ba// 'bras phyir byang chub
352a3(rgyud 'bum): thob 'gyur ba'i/ / ting 'dzin lha mo ri gi ste// mchog tu bde ba chen po nyid// srub dang srub byed las byung ba// kun mkhyen ye shes yang dag 'byung // sems pa thams cad yongs su spangs//
352a4(rgyud 'bum): dbang po thams cad bzlog par bya// dgon pa dben pa'i gnas su ni// gnyis gnyis thams cad rnam par spangs// mig dag steng du bzlog nas ni// smin ma'i dbus su sems byas nas//
352a5(rgyud 'bum): mi bzad mun pa'i gzugs su ni// sgrub pos dang po mthong bar 'gyur// phyis ni rna ba g.yon par bcug/ dal gyis dal gyis 'gul bar 'gyur// yan lag can gyi bde ba gang // de bzhin
352a6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya chen po bde/ / phyi yi phyag rgya ngang gis 'jigs// de yis ye shes kyang ni 'jig/ bde ba chen por rtogs pa'i phyir// de yi ye shes phyag rgya ba// 'di nyid ye shes chen po nyid// rang
352a7(rgyud 'bum): gis rig pa'i rang bzhin can/ / gzhon nu'i dga' ba ji lta bur// gzhan du brjod par mi nus so// lhan cig skyes pa'i rnal 'byor 'di// sems can gsol 'debs sems kyis ni// sems
352b1(rgyud 'bum): can kun la snying rje yis/ / 'di ni rnal 'byor gtso bo nyid// 'di la goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// nam mkha' mnyam pa'i sems kyis ni// snying rje mthu chen rnal 'byor pas// 'grub 'gyur 'di la
352b2(rgyud 'bum): the tsom med/ / dang por mun pa mthong bar 'gyur// gnyis pa dkar dang du ba 'thul// gsum pa me khyer rnam pa ltar// bzhi pa ya ba'i me tog bzhin// lnga pa sprin med ye shes ni// rang bzhin
352b3(rgyud 'bum): yang dag rig pa spangs/ / sprin med nam mkha' lta bu ni// de yod thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyu// rtag tu goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// rtse gcig sems kyis ri gar 'gyur// ye shes bdud rtsi
352b4(rgyud 'bum): rtag 'thungs pas/ / bkres pas zil gyis mi non cing // skom pa yis kyang zil mi non// rga dang na bas gzir mi 'gyur// 'di yi thabs kyis rnal 'byor gyis// ri gi thams cad rig par 'gyur//
352b5(rgyud 'bum): de nas rnal 'byor pa chen po// A ra li ni nyid kyis ni// dam du 'khyud par 'o mdzad pas// ri gi la ni gus par zhus// a wa ma yA ci zhig bshad// e yi rnam pas sa ru bshad// waM gi rnam
352b6(rgyud 'bum): pa de bzhin chu/ / ma ni me zhes bya bar brjod// yA ni rnam pa rlung du gsungs// ri gi sdom pa ci zhig bshad// ri gis bka' stsas pa/ ri gis mkha' 'gro mar ni gsungs// sdom pa dam par gyur pa 'di//
352b7(rgyud 'bum): ri gi e waM sdom pa ni// a waM rnam pa rna bar gnas// ri ga sna yi rtse mor ni// rtag tu ri gi bzhugs pa yi// ye shes dam pa 'di nyid ni// kun mkhyen ye shes de yi bdag/ 'byung ba chen
353a1(rgyud 'bum): po bzhi gtan la dbab pa dang brda'i le'u ste gsum pa'o/ / // de nas rnal 'byor chen po yi// A ra li ni nyid kyis ni// rang bzhin mdzes pa nyid
353a2(rgyud 'bum): la zhus/ / dkon mchog gsum la gnod byed pa'i// khrag ni ji ltar dgug par bgyi// nus la sogs pas mdun du ni// ya ba'i me tog bzhag nas ni// rang gi khrag ni dgug par
353a3(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / ri gri nyon cig goms pa yi// nas ni nyi shu kha smad byung // phyi nas khrag ni dgug par byed// lha ni bral ba bshad par bya// spyi bor 'bar ba bsam par bya// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas
353a4(rgyud 'bum): / khyab nas ni// der ni sngags ni bzlas par bya// oM he ru ka pa taM pi pa ta ya/ ri gi A ra li'i sbyor bas// lha ya phyag byas 'gas par 'gyur// a li ka li yan lag mnyam// 'di dag gnyis
353a5(rgyud 'bum): / dbus rang sa bon// rang gi sa bon nyid kyis ni// rang gi phyag rgya rnams yin te// phyag rgya las ni lha rnams 'byung // oM shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma kohaM/ lcags kyu phyag rgya lag gnyis kyis// mthen
353a6(rgyud 'bum): chung phan tshun lcags kyu'i tshul/ / dbu ma yi ni sor mo gnyis// mthe bong rgan pos gzir bar bya// sdigs mdzub gnyis kyi zhags pa nyid// rdo rje ral gri zhags chen po// chos kyi ye shes gang zhig/
353a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan// ri gi nyid du rab tu grags// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yis ni// si si la sogs rab tu grags// mi 'jigs pa ni bzhi yin te// mi bzar la sogs rab tu grags// bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi
353b1(rgyud 'bum): yis ni/ / wa la sogs pa rab tu grags// phyag drug 'gro ba drug tu gsungs// spyan gsum srid pa gsum du brjod// 'jigs byed bdag gi sems nyid de// zhabs kyi rtsa bar bsgyel ba nyid// dga' ba
353b2(rgyud 'bum): la sogs sa bcu na/ / gnas sogs yang dag rab tu grags// pha rol phyin drug phyag rgya drug/ thod pa nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor nyid// e wa ma ya'i dbus gnas pa'o// bdag nyid kyis ni de ltar
353b3(rgyud 'bum): bsam/ / 'chol pa kun gyi mtshan nyid kyis// thams cad rgyud du yang dag gnas// gri gug ma rig gcod pa nyid// thod pa yi ni snying rje che// ri gi A ra li yi sgra// cang te'u hUM da'i sngags bzlas
353b4(rgyud 'bum): pas/ / dgra sta chos kyi 'byung gnas brjod// rdo rje rdo rjer rab tu grags// mgo bo nyon mongs pa yi bdud// thod pa nam mkha' dag pa nyid// lcags kyu ri gi ze 'bru ste// de bzhin zhags pa
353b5(rgyud 'bum): dag pa nyid/ / ngang gi dag pa bsdus nas ni// lus ni mchod rten dag pa ste// skyil krung gdan du shes par bya// 'dzam bu'i gling gi snying por gsungs// gnyer ma gsum rtag lte ba nyid//
353b6(rgyud 'bum): lto ba yang ni gzugs su 'gyur// mgrin pa yang ni mgrin par brjod// kha khyer mgo bor shes par bya// spyi bo gdugs kyi 'phreng bar brjod// mig gnyis zla ba nyi ma nyid// 'phan ni
353b7(rgyud 'bum): mgo las skyes pa yin/ / rus pa bde bar gshegs pa'i gdung // de phyir rang byin rlob par 'gyur// de phyir sangs rgyas gzugs brnyan lus// rnal 'byor pa yis rtag tu mchod//
354a1(rgyud 'bum): rang gi ngo bo sangs rgyas su bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // rgyal po chen po zas gtsang 'di// A ra lis ni yang dag phye// de la ri gi sgyu ma che/
354a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba thams cad shes rab dag/ don grub rdo rje sems dpa' ste// lha mo sa 'tsho phyag rgya'o// sgra gcan bzang po bde ba che// sgyu ma'i gzugs kyi spros pa las// sgyu ma chen po sa'i tshe nyid//
354a3(rgyud 'bum): / rdo rje sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul bas// don grub lhan cig skyes dga' nyid// sras ni bcom ldan rdo rje can// yab ni rdo rje 'chang bar grags// yum ni sgyu ma chen mo yin// de nyid phyag rgyar rab tu grags//
354a4(rgyud 'bum): mthe bong rgan po rdo rje yin// lte ba chos kyi 'byung gnas gsungs// sgyu ma chen po'i rnam 'phrul pas// don grub nyid ni gzi brjid can// ngo bos 'gro ba sangs rgyas nyid// lha mo ri gi da tshig nyon//
354a5(rgyud 'bum): las la spyod pa rab brtags pas// lus can rnams ni rtag tu gdungs// dga' ba yang ni shi shrir gsungs// mchog tu dga' ba 'dod pa ma// dga' bral dga' ba bde chen ma// lhan cig skyes
354a6(rgyud 'bum): dga' sdom pa na/ / mi zad ma ni 'o ru gsungs// rnon mo yang ni 'khyud mo nyid// sgyu ma skyed la sgyu ma che// mthe bong mchu ni 'jib pa nyid// dga' ba'i rtsod pa wa nyid de// sbrang rtsi btung bas ma he nyid//
354a7(rgyud 'bum): rtog pa yis ni rta mgrin te// 'o byed glang po'i rgyal mtshan no// rdo rje ra li 'don chen can// 'dod pa ma ni ri gir brjod// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis// 'gro ba thams cad rnam par khyab// si
354b1(rgyud 'bum): si rnam pas dmyal ba bzhi/ / de bzhin ha yi rnam pa bzhi// 'khor bar ji ltar spyad pa ni// mya ngan 'das pa mi 'gal lo// rdo rje A ra li nyid ni// khu bar yang ni 'gyur ba yin// ri gi bde ba chen por gsungs
354b2(rgyud 'bum): ri gi A ra li sbyor bas/ / rdo rje sgyu ma zhes byar brjod// bud med sgyu ma'i spros pa yis// 'gro ba thams cad rnam par rmongs// bud med sgyu ma sangs rgyas nyid// sgyu ma thams cad spel bar byed// snying
354b3(rgyud 'bum): po'i sngags ni/ oM A ra lI b+h+yo b+h+yo ha ha ha ha/ si si si si/ mi gsal bar bzlas so// gnyis kyi nye ba'i snying po ni// ha ha ha/ las rgyas pa la sngags gang ni// de yi sngags su rab tu bsngags// snying
354b4(rgyud 'bum): po yi ni sngags yin ni/ / nye ba'i sngags kyis bskul ba yin// sgom pa bde chen myang ba ste// de bzhin dam tshig mchod pa nyid// thams cad kyi ni dam tshig la// mi las skyes pa rab tu bsngags//
354b5(rgyud 'bum): klu gzir gnyis 'thung dam tshig ste// rmi lam rta ni rab tu bsngags// gsang la ma he dam tshig go/ dbang la khyi ni rab tu bsngags// khrag dgug pa la dam tshig ste// 'jug pa de bzhin rnga mo nyid//
354b6(rgyud 'bum): rengs pa la ni ne bu'i shwa// kha na ma tho med rnyed pa// gal te bsang bar byas na ni// de tshe rnal 'byor pas mi 'grub// sems can bskyab sems rnal 'byor pa// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med//
354b7(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor khru ni bzhi par bya// sgo khyud sor ni gnyis su gsungs// logs la yang ni sor gnyis yang // ske khyud kyi ni kha khyer lo// sor ni bcu gnyis dag tu gsungs// lha yi snam bu sor
355a1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis te/ / rta babs sor ni bcu drug nyid// sgo las sor mo gnyis kyis ni// rdo rje 'phreng ba de bzhin bya// dkyil 'khor snying po zlum po ste// phyogs bzhi kha dog bzhi
355a2(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan/ / kha dog lnga yi rdul chen nyid// srad bu lnga zhes bya bar brjod// gser dang yang na dngul nyid dang // mu tig dang ni byu ru dang // mu man yang dag bsres nas ni// rin chen lnga ni shin tu gzhug/
355a3(rgyud 'bum): lha yi grangs kyi bum pa nyid// rnam rgyal bum pa ches che ba// bum pa dkri ba nyid du ni// sgrub pa po ni dam pas bya// dang por sa ni yongs dag bya// gnyis par thig sogs gdab pa dang // lnga pa'i
355a4(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor bri ba dang / / de bzhin snga bar sbyin sreg nyid// 'jig rten skyong ba dbang po dang // lha mo khyod ni dpang du gyur// dkyil 'khor 'di ni bzhengs par bgyi// 'od srungs ma yis bgegs
355a5(rgyud 'bum): med mdzod/ / ji ltar bdag nyid nags de bzhin// rtag pa nyid du gtor ma sbyin// mtshan mo thun gcig gnas pa ni// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor mnyes par bya// gtor ma'i sngags ni/ oM sharga ti
355a6(rgyud 'bum): / ka sa ne nA k+Sha ro mu khaM sarba d+harmA dz+nyA A d+ya nut+pan+na tAta/ sa ni yongs su gzung dus su// bgegs ni skrod par byed pa'i sngags// oM a na sa ta na na Ta stiSh+Tha ya ma ba ru Na ku be ra ka swA tsas+pha Ni khu tiSh+Tha d+haM
355a7(rgyud 'bum): rak+ShaM ku ru ta me bi ra traM/ cho ga'i mtshan nyid dang nges pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// / ri gi A ra li'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po ka ya s+tha
355b1(rgyud 'bum): pa ga ya d+ha ra'i zhal snga nas dang / bod kyi lo tsa ba dge slong shAkya ye shes kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// rgya gar skad du/
355b2(rgyud 'bum): badz+ra A ra li ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ rdo rje A ra li zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/ kye'i rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
355b3(rgyud 'bum): gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i b+ha ga la bzhugs so/ / bcom ldan pa das kyis sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' du ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pas gsol ba
355b4(rgyud 'bum): btab par rig cing / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang mkhyen nas bde ba'i ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te/ phyag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// chu yis gdong ni bkrus nas ni// sman
355b5(rgyud 'bum): ni bza' bar byas nas su/ / bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// he ru ka ni rab bsgrub bya// rang gi snying khar re pha ni// sreg pa'i bskal pa ltar 'bar bsgom// de byung rdo rje nyi ma ni// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas
355b6(rgyud 'bum): yang dag khyab/ / de yi steng du hUM nyid de// bskal pa'i me ni lta bu nyid// de ni rdo rjer yang bsams nas// rdo rje las byung he ru ka/ bgegs ni chen po mnan nas ni// sku la thal bas byugs pa dang //
355b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya lnga dang yang dag ldan// 'jigs pa yang ni 'jigs par mdzad// in+d+ra nI la'i 'od lta bu// dbu skra ser po stobs po che// gar dgu'i ro dang ldan pa ni// rol pa'i gar gyis gar mdzad cing //
356a1(rgyud 'bum): ri rab ri rgyal lhun po yang // sa yi 'og tu yang dag mnan// phyag tu rdo rje bsnams bsgoms nas// g.yon pas skyes pa'i thod pa ni// bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan// shalnga
356a2(rgyud 'bum): yang dag ldan par bsgom/ / kun da dang ni zla ba dang // chu skyes do shal lta bur ni// kha T+wAM ga yis phrag pa brgyan// rdo rje A ra li las lha'i le'u ste dang po'o// / de nas phyag na rdo
356a3(rgyud 'bum): rje la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / dbang po la sogs pa rdo rje nam mkha' la gnas pa thams cad dang / glang po che'i rna ba la sogs pa zhing skyong ba thams cad dang / kun dar
356a4(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pa'i yi dgas thams cad dang / de dag la sogs pa sems can thams cad kyi chos nyan pa'i sbyor ba des/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje A ra li chen po la zhus pa/
356a5(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das gtor ma'i sngags ji ltar lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// bder gshegs kun gyi ston pa yis// gtor ma'i las ni rab tu phye// phyag rgya yang ni khyad par
356a6(rgyud 'bum): du/ 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa'o// rdo rje thal mo gyen phye nas// oM dz+wa la dz+wa la b+h+yo hUM phaT swA hA/ 'di nyid sngags ni chen po nyid// de bzhin du nI gtor ma'i sngags// las ni thams cad pa yi sngags
356a7(rgyud 'bum): yin pa nyid du the tsom med/ / rdo rje A ra li las gtor ma'i bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis ming yang dag par rab tu phye ba/ gdong ring sna ni mtho
356b1(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / de bzhin dpag bsam shing nyid dang // tshangs par spyod pa mang ba nyid// dam tshig 'dir ni dngos grub sbyin// glang po rta bong glang rnga mo// khyi las byung ba'i mar me dang // mar me chen po bsregs/
356b2(rgyud 'bum): nas ni// tshangs spyod 'dzin pa mchod par bya// de nas sdom pa bka' stsal pa// khyod kyis srog chags gsad par bya// brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya// khyod kyis ma byin par yang long // gzhan gyi
356b3(rgyud 'bum): bud med bsten par gyis/ / ma dang sring mo nyid dang yang // bu mo sring mo'i bu mo ni// thabs dang shes rab cho ga yis// rnal 'byor rig pas rtag tu mchod// de nas dbang bskur bka' stsal pa//
356b4(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya ldan pa'i slob dpon gyis// de la dbang bskur sbyin par bya// dbang bskur de yi phyi nas ni// de nyid 'di ni rab tu dbye// 'di nyid bde ba chen po ste// thams cad lus la rnam par gnas/
356b5(rgyud 'bum): 'di nyid ye shes chen po ste// mchog tu dga' ba'i rang bzhin can// de nas sbyin sreg bka' stsal pa// khru gang tsam pa'i tshad dang ni// khru phyed sa la brko bar bya// rdul chen dkar po ldan par ni//
356b6(rgyud 'bum): rnam par mkhas pas thab khung bya// gsungs pa'i sngags kyis nges par ni// dar ni sha sogs sbyin sreg bya// me ni lha yi spyan nyid de// 'dod pa'i don kun sgrub pa'o// de nas dkyil 'khor bka'
356b7(rgyud 'bum): stsal pa/ / gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis rnam par brgyan// ka ba brgyad dang yang dag ldan// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// dur khrod sol ba so phag dang // ldong ros phye/
357a1(rgyud 'bum): ma nyid dang yang // ljang ku yi yang bye ma nyid// dkyil 'khor la ni mkhas pas bsngags// dbus su gsum la rdo rje bri// shar gyi sgo ru mgo chen po// lho ru rdo rje dril bu/
357a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid// de bzhin nub tu dgra sta ste// byang du gri gug dge ba nyid// rdo rje dkyil 'khor du ni bri// chos don 'dod dang thar pa la// dkyil 'khor 'di ni rab tu dbye// dkyil 'khor bzhengs par byas nas ni/
357a3(rgyud 'bum): der ni slob ma gzhug par bya// ras kyis gdong ni bcings nas ni// bkrol nas dkyil 'khor bstan par bya// rdo rje A ra li las las thams cad pa'i le'u gsum pa'o//
357a4(rgyud 'bum): mngon par shes pa bka' stsal pa// lha yi mig dang rna ba dang // de bzhin gzhan sems shes pa nyid// sngon gyi gnas rjes dran pa dang // de bzhin rdzu 'phrul mngon shes nyid// he ru ka yi dbyis
357a5(rgyud 'bum): bsgoms nA/ / yo gi mngon shes lnga ru 'gyur// shin tu goms pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// he ru kar ni ngang gis 'gyur// bsam gtan las ni nus skyes nas// yid ni brtan nam g.yo ba'am ci// rang
357a6(rgyud 'bum): gi sems ni bskul ba'i phyir/ / glu ni sna tshogs len pa dang // de bzhin gar ni sna tshogs nyid// sna tshogs rim gro byed pa dang // lus la rgyan ni sna tshogs dang // de bzhin sna tshogs dga' ba yi//
357a7(rgyud 'bum): gzugs sgra nga bzhin dri dang ni// ro dang reg bya yang dag brtsam// de nas las rgyas bka' stsal pa// re'u mig brgyad ni bris nas ni// rgyud kyi sngags ni rgyas par bya// las kyis dbye ba'i rab dbye
357b1(rgyud 'bum): bas/ / de bzhin zhi rgyas la sogs kyis// oM ni dbang ldan la ni mer// de bzhin bden bral nyid du la// rlung gi mtshams su hUM nyid de// shar du dzA ni rnam par gnas// lho ru dzA yi rnam pa nyid// nub tu/
357b2(rgyud 'bum): b+h+yo yi rnam pa ste// byang du phaT kyi rnam pa yin// dbus su swA hA rnam par gnas// ngos gsum du ni bsgrub bya'i ming // rdo rje A ra li las le'u bzhi pa'o// / de nas 'khor lo
357b3(rgyud 'bum): bri ba bka' stsal pa/ che ge mo 'di sod cig/ che ge mo ba di dbang du mdzod cig/ che ge mo rengs par mdzod cig/ che ge mo rmongs par mdzod cig/ che ge mo ma lus par gyis shig/ che ge mo lkugs par
357b4(rgyud 'bum): mdzod cig/ che ge mo khug cig/ che ge mo skrod cig/ che ge mo la sdang bar mdzod cig/ che ge mo chings shig/ che ge mo ma ning du mdzod cig/ che ge mo sgur por mdzod cig/ ces sngags kyi rkang pa
357b5(rgyud 'bum): 'di rnams kyi ngos gnyis su bris te/ gro ga'i 'dab mar gur kum gyis bri bar bya zhing 'di dpung pa'i rtsa bar gdags par bya'o// dgug pa la ni zla mtshan zags pa'i ras la rgya skyegs kyi khu
357b6(rgyud 'bum): bas bri bar bya'o/ / gsad pa la sogs pa'i las la dur khrod kyi sol ba dang / tsi tra ka yi khu ba dang / yungs mar dang / dug dang / ske tshe dang / lan tshwa dang / tsha ba gsum dang / ka na ka yi khu ba dang /
357b7(rgyud 'bum): rus pa'i sbu gus so// dgug pa la ni skyu ru ra'i tsher mas so// rmongs pa la ni d+hu d+hu ra ka'i shing gis so// rengs pa la ni pa Ta'i sbu gus so// ma lus pa la ni bo de tse'i shing gi sbu gus bri bar
358a1(rgyud 'bum): bya'o/ / de nas rdo rje mchod pa bka' stsal pa/ bas mtha' dang ni dben pa dang // bdag gi khyim gyi nang du yang // lo ni bcu gsum de bzhin du// lo ni bcu drug bu mo dang // nyi shu/
358a2(rgyud 'bum): rtsa lnga ma mchod bya// ba dang de bzhin ma he dang // spre'u mo dang khyi mo dang // bong mo de bzhin rnga mo dang // sha ba dang ni ra ma nyid// phag dang ba men las byung ba// gzhan yang he ru ka mchod pa// 'grub pa nyid
358a3(rgyud 'bum): du the tshom med/ / nya dang zla ba 'pho ba yi// tshes ni mu stegs can gyis brtag/ dri ma gzhig par bya ba'i phyir// rnal 'byor pas ni myang bar bya// srog chags rnams ni gsang mi bya// brdzur gyi tshig ni smra
358a4(rgyud 'bum): mi bya/ / ma byin par ni blang mi bya// pha rol bud med bstan mi bya// nyin par nyal zhing mtshan mo lang // shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas 'dug/ sha chen dang ni rus pa dang // khrag ni chen po btung ba dang //
358a5(rgyud 'bum): khu chen yang dag bza' ba dang // de bzhin rnam snang chen po nyid// bram ze ma dang g.yung mo nyid// gar ma de bzhin btso blag ma// thod can ma dang ko lpags mkhan// gdol pa de bzhin phyag bdar ma//
358a6(rgyud 'bum): rtswa 'tshong ma dang shan ma nyid// de bzhin kla kli la sogs dang // smig mkhan dang ni chang 'tsheng ma// gzhan yang zla mtshan 'dzag pa nyid// ma dang sring mo bu mo dang // sring mo las byung bu mo nyid//
358a7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan gyi bu mo spang mi bya// rje'u rigs mngon dga' mi bya ste// bgrod bya'i bu mo rtag spangs nas// bgrod min mkhas pas bsten par bya// rdo rje A ra li las le'u lnga pa'o//
358b1(rgyud 'bum): / de nas dam tshig gi bag dbab pa bka' stsal pa/ nyan thos skal ba ngan pa la// bag ni dbab par mi bya zhing // de bzhin gcer bu thod dum dang // ral pa can ni thams cad la// dam tshig bag ni dbab
358b2(rgyud 'bum): mi bya/ / snying rje yi ni bdag nyid can// gal te yin na bzab par bya// grub kyang lta ba dman pa ni// sems can don byed skyes pa nyid// skal ba ngan pa zhes byar brjod// bram ze dam tshig rnam par sdang // de
358b3(rgyud 'bum): nas slob ma'i dam tshig bka' stsal pa/ dul byed blo dang ldan pa dang // bzod ldan dal ba mi slu ba// bla mar gus shing snying rje ldan// rgyud ni 'dir ni rab tu bsngags// de nas slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid
358b4(rgyud 'bum): bka' stsal pa/ sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba shes// snying rje ldan zhing bstan bcos mkhas// de nyid bcu ni yongs su shes// dkyil 'khor bri ba'i las la mkhas// de nas thun tshod bzhi byin gyis brlab
358b5(rgyud 'bum): pa bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar bsgom pa'i sbyor ba des// dang po thun tshod byin gyis brlab// des ni ji srid nyi phyed na// nyi ma phyed na thun gsum pa// dus dang bral nas nam phyed na// thun tshod byin brlabs
358b6(rgyud 'bum): rab tu grags/ / thun tshed byin brlabs rnal 'byor gyis// bdag gi rnal 'byor ldan pas 'grub// de nas bdag nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // phrag dog
358b7(rgyud 'bum): dang ni ser sna nyid/ / bcom ldan he ru ka la med// yod na rnam par dag pa nyid// de nas dam tshig bsgrub pa bka' stsal pa// bgegs dang btsugs pa'i shing la 'am// ljon shing btags shing 'phyang
359a1(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / g.yul du mtshon gyis bsnun pa nyid// bdag nyid rnal 'byor ldan pas bsgrub// de nas nang du mdzad pa bka' stsal pa/ btung ba rin po che yi chu// gang zhig bza' de don yod
359a2(rgyud 'bum): nyid/ / khrus ni dpag med rdo rje yis// dril sogs rim pa rnam snang mdzad// dam tshig chos kyi de bzhin spyad// btso ni gang zag mnyam pas ni// dam tshig ro ni 'di yis ni// gang zhig glu yi rang bzhin nyid//
359a3(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro thams cad btsun mo ste// bu ni 'jam dpal la sogs pa// khro bo yi ni bsnyen bkur ba// bdag nyid he ru ka ru 'gyur// brjod pa bzlas pa yang dag bshad// yan lag nyid sogs phyag rgya ste// lha
359a4(rgyud 'bum): yi rnal 'byor dmigs nas ni/ / gang zhig thams cad du ni gnas// mang du brjod pas ci zhig bya// gang zhig 'jig rten bya gnas pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas thob phyir// rnam par bzlog pas bya ba nyid// /
359a5(rgyud 'bum): ridags shor sogs bya ba ni// 'jig rten du ni mi shes pas// mchog tu rab tu bsngags 'gyur ba// rnam dag dag pa dam pa ni// de nyid thob pas rab tu spyod// de nas sdom pa bka' stsal pa// rdo rje dril bu
359a6(rgyud 'bum): gzung bya zhing / / bdud rtsi mkhas pas bza' bar bya// rang gi phyag rgya rtag bstan cing // spyod pa 'da' ba nyid mi bya// de nas lha'i mchod pa bka' stsal po/ chu klung tshal gyi gnas su ni// bdag nyid lha ni
359a7(rgyud 'bum): mchod par bya/ / bdag gi sngags ni brjod par bya// me tog la sogs byin gyis brlab// rdo rje A ra li las le'u drug pa'o// / de nas bsod snyoms kyi lhung bzed bka' stsal
359b1(rgyud 'bum): par mkhas pas phrub chag par ni/ / rigs pa ni ru ni slong mos rgyu// chu bo'i 'gram du bza' bya zhing // gtsang sbra nyid ni rab tu dbye// byi la'i rkang pa tsam gyis ni// kham ni blo dang ldan pas blung // phye
359b2(rgyud 'bum): btab bza' bar mi bya zhing / / mi ster ba la rtag tu blang // g.yas su rab myos skye bo ni// g.yon nas bskor ba ru ni bya// nges pa med par khyim du gnas// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// rdo rje shing gi
359b3(rgyud 'bum): stongs byas dang / / de bzhin dril bu shing gi bdag/ he ru ka ni rab grub phyir// bzung nas rtag tu rgyu bar bya// de nas rdo rje gnod sbyin ma'i sgrub pa bka' stsal pa/ ser skya'i phru ma blang nas ni// sngags ni 'dis
359b4(rgyud 'bum): ni bzla bar bya/ / bsrung bar byas shing bskams byas nas// de la gu gul bsre bar bya// mkhas pas gnod sbyin mo sngon du// des ni bdug pa sbyin par bya// shin tu mdzes shing gos mdzes pa// bris skur
359b5(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa legs grub phyir/ / 'di nyid kyi ni cho ga yis// gnod sbyin mo ni dgug par bya// bris sku nyid ni gnod sbyin mo// snga bar byin nas 'gro bar 'gyur// de yi rgyan rnams thams cad ni// gang zhig cung
359b6(rgyud 'bum): zad rgyan rnams kun/ / snga ba ru ni blang bar bya// gal te 'dod na mtshan mo la// me tog gis ni mchod par bya// de nas rdo rje ro langs kyi sgrub pa bka' stsal pa/ ma chad rma med gang ba ni// legs par brtul
359b7(rgyud 'bum): zhugs can gyis bkru/ / mar khu chen pos byugs pa dang // bdug pa chen pos bdug par bya// dkyil 'khor chen po'i shar phyogs su// mar khu chen po'i mar me dbul// nga yis khyod la ci gsungs
360a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i/ / de la dkyil 'khor bzhengs par bya// yungs kar rol brdag bya zhing // sgra ni ri bor yang dag brjod// de la mkhas pas 'jigs mi bya// oM dz+wa la dz+wa la b+h+yo hUM brjod par bya'o//
360a2(rgyud 'bum): des ni ci zhig sbyin zhes smra// sgrub pos de la blang bar bya// rkang byug dang ni mig sman nyid// ral gri dang ni sa 'og dang // ril bu mkha' la spyod pa nyid// thams cad sbyin par the tshom medo// de nas tshogs kyi
360a3(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor bka' stsal pa/ gong gi bsam gtan byas nas ni// de la sngags ni bzla bar bya// rang gi he ru ka yi ni// rnal 'byor gyi nr-i bdag nyid du// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub par 'gyur//
360a4(rgyud 'bum): gtsang zhing dben pa'i sa phyogs dang // zhi zhing dag pa'i gnas su ni// rnal 'byor pa yis bza' bar bya// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid du// dpal ldan he ru ka yi ni// A ra li zhes bya ba'i mtshan//
360a5(rgyud 'bum): za ba na ni gtam smra bya// ri yi rgyal po'i mgor gnas par// tshogs kyis dag pa'i sems kyis bskor// de yang tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir// 'grub 'gyur gang phyir 'di nyid du// mchod pas/
360a6(rgyud 'bum): grub par shes mi 'gyur// de yi btsun mo srung ba ni// gshin rje mthar byed du ni 'gyur// shes rab mthar byed dpung gi mgon// pad+ma mthar byed sku bsrungs bdag/ de yi bgags kyi mthar byed ni// dmag
360a7(rgyud 'bum): dpon du ni brjod pa yin/ / 'dod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba// de yi gshed ma'i bdag po nyid// dpal ldan dbyig pa sngon po ni// sgo srungs pa yi bdag po nyid// thams cad la ni dbang byed pa// zhar ba mi g.yo/
360b1(rgyud 'bum): mgon po nyid// yi ge ba yi bdag po ni// de bzhin du ni stobs po che// rdo rje A ra li las le'u bdun pa'o// / de nas byang chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa thams
360b2(rgyud 'bum): cad gtam 'di thos nas srid pa'i sbyor ba kun tu bcad cing rnam par dag par gyur pa dang / sdig pa zad cing nyon mongs pa bsregs par gyur to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis tshig 'di skad

360b6(rgyud 'bum): pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/ / kha cig bye brag smra ba'i lam// kha cig tu na mdo sde pa// kha cig tu ni rnam shes nyid// kha cig tu ni dbu ma nyid// la lar dmyal ba chen por 'gro// la lar sems can rjes su skyong //
360b7(rgyud 'bum): sems can 'dul ba la bltas nas// snying rje'i bsam pas rol par bya// rdo rje A ra li las le'u brgyad pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / gang yang byang
361a1(rgyud 'bum): chub sems dpa' de dag gis las rnam par 'byed pa bstan par bya'o/ / gang zhig rgyud gang du dam tshig byed pa des ni 'jig rten gsum po kun gyis bstod par 'gyur ro// gang zhig/

361a3(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig gar gyis mchod byed pa// de ni rig 'dzin chen por 'gyur// gang zhig phyag 'tshal byed pa ni// de la skye bo phyag 'tshal 'gyur// gang zhig dri zhim 'bul ba ni// lus ni dri zhim ldan par

362a1(rgyud 'bum): btsugs te/ lag pa thal mo sbyar nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gsang ba sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid rnams// ye shes dbang la nyan par 'tshal// sa dang nam mkha'

362a4(rgyud 'bum): tshig stong dang / / drug brgya ru ni brtsi bar bya// chu tshod drug cu'i dbugs rnams kyis// nyin mtshan du ni grags pa yin// 'byung dang 'jug pa'i dbugs rnams ni// 'byung ba'i grangs kyis brtsi bar bya// blo dang
362a5(rgyud 'bum): ldan pas dbugs gnyis ni/ / 'jug pa 'byung la thim par bya// de bzhin sa ni bcu gnyis la// phyi rol mtshan ma gzhag bya ste// tshes grangs mtshan ma ji bzhin du// re mig bcu gnyis rnams su gzhag/
362a6(rgyud 'bum): go rims bcu gnyis rab brtson pas// shar nas dpyid zla 'bring sogs gzhag/ ro hi ta dang mo hi ta// de bzhin b+ha dra bri kha b+ha// kur ma ma ka ra d+ha dang // mi gir de bzhin bid tri ka/ b+hu ku swa ba na ka ma

362b1(rgyud 'bum): / pu can// rtag tu mtha' 'khob gtso bo ste// 'khrig pa la ni rtag tu dga'// thams cad du ni snyar par smra// ro hi ta la lnga mchod cing // de bzhin tshe lo bdun cu thub// ro hi ta la nor btang na// mdza' bo
362b2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad ldog par 'gyur/ / lo hi ta la lus smras na// dpal dang kun tu phrad par 'gyur// ro hi ta la gnas rten na// grogs dang nor gyis rgyas par 'gyur// ro hi ta la 'gron zhugs na// bsam pa
362b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad mngon par 'grub/ / bag ma blangs dang me yi las// zhi ba'i las ni sbyar bar// mo hi ta yi don sbyor ba// bgrang ba nyid kyis shes par bya// mo ha~M ta la btsas pa'i bu// tshe ni drug cu rtsa lngar
362b4(rgyud 'bum): grags/ / mang du za zhing sems chung la// 'khrig pa la ni rtag tu dga'// rtag tu gdug cing ca cor ldan// mi snyan pa dag smra la dga'// khro la nga rgyal snying stobs med// sdig pa byed cing ngang tshul
362b5(rgyud 'bum): ngan/ / 'khyal ba dang ni tshig rtsub smra// mtshon gyis nges par 'chi bar 'gyur// yang na tshe lo brgyad cu ri// rtsa bzhi dag tu rab tu grags// rung ba'i sa ni spong byed cing // mi rung ba la brtson par 'gyur//
362b6(rgyud 'bum): lus kyi yan lag smras na ni// 'chi bdag dang ni phrad par 'gyur// gal ta cung zad nor gdong na// btang ba la ni mi ldog go/ b+ha dra la ni skyes pa'i bu// kha zas bzang po za ba dang // bzang po'i las
362b7(rgyud 'bum): ni byed 'gyur zhing / / lo brgya ru ni 'tshe bar 'gyur// dbul la chos ni spyod pa dang // bden par smra zhing snyan par brjod// chung ma gcig gis tshim pa'i lus// bzang por smra ba'i gtso bor 'gyur/
363a1(rgyud 'bum): bzo rnams kun dang dus tshod rig/ rtag tu rang gi gnyen dang mdza'// chad pa gcod pa'i rigs can te// de bzhin lus ni chu rung chi// bri Sha b+ha la skyes pa'i bu// brtson 'grus ldan zhing
