363a2(rgyud 'bum): dgra la dpa'/ / sgeg dang nor gyis phyug pa ste// chung ma mang du len par 'gyur// rtag tu gnyen ni mang ba ste// pa yi srog ni 'joms par byed// so nam tshong gis 'tsho byed cing // tshe ni drug cur 'tsho bar
363a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / snyoms las mu cor smra ba dang // gdug cing las dang ngang tshul ngan// mtshon gyis 'chi bar 'gyur ba 'am// yang na srog chags gdug pas so// kur ma la ni btsas pa'i bu// rtag tu
363a4(rgyud 'bum): sems khral can du gnas/ / chung gis khro zhing chung gis mgu// mang du smra zhing gnyen la byams// drag tu smra zhing lhag par khro// phyug cing thams cad gtong la dga'// bu dang chung ma 'chi bar 'gyur//
363a5(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu rang gi yul na gtso// zhing gi las la sogs pas 'tsho// mdze yi nad kyis 'dzin par 'gyur// tshe lo brgyad cu lon pa na// de bzhin rang gi yul du 'ani// ma ka ra la btsas pa'i bu// tshon dgu
363a6(rgyud 'bum): bcu rtsa drug ste/ / tshul khrims phun tshogs bsod nams ldan// 'dul ba dang ni spyod pa srung // nor ldan gzugs bzang phun sum tshogs// skal ba bzang zhing grags pas mdzes// bzo dang sgyu rtsal
363a7(rgyud 'bum): kun la mkhas/ / chung ma gcig ni shin tu gsal// rtag tu sems ni ldod pa ste// dul ba dang ni srung ba ste// gnyen gyi nang na gcig pu gtso// kun la snyan sogs smra ba dang // de bzhin g.yul ngor/
363b1(rgyud 'bum): 'chi bar 'gyur// tshe lo brgyad cu rtsa lnga dang // yang na drug cu'am sum cu'o// ra d+ha la ni btsas pa'i bu// rtag tu sdig pa'i blo can te// sems can rnams la 'khyal par smra// rtag tu dbul zhing
363b2(rgyud 'bum): kha gsag smra/ / dus kun tu ni nad pu can// rgyal pos chad pa gcod pa'i bdag/ 'khrig pa la ni rtag tu dga'// gzhan dag la ni yid mi rton// zol dang bzo sogs kun rog pa// bud med rnams
363b3(rgyud 'bum): la skal ba bzang / / tshe lo lnga bcu rtsa lnga 'am// yang na drug cu'am sum cur nges// mi ki ra la btsas pa'i bu// chos shes rang gi rigs kyang mtho// lugs kyi bstan bcos phun sum tshogs// bzo dang
363b4(rgyud 'bum): / rigs pa sna tshogs ldan// tshig rtsub smra la drag pa ste// shin tu khro zhing 'jigs su rung // nor nyung gzugs ni bzang ba ste// bya ba thams cad myur bar grub// de yi lus ni rang nyid kyis// chu ru mchongs te 'chi
363b5(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / tshe lo brgyad cu rtsa brgyad na// yang na rgyal po'i khrims kyis gsod// b+he tri ka la btsas pa'i bu// skyes ma thag tu ma ni 'chi// pa yang lo ni brgyad na 'chi// de bzhin rang gi khyim na gtso//
363b6(rgyud 'bum): khro la rdzas ni nyung bar 'gyur// sdig pa la sogs blun dang ldan// las dang sems khral chung ba ste// dpung rnams kyi ni gtso bo nyid// tshe lo brgya dang rtsa brgyad na// rang gi khyim du 'chi bar 'gyur//
363b7(rgyud 'bum): gnyen rnams kun dang mdza' ba ste// sdug 'phongs rnams la brtse bar ldan// byA ku la ni btsas pa'i bu// blo chung ngan par smra ba dang // shes rab zhan cing nang pu can// rtag tu grogs po
364a1(rgyud 'bum): ngan dang 'grogs/ / rang gi gnyen byams skal ba bzang // sdug 'phongs rnams la rjes su brtse// nor dang ba glang shin tu phyug/ khyim dang chung ma gsum la sogs/
364a2(rgyud 'bum): skad cig khro zhing nga rgyal ldan// dgra yis gzir bas 'jigs par 'gyur// pha dang ma ni tshe yang ring // de bzhin tshe lo bdun cu thub// tshong gi las kyis 'tsho bar byed// lan cig tshong gi rgyu
364a3(rgyud 'bum): yis 'chi/ / sbyor ba brtsams pa'i mtshan ma la// ye shes can gyis bgrang bar bya// srab na la ni btsas pa'i bu// dpa' rtul pha rol gnon pa yis// dgra rnams thams cad sreg par byed//
364a4(rgyud 'bum): mgon med rnams kyi rtsa lag ste// dus rnams kun tu dbul ba dang // sdig pa'i las la nan tan byed// bdag nyid seng ger sems pa dang // tshig rtsub smra la thams cad rig/ dus kun tu ni
364a5(rgyud 'bum): nad med cing / / rtag tu longs spyod rnyed par 'gyur// gzhan la rten pas 'tsho ba dang // bud med kun la gnod cing spyod// tshe lo lnga bcu tham pa ru// de ni nges par 'tsho bar 'gyur// dgra yis
364a6(rgyud 'bum): mtshon gyis brgyab nas su/ / 'chi bar 'gyur bar gdon mi za// kA ma sA la btsas pa'i bu// tsho ni drug cu rtsa brgyad 'tshe// nor dang 'bru dang grong dang ni// phyugs dang rta sogs bzhon par ldan//
364a7(rgyud 'bum): bden par smra zhing chos kyang shes// sems can kun la phan par byed// rig pa dang ni snyan par sla// bstan bcos thams cad shin tu rgyas// sems can kun la skal ba bzang // rang gi yul du 'chi
364b1(rgyud 'bum): bar 'gyur/ / sbyor ba'i mtshan ma bstan pa rnams// ngas bstan pa la the tshom med// ro hi ta ni lha la mchod// mo hi ta la nor la brkam// b+hu dra kha zas bzang po za// bri kha ba la mang du khro/
364b2(rgyud 'bum): kur ma la ni gzhan du sems// ma ka ra la 'brel bar smra// rar d+ha la ni sdig sems can// mi ka ra ni 'khrig la brjen// b+hid ta ka ni gnyid log cing // b+hu ku li ni bla brdol lo// swab na la ni rang
364b3(rgyud 'bum): / nyid sems// ka ma glu dang klog 'don byed// ro hi ta la zhi ba'i las// de bzhin bri Sha rgyas pa ste// ma ka ra ni dbang dang 'byor// b+hu dra la ni mngon spyod bya// mo hi ta yis bskrad pa ste// kur
364b4(rgyud 'bum): ma la ni bcing ba'i las/ / ran d+has dbye bar shes par bya// bya ku la ni sman sbyar bya// re yi khyu mchog grub pa ste// bdud rtsi sbyor bas skye mi 'gyur// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs na gnas//
364b5(rgyud 'bum): snga dro mkhas par brtsi bar bya// ro hi te la nor byin na// rdzu 'phrul dag ni rgyas par 'gyur// mo hi ta la nor bsdus na// gzhan gyis dgag par mi nus so// b+ha dra la ni khyim brtsams na/
364b6(rgyud 'bum): dpal dang yang dag phrad par 'gyur// bri Sha lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// sngags ni kun tu 'grub par 'gyur// kur ma'i sbyor bas bag ma blang // thams cad du ni 'bral mi 'gyur// ma ka ra
364b7(rgyud 'bum): la zhing btab na/ / gdon mi za bar 'bru rnams 'phel// ran d+ha bud med bgrod byas na// shi bar gyur kyang mi gtong ngo // mi ki ra la tshong byas na// gtams pa da lta len par snang // rtag
365a1(rgyud 'bum): tu brtan par gzhag bya ba'i/ / las tshogs b+hi ti ka la gzung // b+hU ku li la 'gron zhugs na// 'tshe ba med par gnas su phyin// srab nas thams cad kun tu ni// nges par
365a2(rgyud 'bum): / rtag tu mngon par 'od// ka ma la ni nor btang na// btang ba slar la ldog mi 'gyur// ro hi ta la nor rgyas bu// mo hi ta ni 'dzeg po yin// stobs kyis rgyu ba b+ha dra'i gnas// de bzhin pad+ma bri Sha b+ha/
365a3(rgyud 'bum): kur ma pad+ma chen po ste// ma ka ra ni dung skyong ngo // ran d+ha dung skyong chen po ste// mi ki ra ni rigs ldan no// b+hi tri mgo brgya pa yin te// b+hA ku la ni 'khril ltung yin// swab na 'jigs pa zhes
365a4(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ / ka ma dus kyi 'chi bar 'dod// 'di dag dug sbyor rim pa bzhin// bye brag tu ni shes par bya// rA yi khyu mchog grub pa ste// bdud rtsi sbyor bas skye mi 'gyur// gang gis 'chi bas mngon
365a5(rgyud 'bum): zin na/ / 'chi bdag dang ni phrad 'gyur ba'o// dug bsdu ba yi sbyor ba dag/ gzhan la dug ni sbyar bar bya// dus kyi mtshan ma ji bzhin du// go rims rim pa bzhin du bya// dpyid zla 'bring sogs
365a6(rgyud 'bum): rim bzhin du/ / nyi ma byang du 'gro ba'i tshe// ji lta'i dus bzhin mtshan ma ni// rim gyis rim gyis sbyar bar bya// nyin mo'i chu tshod so sor ni// mkhas pas bcu gnyis bzhi bsgyur bya// mtshan mo drug dang
365a7(rgyud 'bum): bcu gsum bsgyur/ / chu tshed mkhas pas brtsam par bya// reg mig dag ni gnyis pa la// dus la mkhas pas dus chod pa// nyin mo drug dang bcu gnyis bsgyur// chu tshod kyi ni mtshan mar bya//
365b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhi dang bcu gsum bsgyur ba ni// mtshan mo chu tshod du ni brtag/ bdag dang bcu gnyis bsgyur ba dag/ nyin mo ru ni brtag par bya// gnyis dang bcu ni gsum bsgyur ba// mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni brtag/
365b2(rgyud 'bum): chu tshod sum cu tham pa ni// dbus kyi bi shu gnyis par sbyar// gnyis mtha' bcu ni gsum po dag/ nyin mo chu tshed shes pa ste// brgyad dang bcu ni gnyis po dag/ de yi mtshan mo'i mtshan mar bya// bzhi
365b3(rgyud 'bum): dang bcu gsum mtshan ma ni/ / nyin mo yi ni chu tshod de// drug dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba// mtshan mo'i chu tshod mtshan ma bya// drug dang bcu ni gsum bsgyur ba// nyin mo yi ni shes bya ste// bzhi dang bcu ni
365b4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis bsgyur ba/ / mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni grags// byang du bgrod pa bshad nas ni// de bzhin gzhan gyi dus shes bya// bzhi dang gsum bsgyur chu tshod ni// nyin mo yir ni bshad pa yin// drug dang
365b5(rgyud 'bum): bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba/ / mtshan mo yaM ni mtshon par bya// gnyis dang bcu ni gsum bsgyur ba// de bzhin nyin mo'i chu tshod yin// brgyad dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba// chu tshod mtshan gyi rab tu grags//
365b6(rgyud 'bum): bcu ni gsum gyis bsgyur ba dag/ bi shu nyin mo'i chu tshad de// de bzhin mtshan gyi chu tshod kyang // bcu ni gsum du bsgyur bar bya// de bzhin bi shu bar ma gnyis// brgyad dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur
365b7(rgyud 'bum): ba/ nyin mo yi ni bsam par bya// gnyis dang bcu ni gsum bsgyur ba// mtshan mo'i chu tshod du ni brtag/ drug dang bcu ni gnyis bsgyur ba// nyin mo'i chu tshod rim pa yin// bzhi dang bcu ni
366a1(rgyud 'bum): gsum bsgyur ba/ / de bzhin mtshan mo'i chu tshod do// sum brgya lnga bcu rtsa gnyis kyis// chu tshod kyis ni dus rnams 'da'// chu tshod drug cu'i grangs kyis ni// nyin mtshan phrugs
366a2(rgyud 'bum): gcig tu ni sbyar/ / zla ba'i go rims ji bzhin du// rim pa de bzhin mtshan ma bya// chu tshod dbugs sogs rdzogs pa dang // bi shu ma gtogs rim spel bri// lus dang las min bye brag bzhin//
366a3(rgyud 'bum): dbugs kyi rim gyis gzung bar bya// kha dang ra sogs dus tshigs dang // bgrod pa gnyis kyis mtshon par bya// gnyis po dag ni bcus bsgyur ba// de bzhin lo yi chu tshod do// de yi mtshan
366a4(rgyud 'bum): ma ldan pa yis/ / nyin mtshan gyi ni dbugs su brtsi// ngag gi dbang phyug kun bzung nas// dbyangs kyi mtshan mar mngon par gzhag/ ma ning gnyis ni spangs nas su// su yi dbang phyug
366a5(rgyud 'bum): kun tu gzhag/ a yi rim pa la bab na// dpal dang mngon par mnyam 'grogs shing // nor rnyed pa ni snang ba ste// skal ba bzang por gdon mi za// A yi re mig la bab na// rims dang nad
366a6(rgyud 'bum): kyis gzir ba dang / / 'jigs shing skrag par snang bar 'gyur// A zhes bya bar nges par ston// yi ge i la bab gyur na// rgyal po'i dpal ni ster 'gyur te// kun nas nor ni rnyed pa dang // gang zhig
366a7(rgyud 'bum): bsams pa nges 'grub 'gyur/ / yi ge I la bab gyur na// zla ba drug na 'chi ba dang // de bzhin dgras ni gzir ba dang // me yis 'jigs pa shes par bya// yi ge u la bab gyur na// dpal
366b1(rgyud 'bum): dang grogs mo rnyed pa dang / / nor dang 'bru ni 'phel bar 'gyur// dpal rnams kyang ni rnyed par 'gyur// A la gal te bab gyur na// de ni dgra yis 'tshe bar 'gyur// bran za dang ni gnyen mtshan
366b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / 'jigs shing skrag par snang bar 'gyur// yi ge a la bab gyur na// 'phral du skye bo skal can 'gyur// skyes pa bud med dag gi ni// mchod pa'i gnas ni thob par 'gyur// e yi mtshan/
366b3(rgyud 'bum): ma la lhung na// dgra dang rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang // lus can rkun pos gzir 'gyur zhing // nad dang rims kyis thebs par 'gyur// oM yi mtshan ma la bab na// gnas kyi dbang por 'gyur ba
366b4(rgyud 'bum): dang / / nor dang 'bru ni rnyed 'gyur zhing // yid 'ong rig pa de bzhin no// oM yi mtshan ma la bab na// 'thab mo dang ni dgras 'tsho zhing // gnas las nyams dang brdeg 'tshog dang // byas pa chung
366b5(rgyud 'bum): ni zos par 'gyur/ / yi ge aM la bab gyur na// bran za dag ni rnyed 'gyur zhing // bu dang rig pa rnyed 'gyur te// de bzhin grogs po rnyed par 'gyur// ji ltar sngon gyi a zhes pa// de bzhin tha ma'ang
366b6(rgyud 'bum): gzung bar bya/ / drug 'gyur du ni bzhag nas su// lnga pa de ni sum 'gyur bya// sum brgya drug cu bsres nas ni// sa bzhin du ni bcad nas su// yi ge lhag ma zung byas te// yang na ri mo kyag
366b7(rgyud 'bum): kyog bri/ / dbyangs kyi dang po la sogs bgrang // yang na me tog gtor nas ni// de bzhin sa ni mtshon par bya// snga dro ro hi te dus su// bden pa thams cad blta bar bya// rnal 'byor bstan
367a1(rgyud 'bum): bcos rab tu bsngags/ / bdag gi gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba ste dang po'o// / ye shes de ni bye brag dag/ bcom ldan 'das la nyan par/
367a2(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal// lus kyi mtshan ma ji lta bu// de nyid gang la bsten par bgyi// lus kyi mtshan ma ston pa rnams// nyon cig rdo rje rgyal po che// lus kyi mtshan ma mngon bstan gyis// gang zhig shes pa
367a3(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyis ni/ / 'chi ba'i dus la bab par gnas// dbugs ni rnam par rgod tsam gyis// lus can zla ba drug gis 'chi// 'jigs pa cung zad mthong min par// 'gram pa'i mtshams ni bye gyur/
367a4(rgyud 'bum): na// de tshe dus la bab par 'gyur// dbugs ni chad cing chang 'gyur ba// snga dro ro hi ta dus su// mtshan ma dag ni brtag par bya// sna yi bar ni chad gyur na// nyi ma bdun na gdon mi za// mig
367a5(rgyud 'bum): gi chu ni chad gyur na/ / de bzhin nyi ma lnga yis 'chi// 'gram pa'i logs kyi mtshan ma yis// zhag gcig las ni mi 'tsho'o// rna ba'i chos zangs ltebs pa yis// chu tshod ldan gdon mi za//
367a6(rgyud 'bum): 'dir ni lce yi thig 'di yi// lus can zhag gnyis 'chi bar 'gyur// stang 'og so ni 'thams pa na// zhag gsum 'chi bdag phrad par 'gyur// mgrin pa'i logs kyi phyi rol rtsas// zla ba
367a7(rgyud 'bum): phyed na gdor ma za/ / brang gi dra ba zhom gyur na// zla phyed sman pas gsor mi rung // sen mo khrag ni med pa yis// lus can nyi ma brgyad na 'chi// 'chi ba'i mtshan ma brgyad bcas pa// 'chi
367b1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dus bab mtshon par bya/ / sna yi bar sha chad pa la// ye shes sa bon gyis gzir bya// mig gi chu ni chad pa na// rdo rje ma yi sa bon gzung // mkhur chos logs kyi mtshan ma la// drag mo'i
367b2(rgyud 'bum): sa bon gzir bar bya/ / rna ba'i chol bzangs zhum pa la// ro langs ma yi sa bon dgod// lce yi thig nag 'di la ni// gtum mo'i sa bon bsam par bya// so dang so ni 'thams pa la// seng ge
367b3(rgyud 'bum): ma yi sa bon brdeg/ mgrin pa'i logs kyi phyi rol rtsa// stag mo'i sa bon brdeg par bya// brang gi dra ba zhom pa la// ce spung sa bon gzung bar bya// lag pa'i sen khrag med pa la/
367b4(rgyud 'bum): 'ug pa ma yis sa bon gzung // 'chi ltas yan lag mtshan ma ni// sa bon de dag dgod pas srung // phyi na ye shes 'khor lo ni// bri ba'i cho gas rnam shes srung // ma bsregs kham phor
367b5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis bzung la/ / gur kum ro tsa na yis ni// 'og gi char ni re mig dgu// de bzhin steng la bcu gnyis bya// dbus su ming ni bris nas su// sa bon gyis ni mngon par bskor// phyag
367b6(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal g.yas kyi dang po ste/ / bsrung ba'i tshig gi sngon du bya// sangs rgyas lnga sogs ldan pa yi// sa bon mtha' ru gnas pa ste// sreg byed yi ge de yi mtha'// steng sogs mu khyud dbyangs yig
367b7(rgyud 'bum): dgod/ / kha pa gnyis 'gyur sa bon dang // lha mo rdo rje ma zhes bya// sangs rgyas lnga yi sa bon ldan// thams cad phyag 'tshal sreg byed mtha'// dbyug pa 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon// gya gyu phyag na rdo rje
368a1(rgyud 'bum): yin/ / de bzhin lus ni 'jam pa'i mchog/ mgo nang dpung pa byams pa ste// steng du 'bar ba ma yi ste// 'khor ba thams cad sgrol byed pa'o// de la shar gyi phyogs gnas pa//
368a2(rgyud 'bum): lha mo rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// byang du drag po zhes bya ba'i// sa bon nyid ni sbyar bar bya// nub kyi phyogs su gnas pa ni// ro langs ma yi sa bon sbyar// lho yi phyogs su gang gnas pa// gtum
368a3(rgyud 'bum): mo'i sa bon rdzogs par bstan/ / sa bon mngon du bstan pa bzhin// dbang ldan du ni seng ge ma// me mtshams stag mo dgod bya ste// bden bral du ni ce spyang ma// rlung du hUM byed 'ug pa mo//
368a4(rgyud 'bum): mtshams na gnas pa'i sa bon ni// bzhi pa'i drag po'i dngos su ni// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams ji bzhin du// de bzhin sa bon dgod par bya// steng gi gnas ni bcu gnyis la// dbyangs
368a5(rgyud 'bum): kyi sa bon gzhag par bya/ / phyag 'tshal sreg pa mtha' dang bcas// phyogs su ma ning gzhag par bya// 'bar ma 'jib ma zhes bya dang // de bzhin 'phrog byed mkha' 'gro ma// phyag 'tshal sreg pa
368a6(rgyud 'bum): mthar gnas pa/ / ji lta'i gnas bzhin gzhag par bya// shar phyogs mkha' 'gro ma yi gnas// byang du gnas pa 'bar ma ste// nub tu 'jib mar yang dag gsungs// lho ru 'phrog byed dgod par bya//
368a7(rgyud 'bum): dbus su ming ni bri bya ste// 'og tu ji bzhin steng de bzhin// gnyis ka kha ni sbyar nas su// skud pa dmar pos dkri bar bya// kun nas mnyam pa'i gnas su ni// tsan dan dmar pos byugs nas su//
368b1(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs me tog bdug pa dang // drir bcas nyer spyod gtor ma sbyin// dbus su 'khrul 'khor bzhag nas ni// mkha' 'gro ma lngas bskor bar bya// bdag nyid rdo rje can sbyor bas// rdo rje sems
368b2(rgyud 'bum): dpa' dag ces brjod/ / rdo rje lag ni lag rtse ru// rdo rje bsams nas reg bya la// dbus su bstan pa'i sa bon ni// brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas par bya// tshe rabs snga ma'i sdig la sogs// lha la sogs
368b3(rgyud 'bum): la bsgo bar bya/ / yan lag thams cad gzir ba dang // 'chi ba'i dus bab 'byung mi 'gyur// 'tshe med nad ni thams cad dang // nad pa glor bzhag sbyar na ni// dus rnams kun tu nad mi 'byung // lus
368b4(rgyud 'bum): can tshe ni zad pa yang / / zla ba drug tu gnas par 'gyur// gnas gzhan du ni bzhag nas su// rtag tu mchod la brtson par bya// rdo rje rgya ldan sbyor ba yis// rnam shes gang du'ang 'gro mi 'gyur//
368b5(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang bdag gi dbugs dag ni// der ni rab tu brdeg par bya// dbugs kyi gnas ni mtshungs pa na// thams cad grub par gsungs pa yin// g.yas pa g.yas su gnas pa dang //
368b6(rgyud 'bum): blo ldan g.yon la g.yon du gnas// der gnas na ni smra byed pa// thams cad 'grub pa nyid du 'gyur// dbugs dang 'dri ba mi mthun pa// dngos grub ring ba mtshon par bya// skad cig srog gi rang
368b7(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba/ / sbyor ba gnyis ni shes bya ste// skad cig la ni bya ba kun// rgyas par 'gyur bar rab tu grags// srog la bya ba gang byas pa// grub pa ring bar the tsom med// mche ba la sogs bsams/
369a1(rgyud 'bum): nas dug/ der ni gso ba dag tu bya// sbyor sogs sngar gyi mtshan nyid can// thams cad rig pas klul bsgo// sbyor ba bzhi la sos btab pa// 'chi bar 'gyur ba the tsom med/
369a2(rgyud 'bum): / dug bsdu ba yi sbyor ba yis// gzhan ma thams cad gso bar bya// sos btab lus la kun rig pas// sa bon gyis ni dgod par dgod// yi ge brgyad kyi sngags dag ni// yan lag brgyad po rnams su
369a3(rgyud 'bum): dgod/ / kha dog dkar po bsams pa yis// sa bon rnams kyis yid du dbrog/ dkyil 'khor dbus su gnas pa yi// ye shes kyis ni rnam shes bcing // yan lag bsgyur ba'i sbyor byas nas//
369a4(rgyud 'bum): de 'og phyi rol brtsam par bya// chu dang po ma bsres pa yis// sa snod yongs su dgang bar bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa'i// dbus su pad+ma bsam par bya// gdugs dkar po yis
369a5(rgyud 'bum): brgyan pa yis/ / rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma de bsgom// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// kha T+wAM ga dang thod pa dang // shin tu mdzes pa'i na bzas klubs// klu
369a6(rgyud 'bum): brgyad kyi ni mgo bo rnams/ / pad+ma yi ni gdan la mnan// shar du nor rgyas bu bsam bya// de bzhin byang du 'jog po'o// nub tu stobs kyis rgyu ba ste// lho ru pad+ma blta bar bya// dbang ldan du ni pad+ma che// me
369a7(rgyud 'bum): mtshams su ni dung skyong ngo / / bden bral rigs ldan zhes bya ba// rlung mtshams 'khyil ba ltung ba'o// klu brgyad po ni bsams nas su// mgo bo rnams ni mnan par bsgom// rdzas rnams kun gyis mchod
369b1(rgyud 'bum): nas su/ / me tog spos sogs gtor ma sbyin// bdag nyid lha yi rnal 'byor ni// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma ru bsam// rma bya sgro yi chun po yis// chu yi sbyor bas drang bar bya// kun nas bkang bar drangs nas su//
369b2(rgyud 'bum): / rkang pa nas ni chur thim bya// oM hrI Tan+daN+Da Da ra hUM phaT swA hA/ rdo rje sems dpar mngon sbyor bas// 'bum phrag la sogs bsnyen pa bya// oM bA su ki ri hrI TaT+Tar+thA Da ra hUM hUM hUM phaT swA hA/ oM tak+Sha ka hrI Tan+naN+Da Da ra
369b3(rgyud 'bum): swA hA/ oM karko Ta ka d+hI Tan+daN+Da Da ra swA hA/ oM pad+ma hrI TaT+TaN+Da Da ra swA hA/ oM ma hA pad+ma hrI Tan+daN+Da Da ra swA hA/ oM shaM kha pA la hrI Tan+daN Da ra swA hA/ oM b+h+yo ku li sha ya la hr-i tra taM ta raM swA hA/ oM hu lun d+ha ke hri Tan+daN+Da Da ra swAH/
369b4(rgyud 'bum): / oM hrI Tan+dat+ta Da ra hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT phaT/ a mu ke s+ya nir bi shaM ku ru hUM phaT swA hA/ zhes brjod cing / 'og ma'i dbus su drangs pa yis// 'phral du 'o ma nag por 'gyur// yungs kar me tog dkar ba
369b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / tsan dan dag gi bsres pa yis// 'chi bas zin pa'i snying ka ru// gsang sngags zlos shing brdeg par bya// snying ni 'phar ma thag tu yang // ye shes bsdams te bsrung bar bya// rnam shes
369b6(rgyud 'bum): bsdams pa tsam gyis kyang / / de bzhin dbugs ni g.yo bar 'gyur// dbugs ni rnam par g.yos pa yis// bdag gi dbugs kyis gzir bar bya// dbugs kyis gzir ma thag tu yang // rkang
369b7(rgyud 'bum): lag la sogs 'dar bar 'gyur/ / yan lag thams cad 'dar ba na// bdag nyid dbyangs ni blang bar bya// hUM gi glu ni blangs nas su// sa gol gsum gyis bslang bar bya// 'chi bas zin pa bslang nas ni//
370a1(rgyud 'bum): de yi yan lag bsrung bar bya// bsdus nas klu yi gnas su ni// 'o ma de ni dbo bar bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i// rdo rje sems dpar mngon sprul la// 'bum phrag
370a2(rgyud 'bum): gsum ni bzlas pa yi/ / sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya// de nas sgrub pos dug bsdus na// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// kha dang thig le gnyis dag dang // steng dang mgrin pa sna m+b+hi dang // snying ka lte ba
370a3(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba dang / / rkang pa'i mthe bong dag tu ni// zin pa gso bar mi bya ste// 'chi ba nyid kyi rgyu ru gsungs// nyon cig rgyal po rdo rje che// char pa dbab pa'i cho ga mchog/ chu 'gram dang ni nye ba yi// sa phyogs nyams ni/
370a4(rgyud 'bum): dga' ba ru// bla re dag ni bres nas su// dar dpyangs sna tshogs spungs pa ru// kha dog sna lngar btsos pa yi// tshon gyi las ni brtsam par bya// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// klu brgyad kyis ni rnam par
370a5(rgyud 'bum): klubs/ / mgo bo gnyis ni sgor bcas te// mjug ma gnyis kyis gur du mdud// shar du rgyal ba bzang po ste// dpal dang dga' bo byang du'o// nub tu char 'bebs sdug pa ste// bstan dang drag po lho ru'o//
370a6(rgyud 'bum): klu brgyad kyi ni rab ste// phyogs la sogs par rigs brgyad dgod// nor rgyas bu ni shar du ste// 'jog po byang du dgod par bya// nub kyi phyogs su stobs kyi rgyu// lho yi phyogs su pad+ma ste// dbang
370a7(rgyud 'bum): ldan du ni pad+ma che/ / me mtshams dung skyong dgod par bya// bden bral du ni rigs ldan te// rlung mtshams 'khyil ba ltung ba'o// sprin gyi dbang phyug rgyal po brgyad// phyogs brgyad nas ni dgug par bya//
370b1(rgyud 'bum): sgra sgrogs rmugs pa de bzhin du// drag po 'khyil ba stug po dang // gtum po char 'bebs rab gang ba// brgyad po rgyal po zhes bya'o// shar la sogs pa'i phyogs dgod pa// ji bzhin phyogs kyi
370b2(rgyud 'bum): mdog tu bsam/ / dbus su rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// pad+ma'i gdan la yang dag bzhugs// kha T+wAM ga dang rnal 'byor snod// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// sku mdog dkar po shin tu 'bar// shin
370b3(rgyud 'bum): tu mdzes pa'i na bza' mnabs/ / pad+ma sbrul gyis bskor nas su// sbrul ni gdan du sbyar bar bya// mchod pa rgya chen bshams nas ni// 'o ma la sogs snod brgyad gzhag/ me tog bdug spos dri dang
370b4(rgyud 'bum): ni/ mar me sna tshogs rigs las mchod// ye shes mkha' 'gro bdag bsgoms pa'o// ye shes can gyi rnal 'byor pa'i// oM b+hur b+hu ba swA hA/ nye bar spyod pa'i sngags so// oM bA su kI hUM swA hA/
370b5(rgyud 'bum): oM tAk+Sh+Na ka hUM swA hA/ oM kar ko Ta hUM swA hA/ oM pad+ma hUM swA hA/ oM ma hA pad+ma hUM swAhA/ oM shaM kha pA la hUM swA hA/ oM ku li sha pA la hUM swA hU~M/ oM hu lu d+ha hUM swAhA/ klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyi sngags so//
370b6(rgyud 'bum): / oM g+hi li g+hi li/ b+ha sha b+ha shA pa ya/ hUM hUM hUM ho ho ho/ tha Tha tha swA hA/ sprin gyi rgyal po brgyad kyi sngags so// lag pa kun tu bskor nas su// phyogs brgyad du ni bstan par bya// sprin gyi rgyal po brgyad kyi
370b7(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'o/ / g.yon pa khu tshur bcangs nas su// mthe'u chung dang mthe bong brkyang // g.yas pa sbrul mgo gdengs nas su// mthe bong steng du gung mor sbyar// klu'i rgyal po brgyad kyi phyag rgya'o// oM badz+ra DA ki/
371a1(rgyud 'bum): nI baR+Sha baR+ShA pa ya hUM phu swAhA/ rtsa ba'i sngags so// sngon du bsnyen pa 'bum phrag ni// gsum du byas nas bzlas pa bya// rnal 'byor can gyi las 'di rnams// char 'bebs pa yi cho ga
371a2(rgyud 'bum): mchog/ gzhan yang dge dang sdig pa yi// po nya'i mtshan ma bshad par bya// mig g.yon mgo dkar sgur po dang // 'jigs pa'i gos dang dbyug pa thogs// bud med rnams dang 'grogs te 'ong // ngu zhing
371a3(rgyud 'bum): skra ni lug pa sogs/ / gcer bu ngan gyis smra ba dang // sbyor bzhis 'chi ba ston pa yin// pho nya ji bzhin bdag nyid la// brtags nas rnam pa gnyis su bya// de tshe sngags pa 'grogs 'dod na//
371a4(rgyud 'bum): grub pa nyams par the tshom med// bdag gi gdan gyi rab tu byed pa zhes bya ba las rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o// / rnal 'byor brtson pa'i khyad par dag/ bcom ldan 'das
371a5(rgyud 'bum): la nyan par 'tshal/ / gang gis sngags rnams 'tshul bar bgyi// ye shes gzung ba ji ltar lags// nyon cig rdo rje de kho na// de bzhin lha yi bdag nyid do// dang por stong nyid bsgoms pa yis/
371a6(rgyud 'bum): lus can dri ma bkru bar bya// dang por gzugs ni stong sogs bya// ji srid rtsa brgyad nyid yin te// gzugs khams zhes bya stong pa ste// de nyid du ni sgra yang bya// dri khams zhes bya stong pa ste// /
371a7(rgyud 'bum): de nyid du ni ror yang bya// reg bya'i khams ni stong pa ste// de nyid du ni gzugs kyang bya// mig gi bdag nyid stong pa la// dbus na rnam shes ji ltar yod// nyan pa'i bdag nyid stong pa la//
371b1(rgyud 'bum): dbus na rnam shes ji ltar yod// snom pa'i bdag nyid stong pa la// dbus na rnam shes ji ltar yod// lce yi bdag nyid stong pa la// dbus na rnam shes ji ltar yod// lus kyi bdag nyid stong pa la// dbus
371b2(rgyud 'bum): na rnam shes ji ltar yod/ / yid kyi rang bzhin stong pa la// dbus na ji ltar brtag par bya// yid ni nam mkhar thim nas su// thams cad stong par bsam par bya// gling dang ri rab la sogs pa// steng dang
371b3(rgyud 'bum): 'og dang bar gyi na/ / khams gsum stong par bsgoms pa yis// thams cad zad pa nyid du bya// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams kun gyi// gzugs la sogs pa zad par bsgom// bdag gi dngos po
371b4(rgyud 'bum): zad bya ste/ / dngos po 'dres par dmigs par bya// sbyor ba mnyam par kun bsams te// rnal 'byor pa ni mkhas pa yis// mnyam nyid stong par bsams nas su// de yi dbus su bltas nas kyang //
371b5(rgyud 'bum): de la mtshan ma brtag par bya// mar me'i 'od kyis zhi ba ste// ser po dngul gyis rgyas par 'gyur// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba ni// chags pa la sogs 'grub par 'gyur// mthar ni du ba gan mthong
371b6(rgyud 'bum): na/ / mngon spyod du ni rab tu grags// rlung gi mdog ltar 'khrug pa yis// de yi mong la skrag par 'gyur// zla ba dkar po'i 'od zer ltar// thams cad du ni dkar mthong nas// rnal 'byor grub par shes
371b7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / blo ldan 'gro ba'i yang dag gnas// de 'og rnal 'byor las byung ba'i// myu gu la sogs mngon par bsam// gang zhig stong shes bsgom pa yi// myur du sems dpa' grol bar 'gyur// ya
372a1(rgyud 'bum): shes kyis ni shes bya blta/ / shes byas 'gro ba brtag par bya// pa dang ma ni gsang bya ste// bram ze gtsang ma gnyis bzung nas// rgyal po yul 'khor bcas bcom na// mi de dag par
372a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur zhes bya/ / bdag gi gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba gsum pa'o// / nyon cig rdo rje ji bzhin lam// gnyis spangs gnyis su med pa ste// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshor
372a3(rgyud 'bum): rab 'jigs pas/ / chu yi dgra ni dam pas gang // dbus su bying ba'i lus can rnams// sgrol ba'i mtshan nyid ces byar brjod// mtshon byas mtshan nyid mtshon pa po// rnam shes kyi ni ye shes te// ye shes
372a4(rgyud 'bum): kyi ni shes bya blta/ / shes byas 'gro ba brtag par bya// 'gro ba brtag pa'i sems kyis ni// ji ltar 'dod bzhin mngon par 'gro// zhags pas glang chen myos bcing ltar// 'khor ba'i zhags pas/
372a5(rgyud 'bum): gnod rmongs pas// rnal 'byor pa ni stong phrag gcig/ tshe rabs snga ma'i 'gro bar 'gro// sngon du mtshan nyid bstan pa bzhin// mnyam nyid stong par bsams nas su// stong pa'i zhing la sogs lus la//
372a6(rgyud 'bum): blo dang ldan pas sa bon gdab// dper na gdol pa'i khang pa mes bsreg pa// lha yi byin gyis brlabs par rab tu brjod// rig can dge dang mkhas pa kun tu gnas// bde bzhin ting nge 'dzin gyis kun
372a7(rgyud 'bum): bshig nas/ / sa bon dgod pas rab tu dgod par bya// stang du me yi sa bon brtag/ sa yi sa bon rnam pa gnyis// mig gnyis su ni sbyar bar bya// stong sogs rlung gi sa bon ni// sna dang rna ba dag la bsam//
372b1(rgyud 'bum): bdud rtsi'i chu yi sa bon ni// lce yi dbang po dbang phyug gtso// gang gis brtsegs pa rim bzhin gzung // gnas bzhi ru ni sbyar bar bya// mgrin par gti mug sa bon te// de bzhin dpung par nyon mongs so//
372b2(rgyud 'bum): snying ka'i phyogs su g.yo ba ste// lte ba'i rtsa bar phyug yin no// yan lag brgyad du sa bon ni// brgyad po bkod pas bsrung bar bya// ye shes mkha' 'gror bdag byas te// lus ni sa bon ldan par bya// nyi
372b3(rgyud 'bum): ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa/ / pad+ma yi ni stan la bzhugs// gdugs ni dkar pos steng du g.yogs// btso ma'i gser ltar 'bar ba'i 'od// zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste// sems dpa'i
372b4(rgyud 'bum): skyil krung yang dag bzhugs/ / stang du rdo rje dbu rgyan can// dar gyi thod ni mdzes par bcings// spyan gsum khro zhing bzhad pa ste// shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol// ral gri dgra sta rdo rje dang //
372b5(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa'i sdigs mdzub nyid dang ni// sha ka ti kha T+wAM sgreng ba ni// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya mngon par bsnams// sangs rgyas sprin ni 'phros pa yis// sems can rnams kyi don mdzad brtson// 'od zer
372b6(rgyud 'bum): sna tshogs 'bar ba ru/ / dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom par bya// yid kyis ye shes rnam shes dag/ shel dang 'dra bar bsam par bya// a li ka li rab sbyor bas// de yi sa bon bzung byas te// smisprin
372b7(rgyud 'bum): par thig pa'i gnas dag tu/ / ye shes can gyi sa bon bsgoms// sangs rgyas lnga yis brgyan pa yis// yi ge'i sa bon bzlas par bya// rlung dang me yi mdun don la// rdo rje ma yi sa bon skul// sgra dang
373a1(rgyud 'bum): thig les yang dag mnan/ / char pa'i rgyun zhes bya bar brjod// thog mar bla ma'i yi ge gzhag/ sreg byed yi ge mthar bzlas bya// ting nge 'dzin dang ldan pa yi// blo gros can gyis sum 'bum
373a2(rgyud 'bum): bzla/ / bzlas dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor pa// de yis bsam pa thams cad 'grub// las brgyad la sogs dngos grub rnams// sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya// de 'og las rnams brtsams byas na//
373a3(rgyud 'bum): 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med// rmongs par bya ba'i bye brag ni// nyon cig rdo rje de kho na// bcing ba rnams kyis bye brag dag/ sngon du rdo rje'i tshig brjod la// snga tshan dang po'i dang po gzung // de bzhin sde
373a4(rgyud 'bum): tshan bzhi pa yi/ / yi ge dang po bzung nas ni// nyis 'gyur re pa steng du gzhag/ de bzhin i dang re phar sbyar// gang zhig snga tshan gnyis pa yi// yi ge gnyis pa'i thig le can// lcags kyu yis ni gzi
373a5(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / bzhi pa yi ni gsum par bcas// lan gnyis su ni bzlas par bya// sangs rgyas lnga yis brgyan pa dang // sngon du phyag 'tshal yi ge ste// yi ge drag po mtha' ru sbyar// sa bon 'di bzlas
373a6(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pas/ / dngos po thams cad bcing bar gyur// lag gnyis sor mo bsnol nas ni// de nyid bza' ba lta bur sbyar// khro bo dang ni dbu ma brkyang // gnyis ka phan tshun drud par bya// 'di ni chan pa'i phyag
373a7(rgyud 'bum): rgya ste/ / 'od zer 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba 'khrug/ dgra yi mgrin pa la sogs pa// dngos po thams cad yid kyis rol// de nas chu la sogs pa kun// rab tu bcing ba bshad par bya// gang yang sde tshan tha ma ni//
373b1(rgyud 'bum): yi ge gsum pa gzung bar bya// de bzhin sde tshan gsum pa yi// yi ge gsum pa nyid dang ni// de yi sa bon gsum pa la// steng du e zhes bya bar sbyar// sde tshan lnga pa'i dang po la// lcags kyu yis ni gzir
373b2(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / gsum pa chu yi sa bon dang // tsheg drag yi ge dbus bya ste// mtha' ma rdo rje can dang sbyar// re ba glo na lcags kyu can// mthar ni drag po yi ge dang // dang por phyag 'tshal gzhag par bya// bcing ba yi
373b3(rgyud 'bum): ni sngags su grags/ / lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas su// srin lag gnyis ni phan tshun dkri// khro bo gnyis kyis mnan par bya// mthe bong gnyis ni dbus su sbyar// de nyid du ni mthe'u chung sbyar//
373b4(rgyud 'bum): rgod ma kha yi phyag rgya 'di// 'od zer 'bar ba'i 'phrang ba can// phyogs bcu'i gnas su 'bar ba yis// sprin gyi lha tshegs sreg par byed// char pa bcing la sogs dus su// phyag rgya 'di ni sbyar bar bya//
373b5(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pos babum phrag gcig bzlas pas// sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya// bdag gi gdan zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'o// / lha yi gzugs ni ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das
373b6(rgyud 'bum): las nyan par 'tshal/ / zhi ba'i sbyin sreg la sogs dang // gtor ma ldan pa ji ltar lags// gzugs sogs bsam pa rtse gcig pa// nyon cig rdo rje de kho na// sngags dang phyag rgya sbyin sreg gi/
373b7(rgyud 'bum): bzlas dang bsam gtan sgom pa rnams// sngon du mi yi la sogs la// blo ldan bzlas pa shes par bya// sa ni sbyangs ma thag tu yang // stegs bu'i mtshan nyid 'bad de bya// sor brgyad la sogs
374a1(rgyud 'bum): bsams nas ni/ / khru gang tsam nas brtsams nas su// ji srid khru stong rab tu gzung // brgyad pa dgra ni 'joms pa ste// de bzhin bcu pas rgyas par 'gyur// bcu
374a2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pas ni dbang du sdud/ / bcu bzhis de bzhin zhi ba nyid// mtheb sor bcu drug tshad kyis ni// rigs rnams mngon par 'phel bar byed// mtheb sor bco brgyad gnas kyis ni// ba lang
374a3(rgyud 'bum): rigs sogs mngon par 'phel/ / thab khung sor ni nyi shu pas// grong khyer dang ni yul 'khor zhi// rgyar ni cha gsum bgos pa las// cha gnyis su ni brko bar bya// brkos pa yi ni brgyad cha yis//
374a4(rgyud 'bum): khung bu yi ni kha khyer bya// kha khyer gyi ni phyed pa yis// phyi rol gyi ni mu khyud bya// mu khyud cha brgyad ldan pa la// pad+ma'i 'dab de cha brgyad bya// pad+ma yi ni phyi rol tu// sor gcig pa yi ra ba bya// thab khung
374a5(rgyud 'bum): / nang du rdo rje rnams// pad+ma'i nang du gzhag par bya// mngon spyod la ni gru gsum ste// zhi ba la ni gru bzhi'o// kun nas zlum po dbang du sdud// rgyas pa la yang de bzhin no// bskrad la zla ba phyed pa ste//
374a6(rgyud 'bum): dgug dang bcing la zur brgyad pa'o// rim gyi rim gyis sbyar bar bya// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang sogs rnams// sangs rgyas lnga yi mtshon pa rnams// ji bzhin phyogs su dgod par bya// kha khyer gyi
374a7(rgyud 'bum): ni gnas bzhi ru/ / sangs rgyas mtshan mas brgyan par bya// zla phyed rdo rje shin tu mdzes// grwa dang grwa ru rnam par gzhag/ ji bzhin stan gyi gnas su yang // mtheb sor bcu gnyis dag dang ni//
374b1(rgyud 'bum): / dpangs su khru phyed ldan pa yi// ti se'i gangs ni mdzes par gzhag/ 'dab ma brgyad kyi gnas rnams su// lha mo rnams ni rim bzhin dgod// rnal 'byor pa yis de yi tshad// khyad par du ni sbyar bar
374b2(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / oM hi li hi li be tA li hUM phaT/ nye bar spyod pa'i sngags so// ye shes mkha' 'gror sgom pa yis// rang gi lus ni bsrung bar bya// bdag gis yan lag brgyad po ru// thams cad bkod pas
374b3(rgyud 'bum): bsrung bya ste/ / lce la chu 'di nyid dang ni// nam mkha' rna ba sna dag la// sa yis mig tu sbyar bar bya// de bzhin me ni tshangs pa la// mgrin pas rmongs pa'i ded dpon te// g.yo ba snying la gnas pa'o//
374b4(rgyud 'bum): nyon mongs thong ka kun tu'o// lte ba'i rtsa bas phyug yin no// yan lag brgyad kyi srung ba 'di// lha rnams su ni shes byas la// ba dan gsum gyi phyag rgya yis// yan lag brgyad du gtugs te bsrungs//
374b5(rgyud 'bum): ye shes mkha' 'gro'i bdag nyid du// bdag nyid lus ni sprul byas te// kun da zla ba ltar dkar zhing // rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// sems dpa'i skyil krung phyag gnyis pa// shin tu mdzes
374b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i na bza' mnabs/ / phyag na kha T+wAM rdo rje ste// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba kun tu gsal// rang gi lus ni mnyam bzhag pas// dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom par bya// de nas sa ni sbyang bya ste// oM ha na ha na hUM phaT/
374b7(rgyud 'bum): lag pa g.yas pa brkyang byas te// rdo rje bsgoms nas sa la bsnun// sa sbyang ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// lag gnyis khu tshur kha sbyar te// gung mo gnyis kyang kun tu blta// phyag rgya 'di ni dag byed pa'o//
375a1(rgyud 'bum): oM sri swAhA/ mar sbyang ba'i sngags so// oM swA swA hA/ rdzas bkru ba'i sngags so// oM badz+ri swAhA/ 'bru sbyang ba'i sngags so// oM ku ru ku ru swAhA/ zas mchog la sogs pa'i rdzas/
375a2(rgyud 'bum): sbyang ba'i sngags so// oM a swA hA/ yam shing sbyang ba'i sngags so// me dbus pad+ma bsams nas su// me yi lha ni dgug par bya// g.yon pa khu tshur bcings nas su// khro bo dang ni dbu ma brkyang // dbu
375a3(rgyud 'bum): ma'i tshig ni gsum pa la/ / khro bo bsams te btsug pas dgug/ oM A gats+tsha A gats+tsha ag+ne dza swA hA/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa ru// thab khung dbus su bsgom par bya// bgrang 'phreng spyi blugs
375a4(rgyud 'bum): bu ram mdog/ ral pa'i thor tsugs ser skyar ldan// shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' klubs// 'od zer me lhar kun tu 'bar// me yi dbus su bsgom par bya// der ni ji ltar 'byor pa dang // dngos po lnga yis
375a5(rgyud 'bum): mchod nas su/ / me dbus me lha'i lce la ni// kun nas sreg blugs gsum gsum bya// lag gnyis thal mo sbyar nas su// pad+ma'i tshul du cung zad dbye// dbu ma kun tu brkyang bar bya// oM dzu hu dzu hu
375a6(rgyud 'bum): ag+ne swA hA/ me'i snying po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// de nas babad pas se gol gsum// gtogs pas 'bar bar thim par sgom// me yi gnas su kun rig pas// de nas sbyar ba brtsam par bya// oM
375a7(rgyud 'bum): hUM TaM Ta hUM phaT/ rdo rje bcas pa'i lag pa yis// me tog yungs kar chu yis ni// phyogs kun tu ni gtor nas su// me yi nang du thugs par bya// sbyang ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// oM badz+ra prA kA ra hUM phaT/
375b1(rgyud 'bum): lag g.yon thal mo phar bstan te// g.yas pa tshur bstan rgyab sbyar nas// dbang ldan phyogs sogs bskor bar bya// ra ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis ni brkyang nas su// phan tshun rtse mo
375b2(rgyud 'bum): rig par bya/ / oM dz+dza swA hA/ rdo rje'i dra ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// g.yon pa'i khu tshur bcangs nas su// mthe bong 'og tu brkyang bar bya// oM bruM swAhA/ phur bu'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// nyi ma'i dkyil
375b3(rgyud 'bum): 'khor gyis brgyan pa'i/ / me dbus pad+ma bsams nas su// gdugs dkar po yis g.yogs pa yi// rdo rje dbus su bsgom par bya// rdo rje rtse mo lnga pa ste// kha dog dmar sogs bsam par bya//
375b4(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba las// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje'i gzugs su bskyed nas su// rang gi dbus las byung ba yi// sbyor ba'i gdan las byung ba yi// las kyi mdog tu bsgom
375b5(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / phyag gnyis kha T+wAM rdo rje bsdams// thams cad rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// rdo rje'i gzugs ni bskyed nas su// rang gi dbugs las byung ba yi// bdag gis lus ni gang yin la// ye shes mkha'
375b6(rgyud 'bum): 'gro bstim par bya/ / me yi dbus su kun rig pas// sna tshogs dngos po mchod par bya// oM thaHwaHtha swA hA/ dgang blugs kyi sngags so// g.yas su dbyug pa bsam par bya// de bzhin g.yon du
375b7(rgyud 'bum): snod ni sbyar/ / oM hUM swA hA/ rtsa ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ba dang // oM hUM swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni dri'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// brkyang ba de nyid kyi mthe bong dang khro bo sbyar ba dang/
376a1(rgyud 'bum): oM puSh+pe mA le swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni me tog gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// khu tshur de nyid las mthe bong brkyang ba dang / oM tIk+Sh+Na dI pe hUM swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni mar me'i sngags dang phyag
376a2(rgyud 'bum): rgyurgya'o/ / me tog gi phyag rgya de nyid las dbus ma sgreng ba dang / oM d+hU pe shwa ri hUM swA hA/ zhes bya ba bdug pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// lag pa gnyis ka brkyang ste mthe bong dang gung mo bskyod pa dang /
376a3(rgyud 'bum): oM ku ru ku ru ma hA ba li hUM swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni gtor ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// me yi kha yi nang du ni// lan re bzlas shing lan re bzhin// dbus su gong bu bsreg par bya// bdun las lhag pa
376a4(rgyud 'bum): kun bzung nas/ / dbus su gong bu ran par ni// gong ma'i tshul gyis gnas pa ni// 'bad de rdzogs pa'i mtha' ru ni// lhag ma dag ni bsreg par bya// bsregs pa zin nas lha rnams ni//
376a5(rgyud 'bum): bdag gi lus la thim par sgom// dgang blugs kun la rdzogs pa ru// sngags dang phyag rgyas rdzogs par bya// snod ni mar gyis bkang nas su// me yi dbus su blugs nas kyang // drangs nas
376a6(rgyud 'bum): dbugs ni stongs 'gyur te/ / rang gi lus la thim par bya// de nas rang gi lus nyid du// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// dbus su me yi lha nyid ni// mkhas pa yis ni bsams nas kyang // lhag ma lan
376a7(rgyud 'bum): gsum bsregs nas su/ / mchod de gtor ma sbyin par bya// bkra shis dbyangs ni blangs nas su// der ni phyag rgya sbyar bar bya// sbyin sreg las kyis phye ba gzhan// mdor bsdus rgyas pa min par bshad//
376b1(rgyud 'bum): sA lu 'bras dang so ba dang // til dkar po la nyungs kar dang // nas dang dur ba'i sa bon bcas// mar dang 'o mar bsres nas su// sbrang rtsi bsres pa'i bo thug ni// khyad par du ni bsreg par bya// 'o ma
376b2(rgyud 'bum): can gyi shing lnga las/ / sor mo bcu bzhir ldan pa'i tshad// zhi ba'i dus la bab pa na// bsregs pa'i cho ga'i mchog yin no// til nag po dang ma sha dang // sA lu dmar po'i zan dang ni// dri dang gur kum 'o ma
376b3(rgyud 'bum): ni/ mar dang sbrang rtsir bsreg pa dang // mar dang ldan pa'i 'o thug dag/ khyad par du ni bsreg par bya// 'o ma can gyi shing lnga las// yam shing sor bcu'i tshad dang bcas// gal te rgyas pa'i las 'dod na//
376b4(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pos khyad par bsreg par bya// til ni dmar dang gnag pa dang // nA ga ge sar pri yang ku// de bzhin ske tshe'u su dang // sbrang rtsi dang ni mar gsar sbyar// thang shing dang ni n+ya gro dang // klu shing dang ni ba sha ka/
376b5(rgyud 'bum): yam shing sor mo bcu gnyis pa// chags pa'i las la mchog yin no// til nag po dang ma sha dang // 'ba' la ta ka nag chen 'bras// tsha ba'i mar nag khrag dang ni// bsres pa yis ni byug pa dang // lung
376b6(rgyud 'bum): tang shing dang sgur po'i shing / / 'ba' la tag ka ku la'i shing // yam shing sor brgyad pa yi tshad// mngon spyod las la rab tu grags// yungs kar mon sran gre bu dang // lam gyi rdul dang bsres pa dag/
376b7(rgyud 'bum): khrag dang kha ba'i mar nag gis// de ni bsgo bar rab tu bya// gser shing dang ni ba sha ka'i// yam shing der ni bzung nas ni// de nyid las la bsreg bya ba// bslad pa dag la rab tu grags// nya dang sha la sogs
377a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i rdzas/ / bag phye 'bru rnams thams cad dug/ khrag dang sbrang rtsis bsgos pa dang // bya rog gi ni sgro dag dang // bya rog tshang gi shing bu dang // so shing 'chos nas bor ba ste// 'di
377a2(rgyud 'bum): dag bcing ba'i las rnams la/ / brtson dang ldan pas sbyor bar bya// de nas gzhan yang khyad par du// sbyin sreg mtshan nyid bshad par bya// zho dang mar dang sbrang rtsi yis// bsgos pa yi shrI ba la ni// byang chub
377a3(rgyud 'bum): shing gi yam shing la/ / lnga brgya ru ni bsreg par bya// de yi dbus su mnyam bzhag nas// smon lam btab ste khrus byas nas// rgyal srid nyams pa'ang myur du ni// sa gsum rgyal po dbang du 'gyur// mar dang
377a4(rgyud 'bum): 'o ma sbrang rtsir bcas/ / lo ta'i yam shing ma la ni// brgya phrag brgya ru mngon bsregs na// shin tu myur bar dpal ldan 'gyur// bya ba gang dang gang bsams pa// de de thams cad 'dir 'grub 'gyur// de nas
377a5(rgyud 'bum): yongs gzung slob ma yi/ / mtshan nyid dag ni bshad par bya// yan lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs// dul zhing sprod pa zhi ba dang // chos gsum la ni mngon par dad // theg pa che la rtag tu dga'// sngags dang rgyud/
377a6(rgyud 'bum): kyi sbyor ba shes// bzo dang sgyu rtsal thams cad mkhas// bsam gtan sbyor ba mngon par dga'// thos dang klog sogs gus dang bcas// dus rnams kun tu bla mar gus// sbyin sogs dge ba'i las la brtson// /
377a7(rgyud 'bum): 'dod la dga' ba ma yin zhing // longs spyod la ni rten pa min// khro dang nga rgyal med pa dang // ngang tshul ngan min tshig rtsub min// sems can kun la smod pa dang // lha dang bla ma de bzhin te// gdug sems can
377b1(rgyud 'bum): dang ngang tshul can/ / rtag tu sdig pa'i blo dang ldan// 'khyal pa dang ni tshig rtsub smra// 'di lta bu dag spang bar bya// gzhan gyi gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba dang po'o// /
377b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyu yi sbyin sreg ji lta bu// lha las gzigs mo nyan par 'tshal// chu yi sbyin sreg la sogs pa'i// mtshan nyid dag ni ji ltar lags// chu sogs yang dag mtshan nyid rnams// nyon cig rdo rje de kho na// bla re dag
377b3(rgyud 'bum): ni bres nas su/ / sna tshogs gos rnams rab tu sbyang // shin tu yangs shing gru bzhi par// kun tu dri yis byug par bya// dbus su chu yi snod sogs la// dri ni dkar pos byugs nas su// chu dang 'o mar
377b4(rgyud 'bum): bsras pa yis/ / snod ni mdzes par dag par bya// bum pa dag ni brgyad po yang // phyogs brgyad dag tu gzhag par bya// dri yi chu yis rab tu dgang // kha ni shing lo gsar pas brgyan// bdag nyid ye
377b5(rgyud 'bum): shes mkha' 'gro ru/ / skad cig gis ni bskyed nas su// me tog bdug spos dri sogs pa'i// dngos pos bdag nyid mchod byas pa'i// de 'og phyi rol bzhag pa yi// chu yi las rnams sbyar bar bya// lag
377b6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis thal mo sbyar nas su/ / pad+ma'i tshul du cung zad dbye// oM ka ma le b+he swA hA/ pad+ma'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa'i// pad+ma nu yin bkod pa la// gdugs dkar po
377b7(rgyud 'bum): yis g.yogs pa yi/ / sa bon dbus su bsgom par bya// rang gi dbugs las byung ba yi// sa bon las ni gzugs su bskyed// sems dpa'i skyil krung phyag gnyis ldan// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par
378a1(rgyud 'bum): klubs/ / phyag gnyis rdo rje dbyug pa rnams// kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes// bzhad cing khro la sgeg dang bcas// shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol// dam tshig phyag rgyar rab tu grags//
378a2(rgyud 'bum): oM sa ma ye tiSh+Tha hUM phaT/ dam tshig gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// shar gyi bum pa rdo rje ma// byang du drag mo zhes bya ba// nub tu ro langs ma yin te// lho phyogs su ni gtum mo gnas// sang ge zhes bya dbang ldan du/
378a3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin me mtshams stag mo'o// bden bral na ni ce spyang mo// hUM byed 'ug pa rlung gi phyogs// so so so sor mtshan ma ni// dam tshig phyag rgyar bstan par bya// rang gi gzugs kyi sku mdog ldan// sngags dang phyag
378a4(rgyud 'bum): / rgya bstan pa'o// me tog bdug spos dri la sogs// mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la// g.yon pa snying kar bzhag nas su// g.yas pas steng nas dbub par bya// rtsa ba'i
378a5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgyar rab tu grags/ / oM badz+ro hUM swA hA/ rtsa ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// kun da la sogs me tog dkar// rtse mor dur ba btsugs nas su// lha mo'i dbu ste rdo rje yi// cod pan la ni gtor bar bya//
378a6(rgyud 'bum): gsang sngags lan re bzlas nas su// lan re'i sbyor bas dbul bar bya// lan grangs khri yi las kyis ni// thams cad rig cing tshe 'phel 'gyur// kA ra bI ra'i me tog dmar// dur ba dang ni ldan pa
378a7(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / las ni khri phrag byas pa yis// khyim rnams zhi bar rab tu grags// na ga pus pa'i yam shing gi/ 'o mar sbags te dbul bar bya// las 'di khri phrag byas pa yis// grong ni zhi bar byed par
378b1(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / pad+ma yi ni yam shing rnams// khri phrag tu ni bzlas nas su// las rnams kun la sbyar bas na// yul phyogs zhi bar byed par 'gyur// pri yang ku dang bil ba dang // de bzhin ut+pal ku
378b2(rgyud 'bum): mu da/ rgyal po'i las la sogs sbyar nas// pha rol yul 'khor 'joms par 'gyur// sngags pas rtag tu sbyor chu gtor// bye brag tu ni rgyas par 'gyur// gzhan gyi gdan gyi rab tu byed pa
378b3(rgyud 'bum): las rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o/ / // 'khor ba'i pha rol sgrol mtshan nyid// nyon cig rdo rje rgyal chen po// dngos dang dngos med rnam par grol// dag dang ma dag rab tu spangs//
378b4(rgyud 'bum): dngos po gnyis ni rab spangs pas// gnyis med chos shes bya ba ste// gzugs stong thog mar mthar thug dang // dbu ma mnyam par gnas pa'o// dag dang ma dgra dbu ma ni// 'ba' zhig gis ni mnyam
378b5(rgyud 'bum): par blta/ / bsten dang bsten med dbu ma yi// mnyam nyid ye shes las byung ba// lus ni mnyam par gnas pa ste// dag dang mnyam par gnas nas su// mnyam nyid ye shes las byung bas// mnyam pa'i
378b6(rgyud 'bum): lta bas blta bar bya/ / mnyam pa'i lta ba ji lta bu// bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal// gnyis med chos shes gyis pa yi// bdag nyid ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi// gnyis med ye shes mtshan nyid ni//
378b7(rgyud 'bum): ji bzhin de nyid rdo rje nyon// dngos po gnyis ni rab spang la// ye shes can gyis gnyis med chos// rnal 'byor kun gyi thog ma ru// dag pa rnam gsum brjod par bya// oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA swa b+hA ba
379a1(rgyud 'bum): shud+d+hohaM/ badz+ra shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA badz+ra shud+d+hohaM/ yo ga shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+hohaM/ bla med nyid du bya ba'i phyir// thal mo sbyar nas de dag brjod// yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs kyi//
379a2(rgyud 'bum): gnas dag tu ni brten nas su// bla re dag ni bre bar bya// sna tshogs gos ni sbyangs nas su// ba dan rgyal mtshan bsgreng bar bya// g.yar ka dra bas mdzes byas la// gnas bcu dag ni kun tu yang //
379a3(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin dri yi dkyil 'khor bya// skad cig rnal 'byor tshul gyis ni// rang gi lus ni bsam bya ba// ye shes mkha' 'gro bzung nas ni// bdag nyid mchod pas mnyes par bya// lag pa gan kyal
379a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhag nas su/ / dAr ni rdo rje brtag par bya// gnas lnga dag tu bstim par bya// sa 'og tu ni sbyang bar bya// phyag 'tshal 'joms pa'i mtha' ldan pa'i// hUM zhes bya ba sbyar bar bya// lhun po'i steng du bsam/
379a5(rgyud 'bum): bya ba/ kha dog bzhi sogs ldan pa yis// gser las byung ba'i grong khyer ni// rin chen bdun la sogs pas spras// g.yar ka'i dra ba'i 'phreng ba can// mnyam zhing ji ltar 'dod pas sbyang // phyag
379a6(rgyud 'bum): rgya kun gyi thog mar ni/ / dam tshig phyag rgya bcing bar bya// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la// g.yon pa snying kar bzhag nas su// g.yas pa mchan khung gzhag par bya// dam tshig phyag rgya shes par bya// phyag
379a7(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal sreg pa'i mtha' ldan pa'i/ / ji ltar rdo rje dngos sa bon// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// de bzhin dam tshig bstan par bya// seng ga'i gdan ni rnam pa lnga// gnas lnga dag tu sbyar bar bya// nyi
379b1(rgyud 'bum): ma'i gdan ni bsams nas su/ / gdugs dkar po yis brgyan par bya// rang gi dbugs las byung ba yi// ye shes mkha' 'gro dbus su bsam// zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste// sems dpa' yi ni
379b2(rgyud 'bum): skyil krung can/ / skra grol bas ni g.yogs pa ste// sangs rgyas lnga yis mdzes par byas// kha dog sngon mo drag chen mo// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// bzhad dang khro dang sgeg pa yis// zhal gsum po
379b3(rgyud 'bum): ni spyan gsum po/ / ha har bzhad cing gtsigs pa ste// na bza' dmar pos shin tu mdzes// kha T+wAM gyen du bsgreng ba dang // gnyis pa na ni dgra sta nyid// gsum pa yis ni rdo rje thogs// g.yon pas dril bu
379b4(rgyud 'bum): sgra sgrog cing / / gnyis pa na ni snod nyid de// gsum pas de bzhin ral gri 'phyar// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba ru// dbus su mkhas pas bsgom par bya// ye shes kyi ni shar phyogs su// bdag gi chu
379b5(rgyud 'bum): las byung ba ste/ / kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes// skra grol bas ni rnam par klubs// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa ste// phyag na kha T+wAM rnal 'byor snod// shin
379b6(rgyud 'bum): tu mdzes pa'i na bza' klubs/ / 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsgom bya// ye shes kyi ni byang gi char// bdag gi ma las byung ba yi// kha dog ser po shin tu mdzes// sems dpa'
379b7(rgyud 'bum): yi ni skyil krung can/ / skra grol bas ni shin tu brgyan// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// sku ni na bza' mdzes pa mnabs// phyag gnyis kha T+wAM rnal 'byor snod// mkha' 'gro drag mo zhes bya bsgom//
380a1(rgyud 'bum): ye shes kyi ni nub phyogs char// bdag gi rlung las byung ba yis// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung can// kha dog dmar po kun tu 'od// kha T+wAM rnal 'byor snod bsnams shing /
380a2(rgyud 'bum): skra grol bas ni mdzes pa ste// lus kun sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan// shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi// mkha' 'gro ro langs ma bsgom bya// ye shes kyi ni lho yi char// sa
380a3(rgyud 'bum): yi ye shes las byung ba/ / phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung can// kha dog sngon po shin tu mdzes// kha T+wAM rnal 'byor snod bsnams shing // rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs pa ste// skra grol bas ni shin tu
380a4(rgyud 'bum): mdzes/ / ha ha ra rgod pas 'jigs par mdzad// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi// mkha' 'gro gtum mo zhes byar bsgom// bdag dngos lnga las byung ba yi// mkha' 'gro ma ni lnga zhes bya// lnga po lnga
380a5(rgyud 'bum): ru bsgom par bya/ / gzugs sogs shin tu mdzes pa yin// dbang ldan gyi ni phyogs kyi char// seng ga'i gdong ni bsam par bya// kha dog dkar zhing sar ba ste// glang po yi ni sten la bzhugs//
380a6(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje lcags kyu sdigs mdzub can// shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi// 'bar ba'i lus can bsgom par bya// me mtshams stag mo zhes bya ba// rin chen bdun
380a7(rgyud 'bum): gyi stan la bzhugs/ / phyag gnyis kha dog dkar zhing sngo// shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol// lag na lcags kyus brgyan pa ste// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa can// 'od zer sna tshogs
380b1(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba yi/ / 'bar ba'i lus can bsgom par bya// bden bral lha mo ce spyang mo// ha ha bzhud pas 'jigs par mdzad// ma he yi ni gdan la bzhugs// mdog ni dmar zhing sngo ba ste// sku la na bza'
380b2(rgyud 'bum): mdzes par gsol/ / phyag gnyis lcags kyu zhags pa dang // sdigs mdzub kyis ni shin tu mdzes// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi// 'bar ba'i lus can bsgom par
380b3(rgyud 'bum): byarlung mtshams lha mo 'ug pa mo/ / kha dog ser zhing dmar ba ste// klu yi stan la yang dag bzhugs// rgyan du'ang de nyid sbyar bar bya// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung can// sdigs mdzub
380b4(rgyud 'bum): lcags kyu zhags pa bsnams/ / 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi// 'bar ba'i lus can bsgom par bya// dbus kyi mkha' 'gro ma brgyad kyis// phyi rol dag ni rnam bzhi la// shar du mkha' 'gro rgyal
380b5(rgyud 'bum): dbang mo/ / phyag gnyis kha dog dkar po ste// yi dgas kyi ni stan la bzhugs// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis klubs pa ste// shin tu skrag cing skra grol bas// 'od zer sna tshogs yang dga' bar// lag gnyis
380b6(rgyud 'bum): kha ru bcug nas ni/ / hA har bzhad pas shin tu 'bar// byang na 'bar ma rgyal dbang mo// kha dog ser mo shin tu 'bar// spyi bo'i steng du lag pa gnyis// thal sbyar mar me lta bur ba bar// drag mo'i
380b7(rgyud 'bum): gzugs can tshig pa ste/ / shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' rgyan// yi dgas kyi ni stan la bzhugs// 'od zer me ltar 'bar ba bsgom// nub kyi lha mo 'jib byed ma// kha dog dmar mo 'jigs byed cing /
381a1(rgyud 'bum): yi dgas kyi ni stan la bzhugs// rab tu mdzes pa'i go bgos shing // yi dgas stan la kun tu gnod// lag tu skud pa dmar khyer zhing // thal mo sbyar te khrag 'thung ma//
381a2(rgyud 'bum): drag mo me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od// lha mo 'jab byed rab tu grags// dag 'phrog pa ni lho phyogs su// kha dog nag mo mnyam pa'i 'od// yi dgas stan la gnas pa yi// skra ni gyen du 'bar rgyan pa'i//
381a3(rgyud 'bum): rab tu mdzes pa'i dmar po'i gos// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa yi// mdzub mo gtun shing lag na thogs// rnam par rmongs pa'i sems can sgrol// drag mo me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od// thams cad
381a4(rgyud 'bum): kun nas mkhas pas bsgom/ / de dag gi ni gzugs mdun du// dam tshig dag ni blta bar bya// rlung dang me yi bdun don la// rdo rje ma yi sa bon dbye// dgra dang thig the yang dag mnan// char pa'i rgyun
381a5(rgyud 'bum): zhes bya bar brjod/ / phyag 'tshal dang po sreg byed mtha'// ye shes mkha' 'gro'i sa bon yin// dbyangs thog dang po'i sa bon ni// phyag 'tshal dang po sreg byed mtha'// shar phyogs rdo rje mkha'
381a6(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ma'i/ / sa bon du ni rab tu grags// dbyangs yig yi ge gnyis pa ni// phyag 'tshal sreg byed sbyar bar bya// 'di ni byang gi phyogs gnas pa// mkha' 'gro drag mo'i sa bon yin// sa bon dag ni 'di
381a7(rgyud 'bum): nyid la/ / dbyug pa glo ru gzhag par bya// phyag 'tshal dang po sreg byed mtha'// nub phyogs ro langs ma yi yin// sa bon dag ni 'di nyid la// steng du thig le sbyin par bya// phyag 'tshal sreg pa
381b1(rgyud 'bum): mtha' sbyar ba/ / lho phyogs gtum pa mo yi yin// ma ning sa bon dang po ni// phyag 'tshal sreg byed mtha' dang sbyar// dbang ldan lha mo seng ge ma'i// sa bon du ni rab tu grags// ma ning sa bon gnyis pa ni// phyag
381b2(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal sreg byed mtha' dang sbyar/ / me mtshams lha mo stag mo yi// kho na nyid kyi sa bon bshad// de bzhin ma ning sa bon gsum// phyag 'tshal sreg byed mtha' dang spel// bden bral lha mo ce spyang ma// khyad
381b3(rgyud 'bum): par gyi ni sa bon yin/ / ma ning yi ge bzhi pa la// phyag 'tshal sreg byed mtha' dang sbyar// rlung mtshams hUM byed bug pa mo'i// sa bon du ni rab tu sbyar// sde tshan dag ni lnga pa yi// yi ge dag ni gnyis pa
381b4(rgyud 'bum): gzung / / sa bon rtsa bar sgra dang sbyar// phyag 'tshal thog mar sreg byed mtha'// shar gyi mkha' 'gro rgyal dbang mo'i// sa bon du ni shes par bya// sde tshan dag ni lnga pa yi// de bzhin yi ge gnyis pa gzung //
381b5(rgyud 'bum): e dang theg ler sbyar bar bya// phyag 'tshal thog mar sreg byed mtha'// byang phyogs lha mo 'bar byed ma'i// sa bon yi ge sbyar bar bya// sde tshan dag ni lnga pa yi// yi ge gnyis pa gzung bar bya// oM
381b6(rgyud 'bum): dang re pa thig ler bya/ / phyag 'tshal thog mar sreg byed mtha'// nub phyogs lha mo 'jib byed ma'i// khyad par gyi ni sa bon yin// sde tshan dag ni lnga pa yi// yi ge gnyis pa bzung nas su// ra~M pha'i yi
381b7(rgyud 'bum): ge lcags kyu sbyar/ / phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mtha' sbyar ba// lhor gnas lha mo 'phrog byed ma'i// sa bon du ni rab tu grags// khu tshur gnyis ni bcings nas su// dbus ma gnyis ni brkyang nas kyang //
382a1(rgyud 'bum): rtse mo phan tshun sprad nas ni// ye shes lha mor bstan par bya// lag gnyis phan tshun sbyar nas su// dbus ma dag ni mthe bong sprad// cung zad cig ni bskyed par bya// shar
382a2(rgyud 'bum): phyogs rdo rje ma la bstan/ / khu tshur mnyam par bcings nas su// mthe bong gnyis ni brkyang byas la// byang gi phyogs nas brtsams nas su// rgya 'di drag mo la yang bstan// phyag rgya 'di ni bcings
382a3(rgyud 'bum): nas su/ / mthe'u chung gnyis ni brkyang bar bya// lho phyogs su ni bshad pa ste// de ni phyag rgya bzhi pa'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// khro bor gnyis ni brkyang nas su// rtse mo sprad de gnas pa ni//
382a4(rgyud 'bum): mtshams bzhi yi ni phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis thal mo khar bcug nas// phu zhes bya ba sbyar bar bya// shar phyogs mkha' 'gro'i phyag rgya yin// lag gnyis thal mo kha sbyar nas// spyi bo ru ni
382a5(rgyud 'bum): gzhag par bya/ / byang du gnas pa'i 'bar ma la// phyag rgya 'di ni bstan par bya// phyag 'tshal thal mo sbyar nas su// kha ru bzhag ste hUM zhes bya// nub phyogs lha mo 'jib byed ma'i// phyag rgya ru
382a6(rgyud 'bum): ni sbyar bar bya/ / lag gnyis kun tu bskor byas nas// sor mo rnams kyi rtse mo sbyar// gsang ba'i gnas su bzhug nas kyang // lho phyogs 'phrog byed ma la bstan// phyag 'tshal drang ni sreg pa
382a7(rgyud 'bum): yidabus su hUM zhes bya bar sbyar/ / lag po kun tu brkyang la sogs// dri sngags phyag rgyar rig par bya// bdud rtsi'i ro dang thig ler bcas// phyag 'tshal dang ni sreg pa mtha'// dri yi phyag rgya
382b1(rgyud 'bum): / brkyang nas su// khro bo dang ni mthe bong sbyar// sngags dang phyag rgya 'di yis ni// thams cad rig pas thams cad dbul// sde tshan dang po'i dang po ni// phyag 'tshal thog ma sreg byed mtha'// phyag/
382b2(rgyud 'bum): rgya de nyid sbyar nas su// dbus ma'i sor mo bsgreng bar bya// bdug pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya yis// lha rnams thams cad mchod par bya// dgu mtha' yi ni sa bon gzung // phyag 'tshal dang ni
382b3(rgyud 'bum): sreg byed mtha'/ / khu tshur bcings nas mthe bong bsgreng // mar me'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// lha rnams thams cad mchod par bya// sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa bzung // sgra dang thig ler sbyar
382b4(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / phyag 'tshal dang ni sreg byed mtha'// gtor ma'i phyag rgya dang // lag pa gnyis ni sbyar nas su// mthe bong gung mo sbyar bya ba// thams cad du ni skad cig bskyod// gtor ma'i sngag
382b5(rgyud 'bum): ni snga mar sbyar/ / gnyis med gtor ma snga ma bzhin// de nyid 'di yi mchod par bya// sngon du rdzas ni rnam pa lnga// sna tshogs pa yoM lcags kyu dang // dri dang me tog bdug pa sogs// sngags dang
382b6(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya phul nas kyang / / phyi nas mchod pa nyi shu yis// shes nyen can gyis mchod par bya// hUM zhes pa yis glu blangs nas// rnal 'byor ma lus mnyes par bya// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la/
382b7(rgyud 'bum): rkang pa'i mtshams su bzhag nas ni// yan lag gsum du hUM gis bskyed// pi wang tshul du bsgreng ba dang // gling bu'i tshul du 'bung ba dang // zangs dung tshul du 'bud pa dang // cing te'u tshul gyis
383a1(rgyud 'bum): rdeb pa dang / / dkrol ba'i tshul gyis dkrol ba dang // pa ltar ha ltar brdung ba dang // gar gyi tshul gyis bskyod pa dang // bsil g.yab tshul gyis g.yo ba pa dang // rgyal mtshan
383a2(rgyud 'bum): tshul gyis bsgreng ba dang / / bla re'i tshul du bres pa dang // ba dan tshul du 'phyar ba dang // gdugs kyi tshul du dbub pa dang // rdza rnga'i tshul du brdung ba dang // rnga zlum tshul du brdung ba dang // 'dzum pa'i tshul du
383a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhad pa dang / / khro bo'i tshul du khro ba dang // skrag pa'i tshul du skrag pa dang // 'gying ba'i tshul gyis rol pa dang // mda' 'dran nu mar 'khyud pa dang // rdo rje gser zhing phyag 'tshal ba'i// phyag 'tshal tshul du
383a4(rgyud 'bum): 'dud pa ste/ / rnal 'byor ma brgyad de nyid kyi// dngos po kun gyis mchod par bya// de nyid dbyangs su blangs nas su// hUM zhes bya ba dag gis sprul// hUM gi glu ni blang bar bya// rdo rje dga' ba'i mthu dang spyan
383a5(rgyud 'bum): gyis gzigs/ / yi ge'i dngos po rang bzhin stong par rol// dngos dang dngos med las grol dbu ma mkhyen// mi 'gyur dgra bcom lhag ma sems pa'o// gnyis spod gnyis 'khyud chu yi bya ba can//
383a6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis med chos skyes thar pa'ang brnyes pa'o// bde bas 'khor mnan thar pa'ang btang ba'o// thams cad dngos kyi rnal 'byor ma rnams rol// rnal 'byor ma lnga sangs rgyas de nyid mkhyen// gzugs
383a7(rgyud 'bum): mang bsgyur mar sems can smin mdzad pa/ / rdo rje kun rtog chos kyi rmongs pa gcod// rnal 'byor ma rmongs snying chos tshogs la 'dud// rnal 'byor ma yi chos grol nges pa'i gtso la 'dud// sems can
383b1(rgyud 'bum): grol mdzad rnal 'byor bdag la bstod phyag 'tshal/ / thams cad bdag skyes gcig dngos bstod phyag 'tshal// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho rmongs pa gcod la bstod phyag 'tshal// de nyid gcig la rtag tu bdag
383b2(rgyud 'bum): 'dun bstod phyag 'tshal/ / zhes bya bas khyad par du bstod cing glu dang bstod pas nye bar mchod par bya'o// bar bar du hUM gi sgra dang dril bu bsgrag la smon lam rnam pa gsum gdab par bya'o// rdo rje thal
383b3(rgyud 'bum): mo dam bcings nas/ / snying ka'i phyogs su btsir bar bya// oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha sarba d+harmA swa b+hA ba shud+d+hohaM/ oM badz+ra shud+d+haHsarba d+harmA badz+ra shud+d+hohaM/ oM yo ga shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+ma yo ga shud+d+hohaM/ g.yas pa
383b4(rgyud 'bum): pad+mar bsams nas su/ / g.yon pa rdo rje bsgrengs nas kyang // pad+ma'i bskor bas bskor nas ni// phyag rgya chen po bstan par bya// oM ha ho hri/ swA sa hA/ phyag rgya chen po byin gyis brlabs pa'i sngags
383b5(rgyud 'bum): dang phyag rgya'o/ / rnal 'byor can gyis mtshungs pa ru// lha rnams thams cad bsam par bya// 'jig rten pa sogs ye shes can// phyi yi dkyil 'khor brtag par bya// so sor dri yis mchod pa dang // so sor
383b6(rgyud 'bum): me tog gtor ba dang / / so sor bdug pas bdug pa sogs// so sor sbyor bar dbul bar bya// bdud rtsi lnga ni bsres nas su// nya phyis la sogs dbul bar bya// ha zhes bya bas kha dog dbrog/ ho zhes
383b7(rgyud 'bum): bya bas dri gnom ste/ / hrI zhes bya bas nus pa gzhom// go rims de ltar mngon par brjod// rnam gsum lan ni brjod nas su// lha gsum du ni bsam par bya// pad+ma'i dbang phyug gzugs mdzes gser
384a1(rgyud 'bum): gyi mdog/ dri chu'i ji ba shin tu rnam snang mdzad// myang ba rdo rje'i dbang phyug phyag rdo rje// lha gsum dbang phyug bsgom par bya// g.yon pa zla ba'i lag pa yi// zla ba'i dbus su bdud rtsi yi/
384a2(rgyud 'bum): yige kun rig gug skyed bcas// mthe bong sor mo sa nyid de// srin lag dag ni ri rab bo// bsrubs pa'i stobs kyis bdud rtsi yi// chu ni rnam gsum shes par bya// rnal 'byor ma ni thams cad la// mthe
384a3(rgyud 'bum): bong thor ma so sor dbul/ / de 'og rang gi dngos po yis// dag nyid la ni bsam bya ba// rgyas pa lnga yi mchod rten ni// rnam pa gsum gyis bkru bar bya// lce rtse thig le steng du yang // blo dang ldan pas gnas
384a4(rgyud 'bum): gsum mchod/ / ltos shig shin tu mdzes pa'i chos// 'di la rnam rtog yod min thong // bram ze khyi dang gdol pa gsum// rang bzhin gcig pas lhan cig bza'// rnal 'byor pho mo'i 'khor lo la//
384a5(rgyud 'bum): tshigs bcad 'di yis sbyin par bya// pad+ma'i bskor ba sngon 'gro bas// sems ni shal ltar bsams nas su// g.yas pa pad+ma'i gdan la ni// rdo rje rtse gsum bsgreng bar bya// 'dod chags dri
384a6(rgyud 'bum): ma dang bral ba'i/ / rin thang med las legs 'ong chos// 'dzin dang 'dzin med rnam spangs pa// de kho na nyid bdag phyag 'tshal// tshigs bcad 'di yis blangs byas te// sbyor ba'i dngos grub don
384a7(rgyud 'bum): du ni/ kun spyod de nyid ji bzhin du// rnal 'byor pa yis kun tu sbyor// ji ltar bde bas kun ces brjod// dmar po yi ni rdzas rnams kyis// maN+Dal gru gsum gsum du bya// rdo rje khu tshur
384b1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis bcings la/ / rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya// mthe'u chung gnyis ni bsgrengs nas su// mdzub mo gnyis ni bsgreng bar bya// g.yas pa cung zad bskums nas su// sbyar bas phyag rnams spyan drang ngo //
384b2(rgyud 'bum): oM ku ru ku ru sa ma ya a d+hi pa d+hi hUM dzaHswA hA/ spyan drang ba'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// me tog dmar po bdug pa dang // dri dang mar me la sogs dbul// rgyas pa'i gtor ma'i snod la ni// nye ba'i longs
384b3(rgyud 'bum): spyod gtor mar ldan/ / sha rlon dang ni nya la sogs// bza' ba'i rdzas rnams thams cad la// bdud rtsi lnga dang bcas par dgod// g.yon gyi cha ru snod bzhag la// g.yas su khro bo bstan par bya//
384b4(rgyud 'bum): oM shing gcig dang ni dur khrod dang // ri bo dang ni ri sul dang // grong dang bzhi mdo zhing dang ni// khyad par du ni khang stong dang // gdol ma snod dang thang dang ni// khyad par du ni chu la gnas// nag po drag
384b5(rgyud 'bum): po drag chen po/ / lha gzhin mnyam du sten pa dang // nag po gcig dang mi sdug dang // rga las 'das dang log 'dren rnams// rgan byed ma dang drag mo dang // mi sdug ma dang dbu ma dang // rgyal ma rnam par rgyal
384b6(rgyud 'bum): ba dang / / mi thub gzhan gyis mi thub ma// nag mo bzang mo nag chen mo// nag sbom ma dang rnal 'byor ma// dbang mo dang ni zla ba mo// drag tu sdang dang 'phyang ba mo// 'phrog byed ma dang mar me ma// 'jib byed grong
384b7(rgyud 'bum): nas rnal 'byor ma/ / drag mo'i gzugs dang gzugs chen mo// mche ba gtsigs dang zong chen ma// thod 'phreng 'phreng can kha T+wAM ma// sbrul chun ral gri dgra sta can// rdo rje de bzhin gzhu can ma// lha yi dbang phyug
385a1(rgyud 'bum): ma rnams ni/ / de bzhin chen mo mkha' 'gro lnga// las kun rjes su sgrub byed ma// sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor thal chen mo// de bzhin rdo rje dbang phyug gtso// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
385a2(rgyud 'bum): / sku chen te// rdul med rnal 'byor 'byin pa mo// rdo rje dbang mo'i bka' 'di yis// thams cad kun nas 'dir spyon cig/ oM ka ka ka d+h+ya na/ ba ba baM dA na/ kha kha khA da na/ sar+b+ba duSh+Ta nAM ha na ha na g+hA ta ya
385a3(rgyud 'bum): g+hA ta ya a mo ka s+ya shAn+tang+gi ru hUM hUM phaT dza swA hA/ bdud rtsi yis ni kha bkang nas// las kyi go 'phang mngon par bsam// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma bsgoms te// las rnams thams cad rjes su 'grub//
385a4(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings la// rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya// oM tiSh+Tha hUM b+hak+Sha b+hak+Sha dza phaT swA hA/ ji bzhin las sbyor sngags sbyor nas// gtor ma'i las la sogs pa sbyar// zhi rgyas dbang dang dgug
385a5(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / gsad bskrad dbye dang bcing ba la// phyi rol gtor ma de nyid kyis// gtor ma'i las la sogs pas sgrub// de nas mchod pa'i khyad par las// rung dang mi rung rnam par spang // lcags kyu la
385a6(rgyud 'bum): sogs rnam pa lnga/ / de nyid lnga ru bya ba ste// lcags kyu che la dgod pa ni// ye shes lhar ni 'dod pa ste// rdo rje lcags kyu mi bskyod pa// gnas kyi lcags kyu rin chen pa// rgyal po'i lcags kyu don yon grub//
385a7(rgyud 'bum): g.yo ba'i lcags kyu 'od dpag med// lcags kyu lnga la sogs pa la// de nyid thams cad sbyar bar bya// gang zhig 'dod na lha kun dang // rnal 'byor ma kun tshim par bya// 'dod la dga' ba ma yin zhing //
385b1(rgyud 'bum): longs spyod phyir ni bsten mi bya// rang 'dod thams cad de nyid de// mchod pa'i las la sogs pa bya// de yi dbus su dpa' bo rnams// a li ka li sbyar bar bya// a li ka li rab sbyor gyis// lha
385b2(rgyud 'bum): rnams thams cad tshim par bya/ / de yi dbus su byung ba yi// bdud rtsi'i ro kun myang bar bya// rdzas rnams kun gyi lhag ma dag/ phyi yi dkyil 'khor du ni brtag/ hUM zhes bya ba'i glu yi sau ni// bkra shis
385b3(rgyud 'bum): sgra yis dag par bya/ / lus can don phyir shes rab gsol btab pa// kun 'khyud la sogs gnyis spyod cing // sgyu ma lta bur sbyor bas shin tu brgyan// srid pa las sgrol khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rang
385b4(rgyud 'bum): bdod bkra shis sgra dang ni/ / hUM hUM brjod cing dril bu gsil// rdo rje thal mo bcings nas ni// snying kha'i gnas su rab bzhag la// ma lus sems can kun gyi phyir// smon lam dag ni gdab par bya//
385b5(rgyud 'bum): sems can thams cad nad med cing // sems can thams cad bde gyur cig/ gang gi lam nas 'gro ba yis// sangs rgyas nyid dang phrad par shog/ ma brgal ba rnams bsgral ba dang // ma grol ba rnams
385b6(rgyud 'bum): bdag gis dgrol/ / de lta nyid du rjes brtse bas// rnal 'byor bstan bcos gnas la dgod// rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings nas// g.yon pa'i snying kar gzhag par bya// g.yas pa sa la brkyang nas ni//
385b7(rgyud 'bum): de yi 'og tu gshegs su gsol// oM At+ma tiSh+Tha hUM swA hA/ de nas rang gi dbugs kyis ni// bdag gi lus la bstim par bya// skad cig tshul gyis rnal 'byor gyis// bdag gis dngos po mchod
386a1(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / oM sar+b+ba duSh+Ta gr-ih+Na gats+tsha hUM phaT/ se gol gsum ni gtogs pa yis// phyi rol pa rnams gshegs su gsol// gzhan gyi gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba
386a2(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa'o/ / / bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par dang // gang gi lcags kyu lnga po rlab// dngos dang dngos med rnam par rtog/ gnyis med gnyis su med pa'i chos// gnyis kyi rtog pa ji ltar
386a3(rgyud 'bum): spang / a li ka li ji ltar lags// rnal 'byor bstan bcos tshul rnams ni// phyi rol phyag rgya'i sems ni ci// bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// dang
386a4(rgyud 'bum): po'i rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu/ / lnga yi bdag nyid rab tu 'jug/ reg na dro ba me yin te// du ba ltar snang rlung yin no// sla ba'i rang bzhin chu zhes bya// gzugs su snang ba sa yin no// ye shes byin rlabs rdo rje'o//
386a5(rgyud 'bum): lha lnga ru ni bsgom par bya// ma lus chu yi dbyibs dang ni// zad par bya ba me nyid dang // de bzhin rtag tu rlung dang ni// ngang pa mtshungs don sa dbang po// ye shes kyi ni yi ge lnga// sgra dang thig ler sbyar bar bya//
386a6(rgyud 'bum): de yi dbus su zla ba yi// dbus su bdud rtsi'i yi ge'o// lnga po lnga ru brjod par bya// dngos dang dngos med las grol ba'i// rdo rje chu ni sbyangs pa yis// des ni gti mug bsrings pa yin// phyi rol bdud rtsi rdzas
386a7(rgyud 'bum): bzang po/ / me yis bcos nas sbyangs pa ltar// lha tshogs mi yis bcos nas ni// lhag ma bshad dang gci ba yin// me yis btsos nas sbyangs me yi// dbus su sbyin sreg rtag tu dbul// rdo rje chu yis bonam
386b1(rgyud 'bum): sa bon babs pas bzlas nas kyang / / de yi dbus su nyi ma la// dur khrod yi ge bsams nas sreg/ dngos dang dngos med las grol bas// de phyir rmongs las ring du 'gyur// pad+ma'i dbang phyug
386b2(rgyud 'bum): gzugs mdzes shin tu sdug/ dri chu'i ngo bo shin tu rnam snang mdzad// myang ba rdo rje dbang phyug phyag rdo rje// lha gsum rnam pa gsum ni shes par bya// ha zhes pa yis kha dog dbrog/ ho zhes pa yis
386b3(rgyud 'bum): dri zhom ste/ / go rims de ltar mngon par brjod// bdud rtsi chu zhes bya ba ste// lha ni rnam pa gsum du grags// dngos dang dngos med las grol bas// de phyir rmongs pa ring du spong // a li bung ba zhes
386b4(rgyud 'bum): brjod de/ / bung ba rdo rje 'jigs byed yin// a li nam mkha'i mtha' gtugs pa'i// chos kyi dbyings ni rang bzhin te// rgyu dang mi rgyu gsang blo can// lus ni ma lus bskyed pa'o// bcu dang brgyad kyi rtsa
386b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams nas/ / dbang po kun gyi bdud rtsi rnams// de yi dbus nas drangs nas su// a la'i dbus su thim par 'gyur// 'jigs byed rdo rje sgra yis te// sbyor ba'i rdzas rnams skye ba yin// rlung dang me
386b6(rgyud 'bum): yi bdun don la/ / rdo rje ma yi sa bon sbyar// sgra dang thig les yang dag mnan// char pa'i rgyun zhes bya bar brjod// dbyangs yig dang po mchog sa bon// de yi dbus su gzung bar bya// dngos dang dngos
386b7(rgyud 'bum): med las grol ba/ / de phyir rmongs las ring du 'gyur// ka li me tog kun tu mnan// rdo rje can gyi lus me tog/ 'khor ba thams cad bskyed pa ste// sa dang kun gyi ma zhes bya// ye shes chu yi rgya mtsho
387a1(rgyud 'bum): 'dir/ / de bzhin gshegs rab chu srin nya// gnyis med 'dab kyi 'bras bu ni// thabs kyi myu gu de bzhin te// ban du ka ltar kha phye ba// sbrang rtsi bdud rtsi yi ni gnas// ka li bdu
387a2(rgyud 'bum): rtsi'i de nyid ni/ / me tog chu yis de bzhin bskor// yi ge gnyis 'gyur thig le dang // rtsa bar sgra ni yang dag sbyar// yi ge'i sa bon de nyid ni// lha rnams kyi ni rigs kyi yum// zla ba'i dbus su bsam par bya//
387a3(rgyud 'bum): bdud rtsi'i sa bon bsgoms pa yis// dngos dang dngos med las grol ba// de phyir rmongs pa kun tu spong // a li bung ba zhes byar brjod// ka li de bzhin gshegs ma yin// lus gnyis po las skyes pa/
387a4(rgyud 'bum): / dag/ bdud rtsi yi ni cho ga mchog/ sde tshan gsum pa gang yin pa'i// yi ge gsum pa gzung bya ba// dbyug pa phyi mo rdo rje can// ska bo tsha yis dkri bar bya// bdud rtsi lnga yi de nyid kyis// lus can bdag nyid bkru
387a5(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par dang // gang gis shes 'gyur 'chi mi 'gyur// 'gro ba'i sgo ni mthong 'gyur zhing // dag pa'i lus ni skyon med par// bdud rtsi'i sbyor ba kun shes pas// rang dgar bdud rtsi
387a6(rgyud 'bum): myang bar bya/ / bza' ba lnga yi bye brag gi/ de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjer nyon// gang zhig shes nas zos pa yis// myur du 'gro ba mthong bar 'gyur// blo chen dang ni ngag dang ni// rigs la 'gran dang reg 'gro dang // lcags
387a7(rgyud 'bum): chu chen po rnal 'byor pas/ / shel dang 'dra bas longs spyod bya// rnam shes sa bon bzlas nas ni// de yis sa bon gzung bar bya// shal gyis sems kyi longs spyod na// rnal 'byor rmongs pa gcod par 'gyur//
387b1(rgyud 'bum): dag pa'i sems kyis bza' bar bya// bgegs kyi lcags kyu gcig yin te// de yi yan lag la sbyar ba// hUM zhes bya ba'i sa bon gyis// lcags kyu ru ni sbyar bar bya// gnas kyi bdag po'i lcags kyu ni// gri zhes/
387b2(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i sa bon nyid// rab tu sbyar nas bsams nas su// rnam par rtog pa ring du spang // rta yi lcags kyu'i dbus gnas pa// thams cad rig pas dgod bya ba// rnal 'byor pa yi dzo zhes pa// dag pa'i shel ltar
387b3(rgyud 'bum): bsam par bya/ / rdo rje lcags kyu byin brlabs pas// rdo rje'i lus su brjod pa ste// srid ces bya ba bkod de bza'// rnal 'byor pa rnams sdig 'byang ngo // bcu bzhi dang ni bco lnga dang // khyad par du ni tshes brgyad la/
387b4(rgyud 'bum): dngos grub 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas// rab tu 'bad de gtor ma sbyin// sgrub pos rnal 'byor bstan bcos la// rtag tu mchod pa'i las byas na// spyod dang grol ba gang 'dod dang // las rnams thams cad 'grub par
387b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rgyal po'i pho brang 'gro na yang // myur du dpal dang ldan par 'gyur// mdza' bo sdug cing yid 'ong bar// mthong ba tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// dbul po nor gyis 'phongs pa yang // khyim ni 'byor
387b6(rgyud 'bum): zhing rgyas par 'gyur/ / 'chi ba'i tshe na rnal 'byor pa// bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur// dri zhim dang ni sbyar ba yi// rdzas bcu po dag ldan pa la// yi ge bcu yi sngags dang ni// phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mtha'
387b7(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan/ / rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum bzlas te// mkha' 'gro gtor ma'i byin rlabs la// sgrub pos 'di yi du bas bdug/ 'gro ba thams cad rmongs par 'gyur// gur kum dang ni sbyar ba yi// rdzas bcud
388a1(rgyud 'bum): phan tshun ldan pa yi/ / rnal 'byor pa yis thig le bya// skyes bu 'grol skal bzang 'gyur// tsan dan dang ni sbyar ba yi// rdzas bcud dag ni ldan pa yis// yan lag dag ni byugs na//
388a2(rgyud 'bum): su/ reg na shi yang mi gtong ngo // dbang po lag dang sbyar ba yi// rdzas bcu dag dang ldan pa ru// bza' dang btung bar sbyin byas na// dbang med dbang du 'du bar 'gyur// sngags ni lan 'bum bzlas
388a3(rgyud 'bum): nas kyang / / mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin brlabs nas// de dag las su sbyar bar bya// ngas bstan pa la the tshom med// gnyis med dang dpon gnas su ni// thog le byas na go char 'gyur// de nyid theg pa'i
388a4(rgyud 'bum): snying po 'dir/ / 'khor ba las ni rgyal bar 'gyur// bdud rtsi 'od dang skal bzang ma// sems can rnams la sdug par lnga// bde sdug dag ni 'phrog byed ma// de bzhin skrag pa'i nyams kyis mdzes//
388a5(rgyud 'bum): thun mong nga rgyal bdag 'dzin ma// mi brtson ma dang brtson sems can// skal bzang lha kun rmongs byed ma// kun nas 'joms pa nyid dang ni// blo ngan sred pa'i ngo bo 'joms// lha mo byams ma nyid dang /
388a6(rgyud 'bum): niyid 'ong bdud rtsi ldan grag ma// yon tan ldan pa'i lha mo nyid// lha mo 'di dag las kyis ni// spyod dang grol ba'i 'dod pa stsol// de ltar yon tan ldan lha mo// mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya// phonya
388a7(rgyud 'bum): las kyis bya ba yin/ / grub pa'i rnal 'byor don gyi phyir// rnal 'byor ma bzhi'i sgrub thabs ni// bcom ldan 'das las nyan par 'tshal// pho nya'i lus su sbyar ba yis// de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon// las
388b1(rgyud 'bum): rnams kun gyi snying po bas/ / rab tu 'bad de pho nya sgrub// shing gcig gi ni drung ba ru// cho ga bzhin du 'bum du bzlas// khru gang bzhi char bcas pa yi// thang ka la ni bre bya ste// mtheb sor bcu gnyis
388b2(rgyud 'bum): tshad du ni/ / kha dog ser po shin tu mdzes// phyag gnyis mgo bor thal sbyar ba'i// 'od zer me 'bar lha mo bri// sgrub pa'i mdun du bkram nas su// 'bad de mchod pa'i cho ga brtsam// dri dang me tog dmar
388b3(rgyud 'bum): po dang / / sha skam gyis ni bdug par bya// sha dang nya sha btsong la sogs// nye bar spyad pa'i gtor ma sbyin// rdzas lnga dang ni dngos po lnga// mchod nas de bzhin pa bum du bzlas// dang po la ni sgra 'byung ste/
388b4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa la ni nya dri mnam// gsum par shing ni 'gul 'gyur te// bzhi pa la ni mdun du gnas// de yi sngags ni brjod nas kyang // dam tshig phyag rgya bstan par bya// oM dI pai shwa ri hUM phu// lag
388b5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis thal mo sbyar nas su/ / spyi bor bzhag ste brjod par bya// dam tshig gi sngags dang phyag rgya'o// bdud rtsi lnga yis bkang ba yi// dam tshig chu ni sbyin par bya// 'bad de dam tshig byin nas ni//
388b6(rgyud 'bum): lag pa g.yon pas bzung nas su// rnal 'byor ma dang gnyis med par// byin gyis brlabs la bdag sgrubs shig/ de nas rang gi gzugs bzung nas// bza' dang btung sogs ston mo dang /
388b7(rgyud 'bum): gser la sogs pa ci yang rung // bka' bzhin myur du ster bar 'gyur// thun phyed du ni lhan cig spyad// 'khrig la sred pa'i rnal 'byor la// gal te grub par ma gyur na// de tshe drag mo'i sa bon bzla//
389a1(rgyud 'bum): sa bon gnyis ni gzir tsam gyis// 'bar byed ma yi spyi bo gems// sems can don 'bang sgrub pa pos// 'bar ba chung mar bsgrub par bya// grub pa'i mkha' 'gro ma gzhan gyi//
389a2(rgyud 'bum): de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon// thang ka khru gnyis dman pa la// mchod dang gtor ma byin brlabs te// de 'og gzugs ni bri bar bya// dkar zhing dmar la shin tu mdzes// phyag gnyis rol pa'i stabs kyis
389a3(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs/ / shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' gsol// phyag na sdigs mdzub lcags kyu bsnams// skra grol bas ni rnam par brgyan// 'od zer me ltar 'bar zhing gsal// mig g.yon ha ha ra bzhad pa bri// dur
389a4(rgyud 'bum): khrod kyi ni sa phyogs su/ / sgrub pa po yis bris sku dgram// kun tu khrag gis byugs nas ni// me tog dmar la sogs pas mchod// me tog dri dang bdug pa dang // sha dang nya sha btsong la sogs// bdud
389a5(rgyud 'bum): rtsi lnga yis bkang ba yi/ / nye bar spyod pa'i gtor sbyin cing // rnal 'byor sgom pas bzlas nas ni// 'bum gyis dngos grub skye bar 'gyur// lag gnyis thal mo bcings nas su// kha ru bcug/
