389a6(rgyud 'bum): ste bgad par bya// oM DA ki nI hUM phu phu/ sgrub pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// dang po sa ni g.yo bar 'gyur// gnyis pa mdun du god rgyangs sgrog/ gsum pa mdun du snang gyur nas// bzhi pa la ni bka'
389a7(rgyud 'bum): lung nod/ / bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyi// dam tshig 'bad de byin nas ni// g.yog mo ru ni sgrub pa yis// ci 'dod bka' ni bsgo bar bya// dgra rnams gsad cing rtse ba dang // yan lag gzir ba gang
389b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pa'i/ / las la sogs pa thams cad ni// g.yog mo'i las kyis bsgrub par bya// gal te 'bum gyis gdon za na// rdo rje ma yi sa bon gyis// sngon du bstan pa'i cho ga bzhin// mkhas pas
389b2(rgyud 'bum): gzir bar byas te bzla/ / ra dag gi ni pags pa la// 'bad de thang ka brkyang bar bya// 'jib byed ma de bri ru gzhug/ kha dog dmar po shin tu mdzes// lus la rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang // mdzes pa'i
389b3(rgyud 'bum): gos ni gyon pa bri/ / g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang // g.yas su dgra sta dgod par bya// lam gyi bzhi mdo yid 'ong bar// mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub bya ste// lci ba yis ni byugs byas la// me
389b4(rgyud 'bum): tog sna tshogs dgram par bya/ / me tog bdug pa mar me sogs// 'byung po kun gyi gtor mo sbyin// khrag dang nya dang sha dang btsong // bza' ba dag dang sna tshogs dang // bdud rtsi lnga yis dgang ba sbyin//
389b5(rgyud 'bum): 'bad de gnas pas 'bum gcig bzla// oM tsu Shi Ni A kaR+Sha ya phu phaT/ lag gnyis mnyam par byas nas ni// snyim pa'i tshul gyis gar bskyed bya// snying po'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o// rnal 'byor
389b6(rgyud 'bum): pa yis 'bum bzlas pas/ / 'jib byed ma ni 'grub 'gyur te// dang po khyi mi drar ba'i sgra// gnyis pa la ni gsal bar dgod// gsum pa la ni mtshon thogs nas// bsdigs pa'i phyir ni 'ong
389b7(rgyud 'bum): bar byed/ / bzhi par mdun du gnas nas ni// bdag gis ci bgyi bka' stsol smra// bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyis// dam tshig dag ni byin nas su// sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// dbul po dag
390a1(rgyud 'bum): gis khyod bsgrubs so/ / de nas nyi ma re re zhing // gser srang phyed phyed ster bar 'gyur// gal te 'bum gyis ma grub na// ro langs snying po gzir te bzla// sa bon 'di yis gzir
390a2(rgyud 'bum): tsam gyis/ / 'jib byed ma yi mgo 'gems so// chu 'gram gyi ni sa phyogs su// kam po tsi ni bsgrub par bya// ba lang la sogs ko ba ni// brgyang ste 'phrog byed 'dri ru gzhug/ lus ni sbrul gyis brgyan
390a3(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ dzakha dog sngon po 'bar ba'i 'od// skra grol bas ni rnam par brgyan// gos dmar bgos shing phyag gnyis mdzes// ral gri dang ni zhags pa thogs// ha ha bzhad cing rnam gtsigs pa// khrag gis
390a4(rgyud 'bum): maN+Dal byugs nas ni/ / dri dang me tog bdug pas bdug/ rgyas pa'i gtor ma sbyin par bya// sha dang nya dang btsong la sogs// nye bar spyod pa'i gtor ma sbyin// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yi// sngon
390a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin lha yi gtor ma sbyin/ / rnal 'byor pa ni sgom zhing bzlas// 'bum gcig gis ni 'grub 'gyur te// dang po chu ni g.yo bar 'gyur// gnyis pa la ni char chen 'bebs// gsum par thog ni
390a6(rgyud 'bum): 'bab 'gyur te/ / bzhi pa la ni mdun du gnas// bdud rtsi lnga yi khyad par gyis// dam tshig de nas 'bad de sbyin// oM k+ShA kruM hUM phu phaT/ lag gnyis khu tshur bcings nas su// de yi sngags ni
390a7(rgyud 'bum): brjod par bya/ / snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o// mdun na thal mo sbyar bas ni// ci zhig bgyi zhes brjod par 'gyur// ti saM gangs kyi rtse ru ni// rtsa phyir khyod kyis nga khrid la// slar yang 'dir ni 'ong ba
390b1(rgyud 'bum): dang / rgyal po'i bu mo 'am gzhan yang rung // nga 'dod pa de khrid de shog/ gser dang dngul dang zangs la sogs// bza' dang btung dang bgo ba ni// ji ltar 'dod bzhin khyer te 'ong // lha mi'i
390b2(rgyud 'bum): chung ma gang yang rung / / ti se gangs kyi rtse ru ni// ji ltar 'dod bzhin 'khrid par byed// bstan pa'i las kyis ma grub na// las gzhan gyi ni bsgrub par bya// bdag nyid ye shes mkha' 'gro ma//
390b3(rgyud 'bum): mkhas pa yis ni bsgoms nas su// de yi rkang pa g.yon pa yis// mnan te lnga brgya bzlas na ni// gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// gal te des kyang ma grub na// dpa' bo'i dbus su bkug
390b4(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / dum bu dum bur gtub par bya// kri zhes bya dang gsod pa mtha'// hUM gi sa bon bsgoms pa yis// thams cad du ni bza' bar bsam// des ni bsgrub bya'i rnal 'byor ma// thams cad kyi
390b5(rgyud 'bum): ni dbang phyug ma'ang / / gal te ma grub 'chi bar 'gyur// bstan pa'i las kyis ma grub na// b+ha la ta ka nag po'i shing // me 'bar ba yi dbus su ni// khrag dang bcas pa'i yungs kar ni// nyi phyed na/
390b6(rgyud 'bum): hUM zhes pa ni// brjod cing brgya rtsa brgyad bsregs na// mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'chi 'gyur ram// cho nges 'debs shing 'ongs nas su// nges par las rnams sgrub par byed// ngas bstan pa la the tshom med//
390b7(rgyud 'bum): khri bo sngon po mdzes pa ste// khyod ni dam tshig yid du bong // nor bu rin chen ches bcings pa'i// dbyug pa phyag na bsnams pa ste// bdag ni 'khor ba las spel phyir// dpa' bos gnang gis btang du
391a1(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ / rnal 'byor ma yi tshogs dbus su// bzang po sgo ba di phye ste thong // rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma gsang che// gsang dang gsang bas shes bya ba// ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni//
391a2(rgyud 'bum): bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal// ngag gi phyag rgya'i mtshan nyid ni// de nyid ji bzhin rdo rje nyon// g.yas kyi cha ru rnal 'byor pa// g.yon du rnal 'byor ma nyid de// sor mo khar ni 'jug byed pa//
391a3(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro ma yi mtshan ma'o// thal mo spyi bor 'jog byed pa// g+ho g+ha/ 'bar byed ma yi mtshan ma yin// ga g+ha/ mthe bong 'tshir bar byed pa yi// 'jib byed ma yi mtshan ma'o// mu g+hu/ lag pa rna
391a4(rgyud 'bum): bar rdeb pa ni/ / blo ldan 'phrog byed rtags yin no// lu swa sU/ sna rtser sbyor mo rngab pa ni// thugs bde mi bde 'dri ba yin// DaSh+Ta/ sha ba'i mgo ltar stong byed pa// rnal 'byor byed pa'i mtshan ma'o//
391a5(rgyud 'bum): / g+han+d+ho daM/ gang zhig smin ma dbus reg pa// nga yi snying sdug grogs po'o// a li ni da ha/ so yis lce ni 'tshar byed pa// lus nang gtor ma bza' zhes pa'o// b+hak+Sha so/ lag pa skra la ba ju byed pa//
391a6(rgyud 'bum): khyod kyi khyim du ngas phyin pa'o// dwe ra ti/ lag pa snying kar reg byed na// da nI nga yi yid 'ong ba'o// ru tsa pa ta pa/ sna rtser khu tshur 'chang ba ni// med do zhes ni ston pa'o// shu na ta/ lag pa brkyang
391a7(rgyud 'bum): ste lhor rdeb na/ / phun sum ldan par yod ces pa'o// kri ka ha/ lte ba ru ni nyed byed na// kha zas bza' bar 'dod pa'o// tsan+da lig/ mdzub mo mdun du ston byed na// nye gnag gtum la drag
391b1(rgyud 'bum): pa yin/ / ni la tan+ta ba ta/ smin ma la ni reg byed na// 'dir 'dod pa ni nga ltar ston// a na ma ga yud/ lce ni 'dril bar byed pa dag/ da lta 'chi zhes bya ba'o// dur ka ti/ kun tu lta bar byed pa ni//
391b2(rgyud 'bum): tshes grangs shes par 'dod pa'o// ha ra ga na/ tshes gcig nas ni brtsams nas su// mthe bos ri mo bri bar bya// nyi tshed yi ge la sogs pa// sngar bstan pa bzhin mdun du reg/ gi ti to/ steng du lta
391b3(rgyud 'bum): bar byed pa ni/ / nyin phyed dga' bar rol pa'o// sa ma tsha ya/ 'jug dang bcas pas lta byed cing // lag pas lag pa bzung nas su// rgya mtsho lta bur ston byed pa// nor bzang byin zhes bya ba'o//
391b4(rgyud 'bum): dzi na ba ta/ lag gnyis khu tshur 'chang byed na// sap+ta pa ta/ mthe bong gis ni srin lag la// reg pa 'chi bar mi 'gyur ro// so ma/ mthe bong khro bo bza' la sogs// sa ru bad/ rnal 'byor pa dang
391b5(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma rnams kyi dga' ba la rol pa'i ngag gi phyag rgya dang brda'i mtshan nyid do/ / gzhan gyi gdan zhes bya ba'i rab tu byed pa bzhi pa'o// // mtshon bya'i mtshan nyid gzhan
391b6(rgyud 'bum): dag ni/ / bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal// de nyid bzhi po ji lta bu// shes nas ji ltar sbyar bar bgyi// 'khor ba las sgrol mtshan nyid ni// yang dag ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon// dang po de nyid rdo rjes ni//
391b7(rgyud 'bum): dril bu yang ni gnyis pa'o// bgrang ba'i 'phreng ba gsum pa ste// ye shes mtshan nyid bzhi pa'o// de nyid bzhi yi rba rlabs kyis// ji ltar 'dod bzhin pha rol rgol// dbus kyi lha ni rnam snang mdzad//
392a1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad thog mar mi bskyod pa// lho yi rtse mor rin chen 'byung // nub tu snang ba mtha' yas dgod// byang gi phyogs su don yod grub// rtse mo lnga ni lha rnams so// pad+ma byang
392a2(rgyud 'bum): chub yan lag brgyad/ / ji bzhin sa ru gzhag par bya// phyag na pad+ma byams pa dang // nam mkha' dang ni kun tu bzang // gnod sbyin bdag dang gzhan gyi dpal// sgrib pa rnam par sel ba dang // lha ni brgyad po
392a3(rgyud 'bum): 'di dag nyid/ / shar la sogs par ji bzhin bsam// dbus kyi bcu gsum sgo nga ru// ye shes lnga ni thim par bya// pad+ma brgyad pa lha mo brgyad// ji bzhin gnas su sbyar bar bya// rdo rje ljags kyu de bzhin du//
392a4(rgyud 'bum): zhags pa lcags sgrog sgrol ma ste// de ltar lha mo bzhi po dag/ de bzhin phyogs bzhir rol pa yin// mtshams kyi cha ni rnam pa bzhir// mkhas pa yis ni bsam bya ba// skul byed rin chen sgrol ma dang // rdo
392a5(rgyud 'bum): rje lcags sgrog ming can de/ / gzhan gyis mi thub ces bya ste// mtshams kyi 'dab ma kun la dgod// rtse mo lnga ni mkha' 'gro ma// snga ma ji bzhin bsam par bya// shar du rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma// byang du drag
392a6(rgyud 'bum): mo zhes bya ste/ / nub tu de bzhin ro langs ma// lho yi phyogs su gtum mo gnas// dbus su ye shes mkha' 'gro ma// rdo rje de kho na yi lha// mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya// cha gsum gsal bar bzung
392a7(rgyud 'bum): bal/ / ska rags kyis ni shin tu brgyan// ut+pal ku mu da ltar mdzes// rin chen pad+ma yang dag gnas// phyogs la sogs pa brgyad dang ni// dbus ma'i sangs rgyas nyid dang dgu// rtse mo'i dgu yi lha nyid do//
392b1(rgyud 'bum): lha dgu yi ni byin gyis brlabs// chu srin las ni byung ba yi// rtse mo'i 'od zer bzlas par gnas// rtse mo dgu pa zhes bya ba// ye shes rdo rje 'gro ba sgrol// rdo rje'i de nyid gang yin pas// bdag nyid rdo rje'i
392b2(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid bsam/ / rdo rje'i snying po'i rnal 'byor pa// rdo rje yi ni sems su bya// rdo rje dag pas brtan byas nas// chos rnams rdo rje las gzhan med// thams cad rdo rje de nyid yin// rdo rje'i las kyi snying po yi//
392b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'phro ba sbyor ba'i bdag/ rdo rje 'khor ba sgrol bar byed// rdo rje 'gug pa sbyor ba'i bdag/ rdo rje bcing ba'i sbyor bar ldan// bdun pa de bzhin nyon mongs ldan// rnam shes bcas pa'i sgron ma ni//
392b4(rgyud 'bum): ye shes rdo rje bcom nas su// phyogs kun tu ni snang bar byed// rdo rje'i sgrub pa la sogs kun// rdo rje'i bdag nyid blta bar bya// chos kyis 'ching ba rdo rje ste// thar pa mchog 'bad rdo rje'o//
392b5(rgyud 'bum): / rdo rje pad+ma bzung nas su// de nyid thams cad bsgrub par bya// rdo rje pad+mor zhugs pa ni// mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// dril bu yi ni mtshan nyid rnams// nyon cig rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// shes
392b6(rgyud 'bum): rab sgra yi de nyid ni/ / thos pas srid pa las sgrol ba'i// nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gtugs pa// byang chub snying por rnam par gnas// thams cad rig pas phyogs kun tu// gnas pa'i
392b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jig rten khams mthar thug/ phyogs brgyad ces ni bya ba rnams// lha mo brgyad du rab tu grags// yi ge brgyad kyi sa bon ni// phyogs brgyad du ni dgod par bya// shar du lha mo sgrol ma ste// byang gi
393a1(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su gos dkar mo/ / nub kyi phyogs su mA ma kI/ lho yi phyogs su sangs rgyas spyan// mdog bzang dbyangs snyan mdzes pa dang // bzhi pa rdo rje 'phreng ba mo// dbus su nam
393a2(rgyud 'bum): mkha'i rang bzhin la/ / gzugs kun rdzogs shing shin tu mdzes// pad+ma rgyas la yang dag 'byung // gzugs med gnas kyi phyogs su ni// shes rab bdud rtsi bum pa 'dra// shes rab bdud rtsi gnas dug
393a3(rgyud 'bum): la/ de yi dbus kyi stan dag la// shes rab pha rol phyin lha mo// gzugs mdzes yon tan rnams kyi gnas// steng gi pad+ma rdo rje rnams// snga ma bzhin du bsam par bya// dbus kyi ye shes dbyug pa ste/
393a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad spro dang sdud pa po'o// a li ka li'i rab sbyor gyis// phyogs brgyad du ni bskyod par bya// a li ka li'i rab sbyor bas// 'khor ba thams cad gcod pa ste// rdo rje dril bu'i thabs yin te/

393a6(rgyud 'bum): dang sbyar/ / rang 'dod lha rnams bsam par bya// rdo rje gsor bas sgrol ba ste// 'khor ba sgrol ba yang dag byung // hUM zhes bya ba'i glu yis ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rjes chags bya// rdo rje gsor
393a7(rgyud 'bum): ba mdzes pa yis/ / sems can thams cad mdzes par bya// rnam thar chos su bya ba ste// rdo rje shin tu snying po mchog/ oM badz+ra g+haN+Te tsi hUM/ oM badz+ra g+haN+Te ra ni ta pra ra Ni ta saM pra ra Ni ta sarba bud+d+ha k+She tra pra tsa
393b1(rgyud 'bum): li lite/ pradz+nyA pa ra mi tA nA da sA b+hA be badz+ra d+harma hr-i da ya a ba san+to Shi hUM hUM hUM/ ho ho ho/ a a a swA hA/ shes rab thabs kyi gzugs brnyan gyis// shes rab thabs kyis dkrol bar bya// shes rab
393b2(rgyud 'bum): thabs kyi chos kyis ni/ / 'gre ba rnams kyis rtogs bya 'am// mi shes padam du bying ba yi// sems can don phyir dkrol bar bya// rdo rje de kho na yis gzung // chos kyi dril bu dkrol bar bya//
393b3(rgyud 'bum): sems can don byed rnal 'byor pas// shes rab thabs su blta bar bya// de nyid med pa'i rnal 'byor pa// glang chen dril bu sgra dang mtshungs// rnal 'byor de nyid dman pa yi// dngos grub ring
393b4(rgyud 'bum): bar shes par bya/ / de nas gsang dang phra ba yi// rdo rje'i mtshan nyid gzung ba ste// yang dag cho ga gang gis ni// 'dod pa'i dngos grub sgrub byed pa// dbus ma'i tshig ni bskor ba la// gsang ba'i
393b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje cha gsum bya/ / de nyid kyis ni cha gcig gi/ phra ba'i rdo rje rab tu brtag/ spyi gtsug lag pa la sogs pa// rtag tu dag byed khru tshur bcang // slob dpon rdo rje brtul zhugs 'dzin// 'dod don
393b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad sgrub pa'i mchog/ bgrang 'phreng la sogs gzung ba ni// yang dag ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon// yang dag cho ga gang gis ni// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med// shal dang nya phyis mu tig
393b7(rgyud 'bum): dang / gzhan yang nor bu dkar po sogs// zhi sogs las la khyad par gyis// bgrang 'phreng gi ni khyad nyid ni// gser dang dngul dang zangs ma dang // pad+ma'i sa bon khyad par du// rgyas pa yi ni
394a1(rgyud 'bum): bgrang 'phreng ste/ / mkhas pa rnams kyis bgrang bar bya// gur kum la sogs dri zhim pa'i// dri rnams kun gyi khyad par las// ril bur byas te dmar por btsos// dbang du
394a2(rgyud 'bum): sdud par rab tu grags/ / ru rag sha dang lung tang dang // mi yi rus pa de bzhin te// drag po'i las la sbyar bar bya// mngon spyod du ni rab tu grags// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang drag la// bo di tsi ni las kun byed//
394a3(rgyud 'bum): sngags sgrub pa la lnga bcu ste// dbang la de yi phyed du bya// zhi la brgya phrag gcig yin te// rgyas pa la ni brgyad lhag pa'o// mngon spyod la ni drug cu'o// las kyi bye brag gis ni sbyar// las kyi bye brag
394a4(rgyud 'bum): ji bzhin du/ / bgrang baphreng dag ni brtag par bya// phyogs dang phyogs mtshams brgyad du ni// dbus ma nyid dang sangs rgyas dgu// lha dgu yi ni skud pa la// lha dgu byin gyis brlab par bya// gzug
394a5(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs shin tu mdzes pa dang / / gtsang zhing dang ldan snyan par smra// de yis bkal ba'i bgrang 'phreng gis// grol ba'i dngos grub skye bar 'gyur// skud pa thams cad sangs rgyas tshul// ril bu rnams
394a6(rgyud 'bum): ni dgra bcom yin/ / 'og ma mchod rten du ni bstan// snang ma chos kyi dbyings yin no// mchod rten chos kyi dbang po'o// lag par nyi ma bsams nas su// dbyangs kyi dang po yi ge ni// lag pa yi
394a7(rgyud 'bum): ni dbus dag tu/ / dmar po la ni dmar po bsgom// g.yon pa zla ba'i dbus su ni// bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsam bya ba// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi// kha dog dkar po bsgom par bya// g.yas
394b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sor mo rdo rjer bsam/ / g.yon pa pad+ma'i bdab mar bsgom// rdo rje pad+ma sbyor ba yis// kha sbyor dbus su 'phreng bzhag la// de nyid thams cad bsgom pa yis// bgrang ba phreng byin gyis brlab par bya/
394b2(rgyud 'bum): sor mo dag gi bye brag gis// de nas sngags pas bzlas par bya// rdo rje mo dngos g.yon pa ste// g.yas pa rdo rje'i ngo bo'o// dkar po dud pa dung dang ni// pad+ma g.yas kyi sor mo ste// gi wang dri gsum 'jig
394b3(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / sa gdug g.yon par dgod pa dang // ye shes rnam shes mthe bong gnyis// lag la sogs pa'i las can ma// zhi ba la ni khro bos bgrang // rgyas pa la ni gung mo ste// srin lag la ni dbang
394b4(rgyud 'bum): du bstan/ / mtha' mar mngon par spyod pa ste// mthe bong rdo rje lcags kyu ni// lha nyid dgug pa'i bsam pa yin// mnyam par bzhag ste bzlas bsgom nu// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// de nyid
394b5(rgyud 'bum): med pa'i rnal 'byor pa/ / de nyid med pa'i sngags bzlas dang // de nyid med pa'i rdo rje dril// phyag rgya de nyid med 'byung ba// rnal 'byor ma yis grub pa med// rnal 'byor de nyid dmigs na ni// de nyid
394b6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad kun bya'o/ / yi ge'i rgyu las byung ba'i dngos// sngags kyi snying po mdzes pa ste// rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzlas na// rnal 'byor ma yi snying po grub// bram ze rgyal rigs dmangs rigs
394b7(rgyud 'bum): gcig/ rnal 'byor ma yi dra ba 'grub// oM pa de pa de ma hA pa de dz+nyA na sarba bud+d+ha ma hA b+hA be/ hUM hUM hUM/ ho ho ho/ a swA hA/ sngags 'di yis ni sbyang byas na// bgrang 'phreng gis ni lha rnams
395a1(rgyud 'bum): 'grub/ / las rnams thams cad 'grub 'gyur te// mi gsal ba ni ring bar 'gyur// ye shes de dag bye brag dag/ yang dag rdo rje chen pos nyon// ye shes bye brag ring du
395a2(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / thun mong ye shes brjod pa ste// dman dang rab dman dman pa can// gnod sbyin lha min grub pa po// klu dang byol song gsang ba pa// lto 'phye dang ni mi 'am ci// mi dang yi dgas mkha'
395a3(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ma/ / dmyal bar 'tshed pa'i sems can dang // byol song gzugs su brjod pa ste// phra mo sgo nga gzung mi nus// chu dang me dang rlung dang ni// de bzhin du ni sa yi khams// bstan pa la sogs
395a4(rgyud 'bum): thams cad dang / / rtswa dang 'dab ma phra ba dang // bong brdo dang brag la sogs// thams cad ye shes byin gyis brlabs// ye shes med na skye mi 'gyur// ye shes thams cad kun rig pa'o// ye
395a5(rgyud 'bum): shes thar bar gang gis ni/ / ye shes thun mong byin brlabs pa// bye brag gzhan ni ji lta bu// lha las rol mo nyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// nyi shu rtsa gsum lha
395a6(rgyud 'bum): yi gnas/ / gong nas gong du nyis 'gyur te// 'dod pa lnga yi ye shes dag/ gong ma'i ye shes ye shes 'phel// gsang ba'i ye shes reg pa ste// lha min ye shes khro bo'o// yi dgas ye shes
395a7(rgyud 'bum): zhan pa ste/ / dmyal ba'i ye shes 'jigs shing ngu// byol song ye shes glen pa ste// bstan pa rnams ni sems med pa'o// mi rnams ye shes rnam pa lnga// bye brag tu ni shes par bya// glen
395b1(rgyud 'bum): bas bsgribs dang lkugs pa dang / / bud med ye shes slu brid do// byis pa'i shes pa'i shes pa can// ye shes de nyid bye brag dag/ rnal 'byor bstan bcos kyis sbyangs pa// skye ba bye ba stong
395b2(rgyud 'bum): phrag tu/ / sangs rgyas ye shes kyis bskul yin// rnal 'byor bstan bcos rjes 'brangs nas// 'bad de dad pas bskyed par bya// sgra sgrogs phyi rol bstan bac+doMs ni// gar gyi gnas dang
395b3(rgyud 'bum): mtshungs pa ste/ / blo ldan rnal 'byor bstan bcos kyis// spyod dang grol ba'i 'bras bu thob// snying po snying po bstan bcos te// rnal 'byor gsang ba'i rim yin no// sbyor ba'i gdan gyi
395b4(rgyud 'bum): rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba dang po'o/ / // 'khor los sgrub pa'i khyad par dag/ de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang rnams dang // srung dang mngon
395b5(rgyud 'bum): par spyod pa dang / / re mig dgu sogs 'khor lo na// phyi rol mu khyud bskor bar bya// 'khor lo las kyi kha dog gis// mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya// oM tA re tut+tA re tu re swA hA/ sa bon
395b6(rgyud 'bum): de dag thams cad ni/ / phyogs mtshams tha ma dbus su bya// dbus su ming dang srung ba yi// tshig kyang de bzhin sbyar bar bya// mnyam nyid stong pa'i rang bzhin chus// bdag gi las ni bkru bar
395b7(rgyud 'bum): bya ramanyam nyid thams cad rig pas gnas/ / srung ba'i 'khor los bsrung bar bya// ye shes can gyis srung bsgom na// 'jig pa kun las ring bar 'gyur// sems can dngos po med pa ru//
396a1(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba'i dngos po 'jigs pa la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// pad+ma'i gdun ni bsam par bya// sgrol ma'i rgyud du bsgom pa yis// bdag gi lus ni rnam par sprul//
396a2(rgyud 'bum): / oM tA re swA hA/ mgo la'o// oM tut+tA re swA hA/ mig la'o// oM tu re swAhA/ sna la'o// oM n+ya swA hA/ rna ba la'o// oM r-I swA hA/ lce la'o// oM tA ra ni swA hA/ snying ka'o// yan lag drug tu rtag tu
396a3(rgyud 'bum): dgod/ / 'phags ma sgrol ma bsam bye ba// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis ni klubs// kun tu mi 'jigs sbyin pa dang // gzhan gyi snu ru ut+pal
396a4(rgyud 'bum): bsnams/ / thams cad 'od zer rnams bsgoms nas// khyad par du ni sngags bzlas bya// thams cad yon tan can du bsgom// oM tA ra tut+tA ra tu re swA hA/ srung ba'i las thams cad kyi sngags so//
396a5(rgyud 'bum): rgyal po'i btson ra dgra phyogs dang // nyam nga'i lam du 'gro ba dang // yan lag sna tshogs rims dang ni// chu dang dug gis 'chi la sogs// gang dang gang du 'jigs pa'i gnas// de dang der ni bsam
396a6(rgyud 'bum): pabar bya/ / shes rab zhan dang le lo sogs// 'khor lo bris nas bcang bar bya// bsrung ba bzang po 'di yis ni// 'jigs pa kun las grol bar 'gyur// srung ba 'di dag thams cad ni// de nyid sbyor
396a7(rgyud 'bum): babasgrub par bya/ / 'khor lo 'dab ma brgyad pa la// phyi rol mu khyud bskor nas su// dbus su thog ma tha ma ste// bzlas pa thams cad gzhag par bya// mu khyud dbyangs kyis bskor nas su// 'tsho
396b1(rgyud 'bum): lo dkar po bsam par bya/ / yan lag thams cad bye ba yis// mnyam nyid stong par bsams nas su// sngon gyi mtshan nyid ldan pa yis// sngar bstan bzhin du sbyar bar bya// 'khor lo 'di ltar bsgom
396b2(rgyud 'bum): pa yis/ / las 'dis shes rab 'bar bar 'gyur// oM pradz+nyA pradz+nyA ma hA pra dz+nyA swA hA/ 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba su// dngos po bsgoms pas bsgom par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus
396b3(rgyud 'bum): gnas par/ / shes rab dag nyid bsgoms nas su// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// kha dog dkar po shin tu 'bar// shes rab dngos
396b4(rgyud 'bum): po bsgoms nas su/ / sa bon 'di ni bzlas byas nas// shes rab myur du 'phel bar 'gyur// glen dang snyoms las blun po yang // sbyor ba 'di yis shes rab 'phel// snying po re mig dgu ru bya//
396b5(rgyud 'bum): de bzhin par ma bcu gnyis te// phyi rol re mig bcu drug go/ mthar thug mu khyud de bzhin te// phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mthar sbyar ba'i// dbus su bdag gi sems bzhag la// sgra dang thig le ldan pa yi//
396b6(rgyud 'bum): yi ge brgyad po snying por dgod// bcu gnyis pa la dbyangs sa bon// ma ning spangs pa bri bar bya// sde tshan gsum gyi yi ge rnams// yi ge lhag pa gcig dang bcas// sgra dang thig ler ldan pa dag/
396b7(rgyud 'bum): bcu drug gnas su gzhag par bya// gsod pa'i yi gau mu khyud la// thams cad rig pas kun tu bskor// dang po dkar por bsam bya ste// gnyis pa ser po bsgom par bya// gsum pa dag ni
397a1(rgyud 'bum): dmar po ste/ / de bzhin bzhi pa sngon po'o// sngon bzhin mtshan nyid ldan pa yis// mnyam nyid spong bar yang dag gnas// mnyam nyid lta ba bskyed nas su// 'khor lo 'di ni
397a2(rgyud 'bum): bsgom par bya/ / mnyam gzhag dngos po bsgom pa yi// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// kun nas thams cad 'bar ba ste// me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od kyis ni// bdud rnams thams cad sreg par byed/
397a3(rgyud 'bum): ye shes 'khor lo bsgoms pa yis// kun nas nyon mongs g.yogs pa yang // sangs rgyas 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// mnyam nyid ye shes bskyed nas su// bdag nyid nam mkha' bsgoms byas
397a4(rgyud 'bum): la/ 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de yi dbus su sa bon ni// mkhas pa yis ni gzung bya ste// sde tshan dang po gang yin pa'i// yi ge dang po bzung nas su//
397a5(rgyud 'bum): ljalcags kyu yis ni gzir bya ba// rtsa bar re pa sbyar bya ba// bdud rtsi'i thig le stang du dgod// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// 'od zer sna tshogs 'phro ba ni// shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas
397a6(rgyud 'bum): bsgom/ / rgyal po rgyal po'i pho brang dang // yid can gyis ni bsam par bya// yi ge gnyis 'gyur thig pa dang // rtsa bar sgra ni sbyar bar bya// bdud rtsi'i mtha' zhes bya ba ste// 'bum phrag gcig
397a7(rgyud 'bum): gis dbang du sdung / / bu mo rnams kyis gang bsam pa// ming dang bcas nas bsgrubs nas ni// bsam pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// ngas bstan pa la the tsom med// sngon gyi mtshan nyid thams cad mi/
397b1(rgyud 'bum): sngar bzhin du ni bstan pa nyid// thams cad bdag nyid bsams nas su// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// bdud rtsi kun rig phyi mo bcas// 'od zer sna tshogs rnam par 'phro// 'od zer ser
397b2(rgyud 'bum): po shin tu mdzes/ / gzugs sdug 'od zer 'phro bar bsams// rin chen la sogs gang 'dod pa// thams cad rang gi dbugs kyis dgug/ sgrub pa po yi lus la ni// de yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas
397b3(rgyud 'bum): par/ / rlung gi sa bon gyis bskor ba'i// lcags kyu'i yi ge bsgom par bya// kha dog la sogs dmar bsam zhing // gzugs kyang kha dog dmar por bsgom// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas
397b4(rgyud 'bum): par/ / ye shes mkha' 'gro bsgom par bya// gzugs mdzes shin tu rdzogs pa ste// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// g.yon pa lcags kyu'i tshul gyis ni// yid ni 'gug pa bsgom par bya//
397b5(rgyud 'bum): lcags kyu'i yi ge bsgom pa yis// mdzub mo lcags kyu bskyod par bya// yi ge gnyis 'gyur thig pa dang // rtsa bar sgra ni sbyar bar bya// bdud rtsi'i mtha' zhes bya ba ste// 'bum phrag gcig gis dbang du
397b6(rgyud 'bum): 'grub/ / de ltar sgom zhing bzlas nas su// sor mo yang ni bskod byas nas// bsgrub bya'i yid ni bskyod 'gyur bar// 'bum phrag gcig gis 'grub par 'gyur// 'khor lo 'dab ma med pa la// mu khyud kyis
397b7(rgyud 'bum): ni bskor bar bya/ / dbyangs kyi yi ge thams cad kyis// mu khyud mkhas par bskor bar bya// sde tshan lnga pa gang yin pa// yi ge gsum pa bzung nas su// i dang re pa sbyar nas su// 'bad pas dbus su
398a1(rgyud 'bum): bzhag nas bya/ / ye shes can gyi sa bon 'di// sgra yig bdun pa dang sbyar la// 'dab ma rnams la'ang de nyid bya// 'dab mar 'di nyid gzhag par bya// rnal 'byor ma yi grub
398a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dod pas/ / 'od zer sna tshogs rab 'bar bas// gser gyi mdog tu bsgom par bya// sngon bzhin mtshan nyid ldan pa ru// sngar bstan shin tu mkhas pas bsgom// de 'og lha mo nor rgyun gyi//
398a3(rgyud 'bum): gzugs su bdag nyid bskyod par bya// gzugs mdzes shin tu yongs su rdzog// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// thams cad lag g.yas mi 'jigs sbyin// g.yon pa 'bras kyi sku
398a4(rgyud 'bum): ma bsnams/ / dbus su bstan pa'i sa bon ni// phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mtha' sbyar te// de ltar bsgoms shing bzlas pa yis// rgyas pa'i sbyor ba 'grub par 'gyur// lha mo nor ldan rnal 'byor
398a5(rgyud 'bum): gyis/ / rgyas pa ru ni grags pa yin// bdag nyid bye brag gzhan dag tu// rnam gzhag thams cad de bzhin no// bdag nyid sngon gyi mtshan nyid kyis// stong pa'i de bzhin bsgoms nas su//
398a6(rgyud 'bum): ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sa yi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ye shes rnam shes dngos po bsgom// 'dab ma brgyad pa'i 'khor lor ni//
398a7(rgyud 'bum): dbus su sa bon bsgoms nas mi// phyi rol 'khor lo'i mu khyud la// dbyangs kyi sa bon bskor bar bya// phyogs kyi 'dab mar bdud rtsi bzhi// gug skyed kun dang sbyar bar bya// mtshams kyi
398b1(rgyud 'bum): 'dab ma bzhi la yang / / sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon par brgyan// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa ni// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba can// rin chen bdun gyis mdzes pa ste// rang gi lus la
398b2(rgyud 'bum): bsgom par bya/ / gang 'dod yid ni rtog bya'i phyir// de yi 'od zer sbyar bar bya// 'jigs pa med cing ba tshe med pas// dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya// rmugs dang glen dang snyoms las dang //
398b3(rgyud 'bum): shes rab zhan cing lha ngan rnams// rnal 'byor pa yis skad cig la// snyoms las la sogs ring du spong // mnyam gzhag cung zad bltas nas su// rdul phran dkar po spro bar bya// phyogs
398b4(rgyud 'bum): bcur song ste khyab nas ni/ / thams cad rim pas kun snang bya// ye shes sems la bltas nas ni// rnal 'byor pha rol sems shes 'gyur// sems ni mnyam par bcings nas su//
398b5(rgyud 'bum): mnyam bzhag 'khor lor blta bar bya// mnyam nyid ye shes mthong ba yis// 'khor ba'i pha rol sgrol bar 'gyur// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ye shes sa bon gyis bsrungs pa/
398b6(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa yi// kha dog dkar po bsgom par bya// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas// rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs pa ste// phyag gnyis phyag rgya che bcings nas/
398b7(rgyud 'bum): snyi ka'i phyogs su 'tshor bar mdzad// kha dog dkar po mdzes pa yi// 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad gtso// sangs rgyas sprin ni rnam par spro// spob sna tshogs mi zad pas// sems can khams ni tshul
399a1(rgyud 'bum): bar mdzad/ / shes rab rdo rjes 'gro sgrol ba// dbyangs yig dang po mchog sa bon// mtha' ru tsheg drag sbyar bar bya// phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mtha' dang ldan// sa bon 'di ni bsgom
399a2(rgyud 'bum): nas su/ / mnyam gzhag dngos pos bzlas nas ni// byang chub rim pa mthong bar 'gyur// sbyor ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o// // byin rlabs sbyor
399a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i ngo bo dag/ gang gis sems can rnams la bstan// byin rlabs rim pa ji lta bu// lha las gzigs mo nyan par 'tshal// sems can rmongs pa gso ba'i phyir// byin gyis rlob pa'i chos
399a4(rgyud 'bum): bstan pa/ / yang dag 'khor ba sgrol ba yi// de nyid ji bzhin rdo rje nyon// snying kar zla ba bsams nas su// hUM gi sa bon dbus su bsam// 'od zer me ltar 'bar zhing gsal// nyi ma'i dbus
399a5(rgyud 'bum): su gzhag par bya/ / phyogs bcu'i 'jigs rten khams rnams su// ma yi dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// gnas rnams thams cad 'bar ba yis// kun nas thams cad bsregs nas su// sngon
399a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin mtshan nyid bstan pa yi/ / dang po stong pa nyid du bya// me yi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas lnga ni bsam par bya// dbyug pa 'jig rten dbang phyug mgon// gya gru phyag na rdo rje ste//
399a7(rgyud 'bum): lus ni 'jam pa'i mchog yin no// mgo dang bum po byams pa ste// steng du 'bar ba'i ma yig ni// 'khor ba thams cad sgrol ba'o// 'jig rten gsum gyis grub 'don na// sa bon de ni bsgom par
399b1(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / pad+ma'i stan la gnas pa yi// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgoms nas su// ye shes mkha' 'gro'i rang bzhin du// bdag nyid ye shes kyis srung ba// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung can/
399b2(rgyud 'bum): kha dog dmar po shin tu mdzes// steng gi rdo rje cod pan la// sangs rgyas lnga yis rnam par brgyan// kha T+wAM ga dang rnal 'byor snod// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// 'od zer sna tshogs
399b3(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba ru/ / dbugs kyis g.yo bar bsgom par bya// sde tshan gsum pa gang yin pa'i// rdo rje dbyug pa gug skyed bcas// ska bo che la sogs pas dkri// phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mtha' dang
399b4(rgyud 'bum): ldan/ 'bum phrag gsum ni bzlas nas su// gnyis med gtor ba'i las kyis ni// de yi 'og tu las rnams bya// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa la// brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas par bya// cho gar ldan
399b5(rgyud 'bum): pas sbyin par bya/ / de yi mod la 'bab par 'gyur// babs nas rnal 'byor pa yis ni// rdo rje'i glu ni blang bar bya// rol cig rol cig rdo rje khyod// gzhan dang drag po sbyor ba yis// thams cad kun nas khyod kyis
399b6(rgyud 'bum): gsol/ / skad cig 'khor las bdag ma'am bsgral// glu 'di yis ni gar byed de// rdo rje dril bu dkrol bar bya// oM tiSh+Tha yo ga hA kro d+ha hUM hUM hUM swA hA/ 'di ni tshom bya thams cad bya// rnal 'byor ma kun bstan
399b7(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / dman dang bar dang mchog rnams la// de yi 'og tu chos bstan bya// oM yi ga A be sha ya/ shin tu mnyam bzhag rnal 'byor pas// 'di ni sngon du bsnyen par bya// gnyis med gtor ma ldan pa yis//
400a1(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pa yis yungs kar dang // hUM gi sgra ni 'jigs pa yis// sgrub pa po yis 'dis gdab bya// sngar gyi spros pa'i sngags kyis ni// bdag nyid ji ltar 'dod bzhin byed//
400a2(rgyud 'bum): / oM man g+hu ru g+hu ru/ d+h+waM sti tsi li tsi li hUM hUM phaT/ rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum bzlas na// bltas pas 'bebs pa 'grub par 'gyur// mchod cing gang la bltas pa yi// mthong bar byas te gar byed
400a3(rgyud 'bum): do/ oM ma la ma li hUM phaT/ 'bum phrag gsum gyis 'grub 'gyur te// 'gro ba thams cad 'bebs par 'gyur// oM ma hA tsi li tsau li hUM hUM phruM phaT/ 'bum phrag gcig ni bzlas pa yis// skyes
400a4(rgyud 'bum): sogs ring po nas kyang 'bebs/ / oM ba ta li ba ta li hUM phaT/ rnal 'byor 'bum phrag gsum du ni// bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen pa bya// yi dgas 'byung po gsang ba sogs// lha rnams thams cad
400a5(rgyud 'bum): 'bebs par 'gyur/ / oM pa ta ni pa ta ni hUM phaT/ rnal 'byor pa yis 'bum phrag gcig/ bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen pa bya/ chu dang bong ba rdo dang ni// shing rnams kun la 'bebs par byed// dkyil
400a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khor sngon du slob dpon gyis/ / sngon du bsnyen pa byas nas ni// shin tu dul zhing brdeg pa yis// de 'og dkyil 'khor de nyid bsam// lha ni mnyes par ma byas na// bdag nyid la ni tse 'dri yin//
400a7(rgyud 'bum): oM be ta li rak+Sha rak+Sha hUM hUM hUM phru phru phaT/ thal bar lan bdun bar du ni// mngon par bzlas te ro la gtor// nyin zhag bdun du bzhag na yang // cis kyang za bar mi 'gyur ro// oM phu ru phu ru/ ma~M tra
400b1(rgyud 'bum): dzaHhUM phu phaT/ skud pa dmar la brgyad brgya ru// yongs su bzlas dang ldan pa yis// gang gi mgrin par bcings gyur na// ce spyang bzhin du 'khyam par 'gyur// skud pa dang ni bral gyur na// bdag nyid 'dod
400b2(rgyud 'bum): pa bzhin du byed/ / byin rlabs rim pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// mnyam par bzhag pas sgom zhing bzlas// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje mkha' 'gro ma bsam bya// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i sku/
400b3(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer sna tshogs shin tu 'bar// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas bya// mngon du 'grub pa bya bar bsam// rkang mthil gnyis su rlung gi ni// sa bon stan du bsgom par bya// sgra dang thig ler ldan pa ni// rlung gi
400b4(rgyud 'bum): sa bon dbus gnas par/ / rlung gis bskor bar snying kar gzhag/ thams cad kha dog sngon por bsam// rang gi dbugs kyi rtse mo yi// rlung gi brda ru sbyar bar bya// oM yuM pre ta bA yu a mo ka s+ya yuM phaT/ rnal
400b5(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pa yis gsang sngags 'di/ / brgyad brgyar bzlas nas 'grub par gyur// 'gro ba la sogs bzung nas su// dug dang khrag gis bri bar bya// rnal 'byor mchog ni bzung nas su// thams cad gnas
400b6(rgyud 'bum): nas bri bar bya/ / brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas pa yi// skud pa dmar pos dkris nas ni// shing gi rtse mor gdags par bya// rlung gis spur bar sgom pa ste// gang du rlung ni bzhon 'gyur ba// de yi phyogs su 'gro bar
400b7(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / rnal 'byor pa yis bslad pas ni// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// rdo rje mkha' 'gro mar bsams te// bdag gi lus ni bsgoms nas su// zla
401a1(rgyud 'bum): dang ldan pas sngags bzlas na/ / gnyis med gang ba'i gtor ma ni// de yi dbus su sbyar bar bya// oM badz+ra DA ki nI shaM A kaR+Sha ya A kaR+Sha ya hUM hUM pre phreM phaT/ maN+Dal dmar pos
401a2(rgyud 'bum): byug nas ni/ / seng ldeng phur pa brgyad kyis gdab// dbus su ming ni bris nas su// gtor ma yongs su gang bar ldan// skud pa dmar la bzlas nas kyang // lan bdun bskor bas drang bar bya// rdo rje lcags
401a3(rgyud 'bum): kyus drangs nas su/ / gsang sngags 'a da ni bzlas byas nas// dpag tshad brgya yi phyi rol nas// las 'dis bzlog nas 'gugs par 'gyur// maN+Dal gyi ni dbus dag tu// las 'dis 'grub 'gyur the tsom
401a4(rgyud 'bum): med/ / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// mkha' 'gro drag por bsam bya ba// rang gi lus ni rnal 'byor mar// mkhas pa yis ni bsgoms nas su// nyi mo gcig ni bzung nas su// mkha' 'gro'i/
401a5(rgyud 'bum): gtor ma byin gyis brlabs// sngags dang bcas pa'i ming bris la// nya yi kha ru bcug nas ni// rkang pas mgo ni rab mnan la// brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas par bya// oM phruM phruM a mu ka s+ya mu kha baM d+ha baM d+ha/ hri hraM hri//
401a6(rgyud 'bum): phuM phaT/ de ni bzlas pa tsam gyis ni// bya ba thams cad bcing bar 'gyur// thams cad tshul bya ba ste// las gzhan cho ga bshad par bya// sngags 'di rab tu sbyar nas ni// bag zan gyis ni dril bar bya//
401a7(rgyud 'bum): gang du nya ni gnas pa yi// nya yi kha ru gzhug par bya// mkha' 'gro'i gtor ma byin brlabs te// ril bu brgyad brgya byas nas ni// lan re bzlas te zar bcug na// bya ba thams cad bcing bar 'gyur// rlung gi
401b1(rgyud 'bum): dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ / bdag nyid tsaN+Da li yi gzugs// gzugs rnams thams cad yongs rdzogs shing // me ltar 'bar ba bsams nas su// gnyis med gtor ma'i las rnams ni// de yi
401b2(rgyud 'bum): dbus su rab tu bya/ / lci bas pad+ma'i gzugs byas la// ming dang sngags kyi gzhag par bya// oM stam+b+ha ya stam+b+ha ya hUM/ b+ha ga na mu traM phru phruM phaT/ gsang sngags 'di dang ming dag ni// rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas
401b3(rgyud 'bum): su/ lan grangs brgyad brgyar bzlas nas su// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// chung ma shin tu g.yon can rnams// las 'di yis ni gdul bar bya// mthar ni chu dang 'o ma yis// bkrus nas bcings pa las
401b4(rgyud 'bum): grol 'gyur/ / rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// lha mo rdo rje ma ru bsgom// kha dog sngon po shin tu mdzes// 'od zer me dang mtshungs par 'bar// yongs su rdzogs shing mdzes par ldan// rgyan
401b5(rgyud 'bum): rnams kun gyis klubs pa ste/ / yi dgas kyi ni gdan la bzhugs// ha har bzhad pas 'jigs su rung // gnyis med gang ba'i gtor ma yi// las ni de ru byas nas kyang // 'bras phye la sogs
401b6(rgyud 'bum): khyad par las/ / pad+ma'i dbyibs ni byas nas su// khyi yi spu yis dgang bar bya// ming dang sngags su sbyar nas su// gnyis med gtor ma'i rnam pa ni// las der byin gyis brlab par bya// oM kro d+ha shwa ri phruM phruM phaT/
401b7(rgyud 'bum): brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas nas su// rdo rje gsang bar gzhug par bya// las 'di sbyar zhing gzir ba yis// b+ha ga dag ni bzlog par 'gyur// las 'dis shin tu 'grub pa ste// phyung na de las thar par 'gyur//
402a1(rgyud 'bum): chung ma shin tu gdul dka' la// las ni de ltar sbyar ba dang // zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// lte bar bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsgom// rtsa rnams kun las drangs nas su// bdud rtsi'i/
402a2(rgyud 'bum): chu ni 'dzag par bya// ban d+ha'i me tog rgyas pa yi// dbus su lcags kyu'i yi ge ste// kha dog dmar po shin tu 'bar// gsang zhing gsang bas bsgom par bya// kho bo'i sor mo'i sor mo ru// bdud rtsi'i yi
402a3(rgyud 'bum): ge bsams nas ni/ / sor mo 'di yis bskyod par bya// sbyor ba gsum ni bsams pa yis// de yi dbus kyis gnas rnams// bdud rtsi'i chu ni 'dzag par bya// chung ma shin tu gdul dka' la// 'di yis
402a4(rgyud 'bum): b+ha gar brtag par bya/ / 'od zer can dang bla mar bya// smre byed yan lag lnga dang bcas// gu gul chen po tsha dang bsres// mar nag chen pos bskol bar bya// sngags pas bdud rtsi chu dang ni// lce yi dang po
402a5(rgyud 'bum): myang bar bya/ / 'dir ni smyo 'gyur the tsom med// mar zos pos ni grol bar 'gyur// yi dgas gos ni ma lhung bas// mar me yi ni sdong bu bya// klu dbang gi ni gong du gzung // rkang gi mar gyis sbar bar bya// gton
402a6(rgyud 'bum): ma yi ni gnas dag tu/ / mkha' 'gra ma yi snying sngags kyis// du ba dag ni dbab par bya// dur khrod du ni gter byin la// brgyad brgya ru ni bzlas nas su// lam gyi bzhi mdor shing gcig drung // gang la du ba
402a7(rgyud 'bum): byug pa des/ / mkha' 'gro ma kun mthong bar gyur// lhag ma'i snod ni gnyis bzung la// dur khrod kyi ni sol ba yis// tsha ba'i rdzas la sbyar nas ni// bya rog sgo rtsas bri bar bya// oM ki ri ki ri kr-i d+haH
402b1(rgyud 'bum): mu kaM pU phruM phaT/ snod ni gnyis la so so ru// gzugs gnyis ming dang bcas bris la// gnyis med gtor ma byin nas ni// khro bos bkang ste drud par bya// oM ki li ban+d+ha li bar+t+ta li kro d+ha mu khe a mu
402b2(rgyud 'bum): ka s+ya hi li hi li badz+ra tiSh+Tha mu khi phu phreM phreM phaT/ brgya phrag gcig tu bzlas nas ni// myur du bathab rtsod 'byung bar 'gyur// gnyis med gtor mar ldan pa yi// dbang bskur ba ni zhi bar 'gyur// sbyor
402b3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba gsum pa'o/ / / gnyis med sbyor ba'i snying po ste// gnyis med ming gis brjod pa yin// sbyor ba ji ltar brtsam bgyi ba// rol
402b4(rgyud 'bum): mo dag ni nyan par 'tshal/ / gnyis med sbyor ba de nyid kyi// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag/ so sor gzung ba'i de kho na// yang dag ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon// de nyid ji bzhin bdag nyid dang // chos kyi dril bu
402b5(rgyud 'bum): lha mo'o/ / kha sbyor sbyor ba phyag rgya ste// thabs ni de ru thim pa'o// dang por re zhig rnal 'byor pas// rdo rjes thal mo dam bcings nas// sems can kun la rjes brtse bas// dag pa rnam gsum brjod par
402b6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ / oM swa b+hA ba shud+d+haHsarba d+har+m+ma swA b+hA ba shud+d+hohaM/ oM badz+ra shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+har+m+ma badz+ra shud+d+hohaM/ oM yo ga shud+d+haHsar+b+ba d+har+m+ma yo ga shud+d+hohaM/ gzung dang 'dzin pa las grol bas// sbyin pa'i ra bas sbyin par bya//
402b7(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ldan pa'i sems kyis ni// thams cad rtswa bzhin blta bar bya// sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin// 'gro rnams gtse bar mi bya sogs// sems can don ni dgag mi bya// steng du tshul khrims dra ba'o//
403a1(rgyud 'bum): gzhan la gnod pa 'go la sogs// bzod pa'i phur bu 'og tu gdab// phur bu rab dra ba yis// snang ba'i bdud dang dgra rnams bskrad// bdud ni bdud du 'char mi 'gyur// rang gi sem+ba/
403a2(rgyud 'bum): kyis bsdams pa'o// rang gis rang sems btul ba na// bdud kyis 'tshe bar ga la 'gyur// mnyam nyid sems kyi dri yis ni// gru bzhi pa ru byug par bya// lus la lte 'jog tsan dan byug/ sems
403a3(rgyud 'bum): ni mnyam par gnas pa ste/ / bzod pa'i me tog rnal 'byor pas// 'bad dang ldan pas dgram par bya// mnyam nyid bsgoms pa'i bdug pa yis// rang bzhin dag pas bdug par bya// shes rab mar
403a4(rgyud 'bum): me'i snang ba ste/ / khams gsum gyi ni mun pa rnams// mar me 'di yis bcom nas su// ji ltar 'dod bzhin snang bar bya// sems kyis mi 'jigs sbyin pa yis// dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung bya//
403a5(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa'i dus dang khyad par du// gtor ma'i dus su rab tu sbyar// yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas su// bdag nyid rdo rjer bskyed nas ni// shes rab dril bu zhes byar sprul//
403a6(rgyud 'bum): bar du khru gang bzhag nas su// mnyam nyid lta bas blta bar bya// snying kar hUM ni bsgom byas la// thams cad rig pas kun stong bya// khams gsum zad par byas nas ni// thams cad nam mkhar yang dag
403a7(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / sngon bzhin mtshan nyid yang dag ldan// mnyam nyid stong par bsams nas su// pho brang yangs par ci 'dod par// ri rab rtse mor bsam par bya// lha ni nyi shu rtsa brgyad ldan// rdo rje sngon du bstan
403b1(rgyud 'bum): pa bzhin/ / 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi// hUM gi thig le las byung ba// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// mi g.yo rdo rje bsgoms nas su// rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin du// bdag gi lus ni sprul par bya//
403b2(rgyud 'bum): yi ge'i dgod pas dgod nas su// mkhas pas go cha byas nas hUM// sangs rgyas lnga yis brgyan pa ste// gangs dang kun da zla ba'i mdog/ phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas// rgyan rnams kun gyis
403b3(rgyud 'bum): klubs pa ste/ / phyag rgya chen po snying por bcas// go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba kha// sangs rgyas sprin ni rnam par 'phro// dngos po sgom pa bsgoms nas su// hUM gi sgra yis
403b4(rgyud 'bum): dgang bar bya/ / rang nyid ji ltar 'dod sems kyis// ye shes sa bon bzlas par bya// btso ma'i gser ltar shin tu 'bar// sems can kun gyi don la chags// de nas stong pa'i mtshan nyid ni// sngar gyi mtshan nyid bdag
403b5(rgyud 'bum): nyid can/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sngar gyi mtshan nyid kun rig pas// nyi shu rtsa gsum lha rnams kyis// dril bu'i bdag nyid bsgom par bya// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba las// sangs rgyas
403b6(rgyud 'bum): 'od ni rnam par spro/ / de ltar bskyed pa'i lus rnams ni// shes rab pha rol phyin mas bskyed// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par klubs// kha dog cung zad 'dres/
403b7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sku// sangs rgyas lnga yis mngon par brgyan// yi ge brgyad kyi sngags rnams ni// yan lag brgyad du dgod par bya// phyag gnyis phyag rgya chen po ste// go 'phang mchog ni bsgom par bya// a li ka
404a1(rgyud 'bum): las byung ba'i/ / de yi sa bon bzlas par bya// 'dod chags sems ni stobs kyi ni// bcom gser gyi 'od dang bcas// sems can bsgral phyir kun tu 'khyud// nu ma 'khyud cing zhal
404a2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis 'jib/ / rdo rje sor mo'i rtse mor ni// bdud rtsi'i yi ge bsams nas ni// lha mo'i g.yon gyi cha ru ni// bstan pa'i rtse mor gzung bar bya// bcu dang brgyad kyi gnas rnams ni// kun nas bdud rtsi gang gnas
404a3(rgyud 'bum): pamadzub mo 'di yis bskyod pa yis/ / bdud rtsi'i chu ni 'dzag par 'gyur// gnyis kyi kun sprod btang nas su// shar gyi phyogs su blta zhing bskyod// rol ba'i stobs kyis lha mo ni// rdo rje rkang pa'i stobs
404a4(rgyud 'bum): kyis mnan/ / nu ma lag pa gnyis kyis gzir// sgeg cing bzhad pa'i bzhin can te// 'og mas gnon po btsir bar bya// dril bu lag gnyis gsang ba'i sbyor// de bzhin sa bon gnyis med bzlas// shar phyogs
404a5(rgyud 'bum): su ni bskyod pa yis/ / sems can pha rol sgrol bar 'gyur// lha mo g.yon pa bskyod nas su// lho ru kha ni blta bar bya// rdo rje yang ni bskyod nas su// rkang mthil gnyis kyis de bzhin btsir// dril bu'i lag pa
404a6(rgyud 'bum): gnyis kyis ni/ / rked pa bsdams te btsir bar bya// rdo rje g.yas kyi nu ma dang // de bzhin gsang bar btso bar bya// rdo rje dril bu'i lus dag ni// yang dang yang du sprad par bya// sa bon gnyis ni bzlas pa yis//
404a7(rgyud 'bum): lho phyogs sems can sgrol bar 'gyur// nub phyogs snying po'i rkang stabs kyis// lha mo nub tu blta bar bya// rdo rje yi ni phyogs gcig gis// g.yas kyi brla ni mnan par bya// mgrin pa'i rgyab nas gnyis
404b1(rgyud 'bum): 'khyud de/ / dril bu'i lce ni bskyod nas su// rdo rje lce la reg par bya// de bzhin sbyar nas gnyis ka bzlas// rdo rje mnyam pa'i dbus su ni// lag pa gnyis kyis bsdams pa'o// dril bu'i lag pa gnyis kyis kyang /
404b2(rgyud 'bum): rna ba'i drung bar gzug par bya// gnyis ka'i mchu ni kun sbyar nas// de yi bdud rtsi btung bar bya// rnal 'byor pa yis sngags bzlas nas// rdo rje dril bu dkrol bar bya// sems can thams cad bde gyur cig/
404b3(rgyud 'bum): kun kyang 'tshe ba med par shog/ gang gis lam nas 'gro ba yis// sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub gyur cig/ skad cig tshul gyis rnal 'byor dang // skad cig tshul gyis phyag rgya can// kun nas kun tu skad cig ste// /
404b4(rgyud 'bum): skad cig gis ni gsang sngags 'don// dril bu lha ru sbyor ba yis// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// yi ge brgyad kyi sngags dag ni// gnas rnams kun gyi lha nyid de// rang nyid lha mor bsam pa dag/ slar
404b5(rgyud 'bum): yang 'di nyid rab tu bya/ / rang gis rjes su chags pa'i sems// de nas rdo rje kun tu 'khyud// de nas bdag nyid rdo rje ru// dkar nar bcas pa bsam par bya// rdo rje yi ni nga rgyal gyis// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag
404b6(rgyud 'bum): ces brjod/ / chu las byung ba'i me tog ni// gsang ba'i nang gi mtshan nyid las// rtsa ba myu gu me tog ste// ban du ka ni rgyas pa 'dra// thong ka gnyis kyi sa bon rnams// sa dang rlung dag nyid yin no// 'og tu chu yi
404b7(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin la/ / myu gu me yi sa bon no// sde tshan gsum pa gang yin pa'i// yi ge gsum pa bzung nas su// dbyug pa phyi mo rdo rje can// skra bo tsha la sogs pas dkri// lha mo'i gzugs su bsams nas su//
405a1(rgyud 'bum): sa yi nang du thim par bya// dus ma'i yi dgas mer sbyor cing // yi dgas me dang dus mer sbyor// lag pa gnyis kyis kha sbyar ba// mthe'u chung mthe bos mnan nas su// gsum po dag ni/
405a2(rgyud 'bum): rtse mor sbyor// phyag rgya gnyis kyis mgor btsug nas// bdud rtsi bza' ba'i bsam pa yis// gnod pos 'og ma btsir bar bya// bcu dang brgyad kyi lam dag nas// dril bu'i bdud rtsi bskul bar bya// g.yon
405a3(rgyud 'bum): gyi cha ni ban du ka/ chu 'dzag pa yi cha byad can// chu 'dzag bya mchu'i dbyibs lta bu// mkha' 'gro ma yi tshul dag la// der ni phyag rgyas bskul bar bya// rdo rje g.yas kyi chu dag ni// rang bzhin mnyam pa
405a4(rgyud 'bum): tshul du bya/ / thong ka la sogs gnas kun tu// de nas sor mo gdab par bya// de nas rdo rje rtse mo ni// phyag rgya glo ru sbyar nas bya// gnyis ka kun tu sbyar nas ni// rdo rje pad+mo bskul bar bya// hUM gi sgra yis/
405a5(rgyud 'bum): bkang nas su// lha mo thams cad tshim par bya// dril bu yi ni dngos po yis// a li sa bon kun tu sbyin// ye shes sa bon rdo rje rtse// bdag nyid lha ni mnyes par bya// rdo rje dril bu lus yin te// phyag rgya kha
405a6(rgyud 'bum): sbyor sbyar bar bya/ / rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya yang // de kho na yis so sor gzung // rdo rje de kho na bskyod la// dril bu rang dgar dkrol bar bya// rdo rje dril bu rab sbyor te// phyag rgya'i de nyid sbyor ba yin// lus ni gnyis
405a7(rgyud 'bum): ka mnyes pa yis/ / sems can pha rol sgrol bar 'gyur// gnyis ka yi ni bdag nyid sems// chu de byin gyis brlab par bya// sgeg cing bskyod par gnas pa ste// bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// rdo rje rol ban
405b1(rgyud 'bum): rkang pa ste/ / dril bu g.yon gyi brla yis rol// lag g.yon bakhyud cing nu ma gzung // g.yas kyis rdo rje gsor bar bya// bzhad cing khro dang sgeg pa yis// yang dang yang du spro bar bya// dril bu bskyod pa'i tshul
405b2(rgyud 'bum): gyis ni/ / brla yi stan la 'dug nas su// rkang pa g.yas pas dkris nas ni// dku yi gnas su gzhag par bya// mgrin pa gcig gis 'khyud nas ni// g.yon pas dril bu gsil bar bya// ngo mtshar
405b3(rgyud 'bum): bcas bzhad sgeg pa yis/ / yang dang yang du sprad par bya// de nas rdo rje glu blang zhing // sna tshogs hUM zhes bya bar 'dod// bdud rtsi'i chu ni bzung nas su// slar yang glu ni blang bar bya// 'khor ma stong pa snying
405b4(rgyud 'bum): po med pa ni/ / snying po dag ni shin tu bsam pa ste// rnam par thar pas rab tu bsgral ba ste// ngos las rnam par grol ba rab tu 'grub// phan tshun kun tu 'khyud pa'i sbyor byas pa// de yis don ni yang
405b5(rgyud 'bum): dag byed par 'gyur/ / 'khor ba'i snying po dag ni med pa la// rnal 'byor dbus su snying po 'grub// rdo rje dril bu'i sgrar bcas pas// de nas de ltar glu blang bya// mnyam bzhag sgom zhing bzlas pa yis//
405b6(rgyud 'bum): ba grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom med// las ni gang zhig bsam pa rnams// de yis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// sman la sogs pa'i khyad par rnams// bskyed pa'i sbyor bar ldan par bya// gur kum dang ni
405b7(rgyud 'bum): gi wang dang / / ka ra sbrang rtsi ba la sha// yung ba ru rta cha mnyam pa// sbyor ba'i gnas su gzung bar bya// rdzas de dag ni bsgos nas su// rtag tu thig le byas gyur na// rgyal po blon po pho brang bcas// thams cad
406a1(rgyud 'bum): du ni dga' bar 'gyur/ / dbang po lag dang ru rta dang // rmongs byed ma dang rengs byed ma// bdag gi lnga dang yan lag lnga// lnga po thams cad cha bsnyams la// bza' dang btung dang so
406a2(rgyud 'bum): dang zhib tu btags te sbyar la sbyin/ / thams cad du ni dbang 'gyur te// 'chi ba na yang gtor mi 'gyur// khrag ni gtor ba'i sbyor ba yis// dbang la sogs pa'i las rnams 'grub// sngags ni 'bum du
406a3(rgyud 'bum): bzlas pa yis/ / 'gro ba thams cad rmongs par 'gyur// bdag gis lus la gshegs gsol ba// bdag nyid ji ltar dga' bar bya// sems can don phyir blo ldan pas// thams cad dbang du 'du bar sgrub//
406a4(rgyud 'bum): brtul zhugs bram ze'i nye du mos// zhi ba'i las ni skye bar 'gyur// rgyal po bla ma gsang ba mos// rgyas pa'i las ni sbyar bar bya// rje rigs dmangs mo thams cad kyis// dbang gi las ni bsgrub par bya//
406a5(rgyud 'bum): lham mkhan shan pa nya ba mos// mngon spyod du ni rab tu grags// kla klo gdol pa chos mkhan mas// sbyor ba'i dngos grub bshad pa yin// de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis// rnal 'byor bstan bcos gzung bar bya//
406a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang rkang stabs bcing bar bya// sems can bsgral ba'i gnas yin te// gnyis ni kun tu 'dus nas bskyod// de nyid phyag rgya zhes bya ba cing // mnyam pa'i rkang stabs dang / dbye ba'i stabs dang / zlum po'i stabs
406a7(rgyud 'bum): dang / gsum gnon pa'i stabs dang / rus sbal gyi stabs dang / g.yas brkyang dang / g.yon brkyang dang / gnas gcig pa dang / 'dug pa dang / bung ba'i tshogs dang / rgya mtsho rlab pa dang / ri bo dpung pa dang /
406b1(rgyud 'bum): sa rkang pa'i 'phen pa dang / mchod sdong gi tshul dang / pus mo btsir ba dang / bsdu ba'i tshul dang / mnyam du gnas pa dang / dus kyi me dang / snying po dang / dga' bas gnas pa dang / gcig tu bsdu ba'o// rkang
406b2(rgyud 'bum): stabs skyod pa bco brgyad ni/ / mchod pa'i dus su sbyar bar bya// yon tan thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// rnal 'byor pa yis mtshon par bya// snying kar btsir ba dang / rkang pa sbyar ba dang / 'phreng ba'i tshul dang /
406b3(rgyud 'bum): nu ma'i tshul dang / gnyis ka sbyar te bza' ba dang / phyed kyis 'khyud pa dang / gsang bar reg pa dang / lus mnye ba dang / kos sgo steng ba dang / zhal bzhad cing skrag pa dang / mtshan nyid sna tshogs ldan pa
406b4(rgyud 'bum): yis/ de yi las rnams 'grub par bya// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag/ de kho na yis so sor gzung // gsang ba'i rdo rje dang bral na// dril bus ji ltar 'bras bu 'bras// rdo rje bang dril bu dang bral na//
406b5(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje sgrub pa'ang ring bar 'gyur// rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya dag/ dmigs na pha rol sgrol bar 'gyur// mtshan mo zla ba med pa dang // nyin mo zla bas ci zhig nus// de nas rdo rje dril bu dang // mnyam
406b6(rgyud 'bum): pade nyid gsal bar byed/ / a li ka li mnyam bsgom nas// rnal 'byor chen po sgrub pa pos// a li rdo rje zhes byar brjod// ka li de bzhin gshegs ma yin// a li ka li mnyam sbyor bas//
406b7(rgyud 'bum): dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed// sems can don rnams ma lus pa// lha yi gzugs kyis bri bar bya// phyi rol shes rab thabs rnams kyis// ji ltar 'khor ba sgrol bar 'gyur// rmongs pa
407a1(rgyud 'bum): phyi rol sems ldan pas/ / de yi dam tshig bstan pa yin// gsang ba'i gsung ba gsang ba che// rtag tu grub cing gsang ba yi// gang zhig lung ni shes gyur pa// de yi rnal 'byor pa
407a2(rgyud 'bum): ru grags/ / shel ltar dag pa'i sems la ni// de yi chos ni bstan par bya// gal te sems ni the tsom na// skad cig gis ni dmyal bar ltung // 'dod la dga' ba ma yin zhing // longs spyod phyir ni bstan/
407a3(rgyud 'bum): mi bya// sems can don bya'i phyir du ni// rab tu 'bad pa'i de nyid dmigs// gal te 'dod dga'i rnal 'byor pa// thabs kyi mtshan nyid gcig yin te// rang dga' skad cig yang dag 'byung // rdo rje dril
407a4(rgyud 'bum): bu sbyor ba'o/ / skad cig tshul gyis bskyed nas ni// bdag gi rnal 'byor bdag ces brjod// gsang ba'i nang gi dbus gnas par// a li'i sa bon gzung bar bya// bdag nyid skad cig rnal 'byor ni//
407a5(rgyud 'bum): hUM zhes bya ba 'bad de bzla// gang yang cung zad lus dang ngag/ lha yi sbyor bar thim par bya// thal sbyor phyogs ni thams cad du// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor ma dbang gson// dgyes shing thugs ni tshom pa
407a6(rgyud 'bum): yis/ / 'gro ba thar pa de ring thob// e ma chos kyi mchog gi lam// e ma'o 'khor ba gcod pa po// e ma'o rnal 'byor grol ba'i gnas// e ma'o ngo mtshar rnal 'byor lam// tshes grangs med cing rgyu skar med
407a7(rgyud 'bum): bsnyung ba med par bstan pa ste/ / 'di ni bde ba'i sgrub par brjod// bde bas 'khor lo gcod par byed// las kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga rnams// sgrub pa po yi sna tshogs 'dod// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus
407b1(rgyud 'bum): gnas par/ / drag mo'i gzugs su sprul par bya// de yi gzugs su bsams nas ni// sngon bzhin de nyid bsgom par bya// sngags pas sum 'bum bzlas nas su// phyi nas las ni bsgrub par bya//
407b2(rgyud 'bum): yi ge gnyis 'gyur thig le dang // rtsa ba'i sgra ni sbyar bar bya// phyag 'tshal sreg pa mthar bzhag pa// rnal 'byor pa yis sum 'bum du// bzlas pas sngon du bsnyen nas ni// de nyid las rnams 'bad de/
407b3(rgyud 'bum): sgrub/ yi dgas gos la sogs bzung la// lha mo ser mo tshon rtsis bri// phyag gnyis rol pa'i rkang stabs can// dkar dang ser la 'bar ba'i lus// ha ha ra bzhad cing gtsigs pa ste// skra ni lcug
407b4(rgyud 'bum): pas rnam par brgyan/ / yi dgas kyi ni stan la bzhugs// skyes bu'i pags pa'i na bza' mnabs// don yod grub pa'i dbu rgyan can// sbrul gyi rgyan gyis rnam par klubs// glang po'i pags pa'i sham
407b5(rgyud 'bum): thabs can/ / kha T+wAM mchog gis brgyan pa ste// g.yon pa chang gi thod pa bsnams// hUM gi sgra ni 'jigs par mdzad// 'od zer me ltar 'bar zhing gsal// lha mo seng ge bsgom par bya// sa yi dbus
407b6(rgyud 'bum): sogs sbyor bar bya/ / mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// sngon gyi mtshan nyid ldan pa yis// gnyis med gtor mas dgang bar bya// gal te 'byor na yi dgas mo// tha mal me 'bar dbus su ni// yam shi
407b7(rgyud 'bum): thang shing las byas pa'am/ / zho can lnga yi shing las bya// mchod pa sna tshogs rgya chen dang // sha chen la sogs bsreg par bya// sbrang rtsi khrag la sbags pa dag/ brgyad brgya ru ni sbyin sreg bya// de ltar bsregs
408a1(rgyud 'bum): @pa tsam gyis ni/ / des ni mtshan ma ston par 'gyur// oM s+thA bruM pu phaT/ sbyin sreg gi rtsa ba'i sngags so// thams cad sngar bstan bzhin du bya// dang po sa ni 'gul 'gyur te// gnyis
408a2(rgyud 'bum): pa la ni bris gzugs 'gul/ / gsum pa la ni dri chen 'byung // bzhi par seng ge sgra sgrogs te// lnga par sgrub pa'i grogs por ni// seng ge'i tshul du babs nas su// drag po'i gzugs can rnam par gtsag/
408a3(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa'i sgra ni sgrog par byed// dam tshig phyag rgya sogs byin nas// gtor ma'i mchod pas mnyes par bya// ji ltar 'dod bzhin gnas rnams dang // stan ni bdag gir tshang nga gso de ras lnga
408a4(rgyud 'bum): mo dngos bstan nas/ / bdag gis bu yi ci zhig sgrub// 'bad de dam tshig byin nas su// de la phyag rgya bstan par bya// dpa' bos de ltar byin nas su// da lta bdag gi 'dir mdzod cig/ bdag nyid la ni lha
408a5(rgyud 'bum): mo 'grub/ / oM tiSh+Tha ma ma ku ru hUM hUM hUM dza dza dza swA hA/ spyi bor lag pa bzhag nas ni// gsang sngags 'dir ni brjod par bya// sha dang khrag dang sran chan bcas// gnyis med gtor ma de la sbyi yi dgas
408a6(rgyud 'bum): bgrod par gnas nas su/ / rtag po'i dus su byin gyis brlab// lha min klu mo gnod sbyin mo// dri za mi'am tsi dang ni// yi dgas mi mo gang 'dod pa// bka' bzhin skad cig gis 'gugs na// phran chags ma/
408a7(rgyud 'bum): mo smos ci dgos// bka' ni bsgo ba tsam gyis su// lha min klu yi gnas dag kyang // gang zhig don du gnyer ba rnams// myur du khrid nas 'ong bar 'gyur// gang yang dgra rnams gsang ba dang // bka'/
408b1(rgyud 'bum): bzhin du ni smod par 'gyur// las rnams kun byed lha mo ste// mkhas pa yis ni bsgru ba yar bya// stag mo ce sbyang bug pa mo// las de nyid kyis bsgrub bya ste// dngos grub de ltar shes byas la// mkhas
408b2(rgyud 'bum): pa yis ni bsgrub par bya/ / rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya ni// de bzhin nyid kyis so sor gzung // rdo rje de nyid kyis sbyar zhing // dril bu chos kyi lha mo yi// phyag rgya gnyis su ldan pa yin// kun rig pas ni thams cad
408b3(rgyud 'bum): sgrub/ sbyor ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa rdzogs so// // rnal 'byor phyag rgya sogs mtshan pa'i// slob dpon dag ni gzung bya ba// sngags dang phyag rgya sbyor sogs ldan//
408b4(rgyud 'bum): 'khor ba las sgrol mnyam nyid kyi// ji bzhin lam gyi 'khor ba las// sgrol ba'i mtshan nyid rdo rje nyon// slob dpon yon tan ci 'dra zhing // bla ma zhes bgyi ji ltar lags// slob dpon ji ltar sbyar bar
408b5(rgyud 'bum): bgyibacom ldan ji ltar blta bar bgyi/ / thams cad byang chub mtshan nyid kyi// de nyid phyag na rdo rjes nyon// byang chub rdzogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang // lus ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// cha shas byang chub
408b6(rgyud 'bum): yan lag rnams/ / dbu rgyan rigs ni lnga nyid de// ba spu rnams ni dgra bcom mo// 'jig rten pa ni zhabs kyi gdan// 'od zer gnod sbyin gsang la sogs// de ltar yon tan ldan pa'i skur// rnal 'byor can ni
408b7(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu blta/ / ye shes can ni shes bya ba// mtshan nyid gang yin bstan par bya// shin tu dul zhing zhi ba'i gzugs// sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin// sngags dang rgyud kyi sbyor ba mkhas// rnal 'byor bzo
409a1(rgyud 'bum): dang bstan bcos rig/ thams cad du ni snyan par smra// sems can kun la bu bzhin lha// sbyin pa la sogs rtag tu dga'// rnal 'byor bsam gtan mngon par brtson// snying rje phan pa'i
409a2(rgyud 'bum): sems kyis ni/ / bden par smra zhing 'tshe mi byed// mnyam nyid sems ni bskyed pas na// sems can rnams kyi mgon skyob yin// de nyid bcu ni yongs shes pa// 'di ni slob dpon zhes byar brjod// gzhan yang slob
409a3(rgyud 'bum): mas spyod pa yi/ / de nyid mtshan nyid mnyan par gyis// rnal 'byor ma yi sbyor ba lta// dam tshig spyod pa dang lha nyid// gtor ma gsang ba la sogs ldan// slob dpon gsang ba smad mi bya// smad na myur du mnar med 'gro// /
409a4(rgyud 'bum): kun tu dam tshig med pa dang // stan dang mal dang lham sogs dang // gdugs dang na bza' nyer spyod rnams// grib ma 'gom zhing brdzi mi bya// bzlog dang gzir ba'i tshig brjod min// 'das na da ni dus kun tu//
409a5(rgyud 'bum): gnod kyis 'tshe bar 'gyur ba dang // nor nyams dpal las ring du 'gyur// bdud dang sdang bas 'joms par byed// de yi grib ma 'goms gyur na// mchod rten bshig pa'i sdig 'drar brjod// slob dpon smod
409a6(rgyud 'bum): par gang byed pa/ / rmi lam na yang dngos grub med// slob dpon yon tan gzung bya yin// skyon rnams nam yang gzung bya min// sngags dang phyag rgya'i sbyor la sogs// de yi lam gyis 'grub phyir ro// bslab pa sbyin
409a7(rgyud 'bum): pa sngon 'gro bas/ / de nas maN+Dal la sogs bya// sngar bstan yi ge gcig pa yis// sangs rgyas lnga ru bstan par bya// de yi rnal 'byor ldan pa yis// las rnams 'dod bzhin 'grub par 'gyur// sngags/
409b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi dbang bskur ldan pa yis// yi ge brgyad po bsgom par bya// gnyis med gtor sbyin dbang bskur ba'i// de yi chos ni shes par bya// sbyor ba'i dbang bskur ldan pa la// ye shes rnam shes bstan par bya//
409b2(rgyud 'bum): slob dpon dbang ni bskur nas su// thams cad gsang ba la sogs bstan// dang por slob mas bya ba ni// bla gos phrag par gzar nas su// pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga dag/ sa la legs par btsugs
409b3(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / thal mo snying kar sbyar bar bya// bla ma stan la 'dug nas ni// rang gis lha ru rab bsgoms la// lag pas lag pa bzung nas ni// mkhas pas bslab pa sbyin par bya// sangs rgyas chos dang dge
409b4(rgyud 'bum): 'dun la/ / rtag tu bdag ni skyabs su mchi// theg pa gsum po thams cad dang // rnal 'byor gsang sogs mkha' 'gro ma// dpa' bo dpa' mo dbang lha mo// byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che// khyad
409b5(rgyud 'bum): par du yang slob dpon la/ / rtag tu skyabs su mchi bar bgyi// rnam snang mdzad dang mi bskyod pa// rin chen mchog dang 'jig rten dbang // don yod grub pa la sogs pa// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'
409b6(rgyud 'bum): kun/ thams cad bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba ni// dus tshed 'di las bzung nas su// byang chub snying por mchis bar du// ma bsgral ba rnams bsgral bgyi zhing //
409b7(rgyud 'bum): ma grol ba rnams bdag gis dgrol// de ltar rjes su brtse ba'i phyir// bdag gis chos khrims 'di bgyi'o// de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du// mnyam nyid brtan pa'i sems ldan brjod// oM
410a1(rgyud 'bum): swa b+hA ba shud+d+ha sar+b+ba d+har+m+ma sA b+hA ba shud+d+hohaM/ oM badz+ra shud+d+ha sar+b+ba d+harmA badz+ra shud+d+hohaM/ oM yo ga shud+d+ha sar+b+ba d+harmA yo ga shud+d+hohaM/ lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang // ngag gi las ni rnam pa
410a2(rgyud 'bum): bzhi yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni/ / lus bsdam pas ni dam tshig srung // sems ni mnyam nyid shes nas su// ji skad gsungs pa'i chos bshad bya// de nas ras kyis mig bkab nas// gtor ma'i
410a3(rgyud 'bum): gnas su gzhug par bya/ / lag pas lag pa bzung nas su// slar yang bslab pa bstan par bya// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin sku// slob dpon la ni skyabs su mchi// dpa' bo dpa' mo 'khor lo ma/
410a4(rgyud 'bum): sbyor ba'i gdan la bdag phyag 'tshal// don dam rtogs mchog seng ge slob ma rnam shes nas// rnal 'byor ldan pas sgribs g.yogs rnams su bral ba'i phyir// srid pa'i nyes dmigs bskyod pa'i nyon
410a5(rgyud 'bum): mongs bcom nas su/ / rnal 'byor don dam grub byed de nyid rgyal por 'gyur// a ni yig 'bru kun gyi mchog/ gsung gi rdo rjer byin gyis brlab// hUM ni nyon mongs sreg pa ste// thugs kyi rdo rjer byin gyis
410a6(rgyud 'bum): brlab/ / oM ni ye shes 'gugs pa ste// sku yi rdo rjer byin gyis brlab// de nas mig phye mthong ma thag/ kun la yan lag lnga btud nas// bdag gi rang bzhin lus 'di nyid// sbyor ba'i gdan du gding
410a7(rgyud 'bum): bar bya/ / de nas mtshan nyid ci 'dra bar// lus ni ji ltar bstan pa bzhin// mkhas pa yis ni sbyin par bya// ji ltar bstan bzhin mtshon byas la// de nas bslab sogs yang bya ste// ji ltar bstan pa'i yid kyis
410b1(rgyud 'bum): / brtags// bdud rtsi lnga dang ldan pa yis// dam tshig chu ni de nas sbyin// ha zhes pa yis kha dog 'phrog/ ho yis dri ni 'joms par byed// hri yis nus pa gzhom bya ste// la lar sngags ni bzlas par bya//
410b2(rgyud 'bum): / bla ma'i zhabs kyi drung du ni// mgo bos btud de dbul bar bya// oM pany+tsa DA ki nI pu dza u bas+thA na ya At+ma naM nir+ya ta yA mi/ oM A ya tsA pu dzo pas+tha nA ya At+ma naM nir+yA ta ya mi/ oM sarba satwa ya pa ri tA Na Ar+tha ya At+mA naM
410b3(rgyud 'bum): nir+ya ta ya mi/ nga rgyal dang ni khro ba dang // brlang dang tshig rtsub la 'bar bya// sdig pa'i grogs po spang bya ste// srog gcod rku ba de bzhin no// longs spyod kun la mi chags shing // bdag nyid nges par chog shes
410b4(rgyud 'bum): byagar gyi gnas dang tshul 'dra ba'i/ / phyi rol bstan bcos shes mi bya// sa ma ya s+t+waM/ sa ma ya ho/ a A aM aHdzaHrdo rje phyag rgya ldan pa yis// yan lag drug gi sa bon gzung // gzhan
410b5(rgyud 'bum): yang chos rnams thams cad kyis/ / rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim par bstan// de nas slob ma 'byor ldan pas// rtag tu bla mar yon dbul bya// rang gi bu dang chung ma dang // gnyen bdun bran khol bcas pa dang //
410b6(rgyud 'bum): glang chen rta dang ba glang khyu// rin chen khyim dang zhing yul bcas// gsar dang dngul dang zangs dang ni// gos dang 'bru la sogs pa'i nor// stan dang mal cha lham la sogs// gdugs sogs nye ba'i
410b7(rgyud 'bum): longs spyod dbul/ / mthar ni rang gi lus nyid kyang // bla ma'i yon du phul nas su// chos rnams rang bzhin dag pa nyid// dngos po'i rang bzhin med pa ru// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim par bstan// sngon du
411a1(rgyud 'bum): bzod pa'i tshul gyis ni/ / sems can rnams la gzir mi bya// gzhan la tshig rtsub smra mi bya// thams cad mi dgar bya ba min// tshul khrims sdom pa srung ba dang // skye bo rnams
411a2(rgyud 'bum): la gnod mi bya/ / srog chags gsad par mi bya ste// de bas shi bar gyur kyang bla// rab tu 'bar me mtshungs pas na// gzhan gyi nor la reg mi bya// dngos la sred pa'i blun po rnams// bdag nyid srin
411a3(rgyud 'bum): po mi bzang ltung / / rags dang phra mo tsam la yang // rnal 'byor pa yis brdzun bsrung ngo // rnal 'byor spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa'i// de la brdzun smra yod pa min// spyod la legs par bsdams pa dang // bza'
411a4(rgyud 'bum): bca' sogs la'ang legs par bsdam/ / dga' dang rtse la'ang legs par bsdam// gtor ma'i dus su'ang legs bsdam bya// rnal 'byor dngos grub 'dod pa rnams// sems can dga' bas grub
411a5(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / gang zhig kun shes slob ma la// sems can spro ba bstan par bya// mnyam nyid ye shes bskyed nas ni// thams cad mnyam par blta bar bya// rtag tu mnyam par spyod par bya// rnal 'byor
411a6(rgyud 'bum): bsam gtan 'bad par bya/ / sems can sprin la sred pa'i gzhes// tsheng byed myu gu 'phel 'gyur te// de yi myu gu ljon shing gis// 'gro ba'i 'bras lam 'gogs par byed// mtho ris longs spyod 'dod
411a7(rgyud 'bum): pa yis/ / lus can rnams ni byams pas na// dga' zhing rtse ba'i chos spyod kyis// bdag nyid srid par ltung bar 'gyur// mchod rten las ni mi bya zhing // glegs bam bklag par mi ma'o// lag pa'i
411b1(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya mi bcing zhing / / sngags kyi ye shes bzla mi bya// bstan bcos dag ni rnyed sla ste// de yi sbyor ba rnyed pa dka'// slob dpon dag gis lam gyis ni// mkhas pa yis ni blta bar bya// bdag gis
411b2(rgyud 'bum): lha dang gzhan las ni/ / bdag gi lha ni lha yi mchog/ bdag gi gzugs su mi nus pas// gzugs brnyan la sogs bri bar bya// gsang ba'i gdan gyi rab tu phye ba las rim par phye ba dang po'o// /
411b3(rgyud 'bum): / der ni sbyor ba rnyed dka' ba// nyon cig rdo rje rgyal po gtso// de nyid med pa'i sngags pa rnams// srid pa 'phel byed 'og tu ltung // lus po ngo mtshar skyes gyur pas// de nyid chos ni bstan
411b4(rgyud 'bum): du gsol/ / rnal 'byor gyi ni tshad ma ci// sngags dang phyag rgya ji lta bu// chu dang me dang rlung rnams kyi// lus kyi tshad ni ji ltar lags// rnal 'byor pa yi gtor ma'i las// rab tu sbyar ba'i tshad ma gang //
411b5(rgyud 'bum): gang gis 'gro ba sgrub pa yin// mtshan nyid tshad mas ji ltar lags// mtshon bya'i lus dang sems kyi tshad// ji bzhin de nyid rdo rjes nyon// bdag gi khams ni bstan pas na// gtor ma'i las
411b6(rgyud 'bum): dang bzlas pa dang / / dkyil 'khor me dang chu yi las// phyag rgya gdugs sogs mchod pa yi// 'bras bu thob pa'i rnal 'byor pa'ang // srid pa'i rgya mtshor ltung bar 'gyur// phyag na rdo rjes yang
411b7(rgyud 'bum): gsol pa/ / srid pa so sor 'byung ba rnams// gang gis de yi tshad ma ste// sems ni ji ltar blta bar gyis// yid ni the tsom skyes par 'gyur// 'khor ba khyod kyis dris pa nyon// sems ni yid kyi
412a1(rgyud 'bum): bkrus nas su/ / rang dga' ye shes dngos med pa// mkha' 'gro rlung gi bcing ba yis// sems ni gzugs dang gzugs med par// bsam gtan dmigs pas 'grub par 'gyur/
412a2(rgyud 'bum): 'a dod lha la sogs 'dod can rnams// rtag tu 'dod yon spyod pa ste// de ltar 'khor ba'i mi rnams ni// rang 'dod sa la sogs pa 'grub// de las sgrol ba'i dngos po rnams// rdo rje 'dzin gyis mdor bsdus
412a3(rgyud 'bum): nyon/ rnal 'byor can gyis rnam shes dang // lhan cig bgro bas 'gro bar 'gyur// rnam shes rnam par shes pa yis// phyogs kun gyis ni gsal bar 'grub// sems kyi ngo bo the tsom pas// bcom ldan
412a4(rgyud 'bum): de yang bshad du gsol/ / shes rab rnam shes dngos rang bzhin// mi shes ye shes ji ltar lags// rnam shes ye shes mtshan nyid kyis// the tsom gyur pa nyan par 'tshal// shel dang mtshungs pa dag pa'i
412a5(rgyud 'bum): sems/ / sems la skyon dang yon tan med// yul rnams dang ni sprad pa yis// srid pa'i skyon gyis gos pa yin// gang gis 'di yi srid pa'i dngos// yul gnas pa yis zhi gyur nas// ji ltar gnas
412a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhin rab sbyor ba/ / bu ga'i sgo ru gzir bar bya// de yi dbus su shes bya ba// rtag tu rnam shes nam mkha' 'dra// kha dog med cing thams cad 'tshod// mi ldan lus can ldan pa ste// gzugs med pa ni
412a7(rgyud 'bum): kun gyi gzugs/ / de bzhin thung ngu ring po min// sems kyi de kho na nyid kyi// dngos med rdzu 'phrul 'grub par 'gyur// mtshan nyid med pa'i sems kyis ni// mtshan nyid thams cad sbar ba'o// dngos po
412b1(rgyud 'bum): med par sgom pa yis/ / sgom pa dag ni mtshon par bya// gzugs dang stong pa'i dbus su ni// sems ni mkhas pas shes bya ste// thams cad kun nas dmigs pa yis// rnal 'byor lus ni skyon med
412b2(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / gsang las gsang ba gsang chen po// rnam shes ye shes gsang ba dag/ bstan bcos klog la sogs sbas shing // yul gyi mtshan nyid las kyang ring // mtshon bya'i mtshan nyid de nyid ni// bla ma'i
412b3(rgyud 'bum): lam gyis mthong bar 'gyur/ / sems dang lus su bcas mnyam zhing // sems kyang gdung bar mi bya'o// lus ni gdung bar mi bya'o// yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su// mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya//
412b4(rgyud 'bum): bde ba'i stan la gnas nas ni// sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas nas ni// lag gnyis gsang ba'i gnas su gzhag/ mig ni sna rtser bltas nas su// dbugs ni lte ba'i rtsa bar gzung // thong ka kun tu
412b5(rgyud 'bum): spangs pa ni/ / dkyil 'khor lta bur sbyar bar bya// 'bad de mnyam nyid sems kyis ni// de nyid rang bzhin dag byas la// yid kyi dri yis byug pa dang // yid kyis me tog mchod par bya// rang bzhin dri yis
412b6(rgyud 'bum): byugs nas su/ / shes rab sgron mas snang bar bya// bdud rtsi'i gtor mas tshim pa'i lus// kun nas drangs te bza' bar bya// kha dog ser po 'bar ba'i 'od// ka sha gnyis 'gyur yi ge ste// drag
412b7(rgyud 'bum): mor ldan pa'i sa bon nyid/ / tshangs pa'i sgo ru shin tu srung // thams cad gzugs kyi 'jigs byed pa// dril bu chu yi yi ge ste// stong par ldan pa'i sa bon ni// sna dang rna ba dag la dgod// bdud rtsi'i chu
413a1(rgyud 'bum): yi sa bon ni/ / lce dbang rtse mor gzung bar bya// seng ge'i sa bon brtsegs pa yis// rgyas pa'i sgo ni bsrung bar bya// stag mo'i sa bon brtsegs pa yis// thong ka kun tu
413a2(rgyud 'bum): gzung bar bya/ / ce spyang sa bon brtsegs pa ni// snying ka'i gnas su gzhag par bya// lte ba'i tshig ni gdan gyi sgor// phyugs kyi sa bon gyis srung ngo // lha mo brgyad du sbyar nas ni// sa bon brgyad po
413a3(rgyud 'bum): gzung bar bya/ / de yi mdog ni dkar mo ste// lus kun tu ni shin tu 'bar// steng gi mche ba gnyis las ni// dngul chu'i rgyun dang 'dra bar dbab// 'o ma'i chu zhes bya ba yin// 'jug pas rlabs pa'i
413a4(rgyud 'bum): mdog lta bu/ / steng gi mche ba gnyis kyis ni// lce yis bstan pa'i bdud rtsi'i chu// lce rlung gsang ba'i nang du dbab// dpral ba'i sde dang sna dang ni// rna ba gnyis kyi rgyab dag tu// kha zas lta bu'i dngos
413a5(rgyud 'bum): / bo ni// kun nas drangs te gzhag par bya// mchod rten sgo ru sa bon ni// hUM zhes bya ba dbang phyug mchog/ bdud rtsi'i chu yis bkrus nas su// lhag ma 'og tu thim par bya// ngag tu rlung gi sa bon gyis//
413a6(rgyud 'bum): 'khrul 'khor lta bur kun nas drangs// chu ni mjug do rtsib logs dang // de bzhin mchan khung gnyis dang ni// dus dang yi dwags ma rkang pa// tshig rnams kun dang snying sa nas// bdud rtsi btung ba gang
413a7(rgyud 'bum): yin pa/ / ba lang rmig par thim nas ni// sgo gcig nas ni sgo dgur gzhag/ lus kun la ni gnas pa yi// bdud rtsi gang gis shes pa dag/ lus rnams thams cad skye 'gyur bas// de yi rnal 'byor
413b1(rgyud 'bum): brtags pa yin/ / snying dbus zla ba bsam bya ba// mdangs ldan shin tu mdzes shing gsal// gangs dang kun da zla ba 'dra// zla ba de dbus 'o ma'i rgyun// bdud rtsi kun rig gug skyed bcas// bdud rtsi'i
413b2(rgyud 'bum): 'od ni shin tu bsil/ / ma ning rnams ni spangs pa yis// dbyangs kyi yi ge thams cad kyis// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dngos rnams kyi// gnas rnams kun tu bskor bar bya// ba yang rmig pa'i steng du ni// rtag
413b3(rgyud 'bum): tu bdud rtsi bzhag nas su/ / gzugs dang kha dog mdzes pa yi// ye shes lus su bsgom par bya// mi g.yo 'tshe ba med pa ru// dngos po dngos po bsgom byas la// 'o ma'i zla ba sa bon dag/ phyag 'tshal
413b4(rgyud 'bum): sreg pa'i mtha' ldan pa/ / mnyam gzhag dngos pos bzlas byas na// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med// dbang po rnams kyi sred pa dang // bkres skom la sogs med par 'gyur// lo ni brgya phrag du
413b5(rgyud 'bum): mar ba tshe/ / gzugs dang gzi brjid na tshod ldan// rims dang dug la sogs pa dang // grang dang tsha sogs gnod pa rnams// ye shes can gyi ye shes lus// yan lag kun la gnas mi 'gyur// bdud rtsi'i
413b6(rgyud 'bum): rtsa ba dmigs pa yis/ / myu gu skye zhing 'byung bar 'gyur// de dang de ni 'phel 'gyur ram// gzugs dang ye shes bdag nyid che// de yi rnal 'byor gnas rnams ni// stong pa'i brag la sogs par brtan//
413b7(rgyud 'bum): bdud rtsi gang gis shes pa yis// bdud rtsi'i 'bras bu ster bar 'gyur// ji ltar bdag nyid kyi ni sems// ye shes can gyi de kho nas// dag bya 'khor ba'i pha rol mtshan// ye shes dbang las nyan par
414a1(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal/ / gnyis med sngon gyi sems kyis ni// 'dod chags nyon mongs rgya mtsho yis// rang gi lus ni bkru bya ba// ye shes sems dpa' mnyan par gyis// rgya mtsho zab mo lta bu yi//
414a2(rgyud 'bum): stong nyid ye shes de nyid kyis// phyi nang dri ma bkrus pas na// lus ni shel ltar mtshungs par gyur// shel dang 'dra ba'i lus kyi dngos// dri med dung dang kun da' dra// ye shes dbang po sna tshogs kyis//
414a3(rgyud 'bum): chos kyi tshon gyis btso bar bya// rang bzhin gyis ni rnal 'byor pa// nyes byas legs byas las byung ba// gang gi rang bzhin las rgyal ba// ye shes kyis ni snang bar bya// sngon gyi mtshan nyid stong pa yis//
414a4(rgyud 'bum): 'gro ba'i dngos kun zad par bya// mnyam nyid sems ni bskyed pa yis// gzugs sogs thams cad zad pa na// de gnyis dbus su bsam bya ba// zla ba 'o ma'i sa bon te// a li ka li rab sbyor bas//
414a5(rgyud 'bum): de yi dbus su btu bar bya// de yi sa bon de nyid kyis// 'od zer 'phreng ba bsam par bya// sa bon de nyid gang gis ni// myur du ye shes snang bar 'gyur// gzugs mdzes yongs su mdzes pa yi// ye
414a6(rgyud 'bum): shes su ru de nas bsgom/ / phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams su ni// sangs rgyas sprin rnams spro bar bya// phyag 'tshal sreg pa'i mtha' ldan pa'i// sa bon gang zhig bzla ba ni// snga tshan gsum pa gang
414a7(rgyud 'bum): yin pa'i/ / yi ge gsum pa gzung bar bya// dbyug pa spyi mo rdo rje dang // skra bo che la sogs pa dkri// sems ni mnyam nyid bsgoms nas su// rnal 'byor can gyis bzlas par bya// mi g.yo 'tshe ba med pa ru//
414b1(rgyud 'bum): dngos pos dngos po bsgom byas la// rnal 'byor bsam gtan la 'bad pas// 'og min la sogs snang bar bya// 'od zer 'phro ba spros pa yis// sa 'og rim pa bdun yang bsam// rnal 'byor snang
414b2(rgyud 'bum): bar 'dod pa yis/ / rtag tu sems kyis bsgom par bya// snying khar dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// hUM zhes bya ba dbang phyug mchog/ sngon gyi mtshan nyid kun rig pas// thams cad kun nas zad par bya//
414b3(rgyud 'bum): rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba yi// ye shes sa bon de dbus bsam// de las byung ba'i ye shes lus// ye shes mkha'
414b4(rgyud 'bum): 'gro'i bdag nyid de/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// pad+ma'i stan la bzhugs pa ste// sngon gyi mtshan nyid kun rig pas// yan lag rdzogs pa'i skur bsgoms la// snying gi dkyil 'khor dbus
414b5(rgyud 'bum): gnas par/ / zla ba 'o ma'i sa bon bsam// kun nas mnyam pa'i sems kyis ni// rtag tu de nyid bsgom par bya// kha dog dkar po 'od 'bar las// kun tu rdul phran dkar pos dgang // pha rol dngos po
414b6(rgyud 'bum): dmar po ru/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// pad+ma'i stan la bzhugs pa yi// rdo rje sems dpar bsams nas su// gang gi snying gi dbus su ni// de yi rnam shes gzung bar bya// hUM zhes
414b7(rgyud 'bum): bya ba'i phyogs brgyad du/ / kha dog dmar po bsams nas ni// rtag tu mnyam nyid lta ba yis// blo ldan pha rol sems shes bya// kun nas dpag tshad phyi rol tu// rnal 'byor pas ni gang bsam na//
415a1(rgyud 'bum): de yi bsam pa thams cad ni// yi ge de yis ston par 'gyur// gal te pha rol cha yis ni// sems kyi mtshan nyid shes 'dod pas// gzhan gyi sems ni rig pa yis// kun nas
415a2(rgyud 'bum): thams cad shes byas la/ / dpa' bo sems can kun don phyir// rnal 'byor 'di yis sbyar bar bya// de nas me yi las kyi bdag/ sbyor ba ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi// ye shes me yis bdag nyid la//
415a3(rgyud 'bum): sbyin sreg mtshan nyid ji ltar lags// thams cad sems kyis byin rlabs pas// skye bo'i lus can ye shes me// thams cad ye shes byin rlabs pa// me yi de nyid mnyan par gyis// bdag nyid sems
415a4(rgyud 'bum): kyis bsreg pas ni/ / rnal 'byor can gyis sbyin sreg bya// mdud pa'i lte ba'i dbus nyid kyi// dngos su sor ni bdun pa ste// me yi thabs kyi gnas yin la// klu dbang 'khyil ba'i bskor ba yin//
415a5(rgyud 'bum): yi ge thams cad 'bar bar bya// de dbus pad+ma rig pa yis// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ye shes lus ni 'bar bar gzung // mdud pa'i me la dkar po ru// rdo rje mkha' 'gro thim par
415a6(rgyud 'bum): byagayas kyi cha yi logs su ni/ / drag mo thim bya me dang 'dra// lte ba dmar po 'bar ba la// lha mo'i rtse mo ro langs ma// g.yon phyogs cha ni sngon po la// drag tu 'bar ba gtum mo ste// me lnga yi ni
415a7(rgyud 'bum): bdag nyid rnams/ / gzugs mdzes mthe bo'i tshad du blta// chu dang me dang rlung dang ni// sa dang ye shes rnam pa lnga// lha mo lnga yi bdag nyid la// sbyin sreg cho ga'i mchog yin no// bcu dang brgyad
415b1(rgyud 'bum): kyi rtsa rnams nas/ / dus su bdud rtsi dmigs par bya// ba lang rmig pa'i dbus su ni// 'dzag pa der ni thim par bya// me yi dbus su sreg pa'i bzhi// dbyangs yig dang po sogs sa bon// 'di ltar
415b2(rgyud 'bum): de kho na bsgoms nas/ / bdag nyid rgyas phyir bsreg par bya// cung zad bza' dang btung la sogs// rung bar byas nas bza' bar bya// 'di ltar spyod pa'i rnal 'byor pa// bu lon du yang mi 'gyur
415b3(rgyud 'bum): ro/ gsang ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las rim par phye ba gnyis pa'o// // spre'u 'dra bar mi gnas pa// mnyam nyid gang gis sbyar bar bgyi// lus kyi sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid
415b4(rgyud 'bum): rnams/ / lha la rol mo nyan par 'tshal// 'byung ba yi ni khyad par dang // gsang ba rdo rje chen pos nyon// sems ni mnyam par gnas pa ste// nye bar zhi nas ka lir 'jug/ lus las spu rnams skye ba
415b5(rgyud 'bum): ni/ kun tu chu yi tshad ma ste// chu la lus ni ma yin te// lus la chu yi tshad ma yin// lus kun la ni khyab pas na// blo ldan chu ni tshad ma'o// lus ni rdo rje lha mo yin// lus kyi yan lag thams cad la//
415b6(rgyud 'bum): me 'bar lta bur dro ba ste// kha zas smin pa'i tshad ma yin// me ni tshad mar rab tu grags// yan lag thams cad khyab pa yin// me ni kun rig dmar yin pas// lus ni drag mor bstan pa ste// bdag
