415b7(rgyud 'bum): nyid tshad mar rab tu grags/ / bu gar zla ba 'dra gnas pas// rang gi lus kun khyab pa ste// dbugs rgyu ba yi tshad ma yis// mkhas pas sems ni tshad mar grags// lus la rten pa'i sbyor ba yis//
416a1(rgyud 'bum): dbugs ni gang gis shes nas su// thams cad lha mo re langs mar// mkhas pa yis ni shes par bya// sa ni kun gyi gnas yin te// gzugs sogs dbang po yon tan ldan//
416a2(rgyud 'bum): gzugs la sogs pa snang ba na// sa ni tshad ma'i gnas yin no// mdzes ma shes bya rab tu grags// de ni lha mo gtum mo ste// kun gyi gtso mor rab tu grags// yid ni the tsom gcod pa ste//
416a3(rgyud 'bum): byed po sdud po zab po'ang yin// dbang po kun gyis sems rnams kyi// mtshan bzhi mtshan nyid shes par bya// dbang rgyal nyer sbyor longs spyod pa// yul la sogs pa nyer spyod kyis// rnal 'byor tshad
416a4(rgyud 'bum): ma mkhas pa yis/ / lus la ye shes bsten par bya// sems las chu ni byung bas na// rnam shes chur ni 'gyur pa ste// gal te chur ni gzhan yin na// ci phyir zhe na chu mi 'gyur// lus la nges par drod yod
416a5(rgyud 'bum): na chu ni nang du bying mi 'gyur/ / lus la tshad ma lnga yod pas// lnga po gcig gi bdag nyid 'gyur// mtshan nyid gcig tu shes byas nas// rnal 'byor pa yis 'gro ba brtag/ de yi mtshan nyid shes bya'i phyir// /
416a6(rgyud 'bum): dge ba'i bshes gnyen bstan par bya// de nyid rnal 'byor grogs kyi ni// 'khor ba'i pha rol rgal bar 'gyur// yul dang dbang po'i ye shes ni// gzir dang bcas pas sdom par 'gyur// sgong skyes
416a7(rgyud 'bum): khyim gyi gnas su ni/ / dbus su gnas pa bcing bar bya// 'byung dang 'byung min sems kyis ni// g.yo ba'i dngos po bskor bar bya// bcing ba'i gnas dang stan dag ni// rnam shes pad+ma'i stan la'o//
416b1(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pa yis de yi phyir// rnam shes rang bzhin mtshon par bya// gzugs zhes bya ba'i dngos po yi// rnal 'byor grub par bya ba'i phyir// rang bzhin zhes bya'i dngos por 'gyur// lte bar chu shing me tog/
416b2(rgyud 'bum): ni/ snying khar yang ni 'greng ste gnas// rtag tu stong pa'i sgo yin te// mkhas pas rtag tu bzlog par bya// ge sar dang ni ldan pa yi// rtag tu 'dab ma brgyad du 'gyur// de dbus rtag tu gsungs pa ni//
416b3(rgyud 'bum): ye shes rnam shes sbyor ba ste// sbyor ba yi ni shar phyogs char// de dang mthun pa'i sor drug pa'o// mdud pa yi ni nub phyogs char// 'og tu sor ni lnga pa'o// zhing de la ni sa bon dang // 'od zer sna tshogs
416b4(rgyud 'bum): kyis myu gur 'gyur/ / sa bon da yi 'od zer gyis// chu shing lta bur bskor bar bya// rgyas pa lnga yi sa bon la// lho yi 'og nas dgar bar bya// pad+mo mdzes pa bkas pa yis// 'dab ma brgyad kyis rnam
416b5(rgyud 'bum): par brgyan/ / pad+mo da yi stan la ni// sgong skyes ye shes gnas dag la// dbus su shel ltar dag pa yis// ye shes rnam shes dbu ma nyid// mkha' 'gro ma bzhi'i sa bon rnams// phyogs kyi 'dab mar
416b6(rgyud 'bum): gnas pa ste/ / dbyangs yig dang po sogs sa bon// mtshams su sen mo la sogs pa'i// ma ning yi ger sngar bstan bzhin// snying khar dngos po dngos po las// snying khar yi ge blta bar bya// ba lang
416b7(rgyud 'bum): rmig pa'i steng du ni/ / sgo dgu pa yi bdud rtsi yis// rnal 'byor can gyis rtag tu bkru// yi ge dkar po brgyad po rnams// bdud rtsi'i yi ge dkar po yi// 'od 'bar ba spu'i khung nas spro// rnal 'byor
417a1(rgyud 'bum): can gyis thams cad du/ / 'gro dang 'chag dang 'dug pa dang // nyal ba la sogs dus kun tu// ye shes rnam shes sa bon bzla// shin tu mnyam gzhag sems kyis ni// rnal
417a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byor can gyis bsgom bzlas na/ / ye shes las byung rnal 'byor pa// 'khor ba'i pha rol rgal bar 'gyur// g.yo ba med cing 'tshe med par// dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya// gong du 'pho ba'i sbyor
417a3(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid/ / ji bzhin rdo rjes mnyan par gyis// lam bzang po yi rnal 'byor pa// 'gro ba mdzes pa blta bar bya// sgo dgu po ni ji lta bu// ye shes sgo yi bye brag gis// yon tan skyon rnams ji lta bu//
417a4(rgyud 'bum): ye shes dbang las mnyan par 'tshal// 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshad ma rnams// yang dag par sbyor mnyan par gyis// lam bzang po yis mdzes pa'i gnas// lam ngan srid pa'i skyon gyis gos//
417a5(rgyud 'bum): thig le lte ba spyi gtsug dang // mig dang sna dang rna srid sgo// chu dang chu min sgo yin te// sgo dgu yi ni mtshan nyid yin// lte ba 'dod can mtho ris te// thig les gzugs khams kyi lus can// stang nas
417a6(rgyud 'bum): steng du gnas da ru/ / mi gdung la sogs de ru 'gro// sna nas gnod sbyin gnas su ste// rna ba dag gis grub pa'i lha// gal te mig las ye shes 'gro// mi rnams kyi ni bdag por 'gro// srid pa'i
417a7(rgyud 'bum): sgo yis yi dgas te/ / de bzhin gcibs dud 'gro'o// chu min rnam shes myur ba ru// dmyal ba brgyad du shes par bya'o// sgo rnams kyi ni bye brag gis// 'khor ba'i bye brag 'byung ba yin// de bas
417b1(rgyud 'bum): sgo yi bye brag las/ / sgrub pos lam ni bzang po ste// 'chi ba'i mtshan ma ston pa dang // 'chi ba'i dus la bab pa na// rims la sogs pas ma phog par// gong du 'pho ba sbyor ba'i mchog/ sngon du bum pa
417b2(rgyud 'bum): brtsam pa yi/ / sgo rnams thams cad bcing bar bya// rgyas pa lnga yi mchod rten gyis// sgo ni dgag pa bsgom bya ste// de la 'og gi sgo ru ni// chu yi sa bon dkar po bsam// chu dang chu min sgo la ni// me
417b3(rgyud 'bum): yi sa bon 'bar ba ste/ / de la shin tu mnyam bzhag pas// dbugs ni bum pa can du bsgom// lus ni rlung gi mdog tu ste// sems ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor la// rtsa ba rlung gi sa bon no// rlung gi
417b4(rgyud 'bum): mtha' ni rtsa ba can/ / thig le sgra dang ldan pa yis// rtsa ba'i sa bon drang bar bya// rdo rje'i sa bon drag mo yis// lcags kyu la sogs sbyar bar bya// nyi shu rtsa gcig dbugs rnams kyis// gnas
417b5(rgyud 'bum): nas drag tu drang bar bya/ / gnas na gnas nas steng du dbye// tshogs dgu las ni stang du bya// steng du smin pa'i sa bon dang // yi ge phyed dang gnyis kyis sbyang // drag mo'i nga ro brjod bya ste// brgyad kyi
417b6(rgyud 'bum): mtha' yi sa bon la/ / snga tshan dang po'i dang po ni// yi ge phyed du sbyar bar bya// 'og tu rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis// sgra yi dbye bas bskul bar bya// rlung gi sa bon ldan pa yi// rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsam
417b7(rgyud 'bum): nas ni/ / nyi shu rtsa gcig gnas rnams nas// gong nas de bzhin steng gnas su// rnal 'byor pa yis smin byas la// stang gi rtsa tshig bzla bar bya// tshigs dgu las ni steng gzhan gyi// mod la 'pho bar shes
418a1(rgyud 'bum): bya ste/ nyin re bram ze gsod pa dang // mtshams med lnga ni byed pa dang // rku 'phrog 'dod la spyod pa dag/ lam 'di yis ni dag 'gyur te// sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur zhing //
418a2(rgyud 'bum): srid pa'i skyon las ring du 'gro// ji ltar 'dam nas skye ba yi// pad+ma dri med yid 'ongs pa// de bzhin lus kyi 'dam las ni// ye shes sku ni 'dod bzhin 'gro// dus la bab na 'pho bya ste// dus min lha rnams
418a3(rgyud 'bum): gsod par 'gyur/ / de bas lus la mtshan ma rnams// mthong nas mkhas pas sbyor ba brtsam// rnal 'byor sgrub pa'i khyad par gyis// de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon// sngar gyi mtshan nyid kun rig pas// /
418a4(rgyud 'bum): mnyam nyid sems ni bsgom par bya// snying kha'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sangs rgyas lnga yi sa bon bsam// de 'od nyi mar 'bar ba yis// gzugs rnams zad par bsams nas ni// sngon
418a5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin mtshan nyid ldan pa yi/ / sngar bstan stong nyid bsam par bya// gzugs sogs thams cad bcom nas ni// hUM zhes bya ba gnas par bsam// sa bon gyis ni bskyed bya ba// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor
418a6(rgyud 'bum): dbus gnas par/ / pad+ma'i stan la bzhugs pa yi// ye shes mkha' 'gro'i bdag nyid ni// zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa ste// spyan gsum cod pan gyis brgyan cing // bzhad dang khro dang sgeg pa ste//
418a7(rgyud 'bum): rgyan rnams kun gyis klubs pa yi// kun da zla ba ltar dkar zhing // shin tu mdzes pa'i na bza' mnapas// sems dpa'i skyil krung gnas nas ni// sangs rgyas sprin rnams spro ba mdzad// g.yas kyi
418b1(rgyud 'bum): dang po mda' yin te/ / gnyis pa yis ni lcags kyu rnams// gsum pa na ni rdo rje nyid// g.yon pa khro bo'i sdigs mjug ste// gnyis pa 'jigs pa'i zhags pa thogs// go cha'i gzhu ni steng na bsnams//
418b2(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer sna tshogs 'bar ba ru// dbugs mi g.yo bar bsgom par bya// yan lag brgyad du rab 'bad nas// sa bon brgyad kyi yi ge dgod// a li ka li rab sbyor bas// sa bon ji bzhin btu bar bya//
418b3(rgyud 'bum): / 'od zer ldan pa'i sa bon rnams// kun tu kha dog dkar por bya// chu shing me tog pad+mo la// snying khar sgong skyes gzhag par bya// de yi dbus su rnam shes dang // ye shes lhan cig ldan par ni// mi g.yo
418b4(rgyud 'bum): 'tshe ba med pa ru/ / dngos po dngos po bsgom par bya// de nas phyi rol sbyor ba ni// mkhas pa yis ni gzung bar bya// gnas gnyis dag ni bsams pa ni// rlung gi dkyil 'khor bsgom par bya// de yi
418b5(rgyud 'bum): dbus su me yin te/ / me yi dbus su nyi ma la// a li ka lir ldan pa yi// de yi sa bon dmar por dgod// rnal 'byor pa yis khyad par du// 'byung dang 'jug par bzlas par bya// 'byung ba ye shes sa
418b6(rgyud 'bum): / bon gyis// dbus su bsnun dang ldan par bya// 'jug pas snying gi rnam shes la// me tog lta bur ba skrun par bya// 'byung ba 'jug min bzlas bya zhing // 'jug pa 'jug pa min la bzla// rnal 'byor pa yis 'byung
418b7(rgyud 'bum): 'jug dang / / bdag nyid dang ni phyi rol bya// 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa dang // 'jug pa yis ni mtshon byas la// rnal 'byor pa yis 'byung 'jug dag/ de kho na nyid mnyam par bsgom// mnyam gzhag
419a1(rgyud 'bum): dngos po bsgoms nas ni/ / 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med// de nas phyi rol lus la ni// sgrub pa po yis rnam par sprul// pha rol sems dang rjes 'thun par// mkhas pa yis
419a2(rgyud 'bum): ni shes par bya/ / bsgoms dang bzlas pa'i khyad par gyis// shin tu mnyam par gzhag pa ste// bsams pa gang gi lam nas ni// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med// gsang ba'i gdan gyi rab tu byed pa las
419a3(rgyud 'bum): rim par phye ba gsum pa'o/ / // gsang ba'i gdan gyi gsang ba nyid// sems dang ye shes 'dres pa yi// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rim ci 'dra// ye shes dbang las mnyan par 'tshal//
419a4(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i gsang ba chos kyi don// byang chub rim pa rdo rje nyon// 'dod chags la sogs rim spangs nas// mnyam nyid sems ni bskyed par bya// yid du 'ong ba'i sa phyogs su// bde ba'i stan la gnas nas ni// /
419a5(rgyud 'bum): khams dang sems ni bde ba yis// snying rjes phan pa bsam par bya// yang dag bstan bcos de nyid thos// slob dpon lung gis rjes 'gro zhing // gsang chen de nyid don sgom pa// gcig nas gcig rgyud de
419a6(rgyud 'bum): nyid can/ / thams cad sngon bzhin mtshon byas nas// thams cad stong pa nyid du bya// dri ma bkrus pa'i lus la ni// byang chub rim pas gtso bar bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ye shes
419a7(rgyud 'bum): mkha' 'gro bsam byas te/ / zla ba'i 'od zer 'phro ba yi// kun da zla ba ltar dkar mdog/ zhabs gnyis sems dpa'i skyil krung bcas// pad+ma yi ni stan la bzhugs// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i
419b1(rgyud 'bum): / sku/ sangs rgyas lnga yis brgyan pa ste// phyag gnyis phyag rgya che bcings nas// nyid kyis thugs kar 'tshir bar mdzad// gzugs mdzes shin tu rdzogs pa ste// ye shes sems dpa' bdag ces brjod//
419b2(rgyud 'bum): chu shing me tog lte ba nas// snying gi bar du 'greng ste gnas// sngar gyi mtshan nyid kyis bzlog nas// sngon bzhin pad+ma rgyas par bya// ge sar dang ni lte bar bcas// 'dab brgyad shin tu mdzes pa ste// dbus
419b3(rgyud 'bum): kyi sgong skyes la gnas par/ / yi ge'i dgod pa dgod par bya// kha dog dkar po dag cing gsal// dbus su bsgom bya zhu ba'i gtso// de yi dbus su rnam shes dang // ye shes dag ni sbyar bar bya// shar du
419b4(rgyud 'bum): / byams par ldan pa yi// mi bskyod pa yi sa bon bsam// lho yi sgo ru snying rje ste// rin chen sa bon de nyid do// nub kyi sgo yi 'dab ma la// 'od dpag med kyi sa bon dgod// byang gi cha yi 'dab ma la//
419b5(rgyud 'bum): don yod gtso bo bsam par bya// dbyangs yig thog ma sogs sa bon// thig le dbyug par ldan rim bzhin// 'od zer dkar pos brgyan pa ste// yi ge bzhi ni dgod par bya// phyogs mtshams
419b6(rgyud 'bum): dag ni bzhi po ru/ / sngon du bstan pa'i ma ning dgod// de yi dbus su de yi sems// yi ge ru ni mtshon par bya// stong pa mtshan nyid med pa las// ji ltar yi ge sbyar bar bgyi// sems ni ya mtshan
419b7(rgyud 'bum): skye bar 'gyur/ / bcom ldan bdag la bshad du gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// stong pa'i mtshan nyid mtshon pa las// chu shing snyi ma'i bdud rtsi bzhin// snying po med pa'i snying por gyur//
420a1(rgyud 'bum): de nyid ji bzhin rdo rjes nyon// dbus na gnas pa ye shes te// ye shes rang bzhin gzugs med cing // mtshan nyid med pa mtshan nyid can// dri ma med pa'i ye shes sku// dngos dang
420a2(rgyud 'bum): dngos med rnam par grol/ / yi ge gzugs ni yi ge med// gzugs dang stong pa'i dbus su ni// rnal 'byor can gyis de nyid gzung // gang gi mtshan nyid shes byas nas// mnyam nyid ye shes pa dang ldan//
420a3(rgyud 'bum): de yis rdzogs pa'i byang chub lam// myur ba nyid du mthong bar 'gyur// bla ma nyid kyi lam gyis ni// ye shes rnam shes rang bzhin nyid// bstan bcos la ni mtshan nyid bstan// de kho na nyid dpa' bos bshad// /
420a4(rgyud 'bum): 'od zer dkar pos rgyas pa ru// 'di ni kun tu rab bsgoms pa// rgyas pa'i lnga yi mchod rten te// bdud rtsi'i sa bon bsams nas ni// 'od zer dkar po gsal ba'i mdangs// bdud rtsi'i chu rgyun 'dzag
420a5(rgyud 'bum): pab bkru/ / thigs pa'i dbus su sa bon ni// mthe bong tsam gyis zlum por bya// de yi dbus kyi sa bon ni// a li ka li dag las btu// kha dog dkar po shin tu mdzes// zla ba'i 'odra zer kun tu 'phro//
420a6(rgyud 'bum): deyi dbus kyi sa bon ni// thig le bsam par rab tu grag/ skra yi rtse mo brgya yi che// rdul phran gzugs su kun tu bsam// rnam par shes pa'i dngos po yi// mtshan nyid mtshon pa'i ye shes can//
420a7(rgyud 'bum): sems kyis mtshan nyid mi shes pas// thig le gnas kyi go 'phang blta// snying dang tshangs pa'i sgo nga ni// thig pa'i lam gyi sgo dag tu// bla ma'i lung la gus pa yis// rnam shes ye shes gzung bar bya//
420b1(rgyud 'bum): phyi rol gyi ni lam dag dang // bstan bcos las kyang ring ba yin// bstan bcos dag ni rnyed sla ste// de yi sgor ba rnyed par dka'// bla ma'i bsnyen bkur la gus pa'i// thabs dang ldan na sgrub pa po// bla ma'i lug
420b2(rgyud 'bum): gi lam gyis ni/ / mkhas pa yis ni blta bar bya// mi g.yo 'tshe ba med pa ru// mnyam par gzhag pas dngos po bsgom// ches kyi sngon 'gro yid yin te// yid kyis 'jug cing yid kyis bdag/ de bas
420b3(rgyud 'bum): thams cad yid rang bzhin/ / blo ldan yid las 'byung zhes bya// gal te bzlas 'dod rnal 'byor pas// snying gi sdom pa bsam par bya// sa bon gyi ni rgyur gyur pa// de khe nar ni gzugs min no// rgyu dang
420b4(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu'i sa bon ni/ / de kho na nyid mthong ba min// gzugs sogs srid pa'i longs spyod la// sa bon dmigs shing bzlas par bya// kun nas kun tu 'jug pa dang // 'og dang 'og min yang dag
420b5(rgyud 'bum): gnas/ / rtsa bar rtag tu gzer bar bya// ye shes rnam shes sa bon ni// thig le sgra dang yang dag ldan// srid pa'i longs spyod 'dod pa yis// phyi rol dag ni spangs nas su// yid kyis bzlas dang ldan par bya// /
420b6(rgyud 'bum): rtag pa chos kyi dbyings nyid kyis// mi g.yo go 'phang rgyun du gnas// rtag tu phra zhing gos med pas// ye shes pa ni rnam shes tham// rnam shes ye shes nyid gyur nas// byang chub rim pa mthong bar 'gyur//
420b7(rgyud 'bum): mar me lta bur thams cad du// snang gyur mtshan ma dang po ste// srin bu me khyer lta bu'i rdul// mthong ba'i mtshan ma gnyid pa yin// gsum pa la ni rnal 'byor pas// nyon mongs 'joms pa'i mtshan
421a1(rgyud 'bum): pa ste/ rdul phran dkar po'i tshul gyis ni// de bzhin phyogs bcur mthong bar 'gyur// 'dod pa lha yi longs spyod rnams// sems kyis mthong ba bzhi pa ste// mtho ris gzugs kyi lha
421a2(rgyud 'bum): rnams ni/ / sems kyis mthong ba lnga pa yin// gzugs med longs spyod drug pa ste// bdun pa chos kyi sa la'o// sangs rgyas 'bras bu brgyad pa ste// rnal 'byor pa ni rang dgar spyod// mchod rten gzugs
421a3(rgyud 'bum): kyi khyad par las/ / dbyibs kyi gzugs ni ji lta bu// lha yi rnam dag bsgoms pa rnams// bcom ldan 'das la nyan par 'tshal// lus can rnams la yang dag blta// yang dag de nyid shes nas su//
421a4(rgyud 'bum): de nyid sbyor ba brtsam pa yi// rab 'byor rdo rje mnyan par gyis// snying khar zla ba bsams nas su// dbus su hUM ni bsgom par bya// me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od zer gsal// spyi gtsug dkar por yang
421a5(rgyud 'bum): dag ldan/ / me lce 'bar bas bcom nas ni// thams cad kun nas zad par bya// sngon gyi mtshan nyid de kho nas// de nyid stong pa nyid du bya'i// de nas zla bar sa bon ni// mkhas pa yis ni bsams
421a6(rgyud 'bum): nas su/ / mchod rten pho brang gnas nyid ni// de la sems kyis bskyed par bya// gya gyus zhes brjod pa ste// phyogs brgyad dag ni khams yin na// dril bu nam mkha'i dbus gnas par// rdzun//
421a7(rgyud 'bum): po'i lha yi gnas nyid do// 'dod na spyod pa'i lus can rnams// bre ru nges par brtag par bya// 'og dang stang dang dbus nyid kyi// dbus su gnas pa bdag med chos// gzugs khams zhes bya'i
421b1(rgyud 'bum): mtho ris rnams/ / 'khor lo 'phreng bas rnam par brgyan// gzugs bcu dang ni brgyad por ni// go rims ji bzhin rnam par gnas// gzugs med srid pa'i sems can ni// chos kyi srog shing nyid du
421b2(rgyud 'bum): thim lha rnams kun gyi pho brang ni/ / gzugs su mchod rten bskyed par bya// steng gi sgong skyes gnas su ni// bdag gi sems ni mnyam bya ste// sems dang ye shes 'dres pas na// gnyis med mnyam
421b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i khyad par gyis/ / gzugs dang stong pa'i mtha' dang ni// de bzhin dngos dang dngos med nyid// gzung dang 'dzin pa la sogs gzhan// legs byas dang ni bzlog pa rnams// mtshar bzhi mtshan
421b4(rgyud 'bum): nyid ston pa'o/ / de yi dbus su bsgom par bya// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod sogs pa'i// rdzas 'di yis ni mchod nas su// mi g.yo 'tshe ba med pa ru// dngos po dngos po bsgom par bya//
421b5(rgyud 'bum): mnyam gzhag dngos po bsgoms nas ni// 'grub 'gyur 'dir ni the tsom med// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis// de nyid bstan bcos lung la sogs// rnal 'byor dmigs pa goms byas
421b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'ing slob ma chen po'i lus can rnams/ / gdan bzhi pa yi de kho na// bla ma'i man ngag ldan pa yi// rim gyis rang dgar longs spyod de// bdag med blta zhing myang bar bya// bdud rtsi myong ba'i
421b7(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pas/ / ye shes sku ni myur du thob// ye shes sku yi rnal 'byor pas// bdag dang gzhan don mchog tu 'gyur// shin tu rnam par dag pa yi// chos kyi dbyings kyi rnal 'byor ro//
422a1(rgyud 'bum): gsang chen sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid kyi// de nyid de nyid mchog de nyid// gang gis byang chub lam gyur pa// bcom ldan 'das la mnyan par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
422a2(rgyud 'bum): ba/ dang por re zhig rnal 'byor pas// bdag nyid rang dgar byed pa yi// rta rgod lta bu'i sems de nyid// mkhas pa yis ni bsdam par bya// ji ltar bung ba me tog bsnyung ba yi// chang gis myos shing sems ni/
422a3(rgyud 'bum): bstan 'gyur te// longs spyod zhugs shing sdug bsngal rmongs dang bral// de bzhin bsgoms pa'i lam gyis yi bcing bya// yid bsdams pas ni 'grub 'gyur bas// dang po yid ni bsdam par bya// yid kyis
422a4(rgyud 'bum): sgrub pa'i bye brag gis/ / byang chub ye shes mtshon par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// ye shes mkha' 'gro sprul bya ste// phyag rgya chen po snying khar bcing // sngon gyi mtshan nyid kun rig pas//
422a5(rgyud 'bum): yi ge brgyad kyi sa bon rnams// yi ge'i gnas su dgod par bya// rgyal ba lnga yi mchod rten gyis// sgo ni dgag par bsam bya ste// bdud rtsi'i sngags kyi yi ge yis// rgyas pa'i sgo ni bsrung bar bya//
422a6(rgyud 'bum): me yi yi ge 'bar ba yis// chu dang chu min de bzhin bsrung // chu shing me tog pad+ma ni// mdzes shing 'khyil ba rgyas pa dbye// de yi dbus kyi sgo ngar ni// dung dang zla ba ltar dkar ba// phyogs phyogs gan+da
422a7(rgyud 'bum): su sa bon de/ / phyogs bzhir khams ni bzhi po yi// phyogs mtshams sa bon brtsegs pa bzhi// shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms// 'od zer kun nas dkar zhing dag/ lha mo'i yi ge bsgom
422b1(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / ye shes rnam shes ngo bo'o// de nyid dbus su dmigs nas ni// sems ni rang dgar bsgoms pa yis// phyi nas gzugs ni gzhom par bya// phyogs dang phyogs kyi mtshams dag tu// phyogs
422b2(rgyud 'bum): phyogs gnas su bzhag nas su/ / rang bzhin thams cad bcom pa yi// lhag ma rnam shes ye shes nyid// shar gyi phyogs su chu yin te// kha dog dkar po kun da'od// me ni ser po 'od 'bar bar//
422b3(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu byang du bsam par bya// rlung gi sa bon dmar po ni// nub kyi phyogs su brtag par bya// sa yi sa bon ljang khu ni// lho yi phyogs su bsam par bya// phyogs mtshams 'dre ba'i kha dog gis// grwa bzhi
422b4(rgyud 'bum): dag tu sbyar bar bya/ / lhag ma dbus kyi ye shes te// sgong skyes bcas pa gzhom par bya// de yi mtshan nyid mtshon par bya// mtshon bya mtshan nyid dngos med pa'o// sems kyi dngos po sdong pa bas// rang
422b5(rgyud 'bum): bzhin gnas rnams zad par bya/ / rnam rtog stong pa'i dbus dag tu// rdul phran tsa na lta bu'i gzugs// a li ka li sa bon ni// rdul phran zhes bya dbus su ste// rnam pa med cing brjod du med// thams
422b6(rgyud 'bum): cad rdul zhes bya ba la/ / stong nyid du yang mi dmigs te// gzugs la sogs par mi blta'o// rdul ni sa bon ma yin la// rang bzhin med cing mtshan nyid med// rlung dang nam mkha' ma yin te// mnyam
422b7(rgyud 'bum): nyid dbu mar mtshon par bya/ / gzugs dang spong pa de bzhin dbus// de bzhin rnal 'byor can gyis gzung // bla ma'i lung gis rtogs bya ste// lung gi dam pa dag dang ni// bstan bcos mtshan nyid dpyang nas su//
423a1(rgyud 'bum): lung dang bcas pa 'grub par 'gyur// mi g.yo'ang 'tshe ba med pa ru// dngos po dngos po bsgom par bya// mnyam gzhag dngos pos dpyad nas ni// byang chub rim pa 'grub
423a2(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / ye shes thim pa'i rnal 'byor pas// sems can don byed mchog tu brtson// kun rtog lus dang sems kyis ni// gang tshe yul 'khor srung 'dod na// ye shes dbang po'i longs spyod can//
423a3(rgyud 'bum): rang 'dod lus kyi dngos grub kyis// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras 'dod cing // khams gsum ye shes kyis blta dang // rang 'dod yid kyi gnas dang ni// nam mkha' rgyu ba'i lus can dang // sem
423a4(rgyud 'bum): can kun gyi gzhan don gnyer/ / mchog ni myur du ster bar 'gyur// lus dang dbang po don gnyer bas// bdag med pa yis rang dgar bya// chos kyi dbyings kyi rang bzhin gyis// sbyor bas 'khor
423a5(rgyud 'bum): ba sgrol bar 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas 'dren pa rnams kyi yang // sbyor ba gzhan ni don gnyer 'gyur// sgrub po 'du 'dzi med pa dang // sgra sgrog skye bos dben pa yi// tshal dang ri sul brag phug tu//
423a6(rgyud 'bum): gnas nas de ru bsgom par bya// na ga mu la pa sha// rta ru cha ni gsum po dag/ ma ga da ni srang gcig ste// cha mnyam phye mar byas nas ni// ba yi 'o mar yang dag bcas// phye ma bzhi char bsres nas
423a7(rgyud 'bum): su/ 'di ni nyin re rnal 'byor pa// mkhas pa yis ni bza' bar bya// rnal 'byor can gyi lo brgya ru// brag phug stong sogs gnas nas ni// nges par shin tu smin pa yis// grang dang bkres
423b1(rgyud 'bum): skom la sogs grol/ / sman 'di dag ni ldan pa ru// brag phug stong sogs gnas nas ni// 'dul ba srung ba'i rnal 'byor pa// lus ni rtag tu bsrung bar 'gyur// ji ltar bud med byis gtam rjes yi rang //
423b2(rgyud 'bum): gnyis spyod gtam du smra zhing ston pa ste// de ltar lam bshad mchi ba yod ma yin// rnal 'byor lam ldan de ltar bstan pa min// rig byed chu dang de bzhin dur ba rnams// bram zer spyi bzhag sangs rgyas pas
423b3(rgyud 'bum): gzung min/ / dbang bskur sngags sogs nyams kyis 'jigs pas ni// gnas ngan lha tshogs rigs la phyag mi bya// de nas rnal 'byor pa dang / rnal 'byor ma dang / mkha' 'gro dang / mkha' 'gro ma
423b4(rgyud 'bum): dang byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun bye ba phrag brgyad cu du ma'i 'khor rnams sems tsham nas/ thams cad kyis ye shes thob par gyur te/ phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /
423b5(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnams kyis thal mo sbyar te glu blangs pa/ rang dgar sems can sgrol ba yi// rgyu med dngos la 'dud par bgyis// te na hUM te na hUM ta na ta te hUM/ ston ka'i zla ltar zhal mdzes shing // dung lngar
423b6(rgyud 'bum): dkar ba'i sku 'dzin pa/ / te na hUM te na hUM te na te te hUM/ rdo rje dril bu'i phyag rgya can// gnyis su sbyor ba 'dzin pa po// te na hUM te na hUM ta na te te hUM/ sgyu ma'i lus su thim pa yi// 'gro ba mdzes pa rgyu mer dngos//
423b7(rgyud 'bum): te na hUM te na hU~M te na te te hUM/ srid pa gsum 'bar sku ni rjes chags 'dul bar ldan// 'od zer rnon po stong phrag nyi ma stong 'drar ldan// rnam mang sku dang cha byad rjes chags sems dpar ldan// rdo rje sems dpa'
424a1(rgyud 'bum): dbang phyug mchog/ rol pas gar mdzad ces bya ba'i// bkra shis sgra yis bkang nas su// thams cad kun nas glur blangs so// ji bzhin lam ni rdo rjes nyon// bstan bcos shin
424a2(rgyud 'bum): tu mnyam bzhag pas/ / yi ge'am tshig tsam nyan byed na// mtho ris longs spyod thob 'gyur te// yang na 'khor lo sgyur bar ro// 'dri'am 'drir 'jug klog pa dang // shin tu dang ldan sngags zlos pa'i//
424a3(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pa rnams 'pho ba'i tshe// srid pa gzugs kun bsam bzhin 'grub// rnal 'byor bsam gtan byed pa rnams// myur du byang chub rim pa thob// ces bdag nyid kyis stsal pas phyogs
424a4(rgyud 'bum): bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rnal 'byor pa dang rnal 'byor ma 'dus pa de dag dang / phyag na rdo rje la sogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thams cad dang / lha dang /
424a5(rgyud 'bum): dang gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin la sogs pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyis dga' zhing mgu nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// dpal gdan
424a6(rgyud 'bum): bzhi pa zhes bya ba'i rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas 'bum phrag bco brgyad pa las snying po lta bur gsungs pa rdzogs so/ / / rgya gar gyi
424a7(rgyud 'bum): mkhan po chen po ga ya d+ha ra dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba 'gos lnga btsas kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// / rgya gar skad du/ maN+Da aM sa
424b1(rgyud 'bum): / tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/ bod skad du/ sngags kyi cha'i rgyud kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ thugs rje chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// gdan bzhi pa yi rgyud kyis ni// gsum pa yi ni dang
424b2(rgyud 'bum): po'o/ / de yi sbyor ba rnyed nas ni// sngags kyi de nyid khyad par nyid// snying po snying po'i chos// rab sbyor gsang zhing gsang ba yi// de nyid de nyid de las mchog/ snying po'i de nyid bsdus pa'o// bla ma'i ma ning gnyis
424b3(rgyud 'bum): bzung la/ / rtsa bar bskor zhing mnan par bya// spyi bor 'od dang zla ba'o// sa bon bskyed pa'i rim pa bzhin// zla ba dkar dang kun da'i mdog/ bcom po'i sngon du sbyor bar bya// sngags kyi bzlas pa
424b4(rgyud 'bum): rdzogs bya zhing / / dbyangs yig mngon par mthong ba ni// las rnam gsum gyi sngon du ni// bla ma'i yi ge sngon du'o// dka dang ser dang dmar po'o// bzhi pa dag pa ru ni brjod// myu gu'i gnas ni gtse
424b5(rgyud 'bum): bopo nyid/ / srid pa mchog na sgrol ba'o// dbyangs yig dbyangs kyis sgom pa ni// rnal 'byor pa yis mtshon par bya// dor grub 'dod pa'i bzlas pa yi// ban du ka yi me tog 'dra// rdo rje dbyug pa la
424b6(rgyud 'bum): / rtag tu// de nyid du na rna ba thim// dkar po zla bas mnan pa yi// gnyis ka bsgoms pas bkru bar bya// pad+ma rdo rje zla ba dang // bdud rtsi yis ni bkru bar ldan// dang po'i sa bon gtso bo yis//
424b7(rgyud 'bum): dbyangs yig kun la khyab pa po// dkar zhing dag la mnyam pa'i 'od// gsum pa'i las kyi sa bon ni// bzhi par nam yang ma yin no// ji ltar dang po mthar gnas pa'i// khyab par dbyangs yig
425a1(rgyud 'bum): sa bon nyid/ / mtha' yi sngon du sa bon nyid// de bzhin sngon du nyis 'gyur ro// bzhi po mnyam pa'i cha ru ni// mnyam par gnas su sbyar bar bya// bzhi pa gsum pa'i sa bon ni//
425a2(rgyud 'bum): mgo smos go ba'i lus nyid do// yi ge gsum gyi lus nyid ni// rang bzhin gyis ni dbyangs yig dngos// lus dang lus sogs yi ge ni// lcags kyu yis ni mnan par bya// dmar dang gnag sogs sa
425a3(rgyud 'bum): bon ni/ / rnal 'byor pa yis khyad par du// lnga pa drug pa'i sa bon ni// thams cad sgra yi yi ge'o// dkar dang ser la lci bar bshad// dmar dang sngon po de bzhin yang // zhi rgyas dbang la sogs pa ni//
425a4(rgyud 'bum): kun kyang sgra yi dbye ba'o// thams cad las la sgra yis ni// kha dog bzhi ru rab tu grags// bdun pa brgyad pa'i sa bon gyis// skyes bu rang 'dod pa yi la// nges par lus ni sdom pa dang // gnyis pa
425a5(rgyud 'bum): sa bon gyis mnan pa'o/ / yang bas dmar dang gnag la sbyar// rnal 'byor pa yis khyad par du// mtshams ni gcad cing mnan pa'i las// nyid pa lcags kyu'i yi ge ni// rang bzhin yi ge ming
425a6(rgyud 'bum): gis ni/ / de nyid las rnams 'gugs pa dang // sa bon 'di ni dbye ba'o// kha dog dmar po mchog gi 'od// thams cad 'dres pa'i sa bon ni// dbyangs yig skyed pa'i sa bon ni// las rnams
425a7(rgyud 'bum): thams cad byed pa'o/ / ma ning gis bskyed sa bon ni// brtan zhing rtag pa'i sa bon no// bud med dang ni skyes pa 'am/ 'di nyid kun nas rab tu sbyar// sde tshan bzhi pa'i bzhi pa ni// tha ma bzhi ni rnam spangs
425b1(rgyud 'bum): / pa dkar dang kun da zla ba'i mdog/ nyi ma'i yi ge rnam par shes// tha ma bzhi dang lnga pa dang // sde tshan drug pa yang dag ldan// kun nas mtshan mo'i stong par ni// khyad par du ni shes par bya// bdud
425b2(rgyud 'bum): rtsi chu yi sa bon ni/ / dkar zhing shel ltar mnyam pa'i 'od// de nyid kun gyi de nyid ni// kun nas bdud rtsi'i grub pa'o// lha min grub pas 'gugs pa dang // lha dang mi dang gnod sbyin dang // thams cad lnga
425b3(rgyud 'bum): rnams grub pa ni/ / sa bon 'di ni khyad par nyid// sbom po ma ning gnyis kyis la// lcags sgrog bzhin du kha sprad pa// rtsa bar yang ba nyis 'gyur ro// spyi bor bdud rtsi rnam par dgod// steng du ji
425b4(rgyud 'bum): 'bar ba'i mchog/ sangs rgyas lnga yi rang bzhin sku// sa bon lnga yi ngo bo nyid// rnam bzhir phye zhing phye ba yis// lce rtse lce rtser gsungs pa ni// kha dog dmar po mnyam pa'i 'or// zhi dang chu yi bye
425b5(rgyud 'bum): brag la/ / hUM gi rnam pa rkan la sbyar// rtsa bar sgra dang 'od bral ba// bar ma yi ni dbyangs su gsungs// gal te 'dod na lha yi lus// khyad par du ni bzhi pa'i las// snying kha'i rtsa bar gsungs pa ni// kha
425b6(rgyud 'bum): dog ser po'i 'od mnyam pa/ / sbom po'i sgra dang thig le dang // rgyas pa dang ni me yi las// lte bar sgra dang 'joms pa ni// kha dog dmar po 'od mnyam pa// sbom po'i sgra dang ldan pa'i 'od// dbang gi las la rab
425b7(rgyud 'bum): tu sbyar/ / snga rtser sbrid pa gsum pa ni// kha dog sngon po mnyam pa'i 'od// yang ba'i sgra yi 'od du ni// ldan par blo nang ldan par bskul// bskrad dang gsad dang bcing ba dang // mnan dang gdug sogs bskrad pa dang /
426a1(rgyud 'bum): gtor ma la sogs nag po'i las// hUM gi rnam pa sbrid par sbyar// de nyid de nyid bzhi par ni// hUM gi rnam pa nye bar mtshon// sa bon thams cad 'byin mdzad pa// hUM gi rnam pa dbang
426a2(rgyud 'bum): phyug mchog/ thams cad 'byin pa'i ngo bo bas// hUM gi yi ge mchog gi lha// stong nyid yi ge hUM gyur pas// hUM gi rnam pa phyag 'tshal bstod// stong pa'i gzugs dang rab ldan pa// dngos dang dngos med 'byin
426a3(rgyud 'bum): mdzad pa/ / bcom gser dang 'dra ba'i mdog/ sgra dang thig le yang dag ldan// ri rab rgya mtsho ri ni grags// brtan pa dang ni g.yo bar ldan// lha dang lha min grub pa dang // mi dang gnod sbyin rnal 'byor pa//
426a4(rgyud 'bum): lha rnams kun nas g.yo ba ni// gsungs pa'i sa bon gyis 'gugs byed// sna tshan dang po'i sa bon ni// rtsa bar ra pa mnan pa dang // lcags kyu mgor ni rnam par dgod// steng du zla ba'i 'od dang bcas// kha
426a5(rgyud 'bum): dog dmar po mnyam pa'i 'od/ / lcags kyu yis ni snying po sgrub// lcags kyu yi ge sa bon bzhin// lcags kyu yis ni kun 'gugs pa'o// stong par rlung gi sa bon ni// sde tshan brgyad kyi dang po la// rtsa bar
426a6(rgyud 'bum): sgra yis bkri bar bya/ / spyi bor bla tshes thig le dang // rlung gi kha dog drag po yis// lus can kun ni bskul bar bya// bskul ba'i las kyi sa bon gyis// sa bon de nyid kun tu sbyar// lnga pa sde tshan gnyis pa
426a7(rgyud 'bum): yi/ gsum pa'i yi ge bzung byas la// yi ge gsum pas mnan par bya// reb rtsa bar sbyar ba dang // steng du bdud rtsi'i theg pa'o// kha dog dkar po mnyam pa'i bod// dgyel ba la sogs sa bon gyi/
426b1(rgyud 'bum): lha sogs kun nas mnyes par byed// sde tshan dang po'i gsum pa ni// gsang ba'i sgra ni rtsa bar ro// steng du bdud rtsi'i thig le dang // dkar zhing yid 'ong shin tu 'bar// mchod pa'i sngags kyis dus dang ni//
426b2(rgyud 'bum): gtor ma sbyin sreg phyag rgya sogs// rgyas pa'i las ni thams cad la// rgyas pa'i sa bon du ni grags// dang po'i sde tshan bzhi pa la// rtsa bar ra pha sgra dang ni// spyi bo'i steng du 'bar ba'o// kha dog dmar
426b3(rgyud 'bum): po mnyam pa'i 'od/ / zhi ba'i las ni rnam spangs pa// las rnams kun gyi sngon du'o// rmongs shing lus kun rmongs byed pa// rmongs pa'i sa bon du ni grags// sde tshan lnga pa'i gsum pa dang // gnyis
426b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sa bon blang byas pas/ / mtha' ru stong pa gnyis kyi so// kha dog dkar po mnyam pa'i 'od// lha dang lha min gsang bar sogs// rang gi 'dod pa'i gnas su gzhag/ bzhag pa'i las la rnal
426b5(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pas/ / blo ldan yi ge 'di yis gzhag/ stong pa'i sde tshan la spyad la// de yi bzhi pa gzung bar bya// rtsa bar ma ning sbom po dang // steng du bdud rtsi'i thig le'o// 'jig pa srung ba'i las nyid la//
426b6(rgyud 'bum): kha dog dkar po mnyam pa'i 'od// rnal 'byor de nyid 'dod pa yi// sa bon 'di nyid kyis bsrung ngo // sreg pa'i yi ge sngags nyid ni// dbye ba rnam pa gsum du bshad// dkar dang ser dang dmar sogs
426b7(rgyud 'bum): kyis/ / las gsum gyi ni mtha' ru'o// bdun pa yi ni mtha' bzung la// brgyad pa gnyis pa yi ni gdan// bdud rtsi yi ni gdan du chu// kha dog dkar po mnyam pa'i 'od// ma ning sde tshan gyis bskyed pa'i//
427a1(rgyud 'bum): me ltar dmarab mnyam pa'i 'od// logs su dbyangs yig dbyug pa'o// zhi ba la ni sreg pa'i mthar// bdud rtsi'i sa bon kha dog ser// chu yi sa bon dkar ba'i gdan// logs/
427a2(rgyud 'bum): su dbyangs yig dbyug pa'o// brgyad kyis mtha' ma kun nas 'bar// rdo rje'i 'od bzhin 'bar ba'i me// sa bon 'od bzhin 'bar bcas pa// dbyangs yig dbyug pa'i sreg pa'o// rgyas pa'i sreg
427a3(rgyud 'bum): paba'i mtha' mar ro/ / de yi bdud rtsi 'bar ba ni// brgyad mtha'i logs su dbyug pa'o// kun nas dmar ba yi// mthar ni dbyug pa lcags kyu'o// dbu mar drang ba'i sems kyis ni// dbyug pa'i
427a4(rgyud 'bum): dbugs kyis zla bar bya/ / chags pa'i las la rnal 'byor gsum// rnam pa bzhi la don gnyer bas// 'joms pa'i yi ge gnyis su shes// bskrad dang gsad dang dbye ba dang // mnan dang nye bar
427a5(rgyud 'bum): bzlog pa la/ / stong pa'i sde tshan gnyis pa ni// dbyug pa glo ru rnam par sbyar// nyin mo'i sde tshan gsum pa las// dang po gnyis pa'i glo ru'o// kha dog nag po 'jigs chen po// 'od zer
427a6(rgyud 'bum): ma bzhin kun nas ldan/ / rdo rje sa bon mnyam 'bar las// lus kyi dbus su dbugs par bya// gsad dang gdug pa bskrad la sogs// drag po'i las ni thams cad la// dngos grub 'dod pa
427a7(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor pas/ / 'joms pa'i yi ge mtha' mar ro// de yi sa bon ldan pa ni// sngon gyi dbyug tshogs rnam pa spangs// dang po dbu yi steng rnams su// kha dog sngon po rab rno bas// gsad dang dbye dang
427b1(rgyud 'bum): gdug pa ni/ / khro bo'i lha yis bskrad par bya// 'joms pa'i yi ge'i mtha' mar ni// sa bon 'di yis sbyar bar bya// dkar po'i sde dang sde tshan gyis// dang po'i dang po blang byas la// kun nas rdo rje'i sa bon
427b2(rgyud 'bum): yi ge phyed dang gnyis/ / 'pho bar sbyor ba'i sngon dus su// rnam shes gong du bskul ba'o// lte bar rtsa ba'i phyogs nas ni// yi ge phyed dang gnyis kyis drang // brgyad pa'i mtha' ni mngon du'o// ma la ta yi
427b3(rgyud 'bum): sbyor dus su/ / 'pho bar sbyor bso sngon du'o// 'pho ba'i dus kyi sngon du ni// rnal 'byor pa yis rab tu spyod// u la pa li ta sa bon// sbyang bya'i yi ge phyed dang gnyis// dngos dang dngos med sa bon la//
427b4(rgyud 'bum): sgra dang thig le rnam par sbyar// rlung gis rtse ba'i gnas su ni// sgra dang sgra yis bstan pa'o// chu shing me tog lte bar gnas// sa bon 'di yis bsgyur bar bya// sngon du sbyor ba'i bsam gtan
427b5(rgyud 'bum): dang / mnyam par gzhag pa'i sems kyis bcing // bdun pa'i mtha' yi sa bon gyis// bzlog byas rgyas pa'i gnas su ni// chu shing me tog lta bur gyis// ji ltar sde tshan gsum pa ni/
427b6(rgyud 'bum): yi ge gsum pa bzung byas la// dbyug par phyi ma'i sa bon dang // 'od dpag gis ni sngon dkris pa// de nyid de nyid kun dang ni// sa bon sa bon mchog gi gtse// theg pa rnam gsum dag
427b7(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ / a li'i sa bon rab tu grags// sde tshan brgyad pa'i gnyis pa la// lcags kyu yis ni spyi bor gnas// spyi bo zla tshas thig la dang // kha dog dmar po mchog gi 'od// sems
428a1(rgyud 'bum): can kun nas rmongs byed pas/ / yid dbye ba la kun nas sbyar// kun tu rmongs pa'i las la rab tu sbyar// brgyad pa'i mtha' yi sa bon ni// spyi bor lcags kyu mgrin pa dang // rtsa bar
428a2(rgyud 'bum): re pha'i sa bon no/ / kha dog sngon po 'bar ba yi// dri dang me tog ro sogs ming // las kyis kun nas 'phrog byed ming gi sa bon gyis// 'phrog pa'i las la kun tu sbyar// bdun pa dkar po'i sa bon ni// dung
428a3(rgyud 'bum): dang kun da mnyam pa'i 'od/ / bdud rtsi chu yi sa bon no// chu yi yi ge ming can no// ka shar ldan pa'i sa bon ni// kha dog ser po 'od mnyam pa// me bzhin 'bar zhing 'bar ba yi// me yi yi ger rnam par
428a4(rgyud 'bum): grags/ / sde tshan brgyad kyi dang por ni// de nyid sde pa'i dngos po dang // rlung gi sa bon dmar po na// rlung gi sa bon du ni grags// brgyad pa'i mtha' yi sa bon ni// kha dog sngon po'i 'od mnyam pa// snying
428a5(rgyud 'bum): kha ra sa yi sa bon ni/ / de nyid pa yi sa bon no// 'di rnams sa bon sa bon la// thig le yi ge rtsa bar nyis 'gyur ro pha dang // rlung gi sa bon gsum par ro// rtsa bar sgra ni bzhi pa po// steng du thig le sbyar ba dang //
428a6(rgyud 'bum): de nyid bzhi pa'i sa bon ni// bzhi pa'i yi ge drug pa'o// rmongs pa chu yi sa bon ni// g.yo ba'i rlung gi sa bon dang // sa ni nyon mongs par 'gyur ro// phyug ni ma la kun tu sbyar// yi ge brgyad pa'i sa bon ni//
428a7(rgyud 'bum): rnal 'byor ma brgyad sems dang bcas// bdag nyid de nyid gtso bo yi// 'khor ba thams cad gcod mdzad pa// thams cad kun nas spyi bo dang // yi ge kun nas gnas pa'o// sa bon 'di ni kun nas gzung //
428b1(rgyud 'bum): ye shes sa bon zhes bya'i ming // rtag pa'i rtsa bar man pa dang // sgra dang thig ler sbyar bar bya// dkar po kun da zla ba'i mchog/ ye shes rnam shes sa bon nyid// rgyu ba'i gzugs kyi sa bon ni// sa bon
428b2(rgyud 'bum): sa bon de bas mchog/ ye shes rnam shes bya ba'i ming // las kun la ni rab sbyar bya// byang chub sems dpa' zhi ba ni// zhi ba'i gzugs can rdzu 'phrul che// mthar ni swA hA ring por ldan// sngon du bsnyen
428b3(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sngags pa yis/ / gnyis ka lus la bsgoms nas ni// 'di yis lha mo sbyor bar bya// sngags pas sreg pa'i lan la ni// sngon du dbyug pa med pa'o// lha mo'am yang na lha mo la// khro bo'i gzugs
428b4(rgyud 'bum): 'joms la sogs pa'i/ / 'joms pa'i yi ge mthar bzhag ste// bzlas shing bsnyen pa la sogs bya// gzugs dang gzugs can dngos po yis// khro bo khro mo khyad par nyid// bsreg dang 'joms
428b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i sa bon ni/ / khyad par dang ni khyad par can// de nyid de nyid kun gyis ni// rab tu spyod cing blta bar bya// de nyid med pa'i sngags pa ni// dngos grub ring du bstan pa yin// sgrub pa'i dus su lha nyid
428b6(rgyud 'bum): kyiHsa bon mtha' ru bzlas pa bya/ / mchog tu zhi ba'i de nyid la// dang po dbyangs yig mtha' ru'o// khro bo khro mo'i lha la ni// rdo rje'i sa bon mtha' mar ro// lha mo kun gyi de nyid sa// bdud rtsi yis ni
428b7(rgyud 'bum): mtha' mar ro/ / dang po sngags kyi sa bon ni// phyag 'tshal gcig ni rnam spangs nas// bdag nyid ming gi sa bon dang // gnyis ka yongs su 'jig pa'i rgyu// stong dang stong pa'i sa bon ni// bar ma sgrub
429a1(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lha nyid do/ / nyi mo'i yi ge dang po ru// bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i ming nyid ni// de yi sgrub pa'i las rnams ni// rnal 'byor ma yi rnam par mtshon// sngags pas sngon gyi dus su ni// rab
429a2(rgyud 'bum): tulta zhing spyad par bya'o/ / nyin mo stong pa'i sgrub pa ni// 'chi bar yang na the tsom med// nyin mo nyin mo nyin mo sgrub// stong pa stong pa bar ma'o// go bzlog pa yi sa bon no// lhag ma'i yi ge brtsi bar bya//
429a3(rgyud 'bum): nyinyonyin par bsgrub bya lhag pa ni// sgrub pa po la bu lon ni// bsgrub bya stong pa lhag pa ni// dgra nyid pas na 'bras bu med// rab tu lta zhing spyad pa yis// sngags kyis bsgrub pa shes pa yin// sngon
429a4(rgyud 'bum): du ma ni nga sa bon dang / / de bzhin bsgrub bya'i ma ning nyid// dngos grub stong par bshad pa yin// de nyid 'di yi sa bon gyis// rang 'dod lha nyid bsgrub par bya// thog ma tha ma khyad par du// dbus
429a5(rgyud 'bum): su bsgrub bya'i ming nyid do/ / mtho dang dma' dang bar ma dang // khya nyid kyang ni khyad par ro// zhi dang rgyas pa la sogs la// khyad par sa bon ldan pa nyid// stong pa'i sde tshan gnyis pa la// rtsa bar
429a6(rgyud 'bum): rI pa sgra nyid dang / / stang du zla tshes thig le dang // kha dog ser po kun 'od la// lha mo rnal 'byor ma kun gyis// snying po yis ni snying po mchog/ gong du phyag 'tshal yi ge dang // 'dod bzhin
429a7(rgyud 'bum): ming ni dbus su'o/ / mtha' dang mtha' ni sreg sogs nyid// thams cad du ni kun nas ldan// stong pa'i sde tshan gnyis pa la// spyi bor e yi rnam pas mtshan// rtsa bar ra thig ler bcas// kha
429b1(rgyud 'bum): dog dkar po mnyam pa'i 'od/ / dga' byed las kyi sa bon gyi// rnal 'byor ma kun dga' bar byed// de nyid kun gyi sa bon ni// rnal 'byor ma kun gyis rab spyad// de nas sman sogs rim pa ni// khyad
429b2(rgyud 'bum): par nyid du sbyar bar bya/ / bla re bla re nyid dang ni// spos dang bdug pa dri la sogs// sngags dang phyag rgya'i cho ga yis// mkha' 'gro gtor ma byin brlabs pa// sngon du gnyis med gtor mar ldan//
429b3(rgyud 'bum): dri yi maN+Dal gru bzhi pa// dbus su rnal 'byor pas bri ba// gur kum shin tu dri zhim ldan// re mig nyi shu rtsa lnga pa// blo dang ldan pas gru bzhi bri// dbang po la sogs re mi ga nas// blo dang ldan
429b4(rgyud 'bum): pas yi ge dgod/ / dngos dang dngos dang ldan pa yis// de yi sa bon spang dbus so// nyin mo'i yi ge thams cad nyid// lhag ma'i sde tshan brgyad pa yis// sa bon mnyam pa gzhag pa dgod//
429b5(rgyud 'bum): sgra dang thig ler yang dag ldan// kha dog dmar po 'od mnyam pa'o// gu gul dbang po'i lag pa dang // rmongs byed rengs byed de bzhin sgra// satwa sa hI tsam pa ka/ ku tu ru dang ko li ki/ son tsi ka
429b6(rgyud 'bum): dang ba bla dang / / gu gul ru rta dur ba ka/ me dang dri dang gur kum dang // tsan danA gi'u wang yang dag ldan// sha khar dang li shi dang // pri yang ku dang ge sar dang // chu srin sder mo nub phyogs cha/
429b7(rgyud 'bum): rerimig kun dang gnas kun tu// dbang po la sogs sman rim bzhin// rdzas ni re re ra ra dang // cha la sa bon bzlas par bya// phyag 'tshal dang po sreg pa mtha'// brgya dang brkyang du bzlas pa byed//
430a1(rgyud 'bum): tsha dang ldan sogs sa bon ni// sman dang ldan na de bas mchog/ bdud rtsi lnga dang yang dag ldan// gu gul la sogs sbyar byas nas// rgyal po'i btsun mo rgyal dbang la// mkhas
430a2(rgyud 'bum): pabs byin pas dbang du byed/ / bdag nyid lnga yi lnga dang ni// sha da wa sogs sbyar byas nas// re pha'i rdzas la bsgoms byas na// ji ltar sngon dang sngon bzhin nyid// rje rigs bram ze dmangs rigs dang // skyes
430a3(rgyud 'bum): ba'am yang na bud med la/ / bza' ba'i dngos po byin pa yis// dbang du 'gyur bar yongs su grags// smyo byed la sogs rnam pa lnga// son rtsi ka yi cha dang sbyar// brtul zhugs dman pa'i rigs rnams
430a4(rgyud 'bum): ni/ bdag nyid kyi ni dbang du byed// me la sogs sman rim dang // mi yi mar khu yang dag ldan// mkhas pas dpyad cing brtag pa yis// mnyam pa'i cha dang cha ru bya// thig le ru ni sbyin byas na// rgyal
430a5(rgyud 'bum): po'i rigs la 'gro ba dang / / tha snyad la ni rnam par rgyal// 'gro ba yang dag rmongs par byed// dang po sha kha ra sogs dang // tsan dan dang ni rnam par sbyar// sde tshan gcig gi cha dang ni// tsan dan
430a6(rgyud 'bum): gyi ni cha nyid dang / / byams pa'i gnas su rnal 'byor pa// yan lag nying lag byug byas nas// dri ni sna la mnams tsam gyis// nges par dbang du byed pa'o// 'tsham dang 'tsham gyi sha kha ra//
430a7(rgyud 'bum): sbrang rtsi'i cha dang sbyar nas ni// mchog tu bsgoms shing bdug pa yis// kun nas nges par dbang du byed// 'tshams kyi nang gis kun bzang nas// sha kha ra yau cha dang bsre// bdug pas bdug cing bdug
430b1(rgyud 'bum): byas nas/ / mi ni kun nas rmongs par byed// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pas/ ye shes mkha' 'gro sprul nas ni// sa bon so so'i sa bon nyid// kun nas brgya phrag gcig tu'o// de bzhin du ni dmar po
430b2(rgyud 'bum): las/ de yi rjes ni kun bzung la// bdag nyid ye shes lha ru'o// nyi ma'i lag pa'i rdzas rnams ni// kha dog dmar po mnyam pa'i 'od// de nyid sa bon bzlas pa yis// g.yo ba dang ri ltung bar byed// snyi
430b3(rgyud 'bum): kha'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor bsams nas ni// de yi dbus su sa bon ni// bskyed par re pha thig le can// khri phrag gcig tu bzlas pa yin// gnyis kyis ltung ba'am
430b4(rgyud 'bum): g.yo bar byed/ / phyi nas gtor ma'i las kyis ni// g.yo dang mi g.yo grub par byed// gu gul la sogs srin bu lngas// rtsa ba brgyad dang sbyar nas// phra ba'i sgo nga tsam zos pas// mod la myur du 'chi bar
430b5(rgyud 'bum): 'gyur/ / sha ta tsa sogs srin bu ni// 'o ma bdun par sbyar byas pa'i// zhag bdun las lhag par zos na// 'chi ba 'di la the tsom med// son rtsi dkar sogs srin bu lnga// sbrang rtsi spyi byed lnga pa ni//
430b6(rgyud 'bum): bza' dang btung bar sbyin byas nas// smyo byed myos par 'gyur ba'o// me da la sogs srin bu lnga// sbrul gyi sgo ngar bzlas byas nas// thig le tsam zhig zos pas ni// skad cig de la mdzi yis 'dzin/
430b7(rgyud 'bum): kha ra'i sde tshan srin bu ni// mgo la sgo nga dang ldan par// de yi phye ma zos pa yis// mi ni dbyangs dang bral bar 'gyur// 'tsham gyi kha ra kun bzang la// sbrang rtsi mar gyi cha dang sbyar// de yi phye ma bza' byas na// de
431a1(rgyud 'bum): yi mod la gzir bas 'dzin/ / 'tsham gyis nang gi yang dag gzung // sbrang rtsi lhan cig bsgo byas pa'i// phra rab tsam zhig zos pa yis// mod la rims kyis gdung bar byed//
431a2(rgyud 'bum): de nyid rab sbyor snying po ni// gsang zhing gsang ba'i lung gi don// ye shes ldan zhing blo ldan pa'i// lus kyis rim pa rnam par blta// dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa dang // slob dpon dang ni gsang smod par//
431a3(rgyud 'bum): sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur te// rnal 'byor ma ni kun gyis gsungs// lnga pa'am lnga pa'i rim pa zhes bya ba bstan pa rdzogs so// / de nas gzhan gyi rim pa ni// sman rnams
431a4(rgyud 'bum): kyis ni khyad par nyid/ / de nyid kun gyi mchog gyur pa// mchog gi snying po snying po nyid// sngon gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pas// cho ga rim bzhin sman dang sngags// de nyid gtor ma'i las dang ni// dri yi re
431a5(rgyud 'bum): mig dgod par bya/ / bcu dgu dang ni sum cu yi// gru bzhi pa yi re mig dgod// nyin mo stong pa'i sa bon dang // sde tshan tha ma dgod par bya// dbang po la sogs gnas rnams su// dang por dbyangs
431a6(rgyud 'bum): yig rim ji bzhin/ / re mig kun gyi sa bon ni// sman sogs bzhin du gzhag par bya// nA ki b+ha la bing ling ga/ ma ru rta raM b+ha sa ka/ ka sa la sogs bdun pa ni// dbang ldan la sogs gnas su
431a7(rgyud 'bum): dgod/ / dbang po'i lag pa shu dag dang // rmongs byed dang ni tsan dan dang // tsan dan dang ni gur kum nyid// bdun pa'i gnas su gzhag par bya// cha mnyam pa ni gnyis pa'o// ga pur sa li shu
431b1(rgyud 'bum): dug dang / / gur kum kun mo gi'u wang dang // sdang rtsi bdun pa yi ni cha// gsum pa'i re mig sna tshan no// sa rdzar gu gul ru rta dang // g+han d+hi kha ra ku tu ru// me tog 'phreng ba bdun pa ni// bzhi pa'i
431b2(rgyud 'bum): re mig gnas su'o/ / ka ko la dang sha ta dang // ge sar son rtsi rgya skyags dang // pa tra bdun pa'i cha nyid ni// lnga pa'i gnas su yongs su grags// dri dang bcud len k+Sha ra dang // yung ba dang ni kha ra tra//

431b6(rgyud 'bum): sogs sde tshan ni/ / phra zhing zhib par rab tu bya// phye ma kun nas blangs nas ni// bdag nyid mchil mas de bzhin bdun// bza' dang ston mor cho ga bzhin// rab tu mnyam par bzhag pas bya//
431b7(rgyud 'bum): skyes pa'am ni bud med dam// thams cad kun nas 'ong 'gyur ro// dang por shel gyi sde tshan ni// mnyam por cha de phyed mar bya// mi yi snum dang kun tu sbyar// grib ma dang ni grib mar bskams//
432a1(rgyud 'bum): tshe lor 'jug cing dga' ba dang // snga dro thig le sbyin byas nas// rgyal po'i rigs la nyer 'gro ba// skye bo skal can myur du 'gyur// sardza sngon sogs dang por sbyar// phye ma zhing
432a2(rgyud 'bum): tu byas nas ni/ / ljang rtsi kha ra'i cha nyid dang // rang 'dod thos chu rab sbyar nos// mi dga' ba kun dga' ba dang // ngag gi 'dron pa nyid du 'gyur// de la bdug pas bdug pa'i lus// 'gro ba kun tu mong
432a3(rgyud 'bum): par 'gyur/ / ka ko la sogs dang ldan pas// phye ma mnyam por char byas te// tsan dan dang po thams cad kun// cha gsum du ni bya bar bya// mi byams sman zhing bkur ba ni// skal ldan mdzes par

432a6(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa'i cha nyid dang / / rgya skyegs la sogs kun gyi cha// ma la bsro bar rab tu sbyar// ka ran dza yi rdog ma tsam// yid du mi 'ong ba yi gnas// khar bcug kun tu de yi ngag/ tshig gsum
432a7(rgyud 'bum): tshig tu brjod pa yi/ / bdag 'dod pa bzhin dbang du byed// 'tsham gyi ta ni la sogs pa// smyo byed chu ni lnga pa dang // bdag nyid bcing bar sngon ldan pas// mchog tu bsgom na bdug par bya//

432b2(rgyud 'bum): byas nas ni/ / bdag nyid dri ma lnga dang ni// kun nas cha ni mnyam byas la// phye ma zhib mo yang dag ldan// ba de yi sman dang ldan pa yis// bsgrub bya'i lus la reg byas na// nges par dbang du

432b5(rgyud 'bum): bsgrub bya'i sems ni 'gugs par byed// mi 'gyur yi ge'i thig le dang // rtsa bar sgra yis rab tu sbyar// mthar ni bdud rtsi'i yi ge'i ming // 'bum phrag gcig gis rab tu sgrub//

432b7(rgyud 'bum): nas ldan/ / bza' ba'i dngos por sbyin byas na// mi yi skad cig rnam par spang // dan da la sogs srin bu dang // ra yi 'o mar bsres byas nas// gang gis zos pa tsam gyis ni// zhag bdun na ni

433b1(rgyud 'bum): gdan bzhi pa yi rgyud kyis ni/ / gsum pa yi ni gsum pa'o// de yi sbyor ba mthong nas ni// brda yi skad kyis bsdus pa'o// le'u bzhi pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so// de mi rtsa ba'i snying /

434a1(rgyud 'bum): bstan zhig yong shes na/ / de yi mtshan nyid dngos po med// yang dag lam la dmigs pa yis// dngos po mchog dang mchog tu 'grub// ji bzhin gnas kyis rim pa sten//
434a2(rgyud 'bum): ye shes mchog tu gong nas gong // gzhan gyis gnas las 'phangs pa yi// mda' yi mda' ni bsnun par bya// gong nas gong la sogs pa blta// rang 'dod dngos por yang dag blang // bdun pa

437b1(rgyud 'bum): mi g.yo dngos grub rgyu/ / chos kyi snying po snying po nyid// sems ni ye shes rang bzhin ldan// sbyor ba'i bstan bcos cha nyid ni// de nyid de nyid khyad par ro// sbyar dang bsam gtan byas pa yis//
437b2(rgyud 'bum): rtag tu sems ni sbyang bar bya// rnal 'byor rjes su rnal 'byor dang // rnal 'byor las 'das gnas chen po// las bzhi dang ni rab ldan pa'i// ye shes kyis ni 'khor ba sgrol// dang por
437b3(rgyud 'bum): bskyed rim spyod pa dang / / dbugs kyi sbyor ba rim sogs dang // las la sems shing sems pa dang // dang po'i sbyor ba'i mtshan nyid do// me bzhin du ni za ba dang // mnyam pa'i nyi ma bzhin
437b4(rgyud 'bum): du blta/ / rna dbang rlung gi rang bzhin du// rna ba sgra yi mchod par ldan// dngos po kun gyi rang bzhin ni// gzugs brnyan la sogs mchod pa'o// gtor mas ji skad gsungs pa bzhin//
437b5(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa shin tu sbyor ba'o// dngos dang dngos med mnyam byas nas// sangs rgyas byang chub yang dag sbyar// phyag rgya chen po yi ni thabs// sbyor ba las 'das 'di yid do// rang bzhin
437b6(rgyud 'bum): gyis ni legs spyad na/ / thams cad bdag med pa las byung // lus sogs stong par rtogs pa ni// bzhi pa rnal 'byor chen po'o// 'di rnams mtshan nyid ldan pa ni// chen po'i sems
437b7(rgyud 'bum): kyi sdom pa'o/ / rtag tu bya ba der 'jug pas// 'byung zhing 'khor bar sgrol ba'o// spyan ni pad+ma ltar yangs shing // bzhin ni me tog rgyas pa 'dra// 'dod pa lnga po nye bar bsten// bde bar spyod
438a1(rgyud 'bum): cing bde bar reg/ 'dod pa kun dang nyer ldan pa// bde ba'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya// rnam par rtog pa'i rnal 'byor pas// srid par 'khor zhing 'jug pa'o// yid du 'ong
438a2(rgyud 'bum): ba'i sa phyogs su/ / bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// rang bzhin ldan pa'i las kyis ni// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// zla ba nyi ma kha sbyar nas// sor mo 'brel bar byas nas ni// dri med
438a3(rgyud 'bum): gsum dang dud pas sbrel/ / sems ma rdo rje rab tu grags// tsham rngam phur bu ra ba dang // dra ba thams cad las nyid do// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba mnyam pa'i 'od// 'di yi phyag rgyar bstan par bya//
438a4(rgyud 'bum): kha ga'i phyogs gzhan nyid dang ni// rtsa bar rlung dbang gnon pa dang // spyi bor 'bar ba'i re ba dang // mtshan ma'i mnga' bdag gis brgyan cing // rtag tu zhi zhing mchog gi nas// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba
438a5(rgyud 'bum): mnyam pa'i 'od/ / 'di ltar sa bon mdor byas pa// thams cad las ni sgrub pa'o// lus la dgra yis kun tu dgang // gzugs la sogs pa zad par byed// sa bon lus kyi bdag nyid ni//
438a6(rgyud 'bum): sa bon lhag par bsam par bya// go cha'i srung ba dang bral zhing // thams cad yan lag drug gi las// stong pa'i de nyid snying po ni// sngon gyi mtshan nyid yang dag ldan// smad pa dang ni bstod pa'ang
438a7(rgyud 'bum): med ci 'byor dag pa'i bza' ba dang / / dbang po yul dang longs spyod ni// mnyam pa nyid du sems kyis bya// sngon du rig pas sngon lam rnams// bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i 'bras bu rtogs/
438b1(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig yid la 'dod spyod pa// de yi thabs ni rdo rje'o// rdo rje khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// rked pa'i phyogs su bzung nas ni// hUM gi dbyangs kyis kun bkang zhing // grub pa'i glu yis mnyam/
438b2(rgyud 'bum): par bya// dza dza dza dza/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dngos grub bzhugs pa'i bdag po khyod// ha ha ha ha/ hUM yig mgon po dam tshig bdag po bdag phyag 'tshal// ba ba ba pa/ rdo rje sgrog gi gsang ba las byung gru
438b3(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin pa/ / a a a a/ a ho mgu ba'i rdo rje a l-i gcig tu thim par hUM/ 'di ltar gsang ba'i glu chen po// rnal 'byor ma kun tshim byed pa// rtse gcig rnal 'byor sems bcas pas// khru
438b4(rgyud 'bum): byug skad ltar snyan pa'i sgras/ / nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' klas pa// khams gsum snying po'i dbus su ni// rlung gi nam mkha' ltar dag pas// sems nyid rlung bzhin nam mkhar brjod//
438b5(rgyud 'bum): rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam par bya// de yi dbus su rab mdzes pa'i// a li sa bon 'od dang bcas// las kyi sa bon mdog tu ni// mnyam par bzhag
438b6(rgyud 'bum): pas bsgom par bya/ / 'byin dang sdud cing gcod mdzad ma// a li'i sa bon rab tu grags// ji ltar sde tshan gsum pa yi// yi ge gsum pa bzung byas te// glo rung dbyug pa rdo rje dang // 'og/
438b7(rgyud 'bum): bag gis ni dkri bar bya// 'di ltar rnal 'byor mchog sgom pa// 'khor ba thams cad gcod par byed// phyi nas bdag nyid lus po ni// sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'dzin// kun nas chu yis
439a1(rgyud 'bum): gang bar ni/ / phyogs brgyad du ni mnyam par ro// de yi dbus su rab mdzes pa// pad+ma dkar po yid 'ong ba'i// rlung gi dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// 'o ma zla ba'i sa bon
439a2(rgyud 'bum): 'dzin/ / gdugs dkar po yis mngon par bkab// 'od zer 'bar ba rnam mang po// de yi sa bon las skyes pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid ni// kun da dkar dang zla ba'i mdog/ phyag gnyis
439a3(rgyud 'bum): pal mdzes pa'i brang / / dbu rgyan sangs rgyas lnga yi dngos// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// rdo rje snying khar mtha' 'dzin cing // g.yon pa dril bu dgu ru brten// sgeg cing spro ba'i rang
439a4(rgyud 'bum): bzhin dang / / rgyan rnams kun ni rnam par brgyan// 'od zer 'bar ba rnam mang po// dngos po'i tshon gyis btso bar bya// sangs rgyas sprin gyis rab rgyas pa'i// rdo rje rnon po'i 'od 'phro ba//
439a5(rgyud 'bum): 'jigs pa med cing gnod med par// dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya// bzlas 'dod pa yi rnal 'byor pas// spro ba'i sems kyis mnyam par bsgom// dbus su mchog gi sa bon dang // phyag
439a6(rgyud 'bum): 'tshal a li mthar bzhag pa/ / yi ge drug pa'i sngags chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyis gsungs pa'o// blos dang bsam gtan rnal 'byor pas// rang 'dod las ni mngon par 'grub// 'bul
439a7(rgyud 'bum): phrag gsum du bsnyen pa yis/ / de nas de yi mngon du 'grub// de nas kun gyi snying po ni// skye dang 'jig dang rnam bral ba// gnyis med ye shes rnal 'byor pas// 'dod bzhin ye shes gnas rnyed
439b1(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / rdo rje dril bu de nyid dang // ye shes sku ni gnyis kyi gzugs// rdo rje g.yas brkyang gnas nas ni// dril bu mnan pa'i rkang pas mnan// pad+ma rdo rje sbyar byas nas// phyag rgya 'ching ba'i
439b2(rgyud 'bum): mchog tu brtson/ / dril bu lag gnyis kyis mgrin par// rdo rje gcig gis nu mar reg/ g.yon pas gzhung tshigs mtha' ru'o// tshams kyis ma mchu btsir mdzad cing // gnyis kyi sems kyis
439b3(rgyud 'bum): mchog brtson par/ / dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya// steng dang 'og dang dbus gnyis dang // nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas par// thams cad stong pa'i de nyid ni// sems kyis rab tu spyad
439b4(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / mthar ni sgrol ma'i rnam pa'o// dbus su a li sa bon ni// 'bar ba'i 'phreng ba rab tu 'phro// khams gsum kun gyi cha dang bcas// phyis ni gzugs nyid yongs rdzogs pa// gnyis ka yod
439b5(rgyud 'bum): 'od gzugs mdzes pa'o/ / dbyig pa rdo rje 'jam pa'i mgon// 'od dpag shes rab kyi ni gzhi// rdo rje dril bu rab sbyor bas// mchog gi go 'phang bsgrub par bya// rdo rje gsang ba mtshan nas ni// gnyis
439b6(rgyud 'bum): kA 'khyud nas bzlas par bya/ / phyag 'tshal bsreg pa mthar bzhag nas// dbus su a li'i sa bon ni// rtag pa mchog tu phra ba nyid// bde ba'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya// yid kyi mchod pa'i cho ga
439b7(rgyud 'bum): yis/ kun nas yid kyis bsgrub par bya// shes rab rdo rje yang dag par sbyor ba'i le'u rdzogs so// / de nas thams cad snying po ni// mchog gi gtso bo bsdus pa'o// sbyor ba'i
440a1(rgyud 'bum): rgyud kyi rjes 'brangs nas/ / gus pa yis ni gzung bar bya// shel gyi rnam pa'i sems kyis ni// dag pa'i dngos por bza' bar bya// sngon gyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pa/
440a2(rgyud 'bum): dag pa'i ngo bor sgom pa nyid// de nas rtog pa mi rtog pa// bza' dang bza' min mnyam pa nyid// btung dang mi btung rang 'dod du'o// 'khor ba'i pha rol rgal 'dod pas// sngon du dbang
440a3(rgyud 'bum): bskur dpa' bo rnams/ / 'bad pas brtul zhugs gzung bar bya// rim pa bzhin du zla ba dang // nyi ma bam ni lo dus su// brtul zhugs mtshan nyid bzhi pa'o// yon tan de yi yongs su bza'//
440a4(rgyud 'bum): bco lnga dang ni bcu bzhi dang // khyad par du ni tshes brgyad la'o// brtul zhugs rim pa 'di nyid ni// nan tan gyis ni gtor ma sbyin// de yi las rnams thams cad ni// ye shes de nyid 'bras bu
440a5(rgyud 'bum): sogs/ / de lta bden pa'i sngags kun gyis// 'grub par 'di la the tsom med// bza' sogs ston mo'i rnal 'byor pas// zla ba tha ma'i nyi ma gzung // rang 'dod chos ni rab brtags na//
440a6(rgyud 'bum): thams cad sngags ni 'grub par 'gyur// brtul zhugs ldan pa nyin re 'am// gal te ma 'byor pa na yang // dbyar zla 'bring po'i tha ma ni// lo yi nyi ma gzung bar bya// mtshan nyid ji ltar gsung
440a7(rgyud 'bum): pa bzhin/ / skyon med sngags kyis sbyin byas nas// de yis dus rnams thams cad du// dpal dang phun tshogs mdun na gnas// rnal 'byor chos sogs la dga' bas// gnyis med grogs
440b1(rgyud 'bum): mchog rab ldan pas/ / de yis chos la brten nas ni// mchog gi go 'phang bsgrub par bya// stong nyid kyis ni gzugs 'jig cing // blangs pa'i chos rnams zad par byed// thams cad sdom pa nam
440b2(rgyud 'bum): mkha' ni/ / shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas bsam// thams cad nam mkha'i gnas su ni// 'o ma zla ba'i sa bon bsam// 'od zer 'bar ba mang po ni// dkar dang kun da zla ba'i mdog/ a li'i sa
440b3(rgyud 'bum): bon mchog gtso bo/ / dbugs mi g.yo bas bsgom par bya// skad cig rnam par sbyor ba yis// ye shes mkha' 'gro bdag nyid ni// zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa nyid// kha dog sngon po mnyam
440b4(rgyud 'bum): pa'i bod/ / sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyis brgyan pa// steng du rdo rje cod pan dang // sangs rgyas lnga yis dbu la brgyan// rgod dang khro dang sgeg pa dang // spyan
440b5(rgyud 'bum): gsum gyis ni rnam par brgyan/ / smad g.yogs glang chen lpags pa dang // mi yi pags pa rab tu gsol// mi yi yan lag lnga rus pas// rgyan kun gyis ni rab tu brgyan// sgra yi rtse mo rab 'jam zhing //
440b6(rgyud 'bum): me 'bar ba dang mnyam pa'i 'od// dang po'i phyag na kha T+wAM ga/ gnyis pa na ni dgra sta bsnams// gsum pa na ni rdo rje'o// g.yon pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang // gnyis pa thod pa khrag gis bkang //
440b7(rgyud 'bum): ral gri phyag ni steng du'o// rdo rje 'od zer dri ma med// sangs rgyas sprin ltar rab 'phro ba// sa yis dbus su rnam rol bar// dngos po dngos po bsgom par bya// 'ug pa ce spyang seng ge dang // stag mo phyag
441a1(rgyud 'bum): su rnam par bsgom/ / bya rog ce sbyang bya rgod dang // tsi li ka ni mtshams su dgod// 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrog mche ba gtsigs// ha hUM rnam par 'jigs par byed// 'di ltar mkha'
441a2(rgyud 'bum): 'gro rgyal dbang ma/ / bdag nyid sems kyis bsgom par bya// rang gi dbugs las phyung nas ni// gzugs brnyan la sogs dgod par bya// rnal 'byor pa yis bris sku sogs// de yi gnas su
441a3(rgyud 'bum): kun tu bsam/ / 'dod dang grol ba'i go 'phang gnas// gnyis med gtor ma'i lha nyid yin// sbyor ba'i sgo nas sgrub pa pos// 'di yi mchod pa'i cho ga bshad// bza' dang ston mo de nyid dang //
441a4(rgyud 'bum): gsang ba'i mchod pas rab tu mchod// snying kha'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sems kyis hUM gi sa bon las// de yi gzugs la sogs bskyed pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid dgod//
