441a6(rgyud 'bum): bsam pa dang // ha li rnam pas so sor rtog/ sa bon ho yis snang bar byas// hrI yi rnam pas dri ma skyong // lus kyi sgra nyid tshim pa'i phyir// a yi rnam pas rtog par bya// sa bon lnga yis
441a7(rgyud 'bum): nyid ni/ / sangs rgyas lnga nyid mngon par thim// oM dzam+mu traM d+hu ma swAhA/ bza' ba la sogs khyad par nyid// sngags 'di yis ni gzung bar bya// oM gyi rnam pas lus dang ni// dzaM gyis rnam pas
441b1(rgyud 'bum): brdung ba dang / / gyis rnam par so ba dang // dzagis rnam par gyi med drug// rmugs rnam pas spyad par bya// sems kyis sgri lar migs// de nyid rtag su mchod byas nas/
441b2(rgyud 'bum): 'byor ba yis thig spyang bya// dri dang mar me me tog dang // b+ha ba shos dang ni gtor ma yis// glu yi dus su dbyangs snyan dang // ba~M lang gling bu la sogs sgyur// rtag tu de dag gis mchod cing
441b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rjemams dpa' bdag nyid brjod/ 'gro dang / la dang 'dug pa dang / bcag dang thams pad+ma du nyid / rtag tu sems shing sems pa mos/ rdo rje sems dpanga' bsam par bya/
441b4(rgyud 'bum): a sud+d+hi s+thAd+d+ha/ ye shes gzugs brnyan sbyor ba yis// sa bon 'di ni bzlas byas nas// sdig pa thams cad thug bsrings shing // rang 'dod las ni 'grub par 'gyur// 'byung ba sbru las
441b5(rgyud 'bum): myur ba rdzo/ / gang gigasang bar bye byas pa 'dra // rtag tu bsgoms shing bsgos byas na// rdeg pakun las thol par 'gyur// oM ka ra kar ba d+hAs r+b+ba twA~Mr+N+Na bar+dz+dza
441b6(rgyud 'bum): d+hId+him a a mu mu mu swAhA/ sngags chen po yis bon 'di// sangs rgyas sems ni mdor bsdus pa'o// skyon med sbyor ba'i sgrub pa pos// thams cad ldan pa'i sa bon ni// mtshan mo ma
441b7(rgyud 'bum): mtha' nyid dang / / dang por ro hi ta dus la// nya phyis sdong du chu dang ni// ma ga d+ha ni srang gnyis nyid// kun nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor bsam// bdud rtsi'i dbus su yang dag ldan// bdud rtsa
442a1(rgyud 'bum): bsam pa'i thabs kyis ni/ / shin tu mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pas// lan bdun mngon par bsngags byas pa'i// de yi chu ni btung byas na// sdig pa thams cad 'jig
442a2(rgyud 'bum): pa dang / / ye shes bdud rtsi ye shes sku// yid gzhungs shes rab rno ba dang // rlung dang gzi brjid dpal 'phel zhing // kun nas skal ldan dag dang ni// thos dang shes rab nor dang ni// rlung
442a3(rgyud 'bum): mkhris dug dang bad kan dang / / 'dus dang glo sogs kyis gzer dang // mig dang yan lag gzer ba ni// chu 'di yis ni nad kun 'phrog/ oM ra ta a brta ni/ sarba pA paM ha ran+tu maM hUM/ bi
442a4(rgyud 'bum): kr-i ta kro d+ha hUM phaT swA hA/ 'di yi sngags ni sngags chen po// srung ba kun gyi bla na med// sngon gyi dus su bzhag byas nas// rnal 'byor lus ni srung ba'o// lan bdun mngon par bsdigs byas la//
442a5(rgyud 'bum): gnas lnga ru ni lan gsum mo// sangs rgyas lnga ni mngon bsams nas// spyi bo'i steng du bskur byas nas// rgyal po seng ge dgra sogs dang // rkun mo dang ni me dang chu// rlung dang mkhris pa la
442a6(rgyud 'bum): / sogs dang // 'jigs byed 'jigs pa 'joms par byed// oM bi mo ha ni/ saM mo ha ni/ sarba~M pri ye ti hUM hUM hUM swA hA/ 'di yi sngags ni sngags chen pos// 'gro kun rmongs par byed par gsungs//
442a7(rgyud 'bum): mi byams byams pa skyed byed cing // kun nas mdza' bar gyur pa'o// lag pa g.yon pa yi ni chu// snga dro'i dus su khe bkrus nas// rnal 'byor pa ni grub 'dod pa// dgos pa thams cad 'grub par
442b1(rgyud 'bum): gyur/ rede nas sbyor ba mchog tu bshad// snying po las ni snying po mchog/ rdo rje la sogs bsgom par bya// gnyis su med par mnyam par 'dres// yan lag 'di yis tha dad bsgom// dug med
442b2(rgyud 'bum): pa yang dug gis bsdun/ / shin tu mi bzad rmongs pa yis// rmongs pa rnal 'byor bdag nyid 'jig/ 'bad pas chos kyi thabs kyis ni// dag pa'i lus ni rnam dag byed// dag pa'i sgron ma bltas pa yis/
442b3(rgyud 'bum): nyon mongs la sogs mun 'joms pa// nam mkha' rdo rje rdo rje la// sems dang sems ni rnam par thim// gcig sogs dngos po sgom pa ni// 'di yi rnal 'byor mtshan nyid ni// me yi lhag ma sogs
442b4(rgyud 'bum): lhag pa/ / dbus dang dbus su rnam par 'tsher// de yi 'od kyis nam mkha'i khams// shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas blta// sa bon 'di yi myu gu las// a li ka li rnam par 'byung // sa bonas
442b5(rgyud 'bum): bon rab 'phro ba/ / nam mkha'i khams su yang dag gnas// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas pa'i// ro langs ma yi dbus su bsam// pad+ma'i gdan la rnam par bzhugs// gdugs dkar po
442b6(rgyud 'bum): yis mngon par g.yogs/ / phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo gung // kha dog dmar po 'od mnyam pa// lcags kyu zhags pa sdigs mdzub dang // spyan gsum gyis ni rnam par brgyan// sgeg pa'i
442b7(rgyud 'bum): nyams kyis blta ba dang / / na bza' dmar po mngon par g.yogs// mchog gi sems dang sems pa la// bdud rtsi'i yi ge rnam par bsam// lcags kyu'i rtse mor yi ge k+ShuM// bzlas shing 'di yis
443a1(rgyud 'bum): drang bar bya/ / gzugs brnyan gyis ni yid bskyod cing // rang gis dbugs kyis dgang bar bya// oM rA ga ta b+ha ti tsUk+Shu~M sUhA/ lcags kyu'i sngags dang phyag rgya yis// rnal
443a2(rgyud 'bum): 'byor pa yis 'dod bzhin drang / / rmongs chen shin tu rmongs pa ni// mnyam par bzhag nas rab tu sgrub// gdan bzhi pa yi rgyud kyi ni// sbyor ba'i gdan gyi gsum pa las// grub pa'i snying po bsdus
443a3(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ mdor bsdus nas ni bsdus pa'o// de nas ye shes lus la ni// shin tu mnyam gzhag rnal 'byor pas// bza' dang bza' ba'i bsam pa yis// sbyangs dang rtog pa spyad par bya// dngos
443a4(rgyud 'bum): po smad pa ma yin zhing / / gang yang brtag par mi bya'o// mtho dang dma' ba'i rigs la sogs// mnyam nyid lha ni lnga pa'o// gang zhig skye ba po sogs pa// sems kyis gnod pa mi bya'o// gal
443a5(rgyud 'bum): te gnod pa byed sems na/ / rnal 'byor sdom pa ring bar 'gyur// gang zhig che dang phra ba yi// gzhan rdzas rang gir byed pa yi// rku ba'i sems ni mi bya'o// rnal 'byor sdom pa ring ba nyid// rdzun dang
443a6(rgyud 'bum): tshig rtsub phra ma dang / / 'khyal pa'i ngag ni ring du spang // gzhan gyis sems la gnod byas pas// rnal 'byor sdom pa ring ba nyid// don dang ling ga rab sbyor bas// sbyor ba'i chos kyis snying po nyid//
443a7(rgyud 'bum): rmongs pas log dkris ngag sogs kyis// de yi rab sbyor smod pa nyid// legs par byas pa'i las kyis ni// bde ba bskyed pa'i lus kyis ni// sems can bde ba lhur len pas// theg pa che la legs
443b1(rgyud 'bum): par bslabs/ / gal te sems can gnod sogs pa'i// mi dga' ba yi tshig mi smra// sdig pa'i las ni mi bya zhing // rnal 'byor gtsug lag mi smad do// rnal 'byor 'dod dag ba ma yin zhing /
443b2(rgyud 'bum): rmongs pas rgyags par mi bya'o// phyag rgya 'ching bar rab sbyor bas// rang 'dod kyis ni bsten par bya// bstan cing bstan pa'i rab sbyor bas// lha nyid tshim zhing bsgrub par bya// sems can don gyi ngo
443b3(rgyud 'bum): bo yis/ / sems can bde bas phan 'dogs byed// theg pa chen po'i 'bras bu che// 'di yi lam gyis bsten par bya// gang dang gang du rab sbyor bas// de dang der ni phan pas bde// sems can sdom
443b4(rgyud 'bum): pa la sogs pas/ / de yi sems ni gdon mi za// 'khor bar skyes pa'i dus na ni// thabs dang shes rab yang dag ldan// dngos po dngos po med byed dang // sems can don na a lir bsgyur// phyag
443b5(rgyud 'bum): rgya bzhi dang ldan pa'i rgya/ / gsang ba'i gsang ba bcing ba yis// de yi dbus su bdud rtsi ni// skye zhing myu gu 'byung ba'o// 'dab ma gsum dang kun ldan pa'i// a li mchog ni mtha' med do//
443b6(rgyud 'bum): gzhan yang bdud rtsi mchog nyid ni// phyi rol kun gyi snying po nyid// bdud rtsi yid 'ong skal bzang zhing // sems can la ni snyan par ston// sangs rgyas lnga yi kun gyi lus// bcom gser ltar 'bar
443b7(rgyud 'bum): ba'o/ / cod pan bcings shing 'phyar ba dang // phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par spras// rgod dang sgeg pa'i nyams dang ni// rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan// steng du rdo rje lcags kyu dang // gnyis pa rdo rje
444a1(rgyud 'bum): zhags pa'o/ / g.yon pa rdo rje dril bu dang // gsum pa lcags sgrog 'ching ba yi// phyag bzhi po yi phyag rgya ni// gsang ba gsang sogs 'ching ba dang // lus dang kha dog 'bar ba ru/
444a2(rgyud 'bum): snang ba mtha' yas mnyam par gzhag/ ha yi rnam pa'i sa bon ni// yi ge mchog gi dga' bar byed// ho yi rnam pas lus dang lus// rnam snang mnga' bdag lha nyid do// sems dang sems pa bsgom pas
444a3(rgyud 'bum): ni/ lha nyid du ni yongs su grags// thams cad lus dang lus can gyi// srog dang sems ni 'phrog pa'o// hrI yi rnam pa'i sa bon ni// phyag na rdo rje stobs po che// oM gyi rnam pa gsal bar 'phro//
444a4(rgyud 'bum): kun nas sems ni rtogs mdzad pa'o// a yi rnam pa des tshim byed// blo dang ldan pas yongs su bsten// bdud rtsi chu yi lha mo ni// de yi shes bya rtogs pa'o// bdud rtsi gang gis myang ba yis// bdud rtsi
444a5(rgyud 'bum): yi ni 'bras bu thob/ / de bzhin gshegs dges lha mo ni// gzugs mdzes mchog tu yid 'ong ba'o// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnam pa yis// phyag rgya bzhi pa bcing bar bya// rnal 'byor pa ni sgrub 'dod na// gnyis
444a6(rgyud 'bum): ni gnyis su med par bsgom/ / gnyis ni dngos po dngos med pas// ye shes ldan pas yongs su gsal// nga rgyal chen pos bcing ba ni// spro ba'i sems dang ldan pas bcings// sgeg dang khro dang tshul gyis ni//
444a7(rgyud 'bum): lha mo'i snying po nyid du thim// nyi ma'i lag pa'i gdan la ni// zla ba'i lag pas reg byas la// de yis 'khyud cing 'khyud nas ni// lha mo'i ye shes nyid du thim// lto ba'i ye shes me yi lha// me yi gnas su
444b1(rgyud 'bum): tshim par bya/ / shes rab thabs la thim pa yis// gnyis med sbyor bas tshim par bya// oM ha ho hrIHa/ sa bon chen po'i sa bon ni// 'di yi sa bon bsam par bya// rim pa 'di yis mchod pa ni// sman/
444b2(rgyud 'bum): gyi rgyur ni ma yin no// lha mo bkres dang sdug bsngal 'phrog/ sgeg cing snyan par smra ba dang // nga rgyal med pa'i nga rgyal byed// brtson med pa yi brtson 'grus bcas// kun nas skal ldan lha mo ni// rmongs
444b3(rgyud 'bum): byed 'jig dang 'gugs par byed/ / yid mi gzhung dang ngo tsha 'jig/ lha mo snyan mas 'joms par byed// de ltar yon tan lha mo ldan// yid 'ong bdud rtsi snyan pa mo// 'dod dam thar pa'i go 'phang gnas//
444b4(rgyud 'bum): gang zhig lha mo 'di yi lam// chu sbyar ne tso gtam dang ni// sgeg dang gar ni lnga ldan pa'o// lha min brtson 'grus bdun pa ste// dran pa nyams byed brgyad pa'o// lha mo pho nya brgyad kyi las// myur du
444b5(rgyud 'bum): sems ni 'phrog pa'o/ / rnal 'byor pa yi bdag nyid sems// 'dod pa'i sems kyis rnam par byed// ji ltar gsum pa'i mtshan nyid kyis// 'bad pas thang kha sna tshogs dgram// pad+ma'i gdan la
444b6(rgyud 'bum): bzhugs pa ni/ / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gyos brgyan par// kun nas pho nya brgyad pa ni// bud med gzugs su de yi tshul// phyogs kyi mdog dang mdog tu'o// gzugs mdzes yon tan ldan pa yi//
444b7(rgyud 'bum): dung chen la sogs lag pa na// gnas dang gnas la bdud rtsi'i chu// sha lnga yi ni snod la sogs// bza' dang ston mos nye bar mdzes// de yi gzugs brnyan mdun du ni// mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub/
445a1(rgyud 'bum): par bya// me tog spos dang dri la sogs// gnyis med gtor ma yang dag ldan// dang po re zhig dam tshig gi/ phyag rgya la sogs bcing bar bya// zla ba'i lag pa rab brkyang nas/
445a2(rgyud 'bum): / rnam shes byed par kun tu ldan// oM hi li hi li hUM phaT/ dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya yis// mchod pa'i las la rab tu sbyar// oM a mr-i ta kuN+Da ha ho hrIHa swA hA/ nye bar spyod pa'i sngags dang phyag rgya'o//
445a3(rgyud 'bum): nyi ma'i lag pa'i gdan la ni// zla ba'i lag pa kun sbyar la// snying po'i snying dang phyag rgya yis// rang 'dod las ni rab tu byed// 'bum phrag gcig zlos rnal 'byor pas// sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs
445a4(rgyud 'bum): bya/ phyis ni me la sogs pa'i las// gnyis med gtor ma'i las kyis so// me thab kha ran gsum par ni// snang byed shing ni rab sbar la// lha mo'i me tog rgyas pa ni// sbrang rtsis bsku zhing sbyar
445a5(rgyud 'bum): byas la/ / bdud rtsi'i chu dang kun nas bsra// gang gi ming nas yang dag bzung // brgyad brgya ru ni bsregs byas nas// nges par dbang du 'gyur ba'o// me yi lha sogs thal ba dang // bdag nyid khu ba lan
445a6(rgyud 'bum): lnga ru/ bdud rtsi dbus su sbyin byas na// bdag nyid 'dod bzhin dbang du byed// smyo byed sbrul ni lnga pa dang // su dza'i shing ni cha mnyam pa// bdud rtsir ldan par byin byas na// myur du skyo bar 'gyur ba'o//
445a7(rgyud 'bum): nim pa la sogs rtse mo la// mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par bya// me tog bdug po dri sogs dang // gnyis med gtor ma'i las kyis ni// arga dkar po rtsa ba las// 'dab pas me ni rab
445b1(rgyud 'bum): tu sbar/ / pad+mo zhib mo phye ma ni// 'o ma dang ni bdud rtsis sku// brgyad brgya ru bsreg byas pa yi// lhag ma'i thal ba bgos pa'o// tsi tru ka yi rtsa ba'i chus// lan bdun bgos la grib mar
445b2(rgyud 'bum): bskam/ / mchod pa'i dus su rnal 'byor pas// de yi thal ba bdud rtsi nus// myur ba nyid du bgos pa ni// kha ba kun da 'o ma ru// lus ni mongs pa'i gzugs dang ni// shin tu rmongs shing rmo
445b3(rgyud 'bum): ba'i dri/ / pho nya brgyad kyi lha mo ni// stobs dang gzi brjid don me'o// rnam rtog rmongs pa'i sems can la// 'di yi las kyis rab tu sbyar// rmongs pa spang ba'i rnal 'byor pas// 'gro ba
445b4(rgyud 'bum): myur du rtog par 'gyur/ / 'di yis phye ma blang byas la// dzA ti mar khu lan gsum spang // bdud rtsi mchod pa'i dus su ni// thal ba lan cig bsres byas nas// thig le lce yi myang ba yis// pho
445b5(rgyud 'bum): nya brgyad kyis 'dzin par 'gyur/ / pho nya'i mtshan ma yongs rdzogs pa// spro zhing rgyags pa'o// smyo byed shing ni yang dag blang // 'bad pas me ni rab sngar la// me tog sbrang rtsi bdud rtsir ldan// brgyad
445b6(rgyud 'bum): brgya ru ni bsreg par bya/ / de yi thal ba blangs byas nas// rab tu sbyor ba la sogs bya// bdud rtsi bskyed pa'i gnas su ni// thal ba de yis byug byas nas// chu yi mdog ni gzhan du dang // de yi ro na
445b7(rgyud 'bum): gzhan du 'gyur/ / sbrang rtsi 'o ma ldan pa yis// de gzugs snga ma bzhin du 'gyur// de yi thal ba blangs byas la// ku sum pa yi cha dang bsres// bdud rtsi yi ni cha bdun dang // ma ru rtsa yi cha brgyad ni//
446a1(rgyud 'bum): mchod pa'i dus su chang la ni// de yi thal ba blugs byas na// gang la byin pa tsam gyis ni// bdud rtsi kun nas rang 'dod rig/ gang dang gang gi lam gyis ni// de dang de'i ni rmongs
446a2(rgyud 'bum): pa rnams/ / sems can don du rmongs bsal phyir// rtag tu lam ni bstan par bya// gzhan gyi don la brtson par bya// rang gi 'dod 'di bsdus pa'o// sman dang sngags kyi sbyor ba yang // shes rab dman
446a3(rgyud 'bum): la sogs pas dman/ / gdan bzhi pa yi rgyud kyi ni// gsum pa gtor ma'i las kyis ni// dngos grub snying po bsdus pa ni// de yi dngos po bsdus pa'o// sngags sgrub pa yi don du ni// gzugs brnyan
446a4(rgyud 'bum): rab tu sbyar bar bya/ / mchog gi gzugs brnyan rab sbyar bas// byin gyi rlabs kyis rim pas sgrub// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang dang ni// gsad dang bskrad dang dbye ba ni// gzugs brnyan gyis ni thams
446a5(rgyud 'bum): cad 'grub/ / gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid ldan par bya// sngon du ras kyi mtshan nyid dang // gnyis pa ta la'i mtshan nyid dang // gsum pa kha dog rim pa dang // bzhi pa gtor ma sbyin sreg nyid// gleng
446a6(rgyud 'bum): gzhi rang 'dod bskyed nas ni/ / ma nyams kha tshar yang dag ldan// steng 'og la sogs rab rgyas pa// ras la zhi ba'i ri mo bri// ma lhung ba yi yi dgas gos// ma nyams kha tshar bgo bar bya// mtshon
446a7(rgyud 'bum): gyis ma phog cha la ni/ / rgyas pa yi ni mtshan nyid do// yi dgas mo yi dmar po'i ras// ma lhung bar ni rab tu spyad// mtshon gyis ma phog rab sbyar ba// dbang nyid du ni yongs su grags// ra nag po
446b1(rgyud 'bum): yi pags pa dang / / ba lang rta sogs gzhan dag la// gnag cing drag sogs pa yi las// mngon spyod las kyi mtshan nyid do// de yi mnan pa'i gnas su ni// thig gi mtshan nyid gdab par bya//
446b2(rgyud 'bum): cha gsum du ni rab tu bgo/ gcig ni 'og tu dor bar bya// cha gnyis lnga pa'i steng du'o// gsum pa gsungs pa'i thig nyid ni// tshangs pa'i ri mo dbyug pa ni// cha lnga la ni bdun du'o// lus ni cha gsum
446b3(rgyud 'bum): nyid du 'dod/ / zhi dang yan lag mnyam pa'o// zhal ni bcu gnyis cha nyid do// mgrin pa la ni sor bzhi'o// mgo dang skra la'ang de nyid do// rna ba nyid kyang de yi tshad// zhal gyi cha ni gsum pa nyid//
446b4(rgyud 'bum): dpral ba lkog ma sna nyid do// sman ma'i mtha' ni rna ba'i lhag/ mig ni sor gnyis pa yi tshad// bug pa sor mo bzhi pa'o// de ni mig gi mtshan nyid do// mgrin pa'i mtha' yi dbus su ni// brang gi
446b5(rgyud 'bum): cha ni gnyis kyis mnan/ / snying kha'i gnas dang lde bar ni// mnan cing kun tu mnan pa'o// nu ma'i mthar ni mnan bcas pa// brang du nu ma gnyis mnan la// lag pa gnyis kas mnan pa ni//
446b6(rgyud 'bum): lag gnyis kun tu gnon pa'o// sor bzhi pa dang ldan pa ni// brla dang rje ngar kun tu ldan// pus mo gnyis la sor bzhi'o// rkang pa'i tshad kyang de bzhin no// bcu gnyis ta la'i tshad kyis ni/
446b7(rgyud 'bum): lha yi gzugs ni ri mor bris// lhag pa'i sor mo bzhi po ni// lha brgyad kyi ni gdan du'o// dgu pa yi ni gdan nyid ni// sor mo gnyis su bshad pa'o// dbus kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor no// kun nas
447a1(rgyud 'bum): #na bza'i 'od zer sogs/ / rab zab rdo rje'i lha nyid ni// tal bcu gnyis kyi ni tshad// 'og ma'i cha dang cha sogs dang // nye bar mdzes sogs ri ma bri// steng gi lhag pa'i chal ni/
447a2(rgyud 'bum): rigs ni lnga pa bstan pa'o// las kyi mdo sogs mdog tu ni// 'dod bzhin lha nyid bsgrub par bya// gzugs brnyan rab tu sbyor ba ni// bcu gnyis ta la'i rnam pa'o// de yi ta la'i tshad la ni// phyag
447a3(rgyud 'bum): gnyis kun nas bkug pa ni/ / sor mo gnyis ni rab dor la// gzhi pa'i lha yi rnam pa'o// de yi ta las zhal bzhi ni// gsus khyim che zhing che ba nyid// kun nas tshigs dang tshigs nyid ni// sor mo
447a4(rgyud 'bum): gnyis ni dor bar bya/ / khro bo khro mo dbang phyug ma// bran pho bran mo mngag gzhug ni// drag po 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs// ta la bcur ni bri ba'o// dkyil 'khor sgrub par 'dod pa yis// mchod
447a5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i lha mo mngon par ldan/ / ras kyi brgyad kyi cha nyid ni// ta la'i steng du dor bar bya// dkyil 'khor lha mo'i rim pa ni// rim dang rim bzhin sbyar bar bya// dbus su mngab bdag rdo rje'i lnga// gcig
447a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par bri/ / mgrin pa ko sko zhabs nyid ni// de gsum ring na nyes skyon no// sngags pa nges par bdag nyid ni// skrod dang gnas ni rlag pa'o// shangs dang snyan dang sor mo ni// de gsum
447a7(rgyud 'bum): thung ba'i nyes pa ni/ / nges par dngos grub rlag pa dang // de yi dpal yang ring ba nyid// rje ngar zhag dang mkhur chos ni// de gsum sbom pa nyes pa che// nges par sgrub po'i bdag nyid ni// bdud
447b1(rgyud 'bum): dang bgegs dang dpal ring ngo / / 'gram pa brang dang rtsibs logs ni// de gsum dma' na skyon che'o// yun mi ring ba myur du ni// nor ni rlag par 'gyur ba'o// num rna ba dpral ba ni// de gsum yo na
447b2(rgyud 'bum): skyon che'o/ / 'thab mo yi ni dgra 'tshe bar// myur du sgrub pa po 'gyur ba'o// brang dang lus dang brla gnyis ni// de gsum dma' na skyon che'o// dgras ni 'jig par 'gyur ba dang // 'chi bar yang ni tha
447b3(rgyud 'bum): tsom med/ / sna zhom mig ni yo ba dang // rna ba mchu dang dpral ba ni// bgegs dang bdud dang sems 'jigs shing // dngos grub ring bar 'gyur ba nyid// gyen du lta ba'i dbugs dang ni// gdan
447b4(rgyud 'bum): ni yo zhing tha dad pa/ / brang dang mgrin pa yan lag ni// nyes skyon grangs ni med par grags// 'od zer yo zhing tha dad dang // phyag rgya phyag mtshan nor bas ni// mya ngan gdung bas sdug bsngal bar//
447b5(rgyud 'bum): sgrub po'i gzugs brnyan nyes skyon no// rgyab yol gdugs dang gdan rnams ni// rnam gsum dog pa'i nyes pa ni// 'chi zhing dpal nyams rlag pa dang // mi mdza' mdza' ba 'joms pa'o// de ltar nyes
447b6(rgyud 'bum): skyon skyon chen pos/ / dul zhing dul la bzod pa dang // sems ni shin tu mnyam bzhag pas// rnam par brtag cing rab tu dpyod// mtshan nyid thams cad yongs rdzogs shing // mdzes pa'i tshul gyis
447b7(rgyud 'bum): mchod par bstan/ / sngags grub rgyu yi don dang ni// dbang dang dgug pa yi ni lha// zhi ba la ni zhi ba'i tshul// drag la drag cing 'jigs su rung // dpa' zhing dpa' ba'i nga rgyal gyis// rgod cing khro dang
448a1(rgyud 'bum): sgeg pa dang / / khro ba'i gzugs kyi tshul dang ni// bran dang bran mo'i rnam par sprul// las kyi gnas dang gnas nyid du// bdag nyid kyis mi kha dog bsgyur// de ltar mtshan nyid mtshon pa
448a2(rgyud 'bum): yi dngos grub myur du rdzogs pa dang / / rnal 'byor pa yi 'dod pa las// sngags pas thang kha'i ri mi bri/ na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ saM bo d+ha ni/ bi shud+d+ha/ na maHsarba b+hi ga ha ra nan+tu hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/
448a3(rgyud 'bum): sngags pa yis ni sngags 'di yis// ras dang skud pa bkru ba'o// thams cad las kyi sngags kyis ni// sangs rgyas lnga yi byin gyis brlabs// gzugs brnyan so sor rab sbyor bas// sgrub pos thang kha bsgrub/
448a4(rgyud 'bum): par bya// gzugs brnyan 'grub pa'i rgyu ru ni// sbyin sreg phyag rgya sngags bya'o// yi dgas kyi ni gos blangs la// gtor ma la sogs ldan pa yi// nan tan gyis ni thang kha brgyad// thig skud kyis ni ri mo bya//
448a5(rgyud 'bum): pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par// sems dpa'i skyil mo krung gis bzhugs// phyag gnyis pa la thang kha mdzes// rdo rje cod pan mthong ka'i rtse// sangs rgyas lnga yI
448a6(rgyud 'bum): rnam par brgyan/ / rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan pa'i sku// dar gyis dkri zhing rnam par 'phyang // rdo rje phyag gis gsor mdzad cing // snying khar gnon pa mchog tu brtson// g.yon pa po dril bu mngon ldan
448a7(rgyud 'bum): pas/ rker pa'i mtshams su rnam par gnon// bcom gsar gyi kha dog dang // skrag cing shin tu bzhad pa'i zhal// rdo rje dkyil 'khor la brten par// khro bo'i 'od zer rnam par spro// dkar dang zla ba
448b1(rgyud 'bum): kun da'i mdog/ lha mo gsang ba'i snod mdzad cing // rkang pas 'khyud pas thal mo sbyar// phyag gnyis kyis ni mgrin par 'khyud// tshems kyis ma mchu btsir nas ni// myos pas khro bo mchog gis te//
448b2(rgyud 'bum): rgyan rnams kyis ni brgyan pa'i sku// chags pa'i gos dkar bsnams pa nyid// ba spu nas ni rdo rje 'phro// gdugs dkar po yis mngon g.yogs pa'i// 'di ltar rdo rje dbang phyug rgyal// pad+ma'i lus can
448b3(rgyud 'bum): rdo rje 'dzin/ / rdo rje shar gyi cha ru ni// mo gzugs ri mor bris pa ni// gzugs kun la sogs rab rgyas pa'o// gnod sbyin mo ni rgyal dbang 'di// rin chen gdan la bzhugs pa ni// rgyan kun gyis ni
448b4(rgyud 'bum): rnam par brgyan/ / phyag na gtor ma'i snod sogs pa// phyogs kyi mdog tu btso bar bya// dngos grub kun ster lha mo ni// lus ngan gyi ni sring mo'o// phyag 'tshal tshul gyis 'dud pa ni// lha mo sgrub
448b5(rgyud 'bum): pa'i mtshan nyid do/ / rdo rje byang gi cha la ni// lha mo snyan par smra ba ni// de ltar rdo rje dbang phyug rgya la// pad+ma'i lus can ye shes 'dzin// snyan pa'i gser btso ma yi mdog/ bzang po'i gdan la bzhugs
448b6(rgyud 'bum): pa ni/ ngargyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// gnyis kyi phyag na bdud rtsi'i snod// sgeg pa'i nyams kyis lta ba ru// mkhas pa yis ni bri bar bya// ye shes nub kyi cha la ni// lha mo snyan pa'i dbang
448b7(rgyud 'bum): phyug ma/ / bcom gser gyi mdog dang ni// rgyan rnams kun gyis rnam par brgyan// thams cad mtshan nyid yongs rdzogs pa'i// lha mo gzhon nu grub pa ni// lcags kyu lnga sogs snod kyis ni/
449a1(rgyud 'bum): gnyis pa'i phyag ni rnam par brgyan// rdo rje lho yi cha ru ni// 'byung mo'i ming ni ska rags can// sku mdog sngon mo gzugs mdzes pa'i// rgyun kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan//
449a2(rgyud 'bum): bdud rtsi bum pa phyag gnyis na// gzhan gyi sgeg pa'i yan lag dang // gshin rje yi ni sring mo nyid// dngos grub kun ster lha mo ni// thams cad kun la gzugs mdzes par// rnam par brtags
449a3(rgyud 'bum): te ri mor bri/ / rdo rje dril sogs rim par yang // dbang ldan la sogs rim par sbyar// phyag gnyis sems dpa'i skyil mo krung // phyag ni phyag rgya mtshan ma sogs// de ltar rdo rje dbang phyug rgyal//
449a4(rgyud 'bum): rol pa'i 'khor lo bsam par bya// lha rnams dmigs pa dang bcas pa// sngags dang phyag rgya gtor mas mchod// oM sarba sid+d+hi ku ru hUM/ nye bar spyod pa'i sngags so// oM badz+ra hUM phaT/ nyi ma'i lag
449a5(rgyud 'bum): pa rab brkyang nas/ / ye shes kyis ni pad+ma mnan// dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya'o// de yi sngags dang phyag rgya yis// yan lag drug tu bsrung bar bya// ye shes khu tshur gnyis bcings nas// dkar po
449a6(rgyud 'bum): dang ni sa gdugs bsgreng / / 'khyil bar sa gdugs 'khyud byas la// dkar po'i lcags kyus spyan drang ngo // oM badz+ra aM ku sha dza/ phyag rgya de nyid brtan bcing la// dkar po dang ni gi'u wang spel// zhag+sa
449a7(rgyud 'bum): pa'i dam tshig phyag rgya yis/ / kun nas lha mo bzhugs par ldan// oM badz+ra pA sha hUM/ phyag rgya de nyid dam bcings nas// rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya// gsang zhing gsang ba'i lcags sgrog gis//
449b1(rgyud 'bum): lha rnams kun nas mnyes par bya// khu tshur de nyid dam bcings nas// rgyab dang rgyab tu yang dag ldan// sa gdugs pad+ma sbrel byas la// kun nas lha nyid tshim byed pa'o// spos kyi phyag gnyis rab ldan
449b2(rgyud 'bum): pas/ sor mo gnyis ka bsgreng byas la// zla ba nyi mar bzhugs byas la// snying rje chen po'i phyag rgya'o// oM su ra ta badz+ra hUM dza/ khu tshur gnyis ni bcings byas la// nyi ma'i steng du kha sbyar la/
449b3(rgyud 'bum): shar gyi phyogs kyi lha mo ni// snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o// oM shri ye ba ti hUM phu swA hA/ phyag rgya de nyid dam bcings te// ye shes dang ni rnam shes bsgreng // oM su tri ye hUM phu swA hA/ byang gi phyogs
449b4(rgyud 'bum): kyi lha mo no/ / snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o// phyag rgya de nyid dam bcings nas// dkar po dang ni gi'u lang bsgreng // oM su ru su ru ma du re hUM phu swA hA/ nub kyi phyogs kyi lha ma ni// snying po sngags dang
449b5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya'o/ / phyag rgya de nyid dam bcings nas// sa gdugs pad+ma'i kha sbyin bya// oM pri ya me kha lA hUM phu swA hA/ lho phyogs lha mo rgyal dbang gi/ snying po sngags dang phyag rgya'o// gnyis med cho ga'i
449b6(rgyud 'bum): sngags kyis ni/ / mkhas pa yis ni mchod par bya// bdug pa me tog sogs glu dang // mkhas pas mchod pa nyi shu mchod// 'dod dang thar pa dge ba'i gnas// las rnams thams cad 'grub par
449b7(rgyud 'bum): byed/ rdo rje chos kyi bde spro ba// rnal 'byor sngags kyis sgrub par byed// de nas kun gyi snying po ni// khro bo gnod byed khro mo ni// dbye ba rnam gsum sku rang bzhin// sangs rgyas byang chub yan lag bzhi//
450a1(rgyud 'bum): khros pa'i khro bo'i mchog tu spro// 'jig pa theg pa rnam pa gsum// lha mo'i lta bas 'jigs par byed// bdud dang 'byung po gcod byed cing // bdud dang gdug pa skems pa dang /
450a2(rgyud 'bum): gnon cing yul nas skrod pa dang // 'dod dang thar pa'i go 'phang sgrub// tshangs pa mnan cing nyed pa dang // tsa muN+Di drag pos 'gugs// 'jigs byed kun nas sgrub pa yang // mkhas pa yis ni bsgrub par
450a3(rgyud 'bum): bya/ re zhig dang po bris pa'i sku// mtshan nyid ji ltar gsungs pa bzhin// bye ba bcu bzhi'i tshogs dang ni// sna tshogs gzugs can bzhin ngan pa// lha mo dka' bzlog gdan du ni// rgyab tu kun nas
450a4(rgyud 'bum): rnam par mnan/ / nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje mkha' 'gro rnam par sprul// zhal gsum phyag ni drug pa nyid// 'od zer sngon po 'bar ba'i zhal// rol pas 'phen pa'i gdan la
450a5(rgyud 'bum): ni/ tshangs pa'i mgo ni zhabs kyis mnan// spyan gsum khro la nga rgyal can// dmar zhing dmar ba'i spyan dang ldan// 'khyil zhing rnam par dgyes pa yi// dbu skra dmar pos rnam par brgyan// rus
450a6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i thod pa'i 'phreng ba yis/ / sangs rgyas mi bzad cod pan no// bgegs kyi mgo bo bsam pa yi// klu gnyis kyis ni rnam par brgyan// shin tu rgod cing mche ba gtsigs// zhal gsum kha dog
450a7(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa'o/ / glang chen lpags pa bsnams pa'o// mi yi pags pa rab tu gsol// rgyan brgyad kyi ni gnas nyid du// dkar zhing rab 'bar rus pa'o// sangs rgyas mgo bo'i 'phreng ba dang /
450b1(rgyud 'bum): mche ba rno zhing sor mo 'bar// steng gi phyogs su mda' dang ni// gnyis pa la ni kha T+wAM ga/ gsum pas rdo rje gsor ba'o// g.yas pa sdigs mdzub zhags pa dang // gnyis pa la ni thod pa'o//
450b2(rgyud 'bum): gsum pa gzhu dang kun nas ldan// rgan byad drag mo 'jigs su rung // zhags pas bcings shing rnam par brgyan// drag mo mnan cing mche ba gtsigs// khrag 'dzag pa dang rgyal ba ni// so sor
450b3(rgyud 'bum): dbus su brgyan pa yi/ / so so'i pho nya rab tu sgrub// tshen bdun gyis ni gos pa yi// rgyun mi 'chad par rtag tu spro// khro bo mche ba gtsigs pa'i lus// 'bar ba'i 'od zer rdo rje can// mi yi keng
450b4(rgyud 'bum): rus keng rus dang / / gdugs dkar po yis mngon par g.yogs// ye shes khro bo dbang phyug bdag/ drag cing shin tu drag pa 'dul// bdud rnams thams cad gnon mdzad pa// shin tu gdug pa'i
450b5(rgyud 'bum): sems can rnams/ / zhi bas 'dul bar mi 'gyur bas// thabs dang shes rab sbyor ba yi// khro bo'i gzugs la sogs pa bstan// khwa dang bug pa bya rgod dang // ce spyang srin po khyi la sogs// 'jigs
450b6(rgyud 'bum): pa'i ku co rab sgrog dang / / mi yi keng rus kyis bkang ba'i// de ltar gzugs brnyan rab sbyor bas// 'dod dang thar pa'i don gnyer dang // thams cad khro bo 'jigs mdzad pa'o// sngags pas gzugs
450b7(rgyud 'bum): brnyan bsgrub par bya/ / oM ta hUM ma tha ma tha duny+dzan g+ha ta ya hUM phaT swA hA/ ba dan gsum sogs phyag rgya yis// las rnams kun nas rab tu byed// spos dang bdug pa la sogs dri// rgyas pa'i mchod
451a1(rgyud 'bum): pa kun ldan pas/ / dpa' bo mchod srog yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor cho ga mthong ba yis// cho ga'i yan lag sbyin sreg las// gtor ma'i las ni khyad par nyid// ma brtags
451a2(rgyud 'bum): pa yi sha dang ni/ / khrag gis kyang ni de nyid las// gang gang dngos grub 'dod pa yi// de yi rnam pas tshim par bya// oM bi dr-it+ti ni ma hA kro d+ha hUM phaT/ zla ba nyi ma brkyang nas ni// rgyab dang rgyab tu sbyar bar bya/
451a3(rgyud 'bum): dkar po gi'u wang sbrel byas nas// sa yi gdug dang pad+ma sbrel// de nyid snying po phyag rgya dang // sngags de nyid ni rnam par sbyang // phur bu ra ba tsham rngam dang // dra ba go cha mtshon cha rnams// las kyi gnas
451a4(rgyud 'bum): su dgod pa ni/ / phyag rgya 'di ni rab tu drag/ phyag rgya 'di nyid snying khar bcing // ye shes dang ni rnam shes sbyar// oM kr-i d+ha ni hUM a/ snying po mchog gi sa bon dang // phyag rgya de nyid rnam par bya//
451a5(rgyud 'bum): lus dang srog la ltos med par// chen po'i sems kyis bsgrub par bya// drag cing rno ba'i lha mo na// rno ba'i sems kyis grub par bya// cung zad zhi ba'i lha mo ni// thabs gcig gi ni mtshan nyid do//
451a6(rgyud 'bum): chu yi 'gram gyis phyogs su// sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya// 'bum phrag lnga ni bzlas pa dang // phyis ni 'bum phrag gcig gis so// zhi ba'i mchod pa phul nas ni// maM yi lus la sogs
451a7(rgyud 'bum): pa byas/ / nag por mi sha dang ni// khrag dang rnam par bsres nas mi// bris sku la sogs gzugs brnyan mdun// rdzogs pa'i tshogs sbyin phrag bya// gtor ma sbyin sreg gis tshim bya/
451b1(rgyud 'bum): thams cad las ni 'grub par 'gyur// zhi dang rgyas dang dbang drag dang // mngon par spyod pa la sogs 'grub// dri zhim chu yis bkang ba yis// bum pa rgya cher mchod pa yis// nad kyis yan lag
451b2(rgyud 'bum): gzir ba la/ / sngon du dbang bskur byin byas nas// nad kun dang ni bral ba dang // de bzhin gza' yis gnod pa nyid// skal ba dman dang mi byams pas// thams cad zhi ba thob par 'gyur//
451b3(rgyud 'bum): ser po'i tshon dang spra tshil las// log 'dren lha yi gzugs brnyan nyid// mnyam pa'i don la thal mo sbyar// phyag bzhi yis ni rnam par spras// mche ba gtsigs pas yan lag rgyas// pad+ma'i
451b4(rgyud 'bum): snod la gnas pa ni/ / rtse gsum dang ni bza' ba'i snod// dgra sta la phug phyag na'o// sor mo bzhi yi tshad du ni// rgyan kun gyis ni rnam par brgyan// bris sku'i gzugs brnyan mdun du ni//
451b5(rgyud 'bum): 'khrul 'khor 'di ni bri bar bya// gro ga 'am ni shing shun la// ga'u wang dang ni gur kum gyis// sgrub pa po yi gzugs brnyan bri// gzugs dang rnam pa kun ldan pa// snying khar ming ni bri bar
451b6(rgyud 'bum): bya/ g.yo dang lhung dang srog 'dren pa// lcags kyu kun nas ldan pa dang // dpral bar drangs nas gzhag par bya// bgegs kyi dbang po mi ni gdan// snying khar mnan nas gzhag par bya/
451b7(rgyud 'bum): me tog bdug pa sogs pas mchod// nan tan gyis ni gtor ma'i las// don 'dod 'bras bu don gnyer ba'i// rnal 'byor pas ni sngags yig bzlas// oM tra~M tha tha tha hUM dza swA hA/ me tog
452a1(rgyud 'bum): dkar po la bzlas shing / / re re zhing ni 'ardeg par bya// brgya rtsa brgyad du yongs rdzogs na// 'grub par 'di la the tsom med// sngags 'di yi ni sbyor ba yis// sgrub pa po
452a2(rgyud 'bum): yi yid g.yo zhing / / myur du 'gags shing lon pa'o// rgyal po'i dbang po dbang phyug sogs// rgyal po dang ni rgyal tsha ba dang // phyug po'i byis pa la sogs dang // shin tu mdzes pa'i bdag
452a3(rgyud 'bum): nyid lus/ / sha rtsi dang ni brgya byin sogs// gal te kun nas 'dod tsam gyis// sgrub pa po yi dbang du 'gyur// ji srid lus ni 'tsho ba'i bar// dus rtag tu ni rnam par 'dud// nga rgyal
452a4(rgyud 'bum): yan lag gtso bo bas/ / nga rgyal gyis ni 'grub par 'gyur// khro bo'i lus ni bstan pa yis// las dang las ni myur du 'grub// khro bo'i lus rnam par bstan pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
452a5(rgyud 'bum): spyod pa'i chos can kun bsdus pa// brtul zhugs mtshan nyid bstan pa'o// ye shes longs spyod 'bras 'dod pas// spyod pa'i mtshan nyid shes par bya// mi bzad
452a6(rgyud 'bum): 'a'akhor ba 'jigs pa ni/ / chags pas srid par ltung ba'o// chags pa spang ba'i lus kyis ni// rgyun du brtul zhugs yang gzung ngo // dben par shin tu mnyam bzhag pas// dngos po thams cad
452a7(rgyud 'bum): mdor bsdus pa'o/ / chags pas srid par ltung ba dang // zhen pas 'khor bar 'jug par byed// rmongs pa'i bdag nyid ring du spangs// sems can don du chos bstan phyir// sems can don byed
452b1(rgyud 'bum): gyur pas kyang / / brtul zhugs dka' thub mi zad pas// dben par sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur// chags pa'i nyes pa rgya mtshor 'khor// bdag nyid nyon mongs las rgyal phyir// sems can don blo/
452b2(rgyud 'bum): baba' zhig go/ sems can don 'gyur dus su ni// spyod dang sdom pa'i sngon bzhin no// 'du 'dzi dang bral dben pa ni// dag pa ru ni lus srung ngo // dang po re zhig rnal 'byor pas// bstan bcos
452b3(rgyud 'bum): tshig rnams blangs byas nas/ / sdom pa thams cad yang dag ldan// rab tu rno bas chos spyod do// gnas dang gnas la'ang mi gnas pa'i// nam du yang ni mi gzung ngo // bza' dang bza' min/

452b5(rgyud 'bum): kyis lam gyis ni/ / rtag tu slong mo bslang bar bya// gal te gong du spyod pa'i tshe// gang zhig bza' ston zos pa dang // mal cha ras dang mchil lham yang // longs spyo longs spyod yid 'ong

452b7(rgyud 'bum): med de/ / dngos po yang ni mi gzung ngo // sems ni rnam par dag pa yi// thams cad bza' zhing bza' ba nyid// dag cing gus bcas nga rgyal gyis// de yis gnas ni yongs su spang // dad pas
453a1(rgyud 'bum): / dkyil 'khor 'bri ba dang // yang na gtor ma'i las la ni// bsam pa'i rdzas kyi dngos po ni// de yi gnas su dbul bar bya// chos gos gsum gyi lhag ma ni// slar la

453a3(rgyud 'bum): chu tshags bcas/ / de ltar 'dzin pa'i lus la ni// glegs bam la sogs gzhan yang med// grog mo la sogs bsal ba'i phyir// rnga ma'i chun po bsngags pa yin// sangs rgyas byang chub

454a1(rgyud 'bum): bza' dang 'jam pa'i gos/ / sna tshogs dbang pos reg pa yis// gti mug chags pas go bzlog pas// srid par lhung ba'i las su 'gyur// las ni bya ba'i dbang por 'gyur//
454a2(rgyud 'bum): rmongs pa ye shes mi rtag pa'o// 'dod dang khro dang nga rgyal 'joms// srid par 'ching ba'i bza' ba'o// 'byung po 'byung la rtsa ba dang // kun nas sdig pa mi brtag go// mgon med sdug bsngal

454b1(rgyud 'bum): bo ni gnyis pa ru/ / gzung la dbang po lnga ni gzung // steng du rdo rje'i dbyug pa ni// mi yi yan lag rus pas brgyan// ba dan dril bu 'phreng ba ni// dbyug pa lag pa g.yon pas gzung // de ltar/
454b2(rgyud 'bum): bsdu ba'i lus kyis ni// 'bud pas brtul zhugs spyad par bya// 'di ltar rdzas sogs dngos po ni// me bzhin 'bar bas rag mi bya// bza' dang btung ba la sogs gzhan// dang po bsdu bar
454b3(rgyud 'bum): yang mi bya/ / snying rje phan pa'i sems kyis ni// kun nas dga' zhing bza' bar bya// thams cad gnod med pas// dngos po kun nas yongs su spang // lus ni srung ba tsam gyis ni// slong mo'i

454b6(rgyud 'bum): gsungs pa nyid/ / sdig spangs rnam par spyod pa yis// 'khor ba ru ni mi gnas pa'o// thams cad dngos po dngos med par// rtag tu sems kyis lta ba nyid// bdag nyid sangs rgyas rgyu ru ni//
454b7(rgyud 'bum): de nas tshig bcad gnyis ni brjod// sbyin pa chos kyi srung bar ni// tshig bcad gcig ni gnang bar bya// e ma'o rmongs pa yi ni mthus// lus can kun nas dbang du byas// 'dod tshogs chos
455a1(rgyud 'bum): sogs mi bzad pas/ / mkhas pa yis ni yongs su spangs// dngos med dngos po yang ma yin// gzung dang 'dzin pa mi rtog pas// srid pa'i dgon pa las rgal zhing //
455a2(rgyud 'bum): dmigs pa med pa'i bde ba 'thob// gzhan gyis brtag pa'i longs spyod sogs// nyal dang 'chag par dus gsum du// rnal 'byor tshig bcad gcig gis ni// rnal 'byor rmongs pa gcod byed
455a3(rgyud 'bum): pa'o/ / sems chen po yi sems kyis ni// brnyings pa'i ras ni bsags pa yis// de yi gos su rab tu bgos// kang rus kyis ni yan lag kun// shin tu mdzes pa'i dbyig pa bzung //
455a4(rgyud 'bum): pa Ta ha yi chos kyi brdung // rdo rje'i glu ni blang ba nyid// sems can sgrol ba'i rgyu dang ni// grong nas grong du kun tu rgyu// dmigs pa med pa'i rang bzhin gyis// brtul zhugs spyod pa mnyam par gzhan
455a5(rgyud 'bum): dag pa'i sems ni mi dmigs pas/ / dga' ba yis ni bsrung bar bya// spyod pa yis ni rgyur gyur pas// rnal 'byor spyod pa don gyi rgyu// sdig pa thams cad rnam bsal zhing // nyes pa kun
455a6(rgyud 'bum): nas rnam spangs la/ / brtul zhugs zla drug spyad pa yis// rang 'dod ye shes 'grub par 'gyur// brtul zhugs kyi spyod pa rnam par bstan pa'i le'u zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
455a7(rgyud 'bum): de nas thams cad snying po ni// de nyid kun gyi don bsdus pa// 'khor bar brtan dang g.yo bcas pa'i// kun gyi snying por rab sbyor ba'o// dang po re zhig rnal 'byor pas// yid du 'ong ba'i sa
455b1(rgyud 'bum): phyogs su/ / bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas ni// sngon du bsnyen pa la sogs bya// rdo rje'am shes rab rnal 'byor gyis// 'bum phrag gsum du bzlas byas nas// phyis ni rang 'dod pa yi las//
455b2(rgyud 'bum): 'grub par 'di la the tsom med// spra tshal la ni gzugs brnyan bya// tsha ba'i mar khus byugs byas la// snying khar ming ni gzhag pa dang // tshogs dang tshigs su tshar mas dgang // skyur po cha
455b3(rgyud 'bum): dang ma ru tse ra/ / gzugs brnyan dang ni yang dag ldan// snod du bsres la yang dag gzhag/ ye shes lus la lus kyis ni// rkang pa g.yas pas mnan par bya// rno ba'i sems kyis bzlas
455b4(rgyud 'bum): byas pas/ / mtshan mo gcig gi mtha' ru ni// 'grub par 'di la the tsom med// smin pa'i me la bzhag byas na// rgyal po myur du gdung bar 'gyur// dkon mchog gsum la gnod pa la/
455b5(rgyud 'bum): las 'di yis ni sbyar bar bya// hrIHa mo g+ha si sid haM da ha gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM hrI phaT/ snga dro nyi ma shar dus la// me tog dkar po'i maN+Dal dang // spos dang mar me'i cho ga yis// zhi ba'i las ni rnam
455b6(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / chu dang 'o ma bsres pa'i snod// de ni gtor mar sbyar nas ni// sngags ni brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas// rgyal po nad dang bral bar 'gyur// oM a mr-i ta ba ra de hUM hUM hUM a a a/ thams cad las ni bsdus byas la/
455b7(rgyud 'bum): chu bo chen po'i rgyun la bskur// rims nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i le'u rdzogs so// / de nas rab sbyor snying po 'di// sngags pas rab tu rnam par spyad// yungs kar
456a1(rgyud 'bum): las ni gzugs brnyan bya/ / snying khar ming ni rnam par sbyar// rdo dang tsher ma lte bar ro// rkang pas mnan cing bzlas par bya// su tIk+Sh+Na shU la hUM dza phaT hrIHme la bsgo
456a2(rgyud 'bum): zhing gdung ba dang / / lhag par bzlas shing gzhag par bya// 'di ltar mtshon pa'i mtshan nyid kyis// mod la gzer bas yang 'dzin to// zhi ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga las// 'o ma dang ni sbrang rtsis /
456a3(rgyud 'bum): bkru/ chu bo'i rgyun la bskur byas na// gzer zhing gzer ba'i nad dang bral// oM sarba ka ri hA dza swA hA/ gzer ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags so// de nas thams cad snying po yis/
456a4(rgyud 'bum): gzhan gyi las kyi mtshan nyid ni// sngon du bsnyen sogs bsten byas pas// las kun 'grub par 'gyur ba'o// nag po'i mtha' dang tha ma la// ba skam gyi ni lci ba las// bsgrub bya yi ni ming
456a5(rgyud 'bum): dang gzugs/ / dmar po'i tsan dan gyis ni bsku// bsgrub bya'i ming ni kun nas gzhag/ seng ldeng phur pas mig 'bras la// g.yon pa'i rkang pas mnan nas ni// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas
456a6(rgyud 'bum): byas shing / / me la bdug cing bdugs pa yis// mig ni gzer bas 'dzin par 'gyur// oM tsak+Shu ma li ni hUM phaT/ 'di yi sngags dang sngags kyis ni// 'grub par 'di la the tsom med//
456a7(rgyud 'bum): zhi ba'i mchod pas mchod byas nas// oM badz+ra tIk+Sh+Na ya hUM swA hA/ lan bdun mngon par bsngags byas nas// de'i 'o rgyun la bkrus na// bsgrub bya'i nad dang gnod pa sal// mig 'bras rno/
456b1(rgyud 'bum): zhing gsal bar 'gyur// mig nad rab tu zhi bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i cho ga'o// lhang tsher las ni bsgrub par bya// mkhas pas khrag gis bri ba'o// dug dang dur khrod sol ba yig/ mig gi
456b2(rgyud 'bum): 'bras bu byugs byas la/ / kang pa g.yon pas mnan nas ni// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pa'o// oM kriSh+Na piM ga li hUM khaM phaT/ 'di yis sngags dang sngags kyis ni// bdag nyid lci bas bran
456b3(rgyud 'bum): par bya/ / de ltar mtshan nyid kun ldan pas// bsgrub bya myur du long bar 'gyur// sbrang rtsi mar gyis bsku byas nas// bsgrub bya'i nad dang gnod pa sel// brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par
456b4(rgyud 'bum): bzlas/ / oM a mr-i ta lo tsa ne a swA hA/ long ba rab tu zhi bar byed pa'i sngags so// gzhan yang bsgrub bya sgrub pa pos// las ni shin tu rnam par spyod// dkon mchog gsum la gnod
456b5(rgyud 'bum): byed pa/ / sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ro// bag zan las ni pad+ma'i dbyibs// bsgrub bya'i ming ni dbus nyid du'o// khyi yi spu yis bug pa dgang // tsha ba'i mar khus bskus byas la/
456b6(rgyud 'bum): g.yon pa'i rkang pas mnan nas ni// brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas par bya// oM badz+ra ba ke hUM phu phaT/ ma la bsro zhing bsres pa yis// b+ha ga myur du bzlog par bya// shin tu gdug pa'i
456b7(rgyud 'bum): chung ma ni/ / 'di yi las kyis rab tu sbyar// lan bdun du ni mngon bsngags nas// sbrang rtsi 'o ma'i rgyun gyis bkru// oM su ko b+ha bi hUM he swA hA/ zhi bar byed pa'i sngags so// 'ji
457a1(rgyud 'bum): ba'i snod ni blang byas la/ / pad+ma'i dbyibs kyi rnam par bya// rdo ba'i til mar yungs kar gyis// bug pa dgang zhing sbyor bar bya// rkang pa g.yon pas mnan nas ni// sa
457a2(rgyud 'bum): ldeng phur pas brdung bya zhing / / sngags ni brgyad brgya rab bzlas na// b+ha ga gzir zhing gzi bar 'gyur// hri pi la ta hUM phaT/ 'di yi sngags dang sngags kyis ni// b+ha ga gzir ba'i las nyid
457a3(rgyud 'bum): do/ / chu dang 'o mar bkru bya zhing // sngags dang mngon du sbyar bar bya// oM sarba sho d+ha ni swA hA/ 'di yi sngags dang sngags kyis ni// b+ha ga gzir sogs las grol lo// gzhan yang las kyi
457a4(rgyud 'bum): mtshan nyid ni/ / shin tu rnal 'byor pas spyad do// rgyal po lam gyis rdul blang // yang ni bzhi mdo'i sa rdul las// pad+ma'i mtshan nyid mtshan nyid ni// b+ha ga'i snying po khrag dang ni// yi dgas
457a5(rgyud 'bum): phyag rgya phyag rgya yis/ / brgya rtsa brgyad du mngon par bzlas// hri pri phaT/ 'di yi sngags dang sngags kyis ni// pad+ma sdom pa'i las su 'gyur// oM a mr-i ta wa ti swA hA/ dkon mchog gsum la
457a6(rgyud 'bum): gnod pa dang / / bla ma dang ni slob dpon smod// dam tshig spyod la 'phya ba ni// sdig gis gos par mi 'gyur ro// gal te rmongs shing khro ba ni// las kyis rtag tu byas nas ni// 'dis ni nges par ltung
457a7(rgyud 'bum): ba ru/ sangs rgyas kyis gsung the tsom med// las kyi rab tu dbye ba zhes bya ba'i le'u rdzogs so// / gsang zhing gsang ba'i de nyid don// snying po'i mchog ni mdor bsdus pa/
457b1(rgyud 'bum): rol mo bstan bcos sogs glu yi// de nyid thar pa go 'phang gnas// gnyis med dngos po'i ngo bo la// gzung dang 'dzin pa ji ltar 'gyur// gnyis kyi dngos po bdag min pas// gnyis dngos dngos po
457b2(rgyud 'bum): med pa yi/ / dngos po dngos min dngos med la// mnyam nyid lta ba'i sems kyis su// rnam par rten dang brten bya med// rtog cing rnam rtog 'khrul pa dang // gzugs dang gzugs can zad par byed//
457b3(rgyud 'bum): rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin nyid// sems kyi brtan pa'i gnas su ni// bsam gtan bsam bya bsam par bya// dmigs pa med pa'i rang bzhin nyid// thams cad dbyibs su 'jig par byed// stong nyid stong la sogs
457b4(rgyud 'bum): stong pa'i/ / nam mkha'i khams kyi mtha' can nyid// dag cing phra la phra ba'i don// sems dang sems pa dang bcas pas// kun tu dngos po dngos med pas// thams cad nam mkha' bsdam pa'o// rtag cing rtag la rtag pa'i/
457b5(rgyud 'bum): don nam mkha'i khams ltar bstan sems pas// me stag rdul phran yan lag 'phro// chu skyar bzhin du brtag pa yi// rnam shes ye shes lhag ma ni// nam mkhar 'phro zhing snang ba'o// nyon mongs de bzhin
457b6(rgyud 'bum): mun pa ni/ / ye shes rdo rjes bcom nas su// rnam par shes pa lhan cig 'bar// ye shes snang ba sogs thob 'gyur// sems dang sems byung sems pa yis// rnam par lta zhing rab tu spyad// 'jigs pa med cing
457b7(rgyud 'bum): 'tshe med par/ / dngos pos dngos po bsgom par bya// thams cad kun tu snang byed cing // thams cad 'od zer kun bsdus pa// snying po'i sa bon sa bon ni// dkar dang kun da zla ba'i mdog/ a li ka li rab sbyor bas//

459a1(rgyud 'bum): @##/ chos mchog go/ rdo rje sems ni rjes mchod pa'i// hUM gi glu yi rnam pas bya// bkra shis sgra ni snyan pa yis// mnyam par bzhag pas blang bar
459a2(rgyud 'bum): byA/ tri b+hu ba na dzA la ti mUrti a nu ra ya na wa ti/ rasmi saM ha sra tIk+tA d+ha sa su pa ra sra wa ti/ ba hU bi da ru pa pe sha a nu ra ya na ta ta ta wa ti/ na ta i badz+ra sa pa
